Summary: We visited Disneyland over 5 days in February. We stayed at BWPPI. Location is literally across the street from the entrance of DLR. Our room was clean and comfortable. It even faced the park. We were able to see the fireworks one evening. I especially liked being able to see Space Mountain while lying on the bed. Only downside was the road noise at night but that was no fault of the hotel. I have a bad knee and was able to rent an ECV in the lobby which was convenient. We attended breakfast on a few of the mornings. The space was clean. The staff friendly. Lots of hot items: eggs, French toast, bacon, etc. Plenty of fruit, cereals, breads, and juices. We were pleasantly surprised with our whole stay and would definitely return.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed here during a short Disneyland trip. Obviously the best part is the location. Three minutes from Disneyland gate to crosswalk across from the hotel. I never had the breakfast but drove by it when I was leaving and it looked a bit paltry. Pool is open, ground floor rooms hear the people above, unfortunately there’s nothing that can be done about that. Walking distance to a McDonald’s and a Panera. Room was spacious but the bathroom was tiny. Pretty decent sized refrigerator for a hotel. We’re staying again in a few weeks in one of the mini suites so we’ll see how the size difference is compared to a standard double room (two double beds). Parking is $15 per day and you’re limited to one car per room. There weren’t any USB ports in the room so bring your plugs! I will
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to tell us about your stay. We're sorry there were a few things that weren't completely up to standard. We look forward to seeing you again in a few weeks to hopefully improve your experience!

Summary: The hotel had nice clean and a very short walk to the parks. The hotel was right across the street from Disneyland front gate.  Central location with many restaurants  near by to eat including the Garden Walk Mall.  The only bummer was there was only room for one car to park.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stay here every year when we come to Disneyland. Recommend staying the night before visiting Disneyland so you can eat a wonderful complimentary breakfast and quickly walk 5 min to the Disneyland entrance. With young kids, the location makes it so easy to come back to rest at the hotel during the day. The breakfast is high-quality. Hot breakfast (eggs, sausage, bacon, potatoes), bagels and bread with jams, peanut butter, and Nutella!, and yogurt containers. Grabbed a couple wrapped danishes, granola bars, and fruit to enjoy at Disneyland. The rooms are comfortable and spacious - we like the 2 beds plus sofa bed for our family of 5. It was cold and rainy during our visit and were happy to come back to a very warm room. We didn’t use the heater but the room was very toasty. It
Manager Response: none

Summary: This Best Western is the best choice on Harbor Blvd. Unmatched location, clean rooms, and overall just a great value. Would not think of staying anywhere else for a Disneyland trip, and definitely recommend.
Manager Response: none

Summary: You can't go wrong with this hotel given its prime location. Not only it's closest to the front gate of disneyland, it's close to a lot of quick eats (whereas Grand Californian is far from the cheap eats). Staff is friendly and the free breakfast had a lot of variety. Will definitely recommend!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel offers a great breakfast, close to the park and comfortable rooms! Who could ask for more?! We took our family to Disneyland for our granddaughter first trip! Being so close to the park was great to be able to take her back for a nap with ease!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Staff was very helpful and friendly, rooms were nice and clean. Love the big vanity. Beds were pretty comfy, but needed a bit more blankets as we got cold the first couple of nights until we asked and got more.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Clean room, comfortable, enough pillows, quiet and across the street from Disneyland and at walking distance to restaurants. This is the second time we stay here and we'll be coming back again next time.

Summary: We stayed here for a family Disneyland trip. The hotel was wonderful. Clean rooms, comfortable beds, and a great breakfast each day. Being able to walk to Disneyland and come back for midday rest was perfect.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: An excellent property from which to visit Disneyland
Summary: We joined our son and his family on their trip to Disneyland. We were in adjacent rooms and found the rooms to be very sound-proof as we rarely (and barely) heard their 1 yr old. The hotel is extremely well located for easy walking access to Disneyland, the breakfast buffet was substantial and excellent, and the hot items varied daily. The pool area was clean and well-maintained.

Summary: We love staying here! Can’t beat the location, price, breakfast and cleanliness. We love the suites! Staff is always friendly. If going to disneyland this is by far the best hotel. Super accommodating.

Summary Heading: Best hotel for proximity to Disneyland!
Summary: We stayed at the BW Park Place Inn in late January for a Disneyland trip - we had 11 people total (6 adults, 1 teenager -14-, 4x kids 10-8-8-6).   We rented 2 family suites that each had 2 beds, and a pull out couch - the rooms were quite spacious for the amount of people using them - we love that the toilet/shower is separate from the sink as people could get ready on the outside while others were using the shower/toilet room.    One person in each room rented a scooter, and they fit inside the room with little struggle (they had to be charged each night to be ready to go the next day).  One party left a day earlier than the other, and we were able to put two scooters in one room for that last day/night.  Each room has one closet, and one dresser with 3 drawers - for the amount

Summary Heading: Very expensive for what you get. Be careful with parking charges!
Summary: The pictures are misleading because the lobby looks nice, but the rest of the place is budget motel quality. We come to Disneyland a lot and I've always wanted to try this place because it is so close to the Disneyland entrance. It ended up being a poor and very expensive stay.  I won't be back.   Positives: closest motel to entrance. Electric scooter rental counter in the lobby. Decent free hot breakfast with many choices offered til 9:30 AM. Large fridge and microwave. Sofa bed was above average.   Cons: Parking is additional fee of $15/night. You can't park in their lot til mid afternoon your first day and you must be out of the lot by 3pm on the day of checkout. But where to go if you plan to stay in the park and you've rented a wheel chair in their lobby?? My paperwork said

Summary: This hotel exceeds my expectation! They have the best hotel free breakfast I ever had! The hot food options were different every day for the 3 days we stayed! It was even better than the airport lounge! The room was clean and spacious. I read some negative reviews on google prior my visit so I lowered my expectation. But I think those reviews maybe for another Best Western that is just 1 block away from this hotel, because I didn't experience any of those negative reviews. Overall I am super happy with the price I paid for the location, the free breakfast, and the spacious room we experienced!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Being the closest hotel to Disneyland is not the best. Only 1 working elevator for the whole 3 story hotel. No working TV, badly working a/c, breakfast was upstairs next door with no elevator. Staff didn't seem to care that there were issues and made fun of us for needing an elevator. Stay at any other hotel on the block and you will pay less and get better staff.

Summary: it was my first time here but must say i would definitely go back! clean and comfortable room and very convenient to Disneyland just a walk across the street :) my wife loved the room and was happy :)

Close to other eateries such as ihop, tony romas and a mexican resturant right next door. It is a great place if you have a young family and want to take a break in the day from the disney parks before you head back in at night.

What we didn’t like is that they don’t do housekeeping in your whole stay. They only set the needed but they leave it over the beds. So you don’t have a clean room and made beds when you get to your room after a very busy day.   We would probably stay here again even if they don’t do the house keeping because of the walkable distance they have to Disney.

Summary: I was impressed with the size of our room and the hot breakfast . They served breakfast early enough to make it to Disneyland before it opened.My family also enjoyed the use of the outdoor pool in January because it was heated.

Summary Heading: Best location and breakfast around Disneyland!
Summary: This hotel is literally across the street and it makes it so nice after a long day. The breakfast is amazing! So many options that everyone will be happy and full! The staff was very nice and helpful.

Summary: Great hotel, responsive to fixing our heat.  Breakfast was tasty and plentiful. Staff were wonderful. Location is out of this world and I can't imagine staying at a different property on return trips to Disneyland.

Summary: This hotel was an amazing find for the location and also the friendly service and cleanliness. I would 100% recommend this hotel to anyone wanting to stay within walking distance to Disneyland. Continental Breakfast was fantastic and the staff was very helpful and friendly.

Summary Heading: Great Price, Great Stay, Great Customer Service!
Summary: I stayed for two nights with my family of 6 and my overall experience was great! Free complimentary breakfast, great start to the morning before leaving to the parks which is a short walk, right across the street!! The room was nice and clean, and the staff at reception were so welcoming. The woman at the front desk explained everything very well. The staff at breakfast were super friendly and amazing! They were also bilingual which I appreciated! Housekeeping did a great job at keeping our room tidy! Amazing amazing amazing! I have nothing bad to say.

Summary: We have wanted to stay here for years and finally had the chance. There was nothing that disappointed us in our experience. When we needed a late checkout because of an illness the hotel staff was accommodating and helped us. We can’t wait to stay here again.

Summary: Location can’t be bet and has free breakfast. Breakfast items are very limited but still free. Our bathroom Faucet was leaking and had to use our towels to keep our things dry, elevator broken and shower has no pressure. No housekeeping service.

Summary: Our entire family--11 people, 3 mini-suites--stayed here for all of Thanksgiving week, and could not have been happier with our choice of a Disneyland-area hotel.  Location--nearly perfect. Lobby staff--friendly and efficient.  Cleanliness--absolutely no complaints.  Housekeeping staff--cheerful and responsive.  Room size--excellent for a family of four (but do spring for the mini-suite!).  Breakfast--top-notch.  I could nit-pick a few minor issues:  the air-conditioner was noisy; the TV remote was tricky; the upstairs neighbors seemed to be throwing anvils around (who's fault is that?).  But for one-third the price of the Disneyland Hotel, we were closer to the parks, with included breakfast and comfortable beds.  This was our third stay, and we will continue to make it our

Summary: The location & amenities (breakfast, fridge & microwave) cannot be beat. It’s so convenient & practical for families with children. However the cleanliness of room is awful. The carpets are so filthy we couldn’t relax: we had to wear slippers in the room & had to make effort to keep everything and everyone (kids included) off the floor. The outside sidewalk felt cleaner. The room is extremely dusty too. We got bitten by dust mites & when the AC was on, dust flew everywhere.  We used to love this hotel & have been loyally staying here & recommending to others in the last 20 years. This stay has made us want to consider other options in the future.

Summary Heading: Free breakfast right across from Disney
Summary: Hotel is right across from Disney-closer than 2 of the 3 Disney hotels. Free breakfast that was basic with some waffles, breakfast meats and the normal hotel quick breakfast items. Small parking lot but safe with a gate that only guests can get in. Quiet despite some rooms being close to the main road

Summary: We stayed at BW Plus in Anaheim November 15-19.  It is right across from Disneyland.  You cannot get any closer.  The only thing we didn't like was the height of the beds.  My husband and are older and it was difficult to get in and out.  It might be fine if you are taller or younger.  There is a free breakfast next door, but you have to climb stairs, which might be difficult for some people.  We probably will not use it again because I have trouble with stairs. The breakfast had a nice variety of food.  The beds and pillows were comfortable.  There were plenty of outlets.  There was a nice bathroom counter for any beauty & make-up, etc you needed to store.  There was a frig, microwave & TV. There was no daily housekeeping.

Summary: Staff is super friendly and helpful and the complementary breakfast is really good. If you're going to Disney, you can't beat the location. Never heard the neighbors except for when the kids ran up and down the outside hallway. Walls are nice and thick.

Summary: This is an excellent location; our rooms were clean and very comfortable. They did run out of blankets but were as accommodating as they could be. For a first time visit to the area and Diseny, I would recommend as well as stay there again.

Summary Heading: Best place for a Disneyland trip
Summary: The hotel is clean, and everyone is friendly but most importantly its only a 5 minute walk to the park. Breakfast was great. There was a nice variety of choices that varied each morning. Two people in our group have a severe gluten intolerance and were pleasantly surprised with the options available to them, including bread for toast! My favorite was the chorizo egg scramble & what seemed like a homemade tortilla!! Other note worthy things: comfortable beds & electric scooter rental in lobby.

Summary: You cannot beat the location of this off-property hotel for Disneyland visits! It is a bit pricey for a BW, but I traveled solo, planned to stay in the parks until late and did not want to worry about walking too far at the end of the evening, so was willing to pay the higher price. The room was clean. The heating/cooling unit was loud (which I have found to be typical in BW hotels) and the bathroom fans made a screeching noise off/on when used. I arrived early and didn’t receive my room assignment until later, but they made it easy to check my luggage so that I could just get to the parks. Summary: You are really paying for the convenience. Everything was clean. Verizon doesn't work well here but the wifi was fine in my room. Breakfast is decent. The pull out bed is a little ricketty. Thin walls.

Summary: The staff are amazing, my friend and I lost our cases on the way to Anaheim, and the staff went above and beyond to help us and make us feel comfortable, especially Cassandra, she is wonderful.  Also you quite literally couldn’t be closer to Disneyland, it’s so close!

Summary: This is the ONLY hotel my family will stay at when traveling to Disneyland/ DCA. My family have now stayed at this hotel 3 times this year; Feb, March, October. My kids love the pool, and the location allows for midday naps without having to wait for shuttles- just walk across the street/ crosswalk. I always recommend this hotel to all friends and family visiting Disneyland/ DCA. You will not be disappointed- I promise!

Summary: We loved how close the property was. Typically we park in the Disney parking garage, walk to the tram, then walk from the tram drop off to the park entrances. It's a lot of time and steps. Summary: I booked two rooms for three nights in early October for a Disneyland trip. the only thing positive about this place is the location. I showed the email saying I booked both rooms but bc I put the second room in my daughters name, they refused to let me in. She was coming in on a later flight and the desk staff actually told me to call her to see if it’s OK if I could go in the room. For goodness sake‘s, she was traveling solo with a toddler and a baby and about to board the plane, and I’m supposed to call her to get permission to get into her room.  Ridiculous!

Summary: It was a very clean Hotel with excellent service and an awesome breakfast! We stayed for 6 days and the service could not have been better. The breakfast was well above the average prepared breakfast and the service there was also very very good!

Way too expensive for the noise and cleanliness of the rooms.  Only plus about this hotel is that it’s across from Disney.

Some people complain about little things with this hotel, but it's great for the price and area!

Summary: Staff was friendly and informative, room was clean, with proper amenities. We had leftover dinner from near by restaurant so didn't take advantage of breakfast so not sure how that was. Location is amazing to access Disney Parks, but the price for what you get is questionable, it's not like it's a top of the line resort for over $300 a night but because of the location people will pay for the convenience. It's kind of unfortunate that the hotel industry takes advantage of people like that.

Summary: BW Park Place is a fantastic place to stay.  You couldn't ask for a better location. The accommodations were perfect for our purpose.  We were able to get adjoining rooms as requested. The wait staff for breakfast were outstanding.

Summary Heading: Scheduled water shut off without notice to guests
Summary: The water was shut off from 11 am to 3 pm with no notice to guests. We were told they planned it to coincide with the time between checkout & new check ins. But, since it was mid stay, it would have been nice to know this before coming back to a room with no water.  Ask for a room towards the back, as the walkways are bumpy & roller wheeled suitcases going by early in the morning sounds like a thunderstorm every time it happens.  But, the location is good & the breakfast is adequate. The room is fairly basic, but ok.

Summary: We love staying at this Best Western for many reasons. The staff are amazing. They are always willing to help and go out of their way to help make your experience the best it can be. The rooms are always clean. The location can't be beat. And the breakfast is always a great way to start off your day. The scooter rental staff are fantastic. And the pool is always fun. We wouldn't choose to stay anywhere else.

Summary Heading: Staff is fantastic - don’t take off your shoes
Summary: Staff was so great and did everything they could for us. Pretend you’re camping and don’t take off your flip flops. Floors are vacuumed but not steam cleaned and turn your feet black. Great location, but building could use some sanitation. All towels and sheet snell strongly of bleach, and ac is on all the time, but filters probably haven’t been changed in years. Immediate sinus congestion every time we entered our room.

Summary: We always walk past this hotel on our way to whatever other hotel we are staying at when going to Disneyland and we were finally able to book it and try it out.  The location is the biggest draw, no other hotel is closer. Just steps from the crosswalk to the entrance, maybe a 15 minute walk to the front gate.  The staff at check in were super friendly and accommodating. The lobby was very nice and they have a self checkout store area which was convenient.  The room itself was nice.  We were on the third floor, which was kind of annoying after a long day, even with the elevator because it was incredibly hot and slow.  Plenty of towels. Bathroom had a somewhat accessible setup, bars on the toilet and shower but the shower did have lip and there was two shower heads but very little

Summary Heading: Comfortable basic hotel close to Disneyland with great breakfast
Summary: I chose the hotel on the recommendation of my travel companion who was staying at a Disney resort & knew I needed something more affordable. It was close walking distance to the parks and downtown Disney. It was clean, quiet, and comfortable with good amenities. The breakfast buffet was substantial with several hot choices. The staff were lovely & helpful. The minor downsides were a fairly small pool which felt crowded with very few people in it & a somewhat noisy air conditioner. I felt safe there as a single woman.

Summary: Can’t beat the location. Right across the street from one of the entrances to Disneyland. Depending on the security line, 10-15 min walk and you are in the park. They have a free breakfast which is decent.  Pool is kinda small. Lots of noise outside the room, but that’s to be expected at a hotel near Disneyland.  Facilities are old and dated, but well maintained. Water pressure is good and never had a problem with hot water.

Summary Heading: Ideal spot close to the park
Summary: If you’re looking for a budget friendly, breakfast included, close to the park place to lay your heads, look no further. This is everything you’ll need in a hotel you’re only in to sleep before you’re up and at it again. The breakfast was key - a GREAT start to the day!

Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights, and visited one park per day. The location was incredible. It is right across the street to the entrance. Right across the hotel, is a Mexican restaurant that is a great dinner spot but in the morning, it is where you go for the hotel’s free breakfast on the 2nd floor. Breakfast included pancakes/waffles, ham, potatoes, cereals, donuts, bear claws, and fruits. All of the staff were friendly. There was someone making character balloons as well. The room was perfect for our family of 4. We had 2 queen beds, a breakfast table, and a stand with a TV. The pool and hot tub were great as well. The front desk staff were very helpful with any questions or to get us extra towels or shampoo/conditioner. We had an excellent stay at Best Western Park Place Inn.

Summary: Our stay was awesome everything was walking distance for thr trip pre plained would diffinitly plain again n the future for other family events would also recommend to other family. THANKS AGAIN BEST WESTERN

Overall we enjoyed our stay and would stay here again. It is a little pricey but we had best western points we used to help with costs. Location is perfect for DL.

Summary: Great hotel if you are going to Disneyland! Breakfast included!!  Great size room and the couch was a pullout. Staff was very attentive and delivered everything we needed in a timely fashion. There are also lots of places to eat that are walking distance!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great hotel! Location cannot be beat!
Summary: This hotel was located directly across from the park gates. Quick 5 minute walk. Breakfast was great, with both hot and cold foods to choose from. Check in and check out was easy and fast. Laundry room was a bonus. Pool was warm enough to swim in even at night. Will definitely be staying here the next time we go to Disneyland!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed at this Hotel because it was the closest Hotel to the entrance of Disney Theme Parks(Just across the street) and for that fact alone and other reviews we saw online...We were not disappointed! Our room was clean and comfortable with a great breakfast menu in the morning! Also our car was in a secured place...We were SO happy to come back here after a very ;long day of walking! Fell into bed...Disney Dreams!.....
Manager Response: none

Summary: Best location to stay for our Disneyland vacation!!! The staff is friendly. The breakfast had a great selection including hot choices. The room was big, had all the amenities we needed. The beds were comfy.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed this hotel for our disneyland trip.  location was perfect just across the street from park!!!   and plus free breakfast!  our family of 5 had breakfast in the morning and go from there to the park.  i will  definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Best place to stay if going to Disneyland. The hotel is closer to the parks than Disney's hotels for 1/3 the cost plus it includes breakfast. Rooms and clean and staff is great. Just across the street from where the buses pick up guest.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Was a good time for us
Summary: The location and breakfast was awesome. Rooms were your normal style rooms, nothing special. They take good care of you there. The parking lot is tiny, so don’t bring your truck, or huge SUV or probably expect to get door dings. Other than that, you can’t beat it.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Asked for early checkin 3 days ago because coming from Knotts area. Front desk girl seemed confident it would be do-able . They are making us wait here 3 hours until official check in time. When we parked the room was being made up and has not been re entered since.  Can see it since we are parked right outside of it. Front desk will not even call to see if done! We travel a lot and stay at Best Western exclusive. Have already stayed at 5 different ones on this check and all honored early checkin for us. We are over 70 snd husband has COPD. This BW has horrible customer ice!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Must stay if going to Disney
Summary: Our tired feet were glad we didn’t have to walk any further than this very close hotel! The rooms were clean & comfortable. The breakfast was one of the best hotel meals I’ve had! Employees are amazing!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great stay. Nice breakfast. Nice big and clean room. Ice machine on each floor and vending. I walked to CVS which is a half mile away for snacks. Closest hotel to Disneyland so just a minute or two walk to get to security and into the parks. Will stay again. Highly recommend.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: You’re paying for the location to Disney which can’t be beaten but a basic hotel
Summary: We chose this hotel purely for its location to the Disney parks and for that - it can’t be faulted. Literally across the road to the entrance so this can’t be beaten and the hotel can be forgiven a few of its faults purely due to this!  There’s an Ihop and other fast food places close by too . If you’re going to be out at the parks all day and just coming back to sleep then this will do.  The rooms itself are basic but comfortable and clean. Air-con unit was extremely noisy when switched on - luckily we didn’t need it much in April. Bathrooms small and tired. We had a problem with The shower in our suite - it wouldn’t turn off properly so was running water but even when reported to house keeping - when we returned to our room after being at the park all day - it was still
Manager Response: none

Summary: Can't beat the location, but the property is definitely riding that coattail.  Once they bring back daily housekeeping, this could be a great option for your Disney trip. Be forewarned that the AC is nowhere near consistent.
Manager Response: none

Summary: If you’re going to Disneyland and staying off resort, you cannot beat this location. The location is perfect especially with little ones!  But must warn not else is remarkable. Most of the staff is unfriendly and breakfast is nothing at all to note. Rooms are okay but not the best kept. This hotel is all about location and essentials. If that is what you’re looking for, it works out just fine!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We just got home from a 5 night stay and had a great experience. Hotel is older, but very well kept. Rooms are basic but were very clean and spacious.  We need maintenance and housekeeping on 2 separate occasions for small issues and both times they were at our room door to assist us within minutes of me calling the front desk.  Everyone was extremely friendly, helpful and responsive. I have nothing but great things to say about every employee that we encountered!!! Everyone was so nice!  Breakfast was your standars free hotel breakfast fare, but it was hot amd filled us up. I loved the pre-packaged grab n go section as well.  You cant beat the location of this hotel, being right across the street from Disneyland!!  Overall, I would definitely stay here again and would recommend
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Closest hotel to Disneyland! Right across the street with awesome complimentary breakfast.
Summary: If you want THE hotel right across the street from Disneyland, this is it! Super convenient location, amazing complimentary breakfast offerings — during our stay there was a variety of hot foods like pancakes, waffles, French toast sticks, sausage, eggs. They also had cereal, toast, English muffins, juices, coffee, water dispensers. Was close enough to go hang out at the room in the middle of the day and take a break. Rooms are standard but clean and comfortable. Was our first visit to Disneyland and couldn’t have asked for a more convenient place to stay off property. 10/10 recommend!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The location was amazing with only a 5 minute walk to park entrances and Downtown Disney. In addition there were several restaurants to choose from.   The staff was extremely friendly and helpful with any questions.   The breakfast was a good variety of hot breakfast items and packaged to-go items.   The rooms were spacious and it was nice to have an extra sitting area with the couch.   Overall - if you are looking at this hotel for your Disneyland vacation, book it!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Right in front of Disneyland.. have a lot of food places walking distant from hotel. breakfast is awesome, plenty of hot and cold choices. Had no trouble finding parking. Would definitely recommend and stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: After arriving at 2:45 there was an extremely late check-in 6pm the room smelled like mold and old cigarettes. There's no daily room service and you pay an increased rate for less service.  They don't offer a 1pm checkout.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel is practical for visiting Disneyland but is a little pricey to stay in. Also they don’t change out your towels unless you go to the office and ask for some. The breakfast is good but not amazing.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hotel location in proximity to Disneyland parks was INCREDIBLE!  Couldn’t ask for anything closer!  Room was clean and comfortable. Two Queen size beds and a sofa pullout, but we didn’t utilizes the pull-out were PERFECT for our needs!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed here for 3 nights to celebrate my birthday at the Disneyland Resort. I love that it's walking distance and so comfortable. The pool and hot tub was great! One of my kids had homework to finish and utilized the computers in the lobby (her laptop was acting up), she said everyone was so nice and helpful. The bed and pillows are so comfortable, we all slept great! The included breakfast is always plentiful and so appreciated. I was able to get a room with what should've been a view of fireworks, but the California breezes were to blame for no fireworks =( Maybe next time. This is my go-to place, every time. Parking is $15/ night but again, for me it's totally worth it to just walk across the street. Already have my reservations for our next trip in July.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for choosing to celebrate with us! We're so happy to hear you had a memorable trip. Our staff works very hard to ensure all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again soon!

Summary: We loved absolutely everything about our stay at Best Western. The rooms are large and clean, the beds comfortable and the FREE breakfast was the best deal in town. We didn't need to wait for downtown-Disney to open to eat. 6:30 Breakfast and 8:00 hop into the park. The breakfast is wonderful and did I say FREE. Every person we encountered at Best Western could not have been nicer. The servers in the breakfast room went out of their way to be helpful and kind. They were top notch in any restaurant. We loved our entire trip. From Grand kidsto Grandparents we all loved our stay. And the best ever easy walk into the park. Walk out your door and cross the street to The Happiest Place on Earth.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay! Our staff works very hard to ensure all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again soon!

Summary: We stayed at the BW Plus in April 2022.  The closeness of the park was a major plus for us, right across the street. Our room was very clean and spacious.  Check in process was swift and easy. The staff was very attentive and helpful.   Our family will definitely be staying here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay! Our staff works very hard to ensure all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again soon!

Summary Heading: Happiest place on earth to Spend the night!
Summary: I Never stay any place else at Disneyland! Accommodations are excellent and it is truly right across from the tram entrance to the park. I share with everyone I know that is going to stay in Anaheim to make reservations with Best Western suites.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to tell us about your stay. We're glad you enjoyed our convenient location. We appreciate your continued patronage and thank you for telling your friends about us! We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We stayed here for a week and it was so great. The distance to the park is just amazing. You can’t get any closer. The staff are all so kind and accommodating! The free breakfast was yummy. Lots of options for everyone. I also liked the fact you can take the breakfast to go if you’re short on time. The rooms are quite large which is a nice surprise. I loved that there was a microwave and fridge. The beds were great. I slept so good. We were on the third floor and I really liked it. It was quiet. I can’t say enough good things about this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay! Our staff works very hard to ensure all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again soon!

Summary: Great proximity to Disneyland. The rooms could use updating, the mattresses were well worn out. Breakfast buffet was average, the pool was “closed for maintenance the 4 days we were there which was a disappointment for my granddaughter.
Manager Response: On behalf of our entire team, I would like to apologize for not exceeding your expectations. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you gave us to implement improvements to ensure we offer a better experience for guests in the future. I hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you with a superior experience.

Summary: Do not clean the room at all for 4 days stay with kids. Called reception and did mot responded at all. Want to enjoy stay so away from this hotel. Get better hotel with few steps of walking. My whole family hated the stay.
Manager Response: On behalf of our entire team, I would like to apologize for not exceeding your expectations. Summary: Couldn’t ask for a better location. Disney entrance across the street makes it even better!! Having a hot breakfast every morning was nice too and they changed it up each morning giving you options. Would stay again!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to tell us about your stay. We're glad you enjoyed our convenient location and fulfilling breakfast. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Friendly staff . there was a mistake with my reservation but the handled it right away!!! Great room excellent location across the street from Disney made the trip very easy and enjoyable. Would definitely stay there agin.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay! Our staff works very hard to ensure all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again soon!

Summary: Excellent location to Disneyland       Excellent hot breakfasts Overall nice place with very nice staffing Finally was able to take our vacation that had been scheduled prior to Covid - was so nice to stay here!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to tell us about your stay. We're glad you enjoyed our convenient location and fulfilling breakfast. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Eric - in the lobby was very knowledgeable and so friendly
Summary: When we needed fresh towels and paper Eric made sure to have to delivered right away. Every morning we were greeted with a friendly face and a hot breakfast. The whole staff was friendly and helpful. Very convenient
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay! Our staff works very hard to ensure all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again soon!

Summary Heading: Best hotel for price, service, location, amenities, staff, and pre-Disney breakfast.
Summary: This hotel is the BEST and most convenient for Disney travel. Staff is always very friendly and helpful. Rooms are clean and facility is well kept. The pre-Disney morning breakfast is perfect! Do it!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to tell us about your stay. We're glad you enjoyed our convenient location and fulfilling breakfast. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Excellent service with an excellent location
Summary: I was very impressed with all the staff here and especially the front desk staff. The breakfasts were great, with the hot foods hot (they even covered the plate with another plate to keep it that way longer) and great options with other foods too. The location of having Disneyland right across the street was very nice too, especially since we seemed to walk literally for miles in the park each day. I would definitely recommend this location!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay! Our staff works very hard to ensure all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again soon!

Summary: Room was clean, towels are fully stocked, room was spacious and the pool was clean and never crowded! We liked everything from the breakfast to the location. It is literally a 2 minute walk to Disneyland!! This is a solid 3 star suite/ hotel, very basic but clean. The price is too high per night because of its location. Minus 1 star for parking, they have very tight parking spaces.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! We're happy to hear our location was convenient for you. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: The staff is very nice.  The room was excellent.  If you have trouble walking, breakfast was up two flights of stairs.  They do offer to bring a plate down to you.  It's a convenient location to Disneyland and we were happy with our stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! We're happy to hear our location was convenient for you. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Service was good! Enjoyed the hot tub! Clean hotel! Basic room, but comfortable! Not a whole lot of extras, but amazing location (right across the street from Disneyland entrance). Under $300 which seemed to be a good value for the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! We're happy to hear our location was convenient for you. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: This facility is great because the staff is great. Check in was delayed due to staffing shortage and understandable. One day of parking was comped. Internet functioned perfectly during our 3 night stay. Ability to rent a scooter at a very reasonable rate was a huge plus for two of our family members. Children and adults enjoyed the pool and jacuzzi. Will definitely stay here again with absolutely no reservations in doing so.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay! Our staff works very hard to ensure all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again soon!

Summary: This is a nice hotel and the location is amazing.  The rooms are nicely decorated and appear to be recently updated.  The free breakfast is a nice amenity to have.  The rooms can get noisy, but I didn't find the noise level to be to problematic.  But if you are bothered by hearing people outside your room, just something to be aware of.  The location is the main selling point. This hotel is literally across the street from Disneyland.  We were in the farthest room from the street and still our walk to and from the parks was super short (about 10 minutes to bag check).  If you are going to Disneyland, this hotel is a great option.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! We're happy to hear our location was convenient for you and our breakfast kept you fueled for your day at the parks. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: This hotel has the nicest, most helpful staff of any place I've stayed. Everyone I encountered really extended themself to me.   The rooms are immaculate and have a microwave, huge frig and coffee maker.   Just across the street from Disneyland, the location is great!   I will be staying there on my next trip!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay! Our staff works very hard to ensure all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again soon!

Summary: The best place to stay for Disneyland.  Free hot breakfast and free wi-fi.  The food is always good.  You can rent a scooter right in the lobby and it’s way cheaper than Disney.  Parking is also a great value.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay! Our staff works very hard to ensure all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again soon!

Summary: Can't beat the location in proximity to Disneyland. If you map it out, its closer than the Disneyland hotel. Room was nice and spacious. Sometimes loud since there are a lot of kids getting excited for Disney and dragging suitcases down the walkway, but didn't bother us. Love having a free breakfast to save some money- nothing special, but again saves money. There are a couple of restaurants very close which is also a nice benefit. Also appreciated having a fridge and microwave. Staff was super friendly. Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay! Our staff works very hard to ensure all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again soon!

Summary: We stay here whenever we go to Disneyland. The location is great. The staff is always friendly and accommodating. The rooms are clean and the beds are comfortable. It is so close to the park, we love being able to take breaks and go back to the room.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to tell us about your stay! We're glad you have enjoyed our convenient location time and time again. We appreciate your continued patronage. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Another great stay at the closest hotel to Disneyland!
Summary: This is my second stay at BW Park Place Inn, and there really is no closer option. While there are quite a few options nearby, when your feet hurt from being in the park all day it is nice to cross the street and be back to your hotel in minutes. It's convenient to grab a sweatshirt or drop off souvenirs or take a quick break. Breakfast is decent, lots of grab and go options as well as hot food and the rooms are clean and spacious enough for a family of 4.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! We're happy to hear our location was convenient for you. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Not enough comfort even for the location
Summary: We finally paid more for our stay on one of our Disney trips. We were so excited for the location. The problem is, the location makes you feel like you can go back to your room for rest or a hotel break during your park visit, but you don't really want to since the room is literally just a room. The beds have no bedding other than a sheet and ultra thin blanket. One of our outlets didn't work at the bathroom counter so you had to plug hot appliances into the one right at the sink basin. The bathtub did not drain so we were limited to showers only (or else you had a bathtub full of dirt and slime after the first shower) and showers do not work with small children. Also, the frig froze only - so no milk or water available the next morning. For the hotel review, the breakfast is

Summary: We stayed at the Best Western Plus Park Place Inn & Mini Suites for our week long trip to Disneyland, DCA and Universal . Our check in day did not go smoothly. Despite us having reservations for two rooms they had no rooms ready when we got there at 4pm for check in. It took over 30 minutes to finally locate rooms for us. When we finally got rooms, the room they ended up giving my parents already had someone in there. Such a security issue. For our troubles they gave my parents a free night and upgraded us to a mini suite.   We did not have any issues after that though. The hotel was clean, the free breakfast was good, and the distance to the parks was amazing, 5 minute walk. My only suggestion would be that they should add in room safes, we did not enjoy the lock box system at
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay. Please accept our sincere apologies for the less-than-stellar service you received during the check-in process. Summary: You can’t beat the proximity to Disney! Made walking home a breeze at the end of a long day! The staff was beyond amazing and the room was nice and clean! We will definitely book here next Disney trip!

Summary: Please give guests options for parking. If they want to park all day and night. Then simply give them an option to do so. Even if it means an additional charge. This will result in satisfied guests and happy employees.  This was not an option and many many many disagreements arose. I love best western franchises !!! Unfortunately this experience was less than satisfactory.  :-(

Summary: No manager or supervisor was on duty and it was quite obvious!!! Staff was aggressive, unprofessional, disrespectful, parking a huge problem. Very stressful.  Staff unwilling to accommodate any concerns or make exceptions for anything. Antoinette was a disgrace to best western franchise.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is my first choice when visiting Disneyland. Closest hotel to Disneyland (5min walk to security); it’s right across the street. Very easy to come back for a break during the day. Inclusive breakfast was excellent. Hot food line moved very quickly. Nice assortment of food (eggs, pancakes, sausage/ham, yogurt, fruit, cereal, coffee, etc).  Very clean dining area and rooms are very spacious. Enough room for a non stroller and a pack n play.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to tell us about your stay. We're glad you enjoyed our convenient location and fulfilling breakfast. We appreciate your continued patronage. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: This hotel was very clean and all staff was friendly, helpful and accommodating.  It is directly across the street from the entrance to Disneyland, making it very convenient for visit. The breakfast was available very early in the am making it easy to grab a bite on our way to the Park.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay! Our staff works very hard to ensure all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again soon!

Summary Heading: Don't stay in the front building!
Summary: We have just returned from our stay in room 202. This place is the very closest to the Disneyland entrance but the front building is extremely noisy. The staff here are great and the room was very clean. We were right outside the stairway and it is quite difficult to get good rest. We should have requested the back building!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! We're happy to hear our location was convenient for you. We're sorry the noise kept you up at night. We hope to have the opportunity to host you again soon.

Summary: This hotel is a great value for the money. It is located directly across from Disneyland which is nice after a long day of walking. We have stayed a few times and the staff is always friendly and very helpful. The rooms are clean and well maintained. The breakfast has a large variety of food to accommodate most people. This is now our go to hotel when visiting Disneyland (which is at least once a month). I highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to tell us about your stay. We're glad  you have been able to enjoy our convenient location and fulfilling breakfast time and time again. We appreciate your continued patronage. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Great location! Was able to walk back and forth between the hotel and park easily. 5 minute walk at the most! People at the hotel were friendly and welcoming. We had 2 beds and a pull out couch. We all slept comfortably. The rooms are a little dark. We kept the door and blinds open whenever we were taking a break in the room.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! We're happy to hear our location was convenient for you. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We have tried many of the hotels right across from Disneyland. BW Park Place is the best we have found!  The rooms are clean and spacious and the hot breakfast was good.  The staff is very friendly and helpful. Will definitely be staying here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay! Our staff works very hard to ensure all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again soon!

Summary: The proximity to Disneyland just cannot be beat unless you stay at a way overpriced Disney hotel.  The newly remodeled rooms were comfortable and the breakfast was really good.  The biggest issue we had is that the day we checked into our hotel, their rules state that we couldn't park there until after 3:00.  I completely understand not being able to get into our room until after 3:00 but parking?  Then on the day we left we planned to have one more day at Disneyland before we started for home but we could only park there until 1:00.  After that it was $25.00 per hour.  I understand all the parking issues in the area but I think the price we paid for the room they could have allowed us to park there on our first night's stay, regardless of the time.  But front desk staff and all

Summary: The suite was much smaller than I expected and felt very crammed. The location to Disneyland was EXCELLENT! Literally across the street from the main gate. Would stay here again and deal with the room size for that reason alone!

Summary: We booked this hotel specifically because of how close it is to the gates. We had a great time in the pool every day, we used the free breakfast every day, and the rooms are clean and have tons of plugs for charging devices. The rooms were quiet, we didn't hear our neighbors unless they were walking outside with roller bags that clickety clacked.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us! We're so happy to hear your stay was comfortable and convenient. We hope to see you back here again soon!

Summary Heading: Paid parking is only until 3pm of the day you check out.
Summary: We booked this hotel for 1 night with the intention of going to Disneyland the next day. During the time of booking, we thought if we paid for parking ($15/night) we could leave the car in the hotel's parking lot for the day (as different hotels in the area have let us before). If that were the case, we were ok with paying the premium for the hotel since Disneyland is right across the street. However, when checking in we were told parking was only until 3pm, which meant we had to move the car and pay for parking elsewhere for the day. This nullified the convenience of the hotel's location since we could have paid less for a hotel a few blocks further and drove to the same parking lot we did for our day at Disneyland.  We understand that this is was probably somewhere on the

Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you gave us to implement improvements to ensure we offer a better experience for guests in the future. I hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you with a superior experience.

Summary: Family vaycay to disneyland. Very convenient. Breakfast included even with covid restrictions. Short walk to Disneyland. We came back to the hotel everyday for a break in between parks. Definitely worth the stay
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! We're happy to hear our location was convenient for you and that our breakfast kept you fueled for your day at the parks. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Location, convenience, clean, and excellent service
Summary: Being this close is such as benefit. After walking ten miles in a day, being able to get to your room within five minutes is key. Easy to take breaks. The breakfast bar is great to also get snacks for the day. Loved our stay and fair parking prices.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! We're happy to hear our location was convenient for you and that our breakfast fueled you well for your day at the parks. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Overall it was nice enough. Mattress are  firm and for me that is uncomfortable.  Room was a good size and very clean. The closest you can get to Disneyland, so I would stay again.  Overall it met are needs.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! We're happy to hear our location was convenient for you. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Our hotel stay was great. The staff at this hotel is very friendly. The breakfast at this Best Western is convenient and organized. The location is the best. It is right across the street from the Disneyland entrance. The only suggestion I have is that the pool and hot tub need to be a lot warmer to enjoy. Other than that I would recommend this Best Western.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! I'm glad to hear you enjoyed your time here. We look forward to hosting you again soon!

Summary: We enjoyed our stay so much at the Best Western Plus Park Place Inn. The check in was so fast and we got our room a little early so we could go straight to the park. The AC worked great in the room (Much needed after a long day in the parks). It was so convenient to the entrance of the parks and we felt very safe!  There were plenty of towels and everything was clean!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! We're so happy to hear you enjoyed our facilities and that our location was convenient for you. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Best place to stay outside of Disneyland
Summary: The convenience of the location, and the convenience of the free breakfast, are so worth it. Short walk to both and so much more cheaper than the Disneyland hotels. Clean and the staff there are friendly and very willing to help with anything.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay! Our staff works very hard to ensure all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again soon!

Summary Heading: Clean Hotel & Easy Walk to Park
Summary: BW Plus Park Place Inn Mini Suites room was clean and the breakfast was enjoyable. The hot breakfast buffet was served by staff. They also had muffins, some assorted fruit, juice, coffee as well as milk. The dining area was kept clean and staff replenished the food often despite being short handed. The rooms were clean and the AC worked well. The trash was taken out daily despite  limitations on the housekeeping services due to restrictions. While this hotel was a little higher than our average price range, the short walk from the park's shuttle entrance can't be beat.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay! Our staff works very hard to ensure all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again soon!

Summary Heading: Not sure where to stay? This is the place.
Summary: This hotel is right outside Disneyland gates. You cannot get closer without staying in the park itself. The room was clean and quite nice. The staff was AMAZING. I wish I had the name of the young lady at the front desk who helped us check in. Outstanding service.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay! Our staff works very hard to ensure all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again soon

Summary Heading: great place to stay to disneyland
Summary: i have been here so many times and these is a great place to stay. rooms are clean and so peaceful to sleep in. staff at the desk is so helpful and great with customer service. they have breakfast in the morning and its good add on before the park. never had any issues and its such a short distant to the park. makes life easy.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! I'm glad to hear you continue to enjoy your time here. We look forward to hosting you again soon!

Summary: Wonderful hotel in the closed, best location possible! I love just crossing the street and we are right there ready to relax! Staff is very nice and courteous. Having a full breakfast makes a big difference for me and my family before heading into Disneyland. They even gave me some snacks for later in the day.  The pool and jacuzzi are nice to  unwind a bit after a long day.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay! Our staff works very hard to ensure all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again soon!

Summary: We stayed here 2 nights. The hotel is clean, convenient to the pedestrian walkway to Disney, and has everything one would need to have a decent night sleep. It was very quiet and we had a room near the street. The staff was so sweet and efficient. The front desk is 24/7 and we called to request a couple of things and it was delivered in lightening speed. We unfortunately had a medical emergency and had to call 911. The front desk called the following morning to check in on us with the utmost compassion and concern. The breakfast was good with plenty of hot and cold options as well as pastries, fruit, cereal, oatmeal, and granola bars. The only thing to keep in mind is there’s no parking there before 1pm on the day of your check in because there is literally one space per room
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay! Our staff works very hard to ensure all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again soon!

Summary: Had a one-night stay during our Disneyland trip. It is a prime location and everyone working there was so pleasant, in spite of how crazy busy check-in was. I love that complimentary breakfast is available.  Having gated parking makes me feel better having my car there. I will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay! Our staff works very hard to ensure all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again soon!

Summary: Stayed here for two nights. We got a pretty big room, but anytime a car would pass by or the next door people would turn on the tv, you can hear it clear as day. I can hear the guy next door yelling at his kid whos crying and i can hear the family that passed by that just came back from disneyland. Usually, you would only hear muffled voices if someone is loud, but staying here, you can hear an entire conversation. The only draw to this hotel is nice staff and its accross the street from Disneyland. Otherwise its kinda dirty (grimy) and don’t expect to sleep quietly. You can hear people as if they were in your room.
Manager Response: On behalf of our entire team, I would like to apologize for not exceeding your expectations. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you gave us to implement improvements to ensure we offer a better experience for guests in the future. I hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you with a superior experience.

Summary: Outstanding customer service, super friendly, great accommodations, delicious hot breakfast! Closer than close to the park! Nice pool and hot tub. Convenient check out. Fun family experience! We stay here every time we go to Disneyland. It's more convenient than one of the three park hotels, especially considering proximity and the free breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay! Our staff works very hard to ensure all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again soon!

Summary: Parks right across.Rooms are nicely decorated. Awesome breakfast room staff. Parking just outside the room. Did not get the request to have a room near the entrance of hotel. Hassle free check in and check out.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay! Our staff works very hard to ensure all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again soon!

Summary Heading: Disneyland just a hop skip and jump.
Summary: Loved that this hotel so close to Disney without staying on Disney property and paying Disney resort high costs. All staff was nice. Parking small. The bathroom is very small for the 2 Queen rooms. Apart from a few ants in thew room, the stay was nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! We're happy to hear our location was convenient for you. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Directly across the street from Disneyland
Summary: Hotel is located directly across the street from Disneyland so it’s a very convenient and short walk. Would be great if you could park at the hotel before check in to avoid having to park at Disneyland, pay both fine land and hotel parking and have to deal with the inconvenience of the extra walking. It’s a decent hotel, overpriced but that’s expected since it’s near an amusement park. It was perfect size for our family of 5. We could literally hear the people next to us talking the walls are so thin. Great place to rest your head for a few hours.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! We're happy to hear our location was convenient for you. On behalf of our entire team, I would like to apologize for the other aspects of your stay that did not exceed your expectations. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you gave us to implement improvements to ensure we offer a better experience for guests in the future. I hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you with a superior experience.

Summary Heading: Mini Suite stay for family of 5 for 5 nights.  Dec 12-17, 2021
Summary: I love this place!  Super friendly staff, especially Jaime at the front desk.  The maids and even the breakfast bar staff were all so nice and welcoming - even had fun nature about them.  Super clean and the beds were so comfortable.  I dont think I would visit Disneyland if I couldnt stay at this property.  Good work, PPI!  Love you guys!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay! Our staff works very hard to ensure all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again soon!

Summary Heading: Still THE closest hotel to the Park!
Summary: We stayed at the Best Western Park Place Inn (BWPPI) during the second week of July 2021 for four nights and found the visit to be just as good as our last visit in 2019 (see our review for that stay as well).  In many ways, this review will read pretty much the same as our 2019 review.  That is to say, they have managed to stay fairly consistent with their service and quality of the facilities.  As many others have pointed out, from the front of the lobby of the hotel to the Disneyland turnstiles, this is THE closest hotel to Disneyland.  An exception might be the Grand Californian, but that is a completely different class of hotel and door-to-door distance would vary much depending on where on the Grand California property you’re staying.  The same can also be said for the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay! Our staff works very hard to ensure all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again soon!

Summary: Rooms were very clean and quiet, convenient to Disneyland is an understatement, so happy with this hotel. Will definitely stay here every visit to Disneyland from now on. Helpful and kind staff too. Beds were comfy after a long day at the park and room was a good size.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! I'm glad to hear you enjoyed your time here and that our location was convenient for you. We look forward to hosting you again soon!

Summary Heading: Superior hotel, closest to the parks!
Summary: We have stayed here before and love it each time!  It’s clean and literally the closest you can get to the parks (besides Grand Californian). No complaints from us. Shower is hot and beds are super comfy.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! I'm glad to hear you enjoyed your time here. We look forward to hosting you again soon!

Summary: We had the best experience at this hotel . The staff was exceptional!! Everyone was friendly helpful and hospitable. The rooms were clean spacious and quiet. We enjoyed the pool area as well. 10/10 would recommend and stay here again. You literally walk out the lobby and are in front of Disneyland, the location is SUPERB!!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! I'm glad to hear our location was convenient for you and you enjoyed your time with us. We look forward to hosting you again soon!

Summary: Other than the scrubbing of the 2nd floor walkway, room facing a giant wall (causing massive noisy echo) & thin walls- this was a terrific stay!  Functioning microwave, a larger size, mini fridge (don't turn it up too high, you'll freeze ur food)- spacious room & very clean (it wouldn’t hurt to bring an air freshener plug-in (or 2) to sweeten the “standing-air” smell (there was no air circulating in our room when we got in- it wasn't bad- but the smell was stagnant)).  -Plenty Of parking (more compact spaces than larger ones) & they have a "1-car, per room," policy. Also- there are several elevators to choose from- very helpful after a long day of walking & lastly- BWP Park Place IS directly across the street from the park entrance- making that turn into hotel area is tricky
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay! Our staff works very hard to ensure all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again soon!

Summary: Very unsatisfied with our last trip, rooms were not ready to occupied. Front desk were not helpful is information is requested. I am not sure if I will  take my family up to this hotel again. I will re evaluate my situation before next year.
Manager Response: On behalf of our entire team, I would like to apologize for not exceeding your expectations. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you gave us to implement improvements to ensure we offer a better experience for guests in the future. Summary: While the location is great - if you cannot sleep it is a waste of money.  They assured me the mattresses were replaced in 2018 but I stay in a lot of hotels (so have a tolerance for iffy mattresses) and this was the worst bed I've (NOT) slept in during the last 10 years. Look elsewhere!
Manager Response: On behalf of our entire team, I would like to apologize for not exceeding your expectations. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you gave us to implement improvements to ensure we offer a better experience for guests in the future. I hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you with a superior experience.

Summary: The staff were all very friendly, and the hotel room was clean. HOWEVER, your car must be out of their parking lot by 3pm on checkout day. This information was not written anywhere until the day we checked in. We paid an extra 100+ per night to stay at this hotel over other hotels specifically because it is right across the street from the Disneyland park, but we still had to drive over and park (for $30) at Disney because we couldn't leave our car at the hotel for the day. The front staff was aware of this as an issue, and suggested I pay to park at a nearby hotel and walk. So frustrating. I understand that their parking is limited, but this policy should be clearly stated before booking. I dropped an extra $260 bucks for no reason because of this misleading advertising. Yes,
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay. On behalf of our entire team, I would like to apologize for not exceeding your expectations. Unfortunately, parking is very limited at our property and we have to ensure that we have parking available for all of our guests arriving each day, which causes us to limit the amount of time we can accommodate our departing guests. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you gave us to implement improvements to ensure we offer a better experience for guests in the future. I hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you with a superior experience.

Summary: You already know the location is the best there is. During a recent pandemic stay, I was really impressed with the cleanliness and standards. Housekeeping is not daily right now but they empty the trash and will bring you anything you need like new towels, TP, shampoo. Breakfast was as good as always, there are just a few things less self-serve. If anything, I think their self-serve options might be more expanded. The front desk couldn't have been more friendly and accommodating even witnessing some interactions with frustrated visitors. A+++!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay! Our staff works very hard to ensure all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again soon!

Summary: Not much more to say than the title. It’s right across from Disneyland, the property is clean inside and out, and they have a full breakfast that they change up a couple items daily. Parking is limited so make sure to reply to their email about whether or not you need a spot.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! I'm glad to hear you enjoyed your time with us. We look forward to hosting you again soon!

Summary: I booked this location for myself (30), my brother (26), and our mom (64) for an extended weekend trip for the opening of Holidays at Disneyland, and the mini suite was the perfect choice for three adults who each wanted their own sleeping surfaces. We were even able to fit an ECV comfortably! The location truly cannot be beat, and our room (365) overlooked the wall of Tropicana Inn next door, so it was quiet unless someone was directly outside of the room. Despite being completely booked, I think we ran into other people using the elevator maybe twice. The complimentary breakfast truly cannot be beat; I was very impressed by the selection and availability of seating. Our room was not ready at 1pm when we arrived (this was expected) and after 3pm, when we’d had some lunch over
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay! Our staff works very hard to ensure all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again soon!

Summary: This so far has been one of my favorite hotels while visiting Disney! The rates were reasonable and super close to the park. We have found the perfect place to stay at. Will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! We're happy to hear our location was convenient for you. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Great location to Disneyland - cannot be beat. It felt closer than a walk from the Disneyland Hotel. The room we had was renovated and the mattress and pillows were very comfortable! We were able to eat a warm breakfast of sausage, eggs and French toast/waffles or pancakes (depending on the day) - a great way to start a long day at the parks! Only complaint was the noise from the street or other guests passing by - we heard a lot of roller luggage, babies crying, honking and racing cars from the street. To be fair: our room was very close to the street. Would probably be better further back in the parking lot. I say: bring a white noise machine or ear plugs and stay here. It was worth it.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! We're happy to hear our location was convenient for you and our breakfast kept you fueled for your day at the parks. We apologize for the noise level you experienced while here. Please know for the future that the Front Desk is open 24 hours and would be glad to handle any concerns you might have. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Breakfast was great, service was kind and location was AMAZING- right across the street from the parks! It was obvious they recently renovated as the rooms were clean, modern and very comfortable.  Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay! Our staff works very hard to ensure all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again soon!

Summary: You can’t get any closer to Disneyland than this hotel.  It has free breakfast that is actually surprisingly good.  Laundry facilities and a swimming pool.  Saved money staying here vs a Disney hotel and it’s closer walking distance to entrance of the parks!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! We're happy to hear our location was convenient for you and that you enjoyed your time with us here. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Great experience, good value.  Front desk staff were extremely nice.  Rooms were clean.  They didn't offer room service, but were prompt in replacing anything we asked for.  Literally steps from the Disneyland Resort!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay! Our staff works very hard to ensure all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again soon!

Summary: The location is great but there are other hotels within similar distance that are better. The staff was awful. The AC was coming off the wall. We couldn’t get towels of all things. We won’t be returning
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay. On behalf of our entire team, I would like to apologize for not exceeding your expectations. Summary: Close is the only convenience. No room service, terrible ventilation and a/c system. Either freezing or swampy. Smelled like mold and mildew. Suite setup was awful. No door to the sink and counter area so it made it difficult not to wake anyone. Decor is outdated and old. Things falling off walls. Overall disappointed that things like NO room service were not said at time of booking. Breakfast wasn’t your typical. Lots of prepackaged food because of “covid”

Summary: I stayed here to have an easy access to the Disneyland resort. We were celebrating our Anniversary and chose to stay here. The room was spacious and clean. Everything worked out great and we had a very restful night. I would stay here every time, I am in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us for your anniversary celebration! I'm glad to hear you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to having you stay with us again soon!

Summary: Great place to stay when going to Disneyland. We have stayed here several times over the past few years and it has been a nice stay each time. Right across the street from the entrance to Disneyland. S

Summary Heading: 25 dollars an hour for parking after check out
Summary: I wish that I would have know that I would have to pay 25 dollars and hour for every hour that my car was on their property after 3pm the day of check out. I had to move my car morning of to a parking garage. Wasn’t aware of this until check in. The room was on the street. Could hear cars and see the street light through the shades.

Summary: This motel is right across the street from Disneyland.  The check in process was quick and the employees working at the front desk were extremely friendly.  Our room was clean and comfy, the beds exceptionally so.  It was quiet and we really enjoyed our stay.  I would absolutely recommend this hotel for a great stay close to Disneyland.  We did not partake of the breakfast offered.  Whenever we needed anything it was immediately brought to our room.  I am however, starting to feel hotel industry wide that the maid service really needs to return.  The daily maid service is starting to be greatly missed and the nightly prices have increased so the maid service would be expected.

Summary: Dirty and dated smelly rooms. One star because of the location and another star because of the free breakfast. I know it's a motel but if you are not picky then this is for you. They said it was recently renovated, I didn't notice it. Can't complain on the location, it's just across Disneyland.
