Summary: First off, the good- location, location, location!  This motel is almost directly in front of the crosswalk to Disneyland making it an easy commute to the parks.  The room was decent, the furniture a bit worn and dated looking but very clean and comfortable beds. The free breakfast was much more substantial than I was expecting.  The housekeeping staff that I encountered on walks to and from the room were friendly.    Now the not so good.....our front desk experience.  This was a girls trip for my friend and I, no husbands, no kids!  We booked what we thought was a two double bed room.  However, when we got to the room, it was a king and a sofa bed.  We assumed a mistake had been made and went back to the front desk to say we needed two actual beds.  Lucy at the front desk told
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Not what it used to be
Summary: We have stayed at this hotel in the past and it was great but something happened to the air conditioning in the rooms.  We've stayed 2 times in the last month and the air blows all night but it's not cool at all - rooms completely stuffy and miserable.  We will not be staying there any more.  The a/c unit says you can go all the way down to 60 but the room was more like 70+ all night with recirculated air flowing.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us again and taking the time to write a review.  We do enjoy having you as our guest and are very sorry your A/C did not seem to be working correctly. Please note that we have started the remodel of our rooms and should be completed within the first week of May.  I do hope you will provide us with another opportunity to provide you with superior customer service.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Great free breakfast and ideal location
Summary: Great staff, perfect free breakfast, right across the street from the enterance. Easy parking. We were right by the pool but never heard a sound. Overall great stay. Rooms were fine - nothing extraordinary, but clean and comfortable

Summary: We wanted to be close to Disneyland so my granddaughter could enjoy the park and go back to rest if she needed it. Everything was very nice. I had the oatmeal each day and they have added new toppings. The tub looked new and clean, so I soaked my Grandma bones at the end of each day.

Summary: Hotel was selected for the access to Disneyland. It is simply using a stop light to go across Harbor Blvd into the Park. So easy for Families and Seniors. Very helpful staff. Complimentary Breakfast was served next door at Captain Kidd's (Buffet style-easy in and out). Great way to start the day, then eat lunch and dinner inside the part. Next to Captain Kidd is an I-hop open 24/7. Terrific food and great staff. Best place to stay going to Disneyland is the Best Western Plus Park Place Inn!!!!!!

Summary Heading: Right on the doorstep of Disneyland
Summary: You couldnt get any closer to Disney if you tried.  Hotel is across the road from the main entrance, absolutely perfect for families wishing to take a break during the day and head back to the hotel.    Our visit was middle January, kids were still able to use the pool during the day, hotel also had a hot tub.  Lots of vending machines around for snacks and drinks (only takes $1, $5 notes or coins), ice available too.  Hotel has 3 levels, had lifts to get your luggage to your rooms.  Rooms are spacious and have everything you need.  The hotel provides breakfast which is next door, not the best breakfast but perfectly adequate to get your day started.  Turn left and next door but one is ihop and a few places down the road is Dennys, if you turn right, Mcdonalds is not that far,
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for taking the time to share your experience. Summary: This hotel is right across the street from Disneyland, location is perfect. The rooms and grounds are always clean. Price is really good compared to others in the area. The only downside is their small parking lot and the pressure from the shower wasn't that great.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us again and taking the time to write a review.  We do appreciate your comments and compliments and hope you will enjoy our hotel even more once we have completed the renovations.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care

Summary: The BW Park Place is the best hotel on Harbor Drive (convenience to Disneyland!!)  We recommend Park Place to everyone that visits Disneyland!  The convenience is great but the hotel and service makes it even better!!  Thanks for always being wonderful!!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us when visiting Disneyland and for recommending us to others.  We enjoy having you as our guest and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We do look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care

Summary: I had to pay $75 for parking this is ridiculous. Staff at front desk is vtheery rude. Dissapointed I always use best western for my trips not anymore. The second  day we stayed they didn't clean mirrors. Only thing good is the breakfast bar.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  Unfortunately we do have very limited parking.  Due to our proximity to Disneyland and the numerous requests for extended parking, we do need to limit the parking to our currently registered guests. I do hope you will choose to stay with us again.  We will begin remodeling all of our rooms in just a couple of weeks.  Thank you and take care

Summary: This is my favorite hotel when I go to Disneyland! I have stayed many times and stayed there again this past weekend. When we checked in, the lady at the front desk didn't realize the room she gave us was being worked on. She came after us after we had gotten in there and walked us to a new room which had been recently remodeled. It happened to have two beds instead of one, which was great for my friend and me. I love that the rooms have microwaves and refrigerators in case we come back with food, and the breakfast next door is always a plus. This time I was just looking for something quick so I grabbed two bowls of cereal and saved one for the second day. And because we had a fridge I was able to bring milk as well. I will continue to stay at this hotel when I visit Disneyland
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for 8 nights.  The beds were comfortable.  The location was great as we were going to Disney.  Lots of nearby restaurants.  Staff was great.  Includes hot and cold buffet breakfast.

Summary Heading: Closer to the gates than Disney!
Summary: We have stayed at this hotel twice in the last few years. The first time we went, being close to the park gates was very important as we had little ones. This hotel is as close as you can get get to the main Disneyland entrance and gates so if that is important to you... this is the place for you.  The main lobby and 'curb appeal' of the facility has been updated and is a welcome reception. Behind this facade however, the place is feeling its age a little. That said, the rooms were always clean, it was quiet the nights we were there, and the staff was excellent.  The buffet breakfast was an adventure. The food choices were plentiful but were more of a 'warm up' of boxed food items. And because more people all want to arrive in Disney at the same time, tables are a bit of a free

Summary: The hotel itself is nothing spectacular. Rooms are a bit outdated, but most places near the park are. Whats best about this hotel is its close proximity to the front of disneyland, and the included breakfast. Breakfast was pretty standard, but all the foods were hot and rotated everyday we were there. For example, one day was pancakes and bacon and scrambled eggs and potatoes, and the next day they had french toast sticks and sausage and scrambled eggs and potatoes. They also have a large assortment of pastries and yogurts. Breakfast was busy around the time the park was opening, so I would suggest going a little earlier.  I've stayed at hotels on Katella, but hate having to walk through all of downtown disney to get to the parks. This resort was close, had decent breakfast, and

Summary: Courteous and helpful staff as well as location (at the entrance to the Disneyland parks) make this an excellent hotel choice. The room's decor is dated, but the rooms (beds and pillows) are comfortable!
Manager Response: none

Summary: My 2 friends and I were lucky enough to nail down a mini-suite at this BW for the Star Wars race at Disneyland this past weekend.  We had a room with 2 Queen Beds and a sleeper sofa.  We were on the 2nd floor in the building nearest to the lobby.  We loved the spaciousness of the room!  The beds were nice.  The LOCATION IS STELLAR!  Directly across the street from the entrance to the parks!  The free breakfast was always delicious, always hot and had lots of options.  The gift shop in the lobby offered souvenirs much cheaper than park prices + a 15% discount for guests staying at the hotel. My only complaint was the noice.  The walls/windows are especially thin and I could hear the neighbor next door coughing.  When the fireworks went off at the park, you could hear them in the
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here in March of 2015, and everything I wrote in my review at that time is still true.  This time, there were seven of us, of three generations, occupying two rooms, and it was unanimous that we had chosen the best possible lodgings for our three-day Disneyland adventure.  Our rooms were on the third floor, toward the back of the property.  We never waited more than a minute or two for the elevator.  And we were never disturbed by traffic noise, nor by noisy neighbors.  The rooms themselves were spacious and felt uncrowded.  Plenty of space for our "stuff."  Motif is unchanged since 2015, and it's true that the furniture is a little scuffed and worn.  But the linens were fresh, the beds were comfy, and both the TV and the fridge were large.  Check-in was a little
Manager Response: none

Summary: First, the hotel is the closest non-Disney hotel to the Disneyland entrance. It is probably closer to the entrance than the Disneyland Hotel, but not the Grand Californian. Secondly, we have had a great experience staying at the hotel each time we have stayed there over the last 5 years. Lastly, my daughters left a much-loved stuffed animal buried in the sheets and the staff found it and mailed it to us immediately. We had possession of it only five days after we left the hotel. If you have young daughters, you know how huge that was.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is as close as you can get to Disneyland which is why I choose it.  Sadly, it still has single pane windows affording no protection from the outside noises of other guest, parking lot etc.  The beds are not comfortable, but not the worst I have experienced.  The breakfast is large and good.  So that was helpful.  Overall I would not stay here again.  The hotel is in serious need of an update and I would rather walk farther and sleep better.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Close to Disneyland but not worth the money!
Summary: From the front of the hotel it looks to be a amazing hotel, then you renter the room. Very outdated furniture, can't keep any liquids in the fridge or they would completely freeze. Constant smell of marijuana seeping from inside the room from others hotel rooms. The table and the entertainment center had a built on greasy grimy feeling(gross)! The back corner smelt of old rottten milk. The close distance to Disneyland made up for some of the problems in the room. It kept us out of the room!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very sorry for the issues you encountered during your stay.  I do hope we were given the opportunity to address your concerns for you.  We will be remodeling all of our rooms beginning in just a couple of weeks.  I do hope you will give us another chance to provide you with superior customer service.  Thank you and take care

Summary: We stayed 2 nights in a "2 Queen" wheelchair accessible room.  The room was well arranged, stocked, and comfortable.  All the staff we came in contact with were polite and helpful.  My only concern was that the "wheelchair" accessible room was on the 3rd fl, which, in case of an emergency, for us, could be an issue.  If a wheelchair is not part of your travel routine, than this hotel is a wonderful value.  I would highly recommend it.  Again, we did NOT have an issue with the wheelchair, but we always have to consider that aspect of our hotel stay.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great place to stay. Affordable, clean, close. So convenient, pool was dirty but it was cold out so it didn't matter. Choose Dennys for breakfast instead of IHOP (half the cost) if you're not eating at the hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The location of this hotel is right across the street from the entrance to Disneyland, this is the closest hotel to the park. Our stay was great, the staff was wonderful, the room was cleaned everyday and any requests we had were met. Each morning a wonderful continental breakfast was available upstairs of the adjoining restaurant. We checked in early the day we arrived and were able to stay an extra hour the day we left. Our flight left late the day of our check out and we were able to leave our luggage behind the desk until our shuttle came to take us to the airport, that way we spent a little time that day in Downtown Disney before we left. We took Super Shuttle to and from the airport so we had no need for the added expense of a rental car. We would definitely tell everyone
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Can't get any closer to Disneyland!
Summary: I have enjoyed my stays at the Best Western Park Place inn when visiting Disneyland.  The hotel is right across the street from the park entrance and is very comfortable and quiet.  They even have a pool and hot tub to relax in after a long day at the park.  There is also a laundry facility in case you need to wash a few items.  Another perk is the complementary breakfast you can get next door. They serve fresh fruit, yogurt, cereal, even scrambled eggs and sausage.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Walk to Disneyland - best value for your money - full breakfast included; parking is reasonably priced. Rooms quiet. Staff helpful. Half the price of a Disney property hotel. Can buy tickets for the Disney parks here
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great location! The closest you can get to Disneyland without staying at a park hotel. It was great to leave the park after a long day and have our hotel be the first one you come to! The staff was helpful and accommodating, they worked hard to get our parties three rooms all together at the last minute. The hotel rooms could use some updating, and there is only one elevator. We had a second floor room a good distance from the elevator which meant my husband carried our stroller and bags up and down the stairs each day. The buffet style breakfast had an assortment of hot food, dry cereal and pastries to choose from, not the greatest food but was okay for free. The pool/ hot tube area was nice and clean but small especially when several groups of kids were there. For a family
Manager Response: none

Summary: This Hotel looks good, but it is only refurbished in the lobby and on the outside of the building. The room are old and run down. The toilet kept clogging and the tub would not drain. Location to Disneyland is good.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very sorry you did not enjoy your stay with us.  Our rooms will be remodeled this Spring.  I do hope you will be able to stay with us again and enjoy the improvements we will be making to our hotel.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Everything I expected. Great location across from Disneyland. Decent sized room with 2 queens and pullout bed. Perfect for our family that spends all day in the park and only uses the room to sleep. Breakfast was typical continental breakfast fare.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great service, great location for a trip to Disneyland. It is literally right across the street to the parks and Downtown Disney. The breakfast buffet is plentiful and good. The staff was all wonderful. Everyone we interacted with at the front desk was super friendly and helpful.  My youngest daughter was also happily surprised to find all her stuffed animals waiting for her on the bed facing our door when we walked in after a long day at Disneyland! Housekeeping took the time to do that and we found it to be such a cute and thoughtful gesture! The room was spacious and clean. Will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We felt safe and cozy at BW.the irooms are very clean and comfortable. The staff is very friendly and attentive to your needs. The breakfast has a good selection of food to start your day. The pool is clean and well kept
Manager Response: none

Summary: If I can stress anything, location!!  Right across the street from Disney!   The rooms are large and clean.  The staff is friendly.  The breakfast that is included is a great way to start the day, though the morning we were there it was pretty messy.  It was at the end of breakfast and the tables were dirty and trash was overflowing. We really do like this Best Western the best out of the ones near the parks.  We will book again!
Manager Response: Thank you for completing the survey regarding your recent stay at our property.   Your business is very important to us and we value your feedback. We hope you will come back and see us again soon.  If I can be of assistance in the future, please don't hesitate to contact me at 714-776-4800. Summary: Clean rooms and a very comfortable walk to Disneyland. I would stay here again. There are restaurants nearby if you want a bigger breakfast and the staff was very accommodating. We needed an extra room at the last minute and they found one for us.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Staff is friendly and accommodating. Location is great as it was a short walk to Disney proper. Rooms are a great value and descent size.  With the breakfast and free wifi it adds to the appeal to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and are pleased you enjoyed the staff and accommodations.  We hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care

Summary: PRO: Location! Literally the closest hotel without being a Disney property. Walk straight across the street : ) Value! Best rate given location and amenities. Amenities! Free wi-fi, free breakfast, mini-fridge and microwave. Rooms! Spacious, comfortable and clean. Service! Housekeeping did a great job given the mess we left daily (although I did tip because of the mess they had to work around)  CONS:  I am not even going to try and deter you by nit picking. Seriously do not hesitate staying here.   This is an excellent property. I will agree with some reviews that the quality (whether it is carpet, matress, etc.) is not luxury. However, I am not rating this in comparison to a luxury hotel (as it would appear some who rated very good were doing). I am making my ratings judgement
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I know a lot of guests were disappointed by the closing of the Carousel but I am very pleased you will be staying with us.  We will be remodeling our rooms in February and should be completed in May.  I hope you will enjoy your summer stay even more with the updates.  We look forward to your next visit and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Nice and close but memorize the internet password
Summary: Although dated, room was very nice and staff extremely attentive. We chose not to have our room cleaned daily during our six night stay and we received a call prior to housekeeping leaving on the off days asking if we needed anything before they left.   You can not get any closer to the main gates of the park and the breakfast is very nice and fresh providing a great start to your day.   The internet leads an awful lot to be desired. On an almost daily basis, I had to re-enter the password on both our devices and mini.  Given the overall quality of this place, I can not believe that they can not spring for better wifi.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  We greatly appreciate the your comments and compliments and hope you will stay with us again.  We will be remodeling all of our rooms starting in February.  The wi-fi does require guests to login every 24 hours so the network is not tied up by idle devices given the numerous devices that guests bring.  Thank you and take care.  We hope to see you again

Summary Heading: Good Disney value, easy walk to Disney
Summary: Staff was great, location was great, good value, convenient buffet breakfast, easy and friendly car and scooter rental on location. Only complaint was the pull out sofa bed was not very comfortable. We had 5 people so we needed the sleeper sofa.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We will be remodeling our rooms in February and will be getting different sleeper sofas. I hope you will find those more comfortable.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care

Summary: Right across the street to Disneyland. Breakfast was great with hot and cold options, but is next door and you have to walk up stairs to eat or if unable they give you the option of eating downstairs in the captain kids restaurant. The pool and laundry has to be opened up for you or with a rewards card. So that was slightly inconvenient, but they have so many staff it was easy to flag someone down.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your time with us.  The laundry room should be left open for guests so a key is not needed until closing time. The pool is accessible with a room key.  I will look into what might have happened during your stay.  I greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and hope we will see you again.  Thank  you and take care

Summary: The room was clean both above and below the beds, bathroom, and cabinets.  The complimentary breakfast had a great selection, (gluten free too upon request). Small room, get their early or take it to your room to eat. no reservations, no waitress, buffet style. Customer services was very nice. The beds are very hard, orthopedic style.  All you have to do is cross the street at the traffic light and you are at Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to share how we contributed to good vacation memories.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope we will see you again soon

Summary: We stayed for a week from December 11-17th.  We had room #380, which is at the very front of the hotel.  It was very convenient when we wanted to come back to the room and get our coats in the evening.  The beds weren't the most comfortable, and it wasn't renovated, but I am sure it will be soon.  The breakfast was one of the best we've had in all our trips.  It was nice to have hot options. We adjusted our dates, and the hotel was more than accommodating in letting us stay an extra night.  The front desk staff was very friendly, and housekeeping did a great job every day we were there.  We will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and look forward to your next visit.  We will be remodeling all of our rooms beginning in February and they should be ready to go for the summer crowds.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Look - don't get me wrong... I loved staying at Disney's Grand California.  However, the cost of one night there was roughly the same amount as 3 nights here.  This hotel is literally right across the street from the entrance.  It took us less than 5 minutes to walk!  You can't beat that and the price if you are going to Disney.  Our room had a spacious King bed for my husband and I and our 5-year old slept in the sleeper sofa.  It was the perfect amount of space.  We had an issue one night with our TV and maintenance was there in 5 minutes to fix it.  The continental breakfast is the most amount of spread I've seen for a free breakfast.  Kudos to BW on this!    Look, if you are wanting glamour and the Disney experience within your hotel you aren't going to get it here.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I greatly appreciate you sharing what will make you stay with us again.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the breakfast and the location. Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care

Summary: Best western mini suties is the best hotel by Disneyland. Right across the street and very convenient if you have little one's. The price is fairly priced with the rest of hotels around Disneyland....
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We are very pleased that you find us the best hotel by Disneyland.  We will begin a remodel on all of our rooms beginning in February so we can be even better for our guests.  Your comments and compliments are appreciated and we hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care

Summary Heading: Perfect location for a overnighter at Disneyland
Summary: Best western is across from Disneyland, California adventure park and Downtown disney, all with in a 5 minute walk, no worries on parking in the theme parks or having to travel to and from, AAA+++. NO BRAINER.

Summary: Perfect hotel for disneyland. Close to park entrance, great breakfast, fast internet for streaming movies, secure parking and the staff was incredibly helpful. I will stay again, the next time i visit disneyland.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We have been coming here since 1998 and have always had a great stay. Room is clean, staff are nice, pool is great. The location is perfect. Great wi-fi and yummy breakfast to add. it is a nice quiet nice and clean hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Affordable Comfortable Hotel Across from Disney Parks
Summary: Park Place Inn and Suites is directly across from the entrance to the Disney resorts. The rooms are comfortable and clean and the staff are always polite and helpful.  The breakfast is a bit below the standard you can find at other hotels, including other Best Westerns, but it is included in the price.  Parking has been easy to find the last few times I have stayed here, which is nice. This Best Western is the hotel I try to stay in every time I go to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us again and taking the time to share your experience.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Arrived on a Sunday afternoon planning on a visit to Disneyland the next morning.  Checking in was quite efficient and pleasant and the employee was exceptional.  Found our rooms to be clean, well stocked and nicely upgraded.   Breakfast is included and is provided upstairs at the adjacent restaurant, Captain Kidd's.  Bacon or sausage would've been nice, though.  Only one meat option; ham. But it is included in the cost, so a minor consideration.   The biggest plus is location, location, location.  Directly across from the entrance walkway to Disneyland.   Checkout time is 11 a.m., and your vehicle must be removed from the lot by 3 p.m.  So, this required a return to the hotel mid afternoon to find alternate parking at Disneyland.   If you decide to purchase park tickets at the
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  Thank you for sharing what made your stay with us superb.  We do greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  While only one meat selection is served during breakfast, it is rotated daily between sausage and ham.  We hope you will come stay with us again.  We are looking to make our guests' experiences even better with a remodel of all of our rooms beginning in the first quarter of 2017.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We have stayed at this Bestwestern hotel a number of times-it's the closest to Disneyland without staying at one of the Disneyland hotels.  When the day has come to a close, it's nice knowing that the hotel is right there at the crosswalk. From the initial check-in to when we left, the entire staff was very friendly, very nice. Over the course of stays, they have made up-grades to the outside of the facility and have even re-done the lobby but the rooms are still the same.  Don't get me wrong, the rooms are very clean but they are showing signs of wear and tear-carpeting wearing, edges of the furniture worn from day to day use and there is only so much paint that can be put on molding before it should be replaced, compared to other hotels in the area that I have seen on line,
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us again and taking the time to write a review.  We do greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We have been completing upgrades in stages.  The remodel of the rooms will begin in the first quarter of 2017.  Please come and see again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I have to say this was a fabulous hotel location.  It is right across the street from the entrance of the Disneyland Parks.  My family stayed for one night and unfortunately the night we came back from the Disneyland Park, I found a baby cockroach in my bathroom sink.  I wanted to move out to another hotel, but it was too late to move around a 3 year old toddler and an 8 month old baby.  I was extremely unhappy and paranoid that my belongings would have cockroaches crawling around and I would hate to take them home with me.
Manager Response: I am sincerely sorry to hear of your incident. Had we been made aware at the time of occurrence we could have immediately offered you a new room. Please know that we have preventative maintenance in place, performed by Orkin services on a weekly basis, to avoid any such incident.  Therefore I do hope you will consider this incident to be isolated and you will give us a second opportunity to provide you with a superior experience in the future.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Very clean....property maybe old but the place is super clean.....no complaints here. We visited during thanksgiving 2016, and we felt the best part about this place is it's GREAT location. Just cross the street and you're in Disney. Parking spots are very tight.....no complaints about the breakfast....it was well managed and we always got a table no issue. Standard hot breakfast choices. This is the place to stay if visiting Disney.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Directly across from park, rooms were clean and roomy, includes breakfast. Thoroughly enjoyed our stay. Best thing about this hotel is it's location, was able to return to our room through the day to rest, freshen up, and eat.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We greatly appreciate you sharing what you enjoyed about your stay and hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Location couldn't be better, right across from the entrance to Disney. Staff was helpful and friendly, breakfast was included and very convenient. This hotel was great for the money, we will likely stay here again
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the staff, location, and breakfast.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: My spouse and I stayed for 2 nights during our Disneyland visit. The location can't be beat and includes a filling breakfast at captain 's restaurant upper level next door. We both loved our king size bed, it was very comfortable. The room was spotless too although we weren't in it very much. I would love to stay here again if we're ever in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and hope you will be back in the area again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The stay was good just across from Disneyland made it very helpful the hotel was clean and comfortable. There were a lot of places to eat at my family enjoyed it. The breakfast was good but can be improved.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and hope you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The location is excellent....well worth the money.  The rooms were clean and comfortable and the staff was great.  Breakfast was excellent!  We will stay here any time we come to disneyland in the future!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for taking the time to write a review.  WE enjoyed having you stay with us and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments. We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The hotel is right across from Disneyland so it's great if you need to take a nap in the middle of the day. And the hotel has great staff that are helpful and nice. Also, my room was always nice and clean.
Manager Response: none

Summary: As stated in almost every review for this hotel - GREAT location. It was great for Disneyland. However, this is a very average hotel. The carpets were thin, old, and dirty (see picture of hole in carpet). When I put on brand new white socks and walked around in the room getting ready on the first morning, they were darkened significantly from dirt on the floor - which really grossed me out. The bed was not good. I could easily feel springs digging into my back - very disappointing after a long day at Disneyland. The dresser that had the TV on it was quite sticky on top. We placed the remote there and when we returned it took quite a tug to loosen it from the dresser - also gross. The cooling unit and fan in the bathroom are extremely loud. The pool area was small and worn down.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Everything you need is here at reasonable prices. Very happy to stay here again and again. Internet is not always going but that was not a concern. We went to Disneyland and had adjoining rooms which my grandaughter loved! When we didn't have our room cleaned staff contacted us to see if we needed anything.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is a great option for a family going to DisneyLand.  Its the closest one to the gate of the parks.  Our room was nice and breakfast is offered each morning included in the cost of the room.  The beds and pillows are very comfy.  The only thing I wish was different is the rooms are kind of dark.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is the closest hotel to the Disneyland park. After a long day at Disneyland it is wonderful to walk to the closest hotel. The rooms are nice.  The full breakfast is wonderful.  The staff is always helpful.  Thanks for another great stay!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Good place. Convenient to stay by the park. Door to hotel was broken. Someone came out to fix it but showed us the trick to open it instead of actually fixing it. I would stay here again if I had to. Thanks
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is one of the closest hotels to the parks, a true less than five minute walk to the security area.  The breakfast is great for being free...more than enough to get you going in the morning.  The hotel was clean and the staff were friendly.  I would stay here again for sure.  Breakfast had...waffles, yogurt, fruit, coffee, juice, pastries, cereal, oatmeal and all the ingredients you would need to make yourself an egg mcmuffin type breakfast sandwich.  The breakfast area was large and we always found a seat.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Always great place to stay. Never had any problems and it's right across the street from the park. Book it way in advance though because it sells out quickly.  You can also see the fireworks from the balcony around the hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great experience and a location that can't be beaten
Summary: Just back from an excellent four night stay at the Best Western Plus Park Place Inn.  I have walked past this hotel many a time on my previous Disney visits and have always wanted to stay so I was thrilled when they had a room available for our latest Disney extravaganza.  Without doubt, the best thing about this hotel is it's location.  You seriously cannot be closer to the entrance to Disneyland (apart from staying at the Grand Californian Disney Hotel which will break your bank!).  It was SO nice knowing that after a long day at the parks, we just had moments to walk back to our hotel room.  We were able to leave sweaters there rather than take a locker as it was just so darn convenient to zip out the park, bundle up and return.  The room itself was great - plenty of space.
Manager Response: none

Summary: First time visit to Anaheim, chose this hotel for the location to Disneyland. Perfect just across the street. Staff friendly and knowledgeable of the area. Only problem was poor water pressure in the shower. Would highly recommend this location and would stay here's again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I have visited Disneyland about 25 times over the last 40 some years but this visit was the easiest. The location is perfect, the price is very good and breakfast was good. The rooms are fairly large and very comfortable. The staff was great. The $10 parking fee is reasonable considering we came from a $46 a night fee in San Diego.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: There is no better location for Disneyland
Summary: You walk out of the hotel and walk across the street to Disneyland.  It doesn't get much more convenient, and the added cost is worth it.  Rooms are clean and comfortable, and the breakfast was satisfactory.  We would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: we loved proximity to disneyland. very short walk.   lots of variety at breakfast. got a little crowded at times. but quick in and out.   rooms were very clean and large. would be nice to have all queen beds vs standard.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Best Value and Location for Disney
Summary: Hotel room was big/ clean and comforatble. The daily breakfast was a huge benefit before hitting Parks each day. Very convenient being the closest Hotel to the main gate. I'd reccommend to all my friends and family.

Summary: the location was GREAT! it is literally right across the street from the disneyland entrance.  however, wi-fi was TERRIBLE.  i'm not there to use the wi-fi, but still it definitely needs improvement.  The decor in the room could use an upgrade.  it looked like furniture from a beach hotel that closed down in 1975.  the service was really friendly.  the breakfast, which we have to go next door to a restaurant for, was edible.  my boyfriend didn't like it but i had my usual yogurt, peanut butter toast and apple. overall, the location makes this place worth it.
Manager Response: none

Summary: It's PERFECT! Clean comfy rooms, with at home comforts. Delish breakfast! We were there for Disneyland - but I actually wanted to spend time in bed cuz it was SOO cozy :) They even have a Disney gift shop!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Our family has stayed at this hotel for the past 6 years every October. This past October was horrifying to say the least.  This hotel has gone downhill fast.  The rooms are outdated, dirty and the bathroom was full of black mold.  It wasn't until the last day that we realized my daughter had been coughing her full head off shortly after we arrived,  that there was black mold everywhere & hidden behind the filthy wall paper in the bathroom. The carpet was dirty as was the drapery. Beds were so uncomfortable and mattresses were worn out. Sheets are paper thin so make sure you trim your toenails before you get under sheets.  It took me 30 minutes in the morning to get rid of the backache it caused, not to mention the pillows will break your neck. The breakfast is a heart attack
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to reiterate your comments.  It was our pleasure to immediately assist you with your concerns when brought to our attention at check out.  As mentioned previously, our hotel plans for periodic up-dates /remodels to be sure our product remains relevant. Therefore, I do hope this isolated incident will not deter you from coming back to stay with us as our newly remodeled rooms start becoming available the first quarter of next year.

Summary: Recently I stayed at the Park Place Inn. We had a good visit. Rooms were very clean and you just can't beat the location. I have stayed here before and I was very happy to come back. The only negative experience I had was our room location. We were on the ground floor, room 126 and it was right by the pool. The noise from the pool made it impossible to come back to the room at mid-day and take a nap.  It was good to have a microwave and a refrigerator.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us again and taking the time to write a review.  I am very happy you enjoyed your stay.  We will be remodeling our rooms beginning in the first quarter of the new year.  We will be changing some of the bedding arrangements to offer more options to our guests. We hope you will come back again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This is my fifth time at this Best Western (though it has never been acknowledged when I check in--that would be a nice touch). To repeat myself and everyone else, it really is the closest you can get to Disneyland. The complimentary breakfast is also stellar and in fact has only gotten better with each visit. Other than that, it's an old school motel that feels like it's getting more run down with each visit. The room was very well-worn and tired. One thing that really turned me off was seeing the garbage cans on the third floor walkway outside overflowing with garbage at night. Similarly, the customer service needs some work. In the early afternoons we came back to the rooms, which had already been made up, and then hung the "do not disturb" sign on the door. Each evening, I
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us again and taking the time to write a review.  Your comments will help us improve our service to all of our guests.  We will begin remodeling all of our rooms after the first of the year.  We do hope you will come back and see us soon and will enjoy all of the improvements we will be making over the next year.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Great location, rooms need an upgrade
Summary: You cannot beat the location of this hotel--it's literally across the street from the main gates of the Disney parks. However, I recommend you bring the following to make your stay here actually comfortable: your own sheets, pillows, and blankets because the ones on the beds are so scratchy and the pillows are HUGE and hard. Not great.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review. We will begin remodeling all of our rooms during the first quarter of the new year.  We do hope you will come back and stay with us again.  Thank you and take care

Summary: Can't beat the location = right across the main entrance to Disneyland.  Good value (nothing is cheap in the area), good clean rooms, reasonably quiet, good bathrooms, comfortable enough beds.  Very helpful staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review. We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We stayed here for three nights, with my husband, 3 young children, my mother, sister and brother in law. Our rooms were interconnected, and both rooms were spacious, with 2 double bed and sofa beds. Staffs were very helpful when I asked for the sofa bed to be made and also when I asked them to help hoover the floor when I accidentally had powder milk spilled on the floor.  I purposely chose to stay here for the location as it's an easy walk to get to the entrance for Disneyland especially with 3 kids. There are also restaurants close by, which helps after a long day.  Great place for families who want to be close to Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and we were able to address your requests quickly and helpfully.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Top reason I chose this hotel was location - it is directly across from the entrance to Disneyland and it is the only reason I am giving it 2 stars.  Other than that, this hotel was dirty and in major needs of updates!!!!  The room simply was not clean!  I put my wedding rings and jewelry on the dresser with the TV and went to put them on the next morning and they were stuck to the dresser - literally had to pop them off.  Disgusting!!!!  And the whole room was in this kind of shape.  The bath area had a tiny sink and long counter top.  The length was nice for getting ready in the morning, but the sink was inadequate for washing your face it was so small around.  Shower pressure to weak as well, but it was okay.  Beds were uncomfortable and sheets were paper thin, pillows will
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very sorry you did not enjoy your stay with us.  We do appreciate your comments and will use them to address improvements for our hotel.  I would like to let you know that we will be remodeling our rooms beginning in the first quarter of the new year.  I do hope you will come and visit us again and enjoy the improvements we will be making over the next year.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Great Spot for a Disney Vacation
Summary: We would have been happy with just a bed with how little time we spent in the room. The rooms were a little dated but really you aren't in Disney for that anyways. The beds we're comfy the pillows were nice and fluffy. The staff was awesome and they seemed to have a lot of fun. Took our bags when we got there even though it was way before check in. Breakfast was great and on days we declined housekeeping the front desk would give us a courtesy call before housekeeping left for the evening. My only complaint has little to do with the hotel itself and more to do with the fact their are three best westerns on the same street it made it a bit difficult for our cab to come find us despite the directions also breakfast was great with lots of options for my picky eater.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The value in this hotel/motel is the proximity to Disneyland.  It is directly across the main pedestrian crosswalk.   There was a free breakfast and our room was clean.  No frills and basic, but I would stay here again because of the clean room and definitely the location.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is literally across the street from DisneyLand!  It was cheap but clean with a decent little pool that was perfect for cooling off before a short nap each day!  The staff were not overly friendly but willing to assist when asked.  The free breakfast was across the way but provided a full spread before heading to the parks.  Would stay again!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Check in was a little busy but, our room was ready early. Parking spaces were very tight. We had a King room and it was a pretty big space. The bed was nice, room looked updated. I liked that they had 2 luggage stands in there. The fridge came in handy. There was very little light in some areas of the room though even with multiple lamps. The breakfast was wonderful, very easy to get in and find seats for a large group. They offered scrambled eggs, round cooked eggs for sandwiches, potatoes, cereal, pastries, bagels, milk, juice, toast, the meat changed from sausage or ham, and the carb changed as well from waffles, pancakes, or French toast. The Jacuzzi was nice before a late park entry or an early evening after, pool was chilly. The short walk to Disney Parks from this hotel
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great place to stay regardless of what you are ding, but especially i you are going to Disneyland. Best hotel you could stay at for the price and the location. Very good service, friendly staff. I try and stay here every time I'm in this area.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here for a couple of nights to do Disney.  Excellent location! You're right across the walk way to the entrance so only 4-5 mins walk to Disney.  - staff are very friendly and check in was a breeze.  - rooms are a great size and we had a couch and coffee table.  - VERY VERY noisy though. Walls are thin. We had a room near reception on the ground floor. We had people constantly walking past and it got very loud. Rooms above us had people running and walking loudly which just made our room unbearable at time.  Try and request a top floor room.  - American breakfast next door. Really good breakfast.  - has an IHOP and other eateries right next door.  - laundry available - parking is $10 per day but gets packed very quickly.   Certainly a great hotel in a great location,
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Jump, skip, hop into Disney maingate. Location you cannot beat.
Summary: Cannot beat this location. Rooms were basic. Nice counter space by bathroom sink, bathroom fan sounded like it was gonna take off (loud). Rooms opened to outdoors. Although you are a jump, skip and hop away from the maingate (right across the road). You can hear fireworks from Disney at nights from the room. Complimentary hot breakfast buffet is yummy and had something for everyone. Pizza Press down the road is good too, within close walking distance to lots of dining options. Joe's Crab Shack a short drive away was yummy as well.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Although my boyfriend and I usually stay on the DVC side of The Grand Californian for our Disney getaways, we waited too long this time and the vacation villas were already booked. A friend of ours recommended the Best Western Plus - Mini Suites as it's located right across the street and the rooms are very clean and economical. So I looked at the reviews online, decided to give it a chance and booked the room for 3 nights.   My boyfriend and I checked into the BW on Wednesday Oct. 19th. The lobby was nice enough and my friend wasn't kidding, the BW is literally right across the street from the parks. The service at the front desk was just ok. Nobody smiled, they just greeted us in a very matter of fact manner and that was about it. We were told that parking would be $10/night
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel staff was very helpful and friendly.  The onsite breakfast was very nice and saved us a lot of money.  We will stay here again on our next trip to Disneyland.  I rented a wheelchair right off the lobby area, that made the trip so much easier for me as I can't walk that far without my hip or foot in pain.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the staff and breakfast and the convenience of the wheelchair rental.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care

Summary: This is hotel that we prefer to stay at when we make our Disneyland trips. It is literally across the street from the park entrance. Staff is friendly and efficient. Rooms are clean and beds are super comfy.
Manager Response: Thank you for making us your preferred hotel and sharing why.  We enjoy having you as our guests and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments. We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Great for an older motel with breakfast buffet
Summary: I was very satisfied with my stay overall but there were a few problems. The bathroom fixtures had been tampered with, a prankster in the room before us I imagine,  so our bathroom was immediately flooded. The staff was very helpful and courteous but we asked them to wait to fix some of the issues that we couldn't ourselves until after our stay. The breakfast buffet was awesome! Hot food and a great variety. Beds were very small but super comfy. Overall, it was a great atmosphere and we had a wonderful time.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very sorry for the issue you experienced with the bathroom fixtures.  I am very pleased that aside from some issues, you had a wonderful time. We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and we hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel offers the shortest distance to Disneyland. Rooms are great and free breakfast is a plus!! Rooms are clean and spacious and the mini suite can sleep up to six people. Will definitely stay here again!!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to share your experience.  We enjoyed having you as our guests and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Great Location but don't expect comfort
Summary: It was great to stay directly across from Disneyland and I did enjoy the breakfast options however the beds and pillows are very uncomfortable here.  Also, if they have the same A/Cs throughout, they are very noisy and wake you up through the night.   Room was very clean though which was nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  If there is ever an issue with any item in the room making too much noise, please let us know and mostly likely we can fix the issue.  We do hope you will come and see us again.  We will be remodeling all rooms beginning in the first quarter of the new year.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We were very happy with the hotel overall. You cannot get any closer to Disneyland than the location of the hotel. Staff were all great. The bed was hard and the pillows were not my comfort level. Based off other reviews I brought my own pillow. Also the internet was pretty bad, reception as well for the cell phone. Overall a great place.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We are continuously looking to improve all of our services for our guests.  We hope you will come and visit us again and enjoy the improvements we will be making over the next several months.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel before and it is perfect for going to Disneyland or Disney California Adventures. The location is great, the staff is wonderful. Walk out of the hotel and across the street and on our way to Disneyland. The food is expected for a free breakfast. They had eggs, potatoes, waffles, and many other treats. The only complaint I have is the blanket on the bed was scratchy and did not keep me warm.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and thank you for returning to our hotel.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we hope you will enjoy our remodeled rooms which should be completed by mid 2017.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for 6 nights and they didn't disappoint.   First of all, location is a winner! It's right across Disneyland entrance. Convenient walk to enter both parks. I reckon those who are staying at Disneyland Hotel walk about the same distance.   Second, accommodation includes breakfast at Capt Kidd. They serve hot food which I hope had more variety. Imagine having to eat the same menu for the 6 nights we were there.   Third, there are plenty of restaurant choices near the hotel ie Tony Romas, Denny's, McDonalds, iHop, etc. And of course, Downtown Disney restaurants as well.  Will stay here again when we return in the future and will refer to family and friends.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the location and breakfast.  We greatly appreciate your comments, compliments, and recommendation.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care

Summary Heading: Clean, large rooms across from Disneyland
Summary: Location, location, location!  This hotel has the absolute best location being right across the street from the entrance to Disneyland!  Rooms are large and clean. The beds are pretty firm, so may be uncomfortable if you are used to a soft mattress. We didn't have any issues with it however. Bathroom is large and has a lot of room for your toiletries.  We loved the larger dorm sized fridge and the microwave.  We were able to store some left overs and drinks.   We didn't use the pool, but the it is very small. Don't stay here for the pool only.   Breakfast was great. Lots of hot items available ( eggs, pancakes, sausage, bacon, cereal, fruit etc). However, there is not a lot of seating so get there early as to avoid needing to stand while eating. Or you could take it back to your
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  It is wonderful that you enjoyed our breakfast offerings and that the refrigerator was beneficial for you.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care

Summary: Hotel was nice and looked cared for. Very nice and clean rooms. Wi-fi worked great.  Location was great for Disneyland.The park is across the street. Lots of places to eat within walking distance. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the accommodations, amenities and location.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care

Summary: Check in was smooth, and the staff are friendly and helpful. Some people mentioned renovated rooms, but I believe that must be something they're doing in waves because it seemed like our room had not been updated. This is not to say that it was unsatisfactory - the rooms are very generous in size and clean. We tried the breakfast several times and didn't have the problem of over-crowding, but perhaps that's because we tended to enter the park a little later in the morning (9AM). Breakfast is better than most continentals I've encountered and the room it is served in is well-lit and nicely updated. Our favourite part about the hotel is its proximity to the parks. It's less than a ten minute walk to either of the front gates, so it makes for an easy trip back to the hotel for a
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay including the friendliness of the staff, our breakfast, and the accommodations.  We will begin of full renovation of all of our rooms in the first quarter of 2017.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: If you can't afford a resort hotel then this is the place to stay.  You can't get any closer than right across the street.  The breakfast offered a variety of choices and pretty good coffee to get you ready for your day at Disneyland!!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we hope you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care

Summary Heading: Location, Location, Location, and Great Service!!!
Summary: We stayed at the Best Western Plus Park Place Inn which is right across from street from DisneyLand Gates.  You could not get any closer to the Disney Gate.  I think it is closer than the actual disney onsite hotels.  We loved our stay at the Best Western.  The staff was superfriendly and the breakfast was fabulous.  It was located in a private room next door at the captain's table (I believe).  The breakfast had alot of hot choices and they were able to handle my son's glutten, soy, and nut allergies everyday.   We couldn't of asked for anything more.  The rooms were all suites, we had two double beds and a pull out couch so there was plenty of room for sleeping.  The bathroom and room was clean.  Overall the Best Western Plus made our Disneyland Vacation a huge Success.  We
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We have been continuously expanding our breakfast and I am very pleased to read we were able to meet your sons food option needs.  We greatly appreciate all of your comments and compliments and look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The service of the staff is impeccable. The proximity to Disneyland is the best, outside of staying at a Disneyland owned hotel. This hotel sits directly in front of crosswalk that takes you to the entrance to the parks. The rooms are obviously recently renovated. They are quite large. Great value for your dollar. The only complaint  i have is that the bed was a bit uncomfortable. My girlfriend didn't have a problem but I was not entirely enthused. The pillows were pretty rigid too. But it is still an overall comfortable hotel. I have stayed in a few hotels in this area and I would definitely stay here again in a heartbeat.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the service of the staff, the location, and the accommodations.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Staff very friendly and organized.  Housekeeping staff was very quick to respond to request for additional pillows.  Rooms were very clean, comfortable.  I would return next time I go to Disneyland.  Very convenient and it is so nice to be able to come back to the room to recharge before heading back to the park.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We greatly appreciate you sharing what would bring you back to our hotel.  We enjoyed having you as our guests and hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care

Summary Heading: So incredibly close to front gate
Summary: We stayed at Best Western Plus Park Place Inn during our stay in September 2016.  A great, low cost hotel.  Clean, tidy and straight across the road from Disneyland main entrance.  Couldn't ask for more!    The only negative was the breakfast.  This is served in the restaurant next door but it was just too crowded and not enough seating.  We tried it on the first day and then gave up and went elsewhere for our breakfasts.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  There are peak time that we can recommend to avoid the breakfast and you are also more than welcome to take the food back to the room.  We do hope you will come and stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Have been visiting/staying at the BW Park Place Inn since 2008.  Love the location, short walk to Disney.  Like the breakfast buffet vastly improved with good selection of warm food, depending on day, pancakes, waffles, sausage, ham, different eggs and loved their breakfast potatoes.  Sadly the internet reception has not improved much since first began staying there.  Difficult to log on and continually goes down.  Rooms are a little outdated and tired, but they are totally comfortable and the maid service is outstanding.
Manager Response: Thank you for returning to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We greatly appreciate your loyalty as well as your comments and compliments.  Please come and see us again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Great place to base a visit to Disneyland. The breakfast room gets somewhat loud and crazy in the morning, but it's full of kids who can't wait to get to Disneyland. (That's why you came, right?) Also, the room was very hot and didn't smell fresh when we arrived and the AC had trouble getting the room down to comfortable. Wish it had been on a couple of hours before we got there. The price was more than fair and you couldn't closer to the gate at these prices. The staff was outstanding. They were friendly, efficient and when we had a problem with our door lock at 7 am, they had a friendly person who fixed it almost immediately.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  I am very pleased you enjoyed our staff and location and hope we will be seeing you again.  Thank you and take care

Summary: Really love the location to Disneyland and the breakfast was more than I expected.  Rooms not the best and the pillows and beds were very hard. Rooms felt damp with the air on. Cleanliness could be more on the rooms.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments. They will help us as we look for ways to continually improve our service.  We hope you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Almost perfect for a Disneyland stay
Summary: This place is GREAT for a Disneyland visit. You are literally RIGHT across the street (you really can't get any closer), and it's fairly quiet off the strip there. There is a free breakfast every morning, which is pretty good (tiring by day 8, but still very good), the hotel is nice, and it's affordable. The only complaint I have is that the people above us seemed to run a marathon every morning in their room at 5:45 am and it woke us up every time. So that's a down side... but hopefully you get normal neighbors that sleep until at least 6-7. Cheap parking, laundry, small pool...
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your time with us even though you had very loud, early risers, above you.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Loved this hotel. Breakfast was good and good choices. Liked that the hot breakfast changed every day. Pool area was nice and felt more private than others in the area. Staff were amazing. So friendly and knowledgeable. Absolutely can not beat staying right across from Disneyland. Will definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you stay with us and greatly appreciate you sharing how we provided you with an awesome stay.  Thank you for your comments and compliments. We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Great location...great breakfast but Hard beds..WOKE UP WITH A NUMB ARM THEY WERE SO HARD. My daughter said the same thing...as hard as Motel 6 beds.....We rented scooters for Disneyland and the hotel was great about letting us park them in the room at night....
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments, which will help us improve our services.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care

Summary: Had another wonderful stay at Best Western Park Place Inn. Room was ready at 10:00am which was totally unexpected. Had a room with a view of the pool, another nice surprise. The pool was great for mid-day park breaks. Breakfast was great as usual. The best thing ever is that walk to the parks, it really is right across the street. We like to be there when the parks open, and generally head over about 30 minutes before that and it works out great.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us again and taking the time to share your experience.  We greatly appreciate you returning to our hotel and sharing why we are the "Best Location for DLR".  We look forward to your next visit with us.  Thank you and take care

Summary: This hotel is not a 5 star hotel but if you are looking for a clean hotel, right across the street from Disneyland with free breakfast and Wifi, this is your place.  Friendly staff, rooms are good, bed was comfy.  For the price, I feel this is the best hotel and we won't stay anywhere else.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the location, accommodations, and amenities.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Harbor Bvd. Best Western a GREAT Value
Summary: A very friendly and professional staff.  Food wasn't that good, but adequate.  Rooms need updating as well as the pool area but you cannot beat the location.  Considering how busy this Best Western is because of it's close proximity to Disneyland, this property is as well as maintained as could be.  We would not stay anywhere else next time we go.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  All of our rooms will be remodeled beginning shortly after the first of the year.  I hope you will enjoy the property even more once completed.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Hotel Across the Street from Disneyland
Summary: A very average hotel.  Clean and neat.  Breakfast included.  Has a jacuzzi and pool, very close to Disneyland, just across the street, a short walk away.   There are plenty of places to eat close by.  You can buy two-day or more passes at the desk for Disneyland.  No discounts for a one day pass.  You can watch the Disney fireworks in the front of the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and sharing what you liked about the hotel.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care

Summary: Staff were very pleasant and helpful and location of hotel was great - right across from Disneyland. But hotel appears very old and in need of updates to rooms. Beds were quite comfortable but the aircon made lots of noise so it was hard to sleep.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  Starting shortly after the first of the year we will begin remodeling all of our rooms.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel was AWSOME! Checkin was easy. The gentleman at the front desk told us the best place to park (going against what his coworker suggested). We had a little issue with our tv remote not working. BUT, the lady at the front desk sent a maintenance man to our room while we walked back to it! Not 1 minute after we got in our room he was there, he fixed it was we were on our way! The hotel is LITERALLY, 5 minutes away from the Disney parks. It is right across from them! The breakfast is AWSOME for just a continental breakfast. It included sausage, potatoes, egg (patty & scrambled), bagels, English muffins, white & wheat toast, at least 5-6 different types of muffins and Danishes, fresh fruit, 4 different cereals, oatmeal, walnuts, raisins, craisens, granola,  milk, juices,
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to share what made our hotel "Awesome".  I am very pleased you enjoyed the service, location, breakfast, and accommodations.  Your comments, compliments and recommendation are greatly appreciated.  We hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I stayed here to be close to disneyland. The hotel has lots of rooms with a few elevators which is handy when going to different floors with your luggage. The rooms are big the beds have been described as a double but id say more like a king single. The room was clean and comfortable had a tiki kinda feel to it. Depending on what you want to do if your staying in the hotel all day then its not the best but for a bed just to sleep on its good. They offer a free buffet breakfast next door. The hotel is directly across the street to the Disneyland entrance.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Superb location, excellent rooms (big, modern and very clean), less than 10 minutes walk to the disney parks. Entrance to the disney 'property' is directly across the street. Superb breakfast upstairs in Captain Kidds - offering hot and cold options, sausages, ham, hot potatoes, pancakes, toast, bagels, cereal, coffee etc, buffet style. Hotel reception is very modern, we made use of the complimentary computer to print off boarding passes for our internal flight.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great location to Disneyland and clean big rooms
Summary: We had two adjoining rooms, very spacious and comfortable and clean. I didn't love the breakfast, but appreciated that we could grab something quick. Excellent location to the parks, and also not too far to walk to Cheesecake Factory a grew blocks away. Service was great. Definite recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Overall the hotel, breakfast and pool were great and the staff was very attentive. Half the price as the Disney resort & free breakfast!! right across the street from Disneyland, walk over in just a few minutes to CA adventure-land or Disneyland. It is a great location to rest or take a swim after a long day at the "Happiest Place on Earth"
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great place to take the family
Summary: Very clean, large rooms.  Excellent breakfast!  Great value for the money.  Comfortable beds, and a pull out couch. Fridge and microwave.  Great location for visiting Disneyland...literally right across the street.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We were very happy with this hotel. Location was great-right across from Disneyland.  The hotel was clean and the grounds were kept up very well.  The lobby was welcoming and the front desk staff was very helpful.  The beds and pillows were comfortable.  While we were there they were doing complete cleaning of some rooms-a good thing to see happening.  The breakfast-which was next door-was adequate.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Got this room because it's right across the street from Disney. We checked in early, which was nice but our room was 3 doors down from main office. Was expecting it to be noisy but we're happy it wasn't.  Motel looks like it had a make over and was very clean.  But the furniture looks like it was from the 70's.  The dresser had very deep scratches all over it. New tiled bathroom, but kept the old furniture. Made the whole place  look old. The parking is $10.00 per guest visit and we were told we'd have to move our vehicle out of their lot at 3pm. We planned on staying at Disneyland till 5 or 6.  After talking to the front desk, we were told, it's not a big deal go ahead and leave when you want.  Staff was very nice and the complimentary continental breakfast next door at a
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Closest to Disneyland and a nice hotel!
Summary: Stayed 5 nights and enjoyed the room very much.  Plenty of room for our family, very clean and housekeeping service was prompt every day to keep things in order, Breakfast was convenient and the hotel was so close to restaurants and the Disney Park  is just a few minutes walk away.  Will stay here again for sure!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great accomodation conveniently located a short walk from disneyland. Ample parking & washing facilities. Would definately recommend staying here. We arrived well before check in time & our room was ready.   Handy to cheesecake factory & bubba gumps. Family friendly swimming pool & spa. We stayed five nights. The included breakfast was hearty enough to start each day
Manager Response: none

Summary: If you want to visit Disneyland this is the place to stay!! Friendly staff, neat tidy rooms and directly across the road from DL. Perfect for families who want to catch their breath in afternoon and come back for a rest then hit it again for night session. Pool ok. Free breakfast at Captain Kidds  did the job. Overall I would stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great place just across the street to Disneyland entrance! Big rooms, reasonable price, excellent breakfast! Loved it! And if you are tired from walking all day long, you just get to your room in 5 minutes walk. Will definitely return!

Summary: great service only problem came back from long day at Disneyland and was locked out of my room because i hadn't paid for i day of parking for 10.00 so had to go to office and re do my key cards and pay the 10.00

Summary Heading: Quality room at a fair price
Summary: We had a mini-suite. Basically two queen beds and a couch. It served our family of 5 just fine. The staff was very friendly and helpful and the location across from Disneyland was priceless. The breakfast that was included with the room, while not fancy, was definitely better than many. Five people all ate something, so that's a success.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great hotel close to the park
Summary: Hotel was great, free breakfast next door at Captain kids was awful - hot stuffy room, food was horrendous and inedible, staff could care less - total contrast to the hotel staff who were helpful and lovely. Would stay here again but go to ihop for breakfast instead

Summary: rooms have been updated since we last stayed here.  The breakfast is good, and there is a good selection for the whole family.  From cold cereal, to eggs and ham.  There should be something there for everyone.  Excellent location if you are doing a Disney trip as it is right across the street from the entrance.
