We did have the room inspected and treated.  We do hope you will come and stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We stayed here based on the recommendation of a friend and so glad we did. It's a FANTASTIC location right across the street from Disneyland, but not nearly as expensive as nearby locations (like the Disneyland Hotel). The rooms were older, but more than adequate. The beds were comfy, modern TV, bathroom was fine. The breakfast buffet had a lot to be desired, but it was enough to hold us over until we got into the park each day. Overall, this was an awesome choice for us during our visit to Disneyland. It was so easy for us to go back and forth to the hotel to rest after getting hand stamps from the park. I'd definitely recommend this for anyone looking for a place to stay while visiting Disneyland. We always felt safe coming and going and the people at the front desk were
Manager Response: Thank you for following your friends recommendation in choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and greatly appreciate you sharing what you liked about our hotel.  Please come and stay with us again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Closer to Disneyland then The Disneyland Hotel!
Summary: My Wife and I stayed here for 1 week in September 2015.  We found the rooms to be very nice, clean and spacious.  The house keeping was excellent. During our stay the breakfast room was being upgraded. However a free bagged breakfast was provide. It was just fine and definitely saved us a few dollars vs buying breakfast in the parks.  When we return to Disneyland this hotel will be my first pick every time. Unfortunately they are already fully booked at Christmas time this year so we are staying down the road.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  Thank you for your understanding as we updated the breakfast area.  I am sorry we were able to accommodate you at Christmas, but hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Hotel is directly across the street from Disneyland...+++ Front desk staff was great...+++ Rooms were efficient...+++ Breakfast was not good, but I think they were in the process of redesigning the service...--- Would surely stay there again...+++
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and look forward to seeing you again.  We were remodeling our breakfast area, which is now completed.  Thank you and take care

Summary: Due to lack of availability we had to switch hotels for the last few nights of our trip to Anaheim and after weighing up our options, chose the Best Western Park Place Inn.  We were pleasantly surprised that we did.  We checked-in just before lunch and were lucky enough that our room was available straight away, our room was on the 3rd floor around the other side of the building, however it was right near another set of stairs which made the exit to Harbor Boulevard easy.  Our room was spacious (bigger than our room at the Grand Californian) and very quiet.  With a short walk to the parks, gift shop downstairs and the little convenience store next door at the Tropicana, plus various restaurants along Harbor, this hotel makes a great argument for staying off site.   We found
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased we exceeded your expectations.  We enjoyed having you as our guests and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments. We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Decent Hotel very close to Disneyland Maingate
Summary: Hotel was clean, nothing fancy. Room was large enough for family of 4. The pull out sofa was handy so that my children could each have their own bed. However, I'm not sure it would have been very comfortable for an adult.  Biggest benefit of this hotel was the very short walk to Disneyland Main gate. This is our first trip to Disneyland where my children never complained about the walk back to the hotel. Also had a good view of the fireworks from our particular room. Otherwise it was clean enough and quiet. I would prefer a room where the bathroom vanity is separated from the sleeping area so I can get ready in the mornings without waking my sleeping children. It was nice having a breakfast offered, however I would have like to see more variety.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed you stay.  Our breakfast was limited due to the breakfast remodel.  Our breakfast area is now open.  We appreciate your comments and compliments and hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Average for the hotels in this area
Summary: We have stayed here before and again it is a fine place. It is the closest one to the Disney Resort entry on Harbor.  We had no issues with check in or out.  The room was clean and suited our purpose of a decent place to stay when we spend the days in the Disneyland Resort.  The pool is small but we didn't use it. The breakfast area was being renovated however they had a temporary breakfast area that I heard was fine but we did not use it. We had no issues with noise.  The bed was fine - better than average.  We always slept fine.  The shower had some significant temperature changes all by itself.    This place is similar to many other accommodations in this area that were probably built back in the 1960s.  I would stay here again due to the proximity to Disneyland however I
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us again and taking the time to write a review.  Thank you for your comments and compliments and sharing what your enjoyed about our hotel.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: All about location, hotel was decent too
Summary: Other reviewers aren't exaggerating about the perfection location of this hotel. You are literally across the street from Disney. Mind you, you will have to cross the street, walk through the bus/shuttle area before you reach Disney's security but it's as close as you can get to Disney property without actually staying on Disney property.  We stayed during their dining room renovation so unfortunately the breakfast wasn't the most thrilling aspect of the stay. A couple of overly processing prepackaged muffins, apple/orange, orange juice, granola bars and Jimmy Dean breakfast sandwiches made up the breakfast. I look forward to their finished renovations if we return to this hotel.  The cleanliness of the hotel left a little to be desired which is why I've rated this property as
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We appreciate all of your comments and compliments.  I am very sorry that a roach found its way into your room.  The area has seen an unusual number of the flying roaches this year.  Most likely due to the temperatures and humidity.  However, the grounds are treated weekly and rooms are regularly inspected and treated as well.  We do hope you will come back and see us again soon.  the breakfast area has reopened.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: An easy walk to Disney is this hotels best feature.It was great to park the car for two days and not have to fight traffic. The room was small but clean. The beds were small and hard.The pillows were like rocks.The morning grab and go breakfast was good enough to keep you going.The staff was friendly and efficient.I don't think any hotel is closer to Disney but you pay a little more for the convenience.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We appreciate your comments and compliments.  Our breakfast area is now reopen and serving our full breakfast.  We hope you will come back and visit us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The Best Western Plus is directly across the street from the entry to Disneyland and California Adventure.  You really can't get any closer unless you stay at a Disney property.  The rooms are basic and clean.  Great service and very friendly staff.  Can't beat it!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you stay with us and thank you for your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care

Summary: Hotel is directly across from Disneyland.  Literally, you cross the street and you are on the Disneyland pathway to lead you into the middle area between the parks.  So aside from the location being the best for walking to and from Disneyland, the service is also great!  They were very friendly and accommodating.  Parking costs $15 a day but Disneyland would cost you the same or more.  Our room was ready earlier than check in time, which was great because we had two two year old girls and they desperately needed a nap.  The elevators are minimal and sloooow but if you don't have lots of stuff or a stroller, you can easily take the stairs.  We didn't go in the pool, it's pretty small but everyone there seemed to enjoy it.  The rooms are cozy, two double beds, one pull out couch,
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and sharing what you enjoyed about our hotel.  We hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel is as close as you can get to Disney without being at a Disney property (and having to sell a kidney to afford). It's perfect because if you stay further away you end up either driving and parking at Disney or taking the shuttle bus. Either way it's additional money and more importantly, time. It takes forever to park and/or ride the shuttle. If you want to take a break during the day, it's great to be close enough to easily do that.  The rooms are pretty large and appear to have been fairly recently updated. This property has been around a long time and has the doors facing outside. There is a small pool and Jacuzzi that looked nice but we didn't use. The rooms were clean and staff was very nice. They held our bags in a secure place while we were in the park on our
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you stay with us and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  Thank you for sharing what made us a perfect location or Disney.  We hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We had a pleasant stay at the mini suites.  The room was clean and comes with 2 double beds plus a pull out sofa.  The bathroom was also clean.  This is the ideal spot for a Disneyland visit...the entrance is literally right across the street.  Overnight parking is only $10/night and you can keep your car there until 3pm the following day.  You have to wait until 1pm on check in day to park your car at the hotel.  I will definitely stay here again for our next Disney trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We look forward to seeing you during your next visit to Disney.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This is the first time I've stayed here. The staff was great. I had a few issues with my room, but maintenance responded really fast and corrected the problem. The rooms are a little out of date, but very spacious. Best part, it is across the street from Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We will be remodeling our rooms beginning after the first of the year.  We hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: In May I had occasion to attend a large convention at the Anaheim Center. We stayed at the best Western and was very happy that the room was nice, clean, well cared for and the hotel great and the breakfast room well furnished...Would highly recommend
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and greatly appreciate your comments, compliments and recommendation.  We hope you will come and stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Great place for families headed to DisneyLand
Summary: Great hotel for families headed to Disneyland. Not a 5 star hotel, but the location is the most convenient you will find. The staff is very helpful and patient. The rooms are older but clean. You can find newer hotels but they require a much longer walk or use of a shuttle. We stay here every time we come.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us again and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoy having you as our guest and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Room was very clean, staff accommodated us, parking was easy.
Summary: We arrived early at about 1pm and asked if we may park or if a room was available. The room they reserved for us was a front of the building room with views of the fireworks but was not ready yet. We opted to take a 3rd floor room in the middle with a pool view because it was ready then. We were able to put our luggage in the room and use the bathroom before we went into Disneyland.    I wiped down any surface I could with disinfecting wipes because I have a baby. The room was cleaner than I expected, based on other reviews saying otherwise. The room had everything we needed for a one night stay, the beds were comfortable, the shower and bathroom were nice and clean, and the refrigerator and microwave came in very handy. We underestimated how much we would drink while in
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as a guest and I am pleased we had a room available early for you.  Thank you for sharing what you enjoyed about our hotel.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: great hotel, due to remodeling breakfast was a bust. Needs longer hours and more machines for guest laundry. Also needs additional parking so that every room has a spot to park on site. Right across from Disney and easy to get meals close by
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We really did enjoy our week’s stay at Park Place September 12-19, 2015.  I normally stay at Hampton’s for work and pleasure.  A couple of years ago I stayed at a not so nice BW in Albany so I was nervous about the stay.  Park Place’s reviews are solid on tripadvisor so I took the plunge.    I was impressed by the upkeep and maintenance in the entire hotel.  No dirty walkways, no trash, perfectly maintained landscaping.  All of the outside areas are excellent.  The pool/spa area was nice and stocked with towels which was nice!  Lobby is beautiful.  I never had trouble getting a parking place near my room.  All interaction with staff was great.  Everyone was friendly and professional.  You can tell the staff takes pride in their job because everyone’s uniform/dress was neat and
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am extremely pleased we exceeded your expectations and were able to provide you with a "perfect stay all around".  We greatly appreciate you sharing what your enjoyed about our hotel and thank you for your comments and compliments.  We do hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Rented two rooms for a family get away.  We have stayed here many times and will again in the future.  We arrive early in the day from the airport and they either have a room for us or hold our luggage.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us again and taking the time to write a review.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Was very close to disney parks which was a plus as we had a young child with us and had friendly staff and decent room. Bed was a slightly uncomfortable and wish we would have been able to experience the full breakfast as that was a main reason I chose the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guests and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  I hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We stayed here as part of our first anniversary trip that my husband surprised me with, as I hadn't been at Disneyland for 25 years.  The hotel is perfectly located very close to the entrance of Disneyland, you honestly couldn't get any closer unless you were staying at the resort itself.  The rooms were pretty basic, and not large at all (we were in the disability room as my hubby has a disability).  The pool area was small but nice.  It was very handy to have a small convenient store at the hotel.  Staff were pretty good.  Negatives:  Not able to check into our room until after check in time, rooms were a little dark and furniture is a little dated.  Breakfast was so so.  Overall We would stay here again, as the price was right and was very close to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I hope you had a wonderful anniversary.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The location and service was great.  Grateful they provided breakfast grab bags during remodeling of dining area. However, they had double beds rather than queen which was difficult for sleeping comfort. Found a few ants in the room, most likely due to food being brought in with breakfast bags (muffins attracting ants).
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you had a good experience.  We do greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and hope you will stay with us again.  For queen beds, ask for our mini suites.  Thank you and take care

Summary Heading: Do not stay at this hotel
Summary: Do not charge guests $25 per hour for parking after 3pm the following day, when your parking rate is $10 per night.  All other hotels on Harbor Blvd., charge one additional day's overnight parking fee, if a car is left on site after check out.    We were forced to leave Disneyland by 2:30, just so we could move our car from the Best Western and not be charged the $25 per hour fee.  Then we needed to find and pay for other parking, so we could enjoy a full day at Disneyland.  We will never stay at this hotel again.  In addition to the parking joke, the rooms are outdated and look like they should have been remodeled 15 years ago.    This is a motel, charging $150-250 per night.  The value of this motel would be $50-75 per night...even given the location.  It's that dingy.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am sorry you were disappointed with the parking restrictions.  However, we provide hotel parking, not Disney parking.  The $25.00 per hour fee is a non-guest deterrent fee. Access to amenities and facilities (including parking area) of a hotel are reserved for guests of the hotel. Right to facility access expires at that the time of check out which is 11am. However, as a courtesy, we do provide a complimentary four hour extension on parking to our guests. Due to our very limited parking, we do not have the space available to serve as hotel parking as well as Disneyland Parking. After 3:00pm we do require our former guests to remove their vehicles (to avoid additional fees) to make room for our guests who will be arriving that night. If we allowed guests to stay parked until park closing there would have been no room for you to park when you arrived.  If you have any questions, please feel free to contact me.

Summary Heading: Great Location for a Disney trip!
Summary: This Best Western is about as close to the Disneyland Main gate as you can get in a hotel! The crosswalk to get to the entrance of the park is directly in front of the hotel, making the walk to the park 3 minutes tops if you get stuck in a long security line. The rooms are clean and the staff is friendly, though I did notice that the windows are pretty thin, making it necessary for the staff to put up signs about "quiet time" between 9pm and  8pm I believe. Noise did not end up being a problem for us, but it could easily be. We had the "grab and go" breakfast which consisted of a sausage and cheese biscuit sandwich that you cook in the microwave in your room (Jimmy Dean sandwich) a little school lunch sized orange juice, a quaker granola bar, a choice of apple or orange, and a
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and do appreciate your comments and compliments. Our breakfast area should be completed by November.  In 2016 we will be updating our rooms.  While the Best Western down the street does not charge for parking, it does charge a resort fee.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your experience and hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Ideal location, felt very safe as a solo traveler.
Summary: This hotel is literally across from the entrance to Disneyland. The location is ideal, but as a solo traveler, there are additional considerations. It is just a hop from the crosswalk to the park to the hotel lobby, which was always well lit and occupied. Rooms are very quiet, did not realize it was pouring rain on my last morning because the rooms are so quiet. Very courteous cleaning staff, left the room a bit later one morning and heard a knock on the door, it was the maid, who was very apologetic and arranged to come back later. Staff at the front desk very knowledgable about park tickets (which are available for purchase right there). I cannot. Wait to plan another solo trip, and I plan on staying here. Easy decision!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and are please you felt safe and enjoyed the location and accommodations.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Dated and noisy neighbours but close to Disneyland
Summary: Stayed here because it was close to Disneyland and had great reviews at the time of booking. It was clean and spacious but very old and dated. The air con unit rattled so we had to stick cloth and tissues in the panel at the top to sleep with it on. The staff seemed nice, in the information brochure it says they sell tickets at the front desk so we went to get some and the guy said no, have to buy at the gate of Disneyland. So that was a waste of time. Parking is $10 a night and very packed. No shade either so car gets hot. The shower was ok but couldnt figure out how to turn it on at first. Some sort of pull out style.  There was supposed to be a continential breakfast included but apparently the place was being remodelled so we got nothing. Had to go to Dennys instead (and pay
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review. We do appreciate you sharing your experience but, I would like to make some clarifications for you and anyone reading this review.  We do sell Disney Tickets at the front desk. We sell the 2 to 5 day park hopper tickets.  If you were looking for something other than that, then yes you would need to go to Disneyland to purchase the tickets.  The breakfast area is being remodeled.  We did send out notification to all of our guests and travel agencies.  Even though the area is being remodeled, we are still providing (a modified) breakfast  to our guests.  We are providing a Jimmy Dean Sausage, Egg, and Cheese Breakfast Sandwich, Granola Bar, Blueberry muffin, Oranges and Apples, Coffee and Orange Juice. I do apologize for the A/C noise.  If we had been notified we could have corrected the issue. Also, if we had heard back that the kids were still making noise, we could have issued a sterner warning to the guests above you to help entice them to control their kids.  I am very sorry you did not fully enjoy your stay.  Hopefully the clarifications have helped.  I would also like to let you know that the rooms will be remodeled shortly after the first of the year.  I hope you will come back and see us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Just had a great stay here, and the location really can't be beat! From the crosswalk in front of Best Western to handing your ticket over at the Disneyland park entrance was maybe a 5 minute walk door to door! I couldn't believe how close it was, they could easily be charging more for lodging/parking just for the location alone. If you are going to the parks on a budget, this is the spot to stay. The rooms were perfectly adequate and got the job done for our purposes. Clean, comfortable beds, with a very friendly and accommodating front desk staff. The price was right, it was great not having to worry about parking the car/shuttles/wasting valuable park time! I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this hotel to family and friends, and would absolutely stay here again when visiting
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you had a great stay and thank you for sharing what made us the best location for Disneyland.  We greatly appreciate your comments, compliments, and recommendation.  We hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Hotel check in and out was quick and easy. Hotel is located directly across the street from the pedestrian entrance to the Disnelyand parks - very convenient! Room was clean and large enough for our family of 5.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care

Summary: It was great being next to the park. The hotel was much nicer than we though. The rooms were really nice.  They had all the things you needed for a comfortable stay. There are several places to eat with in walking distance of lest than 10 min. Denny's, Cold Stone, Tony Roma, Cheese Cake Fac, etc. The only negative I could say if you are not at Disneyland enjoying the fireworks the blast sound is amplified being that close to the park.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope you will come and stay with us again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Spacious room, really nice staff, best location outside the parks
Summary: I liked almost everything about this hotel. The location is top-notch -- you literally can't get closer to the Disneyland parks entrance. The room was spacious and sparkling clean, and I especially appreciated the very nice, newly remodeled bathroom area -- it even had a water-saving dual-flush toilet. The beds were comfortable. Every single staff member we encountered was friendly and helpful; they got us into our room hours before check-in time, got us car service back to the airport at the end of our stay, and called after we checked out to let me know that I'd left behind a hat that I hadn't even missed yet. And the price was very reasonable, especially given the location and overall quality of the motel.  Downsides are minor, but here they are: The room decor is a little
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us including the accommodations, location, and service.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and would like to let you know that the rooms will all be upgraded by the end of next year.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I stayed here with a friend to run at Disneyland.  The room had 2 queen beds, a pull out sofa, a decent size fridge and a microwave.  It was right across the street from the Disney shuttle drop off location so an easy 5 minute walk to the parks and a 15 minute walk to the race start line (including traffic light waiting).  Since the races started at 5:30 we wanted something as close as possible but also reasonably priced and with fridge and microwave for pre and post run eating.  They also provided a free "grab and go" breakfast (breakfast buffet under renovation) and wifi.  I'd stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased we 'worked well" for your race weekend.  I hope you had fun at the Disney run.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments. We hope you will stay with us again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I really only have good things to say about this hotel. The check-in was efficient and the people working the front desk were super friendly and helpful. And check-out was even faster. We stayed here for 5 nights and never had any problems.   We had a room on the second floor with two double beds. The room was very clean and we had everything we needed. Due to the water shortage in California, water pressure is a little low but that's understandable for conservation. The pool is a little on the small side and the week of Sep 7-11 temperatures ranged from 94 to over 100 degrees so it got a lot of use.  Breakfast is being handed out every morning by the pool as the usual spot is being renovated. You get a brown bag breakfast with a sandwich, fruit, juice, coffee, etc.  As far as
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the location, amenities, accommodations, and staff.  We greatly appreciate all of your comments and compliments and hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel is a 5 minute walk from the Disneyland entrance. You couldn't ask for a more convenient location. The lobby is updated and check in was very easy. The grounds of the hotel are sort of dingy (it's really a motel) and the rooms are average at best. We arrived to our room on a 95F and very humid day and the a/c had not been turned on in advance. It took hours to cool the room down. Our bathtub was not clean - there was sand in it! The bed was decently comfortable and the mini fridge was a plus. My husband enjoyed the pool and said it was clean. The grab and go breakfast was ok - just enough to get us going on our way to Disney. If I stayed here again it would be mostly for the location.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very sorry we did not meet your expectations.  We greatly appreciate your comments which will help us evaluate our service and training.  We do hope you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Stayed here on a family vacation to Disneyland. The hotel was clean, room comfortable, staff friendly, and breakfast was very good! The location couldn't be beat, directly across the street from entrance to DL. The sofa was good and beds comfortable. The refrigerator and microwave in the room and large closet added to the amenities. Pics are from front of hotel looking toward entrance.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us, including the location, staff, amenities, breakfast, and accommodations.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated.  We hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Another Great Stay at Best Western
Summary: Best Western Park Place Inn, Anaheim is one of my most favorite places to stay when visiting Disneyland. It is tied with Best Western Anaheim Plus.  The rooms are always clean and comfortable and the staff are friendlier than any other non-Best Western hotels I have stayed in.  Can't beat the location for a quick trip to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us again and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoy having you as our guest and thank you for sharing why we are one of your most favorite places to stay when visiting Disneyland.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and look forward to you next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Old looking hotel with excellent location, 5 min walking to Disney Parks entrance. I stayed there at August 2015; a cockroach in the bathroom and the complimentary breakfast zone closed due to remodeling were the worst part.
Manager Response: Thank you fro choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very sorry you did not enjoy your stay with us.  The cockroach was one of the flying tree cockroaches and they unfortunately fly in behind guests or housekeeping.  We do greatly apologize.  Thank you for your comments.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We were traveling with small children so we chose to stay here because of it's proximity to Disneyland.  We found the hotel to be comfortable and the staff friendly and helpful. If I had one complaint it would be that there is not enough parking.  Also, the Wifi did not work.  Another guest we talked to had the same complaint, so even though they do have free wifi, I will say no as we were unable to use it the entire 4 days we stayed.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your time with us and do apologize that you had problems with the Wi-Fi.  There should have been no connectivity issues during your stay.  Please contact us next time so we can help you with any issue.  We thank you for your comments and compliments and hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel many times during the last 20 years for leisure travel.  It has always been clean and comfortable and if by chance there was a problem, the staff fixed it immediately.  We love it's walkable distance into Disneyland and Downtown Disney and all the close by shopping and dining.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your Disneyland visits and for taking the time to write a review. We enjoy having you stay with us and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments. Thank you for sharing what brings you back to our hotel.  We do look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Excellent Location - Great Hotel - Great Price
Summary: Loved staying at this hotel!  Excellent Location just steps from main entrance to Disneyland.  Friendly staff that helped in me locating an item I had forgotten to pack! Nice spacious clean rooms and at a great price!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us, and that we were able to help you with the item you for got to pack.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I have stayed here twice now and you really can't beat the location. Right across the road from Disneyland (literally right across the road) and perfect spot to rest after a long day at the parks.  The rooms aren't five star but they are neat and clean but all you need when you will be spending most of your time at the parks.  Breakfast is included and isn't anything special but gives you the fuel you need for getting through your days at Disneyland. There are convenience stores located nearby the hotel so you can always buy your own cereal or snacks if the hotel breakfast isn't to your liking.   The wifi can be a bit hit and miss. During our first stay (September 2014) the wifi was ok but during my second stay it was woeful. I think it really depends on which room you are in.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us again and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  Our breakfast area is currently being remodeled and we will be providing new options in the beginning of November.  We do hope will stay with us again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Location is SUPERB! The service though was...ok.
Summary: The best thing I can say about this hotel is the location!!! It's JUST across the street (which is a normal sized street...not a crazy huge one to cross) from the entrance to Disneyland! You can't get closer! I think our hotel entrance was a closer walk than the walk would be to the entrance to/from the Disneyland Resort Hotel!! The last thing I want when going somewhere that I'm going to be walking around at all day, is to walk a mile + just to get there. This also helps when you need to take a break from the park...it's just a quick walk back to your room for relax for a while. Takes just a few minutes...you cross the street where your immediately greeted by a sign for Disneyland, walk down a small pathway passing the area with the trams/buses and then you're at the entrance!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the location and amenities.  I am sorry you had a few issues during your stay.  We did upgrade you do to an issue that occurred in another room. Since you were in the hotel business, as you know sometimes guests aren't real respectful of the rooms.  In trying to determine who we were going to offer an upgrade we noticed, your request, that you were celebrating a birthday and that you were a Best Western Rewards member.  We decided you were the perfect one to provide the upgrade. We do appreciate all of your comments and compliments and look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel needs some maintenance and better staff. Upon arrival we found our room had many mosquitoes inside, wire screen on the window was not properly fitted, fridge did not cool / work properly and the bathroom door did not shut as it was not in the hinges properly, Despite applying a great deal of mosquito repellent and killing may mosquitoes during the night my wife was bitten on the face several times and had a massive allergic reaction which required a doctor and medication as her eye swelled close.  When I approached the front desk around 7am after no sleep since 1am and explained what had happened and asked for bug spray, the lady did not care, she did not ask if we were ok or offer any assistance she simply turned to the man next to her and asked if they had bug
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am truly sorry for your experience with us. We did inspect the room the next morning after you switched rooms.  We do wish you had notified us of any issues immediately so we could have taken care of any potential problem before it occurred. If there were mosquitos in the room, we would not expect any guest to stay in the room and have to sleep with inspect repellent applied.  We could have found you a new room immediately.  Please feel free to contact us if there is anything we could do to help.  Thank you and take care

Summary: Being the Disney lovers that our family is, we generally try to stay on Property whether it is WDW or DL. This year up in the rotation of our yearly Disney trip was DL. We have stayed at the Disneyland Hotel out last two visits and the prices just seem to keep going up, so we decided to look at the Paradise Pier Hotel also on Disney Property, again, these hotels are just getting very expensive and we wanted to try to save some money.That's when TA came to the rescue and I found the "BEST WESTERN PLUS Park Place Inn - Mini Suites".   This option was just about HALF the price of the lowest priced Disneyland hotel and Closer than the DL hotel and the Paradise Pier Hotel to the Magic Kingdom!!! Everything about this hotel was fine, comfotable beds, clean rooms, laundry room on
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your visit to Disney and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased we exceeded your expectations and that you enjoyed the accommodations, location, and amenities.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and hope you will be staying with us more often.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I spent two nights in Anaheim to catch the Angels game and for one day at Disneyland. The one plus about the hotel is the location which you can't beat if you plan on visiting Disneyland. You are not even a 5 minute walk to the Disneyland front gates, which is extremely convenient if you visit the park. It was also great that you could easily grab takeout outside the park and go back to your room to freshen up for an hour. The hotel offers a free continental breakfast which was decent. The staff were friendly as well.   The rooms & grounds however are very average, low quality and nothing special. Washroom was a bit ran down (they need to renovate the shower stalls etc). Additionally, I didn't find the beds that comfortable, even the pillows were hard as rocks. Also, the wifi
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I greatly appreciate your comments and compliments. They will definitely help us and we continue to improve our hotel.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Not the best quality but it is extremely close to Disneyland. It is quite pricey for the room quality you get but you are paying for convenience. If you are planning to be at the park all day and only sleep here at night, then this place will get the job done. Just don't expect this to be one of the nicer places to stay at.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We appreciate your comments and compliments and hope to see you again soon.  We are set to begin remodeling our rooms in the next few months.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Great location for visiting Disneyland by foot. Price is very reasonable for such a great location and overall quality of room and hotel. The pool is very well maintained and a great place to take a break.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the location, accommodations, and relaxing by the pool.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We only stayed one night at this hotel because I was able to get three nights at my timeshare nearby for our disneyland vacation. Finding the hotel wsa a bit difficult but twice around the block we finally found it. The hotel is directly across the street from Disneyland!  It is a 5 minute walk into the park.  The hotel rooms seemed smaller than a usual hotel room, however all the ammenities needed are there.  We had a small refrigerator in our room.  Air conditioner worked great, beds are comfortable. The pool is outdoors and small.  The breakfast buffet was excellent!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the location, accommodations, amenities, and breakfast.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We appreciate the work/reno being done to the breakfast area and applaud the effort of the staff to provide a bagged breakfast. the renos done to date look great I hope the rooms will be updated next.  Overall we were happy with the hotel and we would definitely stay again and recommend this hotel to others.   Thank you
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  We appreciate your understanding regarding the breakfast as well as your comments and compliments.  The rooms are the next on the list slated for after the first of the year.  Thank you for your recommendations.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: our original go to but found better
Summary: we have been to disneyland many times.  For a long time this and the to a lesser extent the desert inn were our go to.  We started to shop around and check out other hotels while we were at disneyland just to see what the other offerings were and started to realize that this place is not really the best option even though it is very close.  Almost every hotel along harbor is a very reasonable walking distance so proximity is not really a good decision maker.  the rooms are average,  pool is average, free breakfast buffet next door is slightly above average, but price is above average.  for those reasons we usually shop around and find the best value from our new go to's.  check out my other reviews for ideas.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review.  I see that it has been just about a year since you stayed with us.  We are in the process of remodeling the hotel.  It is being done in various stages.  Our lobby was completed at the beginning of the year.  We are in the middle of redoing our breakfast area.  After the first of the year we will be redoing our rooms.  Come and check us out when we are done.  We may be your "go to" hotel again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Directly across from Main Disney Gate.  Great service.  Rooms were remodeled. Quiet even though so close to Disneyland and foot traffic.  The pool was very small.     Parking is limited for late arrivals.  When visiting Disneyland, we would stay here every time.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you stay with us and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care

Summary: This Best Western was just a normal hotel, with nothing really special in terms of amenities.  But the location to Disneyland could not be beat!  Literally right across the street!  The view from our room was the Tower of Terror, which was just absolutely amazing! The room was very clean, and just perfect for relaxing after a long day at the park.  The parking situation was very convenient, and they allowed us to park there before we were able to check in, so we were able to go to the park.  That was a great additional benefit!  The customer service was fabulous!  They had the room ready for us before the check-in time, so when my boyfriend wasn't feeling good early in the day, he was able to go back and rest a little, while I stayed in the park.  The breakfast was ok, at the
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guests and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope you are able to come back and visit us again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We were very grateful to be able to check in to our room early in the morning after a long flight from Australia. The room although not luxurious catered to our needs very well. Having breakfast included in the price was also a bonus. We always managed to get a seat in the breakfast room. Free wifi was also good and worked well. The location was the reason for booking this hotel, which is just a few minutes walk to the main entrance of Disneyland. The only complaint I would have would be the noisy air conditioners. I was kept awake by the noise! We didn't find it necessary to leave it on overnight, but clearly other people did.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and are very happy to have been able to check you in early.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and hope we will be able to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Nice, Clean and Across the Street from Disneyland!  Great choice!
Summary: This hotel was a great place to stay.  We had a clean room and a friendly staff.  The parking is secured and our belongings were safe.  I really liked our stay here.  There was a hot breakfast everyday that consisted of choices of bagels, toast, eggs, waffles, sausage, ham, pancakes, orange juice, apple juice, coffee, tea, milk, fresh fruit and yogurt.  I really liked the stay here.  The pool is great and clean.  The hot tub is tested hourly for chemical balance.  It is a great place to stay.  I dound the beds to be comfortable.  It has a fridge in the room and a microwave.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to share why you 'really liked your stay'.  I can tell you had a great time and I could read the excitement in your review.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and hope you will come and stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: we have stayed here before and keep coming back for multiple reasons a) right across st. from Disney enterence b) pretty descent breakfast and hot too c) next door to ihop 24 hours open and dennys too
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us again and sharing what brings you back to our hotel. We enjoy having you as our guest and appreciate your comments and compliments. We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: ALWAYS THE BEST CHOICE NEAR DISNEYLAND
Summary: This hotel is always clean and the staff are extremely courteous and helpful. Beds are comfortable and the room is always clean and in good repair. Good TV reception and WI FI available..no charge.  They will be implementing a Grab and Go breakfast while remodeling the breakfast room.  This hotel is always striving to improve and give great customer service.
Manager Response: It was wonderful seeing you again.  We greatly appreciate you taking the time to share your thoughts and feelings about our hotel and staff as well as recommending us to others.  We enjoy your visits and look forward to seeing you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The location was wonderful, right across the street from Disneyland.  Rooms are very basic.  The major disappointments are the beds.  They are hard and very uncomfortable. My daughters slept on the pull out couch and they could feel the springs of the mattress.  You would think with walking at Disneyland all day that you could hit the pillow and sleep soundly till morning.  This was not the case.  We woke up each morning tired.  I would not recommend this place if it is important to have a comfortable bed.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am sorry you did not sleep restfully but hope you will consider staying with us again.  We do appreciate your comments and compliments which will help us evaluate and address issues as we continue with the various remodel projects over the next year or so.    Thank you and take care.

Summary: Title says it all.  This hotel is directly across the street from the entrance to Disneyland; you can't get a shorter walk from a non-Disney hotel.  The rooms were clean, and the staff was very friendly.  It was also very quiet, despite our room being right next to the pool and ice/vending machines.  My biggest complaint was that the room seemed to block out all cell phone signal leaving me on roaming, though I think that is probably more a factor of Sprint having terrible service in the area than anything else, and the WiFi wasn't good enough to pick up the slack.  Breakfast was mostly average, but I will rate it a little better than continental because of the hot pancakes, eggs, and meat (sausage or ham) the staff prepares. If you don't want to pay the high prices of a Disney
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We do hope that you will come and stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Clean, basic motel across the street from the parks
Summary: We arrived to the Park Place August 04 at about 2pm. I suspected our room would not be ready and was prepared to stow our luggage and get to the parks. The lobby is very nice, bright and spacious and the front desk clerk was very courteous. When we checked in later that evening we found our request to have a room towards the back on the top floor was accommodated. We requested said room as I had read on TA that noise could be a problem at the front. Maybe it would have, but I suspect we would have been too tired to notice. The room itself was spacious and clean if a bit dated in décor. We had two queens and a queen pull out, a nice flat screen with a wide variety of channels, mini fridge and microwave. We had lots of space for our suitcases and the we liked how the sink and
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review. We enjoyed having you as our guests and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and recommendation.  Our breakfast area is now being remodeled and our rooms will receive attention after the first of the year.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your time with us and hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Best Western Plus Park Place Inn
Summary: Very good location. Breakfast is not bad and staff was very nice. Staff tries to accommodate as much as possible. We had asked for a non-smoking room but the room we were given smelled lightly of cigarette. It could have been the room next to us though. The staff did ask us if we wanted to change room but given that we had already unpacked everything and were ready to head out, we did not want to change room. The pool seems to be nice but we did not have time to enjoy it.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope you will come and stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We had driven across country to pick up a relative in Los Angeles. At the last minute, we decided to go to Disneyland, thus needing a hotel. Best Western had a room available for us 3 adults. The room was pristine....we had a restful night, and the breakfast was included in the price.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and that we were able to accommodate you for a last minute visit.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Not first knowing about the age, location and kind of hotel- we were pleasantly surprised at the quality, cleanliness and restful spot for my family. Would stay there again!!! And we couldn't ask for a better location having the Disneyland Resort entrance directly across the street from where we stayed. I'd recommend this to family and friends in a heartbeat!!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased we exceeded your expectations and look forward to you staying with us again.  We greatly appreciate your comments, compliments, and recommendation.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: For Disney fans this is a good place to rest as it is directly across the street from both parks and a five minute walk. The reason I gave it a four is because the first room I received was a smoking room. At time of registration I asked for a non-smoking room. We called and complained and were given a new room and parking was refunded. The beds were uncomfortable but were bearable. (Could feel the springs)  The staff was nice.... Overall it was okay and price about average for the area..... Would probably stay again when visiting.  Have safe and magical travels 😎
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and appreciate your comments and compliments.  All of our rooms are non smoking rooms.  Unfortunately some guests still choose to smoke in their rooms causing discomfort to our other guests.  We do try to curtail this with a $250 rate increase penalty. However, some still disregard the nonsmoking policy.  I am sorry for any inconvenience you experienced due to the lack of courtesy shown by others. We do hope you will come and stay with us again.  Thank you and take care

Summary: I would stay here again. Good: Suite had three queen beds (one was sofa bed), rooms very clean, staff very helpful, internet quick and easy to connect to, and most of all very close to front gate of Disneyland. Bad: breakfast was just okay.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We do hope you will come and stay with us again soon. We started remodeling our breakfast areas shortly after you stay.  It is set to reopen in November.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Very clean hotel, friendly staff, close proximity to Disneyland, and always a good experience.  This hotel offers a free breakfast buffet (next door) which is enough to get you through to lunch time, not the best taste, but free is good enough for me.  Parking is VERY limited, so plan your trip early and have a great time!!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us again and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoy having you as our guest and hope you will enjoy our new breakfast when it reopens in November.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: A great place to stay for Disneyland
Summary: This is our second summer staying at this hotel.  The location is prime; you walk across the street and you are entering Disneyland property.  There is an included breakfast next door, upstairs at Captain Kidd's Buffet.  The rooms aren't fancy but are definitely sufficient after a long day at Disneyland!  There is a mini-fridge in the room, great for keeping drinks handy.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us again and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope you will come and visit us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We were here for two days in Disneyland/disneyland adventure then decided to stop an extra night so we could have a day in Hollywood. EXCELLENT LOCATION FOR DISNEY PARKS. Just across the road, literally 5 mins into the park itself. The room we had was for 5 people with consisted of two queen beds and a sofa bed which was a double. The sofa bed was really only suitable for a single person as it didn't feel sturdy enough. The room was big with a decent shower and sink area. A large TV, not that we used it but it worked, and a big wardrobe. The only issue was that the cleaners came when we were either getting ready for breakfast (which was included at the restaurant next door to the hotel) or getting ready to go out which meant we had to tell them to come back later. The breakfast
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review. We enjoyed having as our guests and are very pleased you enjoyed your time with us.  We greatly appreciate your comments, compliments and recommendation and hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Would stay here when visiting the Happiest Place on earth!
Summary: Directly across the street from the main entrance to Disneyland & California Adventure theme parks. Room was spacious, and had everything we needed including fridge and microwave. Bedding was comfortable, bathroom was very clean, and hotel staff was warm and helpful. My family and I would not stay anywhere else on our next trip to Disneyland. The Disney owned hotels at 2 to 3 times the price can't compete. Would like to see the complimentary breakfast improve a bit, but still decent. Great Value
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the accommodations, service, and amenities.  We will be updating our breakfast and breakfast area with a remodel beginning in about a week.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and hope we see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: WCWAM Nights #2 and 3  A pleasant surprise!
Summary: This hotel is right across the street from Disneyland so I wasn't expecting much--I figured they could pretty much coast on service and cleanliness etc and still stay booked.   The staff were really sweet and helpful and the room was nice, a little bigger than the average 2 queen + sofabed,  and really clean.  The complimentary breakfast buffet was at the restaurant next door and was one of the best comp breakfasts we have ever had.  When we finished our 12 day road trip and we asked the kids what some of their favorite things from the trip were the first thing my teenage son said was "The breakfast at Best Western"
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased that we exceeded your expectations.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and hope we will see you again. If you do stay with us again, please tell your son we are beginning a remodel of our breakfast room in a week so the breakfast will be even better.  Thank you again.  We enjoyed having you as our guests.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Excellent location, easy to pop back to hotel for a break from the fun at Disneyland. Restaurants within easy walking distance if you fancied a change e.g. Denny's. Hotel room was a good size for the four of us. Room had a fridge and a microwave. We would have preferred a safe in the room instead of using the safety deposit box at Reception-not only for the easier access but also so as not to have a key that could easily be lost. Breakfast was fine, it filled a gap and it meant we didn't bother with buying lunch. It could have been better e.g. Scrambled eggs/omelettes instead of eggs in a shape of a pancake, more choice of cereals and giving the guests the choice of eating sausages, pancakes etc instead of the hotel choosing when to cook them. The staff weren't as friendly as
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and do apologize for those things that did not quite reach your expectations.  We do appreciate your comments and compliments and hope you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The best thing about this hotel is its location.  It is literally at the end of the crosswalk to the entrance of Disneyland!  It was clean, the bed was comfortable (I've had several back surgeries so this is always a concern for me.  It wasn't as good as memory foam for sure, but it wasn't so hard that I couldn't sleep).  The price seemed a little high, but honestly, everything close to Disney is.  It was worth the convenience of location for sure.  Check in and out was smooth and the only real issue were some WiFi problems, but we were so tired at night that we just ignored the internet.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the location, accommodations.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The hotel is directly across the street from the entrance to Disneyland. The rate included free breakfast and wi-fi. The mini-suites are spacious and have a refrigerator and micro-wave. You can't beat the value and location for a visit to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Can't get any closer to Disneyland!
Summary: My family picked this hotel because it seems to be the closest one to Disneyland, and it didn't disappoint! To get to the Disneyland entrance, you just have go outside the property and use the crosswalk right outside. There's a bus stop right in front too. It really can't get any closer than this.  The lobby looks nice, polite staff behind the desk. We were able to get a room close to the street. Pretty quiet at night, not sure about the daytime since we were at the park all day. The room itself is nice and clean, It's big enough to accomodate a stroller inside. Wifi signal is not bad.   Breakfast is served everyday with slightly different menu each day. They have lots of tables there. You can also bring your breakfast back to your room if you want to.  I'd come back to this
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments. We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Best and closest to Disneyland without the Disneyland Hotel Price!
Summary: Literally across the street from Disneyland's main entrance! We have stayed at Disneyland Hotels in the past and they are certainly not worth the almost 3 times cost they charge as compared to the Best Western Plus hotel! Don't get me wrong the Disney Hotels are great but just not worth the money when you are spending most of your time in the parks!  I have stayed in this hotel a few times and have always been happy with the accommodations. They recently renovated and it looks great! the Suites are ideal for families.They also serve a complimentary breakfast which is not limited to just pastries.   I would highly recommend this hotel and will return when we do decide to go back to the happiest place on earth!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us again and taking the time to share why you keep coming back.  We enjoy having you stay with us and greatly appreciate your comments, compliments and recommendation. We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Great Location, Very Good Breakfast and Nice King Room
Summary: Wife and I stayed two nights at Best Western Park Place in Anaheim.  We booked a King room and we were given a King room with a sofa separate somewhat from bed.  It was a relatively large room.  Actually got four large bath towels instead of two or three.  One negative is that the wash basin is separate from the shower and in the same area as the King bed.  The hot water is plentiful and quite hot so be careful if you take a shower.  The unit was also on the first floor and we were told that all of the large King rooms are on the first floor.  Do not plan to go to bed until after 10 p.m.  The noise from Disney's fireworks display is quite loud if you are in the room after 9 p.m.  The walk from the hotel to Disney ticketing and entrance is about five minutes. Really convenient.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the accommodations, location, and breakfast.  We hope you will come and stay with us again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Pros of this property:   -The best location on Harbor Blvd.; directly on the main crosswalk to Disneyland.  You can walk to park faster than other properties can shuttle you and you are closer than Disney's own Paradise Pier hotel.  Makes it easy to take a mid-day break from the parks. -Rooms are large, come with fridge, microwave and are serviced promptly each day. -Wi-fi worked great as did the A/C. -Breakfast buffet is included in room rate. Cons: -Breakfast buffet is mediocre, really just a continental breakfast in a buffet restaurant setting. -The pool is small and basic with few chairs around for sitting in.  The hotel clearly expects families to be in parks, not using the pool much. Parking is not included in the room rate, but adequate space was available near each room
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and are very pleased we exceeded your expectations.  Our breakfast area will begin a remodel in about a week and should be completed by the end of October.  We do hope you will come back and see us again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: lights in the room did not work. TV control did not work may be the batteries were bad (??). the door keys did not work we had to keep asking the reception to give us  new one. At one point we had to ask the reception to open the door for us (they had a special key to open the door)
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am sorry you did not enjoy your stay.  We attempt to find out why the lights in your room were not working but maintenance was denied entry to the room to find out what was wrong. We could have brought batteries for the remote or a new remote if we had been notified.  As far as the room key. The room keys were working properly and no special key was used by the front desk agent that helped you.  She simply made a copy of your key and opened the door for you.  Hotel room keys are sensitive to cell phones, credit cards, and other electronic devices.  If the keys were placed anywhere near these items, the keys will demagnetize.  Again I am sorry you did not enjoy your stay.  I do hope you will give us another chance.  We will be making many improvements over the next few months.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Great Location for Disneyland; Nice Rooms!
Summary: Where to start? Over the years, we have stayed at many of the hotels around Disneyland. We never really found one that we would want to return to, until now.   Our family of four stayed for five nights at the Best Western Park Place Inn. Overall, it was a top-notch experience. First of all, the proximity to Disneyland cannot be beat. It's just a quick walk across the street and you're on your way to the front gates. The hotel doesn't look like much from the outside, but the rooms are very nice. The furnishings and fixtures are of good quality. The layout of the room was perfect for us, with two queen beds and a sofa sleeper. Since we travel with two tall boys (ages 16 and 20), a third bed is an absolute must. Our younger son found the sofa sleeper to be very comfortable, while
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to share your experience.  Your detailed comments and compliments are greatly appreciated.  I am very pleased we stood out from the other hotels you have visited over the years.  We are striving to make the hotel even better.  We will be remodeling our breakfast area beginning the end of August.  We will be updating the rooms after the first of the year.  We look forward to seeing you again and hope you will enjoy our hotel even that much more with the upcoming improvements.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel is walking distance to Disney.  The staff couldn't be nicer and those are the only reasons I keep going back.  It is an old property and it shows.  The rooms are large and have a small couch/love seat in them (I was in a room with one King sized bed) but the beds are not comfortable and the lighting in the room is not good, especially in the vanity area.  The lobby looks great after the renovation it just received, but the rooms still do to justify the price charged.   Like I said, I stay because it's across the street and walking distance to the theme parks.  Otherwise, it's just an old low end motel.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated.  In about a week we will begin remodeling the breakfast area.  After the first of the year we will start on the rooms.  We do look forward to your next visit with us.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: A must Stay! Great service. Perfect location. Great pool. A great budget friendly family hotel. Buffet is right next door. Complimentary breakfast which was excellent for us. Food was good. Eggs, waffles, sausage, cereals, etc.. More than what you would get at other hotels. Disneyland is right ACROSS the street!   This is officially our new hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We greatly appreciate you sharing why we are officially your new hotel.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the service, location, amenities, and accommodations.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The Best western Plus Park Place is directly across the road from Disneyland. The rooms are clean and well maintained although the decor could be modernised. The complimentary breakfast is served next door and was disappointing. Overall we had a good stay as our prime reason was to go to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you had a good stay and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We will begin updating our rooms after the first of the year.  We hope you will be able to come and stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Primary reason for our stay at this location was because of its location directly across the street from Disneyland.  Secondary reason was because of past experiences with Best Western.  Enjoyed our stay at this location.  Would be nice if there was a military discount that matched or exceeded other discounts that are available. I will stay at this location again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We do offer a military discount. However you had already been granted a discount that was equivalent in rate to the military discount. Thank you for your service.  We hope we will come visit us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The location is great. However, the staff is extremely unhelpful. We needed to desperately wash clothes and went to the lobby to get change at 8:45. No sign is posted, but last wash is at 8:30. Really hard to do when you are touring during the day. Asked if they could please please open the door as there was no posted sign and no one said anything when we asked about doing laundry. There is also no fitness center on site, which would have been really nice and seems to be standard at most hotels. If they had only been kind and reasonable in understanding our situation, it would have been great. When you are away from home, you need some necessities and it stinks when people are not understanding especially when you plead with them. I hope the staff encounters the same kind of
Manager Response: I am sorry you are not enjoying your stay with us due to the laundry issue.  We do require the last load to be in by 8:30 pm so the wash is completed by 10 pm. The hours are set due to the location of the laundry room.  The hours and restrictions are posted in the laundry room, stated on the room map that is provided to you at check in, and also listed in the guest directory that is in your room (in the desk drawer).  We do set the hours in consideration of guests who need to do laundry as well as in consideration of guests who may be disturbed by guests doing laundry late into the night.  We do understand guest have necessities which, is why we choose to offer the convenience of on site laundry facilities for our guests.  The laundry facility was available from the time you checked in at 1:13pm until 8:30 pm.  It did open again at 7am.  It is true we do not have a fitness center.  However, our sister property that is just a minute's walk away does allow our guests access to their center. There is also a 24 Hour Fitness within a 10 minute walk that offers guest day passes.  Please feel free to contact me if you have any further concerns.

Summary Heading: Outstanding location, very clean rooms, older facilities but who cares?
Summary: This is the place when you want something basic, clean and close to the Disneyland entrance gate but don't want to pay for Disney hotels.  This hotel is actually closer to Disneyland's entrance gate than Disneyland Hotel or Disney's Paradise Pier, located right at the stoplight on Harbor Blvd. where the shuttle vans enter the Disney property to drop people off.    The rooms were very clean, the bedding, the tubs, etc.    You can walk to a variety of restaurants. The free breakfast buffet is at the restaurant next door, upstairs, standard stuff...eggs, meat of the day, typical fruit and bread items,, gives you what you need.   The only drawback, like many older tourist areas in California, is that the facilities are old and dated, basically an old motel with new insides, awkward
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to share your experience.  I am very pleased you were able to take good advantage of our location, amenities, and accommodations.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and we hope you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care

Summary Heading: Great Location, Nice rooms, Nice Staff
Summary: The room was very nice for two people.  King bed and a couch in the sitting area.  Carpets could have used a good shampooing, but overall we were pleased with the room.  You cannot beat the location, directly across from the Disneyland entrance.  Breakfast included.  Great place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review. I  am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and thank you for your comments and compliments.  We hope you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel is literally across the street from the bus drop off area of Disneyland! Room was a bit musty but cleared up after running the AC for a bit. Breakfast was okay...the eggs were pancaked shape. Front staff were very friendly.
