Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and thank you for your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Stayed here for one night and it is located right across from Disneyland! Can't beat that for the price. You do have to pay $10 per day for parking but it's a typical motel similar to motel where you can park in front of your room and walk right in. Didn't get a chance to use the pool but it's pretty small. Inside the room was pretty clean. They offer free breakfast but we didn't get a chance to use it. May come back because of the location.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am pleased you enjoyed the location and accommodations and thank you for your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: closest hotel to entrance of Disneyland
Summary: Great hotel, friendly staff, good breakfast. Located just a few steps from the entrance of Disneyland. The pool is tiny but we were there to enjoy the park not the pool. Internet access from the room was great!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guests and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope you will come back and stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: 7-2015 This hotel really was right across the street from the entrance between Disneyland and California Adventure.  It was not too far to walk back to for afternoon naps.  They have an arrangement with the restaurant next door for all you can eat breakfast buffet.  The food was good and the restaurant was clean.  The only "bad" thing about the hotel was the small size of the swimming pool. I did get a little crowded at times.  We never stayed at the pool that long anyways. Overall a 9 rating for the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to share your experience.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The closeness of this hotel to Disneyland and DCA is the BEST.  It had inexpensive parking and included breakfast and wi-fi.  The rooms were clean, and beds comfortable.  We used the fridge and microwave, but coffee pot is a joke.  Pool could be larger and be updated...
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I booked a room at the Best Western Park Place Inn through Costco and had a great experience. We originally going to stay at the Disneyland Hotel in April, when it would have been much cheaper, but our dates changed to June, so I changed the hotel, due to the difference in price.  I still wanted to be close because we have a 5 year old and a baby so we would need to come back for naptime. I was a little hesitant because the pool is small, but we ended up only using the pool one day, so I was glad that didn't factor in.   The customer service here was EXCELLENT. Our airline lost our luggage that had our hotel voucher in it, but the front desk assured us we wouldn't be stranded and let us bring back the voucher when the bag was delivered. My phone charger was also in the lost bag,
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We greatly enjoyed having you as our guest and were very happy to help you in any way we could.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Loved staying at this hotel. It is literally right across from Disneyland. I was very impressed with the cleanliness of this hotel. Kudos to housekeeping, my room was spotless. The breakfast was ok, could improve on the eggs and different choices. The front desk girls could be a bit more friendly, just saying. They charge $10 each day for parking and on the day you check out (11:00am), they give you until 3:00pm. It made it difficult because we still had that day at Disneyland and our flight was not schedule to depart until 8:00pm. We had to get it and park it elsewhere. Overall I would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We greatly appreciate your comments, compliments, and suggestions.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This is literally right across the street from the Disneyland Resort. After spending all day walking around with my 6 & 7 year old, the last thing we would have felt like doing is taking a shuttle to get to our hotel or having to walk 1/2 mile or more to it.  It was so nice to walk less than 5 minutes to our hotel midday for a break and to freshen up.  The staff was very accommodating and very pleasant.  We will be staying here again for your next Disney trip in November.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the accommodations, location, and staff.  We greatly appreciate your comments, compliments, and ratings.  We look forward to seeing you again in November.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: overall experience is really good . hospitality ,service,employee nice and area is clean .  very convenient for family going to Disney vacation like us 5 minute walk you can go back to hotel easy . about free breakfast that is good I don't need to worry were going to eat just makesure we are there before 10 am good brakfast
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you had a really good experience and thank you for your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: As many reviewers have said on this page, you cannot beat the location of this motel.  It is right across the street from the pedestrian entrance to Disneyland.  You cannot stay any closer unless you were at one of the Disney hotels on property (and this place is much closer than Paradise Pier).  The lobby has been renovated.  The staff was friendly and efficient.  The parking costs $10 a night and on the day you check out, you must move your car by 3PM  (IF NOT, THEY CHARGE $25/hr for parking, so move that car down to the Toy Story lot and ride the bus back to Disneyland).  I did not use the pool nor was in the room too much (other than to come back and get umbrellas or drop off souvenirs). The area has plenty of places to eat, whether driving or on foot, especially the Anaheim
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you stay with us and greatly appreciate all of your comments and compliments.  I am very pleased you will be staying with us again and hope we will be seeing you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel is the closest to Disneyland. Includes continental breakfast. Great value for your money. If your on a budget and want to be super close to the parks stay here. We will be staying here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and take the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: TOTALLY AMAZING HOTEL TO STAY AT!
Summary: The employees were extremely friendly and helpful. The breakfast was one of the best continentals I have had in a long time. Their was plenty of room to sit and the food was appealing. As far as the room goes the beds were extremely comfortable and there was hardly any noise outside.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and thank you for sharing what made us a "totally amazing hotel".  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: spend some money and up grade this place the beds are terrible room service is poor.Take a look at the best western Hotel in pasco wa that's is the role model for how best western hotel should be like.Then charge 25k a night in points
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am sorry you did not enjoy the room service provided.  Your concern is something that is addressed frequently so I will take the time to address the issue here. The majority of the time someone stays at a hotel, once they leave for the day they do not come back until the late evening.  Due to this guests, rarely see housekeepers cleaning rooms and do not realize that housekeepers work from 8am to 4pm. The rooms just happen to be beautifully cleaned when they come back.  Now we have a fantastic location directly across from the main access to the Disney Parks.  With that comes the convenience for our guests, the ability to come back to the hotel for a rest.  However, guests do not realize that housekeeping is still working to clean rooms.  Our hotel consist of 199 rooms that need various degrees of cleaning. They focus on the checked out rooms first to ensure those are ready by 3 pm for all arriving guests.  They try to get as many rooms ready as early as possible, for the multiple number of guests that arrive early to begin their visit to Disneyland. This does not mean they ignore the guests that are already checked in and will be staying another night.  They do have those rooms cleaned by 4pm. However, if our guests notify us that they are planning on coming back midday for a break, our housekeepers work diligently to ensure their room is ready for them so they can come back and rest.  Again I am sorry your room was not ready for you when you came back for a break.  But I am hoping this will help you and all others reading it, in having a much more relaxing stay at our hotel.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Stayed 3 nights whilst visiting Disneyland. Staff were efficient and helpful. Lady that checked us in should try purchasing a sense of humour but otherwise can't fault the hotel. Room overlooking Disney entrance, small pool with hot tub. Free breakfast next door at Captain Kidds was OK, but don't bother with dinner, it was rubbish.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am pleased you enjoyed your time with us and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  The restaurant is separate from the hotel.  We just lease the space for the complimentary breakfast.  It was a pleasure having you stay with us and we hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Great place to stay if visiting Disneyland. The washing machines (only have 2 and both were out) were out, so we had to go to an offsite facility. That was a bit troubling. But the room is comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I do apologize for the washers being out of order.  We did have the company that owns the washers fix them within a day.  I am pleased you enjoyed your time with us and hope you will come and stay with us again. We appreciate your comments and compliments.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: 1st Class Hotel, literally steps from the entrance to Disneyland.  Every single staff member I encountered was smiling, efficient and friendly.  Lovely gift shop, excellent Captain Kidd's Buffet (for free!!!)  Pool was a welcome relief from the heat and humidity.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  We greatly appreciate your kind comments and compliments and hope you will be able to come and stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This was our third stay here (family of four).  It is super close to the main entrances of Disneyland and California Adventure Park (about 3 to 5 minutes walk).  Whilst the interior of the rooms are older, the rooms themselves are spacious, clean and well appointed with fridge, microwave, reverse cycle heater/cooler, free wifi and coffee maker.  There is a onsite laundry for guests, and plenty of parking (which you have to pay for).    There is no onsite restaurant/cafe, however there are plenty of food outlets (IHOP, Denny's, McDonald's, Pizza Press and others) all nearby (within a 2 to 3 minute walk).  There are further food options (Tony Romas, Cheesecake Factory and downtown Disney) if you are happy to travel a bit further (10 to 15 minute walk).    Staff are all very
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us again and taking the time to write a review. We enjoy having you stay with us and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope you will be able to come back for another visit soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Second visit - Excellent location, Great value
Summary: We recently made our third trip to DL and stayed at this hotel for the second time. Everything about this hotel is average, except it's location ... which is perfect. As other reviews indicate, it is just across the road from the DL entrance.   When at DL we're at the gate to get in by 8.30 am and there until late, so don't need to stay anywhere flash. With this hotel you have the convenience of being able to go back to the hotel for a quick rest, without the stupid rates of the DL branded hotels. We will definitely stay there again next time.  We had 2 adults and two kids in a mini-suite which was fine. Bathrooms are as about as basic as you can get but the reality is you choose this hotel for it's location and valuation. Anything else would be a bonus.  The pool is basic but
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We appreciate you staying with us again as well as sharing your comments and compliments.  We hope you will come and see us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This is the second year in a row that we've stayed at this hotel and it's been the same amazing experience. The service, the closeness to the Disneyland Resort, the amenities, the convenience, the price...you name it. The staff goes out of their way to make your stay even more enjoyable. They're very courteous and professional. They make you feel no just as a customer, but as a VIP. I look forward into staying here year after year.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us again and taking the time to write a review.  We appreciate you sharing what made this an excellent experience.  I am very pleased we were able to deliver the same level of experience you experienced your first visit with us  Thank you so much for your comments and compliments and we look forward to many more visits.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: excellent location  reasonably priced  free breakfast  but food is horrible   excellent staff  however housekeeping primarily speaks Spanish so they don't understand what your asking for most of the time.  feel safe at location and is directly across from Disney entrance
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and greatly appreciate your comments, compliments, and recommendation.  We hope you will come and stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The only good thing is location, for the money you pay its best to upgrade to a better chain and parking is not free. From 9:00 AM to 12:00 PM 4 times they knocked on my door for room service, basically trying to get me out. Thanks god I only was there one night.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am sorry you did not enjoy your stay.  Housekeeping was not trying to get you out of the room. They were merely checking to see if the room was vacant so they could clean the room for the next guest.  If you do not wish to be disturbed until you are ready to leave, utilize the Do Not Disturb sign that is provided. This way housekeeping knows you are still in the room and they will bypass your room until check out time.  This is very helpful for you and housekeeping in any hotel you stay in.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Could not ask for a location any closer to the Maingate of Disneyland.  We arrived early and they allowed us to pre-check in and park our car.  Double queen room with sofabed provided a large room. Appreciate the in room coffee maker, microwave, free WiFi, and refrigerator.  Rooms are clean and not run down. Breakfast buffet is not bad at the restaurant next door.  All staff was pleasant and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  Thank you for sharing what made us a perfect location and greatly value.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I stayed in Best Western Plus Park Place Inn two years ago whilst staying in Disneyland and had such a great experience that my family insisted that we stay there again this year.  The staff in the hotel make you so welcome from the moment you arrive.  The rooms are comfortable and clean and have all the amenities you need.  A free breakfast is provided in the morning and has a wide variety available.  It's closeness to Disneyland makes it an excellent choice for families particularly at the end of a long day in the park.  I will definitely be returning.  Thanks to all the staff for making our trip so special.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us again and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and greatly appreciate your comments an compliments. We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Second Stay - Pro's outweigh the Con's
Summary: This is the second time in 4 years we've stayed at the BW Park Place Inn. The Pro's outweigh the con's, and overall we have a very nice stay. Pros: -Excellent Location, literally right across the street from the Disneyland entrance. By far the best location for a hotel except for the Disneyland Grand Californian.  -Hotel rooms are very spacious - there is a seating area with a couch which is nice and large sink/counter area outside of the shower room. -Mini Fridge and Microwave included in room. The fridge is a full size mini fridge which was nice, we had lots of room to store a flat of water, yogurts, etc. -Staff Service was excellent -Rooms were very quiet, we couldn't hear anyone around us   Cons: -The beds are very firm. If you have back or neck problems, these beds might be
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review. We greatly appreciate all of your comments and compliments. They will greatly help us improve our service and offerings.  We hope you will come and stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Read the reviews, and the hotel definitely delivers on its proximity to Disneyland. Literally the closest outside the park.   Just noted the room was very poorly lit which was kind of odd. Also the hot breakfast was comprised of a selection of preservative and fat laden options, nothing really that good for you but I managed to fill up on Cheerios and an apple each day.   Amazing location, easily caught the ART bus to the Outlets at Orange and popped back to our hotel for afternoon naps while spending the day at Disneyland. Very hand.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you stay with us and appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope you will be able to stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I have stayed here before.  The staff is friendly and will allow you to check your bags at the main desk if your room is not ready.  We arrived around 9:00 am and checked our bags then went to the Parks.  I prefer the front building (there are three buildings)!  The breakfast is also at the front of the hotel at the building next door.  There is a gift shop, however be aware of open times, it does close during the day.  It would be nice if the front desk had access to the gift shop all hours.  The air conditioning is a little noisy.  Computers are available in the lobby if you need to print boarding passes.  Free wi-fi is available for guests, you will need to enter the password EVERY time you want to access the internet.  I recommend this hotel, I enjoyed my stay and will call
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us again and taking the time to write a review.  We appreciate you sharing what brought you back to our hotel and thank you for your comments and compliments.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This was a perfect location for going to Disneyland, right across the street, fuel up for breakfast and then head over. Walk back across the street and pass out for the night. A bigger store on site would be nice but overall, I'd totally go there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and would stay with us again.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Stayed here to visit Disneyland. It is directly across the street and a five minute walk to the main gates of Disneyland and California Adventure. Staff is friendly, rooms are clean and comfortable. Lots of dining options nearby with Downtown Disney so close and other restaurants within walking distance.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We appreciate you sharing what made us perfect for Disneyland and appreciate your comments and compliments..  We hope you will come and stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Fantastic Stay at the Best Western Park Place Inn and Mini Suites Anaheim
Summary: Our family of 5 stayed at this hotel for 9 nights in July 2015 in one room. We cannot fault the hotel and the staff we encountered there. From check in to check out 9 days later we had a very smooth experience. The front desk staff were particularly helpful and knowledgeable. They were always willing to help and provide information whenever we asked for it. The hotel itself was very accommodating - our room was very spacious, the beds were extremely comfortable and the bathroom was very clean and modern. There was plenty of space for our luggage and five people in our room. The free Wifi was great and very fast. Needless to say the location of the hotel right opposite the entrance to Disneyland is fantastic. The complimentary breakfast was sensational. We will definitely
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review. Thank you for sharing how we provided a fantastic stay.  We greatly appreciate your comments, compliments, and recommendation.  We hope you will have the opportunity to come and stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I was in Anaheim for business (yes - really!) and needed to be close to Disneyland for business purposes (again - yes - really!).  The location was terrific! Right across from the main gates to Disneyland; a variety of restaurants within the block. Check-in was great - check out was fine.  I had a king suite - and the room was a lovely size.  The decor however was "tired", the air conditioner worked but was noisy - I suspect it needed to be cleaned since both my niece and I had congestion in the morning.  The bathroom was clean and modern.  Continental breakfast was provided - and was just "ok".   The rate was ok - since my stay was during peak season.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We appreciate you sharing your experience.  We will be remodeling our breakfast area in September and will be updating the menu.  In the beginning of the new year we will begin remodeling our rooms.  I hope you will come and stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Great Location, Friendly Staff & Clean Rooms
Summary: We visit Disneyland about twice a year  to run at the Park.  We normally stay at another Hotel but wanted a try somplace new.  It was the best decision we ever made. The staff were helpful and courteous.  Our room was very clean.  It is in walking distance to the Garden Walk and right across the street from Disneyland. They have great amenities pool, laundry facility and free breakfast. We have already made reservations for our next trip down to California.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very happy you decided to give us a try and enjoyed your stay with us.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and look forward to your next visit with us.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: As many reviews state the location is great. Disneyland is just a walk across the street and there are plenty of places to eat.  However the carpets are worn and the room smells weird. We asked that our bedding be replaced and we pulled sheets off the bed to help out the cleaning staff before we left but the cleaning lady took it all off the floor and put the sheets back on the bed in hopes that we wouldn't notice. Our bathroom was also dirty and after we came back we had to call the front desk twice before they sent another woman up who seemed do half the job and finally my mother did the rest herself including making the beds and cleaning the bathroom.  Bottom line: Location is great but cleanliness needs to be improved.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very sorry for the experience you received with the servicing of your room.  The second girl who came to clean your room did take a little time to get there because she was the only housekeeper on property when you called.  She was already at the door when the second call came in.  She did do a full service of the room and even reported back to me what had not been done correctly, by the previous housekeeper so it could be addressed with the Head Housekeeper.  I do hope you will give us another chance so you can experience the true service and experience of the Best Western Park Place Inn.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Stayed here 2 nights after Leaving Grand Californian where we stayed 3 nights so mind you from Grand Californian to this one lol but over all it is the best location to stay at that is the closest to parks in regards to Good Neighbor Hotels.  Also free Buffet Breakfast was good. Pool was really small but who really has time for swimming
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I remember checking in you and your sister.  We enjoyed having you stay at our hotel and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We have been staying at Best Western Park Place Inn for 13 years and we just love everything about it.  I am a bit of a clean freak and this hotel is spotless in the rooms and around the grounds.  All the staff members are Kind, friendly, and well kept.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us over the past 13 years and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoy having you as our guest and greatly appreciate you sharing what brings you back every year.  Thank you for your comments and compliments. We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I have stayed here many times before.  I use a scooter for Disneyland and the location is perfect directly across from the Park. Having the free breakfast is also a plus as it makes for a quick and easy start to the day.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us again and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoy having you stay with us and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We look forward to your next stay.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: From the the time I got there till I left the customer service was good and very helpful Rooms cleaned daily and they were clean. They have laundry on site Pool and spa  Great location to Disneyland Have accessibility room
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and thank you for sharing what you like about our hotel.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Review of Best Western Plus Park Place Inn-Mini Suites, Anaheim, Ca.
Summary: Great location & staff. Clean rooms &  courteous staff. Being right across Disneyland is so great at the end of such long, tiring days at the parks. Surrounded by many good restaurants is a plus also. We ate dinner/breakfast once at 1:30 am . Felt safe with so much activity all around...
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review. We enjoyed having you as our guests and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: You can't get much closer to the main gate of Disneyland!  5 minute walk from hotel to the gates at Disneyland and California Adventure.  Hot breakfast daily with waffles, eggs, sausage/ham, yogurt, muffins, toast, OJ coffee.  Convenient to get on your way early.  Rooms could use a bit of a makeover as sofa fabrics, carpeting and restroom grouting is a little "tired".  But you are really only thereto sleep, right? Beds are comfy.  I do have to comment that even at 3pm in the afternoon, our rooms had still not had a visit from housekeeping.  We like to come back in the afternoons for a swim and a nap so being asked to leave your room everyday in mid-afternoon was a little inconvenient. We just went and sat near the pool as they do have tables and chairs.  Close to Tony Roma's,
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  Our housekeepers work from 8 am to 4 pm cleaning 199 rooms. They do put emphasis on the days departures to prepare those for new guests and then work on the rooms for the guests staying over.  However, if you need your room ready for an afternoon break, just let us know what time you will be back and we will do our best to have the room ready for you.  Thank you again for staying with us.  We hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I've stayed at many of the hotel's across the street from Disneyland but this hotel is right at the crosswalk to the Disney Parks. Clean and comfortable with friendly staff willing to help in any way.   We stayed in one of the mini suites which is one big room. Two queen beds or one king bed plus a a sofa sleeper. The free breakfast is very good with some hot and cold items. I highly recommend this hotel and will stay again the next time we go to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We understand there are many choices in the area and greatly appreciate you sharing why you will be staying with us again, the next time you come back.  Thank you for your comments, compliments, and recommendation.  We hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This is a great location and is directly across the street from the entrance to DLR parks. The only drawback is the parking situation. If you are checking out the same day you'll be in the park, your car has to be out of the lot by 3 p.m. It takes away the convenience of the location when you have to park somewhere else and take a shuttle back to the park entrance.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and hope you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel offered multiple amenities including laundry facilities which was a big plus for me. The staff were helpful and took pride in a job well done. The location is perfect if you want to be at Disneyland without paying the Disneyland price !!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope you will come and stay with us again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: If you're looking for an easy stay directly across from Disneyland California, you probably can't beat this location! The hotel is quite comfy, and I found the bed mattress/linens very nice. A great television and cable selection for those times you're not at Disneyland. Really nice maid services! Downside would be the smaller room size, and if you're on the 1st floor level you may be at the mercy of rude people with their bad parking habits (locking/unlocking vehicles with security noises all night).
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write about your experience.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the location, accommodations, amenities, and service.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: It's all about location and you couldn't get better than this hotel. Literally a 3 minute walk to either park at Disney. The room was very clean and the beds were comfortable, which is all that really matters when your going to be at the parks all day. The fireworks from Disney can be a little loud but that's to be expected being so close. Overall is was a great place to stay and we would stay there again if we returned.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I really enjoyed how close this hotel was to Disney land  and it location to many places to eat. The rooms are clean and decent if you only want to sleep.The staff here are fantastic. One of them guested to me to hire a scooter for Disneyland because i use a walking stick and shower me a place down the road where i can hire one. The free Breakie was the best but it free. would deferentially stay at this hotel again if i ever want to see Disneyland again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am pleased you enjoyed the hotel location, accommodations and staff.  We greatly enjoyed having you as our guest and thank you for your comments and compliments.  We hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We asked at check-in to have our rooms cleaned by 11:30 each day. We were told that that would happen. It happened 1 day. Our maid left less that 1/2 roll of toilet paper 3 of the days we were there with 4 people in the room. Left notes for maid to leave air conditioner on, came back to warm room, because they had shut it off 3 days. Over all cleanliness of the room was not good. Carpet was dirty. Over all stay was not what I had hoped for.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review. I  am very sorry you did not enjoy your time with us.  If we had known about all of your concerns we could have definitely addressed the situation immediately for you.  I am aware that there was one day that your room was not cleaned by 1130 am.  We were informed you would like your room cleaned after 11am and by 1130 am. Housekeeping did do there best to get to your room in the window allotted.  As soon as you notified the front desk to have the A/C left on, we were able the issue with the housekeeping supervisor so she could inform the housekeeper assigned to your room.  Any requests for housekeeping should be addressed with the front desk so we can ensure they understand the request and we can follow up to make sure it is done for you.  Again thank you for your comments.   They will help us evaluate and address the service provided to our guests. We hope you will stay with us again.

Summary: We stay at this hotel every time we visit Disneyland , we are annual pass holders and visit several times a year .  Rooms are pretty constantly clean and comfortable, staff friendly and willing to help if a problem arises . Breakfast free and and not bad. Parking can be an issue as spots are tight and it becomes an issue as many people park over lines .
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us for your Disneyland visits and for taking the time to write a review.  We enjoy having you as our guest and are pleased we continue to earn your patronage.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Can't get any closer to Disney Land! Great Hotel
Summary: The hotel is great.  Got a mini-suite which has 2 double beds, and a sofa bed.  Can sleep 6 (we are five).   A hot breakfast is included which is pretty good for being FREE!.  This hotel is right across the street from the park.  The park entrance is right in front of the hotel!  You have a Denny, Ihop within the same block. Plus a buffet Lunch Dinner place right next to the hotel!  Tour busses park right in front of this hotel.  You can't go wrong with this place!  It is also a AAA approved hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and thank you for sharing what you felt made us a great hotel.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we hope you will stay with us again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This past October we decided to surprise our kids with a trip to Disneyland and Legoland. Since our daughter was 5 and son was 8 at the time and we knew that we would be doing a lot of walking, location to the park was important to us, since kids get tired.  After looking at options we chose to stay at the Best Western plus park place directly across the street from the Disneyland main gate ( about a 1 minute walk).  This hotel was fantastic!  All of the staff were friendly, helpful, efficient and courteous with all of our requests throughout our stay.  The rooms were not  fancy but super clean and spacious for our family of 4. Prices were competitive to most of the other hotels in the same area. The room had both a fridge and a microwave which came in handy . We were on the 3rd
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to share your experience.  We are very pleased you enjoyed your time with us and will be returning to our hotel for your next Disneyland visit.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We stayed in the family suite with two queen beds and a sofa bed. Rooms are older looking and a bit dark inside but have everything you want, clean and are roomy. Have a small fridge and microwave which is handy. The hotel is virtually right across road from Disneyland so it's great. Bus stop right outside front door and taxis across road. Daily breakfast included, not fantastic but can't complain in price, they also let you take food back to room if you want or we grabbed fruit and muffins to take with us for kids to have later. Staff were friendly, also we rented a car from hotel lobby a couple of days, great service. Easy walk to Disneyland, Adventure park, Disneyland boardwalk, restaurants and a shopping centre. Overall a great place to stay for price. Beware you may or may
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guests and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We do have limited parking.  However, if you have been guaranteed a space during your reservation you will have a place to park at the hotel.  Due to limited parking, there is a travel company, that per contract, their guests are not allowed to park on-site.  If we estimate that we will run out of parking, we will restrict further vehicles from parking on-site but we let those guests know at the time of reservation.  Again, thank you for staying with us and for your comments and compliments.  We hope you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I was really quite happy staying here. The location could not have been better with less than a five minute walk from the Disneyland gates. The room was large and comfortable with a televisions, mini fridge, coffee maker and even a microwave. Continental breakfast was included, which was pretty good and saved a lot compared to the parks. All this for what I consider to be a very reasonable price. This is where I will stay in future visits to DL without a doubt.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you were happy staying here and thank you for sharing what will be bringing you back to our hotel for future visits to DL.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care

Summary Heading: Excellent off-site stay for Disneyland trip
Summary: We enjoyed staying here for our trips to Disneyland. This is our fourth stay here in the past  5 years. We have stayed here from 5-9 days. We love the mini suite with 2 queen beds and sofa bed.  Our kids enjoyed the new free on-demand cable tv.  We enjoy the free breakfast in the mornings.  Now I am aware some people may complain about the breakfast. But, it is free and includes more choices and hot food when compared to other free continental breakfast. There is a microwave and refrigerator.  Our room had a newer refrigerator without the freezer which allowed us to store more drinks.  Parking can be tight in the evening, but we never have any problem finding a suitable parking spot when we arrive in the afternoon. We drive in from northern California and usually arrive early.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us again and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoy having you stay with us and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We thank your wife for making us her only demand for Disney and for you going along with it.  We hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: after reading all the positive reviews I was a bit disappointed in our room at first. The furniture is old looking and the surfaces on some are sticky from the lacquer melting. It is dark and needed the lights on in the day time.The sofa bed was old and dipped drastically in the middle. The pool is very small. However once we settled in we appreciated it more. It was so conveniently located, and it had all that we needed. The kids played happily in the pool and it was actually easier to watch them in the smaller pool area- more relaxing. I did a load of laundry ( $2 per wash 2$ per dry and 2$ soap). We were so close to Disneyland and the bus was right outside our door. Great pizza place one hotel over to grab a lunch. The air conditioner worked great, housekeeping came everyday,
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I do apologize that you were not fully satisfied with your room.  I am pleased however that you did enjoy your stay and greatly appreciate all your comments and compliments.  The details you provided will help us improve our service.  We will be remodeling our breakfast area and offering some new selections when completed in November. We are also scheduled to being remodeling our rooms in the early part of the new year.  We hope you will come and see us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: The Three Cs: Convenient, Close, and Cheap!
Summary: I know, the word cheap has a negative connotation for some; cheap quality is no bueno, but cheap cost, on the other hand, should not be discounted. Hah, did you catch my pun?  In all seriousness, though, we just booked our second reservation here. After many trials and tribulations, I feel like I should do my fellow Disney fans a favor and explain why we chose this hotel.  For the TL;DR set, if you want decent value for your money and plan to spend most of your vacation in the parks, this is what you are looking for.  That's the consensus wight most of the reviews I've read, too.  My husband and I stayed here in Oct 2013. The staff were nice.rooms were clean, price reasonable for the area, and the walk to the parks was short. What more do you really need? The room itself isn't
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I must say your review is the most enjoyable/entertaining one I have read.  I do greatly appreciate all of your comments and compliments and the details included regarding your stay.  We definitely look forward to your stay in October.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This is an old motel with a small pool. The mattress was too soft and lumpy and the air conditioner was loud.  If this motel was located anywhere else, it would rate two or three stars; however, it is the perfect location to Disney resorts. All you have to do is cross the street. That, coupled with the friendly, helpful front desk makes this a desirable motel, particularly if you have children. Location becomes important if you want to rest during the day or if you have small children who tire easily. Another plus is being able to see the Disney fireworks from this locale-just stand in front of the motel. The continental breakfast provides some carbs, juice and coffee  to start the day. We would stay here again because of location.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We appreciate your comments and compliments and letting us know where we can improve.  Our air conditions are usually very quiet.  If yours was loud then it was most likely time for it to be serviced or replaced, which we could have done quickly for you.  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Very nice stay. Front desk was friendly and very comfortable room.  Very nice pool area and shower.  Very convenient distance to Disneyland, nice area to walk around and find stores around the hotel.  Would recommend this hotel to others wanting to go to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  Congratulations on your wedding.  I wish you many blessings for your marriage.  We greatly appreciate your comments, compliments, and recommendation and hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Easy access to Disneland Main entrance
Summary: Accompanied our Son's family to Disneyland. I picked the hotel for it's location and we were not disappointed. Close enough to take a break in the middle of the day and go back to the park later. Our grandaughter's (age 7 & 6) never complained about the walking. We stayed for 4 nights and spent 3 full days at The parks. Rooms were a little worn down but were clean and comfortable. Enjoyed cooling off in the pool and soaking our tired feet in the hot tub.  Only  2 complaints... The sofa bed is terrible. Only suitable for a small child. Air conditioner in son's room was noisy. Note: The free breakfast is okay, but plan to be there really early or after the park opens. Limited seating and people seem to linger waiting for the park to open. Otherwise there are lots of other choices
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We did enjoy having you as our guest and appreciate your comments and compliments.  I am sorry we were not able to get your rooms closer than three rooms apart.  When guests reserve different rooms types these rooms are harder to get close together.  Our Mini-suites are on the 2nd and third floors.  Our King rooms are mainly on the first floor.  Our rooms with 2 double beds are around the pool area and over the lobby.  In order to have rooms right next door to each other, the best option, for the best opportunity to have rooms next door to each other, would be to book the same type of room.  We do hope we will see you again soon.  We will be remodeling our breakfast area this fall and hope this will help clear up some of the congestion in the breakfast room.  The hotel rooms will be started early next year.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The closest hotel to Disneyland so very, very convenient. However, the rooms were very overpriced for what they were. Clean rooms but very dated decor and you could hear outside noise pretty easily. Staff was friendly and helpful. The free breakfast at the restaurant next door was okay and great to just grab and go on the way to Disneyland.  We would likely pay the high prices and stay here again out of convenience.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and appreciate your comments and compliments. We are scheduled to begin a remodel of our rooms in January and hope you will enjoy the improvements. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The family and I stayed here June 24th threw June 29th the staff was friendly and helpful, the pool and hot tub was great, the breakfast was the better than any hotel offers on Harbor BLVD!  The only problem is they advertise on there website 2 Queen beds and a pull out sofa. It was more like 2 full size beds and a pull out sofa. It was ok, we still fit our family of 6 ok. I would stay here again and recommend family and friends to stay here as well. This is my favorite place in Harbor Blvd!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your time with us and greatly appreciate your comments, compliments and recommendation.  We thank you for sharing what made us a "great place to stay and why we are your favorite place.  I would like to note the room is furnished with 2 queen beds and a queen sofa bed.  Queen beds are actually only 6 inches wider than full size beds (only 3 extra inches per person).    Again thank you for your comments and compliments.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care

Summary: Staff was friendly and the location couldn't be better. Rooms were large with two queens and a pull out sofa. TV wasn't working and it was fixed right away. Walk to Disneyland front gate in two minutes. Closer than actual Disney properties. Only minor we're breakfast was just okay and super crowded and the pool was freezing cold. Highly recommend for a Disneyland trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the location, service, and location of the hotel.  We greatly appreciate your comments, compliments, and recommendation and hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Great Place To Stay For Disneyland
Summary: We stayed here for 5 nights. It was a great place to stay for a Disneyland trip. The beds were comfortable and the staff nice. We didn't try the breakfast so I can't review it. We had a room on the front and I had read a problem with street noise. Yes you can hear traffic but after the parks close this really wasn't an issue for us. It never woke us up or kept us from going to sleep. We even napped in the afternoons without a problem.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and are very pleased that you mentioned we were a great place to stay.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and hope you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Great position for Disneyland visitors, hotel just ok
Summary: After trawling the internet for a well located hotel close to Disneyland I chose the Best Western Park Place Inn. Check in was quick and the staff member we dealt with was pleasant but not overly helpful.   If you are hoping for views over Disneyland, this is not the hotel for you as the majority of rooms look out over a car park and at the wall of the property next door. We were happy enough with no view knowing we'd be spending the majority of our time in the parks anyway.   Our room was on the third floor which we caught what must be one of the world's slowest elevators to. As the days wore on we often chose to use the stairs instead of the elevator as it worked out faster. Our room was very dark, even with all lighting on, and had a strong smell (I couldn't work out what it
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated.  I do apologize that we did not fully meet your expectations.  I will definitely have everyone review the shuttle transportation for the Outlets.  We will be remodeling our breakfast area beginning in September.  I do hope you will give us another chance.  We would enjoyed having you stay with us.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This staff is helpful and courteous.  The rooms are large and kept clean and up to date.  The TV's are large flat screen, with good reception.  There is a pool and hot tub.  You always see staff outside cleaning pool and keeping up the landscaping.  Everyone greets you.  Like that there is Security and that the parking is gated, keeping out any through traffic or non-guests. Always feel safe while at this motel.
Manager Response: Thank you once again for staying with us.  We enjoy having you as our guest and always look forward to your visits.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and can't wait to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Perfect place to stay for Disneyland
Summary: This has to be my favorite place to stay at now when we go to Disneyland. Just strolling from the hotel to the front gate of Disneyland took us only 7 minutes! I love that we were able to take a nap mid day to energize my 8 yo daughter to stay up until midnight. Lines for the rides are so much shorter late at night. The room was very clean. Love that they had a coffee maker , microwave oven and refrigerator in the room. Breakfast was free which included: ham, eggs (scrambled flat cakes), waffles/mini french toasts, mini-muffins, danishes, bagels/bread , fruit, yogurt, and of course drinks. It was located next door at the Captain kidd's buffet restaurant on the 2nd floor. They do take AAA. The only negatives are  that the room smelled musty, but improved with opening the window
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you stay with us and are very pleased we are your new favorite place to stay.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The room shown on the internet is not the one you are going to get!!! the advertising is misleading.. make sure you tell them your preferences when you book the room.. I had to pay extra to switch room as the room we booked was small, dark and in the back..
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am sorry you were not satisfied with your stay.  You were provided with your reserved room of one king size bed and a full size sofa bed which is pictured on our website.  We had listed that there was one adult and one child in the room.  If there were more people than we were aware of that would make this room too small, I do apologize.  I understand you were uncomfortable being towards the back of the hotel.  We did try to move you to a similar priced room closer to the front however, they were all occupied at the time.   My front desk agent mentioned the only other alternative for our hotel which was the mini-suite which you then switched to.  Again I am truly sorry you did not enjoy your stay.  I do hope you will stay with us again.  Please let us know what your preferences are and we will do our best to meet your requests.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel fit our basic needs.  Since we are at Disneyland all day, all we need is a clean place to sleep.  This hotel fit the bill.  The best thing about the hotel was the proximity to the entrances to the parks.  I think it might even be closer to the entrance  than Paradise Pier.  The hotel offered a free breakfast.  We wanted to get to Disneyland first thing but we checked out the breakfast and ended up grabbing some fruit, pastries, and coffee to bring with us.  This didn't bother us but if you are a light sleeper, you may want a room towards the back of the hotel.  People come back at all hours and some people are not very quiet when they return.  It's not really the hotel's fault.  They post signs with quiet hours but not everybody adheres.   I would stay here again just
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am pleased you enjoyed the location, the breakfast, and accommodations.  We appreciate your comments and compliments and hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Reasonably priced, close to park entrance
Summary: We often stay here when we make our visits to Disneyland. Very convenient. Rooms kind of old, beds kind of hard, but a good place for a family. No need for shuttle busses. Other than the Disneyland Hotels, best place to stay if you are in any of the Run Disney events.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us when making your Disneyland visits and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoying having you stay with us and appreciate your comments and compliments.  This year and next year will see lots of changes at our hotel and I hope you will enjoy the updates.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Location was great, directly across the street from the main gate entrance to Disneyland! Clean rooms, friendly staff. However their breakfast offers the same thing every morning with the exception of one morning it has sausage, the next one is ham. Then back and forth. Powered eggs. Was told when making the reservations that they offered a variety that included biscuits and gravy. Never saw it in 6 days of our stay. Just gets boring even though it's included in the price of the stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am sorry you were not fully satisfied with your stay.  We do offer a wide variety of items at breakfast, more than the average household has to choose from on a daily basis, so you do not have to choose the same thing every day.  We have not offered biscuits and gravy at this hotel for a couple of years now.  I am the one who made your reservation and did not state that biscuits and gravy were provided here.  However I did mention the variety of items offered included eggs, sausage or ham, potatoes, toaster waffles, yogurt, bagels, three varieties of toast and a number of spread options, oranges, bananas, apples, variety of pastries and muffins, Cheerios, Fruit Loops, Kellogg's Raisin Bran, Kellogg's Frosted Flakes, Quaker Oatmeal, Hot Chocolate, Coffee, Tea, Milk, Orange and Apple Juice.  We do appreciate your comments and compliments and hope you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care

Summary Heading: Great Location - Good Room - Poor Breakfast
Summary: Just got back from a 5 night stay.  I gave it a 3 stars because it was average.  If it wasn't so close to Disneyland, I would not return.  Not sure I would return even if we would return to Disney(bad breakfast experiences and just an average room).  The Pros - The room was fine.  It was very clean, a little outdated but nothing too bad.  It had a microwave, fridge, desk and was pretty roomy.  We stayed here because I read it was very close to Disneyland and it really was.  There was plenty of parking but parking was $10 a night.  Nice pool area: small but clean.  I used the laundry room and it was nice and clean as well.  WiFi worked well too.  We asked for extra towels one night and they came right away!  Cons - Awful Breakfast IN A HOT ROOM - IT WAS NOT AIR CONDITIONED  AND
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very sorry the breakfast was not to your liking. Beginning in September we will be remodeling our breakfast area and beginning in January we will be redoing our rooms.  We hope you will come back and give us another chance.  We do appreciate your comments and compliments and hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Highly recommended. Full breakfast and great location. Clean rooms, great service. Rooms are quiet. Elevator is a bit slow and parking is tight. Convenient to get in and out of  Disneyland if you want to leave the park during the day!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and we are very pleased your enjoyed your time with us.  We greatly appreciate your comments, compliments and recommendation and hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Shouldn't have to pay to park your car
Summary: Pros:  This hotel is right across the street from Disneyland,It was very convenient and when the kids got tired we came back to take a nap and then returned to Disneyland refreshed and happy. Breakfast was great ,easy and had lots to choose. Our room was very quiet and spacious. Has a fridge and microwave.  Cons:  You have pay 10 a night to park your car. You already pay a huge price for the room you shouldn't need to pay to park your car that you are not going to use for a few days.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and are pleased you enjoyed your stay.  We do charge for parking to maintain the parking control gates and ensure that our guests have parking during their stay.  We do understand that some guests may not want to pay for parking so the charge is posted on our website at the top of the information in bold blue writing, it is in our confirmation emails and all guests are told when calling the hotel directly to make a reservation.  This allows guests to make an informed decision on accepting all charges charged by the hotel (Room Rate, Tax, and Parking) or choosing another location.  Again we do appreciate your comments and compliments and hope you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: First things first!! This is my absolute 1st choice for hotel when in Anaheim. I arrived about 1/2 an hour earlier before check-in. Keeping in mind that my room wouldn't be ready until later. So I checked in and the young man told me I have your room ready. So that was a plus, I didn't have to wait in the lobby with my daughter. So we went to our room and as always nice & clean with everything in working order! Our 3 nights were perfect. I will be back as always! Thank you best western!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us again and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoy having you stay with us and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We do try and check our guests in as quickly as possible and I am pleased we were able to check you in early.  We definitely look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Super close to disney, clean, good price.
Summary: You can't get much closer than this, crosswalk to maingate is right outside property.  Typical continental breakfast, clean rooms and grounds, great prices.  Staff was helpful, the parking is tight, shampoos/soaps could be better for ext. stay guests.  Sofa bed wasn't great, but we figured that and it worked for our daughter.  Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We greatly enjoyed having you as our guest and appreciate your comments and compliments.  We do hope you are able to stay with us again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Hotel rooms are spacious but dated. Rooms are clean however, depending on your room location, can be very noisy. Don't stay by an elevator or stairs - guests are very disrespectful and noisy - you won't get to sleep until 1 AM!! Breakfast was good with a great variety of food items however breakfast staff ran out of some items every morning.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time tow write a review. We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We are scheduled to begin remodeling our rooms in January.  Our breakfast is scheduled to begin a remodel and overhaul in September.  We are taking steps to remind our guests to quiet down when they return from their day of fun.  Again we do greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and hope you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We just returned from a 4-night stay at this hotel and it was an excellent experience. This hotel is absolutely the closest to Disneyland and is literally right across the street. our room had 2 queens and a sleeper sofa and felt very spacious. I cannot sing the praises of their housekeeping department enough - the rooms were amazingly clean and they were so gracious to work around our Disney touring schedule, even cleaning in the evening 2 of the nights for us so we could take a few hours of napping for the little kids during the day. I also appreciated that the mattresses were fully covered in some kind of zip-up mattress cover.  The continental breakfast next door was great and had plenty of protein to keep us full at Disneyland. We loved watching the fireworks from our room
Manager Response: I am very pleased you had an amazing stay.  We appreciate you staying with us and sharing why you had an excellent experience.  Thank you for your comments and compliments regarding the service, accommodations, and breakfast.  We enjoyed having you stay with us and look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: THE place to stay when doing Disneyland!
Summary: This is our go-to hotel whenever we go to Disneyland. We've stayed there numerous times and can't imagine staying elsewhere. You can't get closer to the crosswalk to Disneyland than this hotel! In addition to the location, their breakfast is a perfect way to start the day before heading to the park; they offer a good selection for a variety of tastes/appetites. We've stayed at other hotels on Harbor Blvd., but the BWPPI is by far our favorite.
Manager Response: Thank you for making us your go-to hotel for Disneyland.  We greatly enjoy having you stay with us and thank you for your comments and compliments.  They are much appreciated.  We definitely look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: For connivance to park this location can't be beat, breakfast was average as well as all other amenities, nothing fancy, but if your spending all your time at the theme parks this place is fantastic for the price. I will stay here again. :-)
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and appreciate your comments and compliments.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The hotel is a perfect location for access to Disneyland from Harbor Blvd. Having the breakfast allowed us to start our day off right. Suite suited the five of us.  If you have only one car, you can park at the hotel, but if more than one, hotel sends extra cars to relatively close lot to park--a bit pricey, but at least a place. (we come from different areas).  Rooms are very neat and clean.  Staff is friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review. We enjoyed having you as our guest and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  I am pleased you enjoyed the location. breakfast, staff, and accommodations and hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This motel is very convenient to Disneyland, just across the street from the main entrance.  It took us only five minutes to be at the entrance gate to either park.  There was a notice in the room asking for help in conserving water, we followed the recommendations to use the towels again, but the maid took them anyway.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  Thank you for letting me know about the towels.  We will remind our housekeepers of when to leave the towels and when to replace them.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and hope you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Best place to stay in Anaheim
Summary: We have been coming to the Park Place Inn Mini Suites since 1998 and absolutely love it here. The staff the location and the free breakfast is always a plus.. The rooms are clean and there is a nice little pool & hot tub available to enjoy...
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us throughout the years and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoy having you stay with us and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We are looking forward to your next visit with us in December.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We were concerned about staying here because of previous reviews about the staff.  Not true.  The entire staff (front desk, housekeeping, maintenance, etc.),  everyone, could not have been nicer.  We enjoyed our stay here.  The hotel, the breakfast, the close proximity to Disneyland, everything was great.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us even with your concerns and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased we alleviated your concerns and you enjoyed your stay with us.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and hope to have you stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay, especially for groups!
Summary: I highly recommend this hotel. We were a large group of 31 Girl Scouts and adults. They were able to accommodate all of us! It is so convenient to Disneyland so when the girls got tired we walked back and went to sleep. The employees were professional and extremely nice to all the Girl Scouts.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the accommodations and service.  I was impressed at how quickly you were able to quiet down a bunch of young excited girls.  I hope everyone had a great time at Disneyland and hope to see you again.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Great location....but don't forget anything in the closet!
Summary: My husband and I stayed at the Best Western Plus Park Place Inn for four nights in May.  The location to Disneyland cannot be beat...the hotel is right across the street!  We were given a room that actually overlooked the park; we could see space mountain from our window!! The room was spacious, with two queen beds (or they could have been doubles) and was perfect for visiting Disneyland, California Adventure and downtown Disney.  We took the Super Shuttle from the John Wayne airport, so we didn't need to worry about parking a car or doing any driving; we were so close to everything Disney, that we could walk everywhere.  Breakfast is included and is served every morning in the Captain Kidd's restaurant, right next door to the hotel.  The breakfast was buffet-style and had many
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay including the accommodations and breakfast.  I am very sorry we were unable to find the shirt that was left behind.  We greatly appreciate your comments, compliments, and recommendation and look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This is the third time in 6 years my family has stayed at the Park Place Inn.  Our entire stay was perfect.  This is the norm for this hotel.  We have never had a bad experience staying here.  We stayed 5 nights. The hotel staff is out standing from the front desk to the maids.  We rented two rooms, both two queen mini suites.  One of the most important things we needed and wanted was that they be connecting and the staff made sure that we got what we wanted.  The rooms are good sized with a separate room containing the tub/shower-toilet with the sink outside that room.  It has a full counter top that can handle everything you want to place on it.  The beds are nice and we all got a good nights sleep each night.  The hotel has elevators so getting baggage up to the upper floors
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us again and taking the time to write a review.  We greatly appreciate your sharing what keeps bring you back to our hotel.  Thank you very much for your comments and compliments.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: It has been almost 5 years since I stayed at this property.  It used to be our go-to location for a trip to Disneyland, but it's gotten substantially more expensive over the last few years.  I happened to find a great price through Costco travel so I jumped at the chance to check it out again.  I was traveling with 2 boys, ages 8 and 10.  As a comparison, I have been staying most recently at the Anaheim Plaza Hotel (down the street a block or so).  The Anaheim Plaza is less expensive and in general, not as well kept up (although the grounds are beautiful!)  I found the staff to be efficient, if not particularly friendly.  The lobby and exterior have been fairly recently renovated and the lobby looks terrific!  Check in was efficient and I was assigned a room on the 2nd floor
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us again and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  Your very detailed review will help us evaluate our service and offerings so we can continue to strive to exceed our guests expectations.  We hope you are able to stay with us again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This is the only hotel to stay at if not staying at a Disney hotel. The hotel is right across the street from the Disneyland entrance making it very convenient when we were worn out at the end of the night. The room was clean and the staff helpful. Breakfast at the neighboring restaurant was a free breakfast buffet and had something for everyone.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay including the service, accommodations, and breakfast.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We had a wonderful time, and this is the best hotel for anyone walking to Disneyland/California Adventure.  Room accommodated 3-adults, 4- adults possibly and easily 2-adults and two children.  Breakfast was always hot and plenty!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you had a wonderful time staying with us and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope you will be able to stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: When staying at the Park Place Inn, you know you're not staying at a resort hotel, but for the price and closeness of this hotel, it was well worth it.  The breakfast options were great, room nice except don't plan on sleeping on the sleeper sofa, that was very uncomfortable!  Not sure if it was just the particular room we were in or all need to be replaced.  Would double check that if you're planning on using it for sleeping!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your time with us including the location and the breakfast.  We appreciate your comments and compliments and hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Best Western Across Street from Disneyland
Summary: This hotel is one of the closest to Disneyland.  We just had to walk across the street!  The value is great, but the breakfast is ok in comparison to other Best Westerns.  The waffles were premade and soggy, but you can't be  picky for a free breakfast near Disneyland.  It was adequate (juice, coffee, cereal, fruit, muffins, sausage, eggs)
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and thank you for your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I loved that it was right across the street from Disneyland. I have stayed in the Best Western on Katella and had a long walk to and from the park.  With a three month old Grandchild this was very convenient.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review. I  am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and the location of our hotel.  I hope you had a lot of fun with your grandchild at Disneyland.  Please come and stay with us again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The only reason we stay here is the short walk to the parks.   We stayed here in 2005 and the quality (and ownership) has since changed. If it wasn't for the location, I'm not sure we would stay here again.  The soundproofing needs work.  You can hear everything, especially the fireworks! Do not stay here if you need a sound sleep after a long crazy Disney day.  There are 3 floors, and if anyone with children is sleeping above you, every step they take will resonate through your room.  The staff are professional and courteous, no complaints there.  Breakfast was a crazy hot room at the restaurant across the driveway, the food was average but the amount of people trying to eat made it worse than eating at the parks. Rooms were clean and cool, pool was comfortable, but the noise
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am sorry you did not fully enjoy your stay.  I understand you were frustrated with the Wi-Fi service.  Hotels that charge a daily fee disconnect you from the Wi-Fi on a daily basis so you can agree to accept the daily charge each day.  While our service is free, the service will disconnect devices from the service if idle for too long.  We have a 199 rooms and an average of four or more devices per room connecting to Wi-Fi.  If all devices were allowed to stay connected while not in use, the Wi-Fi connectivity and speed would be very poor for all guests trying to utilize the service.
