We do hope you will give us another chance.  I would recommend requesting a room further away from the front of the hotel for less foot traffic passing your room. We do appreciate your comments and compliments and hope you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This was a great location for our Disneyland trip.  The hotel just across the Disneyland main gate and that was important to us. Our room was very clean and updated. Not sure if all rooms were like ours but this one was great.  Bathroom was spotless.  Vanity outside of bathroom was a plus for getting ready in the morning.   Linens were fresh and crisp.  The beds are firm but comfortable.  Pillows are fat and firm so if you need a soft pillow that would be something to ask about in advance.   I would stay here again.  Breakfast was fine for a complimentary breakfast. (Beggars cant' be choosers) Not just a roll and coffee.   Included a hot item each day (eggs with sausage or ham) plus the usual flair of cold items, yogurt, fruit, toast, bagels, cereal, donuts, and so on.   I would
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  Thank you for sharing what would make you stay with us again. We hope to see you soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Can't get any better or closer location to Disneyland.  Loved the convenience of this for my younger children.  Free breakfast and free Wi-Fi were another great plus.  Very friendly staff.  Small pool and hot tub but my kids loved it anyway.  Would definitely stay at this hotel again on a Disney vacation.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and that you would stay with us again.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Great location, disneyland is just over the road. Breakfast is in thr cafe next day. Breakfastvwas average. The rooms are noisy especially when prople come home from the fireworks. Safe is provided at the front desk for you valuables
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review. I am very pleased you enjoyed the hotel and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope you will be able to stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: It's not the California Grand, But if you want a comfortable clean room for a really fair price this should be it. We have stayed there more then a handful of times and no complaints. We will see them again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us again and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoy having you stay with us and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Well, the good news is that it is VERY convenient to Disneyland (across the street), the rooms were spacious although needing if deep cleaning, and the staff was friendly, cooperative and efficient.  The breakfast was served on the second floor of a restaurant next door. (no elevator). It was large but consisted mainly of cereals, breads, bagels, muffins and donuts. The hot dishes were very dry homefries, egg patties (yes, patties), ham and sausage served on alternate days, and pre-made waffles that were usually cold. We never saw one strip of bacon in five days. An adequate supply of fresh fruit was provided. Generally, this entire breakfast was disappointing. One improvement to the check-in process would be as follows. After a six-hour road trip with 6 people we arrived about
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing staying to with us and taking the time to write a review. I am sorry you did not enjoy the Complimentary Breakfast.  We do try and provide a little something for everyone.  We will be remodeling the breakfast are beginning in September and will hopefully be able to provide more options. Regarding check in:  Departing guests have until 11 am to check out of their rooms.  50% of our daily arrivals will arrive before the 3 pm check in time (many before the 11am), making it difficult to expedite rooms for each of these guests.  However, knowing that we will have such a high number of guests arriving early, housekeeping is notified whenever a guest checks out of their rooms so the housekeepers can begin preparing the room as soon as possible.  The housekeepers work extremely hard to have all 199 rooms cleaned as quickly as possible to meet the needs of our current guests and arriving guests. I am very pleased you appreciated the service of the staff and the remedy to a situation in one of your rooms.  We do charge $10 a night for parking to maintain the parking gates which, are in place to ensure our guests have a place to park and that the spots are not being taken by Disney Park visitors. We do greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and do hope you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I stayed here last November with my wife and four kids.The number one factor in my decision to stay here was the location. It is directly across from the entrance to Disneyland. The price was also pretty good. Probably the least expensive in the area. It is pretty much a motel as there are no inside hallways.  Two suggestions for anyone thinking of staying here: 1. Book early 2. DO NOT book through a third party website. Book directly through Best Western. Some poor guy who was checking in at the same time as me was told that he could not get a parking pass because he booked through a third party website.   The free breakfast was at Captain Kidd's buffet next door. They have a special dining area upstairs for hotel guests. It was gross. The yogurt and bagels and other cold food
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay and that you would stay with us again.  We do appreciate your comments and compliments.  I would like to mention that booking through a third party will not bar you from being able to park at the hotel. There is one international travel company that no parking is part of the contract and it is stated clearly on the guest's paperwork that they receive from the company. I am sorry you did not enjoy the breakfast. The food is not from the restaurant.  The food provided by the hotel is all name brand items (ex. Farmland Meats, Aunt Jemima Waffles, General Mills, Kellogg's, and Landers to name a few) that are found in households across the country.  We prepare the items every morning.  We will be remodeling our breakfast area this fall and will be making some adjustments to the breakfast offerings.  Thank you again for your comments, compliments, and recommendation.  We do hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: After full days at the Disney Parks, 10 steps make a big difference. You can't get any closer than this without spending big bucks for Disney properties. We stayed in a dbl dbl room with 6 and 7 year old granddaughters. Lots of drawer space and closet area to keep clothes so we could keep suitcases stored out of the way. Paper and plastic cups for drinks and coffee. The pool area was fun and not too noisy. Breakfast was an adequate buffet, some meat, eggs, breads, muffins, fruit, yoghurt, cereal and good coffee. The pillows are very lofty, sheet and spread for cover. Everything was clean and functional.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We are very pleased you enjoyed your stay and grateful for your comments an compliments.  Thank you for sharing what you liked about our hotel.  We hope you will stay with us again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This was a great hotel right across from the Main entrance of Disneyland and California Adventure.  We had a continental breakfast buffet that was included.  The price was great during Memorial Week.  We had a great room away from the pool noise which the hotel staff was accomodating.  The room was clean and staff was pleasant.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you stay with us and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope you will be able to stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel is closer to the Disney theme parks that two of the Disney hotels. The breakfast is acceptable, I think everyone will find something to like be it fruit, cereal, yogurt, waffles, eggs etc. The place where they serve breakfast is pretty run down but you can't beat the price ! I highly recommend this hotel to anyone wanting to be close to the parks but not spend alot of $$$.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us.  Your comments, compliments, and recommendation are greatly appreciated and we hope you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Going to Disneyland? This is the absolute best place to stay -- not question about it. We have been staying here for ten years now and this is truly our home away from home. You will not find a better value anywhere in the area. The staff are extremely friendly and helpful. You really can't go wrong with the Best Western Park Place Inn.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during the past ten years and taking the time to write a review.  We greatly enjoy having you as our guest and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We look forward to seeing you again in a couple of weeks.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I've stayed at this property every year for the last several years & I can't express how important LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION is. Park Place Inn is right across the street. Seriously!!! The convenience of not waiting for the next hotel shuttle or ART is immeasurable!! So nice to go back to the room in the late afternoon for a quick nap or change of clothes. Free breakfast is priceless! More than just pastries & cereal like most continental breakfasts. There were eggs, sausage, canadian bacon, bagels, cereal, muffins, danish, yogurt, apples, bananas, oranges, toast, waffles, milk, orange juice & apple juice. Lots of space to eat or take it back to your room. So convenient! Even the microwave & mini refrigerator in the room came in handy! Staff is always so friendly &
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us for your visits to Disneyland and taking the time to write another review.  We greatly enjoy having you as our guest and appreciate your comments and compliments.  We will be updating our breakfast area in September and our rooms beginning sometime around January.  I hope you will enjoy the changes and look forward to you next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Second time around and still the best place to be off property!
Summary: We stayed at this hotel in 2013 and booked it again in for a 9 day stay the end of April 2015. When I booked it, we requested in advance the same room we had in 2013. The room although a little worn from the years was EXTREMELY clean  and decor pretty and functioning. And I will again say LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION. You cannot beat literally walking across the street to Disneyland. Refrigerator in room and mini mart just doors down.  I heard people complaining about the breakfast in the a.m.  (If you are expecting a huge spread then pay for a character breakfast at Disney. Trust me the food will exceed your expectations.) At the hotel it is beyond a continental breakfast and It is hot and tasty enough. They offer a variety of choices. Ham, eggs, waffles, bagels, cereal,
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us again and taking the time to write a review.   We greatly appreciate you sharing what you enjoyed about your stay as well as your perspective on aspects of the experience at our hotel.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and thank you for your comments and compliments and hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Fantastic hotel. Extremely polite and helpful staff. Spacious rooms, very clean, good in room facilities.   It was very nice after a whole day at Disneyland to just walk across the road and your hotel is literally right there. I would stay here for every returning visit to Disneyland.  I do recommend to request a room away from the hotel laundry and pool which are right next to one another - this is where the house keepers hang out and they can be loud early in the morning and until late at night. I also do recommend to get a room on the second floor, as children were constantly running up and down the pathway on the bottom floor, screaming with excitement early in the morning. I'm happy for them and all that, but doesn't help if you're looking for a sleep in.  They have a
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  Thank you for sharing what made us a fantastic hotel and what would make you stay with us again.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and are very pleased you had a great time here.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and hope you stay with us again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We stayed 5/24-5/25..Hotel was very nice, rooms are spacious and really clean. The breakfast was pretty good with a decent selection. Staff is helpful and friendly. The best part hotel is right in front of both parks not to mention the parking is only $10 and convenient. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and are very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us. We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This place is the best!  So close and great value.  We will for sure stay here every time we do Disney.  Breakfast was great and the kids had fun every morning.  5 minutes to the park gate makes it so easy to take breaks.  The hot tub was lovely.  I will stay on the ground floor again too.  Comfortable beds and overall awesomeness!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  Thank you for sharing what made us the "Best Disney Hotel EVER'.  I am very happy your kids had fun every morning at breakfast.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: "this is the place to stay for visiting Disneyland"
Summary: Not only was this a great location for visiting Disneyland but we couldn't have asked for a nicer stay. Our room overlooked the Disneyland entrance. We were able to watch the fireworks from our room.We arrived at approximately 1 p.m. in the afternoon and our room was ready and waiting for us  Breakfast is included in the cost of the room. It was decent. Plenty of food. We were able to visit the hot tub every night after a long day at Disney. We will definitely stay here again.  We couldn't have asked for a nicer stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and thank you for sharing what you enjoyed about your stay.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Great location.  A very short walk to Disney entrance.   Great Breakfast. Simple and familiar food.   Good Pool:  Just big enough to enjoy Good Rooms:  Clean sheets, towels, recently renovated.  Hot shower!  *Two complaints are the floors could be cleaner.  I feel the need to wear slippers in the room.  The furniture is a little dated but for the things that really matter... The television is big with lots of channels, the WIFI works well with minimum interruptions, and the refrigerator makes everything nice and cold.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  Thank you for sharing details of what you enjoyed during your stay.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Hotel was in the middle of where we were going.
Summary: This hotel was located in the middle of where we were headed to. We decided to make a night of it. The hotel was pretty great for the money. Free breakfast was pretty decent. Checking in and out was easy. The staff directed us where to go to each.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I chose this hotel because of location.  Excellent choice.  Hotel staff were very friendly and well staffed.  The lobby is very modern and clean.  The rooms are very clean, the furniture is a little dated, Tommy Bahama decor but very clean!  50 inch flat screen was nice and room was a nice size, queen bed with a sofa sleeper.  Shower was fairly renovated and very clean.  The best part is exactly across the street of DL!  quick walk, no waiting for busses or trams!  Quick walk to downtown Disney or other resturaunts located up and down street for all price ranges.  I will be staying here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review. I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  Thank you for sharing what made this a great place for visiting Disneyland.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I love staying here because it is literally right across the parks exit and after a long day, it's exactly where I want to go to.  The lobby has been remodeled since I was last there and looks amazing, a plus since it was old and outdated!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us again and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoy having you as our guest and thank you for your comments and compliments.  We greatly appreciate you sharing why you love staying with us and we look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Got kids? Doing Disney on a budget? Stay here.
Summary: I read every single one of these reviews before choosing BW Park Place and I'm so glad we did. It's a motel-style hotel (exterior doors) and our 'view' from the third floor was the enormous wall of a grey building next door. Not fancy in the least, but for our needs this place totally fit the bill. Price was right for a budget-conscious family of 5, including a toddler. We paid less than half what we would for a night at a Disneyland resort hotel. That's key. We wanted to spend our money inside the park, where we spent the majority of our 3 Disney days.  Meals were a concern for me, moneywise, so the continental breakfast was a lifesaver for us.  The offerings are just fine...ignore the picky reviewers! Fresh juices, basic fruits, cereals, milk and yes, those egg patties,
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We know you have many options and we are very pleased we met your needs and expectations.  Thank you for your comments and compliments, sharing what you enjoyed about your stay.  It is much appreciated.  We hope you will be able to come and stay with us again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Location is excellent for visiting Disney Parks.  Our room, 104, was a bit noisy as people walked by talking and rolling their suitcases on the walkway.  Maybe and upper floor room would not be as noticeable or farther down the walk way from the the lobby .
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Great property for the price paid. Very clean and comfortable rooms with a very friendly staff. The pool and hot tub area was well kept and a great place to relax in the evenings. Felt safe to leave our car in the gate protected parking area. Breakfast was average but convenient prior to entering Disney parks. It was very easy to purchase park hopper tickets at the front desk. We enjoyed our stay and would recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the accommodations, hotel amenities, and staff.  We greatly appreciate your comments, compliments, and recommendation and hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Great location!  This hotel is located right across the street to the main entrances for Disneyland and California Adventure which really cuts back on the walking back and forth.  Our room was clean and spacious, and the staff were very friendly and helpful. The continental breakfast was on the second floor in Captain Kidds right next door and was great: eggs, ham or sausage, potatoes, bagels, bread/toast, cereal, apples, bananas, oranges, yogurt, muffins, pastries.  The pool and hot tub were clean and a good size; we enjoyed relaxing there at the end of each day.  Overall, we were extremely pleased with our stay and will definitely be staying there on our next trip!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and sharing what will be bringing you back for your next trip.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the accommodations, location, and hotel amenities as well as the breakfast.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Great place to stay as it's right across the street from Disneyland. Very friendly staff and I have always been able to do early check in. Parking is easy and off resort store/coffee/restaurants are close by. I always try to stay here when I visit Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing us for your visits to Disneyland and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoy your stays with us and appreciate your comments and compliments.  We look forward to your next visit with us.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Very clean, quiet and the location is the best you can buy all for a very reasonable price. It also includes an okay breakfast and wifi, a microwave and fridge and the parking is only $10. But, if you're only going to Disney you will not need a car.   I think it is closer to the entrance to the parks than the Disneyland hotels are and it is so nice to just walk to your room after a long day in the parks. You can also access all that Downtown Disney and Anaheim Garden Walk have to offer as well.  The furnishings are a little out of date but the bed is comfortable as are the sheets and towels  :)
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us again and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the location, accommodations and amenities offered and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope you will come and stay with us again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Have stayed here many times and was pleasantly surprised to see the upgraded lobby. The room was clean, comfortable and a continental breakfast served every day next door. The staff was fantastic and went out of their way to make our stay enjoyable.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us again and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the new lobby.  I hope you will like the breakfast room upgrades we will be making in September and the changes coming to the rooms beginning in January.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: My family came from Michigan for a Disney Vacation.  We had 3 rooms with 3 vehicles.  With a total of 10 people there was potential for issues.. we had ZERO Issues. The staff were friendly and extremely helpful for any needs we had.  The facility was comfortable and quiet.  Breakfast was a bonus, especially when going to an amusement part.  Location was really important and it did not dissappoint!!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and we were able to help you and your family from Michigan have a great visit to Disneyland.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Great place to stay, very nice people there too. Great location right across from the park great places to eat at the hotel and lots of other places close for walking to. I will go back for sure. My daughter and I need a Disney 10k run while we were there so much fun.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time tow rite a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your time here and had fun at the Disney Run.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Stayed here one night to allow for 2 days at Disney and it was the perfect option for a short trip.  Excellent service - room was ready early, parking extended and a clean room for the night.  Facilities are very basic, including breakfast, but for a short trip that was fine with us.  As a whole, the hotel could use some updating, but we knew what to expect and it was nonetheless good value for the price.  Location directly across the street from Disney can't be beat!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as a guest and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  Over the next year we will be updating the cable, the rooms and the breakfast area.  We hope you will come back and see us again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Great location to visit the Disneyland Resort. Breakfast was good although the seating area was always full. It was reasonably quiet and the rooms were spacious and clean. Although I didn't have a car, the parking looked tight with skinny spaces. Most of the cars I saw could not fit between the lines of the spaces.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  Thank you for sharing what you like about your stay and we hope you will come and stay with us again soon.  Thank you and take care

Summary: Very pleasant time at our hotel. Ease of access to pool/spa, office and breakfast. Easy access to Disney land and local restaurants. Great service especially at the front desk. Hopefully we can repeat our stay and have a do-over.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you had a pleasant time at our hotel and were able to enjoy the location and service of our staff.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Were there last week! Had 4 rooms all super clean and very nice service!!! Closest rooms to the park off Disney property!!! Was great!!! Breakfast was great and facility was clean had people there cleaning non stop the whole time!!! Tons of families with kids and minimul noise except the garbage trucks but who wants garbage hanging around! Lol
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review. Thank you for sharing what made your stay with us a 'Perfect Stay'.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the accommodations, locations, and service provided by our staff.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: this was perfect. right across the street from Disneyland. i was checked in immediately, so me and my party didn't miss a thing. my room was cleaned as soon as we left and it was done well.   I will be coming back to Disneyland and to this hotel. perfect, perfect, perfect!!!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and are very pleased you had such a wonderful time with us.  Thank you for sharing what made our hotel perfect.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Wonderful location, Average hotel at best. Old, outdated, reminiscent of Motel 6 at triple the price. A few sheets of nearly transparent bargain basement TP on the roll and no backup roll when we arrived. Asked maid in hallway for more and she handed me half a roll from her cart. Next evening after room was cleaned, still no TP. I had read great reviews about this place but I suspect most were written by folks somehow compensated for those reviews. My advice, pay a little extra and stay somewhere nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review. I am very sorry you did not enjoy your stay with us.  No one is compensated for writing reviews.  I do wish you had let us know if any displeasure you had with your stay or room while you were here so we could have attempted to help you enjoy your vacation even more.  I do appreciate your review so I can ensure the issues are addressed.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The Best Western Anaheim Hotel has a great location, just a few minute walk from Disneyland (located right across the street) and surrounded by awesome restaurants.  Mimi's has fantastic breakfasts and The Cheesecake Factory is just a five minute walk.  Room was clean and quiet.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and the location of the hotel.  We appreciate your comments and compliments and hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Great hotel for a visit to Disneyland
Summary: I've stayed at this hotel several times.  It is the closest hotel to Disneyland that I am aware of,it's right across the street.  The hotel is clean and the employees are friendly and helpful. You can watch the fireworks from the sidewalk in front of the hotel.  They also have a complementary breakfast. I highly recommend this hotel for a trip to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us again and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoy having you stay with us and greatly appreciate your comments, compliments, and recommendation.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Best Western PLUS Park Place Inn
Summary: Great location, across the street from Disneyland.  Larger room was perfect with upscale decor (tile in the shower/toilet room). Two double beds, TV, microwave, mini refrigerator, coffee maker, single sink (outside of the shower/toilet room), large counter, wireless internet, good breakfast with some hot foods (waffles, eggs, potatoes and meat). Great staff, both friendly and helpful.  I highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and greatly appreciate your comments, compliments, and recommendation.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your time with us and hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We have stayed here 3 or 4 times before and plan on staying again in November.  The first thing I said when I walked in the lobby was that it has been redecorated.  The staff was very helpful because we arrived early in the morning.  They checked all of our bags (4 adults going on a cruise after Disneyland) and held them till we came back from the park that evening.  Everyone was friendly and helpful.  Helpful buying tickets also.  Of course location is the best thing about this hotel.  We had my parents in 80's, so we wanted as little amount of walking as possible. The rooms are standard rooms. Breakfast is the only thing that I have been disappointed about over the years. Not a large selection of items but now there are some hot items.   Breakfast has improved since the first
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us again and taking the time to write a review.  We greatly appreciate you returning to our hotel and sharing why you return, and your appreciation for the improvements we have made.  We will be continuing improvements throughout the year.  The breakfast area will be redone beginning in September and the rooms will be started in January.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We stayed in Best Western three night. We had pleasant stay. Location? Can't beat!!! Room nice and clean. Friendly staff. Complementary breakfast, putting mildly, its not attractive at all. But who cares, if  you get free fireworks view, from  street facing rooms. Overall,  I recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you had a pleasant stay and greatly appreciate your comments, compliments, and recommendation.  We hope you will be able to stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Seriously, this is probably the best place to stay on a trip to Disneyland. It is literally right across the street from the park entrance, it's inexpensive, and the rooms are decently clean for a motel (all rooms are entered from outside).   We stayed just one night (a Thursday in early May). I was concerned about the parking policy, which states that you can't have your car in the lot until sometime in the afternoon the day you check in. But they called that morning (while we were en route to Disneyland) to confirm that we were still coming, and I asked them when we could park our car... and they said they weren't full so we could park right now! Um, awesome!! So we rolled up around 8:30 a.m. and I went into the lobby to get a parking pass... and was told that our room was
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am so very pleased we made such an impression with you during just a one night stay.   Thank you so very much for sharing what made us an excellent location and great hotel.  We greatly appreciate your comments, compliments, and recommendation.  We look forward to having you stay with us again and hope to see you soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Great Hotel. Great People. Great Stay.
Summary: We LOVED staying at this hotel - we will definitely be booking here again. Love the pool, the cleanliness of the facilities, the breakfast, the location, the comfort of the bed, the helpfulness of the staff. This was our first trip with our 1-year-old son and we were so happy with the room and the closeness - it helped to get him quickly back for a nap and then right back into the park for the fun. One quibble was that the fireworks were so close, they were loud in our room. But we chose to see that as a perk - we were so close, the fireworks were RIGHT THERE. Love it.  Definitely will stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you stay with us and I am very pleased we were able to help you enjoy your first trip with your 1 year old son.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care

Summary: This place is very tacky.  Watch out for the house cleaners!  There are so many, and they take over the elevator and are very noisy.  They tend to have conversations right outside the rooms, so they don't care if you're there sleeping.  My room had coffee cup marks still wet when I went in. Not so nice place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very sorry you did not enjoy your stay with us.  The issue with the carts was addressed with the supervisor who was responsible was reprimanded.  I am sorry for any issues with coffee marks on the counter.  I was not aware this was an issue.  We had received a request from you for no service during your stay.  Again I do apologize for the carts and any inconvenience or discomfort you experienced during your stay.  All issues were addressed and we hope you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I found this to be a great hotel for those looking to be close to the action at the Disneyland Resort while still maintaining a budget.   At up to three times the price for very little extra benefit I just couldn't see staying at a Disney Property.  I was looking at this location and one other as they were the closest to the pedestrian entrance and had good feedback on the DisBoards.  I typically would have stayed at a level up from this chain but decided that for the price/location and amenities this would be the best value.  The hotel itself was very much what I expected.  For just over $100 dollars in a heavy demand tourist corridor,  I am not expecting a deluxe hotel, I am expecting a clean room, basic amenities and good service.  I was underwhelmed with a few things but
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased we met your expectations and you enjoyed your stay with us.  We greatly appreciate your detailed review with its comments, compliments and recommendation.  We will be redoing our breakfast room this September/October and hopefully we will be able to incorporate more items into our breakfast.  We hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Best location and a great deal
Summary: We stayed at this location during our last trip to Disneyland in April. We had a great stay, and would never stay anywhere else when visiting Anaheim. The free breakfast is adequate, but we didn't eat there everyday. It would be the only thing I would rate lower as there was not much in regards to fruit selection, but if you want a quick bagel or toast, yogurt, pastries, cereal and coffee then this will do. I have seen past reviews where this hotel was marked down for cleanliness, but it was not much of an issue for us. There was a small sticky spot on the rug, like someone spilt jam on it, but aside from that there was no problem. I actually saw one of their groundskeepers wiping down each individual leaf on one of their silk plants. The laundry area is a definite plus, so nice
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and greatly appreciate your comments, compliments, and recommendation.  Thank you for sharing why you will never be staying anywhere else when visiting Anaheim.  We will be remodeling our breakfast area this September/October and will hopefully be able to incorporate more of our guests requests.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: They have the best location to Disneyland, you are as close to the parks as the Disney hotels for 1/3 the cost and your breakfast is included. Not just a pastries but a pretty good selection. You have good places to eat nearby and not pay the Disney price. The hotel is quiet for the area and is great if you have kids and you need to walk back to the hotel for naps.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and appreciate you sharing what made us the best location for Disneyland. T hank you for your comments and compliments.  We hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: A Trip to see my Grandson in a Band Review
Summary: My grandson had a band review at Disneyland.  This hotel was right across the street.  The bed was so comfortable.  The pillows were a little too firm but I was able to find a better fit the next night(s).  I love that they serve a hot nutritious breakfast each morning.  Very nice staff!  This is the hotel we always stay at when we go to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us for your trips to Disneyland and for taking the time to write a review.  We enjoy having you stay with us and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The close proximity of the hotel to Disneyland was main reason for choosing this hotel. Easy walk to main gate. We found the hotel clean and the staff very kind and accommodating.  We would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and are very pleased you had a great vacation.  We appreciate your comments and compliments and hope you stay with us again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Super location to Disneyland, right across street. Rooms where very nice, clean and modern. The only thing was that the wifi kept dropping in our room. there are 3 level in this hotel. we got lucky and was on ground floor. hotel has several elevators. the breakfast was not that good but for free it was ok. went to dennys next door two of the 4 mornings.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and enjoyed having you stay with us.  We will be redoing the breakfast area this September and we are also addressing the Wi-Fi issues.  WE hope you will come back and see us again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Booked on the advice of our travel agent. Nothing fancy but clean with comfy beds and very friendly staff. Free breakfast which covers all the usual breakfast food types. Best feature - right across the road from the entrance to Disneyland. The closest hotel. Very, very handy. Plenty of good value restaurants  and a small convenience shop nearby. Pool, spa and good quality laundry. Safe deposit and computers available - both for free. We will be staying here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for accepting your travel agent's advice and choosing to stay with us.  We appreciate you taking the time to write a review and share why you will be staying with us again.  Disneyland has changed a great deal in 17 years and I am pleased we were able to help you enjoy the "new" experience.  We definitely look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We surprised my sister for her 50th birthday! We flew in from Honolulu where we live, and she and her family drove in from Nevada. It was a totally awesome time. The kids stayed together and the complimentary breakfasts were yummy!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you had a awesome time surprising your sister and that we were able to help in the surprise. We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and hope you will stay with us again.  Mahalo. Malama pono.

Summary Heading: Awesome hotel- super close to Disneyland!!
Summary: This hotel is located right across the street from Disneyland. This is the closes hotel to the park. The best time to book this hotel is a couple of months in advance to get a great room rate. This hotel has a very good free breakfast including hot foods like ham or sausage, potatoes, eggs, waffles. The rooms are nice and roomy. The room we had was updated and nice.  The wifi is good during the day but at night it is very slow so don't depend on it to watch movies or Netflixs. I would stay here again on my next trip to Disneyland because it is located so close to Disneyland. This is the biggest plus of staying at this hotel. Very good customer service willing to help you have a great stay in Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the accommodations, breakfast, location, and service. We enjoyed having you as our guest and hope you will stay with us again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel is nice, close, and clean. The sleeper sofa is great for kids or an extra adult. We stayed here 5 yrs ago & again this year and both experiences were pleasant. I would definitely recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us again and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed both of your stays with us and greatly appreciate your comments, compliments, and recommendation.  We hope you stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Dated Room, but Good Service and Clean Room
Summary: Right across the street from Disney. Clean room, very dated decor, internet in the back building was lacking. It may better in the front building. AC unit was a bit noisy, but functional. Our housekeeper was exceptional. Pool was small and chilly, but refreshing. Great deal for a stay at Disney.  A word to the wise: you access your room from the outside. Please do not be one of those people that honks their car horn every time they lock their car.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  I do apologize for the internet issue.  We will have this addressed.  We hope you will come and visit us again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Such an easy hotel to get to Disneyland Park.  Just walk across the street and you are there! Not a luxury hotel for sure but kid friendly and enough space. The breakfast offered started our day really well and the kids enjoyed it too.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and thank you for your comments and compliments. They are greatly appreciated.  We hope you will stay with us again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Ideal mid-range REALLY CLOSE to Disney Resort .
Summary: Family-friendly, closest accommodation to Disneyland, clean rooms, good amenities, good pool, helpful staff( I forgot my email password !!), good wifi, breakfast included ( "borrow" some snacks & fruit to take into Disneyland) & free parking if needed. Last trip, we stayed in Disneyland, but took a cheaper option this trip, with no regrets. I think the walk from Best Western Plus is actually shorter than from the Grand Californian! Be prepared..each night the Disneyland fireworks blast into the night at 9.00pm , surprising us each night! Sounds like a coup..but not, of course. If you go to the end of the balcony…you can see them..lovely.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as out guests and greatly appreciate you sharing what made this an ideal place to stay.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the staff, breakfast, amenities, and location of the hotel.  We thank you for your comments and compliments and hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Our family of 15 stayed in a total of 4 rooms. Each room was very clean and comfortable.The employees are very friendly. The hotel is right across the street from the parks. We will definitely stay here on our next Disneyland trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having your family with us and are very pleased you had a "great staying experience".  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We've stayed here three times now - a pleasant experience every time.  The rooms are clean, the pool is clean, the grounds look good, and the breakfast is good.  Plus, you can't miss with the location!  The staff is always helpful and courteous - from the front desk personnel to the maintenance people and maid service.Truly, the best Best Western I've stayed at over the years!
Manager Response: Thank your for choosing to stay with us again and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased we continue to meet your expectations with each stay and thank you for your comments and compliments.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: My sister and I brought our families to Disneyland and picked this hotel because of the convenient location. It was absolutely perfect! Clean, comfortable rooms, with enough space for all our kids. Friendly staff. A hearty FREE breakfast for the long days at the park. Fun pool with hot tub. And obviously, LOCATION. I can't tell you how much we loved being able to take a short walk into the park every morning, with an easy walk home every night. We could even take our younger kids home for a few hours mid day to nap, and it was no trouble at all. Simply can't be beat. We had the best time! Would absolutely come back again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guests and greatly appreciate you sharing what made us a fabulous hotel.  I am pleased you enjoyed the location, accommodations and staff, as well as the breakfast.  We hope you will come and stay with us again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: very convenient for our family and our trip to Disneyland,  Can't get any closer on foot. Rooms were nice and roomy and appreciated the adjoining rooms. It was nice to have the breakfast included no need to figure out what you are doing every morning for food, only drawback was at certain times it was very crowded.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We thank you for sharing what you felt made us perfect for Disneyland and hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Great Stay!!! Can I go back now please?
Summary: Hotel staff was just wonderful! Checked me early no problem. Room was clean and they provided extra pillows and blanket in closet. Everything worked in room and I honestly have no complaints. Would stay here again. Also right across the stree from where you enter parks.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and would love to have you back.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: My family stayed here to go to Disneyland and it was perfect. It was a 5min walk to disneyland, the room was a good size for my family of 9 year old triplets and a husband, the room was clean and the staff was friendly. The buffet was decent. We will definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you fro choosing to stay with us and taking the time to share what made it perfect.  We enjoyed having you as our guests and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel was directly across the street from Downtown Disney.  If you are the family that needs a break in the Disney day - this hotel is for you!  Within minutes, you can be back at your hotel, take a quick rest or swim and then return ready for the rest of the day!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and thank you for your comments and compliments. We hope you will come and stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: You cannot go past this property for location.  You are literally across the road. We walked back throughout the day and went back at night with ease.  The rooms were big and comfortable.  The only negative is the inclusive breakfast. It's horrible. But for the convenience of the location, go somewhere else for breakfast. Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We appreciate your comments and compliments and look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This is my favorite place to stay if I cannot get into the Grand Californian. I have been staying here since early 2005 and have never had a bad night.  Staff is always kind and helpful (this trip they even printed up directions to our next stop, THANK you!) The rooms are always clean and neat.
Manager Response: Thank you for making us your other home when you are in Anaheim and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoy having you stay with us and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  I am very pleased we are always able to meet your expectations and look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We visited Disneyland with family. Located directly across the street from the main entrance, the only place more convenient to Disneyland would be one of the much more expensive Disneyland hotels located within the park itself.   The hotel is very typical of Best Western. Three stories with elevators, ample parking, and comfortable beds. Free breakfast buffet with adequate variety is served at the restaurant next door. The entire hotel (including the buffet breakfast area) is adequately staffed to handle the huge number of people moving in and out, and all staff were helpful and friendly.   Considering the number of children staying here, including busloads of teenagers participating in special band productions, the rooms were not unusually noisy. In fact, considering those
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your time with us, including the breakfast, location, and staff.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Location = perfection! Easy to break away from the Disney excitement for a quick mid-day swim or to rest a bit before heading back to the park. Good size refrigerator made it easy to keep food in our room. Not fancy rooms, but definitely clean & comfortable. Spacious sink countertop was a plus. Staff is great. A great free breakfast with lots of variety. Price is the best we could find. Totally worth it!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We appreciate you sharing what made our hotel perfect for a Disney getaway.  We enjoyed having you as our guests and greatly thank you for your comments and compliments.  We hope to have you stay with us again.  Thank you and take care

Summary: Great location to Disneyland.  The Breakfast is a good, helpful staff.  I chose this hotel originally because of the location to Disneyland, plus I am a Best Western Gold Crown member.  I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the location, staff, and breakfast.  Thank you for being a Best Western Rewards member.  We appreciate your comments and compliments and hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The location of this hotel to Disneyland was perfect.  The room was kind of old but it was clean.  Our air conditioner was noisy but it worked.  Breakfast was ok but I  think it would be better with more healthier selections.  We would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guests and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Great hotel for a Disney trip
Summary: My wife and I stayed here this month for our trip to Disneyland! The hotel is right accross the street from the park and was just a quick walk. This made it great for heading to downtown disney on an off day or going back to the hotel at night to quickly change into warmer clothes before heading back in. You can also see he fireworks from the hotel.  The beds were comfortable, but the pilots were a bit hard, otherwise the staff was friendly and professional, and the room was clean.  The hotel also includes a breakfast that has fruit, bagels, pastries, waffles, meats, and other items that made it a great way to start the day before heading overbite disneyland.   Overall this place is a great location and a good price for a trip to Disneyland. I recommend staying here for your
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We appreciate you sharing what made it a great hotel for your Disney trip.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the staff, accommodations, breakfast, and location.  We thank you for your comments, compliments, and recommendation and hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Just visited Disneyland and lucky to have stayed at the Park Place Inn that is located right across the street from Disneyland .  The room was spacious and clean and it was very quiet. They also offer a free breakfast right next door at Captain Kids Buffett . The food was ok  but if I had to pay I would recommend Denny's or IHOP that are right on the same block. For dinner I would recommend Tony Roma's and try the onion bowl appetizer . All in all it was an excellent experience .👍🏻
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your visit with us and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  Thank you for sharing what made it an excellent experience.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Everyone here was extremely helpful and sweet! We enjoyed our stay and I appreciated your staff going above and beyond to make sure one of our rooms was handicap accessible. We had a wonderful vacation and this hotel definitely helped make it a great experience! Thank y'all very much!!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guests and we are very happy we could ensure you received a handicap accessible room.  Thank you for your comments and compliments which, are greatly appreciated.  We hope you will stay with us again..  Thank you and take care.

Summary: You could not get closer to the entry to Disneyland: out the front of the hotel and cross Harbor directly into the park. Superb. Breakfast:  each day at least one meat (sausage link, bacon or ham-our least favorite), eggs, endless bread/muffin choices, orange and apple juices, cereals yogurt, and really decent fresh fruit, ie even bananas, four days In a row that were always fresh and yellow and not beat up.  Room cleaned daily and to our liking-left a note about the AC and the drapes. This is a basic hotel and we would choose it again over paying twice as much for an on-property accommodation.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We stayed here so we can take our 2 year old to Disneyland.  The location is excellent to head back and take a rest in the  middle of the day.  Bed wasn't as comfortable but overall it was a great stay for what we paid.  Will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and thank you for your comments and compliments.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel is a perfect place to stay if you are visiting Disneyland since it is directly across the street from the resort. The rooms are very nice and the staff is friendly and helpful.  I would stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us including the location, accommodations, and friendliness of the staff.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel is very noisy. You can hear everything through the walls. The worse part is when someone in a room near you takes a shower, it is so very loud. We didn't sleep well at all which made for a very long day at Disneyland the next day. =(
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to share your experience.  I am very sorry you did not enjoy your stay with us.  I did notice you were on the first floor.  Perhaps you will stay with us again and we can try and find a quieter location for you so you can enjoy your stay and visit to Disneyland.  Thank you and take care

Summary: We have stayed here in the past and it is a great hotel and great location.  We have to vacation on a pretty tight budget and this is a great hotel for the value for my family of 5.  You can't beat the location being right across from the walk-way and gate into Disneyland.  It's a big plus when you need a little break and want to go back to your hotel room and rest, but then get back into the parks quickly.  The rooms are always clean and staff friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us again and taking the time to write a review.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: When visiting Disneyland, Aniheim.  The Best Western Plus Park Place is the closest motel to the attractions with the exception of the Disney Hotels that are three times the price.  Our friends stayed at the Disney Hotels and had the same distance to the attractions as we did.  Highly recommend Best Western Plus Park Place!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and greatly appreciate your recommendation.  We hope you will come stay with us again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The hotel is right across the street from Disneyland, so it is in a super convenient location. The hotel wasn't overbooked the night before we were there, so the staff let us park our car before check in so that we could just walk across the st to Disneyland!  Saved us 17dollars and time, it was very nice of them to offer this to us. The breakfast was also good--ham, egg, bagels and various pastries as well as cereal. There is a staff member who is continually refilling items so that the food doesn't run out. The hotel was also very clean and surprisingly quiet--I was expecting more traffic noise but I didn't hear it at all! Overall recommend this hotel and will be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and greatly appreciate you sharing why you would highly recommend our hotel.  Thank you for your comments, compliments, and recommendation.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I have been staying at Best Western Park Place Inn for almost two decades! It's very clean, friendly and very close to the entrance of both parks!!!!!!!!! Love the free breakfast, clean pool and spa, and staff!!!! The location is the biggest seller!!!!
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate you returning to our hotel year after year and taking the time to share what keeps bringing you back.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We have enjoyed staying at this hotel property for many years.  It has been clean, safe, and very convenient to Disneyland.   Rooms are a good size and they are large enough for a young family.   The hotel staff has been very accomodating and professional.  Rooms are satisfactory but decor could be updated.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us over the years and for taking the time to write a review.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We have started the process of updating our property.  We are currently in the planning stages for the rooms and hope to begin the room remodels in January.  We hope you will enjoy all of the improvements coming the next year and a half or so.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The location, the included breakfast, the nearby restaurants and the friendly staff make this the perfect hotel for visiting Disneyland as Disneyland's entrance is right across the street.  Walked our way into the happiest place on earth.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and sharing what makes us a "perfect hotel for Disneyland visit".  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The location to Disneyland was perfect!!!!  The air conditioner was very loud. Not enough insulation in the walls could hear the people next to and above us.  Other than that we would stay at this location again
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  Thank you for sharing your experience.  The air conditioner should not be overly loud and may have needed replaced.  If anything seems not quite right in your room, please let us know so we can address it for you.  I am pleased you would stay with us again and hope we see you soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Great hotel, very close to Disneyland
Summary: I've stayed at this hotel twice and both times have been a very good experience.  There are other hotels located close to Disneyland for less, but when it's late at night and your kid (walking) just wants to get back to the hotel, this place is right where you need it!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us again and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased your stays with us have been good experiences.  We have enjoyed having you as our guest and look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel is ideal for the Disneyland resort parks. It is only a 5 min walk and is so convenient to be able to walk back to get a jacket or whatever for the evening shows. The staff are very helpful and will arrange any transport needs, and the housekeeping team are very friendly and will accommodate any request promptly.  The queen mini suite accommodated 3 adults and 1 teenager comfortably and was clean and fit for purpose. We were on the top floor facing north and watched the fireworks every night. We have stayed at the HoJo previously but this hotel suited our needs perfectly. The breakfast is average but we wont be staying anywhere else on the next trip. Stayed 11 nights April 2015
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to share what will be bringing you back to our hotel.  We enjoyed having you stay with us and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This was the perfect hotel for our Disneyland trip.  It was great with kids since we were able to walk across the street and come back midday for a break and eat lunch.  We got a great rate and the breakfast was excellent before heading into the park.  We would definitely recommend this to others.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and greatly appreciate your comments, compliments and recommendation.  Thank you for sharing what made this hotel "great for Disney visit".  We hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: My family and I  have always enjoyed staying at Best Western and will always try to book with them whenever I can (so does everyone else because its hard to get in here). This one was great, nice people/staff, clean. Internet worked great.Great and prime location being right across from Disneyland
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with Best Western when traveling and for taking the time to share your experience at our hotel.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your time with us and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope you will be able to come back and stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Great Location! Just in front of the Disneyland Entrance
Summary: We been here for the 3rd time to visits Disneyland and so far the nearest hotel we've  stayed. The free breakfast was good, The shuttle bus for Citadel Outlet is just in front of the hotel if go on shopping.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay with us including the location and breakfast.  Your comments and compliments are appreciated and we hope you will stay with us again for your next Disneyland visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We're just finishing up a 6 night stay here and have been very happy with this hotel.   Located right at the front gate to Disneyland, the hotel is perfect for families if a rest during the day is needed. Decor may be a little dated but beds are very comfortable, bath and shower facilities are excellent, as is the super-fast (free) wifi. The complimentary breakfast is so-so but fresh fruit is offered together with toast and coffee so it does the job.   We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you have enjoyed your time with us and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  I hope if you come back to the States, you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care

Summary: This is the best hotel if your are going to Disneyland.  You walk right across the street and you are there.  5 minutes from your room to Disneyland entrance.  Very convenient.  Room are average.  Comfy, clean.  They do the job.  You're too tired after Disney to care anyways.  Free breakfast is served next door.  Buffet style.  Lots of choices for families.  Nice to grab some extra muffins and apples for a snack later on.  Pool was small, but a nice quick dip to cool off in the evenings was just perfect.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the accommodations, location and amenities offered by the hotel.  We appreciate your comments and compliments and hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Motel is directly across the street to the admission gates of Disneyland and the cross walk is literally outside the motel. Very convenient and lots of restaurants right next to motel. The rooms are good size with comfortable beds. There are no in room safes, they are located at the front desks.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  We are very pleased you enjoyed your stay and appreciation your comments and compliments. We hope you will come back and stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Great location, hotel located directly across from Disneyland.  Staff were very helpful and the room was very well kept.  The breakfast buffet was well organised.  The only downside was the room was facing the street and could be a little noisy at night.  Would highly recommend this hotel for anyone visiting Disneyland California.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and greatly appreciate your comments, compliments, and recommendation.  We hope you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel not only has great clean comfortable rooms, a nice included morning breakfast, is the closest to Disneyland, but it has the most amazing staff and general manager. My family of 5 have stayed there numerous times every year for the past 8 years and it is a great place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us when you visit Disneyland and taking the time to write a review.  We do greatly enjoy having you as our guest and look forward to your visits with us.  Your compliments are greatly appreciated.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Great suite as close as you can get to Disneyland
Summary: Nice room and very comfy beds.  Suite had pull out bed for kids and two beds for adults.  Plenty of room for stroller and all the Disney stuff purchased during stay. Breakfast at the Captain Kidd's restaurant was good.  Like any other free hot breakfast at most hotels.  Good enough to get every moving in the morning.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the accommodations, location, and amenities offered.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: My family has stayed at this hotel for many years.  Perfect location and have always had awesome service. Just wish they had queen beds and not doubles.  The continental breakfast is good, hot and cold foods and good variety. Staff is very friendly and exterior has just been remodeled.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us when you visit the area and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoy having you as our guest and greatly appreciate you sharing what keeps bringing you back.  We look forward to your next visit with us.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel is directly across the street from the shuttle drop off at Disneyland.  It is not fancy but it has everything you need.  The rooms are large and comfortable.  The only complaint I have is that the plumbing is loud.  I am a light sleeper and when someone turned on the shower in the middle of the night it startled me.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope you will come back and stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: LOCATION!!! Made our Trip with a 3yo and 1yo AMAZING.
Summary: We stayed here on Disneyland trip for my daughter's 3rd birthday. Getting right to the point, this is THE CLOSEST HOTEL TO DISNEYLAND with the exception of the Grande Californian.  It is closer even than the other Disney brand hotels.  When you depart the promenade area between the Disney and California Adventures parks, you walk about a quarter mile down a beautiful walkway, get to a crosswalk, and the hotel is on the other side.  We traveled with my 3 year and 1 year old daughters and they needed naps during the day.  The location of this hotel made it possible for us to take them for naps quickly and not spend much time or energy getting to and from our hotel.  PERFECT.  It has a descent sized pool.  Nothing fancy, but the water is cool and that's all that matters.  The
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased the convenience offered by our hotel made for an amazing trip with your 3 year old and 1 year old.  We greatly appreciate you sharing your experience and thank you for your comments, compliments and recommendation.  We hope you will come and stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel is perfect if you want to stay as close to Disneyland as possible but don't have the funds to stay at a Disneyland resort. It is literally adjacent to the road that leads into the park. There is the option to purchase Disneyland park passes and Hopper passes. The staff was helpful and the rooms were clean and comfortable.  There is a free continental breakfast offered, which was great because we filled up early before going in the park and had about an hour to wander around before the crowds arrived.  From our room on the second floor we could see the fireworks in Disneyland. There is a Cold-Stone Creamery a few businesses down (there went my diet!), and several other restaurants on Harbor Blvd.   I gave four stars, because the hotel is a generic Best Western. There
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us again and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoy having you stay with us and greatly appreciate you sharing what keeps bringing you back.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Mostly wonderful - so convenient for walking to Disneyland, Clean, good space,  breakfast was ok - lots of choices and got us ready to head into the park quickly.  King bed was great, sofa bed was pretty uncomfortable - solved it by adding a bunch of blankets on top.
Manager Response: thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  Thank you for sharing your experience.  We hope you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care

Summary: Nice hotel, room was good size stayed in a King w/ pull out bed. Beds were hard and need to be updated. Other than that it was a nice hotel right across the street from the parks which is awesome after walking all day! Breakfast was good too! would recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and are very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us.  Our management just visited a furniture factory to begin the process on updating our rooms. We hope you will come and stay with us again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Good for the money and convenience
Summary: Nice rooms, nice pool and hot tub for after all the walking in Disneyland. Plus its a hop skip and a jump away from the park. Breakfast is not recommended. Had breafast once and understood why Yelp gave it a 1.5 star rating.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us.  The rating of 1.5 on Yelp is for the Captain Kidd's Restaurant.  We lease out the second floor of the restaurant and provide our own food for our guests.  We serve Toaster Waffles, Sausage/Ham, Breakfast Potatoes, Eggs, Yoplait Yogurt, Quaker Oatmeal, Kellogg's Frosted Flakes, Cheerios, Kellogg's Raisin Bran, and Fruit Loops.  We provide Bagels and Cream Cheese, White, Wheat, and Multi Grain Toasts, Muffins, Donuts, Pastries, Bananas, Oranges, Apples, Milk, Apple and Orange Juice, Coffee, Tea, and Hot Chocolate.
