We also provide a number of condiment options.  All is provided at no charge to our guests.  We appreciate your comments and compliments and hope you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Best Western PLUS Park Place Inn - Mini Suites, Anaheim
Summary: Very nice hotel. The rooms were clean and a good size. It is literally right across the road from the Disneyland entrance. The staff are helpful and gave directions and told us which buses to catch. Breakfast was nice but a lot of people.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you stay with us and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments. I am very pleased you enjoyed the hotel accommodations, location, staff, and amenities.  We hope you will be able to stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Prime Location, Excellent Customer Service, Clean Room
Summary: I booked this hotel(motel)based on reviews as well as location.  You really can't beat the location; it's literally across the street from Disneyland's main entrance.   We arrived quite early and our room wasn't ready so the staff stored our luggage for us.  They also did the same on check out. Room checkout was at 11:00 but our shuttle service wasn't coming until 4:00.  This is good to know in the future as you can get an additional day at the parks.   The rooms were certainly adequate, nothing fancy but quite clean.  We had a king bed room with a sofa bed.  The room came with a decent sized fridge and microwave.   The rooms are all motel style, exterior doors, so I recommend a ground floor room.   Our cleaning staff was amazing.  One thing I noticed before the rooms are ready
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  I know you arrived early and waited patiently to be able to get into your room.  I truly wish we could have placed you in the room earlier.  I do remember you waiting in the lobby, ready to take a rest.   Your understanding was much appreciated.  We did enjoy having you as our guests and hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Best place to stay for Disneyland holiday
Summary: This property is by far the best location when planning your Disney vacation.  It is literally right across the street from the main gate...5 minute walk and you are in.  It has a continental breakfast but there's also an ihop next door if you want a change.  On the other side of it is a convenience store where you can buy your essentials ie: beer, wine, milk, fruit, snacks, cheaper souvenirs etc.   The rooms are spacious and comfortable and the service was great.  I will most definitely choose this BW again and recommend it to everyone I know planning a Disneyland vacation.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay including the location to the service provided.  We greatly appreciate your comments, compliments and recommendation and hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Perfect hotel for going to Disneyland. It is directly across the street. The rooms are comfortable and clean and we were able to get rooms next to our daughter and granddaughters. I would definitely recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and we were able to place you in rooms next to each other.  We greatly appreciate your comments, compliments and recommendation.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: My husband and I took our five-year old to Disneyland and we stayed at the Best Western Park Place Inn. We chose this hotel based on its location, price, and available breakfast.  Check-in was painless. There is a $10 per day charge for parking. We were given a room on the first floor on the north side of the hotel (the back side). The room doors are to the outside, but this was never an issue for us. We had a room with a sofa sleeper and a king bed. The sofa sleeper was nearest the door and window, then there was a half-wall and the king bed on the other side. The sink and separate bathroom (toilet and tub/shower) were at the back of the room. There was a decent sized closet with more hangers than I've ever seen in a hotel room, which was nice. The closet shelf had extra
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We greatly appreciate your detailed description of what you liked about your stay with us.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your time at our hotel and that we were able to meet all of your needs.  I hope you had a wonderful time at Disney with your five year old and that you will be able to come and visit us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This is a great place to stay if your going to Disneyland and/or the Convention Center.  We stay at this BW when we're in Anaheim.  The location and convenience is ideal.  The rooms are spacious.  The staff is very helpful and friendly.  The free breakfast is OK and fits the bill.  Overall, we always enjoy our stay here.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us when you are in Anaheim.  We appreciate you taking the time to write a review and share what you like about our hotel.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: You can't beat staying across from the entrance to Disneyland.  Very friendly and helpful staff.  Rooms are clean and comfortable.  Don't have to deal with shuttle buses.  Good dining is nearby if you don't want to visit Main Street Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us again and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you stay with us and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Spacious, clean rooms and are one of the closest hotels to Disneyland. They really are walking distance. We stay here often and always have great service. If your looking for luxury this is not your hotel. If you want clean, convenient and family friendly stay here!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us again and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoy having you stay with us and greatly appreciate you sharing what keeps bringing you back.  We look forward to your next visit with us.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I have stayed at many Best Westerns.  The hotel was extremely noisy and the room was musty smelling, which probably had something to do with the air conditioner because it sounded like it had was in it while it was in operation.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am sorry you did not enjoy your stay with us.  We do appreciate your comments as they will help us improve our service.  I hope you enjoyed your visit to Disneyland.  Thank you and take care

Summary: Very close to Disneyland.  Offers breakfast as early as 6:30 so you can get an early start.  Very courteous and helpful staff. The rooms are clean and the beds are comfortable and roomy.  The housecleaning will accommodate you and even work around your coming back to hotel to take a nap.  They must have someone on service all the time!  It is so nice not to have to wait for a shuttle bus to your hotel, but to just be able to walk across the street and you are there.
Manager Response: It was so nice to have you here with us again.  We enjoy having you as our guest and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share what you enjoy about our hotel.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We had a very great experience.  The service was very good.  The room was comfortable and met all of our needs.  The breakfast offered a good variety and the staff was very helpful. We will definitely stay here again,
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you had a great experience.  I appreciate you sharing what you enjoyed about your stay and look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The location of this hotel is excellent.  Just walk across the street to Disneyland.  Full hot breakfast included in the room price.  Expected it to be noisy but had a good sleep.  The pool was not that appealing.   Would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased your enjoyed your stay with us including the accommodations, location and amenities offered.  We enjoyed having you stay with us and look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I do not stay at hotels that not only over charge for rooms, but then also charge for parking. Diamond members should never pay to park. Also business hotels should always provide for a color printer in their business center, this hotel did not.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am sorry you were disappointed with your stay.  From another review and your demeanor at check in, I do realize you must have been under pressure preparing for a meeting and had limited time to search for a hotel (arrival within an hour of online reservation).   If we had been contacted by phone we could have helped alleviate some of your stress and guided you to a hotel that would have more met your needs.  We are not a business hotel as mentioned in your review.  We are a limited service, family hotel, located directly across from the main entrance of Disneyland.  We cater to families providing complimentary refrigerators, microwaves, breakfast, Wi-Fi, and business center services that would come with additional fees at many business oriented hotels.  However, a quick inquiry at the front desk could have provided you prompt assistance with your color printing needs or other assistance you may have required in preparing for your meeting.    While all of our guests do pay for parking, you do receive various other benefits for being a diamond member.  Again, I do apologize your were disappointed with your stay.  I do hope you had a successful and productive business meeting.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Great value.  Friendly and helpful staff, especially the front counter people.  Clean, comfortable bed.  Quiet considering the very busy location of the hotel. Directly across the street from Disneyland!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  Thank you for sharing what you enjoyed about your stay with us.  I hope you and your grandson had a wonderful time at Disneyland.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The hotel staff was great. Rooms were clean. Simple but clean. Motel layout with access to rooms on outside. Couple of fast food places around for before/after park eating. Hotel is closer to Disneyland main entrance than the Disneyland Resort hotel. So nice to only have a 5 minute walk to hotel especially with tired cranky children. Free breakfast was ok at best. Nothing to get excited about. Pretty standard free breakfast. I love breakfast so I may be judging harshly. But overall, this hotel is all about location. If that matters to you, you wont be disappointed.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the convenience of our location.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: room was clean and roomy. Great deal for a hotel literally across the street from disneyland. the breakfast that comes with is terrible, we found hair on the donut and the eggs looked like plastic, so i wouldn't count on that as your breakfast unless you're the type of person who will eat anything. Staff was super helpful and friendly every time i talked to them. Just remember there is only on parking spot per room, even if you have a room for 6.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guest.  I am sorry about your experience at the breakfast.  Our staff works very hard to keep the buffet area clean and refreshed, promptly removing items they notice are no longer "sanitary" due to other guests in the breakfast area.  We do offer a wide range of items from hot breakfast items (eggs. waffles, sausage/ham, potatoes) to more standard continental breakfast fare such as 3 types of toast, bagels and cream cheese, yogurt, muffins, pastries, 4 types of cereals, oatmeal and fresh fruit.  I do greatly appreciate all of your comments and compliments, which will help us to continue improving our service.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: A great place to stay when visiting Disneyland.  This hotel is literally across the street from Disneyland's Main Gate.  Our only complaint would be that the breakfast area is not accessible for the disabled or elderly.  Very steep stairs to access the breakfast area.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay with us.  Unfortunately the restaurant does not have an elevator or lift.  However, anyone who has difficulty or is unable to walk up stairs, may sit in the dining area on the first floor.  A member of the breakfast staff will be more than happy to serve you your choice of breakfast options from our complimentary breakfast.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I would recommend this hotel for any family that is visiting Disneyland!  The staff was very friendly and most accommodating!!  The room was clean and even though the hotel was undergoing some remodeling it was clean and presentable.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your time with us and thank you for sharing why you would recommend us.  Your comments and compliments are much appreciated and we hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This was a very nice place to stay while visiting Disneyland. As most people say, the location is everything. Being right across the road from Disneyland, it is so nice to take a break in the afternoon and go for a swim and relax without shuttling back to your car or hotel. For a family of 4,the rooms are very spacious too as they sleep 6. The breakfast at Captain Kidd's next door had lots of selection and about what you'd expect from a buffet for quality. Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your time with us and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope you are able to stay with us again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This place is right across the street from the main entrance to Disneyland.  Very easy check-in.  The parking lot is tight, but to be expected given the location and amount they have squeezed in to a small place.  The beds are very firm (that's why the "very good" instead of "excellent"). The room was very clean, the bathroom spotless, and no weird smells.  The air conditioning unit wasn't extra loud, which is nice compared with some places.  The walls are thin, but noise wasn't an issue.  It's Disneyland, kids, and people enjoying their holiday; there will be some noise.  We've stayed at other BW around Anaheim for past Disneyland visits (annual passholders).  This will be our first place to check for availiabilty for future visits.   We did not use the pool area,  but it
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the location, accommodations, and amenities of the hotel.  Your comments, compliments, and recommendation are greatly appreciated and we hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: ACROSS STREET FROM DISNEYLAND ENTRANCE - NOONE IS CLOSER (NOT EVEN DISNEY HOTELS)
Summary: This is my 3d visit to the Park Place Inn.  It is the closest hotel to the entrance to Disneyland.  One cannot get closer.  I would return only because of my previous visits.  This visit was not as amazing as my first two stays.  If it was not for trip advisor, I would not have known they were being refurbished.  That makes sense why the lobby had folding chairs -- but had I not checked tripadvisor, I would thought this was a cheap place.  Waiting 45 minutes from checkout until the shuttle (Disneyland Express drops off and picks up directly in front of hotel) picked us up, we waiting in the "business center" which had very comfortable chairs, but this was the only place where one could plug in their cell phones to charge.  If the 4 computers were being used, there would be
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us again and taking the time to write a review.  I am sorry you did not fully meet your expectations during recent stay.  We have completed the remodel of the lobby and are just waiting for some furnishings to arrive.  I greatly appreciate all of your comments and compliments as they will help us better serve our guests.  If there is ever a noise issue in your room, please let us know so we can address it and ensure you have a restful nights sleep.  The pool area was temporarily closed for maintenance.  I apologize you were not notified at check in.  We did enjoy having you as our guest and hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I always enjoy staying at this hotel. I have stayed many times over the years. This hotel is in a great location. Right across the street from Disneyland and California Adventure. There are plenty of choices for meals.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your visits to the area and taking the time to share what you like about our hotel.  We enjoy having you as our guest and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments. We look forward to your next visit and hope to see you soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Hotel is excellent staff are very nice, The hotel is located across the street from disneyland bus drop off. Breakfast located next door in Captain Kid. I always enjoy stay at the hotel. Rooms are clean good size TV great value.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your Disney visits.  We do appreciate you returning to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  Thank you for all of your comments and compliments.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: For a hotel outside of Disneyland park, you can't beat the location. It is directly across the street from the entryway to the both parks and Downtown Disney. It is a quick 5-10 minute walk, and you are there! This hotel is full of families with kids, so it can be a little noisy at night when people are returning from the parks. The free breakfast was decent and good enough to fill us up before heading to the parks each day. If/when we go to Disneyland again, this will be our first choice.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We enjoyed having you as our guests and look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The hotel is right across the street from the entrance to Disneyland. It is a great hotel with very nice staff. Great price for the location. The pullout bed was very hard to sleep on for an adult but my Son did fine. Breakfast was not good at all. Over all I would stay at this hotel again. In fact we are planning our next trip and will definitely be staying there again!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the location, accommodations, and staff.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: this is the closest hotel to the front entrance of disneyland.  we were able to walk to the hotel for a mid day break.  Use the pool, take a nap, then go back for the evening at disney.  If you are going to disney, then this is the place!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review. I  am very pleased you enjoyed your time here and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments. We hope you will come and stay with us again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Clean and Close to Disney, but not better than others
Summary: The hotel is clean and close to Disney, however, it isn't any better than any of the other neighboring hotels, and they are often considerably less money. There is also a $10 parking fee AND you have to be out of their lot by 3pm or they charge you $25/hour. This is NOT convenient. The whole reason we chose this hotel was the proximity to the parks. To move our car was a hassle and expensive.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am sorry we are unable to accommodate Disneyland Parking.  Our lot is not big enough to accommodate hotel guest parking (for which it is intended) as well as Disney Guest parking.  Check out is at 11 am.  As a courtesy to our guests, we do provide an additional four hours of free parking until 3 pm to allow a little extra time in the area before heading home.  However, at 3 pm, those who have checked out are asked to make room for the new or currently registered guests.  Do to our location, if we allowed our guests to stay until park closing (after check out) we would not have had parking available when you arrived.  The email confirmation sent by the hotel after we received your reservation (not made directly with the hotel) stated the parking policy so you would not be unaware.  We do appreciate your comments and compliments and hope you enjoyed Disney.  Thank you and take care

Summary: Hard to beat the location - right opposite the entrance to Disney and that is why I picked it in the first place.  Very easy to come back and rest for a few hours before going back to Disney.  However, like most of the hotels along the strip, this one looks old and dated.  The room was clean, pretty big and the wifi was free.  We didn't have a car so parking wasn't a concern but I could see that it might be.  Price for the area was pretty good.  Breakfast - blah!  We were there 4 nights and although it is nice to have breakfast included, this really wasn't great.  The eggs - yellow hockey pucks.  Yogurt and fruit were great but by the 4th morning, we needed something else.  If you aren't expecting much but a place to sleep, this place works great.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the location and accommodations.  As you saw when you stayed we are in the process of updating the hotel. Our lobby remodel is complete except for some furnishings (on order).  We have rewired the rooms for better cable offerings which will be up soon.  We will be redoing the rooms and the breakfast area.  I am sorry you did not enjoy the breakfast. We do try to offer a wide range of items for a variety each morning of your stay.  We provide, eggs, ham/sausage, toaster waffles, breakfast potatoes, yogurt, bagels and 3 types of toast, spreads such as cream cheese, butter, peanut butter, jelly (regular and sugar free).  We also offer muffins and pastries, donuts, GM Cheerios, Kellogg's Raisin Bran, Fruit Loops, and Frosted Flakes as well as Quaker Oatmeal.  Fresh Oranges, Apples and Bananas are provided as well.  Drinks include milk, coffee, tea, hot chocolate, orange and apple juice.  We do appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope you will come and stay with us again to experience and enjoy the changes we will be making over the next year or so.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We stayed here for two nights on our quick trip to Disneyland. We chose it mainly for the location-which cannot be beat. The rooms were very large and clean. Service was great. Parking is a bit scarce and it was difficult to get a spot close to our rooms. I would recommend a room closer to the back of the hotel as we were closer to the front and it was quite loud from the street noise. I would have no trouble staying here another time.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay, including the location, accommodations and service.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Great Place to Stay for Disneyland
Summary: If you are wrangling small children (under 5), this is the perfect place to crash.  It's the shortest walk to Fantasyland of any hotel (even on-property hotels).  It has a mini-fridge and microwave which will save you time and money when fueling up your kids en route to the park.  The room was very clean, and very comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments, sharing what made this a great place for your Disneyland visit.  We hope you will come and stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We loved staying here.  Walking distance to Disneyland.  Very friendly staff and clean rooms!  We didn't use the pool or hot tub because of the wrong season.  This is our 4th time to stay here and we will plan to stay again when we go to the happiest place on earth!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us again and taking the time to share a review.  I am very pleased you enjoy our hotel including the staff, rooms, and locations.  We appreciate your comments and compliments and look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Our room was clean and an easy 12 minute walk to the Ahaheim Convention Center. The staff who checked us were great, I think his name was Kevin, went out of his way to make us feel welcome. We had some problems with our door the second night and the staff came to let us in and fixed the problem the next day while we were at our conference. Great service!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your time with us and that we were able to fix your door at a convenient time for you.  Thank you for sharing your experience.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: You Cannot Be Closer to Disneyland!
Summary: We stayed here for three nights last week, admittedly because our first choice hotel could not accommodate us.  We were immediately pleased with our choice. Our room was a king mini-suite, and there was everything we could possibly need in the good-sized room:  Microwave, fridge, large flat-screen TV, excellent air-conditioning, good-sized sitting area, and comfy bed.  The interior décor was cool and welcoming--kind of a subtle Adventureland theme, with a hint of bamboo on the furniture, and paintings of lush tropical plants.  There is new granite on the vanity and new tile in the tub/shower and on the bathroom floor.  The outside of the buildings and the lobby have recently undergone a beautiful refurbishment.  Breakfast was included, but was nothing special.  And of course,
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write about your experience.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your time at our hotel and we greatly appreciate you sharing what you enjoyed.  Thank you for all of your comments and compliments.  We look forward to having you stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The hotel was fine but the breakfast was certainly nothing to write home about.  If you can over look that the nicest thing is that it is across the street from Disneyland and there is McDonalds a couple of doors down, IHop, next door and a few other places to eat near by.  We actually ordered Papa Johns one night and it was fantastic pizza. WE got a room with a hideabed in it and I think it would have felt very tight for four with four suitcases in a regular room.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am pleased you enjoyed the hotel and location.  I do understand you experienced some difficulty at breakfast for which I apologize.  This was reviewed with the staff to ensure guests do not experience this again.  We do appreciate your comments and compliments and hope you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Where do I start!  Hotel is under cable maintenance until March 20th, I saw previous reviews that said construction was done and it's not.  1 day a strange man knocked on our door wanting to redo cables (not a hotel employee which the signs in the lobby and room assure us it would be if needed to enter the room). another day vans for cleaning carpets made loud noises all day. and then another day to take the cake we left for Disney around 8am so each day we went back to take a nap and when we got back at 2:45pm housekeeping was just then cleaning our room and we were not allowed to enter and was forced to wait with 4 cranky kids in the lobby (which was also caution taped off for maintenance) <- keep in mind that it was also 90 degrees outside at this time.  Everything was broken
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I do apologize that you did not enjoy your stay with us.  The hotel construction was completed aside from some minor work that needed to be completed inside the lobby which provided no inconvenience to our guests..   We were running new cable lines during the time guests are at Disney as to pose as little inconvenience as possible.  We did state we would be requiring access for the cable workers to run the cable lines.  Notification was provided so if there was a time you preferred, you could have contacted us.   I am not sure what vans you are mentioning regarding carpet cleaning.  We do not have vans here to clean carpets, we have our own machines.  No rooms were shampooed during your stay.   Housekeeping does have 199 rooms to clean in 8 hours.  The housekeepers work right up until it is time to clock out.  If a room needs to be cleaned for a guest to come back for a rest, a request by the guest is all that is needed and we will ensure the room is ready early.  During your stay, nothing was brought to our attention regarding any issues within your room so we could address them.  I am very concerned we were not notified of your daughter requiring a visit to the emergency room.  If something in the room was causing an allergic reaction we would definitely have liked to be able to address the situation for you and not have you stay in the same room where she may continue to have reaction. If we had known you were having issues in your room, we could have offered various solutions to help ensure you enjoyed your visit to Disneyland.  I would not expect anyone to stay in a hotel room or at a hotel for five nights where they were so dissatisfied.  Please contact me at the hotel if you would like to discuss this further.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: right across from disney makes it easy to leave the park for a nap or leave the park for lunch or dinner or get a fastpass and then come back it takes 10 minutes from hotel room to SPACE MOUNTAIN!!!  i would never stay farther away  forget about the breakfast crayon water is not coffee sawdust that is coloured yellow and cut into circles are not eggs the waffles - i think they must have been frozen, thawed and frozen again  pro tip - there is yogurt and instant oatmeal - stick to that  the rooms are clean and large  the TV was not HD but they were installing HD cables when we checked out
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and appreciate you sharing your comments and compliments.  We do hope you will come back and stay with us again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Women beware, your door opens to the outside, directly to the parking lots.  People were hanging out in the parking lot drinking beer as I tried to hustle into my room.  I did not feel safe. Bed was hard as a rock and pillows were enormous - I had a neck and back ache.  There were Disney families everywhere, poor for business travel.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a hotel.  We are directly across the street from Disneyland so we are primarily a Disney Family hotel.  Since we are a family destination, safety and security are a priority.  While the doors do open to the outside, our guests and their children are very safe.  I do understand some guests feel interior corridors are safer.  However, unlike interior corridors, all of our rooms are highly visible and easily monitored, our employees are very alert, and security is present at night.  If you felt unsafe at anytime, we would have been happy to have an employee escort you to your room, relocate your room, take care of the source of disturbance, or offered to find you alternative accommodations.  I was present during your stay from the hours of 4pm to midnight and did not observe guests drinking in the parking lot or causing a disturbance.  The majority of our guests that weekend were fellow attendees of expo you were in town for.  I do apologize you were dissatisfied with your stay.  I hope you had a productive time at the Expo.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We've been staying at the Park Place Inn for over 15 years. Always been a great value and it keeps getting better. The property is constantly upgrading all areas, rooms, common areas, lobby and customer service. We always recommend the PPI to friends going to Disneyland
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty over the years and for taking the time to write a review.  We enjoy having you stay with us and greatly appreciate your comments, compliments, and recommendation.  We definitely look forward to your next visit and hope to see you soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Great place to stay, very clean and proximity to Disneyland is 2nd only to the California Grand Hotel. It's literally right at the lights. Breakfast is good enough fuel to get you through till lunch but don't expect fancy. I'm definitely going to stay again, and again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We definitely look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Second Stay same as the first
Summary: This was our second stay since last year and by chance we were booked into the same room as before. Just like before all went well and the staff members are still friendly and eager to help. Thank you for making our visits consistent and very enjoyable.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us again and taking the time to write a review.  I do remember you and your family from your last visit.  We greatly enjoy having you as our guests and look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you for your comments and compliments which are greatly appreciated.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This is a great hotel that is the very closest one to Disneyland!!  Clean rooms, helpful staff, I didn't think staying outside the park would be as good as staying inside, but this trip and hotel changed my mind a bit! You will enjoy your stay here.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review. I am very pleased we were able to change your mind regarding staying outside the park. Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we hope you will stay with us again during your next visit to Disneyland.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The Park Place Inn is very conveinent for Disney goers, not that great for a goods night sleep.  Very noisy and super this walls. Ther continental breakfast that is offered is a nice change and could be considered a full breakfast as it covers all aspects of a nice breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the location and the breakfast.  We appreciate all of your comments and compliments and hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I only stayed one night.  Access to the outdoors, large windows, and first floor rooms for single females is not acceptable.  The wifi did not work, the cable TV resolution was that of an antennae TV from the late 1970s, the bed springs were terrible, the closet door was off the track and rusty, the room and the water smelled poorly.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to share your experience.  I am sorry you did not feel safe.  We are a Disneyland Hotel and always have children on property.  We take the safety and security of our guests very seriously to ensure there are no incidents..  We did inspect your room when you checked out to make sure everything was in proper order.  Again, I am sorry your did not feel safe and did not enjoy your stay.  I hope the rest of your stay was enjoyable.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We will definitely return to stay here when we go to Disneyland next time.  Perfect location and decent rooms.  It's actually an easier walk than if you drive and park at Disneyland. The breakfast is also a plus.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and are pleased your enjoyed your stay.  We appreciate your comments and compliments and look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The beds were comfortable. Very clean. Excellent customer service. Very quiet for us, we were at the back top floor.  When it rained the walkway get splashed from the rain falling on the hand rail but that was not a big deal.  Overall everything was wonderful.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your room and the customer service.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and hope you will come back and see us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Excellent place to rest after a day of play
Summary: If you are looking for a place that is conveniently located near Disneyland or California Adventure park, this is your best bet. Right across from the main entrance can't make it better. The beds are comfortable and the room has all the basics, especially working A/C. Included is the breakfast next door that you can enjoy there, in your room or even plan ahead to take to the park. For the price, and location, we'll be traveling there again and not stay at another place. Get your park passes (just daily, no annuals) or buy gifts at the small gift shop with a discount. Straight shot from the hotel into downtown Disney as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the location, room and amenities, as well as the breakfast.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Right across the street from Disneyland entrance.  Excellent location. Would recommend for family vacations to Disneyland. Easy access to and from at a reasonable price. Can go back to room to eat to save money or when kids need a little nap
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and the location of the hotel.  We greatly appreciate your comments, compliments, and recommendation.  We hope you will be able to stay with us again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I enjoyed a 4 night stay in one of the King Bed rooms. The room was clean, the staff was friendly and you are located right at the pedestrian crosswalk to the Disneyland parks.  It takes just a couple minutes from the motel to the security gates of the parks.
Manager Response: none

Summary: You will have to move your car by 3PM on checkout day, or do what we did that morning... drive to the Disneyland Parking lot & pay $17 to park for the day - WHY would you stay at a hotel across the street from Disneyland so that you can walk to Disneyland, only to have to drive & pay to park elsewhere???? Makes no sense & the lady at the front desk was so condescending! None of the other hotels along Harbor Blvd. make you move your car - we have annual passes and have stayed at many of the other hotels near here - Ramada is our favorite, not the best, but reasonable rates, good pool, no charge for parking and you can keep your car parked there the whole day so that you can enjoy the park without additional parking fees. I will never stay at this hotel again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am sorry you were not satisfied with the parking situation.  Our parking, is hotel parking for guests during their registered stay.  Unfortunately our space is limited and we are unable to accommodate Disneyland parking as well.  Knowing some of our guests like to enjoy a little extra time at the park on their last day, we do offer a four hour courtesy extension until 3pm.  At 3pm we do need to ask guests who have checked out to move their vehicles so that the night's guests will have a place to park.  Again, I am sorry you were disappointed however, I hope you understand we are trying to accommodate all of our guests the best we can.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: the location and proximity to Disneyland is what made this trip for us.  But after being there I really enjoyed the breakfast that was included in the price of the stay. My daughter enjoyed every minute at the hotel, my mom got to relax.  The entire staff from the front desk to the launderers to the maintenance were always asking if we needed any assistance. I will be staying here again this year.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to share your experience.  I am very pleased everyone enjoyed their time with us and that you will be returning this year.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and look forward to your next stay.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This is a good hotel at a great location-across the street from Disneyland.  Skip the complimentary breakfast.  Hotel is older but well maintained.  Staff is friendly.  Parking is an extra charge but convenient and reasonably priced.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Fabulous Hotel in a Great Location
Summary: At this hotel you'll get deluxe accommodation at a low, competitive price.  The rooms are very large and the sitting area is definitely a bonus.  The decor is reminiscent of a stay on a southern island - so soothing after a long day at Disneyland which is directly across the street.  The breakfast was better than expected with bread, bagels, egg patties, roast potatoes, ham/sausages, muffins, donuts and fruit.  We will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review. I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and that we exceeded your expectations.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The hotel was acceptable for a Best Western.  But was pretty sparse for the plus designation. The breakfast "buffet" was intolerable. I would be hard pressed to imagine any way they could have done it more cheaply.    The only thing worth eating was the Froot Loops, and thats very little.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am sorry you did not enjoy the complimentary breakfast.  Items offered are Name Brand items commonly found in homes and we offer a large variety of options so you do not have to choose the same thing everyday. Items provided include Mrs. Butterworth's toaster waffles, Echo Lake Eggs, Farmland Sausage links and ham patties, breakfast potatoes, Quaker Oatmeal, General Mills Cheerios, Kelloggs Raisin Brand, Fruit Loops and Frosted Flakes, Yoplait Yogurt, Landers Bagels, Van de Camp white and wheat bread and Udi's Gluten Free Whole Grain Bread.  We offer a variety of spreads including jellies, sugar free jellies, peanut butter, butter, and cream cheese.  We also provide regular and sugar free syrups.  We offer assorted muffins and pastries, oranges, apples, and bananas,  We also provide Milk, Swiss Miss Hot Chocolate, Lipton Tea, Coffee, and Grower's Pride Orange and Apple Juice. We do appreciate your comments and compliments.  If there is something in particular you would like to be offered in the complimentary breakfast, please let us know.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I absolutely love this hotel it is my #1 preference!! For this stay we got a 2 Queen suite w/ a sofa bed suite. Upon arrival Antoinette was very nice & made me feel very welcomed! Our room was on the 3rd floor. The room was very clean, extra pillows and blankets in the closet! Enough towels, room comes w/ a fridge, and a microwave which is a plus w/kids!! But my absolute favorite about this hotel is LOCATION!!! We take the most 5 mins form this hotel to the entrance of Disneyland! Never fails to meet my expectations. Already have my next reservation for June 😁
Manager Response: Thank you for making us your preferred hotel when visiting Disneyland and for taking the time to write a review.  We enjoy having you stay with us and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We look forward to seeing you again in June.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: For anyone going to Disneyland for any length of stay, this hotel is by far the best for overall location and price.  The Disneyland Resort is right across the street-you can't get any closer than that unless you are staying at one of the Disneyland hotels which are on property.  Our room was ready when we arrived-the only issue we had was the control valve for the shower/tub.  All of the staff we encountered were very friendly and helpful-we would not hesitate to stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having your here and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Closest to Disney entrance, Great Location, very thin walls
Summary: Big plus being so close to the entrance to Disneyland.  Loved that part.  The hotel is average for the area and the staff was very nice.  There was a refrigerator and microwave in the room but NO safe.  They do offer a some free safe deposit boxes at the front desk on a first come first serve but they are on the smaller size.  The wifi is free and actually is fairly fast.   There are a lot of good places to eat around within a very short distance and the prices seemed to be fair for the type of restaurants.  I was surprised they didn't add for the tourist factor.  Speaking of food, we received the free breakfast from the hotel that is provided by restaurant next to it called Captain Kids Buffet.  This was not very impressive.  Expect a flat small waffle, flat oval egg hard, ham
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We greatly appreciate all of your comments and compliments.  We will be upgrading the breakfast room and the hotel rooms within the year.  We are currently in the process of rewiring the rooms for updated TV service.  I do apologize for any miscommunication regarding the room rate.  We do offer a lower rate on the room when our parking is full to compensate for guests who still wish to stay with us but are required to park offsite.  I am not sure why you were put in at this rate when your reservation was made so far in advance.  I do see that due to the confusion, we did not increase your rate and only charged you the $10 per night for parking.   Again thank you for your comments and compliments.  We do hope you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The location of this hotel is 2nd to none when traveling to Disneyland!  The staff is friendly and helpful, breakfast is plentiful with lots of choices.  The rooms are pretty basic and a little on the older side, however they are clean and comfortable.  The price is excellent considering the location - it has been quiet during all of our visits - this is by far our favorite place to stay for our Disneyland vacations!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your visits to Disneyland and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoy having you stay with us and greatly appreciate you sharing what keeps bringing you back to our hotel..  We look forward to your next stay with us.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Grate place to stay if your going to Disneyland
Summary: Super nice people that work the front desk.  They serve a pretty good breakfast and that saves money when your going to disneyland.  Great  location right across the street from Disneyland.  I don't this there is a closer hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing what made us a great place to stay.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your time with us and hope you will come back and see us again soon.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Nice, clean property.  The closest to the park entrance.  Friendly staff.  Full complimentary breakfast. Wifi.  But right on Harbor Blvd, so get a room as far back from the street as possible (NOT x76 through x80).
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and are very pleased you enjoyed your stay.  We do hope you will come back and see us again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I spent two nights at the hotel on a weekend trip to the Antelope Valley. I found the room to be quite comfortable overall. The desk chair could have been a bit better and actually hurt to sit in. Everything else including the included breakfast was topnotch. I particularly enjoyed the access to the AV mall and restaurants.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review. I  am very pleased you enjoyed your time with us and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope you will come back and stay with us again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I've stayed here over 20 years and I memorized the address because it has always been that close to Disneyland. By the time you wait for your shuttle to show up, I'm already  in my room  kicking my shoes off from walking all day at Disney. My family and I have been here   3 times in the past year.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us over the past 20 years and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoy having you spend your Disney visits with us and look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel location is very convenient. Right across the street from Disneyland and close to freeways. Breakfast could be better by changing it up. Offers the same items everyday and after 6 days it gets old:( Eggs are awful! Rooms are large and clean. No problems during our stay. Staff was very friendly!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We are very pleased you enjoyed your stay and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We do try to offer a wide variety of foods, much more than the typical home has available to choose from on a daily basis.  We do offer Eggs, Sausage and Ham rotated, Breakfast potatoes, Waffles, Yogurt, Bagels, White, Wheat and Whole Grain Breads, a variety of spread options, Muffin and Danish varieties, 4 different cereal options, Quaker Oatmeal varieties, 3 different fresh fruits, Coffee, milk, hot chocolate, and apple and orange juice.  Please feel free to mix and match making breakfast sandwiches with the bagels/bread and eggs and ham.  Add bananas to the Cheerios or oatmeal, Yogurt, muffin and a fresh fruit one day, cereal another, waffles with a  breakfast meat and potatoes as another option.  We hope we will see you again soon and you can take full advantage of the breakfast options.  If there is something in particular you are looking for, please let us know.  Again thank you for your comments and compliments.  We do hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Easy access to the parks - literally right across the street! Breakfast is ok - continental breakfast, but it's fine for an early start to the day. location is great for visits to the parks. pools were good too. There are other hotels that don't charge for parking (this one charges $10/night) but given the location of the hotel, I would rather pay more than to be farther away from the parks.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you stay with us and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Friendly no frills hotel for a Disneyland trip.  We were given a great room facing D Land.  I love the fan air conditioner because it gives white noise to sleep better.  There is free breakfast but it's not special in any way, just get a donut and a juice and head to D Land!  Comfortable beds, nice pillows, good value..we always stay here.  It's popular because it's so close to the park so book early.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us for your Disneyland trips and taking the time to write a review. W e enjoy having you stay with us and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We do offer a variety of name brand items at breakfast that are found in many homes such as Farmland meats, Mrs. Butterworth's Waffles, Kellogg's and General Mills Cereals, Quaker Instant Oatmeal, Van de Camp Breads, Landers Bagels, Echo Lake Eggs and Yoplait Yogurt. We also offer a variety of other options such as breakfast potatoes, fresh oranges, apples, and bananas, pastries, muffins, various spreads, milk, Swiss Miss Hot Chocolate, Lipton Tea, and Grower's Pride Orange and Apple Juice.  For a little more sustenance or quick meal on the go, feel free to make a breakfast sandwich with the bagels or bread and the egg and ham patties.  Thank you again for staying with us and taking the time to write a review. We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Stayed 5 days at end of January/early February to visit Disneyland and spend time with USA friends.  Price was good value for the great location as opposite entrance to Disneyland, so easy to get back and forth especially with children.  Breakfast OK, but really good that it has fresh fruit and yoghurt as option to hot selection which was not to my taste.  Rooms good size with lounge/sitting area, fridges and microwave.  Laundry also very useful.  Staff really nice and helpful.  Coffee shop/convenience store next door which makes when asked Australian style lattes, with milk not boiled to "S.....".  Good selection of restaurants within walking distance.  Recommend trying Johnny Rockets burgers in plaza.  Only downside was they are currently rennovating the reception area so ask
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guests and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We are done with the work in the lobby.  We are just waiting for the furniture and greenery to arrive. So, the noisy aspect is gone.  The rooms are scheduled to be updated within a year as well as the breakfast area.  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay and hope you will be able to visit us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This Disney hotel offers great access to Disneyland and a free hot breakfast. It is out favorite hotel to stay at when visiting Disneyland! It is also close to a drug store in case you forgot any items.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us when you visit Disneyland. We appreciate you taking the time to write a review and share what brings you back to our hotel.  We enjoy having you as our guests and look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: While the location is great for Disneyland, this hotel is nothing more than a low grade motor inn.  There are no services.  As a hotel in a major resort location, no food and beverage available after a long day at the park.  No exercise facility.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am sorry we did not meet your expectations.  We are a limited service property (as are majority of our neighbors) which is denoted in our AAA rating.  The Disneyland Area does not operate on a 24 hour resort schedule and late night dining options are limited unless you are staying in a full service hotel.  There are pizza and Chinese restaurants open that will deliver late.  There is an IHop next door that is open 24 hours and offers take out, and a pizza restaurant two doors down open until 1am, also offering take out.  Our sister property does allow our guests to use their fitness room and there is a 24 hour fitness within a 10 minute walk that offers day passes.  All this information should have been provided to you if you had inquired with us, and I am sorry if it was not.  Again I am sorry we did not meet your expectations.  We do hope you will consider staying with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I spent 5 days at this hotel in late January of 2015 and was both loved and didn't particularly like the hotel. The location of the hotel couldn't be better. The bus stop and walk to Disneyland is literally just across the street. It took about 5 minutes to be in Downtown Disney from the hotel. The price wasn't too bad, being as it had an outdoor pool and breakfast included. The design of the building was not particularly attractive. All doors led outside onto balconies and the exterior was nothing to talk about. The lobby was under renovations so their lobby was located in one of the hotel rooms on the main floor. Hotel guests were also required to pay for their overnight parking. The rooms themselves were clean, the decor wasn't too outdated, the bathrooms were fine. However,
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review. We do appreciate all of your comments, compliments and suggestions.  We do try to provide a breakfast to appeal to as many guests as possible.  Items featured are name brand items such as Mrs. Butterworth's Toaster Waffles, Echo Lake Eggs, Farmland Ham and Sausage links, breakfast potatoes, General Mills and Kellogg's cereals, Quaker Instant Oatmeal, Yoplait Yogurt, Landers Bagels, Van de Camp White and Wheat Bread and Udi's Whole Grain Gluten Free bread as well as various muffins and pastries. In addition we provide a variety of spreads, regular and sugar free syrups and jellies.  We also provide fresh oranges, apples, bananas and Lipton Tea, Swiss Miss Hot Chocolate, Milk, and Grower's Pride Orange and Apple Juice.  Again we appreciate your comments  We do hope you will come back and stay with us again.  Thank you and take care

Summary Heading: Great option even if you skip their breakfast
Summary: Recently renovated clean, comfortable rooms. Friendly, helpful staff. The easiest location for Disneyland & California Adventure. You literally just cross the street & you're at the front gates.  The free breakfast is only ok & the dining room that you have to eat in leaves something to be desired & is crowded. Ihop & several other options are steps away.  Even w/o the breakfast this hotel is a very good value.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope you will stay with us again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Cost was higher than we were told
Summary: When I made the reservations they told me the cost for the 3 rooms we needed would be 125 per night per room.  When we checked out the true cost was 156 per night per room.  We enjoyed out stay, but felt they had been dishonest.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review. I  am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and hope you will return.  I am sorry you were disappointed with the rates.  The 125.10 was the rate before taxes.  Your reservations were made through the Best Western Central Reservations line.  They are required to give you the total with estimated taxes.  They also sent you an email confirmation confirming the totals.  In addition we sent an email confirmation that provided the rate and tax breakdown as well as the parking fee. Again, thank you for staying with us and I do hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care

Summary: This is the perfect location for a visit to Disneyland.  This is our place of choice when going to Disneyland.  The staff is very professional and helpful.  Parking is reasonable.  The hotel is well lit.  The buffet breakfast will certainly get you started for the day
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us for your Disneyland visits and taking the time to share what brings you back.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated.  We do enjoy having you as our guests and look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: When at Disney, this is where we stay
Summary: This is the second time we've stayed here, and we've decided that this is where we will always stay when visiting Disney.  Why? LOCATION.  We like things easy (the less to fuss about, the better). We have a five and two year old. They need to nap.  We love that we can take an easy walk back to the hotel to take a quick food/nap/rest break before returning back to the parks for the afternoon/evening.  We also like that we don't have to worry about breakfast; just wake up, grab a quick bite, then walk across the street to the parks. As for the rooms? Well let's face it, it's a Best Western, not the Four Seasons.  Rooms are clean, beds are comfortable, mini fridge and micro were put to use, coffee maker with coffee and tea...it's all good.  So yes, when at Disney, this is where we
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us again and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoy having you as our guests and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  Thank you for sharing what brings you back to our hotel.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Great location, can't get any better unless you're in one of the Disney Hotels.  Renovation to the front lobby were going on when I arrived but by the end it was open and looked bright and clean.  Friendly Staff.  Would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  I am very pleased you liked the appearance of the new lobby.  We are still waiting on a couple of items and hope you will be able to come back soon and see the final product.    Thank you and take care.

Summary: My wife and I stayed here two nights while going to Disneyland. The Location of this motel is as close as two of the three park hotels and for half the price. They have parking for your vehicle but one thing you should understand is on the day of check out you car has to move by check out time. That can be an issue if your planning on a day at the park on that day. I asked if they could do anything for me and they were gracious enough to let me leave it there because they were not full. if they would have been they told me they would not have been able to help me. The rooms at average and I had requested one in a quiet location and they accommodated my request by putting us far away from the pool area. The hotel is directly across the street from the bus entrance to the park. An
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guests and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope you will come back and visit again soon.  Thank you and take care

Summary: The best part of this hotel is the fact that it's the closest to Disneyland. The rooms are adequate. They were clean but in need of some updating. The had just finished a lobby remodel during our stay, which looked great,  so hopefully they'll continue with the rest of the property and make itself really stand out. If you're looking for a clean, close place to disneyland, this fits the bill.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guests and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We will be updating the breakfast area and the rooms, with the work anticipated to be completed within the year.  Thank you again and we hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Motel style accommodation, nothing special, but you can't beat it's location - across the road from the main entrance to the parks.  The rooms are a good size and mini suites can sleep up 6 adults!  Breakfast is included and is a great start to the day.  Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guests and we are pleased you would stay with us again.  Thank you for your comments and compliments, which are greatly appreciated. We hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Wonderful atmosphere, our plans were disneyland each stay!  Close to Disneyland . walk-in!  Hotel had the comforts of parking, wonderful rooms and breakfast buffet!  Hotel was under construction it did not interefere with our plans!  I only have one complaint I dont feel the hotel has sufficient parking to accomodate their patrons.  Each trip we were told we might have to stay two blocks down the street and pay much more for parking than what was offered at this hotel.  We dont quite understand when we booked weeks in advance why parking at their hotel could noit be accomodated!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stays with us and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We do unfortunately have limited parking.  Once our reservations have reached the number of available parking spaces, we do restrict reservations to no parking available.  We have become more strict on this because we no longer have access to convenient overflow options.  Thank you again for staying with us and we hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The hotel is great with no complaints and the location can not be beat. The breakfast is nothing exceptional but as good as most any other hotel buffet breakfast. If you want a superb breakfast go to some other restaurant but it was fine for us. The room was neat and clean and I enjoyed the stay. You go to this hotel because it was close to Disneyland. If you are going to go to Disneyland and don't want all the fluff of a hotel , like character breakfasts or a spa, this is the place.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I know of only one or two other hotels  this close to both parks and not being a resort. I spent many hours researching hotels and reading reviews. Good hint - it's part of a chain which is a great thing.  We found a room to accommodate four adults and one teenager. Clean. Free breakfast could feed anyone, and I mean anyone! We certainly did not leave hungry. It wasn't noisy. Decent pool and hot tub, but we were too exhausted from the park to enjoy it.  I picked this place mostly because of location. If you need your little one to go back and take  a nap, it's so close that it is ideal. We even went back to rest for awhile ourselves.  For towels, the rule is to leave a towel hanging over the shower and they won't change them. My son's mistake. No biggie. We got more with no
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guests and are very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us.  Thank you for sharing what you like about your stay and all of your comments and compliments.  We do hope you will be able to come and stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Our family of five stayed here and found the location fantastic.  This is right on the intersection to Disneyland and if you stay outside the park, this is as close as you can get.  The staff was helpful and friendly and the breakfast was fine, albeit very American (but, as they (sort of) say,  when in America do as Americans do).  The room was clean and comfortable and the price was really good.  They even reduced the price when we checked in without us asking for a reduction.  This is not a five star hotel but it suited our needs perfectly.  We had a sick child one day and he came back to the hotel for a little break and a swim while some of us continued on at Disneyland/DCA.  That break wouldn't have been so easy had we been staying further away.  If we ever returned to
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us.  We enjoyed having you as our guests and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  I am sorry a child was sick but that the location made it easy to let him take a break and rest.  We do hope you are able to visit Disneyland and stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: If you are looking for a place to stay while going to Disneyland, this is THE place. It is across the street from the main entrance to both Disneyland and Disney California Adventure. The rooms are excellent. The staff is fantastic. The breakfast is wonderful -- definitely something for everyone. We've been coming to Disneyland fairly regularly for over 10 years. We've tried other locations, but always come back. Stay here. You won't be sorry.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us over the years for your visits to Disneyland.  We greatly enjoy having you as our guests and appreciate you sharing what keeps bring your back.  We look forward to your next visit and hope it is soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Expectations were low when we arrived at the BW as the hotel was undergoing maintenance and we are accustomed to staying in 5star resorts when we travel. We arrived well before check in and were greeted by the lovely front office staff before heading off for a day at Disneyland. This BW is in an extremely convenient location - just across the road from the main entrance to the park!!! Around midday we were contacted by the hotel to tell us that our room was ready for us (much earlier than check in time!) when we got back from the park. We got back to the hotel around 10pm and were again surprised to find that the front office was still busy with staff who helped us to our room. We were also not expecting breakfast to be included but were surprised when we were told it was. I was
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased we exceeded your expectations!  Thank you for sharing what made your stay a pleasant surprise and what will be bringing you back.  We definitely look forward to having you stay with us again.  We greatly appreciate your comments and hope to see you soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I loved being right across the street from Disneyland and California Adventure!!! We had a group of 7 people in 2 rooms, and there was plenty of space for everyone. The breakfast options were varied, and even a person sensitive to Gluten found something to eat.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay including the accommodations and breakfast.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel a few times and it is excellent each visit.  The front staff is helpful and nice.   It is walking distance to the parks.  The rooms are very clean and nice and the beds are comfortable.  The breakfast is good and has a big variety of foods.  This is our favorite place to stay each time we go to Disneyland!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your visits to Disneyland and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoy having you stay with us and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We look forward to your next visit and hope to see you soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: When you are as close as this hotel is to the parks and no shuttle is needed, it really makes the trip easier! Rooms are spacious & clean. Our room was in the very rear of the hotel so it was extra quiet, which was great too. The food at breakfast was a bit bland...but it was appreciated nonetheless. Again, it's the location that makes this place GREAT!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We stay at the Park Place Inn 6 to 8 times a year.  It's located across the street from the main entrance to Disneyland. The staff, from front desk to housekeeping, is always extremely helpful.  The hotel is well maintained inside and out and continues to improve constantly.  We have recommended PPI to several friends and they experience the same satisfaction time after tlime.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us for your Disneyland visits and taking the time to write a review.  We do enjoy having you as our guests and greatly appreciate your comments, compliments, and recommendation to friends.  We are looking forward to your March visit.  We'll see you soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel is by far the best in location and in price if you're planning a stay at Disneyland!  Its about a 5 min walking distance to the park, and you can buy tickets at the front desk.  However the hotel is located very close to the street and the sound of cars honking and people talking can get annoying when you're trying to sleep.  Try to stay at the far end of this hotel on the highest floor!  My only complaint was the breakfast buffet at the neighboring restaurant was horrible, everything tasted awful!  We went to Denny's down the street for our breakfast, which was cheaper also.  I will only stay at this hotel from now on!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  I am sorry you did not like the breakfast.  However, it does not sound like you went to the breakfast provided by the hotel.  Our breakfast is served at Captain Kidd's, but on the second floor and is complimentary.  I am very happy to read that we will be your hotel of choice for visits to Disneyland.  We do look forward to your next visit and hope to see you soon.  Thank you and take care

Summary: Great place to stay, the staff goes way out of their way to make sure your happy and any problems corrected.  We would go back there but on this trip, they were putting in a new lobby/front desk so we had a lot of noise but that will be done soon, otherwise I would have said excellent.  One minor problem, reception in room on cells phones was horrible, had to step outside to talk but again, that could be our carrier, Sprint.  I would stay here again
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again next year or sooner if you are in the area.  We will have our lobby done in a week and will be redoing the rooms later this year.  I hope you will enjoy the changes if you stay with us for next year's convention.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This is the second year I have stayed here to attend the NAMM convention. Rooms are good sized and clean. Beds are comfortable. Staff is accommodating and professional. Good value. Easy 15 minute walk to the convention center. Last year they were redoing the parking lot, this year renovating the lobby. A slight inconvenience. Only downside difference from last year; the buffet breakfast included was markedly worse in quality. Certainly still better than some others. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us again and taking the time to write a review.  I am sorry you did not enjoy the complimentary breakfast this year.  We have added many new items trying to a appeal to more of our guests.  Please let us know if you were looking for something in particular or if it was in the preparation.  All items served besides the fresh pastries and breads are name brand items.  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay and hope we will see you again for next year's NAMM.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We chose this hotel because it was a Best Western Plus, it had a free breakfast, had mini suites with a fold out coach, and was right across the street from the main entrance to Disneyland.  It was clean, had decent beds, had plenty of room for a family of 3 adults and 1 child. The pillows were way too puffy and there were no other choices which was frustrating.  The breakfast was just OK but some of us opted for the packaged oatmeal and yogurt. It was still better than some free breakfasts at other hotels in the area.. It was convenient and there was a pretty good variety. I prefer the waffles you make yourself to the pre-made offering.
