There was good pizza down the street at pizza press and a McDonald's very close as well.  If this property wasn't going through a remodel and
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write such a detailed review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the hotel, location, and amenities.  I do apologize if the procedure for exiting after extending your parking wasn't explained clearly.  We do greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Got better than expected service, pleasant staff and comfortable room. I was able to check in earlier than normal and thus able to put my belongings in the room while at a convention. Was also able to leave my vehicle so avoided parking at my convention. Great staff!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased we exceeded your expectations and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  I hope we will see you again next year for NAMM or maybe sooner.    Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: First time here...but won't be last
Summary: My wife and I booked this hotel based on the closeness to Disneyland. This hotel is probably the closest hotel to the entrance gate of Disneyland. For about a third of the cost of the Disneyland Hotel, this is by far an excellent value. The room was clean (important!) and well furnished. We were there for the half-marathon weekend, and walking to the start of the race couldn't have been easier. The free breakfast is so-so, but passable.   I think the question if we would return has been answered...already booked for return visit for the next Disneyland run event.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your time with us and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We look forward to seeing you in May for the Tinker Bell Marathon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We stayed here for our honeymoon in November and really enjoyed our stay. We stayed on the third level towards the middle/back. I read mixed reviews before staying here, but I am so glad I sticked with it. Housekeeping was great, the rooms were clean and there was plenty of room for all our things. The spa was awesome and often we had it to ourselves. The only thing that I didn't like were kids who ran up and down outside the windows at 730-8am, I guess they are just excited for Disneyland, but I am on holidays and would have liked a sleep in after long days in the park the day before. Overall, thoroughly enjoyed my stay and loved how close it was to the parks.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  Congratulations and may you have a long and happy life together.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope you will be able to come back and see us again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We have stayed at this location 3 times and don't even consider another location because of the closeness to the gates of DisneyLand.  Plus, it is very clean and the breakfast is great!  The staff is very accomodating and try to honor our requests as best they can.
Manager Response: We thank you for choosing to stay with us for your visits to Disneyland and sharing what keeps bringing you back.  We enjoy having you as our guest and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I was very happy with my stay at Best Western Plus Main Gate.  We flew in from Australia and landed at 6.30am.  After a 12 hour flight and a few hours battling customs and LA traffic we were exhausted when we arrived at the hotel at 9am.  The manager at the hotel was amazing and gave us a room at 9am!  I never imagined we would be able to check in so early.  Check out wasn't even until 11 and we already had a room at 9!  Amazing!  The room was a good size, the bed was comfy, but as others have mentioned the pillows were a little hard.  This is a family hotel, so there can be a bit of noise at night when people are coming home, but that is to be expected at any Disneyland hotel.  If we ever get back to Disneyland (and I hope we do) this will be my first choice  :)
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review. I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and that we were able to check you in early.  We are not always able to do so depending on availability.  We thank you for sharing what made us a "great hotel" and hope you do get the chance to stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I LOVED how close we were to the parks, and the breakfast was awesome.  Rooms were spacious, and the hotel staff was friendly. We can't wait to stay here again!  Bonus was having a frig and microwave in the room as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and appreciate you sharing why we were an "excellent place to stay".  We hope you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I was in Anaheim for a race at Disney. It was just me and I knew I would be spending minimal time at the hotel. The Best Western Park Place fit the bill. It was very reasonably priced and the location was ideal, as I just had to walk across the street to be at Disneyland. Many of the hotels in the area claim to be "across the street from Disneyland" but unless you are across the street from the entrance, like this one is, you still have a long walk. The room was clean and well lit. I had adequate closet space and a useful fridge and microwave. The shower was somewhat puzzling; it didn't seem to function like any shower I had encountered. I finally had to call the front desk for assistance and he told me I was not the first to ask for help in this regard. The bed was a little on
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and are very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us.  I hope you had a great Marathon weekend.  We appreciate your comments and compliments and hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The hotel was really close to Disneyland, perfect to walk! The room was clean and nice. The room was also quiet and in a great location. We didn't need to contact the front desk with any concerns. We didn't use the pool or hot tub but they looked nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  We are very pleased you enjoyed our location and accommodations.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The hotel location was perfect for our trip to Disneyland & CA adventure.  The room was a nice size, and clean.  The breakfast buffet had a good amount of options.  The bed was firm and the pillows were a little uncomfortable.  It is a family place, so expect noise at night.  I will come back next time we do a Disney trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guests and appreciate your comments and compliments. We look forward to seeing you during your next visit to Disneyland.  Thank you and take care

Summary Heading: Best Western Plus Park Place Inn
Summary: Very good location for Disney.  Parking available but have to pay extra.  Rooms clean and comfortable.  Offered value for money.  Breakfast in Captain Kids next door.  Self service.  Plentiful supplies of food but sometimes finding space for whole family to sit was hard and made it a bit hard to sit together. Reception was in a converted room - seems they are refurbishing main reception.  Staff helpful and welcoming but reception space was a bit cramped.  Had Disney tickets couriered to motel prior to our visit, they kept them safe and were happy to do this for us.  Would recommend venue to others.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We are refurbishing the reception area and should be done in a couple of weeks.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope you will be able to come and stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: ee visit the Magic Kingdom 5-7 times per year and this is our number one choice to stay each time. While the location is perfect, the entire facility is superbly managed. The staff is professional and courteous, and their can do attitude lets you know that they value customers. The rooms are very large and comfortable. The house keeping staff does an excellent job of keeping the rooms in immaculate condition. But the biggest change has been a HUGE upgrade in their free wifi. It is now super fast and easy to connect. We look forward to being here again in May!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us once again and taking the time to share what keeps bringing you back to our hotel.  We enjoy having you as our guests and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the upgrade to the internet.  This year will bring about a few changes including a new lobby and towards the end of the year, updated rooms.  Thank you again.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Had a great stay.  It was the perfect place to stay for a Disneyland race weekend -- we were able to sleep later than most runners, walk easily to the start area, and walk back after we were done.  We went right to IHOP for breakfast after each race -- the hotel has its own continental breakfast as well.  For dinner, there are a number of restaurants in walking distance, including a fantastic pizza place (The Pizza Press).  I highly recommend this place for people looking for a great value in a great location.  It was perfect for our group of 2 couples that left our kids at home.  If we had our kids, I think some other hotels (like the Howard Johnson) might be better because of the pools.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I hope you enjoyed the run and had a great race.  We are very pleased you enjoyed our hotel and location and appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: You can't beat the incredible location. Across the street from emergence to Disneyland & Disney California! Very clean & comfortable rooms. The lobby is warm & inviting with a little gift shop. The hot breakfast is served at the restaurant next door, buffet style. We will certainly be staying there again next time we're in town.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us, including the rooms, breakfast and lobby.  We are actually in the process of renovating our lobby, so it will be even more warm and inviting and the gift shop will be larger.  I hope you are able to come back soon and see the changes.  Thank you for your comments and compliments. They are greatly appreciated.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Very good for travelling with small kids going to Disneyland.  Right across the street so when they got tired we could take a break then go back after naps!  Not fancy but the beds where great, rooms clean and staff where very helpful.  Breakfast was adequate for young kids in a hurry to eat and go go go.  We would stay again because the location was so awesome.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your time with us and appreciate your comments and compliments. We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care

Summary: We've stayed at this resort twice and were pleased both times. The staff is courteous and helpful, the rooms are very comfortable, and the proximity to Disneyland is exceptional! We chose this hotel over a Disney hotel this year. We are a family of seven and we stayed very comfortably in adjoining rooms. Very nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us again and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoy having you stay with us and appreciate your comments and compliments. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Across the road from Disney Land, big rooms, plenty of wardrobe space, pool, laundry, free WIFI, friendly staff, great breakfast included, requested the room over looking Disney Land and got it! Don't bother looking for other accommodation... you won't find better...... seriously!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guests and are very pleased we were able to meet your needs and requests.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Wonderful stay! Not a super nice hotel, but it had everything we needed. Bed was comfortable. Check in was super fast, as was check out! Used Super Shuttle from LAX, and they were fine. Cannot beat the location for Disneyland!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Could not have asked for a better location for our family's trip to Disneyland.  I was hesitant to stay here since it was an old hotel, but it was comfortable, clean, close and the staff was considerate.  We will stay here again on any upcoming Disneyland trip because of the location.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and I am very pleased to hear we alleviated your concerns.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Chose to stay here because of location to Disneyland.   Room was clean, in good shape and inoffensively decorated. Room was very small and noisey with both traffic on the concrete walkway and construction. Registration was in a cramped, repurposed hotel room that had guests bumping into each other and blocking the corridor. Parking was crowded with many spots blocked with construction bins.  There were no signs or lines to indicate that the lot's exit was on the other side of the building.  Multiple attempts to get assistance from staff regarding difficulties in exiting the lot were met with unhelpful confusion. On entering the  room one was confronted with a message that construction workers could enter the room at any time between 9-5.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I do apologize for not meeting your expectations during your recent visit.  We did have some noise the first week of construction due to the demolition work in the lobby. That is now complete and the construction bin has been removed.  We do have one way directional signs indicating which way to travel before the parking entry gates and after. I do apologize for any confusion or inconvenience experienced.  We did have one date where separate workers (not the construction workers) would need to enter the rooms to rewire for the updated cable service we are providing to our guests to bring better quality and more channel choices.  I understand and apologize for any inconvenience or frustration you experienced and hope you will come back to enjoy all the upgrades we are making to better serve our guests.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: worth the money, comfort and convenient
Summary: VERY good for family. CONVENIENT TO DISNEYLAND. GOOD QUALITY TOWELS AND COMFORTABLE BED. VERY SPACIOUS. HELPFUL FRONTDESK. WILL RECOMMED TO EVERYBODY I KNOW. The over all experience is much better than the very luxury hotel I stayed later in Hollywood. The appearance of the hotel is not fancy. but when you stay there, you will feel at home.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and sharing why you will recommend us to everyone you know.  We hope you will come and stay with us again.  If you were with us after January 5th, you will know that we are remodeling our lobby.  By the end of the year our hotel rooms will be updated as well.  We hope you will come and experience the new improvements and enjoy your stay even that much more.  Again thank you for your comments and compliments.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Normally good, but not so much under construction
Summary: I have to say that this hotel is one we have stayed at quite a bit.  Breakfast is barely adequate, but adequate.  I must say that I like not having to take the dirty stairs up the back and can come in the front now.  The lobby is missing and there has always been noise, but it just tripled with the construction.  We had a rude clerk named Jackie who seemed like we were bothering her by checking in.  I have read poor reviews of this hotel, but have in the past had friendly courteous service.  I have stayed in every hotel on Harbor and in the park in the last 30 years.  We really only choose this hotel because of its proximity to Disneyland.  There are others that are nicer, but my wife has a bad knee almost to the point of disability so we have been staying here more.  We won't
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I do apologize for your experience with us and that we did not meet your expectations.  You checked in the day we were relocating our lobby to a guest room and were trying to organize and settle in.  I really do not believe that Jackie was trying to be rude, but merely a little disoriented as we were trying to check guests in while organizing at the same time.  I also apologize for the noise from the construction.  It was limited to the hours of 8 am to 5 pm to minimize any impact to our guests and was confined to the interior of the lobby.  I do hope you will return and enjoy the improvements we are making to better serve our guests.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We go to Disneyland about 10 times a year.  I have stayed at this hotel several times, and will definitely stay again.  They were renovating the lobby during our stay, but we were not disturbed in the least. They have improved the quality of the free breakfast since our last stay.  It was pretty darn good.   Sometimes we stay somewhere else to try to save a few bucks, but the savings is always outweighed by the hassle of having to take the tram to the parking structure and then drive to the "cheaper" hotel.  I love being steps away from the Disneyland gates.  It's totally worth it.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us again and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the improvements we made to the breakfast and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We enjoy having you as our guest and look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Have stayed here many times because of the location, it smells funky.
Summary: Location is awesome, it's right across from the Maingate! Breakfast is included and not bad, hard boiled eggs, cereal, milk, juice, sweet treats. The rooms are dark and stinky I think it's the carpets and air conditioning.  Small pool.  Price is reasonable if I can't get into my 3 other fav good Neighbour hotels across from the park I will stay here, my husband won't stay here.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review.  I do hope you will come in and see us again.  Our breakfast has changed considerably over the last couple years from what you have described.  If you experience any kind of odd odor in a room, please let us know immediately.  Again, thank you for your comments.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This place was pretty good for the most part. I had a good overall experience here. I wouldn't give it a 5 star review but I would recommend this place to all the people looking for a quick place to stay in.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  We appreciate your comments and compliments and hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: room was very clean & bright beds were just like being at home. staff was very nice & helpful. breakfast was good lot to choose from.  Disney walking distance across the street. freeway down the street. we have stayed here 3times. will come back.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us again and taking time to write a review.  We appreciate your comments and compliments, sharing what will bring you back for a fourth visit.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care

Summary Heading: Super convenient location to walk to Disneyland with toddler
Summary: I researched prices back in May of last year for our potential trip to Disneyland during the New Year's holiday. First I narrowed down my list to about four that were on South Harbor Blvd. and I compared the prices and reviews on TripAdvisor. After much deliberation at the time, once we arrived at the Best Western Plus Park Place Inn it was a no-brainer. It is located directly across from the pedestrian walkway to the parks. They have a ticketed parking lot for motel guests for $10 a night. Compared to the airfares and cost of a shuttle bus service from the airport, it was cheaper for us to drive from SF to Anaheim (although, I think the shuttle bus stops in front of the motel, too).   Our room was slightly better than average: my only complaints are that the HVAC is kinda loud
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and are very pleased that you enjoyed your time staying with us.  We would love for you to come back and stay with us again.  If there is ever anything in your room that could use improvement please let us know while you are here. The HVAC units do get a good work out and tired.  We do have replacement units if yours is beginning to complain about its usage.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Comfortable and Clean, steps from Disney!
Summary: My family took our annual trek to the "House of Mouse" and this year, we stayed at the Best Western Park Place Inn. I am very happy we did!  Like real estate, hotels in Anaheim are all about location, location, location, and frankly, if this was any closer, we'd be in a Disney resort property. In fact, I think that *is* closer to the main gates than TWO of the actual Disney hotels!  The room was fine, spacious by the standard for the strip across from this popular destination. We opted for the King with the pull out sofa, as we only have one child. The seating area and the bed were separated by a small 1/2 wall that really lent itself to a feeling of privacy. The property was well maintained and the housekeeping service was on its game. We came back to a clean room regardless of
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your time with us and will be making us a favorite when you return to visit Disneyland.  Thank you for sharing what you enjoyed and will be bring you back to our hotel.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care

Summary: Room was clean, pillows were stiff and hard.  Usually if we forget any items we get it straight away at the front desk, this hotel sent it to our room after waiting in line and delivery took another 40 minutes.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I do apologize that the items requested were not delivered to you in a timely manner. We do have some toiletry items at the front desk for our guests convenience, which if requested should have been provided to you at that time.  We do appreciate your comments and compliments and hope you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Right across the street from the walking entrance to Disneyland, there isn't a better location for a non-Disney hotel. Pool, hot tub, microwave, refrigerator, free breakfast buffet. TRAVEL TIP: If you want to go from here to Knott's Berry Farm or Medieval Times from here you can take 1 city bus for a couple of bucks and it gets you there in 30 minutes (the same as any of the spendy resort transportation buses that the folks at the hotel recommend).
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We had a great experience at this hotel.  it is super close (as everyone else has mentioned) but it also has great employees, especially the man who helps with parking and such in the driveway.  He greeted us with a smile each afternoon and evening time as we passed, which was awesome. I was worried about the breakfast since so many mention to skip it, I don't know, maybe I am easy to please but we loved it.  The eggs were great and filling, the ham was wonderful (the sausage was a bit too oily for me, bacon would have been fantastic), the waffles were great (yes, toaster waffles, but I mean for a free breakfast, you can't beat it), and there were potatoes, which I didn't eat.  Lots of selection, and fresh fruit and pastries as well as cereal.  You just cant beat it. The room
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and sharing what made you love your stay with us.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the staff, accommodations, location, breakfast, and relaxing in the hot tub.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and look forward to your next visit with us.  Thank you and take care

Summary: Hotel is right across the street, you basically can't do no better than that! Price was great! Walls are a bit thin so you can hear people talking as they walk by and upstairs running around. But if  that doesn't bother you too much if it does, bring a something to cancel the noise, for the women bring your blow dryer, during our stay. The blow dryer was not very strong. Other than those minor things, This is a great place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very please you enjoyed your stay with us and appreciate your comments and compliments.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and hope you will stay with us again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We travelled to CA expressly to go to Disneyland. This hotel literally faces the entrance to the Park. We loved being able to walk across the street & not wait for a shuttle. The room was spacious and comfortable. The only issue was the bed comfort but I find that in most hotels. There was a fridge, microwave & other necessary items so we found it to be well equipped.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and are pleased you enjoyed your stay.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and hope you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Directly Across the Street from Disneyland - Good Value
Summary: Great stay located directly across the street from Disneyland. Very good value for a family vacation to Disneyland. The room cost was much less than staying on Disney's property. Family restaurants located very close to hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased to read that you enjoyed your stay and appreciate your comments and compliments. We hope you will come and stay with us again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: convenient location to attraction,satisfied with room except for noisy upstairs sweets and noisy carts moved along walkway later at night. Breakfast could be better, I never ate the cardboard eggs,ham was good if there was any left when it was your turn in line. No organization at breakfast lineup,freeforall.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guests and appreciate your comments and compliments.  Your comments will help us improve our service to all of our guests.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Get location- right across the street from the entrance to Disneyland. Rooms size was nice. Décor was a bit dated but everything worked well in the room- with the exception of poor water pressure. New flat screen TVs but not many channels. Very good internet connection.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and appreciate your comments and compliments.  This year we are making many improvements to the hotel including remodeling the lobby, updating the rooms and upgrading the Cable TV service. We hope you will come and stay with us again and enjoy the updates.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Old and in need of thorough cleaning.
Summary: We stayed here for three nights while attending a wedding at Disneyland. The only real positive thing about the experience was that the hotel is an easy walk to Downtown Disney and the parks.    The room, a so called mini suite was small, and cramped. It needed a good, deep cleaning. There was dust, and grime, and some mold around the tub, and sink.  The sink was outside the bathroom. Not a fan of that kind of set up. The bathroom was incredibly small.   The elevator seemed pretty decrepit so with the exception of moving the luggage into and out of the room, we took the stairs. We were on the second floor.  The place is noisy, noisy, noisy. Kids running back and forth along the walkways (outside entries, no corridors) yelling at all hours of the night. Parents (presumably)
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  All comments help us to improve our service to our guests.  I am sorry that you did not enjoy your stay.  We are a family oriented hotel full of excited children, directly across from Disneyland.  We do remind our guests of their temporary neighbors when there is excessive vocalizing of excitement from parents and children.  Our housekeepers do work very hard to providing clean comfortable rooms for our guests.  I do apologize if you were not satisfied with your accommodations.  At any time during your stay, if your concerns were brought to our attention, we could have found you a more suitable room in a quieter location. We could have also helped you find alternative accommodations if we were unable to meet your needs so you could fully enjoy your visit..  Again, I am sorry we did not meet your expectations and appreciate your comments and compliments.  Thank you and take care

Summary Heading: Best Western Plus - Anaheim next to Disneyland
Summary: Very nice hotel.  Closest to Disneyland.  Nice American breakfast at Capt'n Kids next door.  Beds very comfortable, except the pull out.  It was like sleeping on a board.  We had 12 in our party with two rooms.  9 were adults.  A bit tight, but the price was right.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Overall, the room was wonderful. We had a King room with a pull out...2 adults and 2 kids (21 & 13 yr old)  so this is great with a family of 4. Our room at the bottom floor and our parking was right in front of our window. Beds were comfy, Room came with extra pillows and blankets and bedding was really nice. Staff was great when needed and they checked in daily to see if we needed anything. (by leaving a voice mail) Breakfast was actually decent. Will stay again if price is right. Breakfast is served next door upstairs at Captain Kids, which consisted of Scrambled eggs, country potatoes, waffles, bagels, toast, fresh fruit, dough-nuts, muffins, cereal, oatmeal, tea, coffee, milk, yogurt,  some days is was sausage, others it was ham, Seriously though..when other hotels say they
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review. I am very pleased to read how much you enjoyed your stay with us including the location, breakfast, and accommodations.  All of your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and I hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This is a Best Western with Free hot breakfast, Nice rooms with plenty of hot water and the closest Motel to the gates of Disneyland!    Parking can be tight as the restaurant and motel shares parking spaces.   The sheets were not worn out, nice and clean and the bed was very comfortable. Plenty of pillows too and the option of leaving the fan on low  in AC/Heater unit for "Gray" noise.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We greatly appreciate you sharing what you enjoyed about your stay and hope you will come stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The location is perfect, right across the street from the Disney entrance. The staff work hard keeping the place clean.  There is some wear and tear because of the volume of stays at the hotel but I've seen a lot worse. The breakfast isn't that great but it gets the job done and keeps the costs down. We had a min-suite and it worked out great for a family of 4.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you stay with us and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope you will be able to come stay with us again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Shouldn't be a Plus status hotel!
Summary: Clean room but old hard bed and pillows, shower head wouldn't pivot due to loose screw, water pressure poor and the tub drain was slow so you stood in water while you showered and I had to pay $10 for parking on the property!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and sharing your experience.  I am very sorry you did not enjoy your stay with us.  I understand at check in you had expected an upgrade.  However, because you were here during our busiest time of the year, there was not one available.  All items mentioned could have been addressed and corrected for you if we had been notified.  Regarding the parking, when you made your reservation online, the price was noted in bold blue as soon as you selected our hotel.  It is also sent in a confirmation to you to it does not come as a surprise at check in.  Again I am very sorry you were not happy with your stay.  This year we will be updating our lobby and rooms.  I hope you will come and give us another chance.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Couldn't have been happier with our experience staying at this hotel, directly across the street from the main entrance at Disneyland.  Everything was exactly as advertised.  Breakfast was no frills, but plenty of options to select from.  You can't go wrong with the price and location.  Great, friendly, and accommodating staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We stayed 12/20 - 12/24 for a surprise Christmas trip to Disneyland.  Another excellent stay in an excellent location.  Can't get any better than this hotel right across the street with a free breakfast.  Great staff at this hotel.  No complaints.  You can't go wrong with this hotel choice!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us again during your surprise Christmas trip.  We greatly appreciate you taking the time to write a review and sharing what you like about our hotel.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care

Summary Heading: You're paying for the location, not for the sleep quality or breakfast....
Summary: I thoroughly researched all the hotels in and around Disneyland prior to booking.  This was definitely the closest - perhaps the actual hotels "inside" Disneyland were closer, but they were more than double the price.  We had a room on the ground floor, with one double bed - a few rooms down from the pool / laundry.  The sofa may have pulled out into a bed, but there was only two of us travelling, so wasn't investigated.  Gold stars for: - location, location, location.  Was so great to be able to drop back into the hotel from Disneyland during the day. - cleanliness of room / daily housekeeping - comfiness of bed  No stars for: - noise levels.  We requested a room on the top floor, but "non available". You could hear people in the rooms next door sneezing.  And above us we were
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and appreciate all of your comments and compliments.  The sofa in your King bedded room does pull out into a bed.  I am sorry you could not find something you liked at breakfast.  We do try and have something for everyone by offering eggs, sausage/ham, breakfast potatoes, toaster waffles, yogurt, bagels and creams cheese, a variety of pastries and muffins, white and wheat toast as well as four types of cereal plus oatmeal.  The oatmeal just requires hot water to be added which is available in the breakfast area. We also provide, bananas, oranges and apples.  Drinks provided include orange juice and apple juice, milk, coffee, tea, and hot chocolate.  Again, thank you for all of your comments and compliments.  We hope you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care

Summary: In comparison to the Disney hotels, well there really isn't a comparison. It is cheaper for comparable rooms, and easier access, with the exception of Grand California, which of course is absurdly more expensive. You can't get any closer to Disneyland, and the rooms are quality, and reasonably priced, especially the double queen suites! Can't recommend it enough for Disneyland trips. The continental breakfast is fair, but considering it's free you get hot food if you like, which is egg patty, sausage, egg or ham depending on the day, and of course cereal and fruit choices.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us again and taking the time to write a review.  We greatly appreciate your comments, compliments, and recommendation as well as sharing what made you stay with us again.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Courteous Staff, Clean Hotel, Best Value....Right across from Disneyland Park entrance!!! There are many choices as far as hotels in the area, but for me, Best Western Park Place Inn is the best and only one!! =)
Manager Response: Thank you for continuously choosing to stay with us during your Disney visits and taking the time to write a review. We greatly enjoy having you as our guest and look forward to your next visit. Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated.  Thank you and take care

Summary: Rooms are fairly basic and the breakfast is terrible but the location is fantastic! The rate is quite cheap and worth it for the position! After huge days at Disneyland the last thing you want is more walking with tired kiddies so this place was great for that. Would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: First time ever staying at the Best Western Hotel in Anaheim. The room was clean and the staff so friendly. I would definitely stay there again.  The breakfast was a little on the rubbery side but they had yogurt, coffee and fruit. What else do you need? :O)
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your first stay with us and appreciate you sharing what will bring you back. Thank you for your comments and compliments. We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Location, location, location!  You can't get any closer to Disneyland.  You walk out of Disneyland and walk across the street and your there.  The front of the motel looks brand new but the rest of the place looks all of thirty years old.  The room was large and clean.  The pool area is nice but a little small.  Plenty of vending machines for snacks and drinks.  All of this really doesn't matter if your there for Disneyland since once you leave in am you don't come back until bed time!  Although the motel is so close, if you do need to go back it takes 5 mins to get back to the room.  That's the number one reason I would definately use this motel again! Check in and check out was easy.  No other contact with front desk or employees so I can't comment staff.  I would have given
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay with us including the amenities and location of the hotel.  In 2015 updating we will be updating the lobby and the guest rooms.  I hope you will come stay with us again and we can earn 5 stars from you when we have completed the work.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  They are greatly appreciated.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This is nothing special and we had troubles with the air conditioner it wasn't working very well... However it's literally across the street from Disneyland so it's very close and a cheap option. Mc Donald's and Denny's is near by which is handy too
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I apologize for the trouble you had with the air conditioner.  I hope we were given the opportunity to fix or replace the unit for you so your stay could be that much more comfortable.  We will be undergoing renovations, updating all of the rooms, in 2015.  I hope you will consider staying with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Not only was our vacation at Disneyland great but our stay at the BEST WESTERN PLUS PARKPLACE INN - MINI SUITES, ANAHEIM was simply terrific.  The hotel is just across the street from the entrance of Disneyland.  The rooms are comfortable and clean.  The entire staff is very customer oriented and provides GREAT SERIVICE TO ALL.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to share your experience.  Thank you for sharing what made your stay with us 'terrific'.  I am very pleased we were able to contribute to a great vacation for you.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This is a great place to stay that is literally right across the street from the walkway to the entrance to both Disneyland & California Adventures.  The rooms are clean, staff is helpful and the continental breakfast is a good way to fill you up for the day!  Highly recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and sharing what you enjoyed about your stay.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated as well as your recommendation.  We enjoyed having you staying with us and hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I couldn't have asked for a better location for my boyfriend and I's first Disneyland trip together! I have very bad, old ankles injuries, so the distance from the parks was GREAT! Definitely saved my legs from a lot of pain and suffering. The only thing I have a complaint about was the in-room internet,  I couldn't seem to stay connected or use it at all during our stay, everytime I got connected, I would soon be kicked off.  Same problem occured on my boyfriend's phone as well.  May be that we were in the far corner, top floor of the hotel (we requested this) however, I would have thought we would get internet too.  No big complaint, just a suggestion to the hotel, may want to look into a system upgrade to reach all portions of the hotel.  Other than that the hotel was great!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review. I  hope you and your boyfriend had a great time at Disneyland.  Thank you for letting us know about the internet. We did actually upgrade and go with a new provider earlier this year, so their should be fully connectivity.  We will contact that them to make share the equipment is functioning properly.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the service and location and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope you will come back and see us again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We have stayed in quite a few Best Westerns this year and this one is ok. Our room was located on the ground level where everyone comes and parks to register. It was a very noisy area, car doors slamming shut, people talking loudly. This went on till late in the evening.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am sorry we did not meet or exceed your expectations.  Throughout 2015 we will be remodeling the lobby and the rooms.  We hope you will come back and stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Recently stayed here for a conference. The hotel staff were very friendly, the hotel room was clean, and the internet worked well -- no complaints! I also appreciated that they have a luggage service if you check out early in the day but are not leaving town until later that evening.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your time with us and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope you will come and stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We had two rooms and they made sure we received  adjoining  rooms. Our stay was fantastic, the location was fantastic. The rooms were very clean and best of all very comfortable. We will stay here every time we return to Disneyland!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you had an excellent stay and greatly appreciate you taking the time to share what made it so.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and look forward to your next visit to Disneyland.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: My family and I have stayed here several times when visiting Disney.  The location is perfect as it is right across from the walkway to the Disney parks.  The rooms aren't anything spectacular but they are nice and clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your visits to Disneyland and for taking the time to write a review.  We enjoy having you as our guest and appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope you will enjoy your stay even more when we have finished updating the rooms by the end of next year.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel has a fabulous breakfast included a great way to start your morning.  Straight across from the entrance of Disneyland.  Don't have to shuttle or drive to Disneyland and there's a buffet next door was very convienient!! Coldstone, IHOP Dennys and McDonalds are very close as well
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I have very pleased you enjoyed the breakfast and the hotel location.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We enjoyed having you stay with us and hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care

Summary: This location is the best for any Disneyland trip. I recommend this place to anyone looking for a short walking distance. Especially after spending all day and evening at Disneyland.  The hotel was perfect for our family of six, two queen bed and one full size sofa bed. The location is also perfect for parking the rate parking rate is low compared to other locations.  Next time we plan on going to Disneyland we will be staying here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and sharing what will be bringing you back.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We look forward to your next visit and hope to see you soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Broken TV, A/C didn't work well and the staff was extremely rude. The property is shabby and run down. Parking is limited and spots are very narrow. Breakfast is ok but not amazing. Housekeeping and maintenance staff is great. Management is the problem at this hotel!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed at The Best Western PLUS Park Place Inn with our children and grand children. It was a great. We walked across the street to Disneyland. The Inn provided a free breakfast each morning. The rooms were clean and well maintained. The price was very reasonable. We would definately stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased that you and your family enjoyed your stay with us including the breakfast, location, and accommodations.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel is excellent based on proximity to Disneyland.  The staff is fabulous.  The pool, hot tub, and breakfast are great amenities.  The rooms need ALL the electric outlets replaced as they do not hold a phone charger.  All carpets need to be replaced.  Rooms have a musty smell.
Manager Response: Thank you fro choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  Beginning in January we will be renovating the lobby and then will be addressing the rooms.  We are scheduled to have work done by the end of the year.  We hope you will come back and see us.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Right across the street from Disneyland so extremely convenient. Helpful front office staff and the room was surprisingly nice. A light island theme decor and spacious room with a larger than normal refrig.I got lucky with parking as it was crowded. Breakfast was more than the usual "Free" fare. In addition to the regular items there was sausage/potato/eggs so could save a family lots of $$ before heading into the parks.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the hotel, accommodations, staff, and breakfast provided.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated. We hope you will come back and stay with us again.  Thank you and take care

Summary: The hotel at this staff goes out of their way to make your stay welcoming.  They quickly responded to any request.  We had a room with 2 queens and a pull out queen.  The room was huge and with 6 people no one felt cramped.  It is directly across from Disneyland so it is an easy walk.  We came home every afternoon so the kids could nap.  Fridge and microwave in the room were a great asset.  Although a little worn in places, the hotel was very clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your time with us and sharing what made this a 'great place to stay'.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care

Summary: We live in So. Cal and are Premium Disneyland Passholders.  We chose to stay at a local hotel so we could go to Disneyland a couple of days in a row without an hour commute back and forth.  We were very happy with this hotel and it was very clean, the lobby and room décor was nice and it is literally right across the street from the Disneyland properties.  Just a short walk away and you're in the park.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the accommodations and location.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care

Summary Heading: Always The Best Choice in Anaheim
Summary: Don't usually use the sofa sleeper, but this trip we did.  I was extremely surprised to find it very comfortable.  Usually dread sleeping on a sofa sleeper..but this was the exception.  Had a great night sleep.  The mattress is a little softer than the firm beds in the room...but very comfortable.
Manager Response: It was great having you here again.  We enjoy seeing you and thank you for your wonderful reviews.  I am very pleased that you had no trouble with the sofa sleeper and were able to get a great night sleep.  We definitely look forward to your next visit with us.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The location of this hotel is quite nice. The beds were old and hard, and the room was dated. On the positive side, everything did appear to be clean. The free breakfast was pretty gross. Ultimately, if you want to get up in the morning and be at Disneyland with little effort, this is the place for you. Next time, we are going to save a few dollars and stay a nicer hotel down the street.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We do appreciate your comments as they will help us make improvements.  By the end of 2015 we are scheduled to have completed updates to our lobby and our rooms.  We hope you will come and stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We have been staying at this hotel for many years every time we come to Disneyland which now is 4 - 5 times a year. The rooms are spacious and the beds are very comfortable. The service is great! Stay here if you are a couple or a family for convenience of walking to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us when you visit Disneyland and for taking the time to share what keeps bringing you back.  We enjoy having you as our guest and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Convenient location across from park. Rooms are clean and decent. Price is a little higher for the average room expected a little more. Staff is friendly and courteous. Parking is a little tight for larger SUVs. Overall satisfied with stay but will probably look elsewhere for future accommodations.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am pleased you enjoyed location and accommodations.  I hope you will stay with us again.   We are schedule to complete room updates by the end of 2015.   Thank you and take care.

Summary: The Best a western was a pretty good hotel for the money. The location was ideal as it is right across from the main gate to Disneyland. The room was good and clean but the deco was dated and the air conditioner was a little noisy. As we were there when the temp was reasonable, this was not too concerning but an update of the air conditioner would be nice.  The staff were friendly and very accommodating. Had no issues with the cleaning staff. The free breakfast was good but it gets very busy and can be very cramped in there at peak times. So get there early and get a table.  Family members in another room had a problem with a backed up toilet and the front desk and maintenance were on it immediately. There was also a minor issue with the lock on the room not operating all the
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and letting us know what you liked about your stay and where we may improve.  We are currently scheduled to have our rooms updated by the end of 2015.  We hope you will come back and stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We stayed for 4 nights while at Disney, Great deal, breakfast included and as close as can get to Disneyland. Breakfast is in a sit down restaurant with boots, help yourself style. Food quality is not the best but its free and good enough, They open at 6:30 am so my wife and I went there to pick up coffee to go every morning before returning for breakfast. My biggest gripe is they charged me $25/hour for parking yes PER HOUR, BECAUSE I left the lot at 3:45 pm instead of 3:00 PM. I thought that was outrageous and I wasn't told about the charge ahead of time. There is no attendant and the area is so tight that you can't back up to go inside and talk to the lobby. Machine only takes credit cards. It left a sour taste especially at the end of our vacation and probably the only
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am sorry that you had a trouble with the parking.  We do notify our guests in the emailed confirmations that parking is only valid until 3 pm.  At check-in, guests sign the parking pass that states parking is valid until 3 pm and after 3 pm non guest rates do apply.  It is also written in large, bold font on the back of the pass so it is visible when placed on the mirror of the vehicle.  Our hotel parking lot is for currently registered guests of the hotel.  Due to limited space we are unable to accommodate Disneyland parking. Since we do understand that guests may like to spend a little extra time in the park on the day of check out, we do provide four hours of complimentary parking.  However, at 3 pm we need to ensure all guests no longer registered in the hotel, move there vehicles to make room for that night's arrivals.  I understand you were in the lot only until 345pm. If you had contacted the front desk we could have assisted you. There is space to back out so you can come to the lobby, or an assistance button is on the machine which would have connected you to the front desk.  I have issued a credit back to your card to cover the cost of what you were charged at the gate.  If you have any further questions or concerns, please feel free to contact me.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Great location to get to Disneyland, Hotel is right across from the main entry.  But the rooms are in need of  remodeling and updated very badly. The décor is dated and feels like the lacquer on the wood is sticky and coming off of the table and dressers. Clothes had an odor after being in the drawers for two days. Again, great location, but needs updated.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We appreciate your comments and hope you will come back and stay with us again.  We are currently scheduled to have room updates completed by the end of 2015.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Very happy with the location of being directly across the street from the park. Hotel staff was friendly and room was very clean. Breakfast wasn't bad either although I wish the dining room was bigger as it was extremely crowded and hard to get around sometimes. Would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am pleased you enjoyed the location, breakfast and staff and appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope you will be able to come and stay with us again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Inn is directly across the street from the entrance to the Magic Kingdom. Can obtain Disney tickets on site, Parking available. Free breakfast, of average quality. Room is nice and roomy, can easily sleep 6, clean with cable TV and WiFi. Perfect for park access and good value considering the location. Excellent service. We have probably stayed here six times, Inn quality has been excellent and consistent over a period of many years. Highly recommended for families.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us when visiting Disneyland.  We enjoy having you as our guest and greatly appreciate you taking the time to share what keeps bringing you back.  Thank you for your comments, compliments and recommendation.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Wow - this was just the best place to stay in Anaheim.  We were a family of 7 travelling through Southern CA for the Thanksgiving holiday.  This hotel was just excellent.  Loved being able to walk right into the park at Disneyland.  Parking at Disney would have cost more than the fee at the hotel $10.00/night.   We even went back to the hotel for a bit  to rest and had an early dinner at IHOP (right next door to the Park  Place).  Kids eat free after 4:00pm.  Went back to the park till it closed at midnight.     Can't say enough good about this hotel.  The breakfast next door was very good.  Offers fruits, bagels, toast, cereal, eggs, a different meat each day, very good home fries, donuts, danish, juices, coffee and I can't remember a few other things.  If you can't get full at
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to share your experience.  We enjoyed having you here with us and are very pleased you enjoyed the location, accommodations, breakfast, and friendliness of the staff.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we hope you will be able to visits us again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Best Location at a Great Value
Summary: Location, location, location!!! No waiting for shuttles or  standing in line for a bus! This Best Western is right across the street from Disneyland!!! Free breakfast that incl. eggs, sausage or ham, bagels, toast, cereal, muffins, danish, banana, apple, orange, apple juice, milk, yogurt, waffles. Free mini fridge is very convenient for keeping bottles of water cold that you need in Disneyland!! Microwave is perfect for making hot cocoa on those cold nights!! Can't beat the value you get at this Best Western. Stayed there the last 10-12 years & NEVER had a problem!!!! Staff is very friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us when visiting Disneyland and taking the time to write a review.  We greatly enjoy having you stay with us and appreciate your loyalty to our hotel. We will be making many improvements over the next year I hope you will enjoy.  Thank you again.  We look forward to your next visit.  Mahalo.  Malama pono.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for a nearby family event. Love how BW does not raise their rates for holidays!  Great location, very helpful and friendly staff.  When I went to the lobby late in the evening, they had a very nice security person walk me back to my room which I really appreciated.  Although I felt safe and did not have an issue with walking back to my room, I was so impressed and thought it was above and beyond expectations and another reason why I will give this hotel my business again in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to share your experience.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care

Summary: The rooms were excellent,very good breakfast and being close to Disneyland and other places of interest makes this Inn one of the best on our list for families and friends. We had a suite and it was very comfortable and clean.The breakfast right across the way was perfect for a quick bite before heading over to the park.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the accommodations, breakfast, and location.  We greatly appreciate your comments, compliments and recommendation.  Hopefully we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This was a great hotel with the kids.  Close enough to walk easily even for the 5 year old.  Breakfast was fine with choices for all.  The pool is rated as small but we found that it was the perfect place for an afternoon swim and rest before heading back to the park.  We would stay here again for sure!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you stay with us and appreciate you sharing what you enjoyed about your stay.  We hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Great spot if you don't need posh
Summary: If you can handle yucky floors (just wear socks) Everything is doable, sleeping seems clean and comfy. We don't mind it here, it's a fair price and outstanding location for a Disney trip I am recommending it. I've stayed there 2 times now and really like the layout of the room for my family. We have a family of 5 and my oldest brings a friend. so 6 of us. Well worth it.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us again and taking the time to write a review.  I am sorry for your experience with the carpets.  We do shampoo the carpets regularly.  We do appreciate your comments, compliments and recommendation.  We look forward to your next stay.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: nice hotel across the street from Disneyland-organized and a very honest staff that alerted me that I left a pair of boots in the room..I would stay here again.. the location was perfect to walk to Disneyland -decent breakfast and hot coffee located on premises.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and that we were able to help you get your boots back.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care

Summary: I payed for an annual pass for disneyland, with parking...   Paying the extra for less walking is PRICELESS!!!   You get a Decent Best Western Hotel, if you are a member like I am then you will know what I'm talking about...  But walking less, even from the parking lot to the park, can not put a price on it!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am pleased you enjoyed the hotel and appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I have stayed here many times and plan to stay more.  I have 4 kids and with the breakfast buffet they were all satisfied.  I have stayed here during 2 separate Disney Runs and the location made it a very smooth transition, not to mention the spa!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us again.  We enjoy having you as our guest and greatly appreciate you taking the time to share what brings you back.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We were in town for the Avengers 1/2 Marathon. needed something convenient. This hotel really is right across the street from Disneyland.  Walking distance to downtown Disney. No need to fight traffic. It was clean and comfortable and quiet. We never heard neighbors but we did hear fireworks! I plan on using this hotel for my next marathon trip. Microwave, refrig and coffeemaker helps keep proper food intake for runners.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I hope you had fun participating in the 1/2 marathon.  Thank you for sharing what made your stay enjoyable and for your ratings.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Love this hotel.  4th time staying here.  Love the convenience of the location.  Good size rooms, very clean, and the breakfast included is an added bonus.  I found the cleaning staff to be so lovely and they did an outstanding job.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us again and taking the time to write a review.  Thank you for sharing what you enjoy about staying with us and your cleaning staff compliment.  We enjoyed having you with us and hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: You cannot get a better location for a Disneyland trip.  Good accommodation for this purpose.  Breakfast was surprisingly good.  Basic, but should please most if you just need something to get going in the morning.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and hope you are able to come stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Loved our stay.  Not just for proximity to park, but also wonderful staff.  Beds were great.  Only beef was not with the hotel but rather with the inconsiderate guests who felt it necessary to discuss in loud voices as they walked by just after 6 am to discuss whether or not to do splash mt that day and the next morn guests let their kids run down the balconies to the stairs about 6.30 (park didn't open till 10 and we were wanting to sleep in so kids could stay up later).  Maybe the hotel could help by putting reminder signs on each floor to keep noise level down?  Loved having the ease of the buffet.  We weren't huge cheese omlette fans and would have liked the option of having plain egg instead...but generally very thankful at having the hot breakfast and we all really loved
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you 'loved your stay'.  Thank you for your comments, compliments, and suggestion.  They are greatly appreciated.  We look forward to you staying with us if you are able to come back to Anaheim again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Best Western is a hop and a skip from Disneyland, GREAT for tired kids, parents or grandparents to walk to and from for a siesta, diaper extraction, etc.  Very close access to restaurants and shops and very clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and greatly appreciate your comments, compliments, and ratings.  We enjoyed having you with us and hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: it was so close to Disneyland and such a convenience to have it right there. the free breakfast was a big plus as it saved us from spending at the parks. the room was clean and comfy. employees were nice and helpful. would def stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and sharing what you liked about your stay.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the location, breakfast, accommodations, and the friendliness and helpfulness of the staff.  your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The price was right, the room was clean, and the continental breakfast was better then most low priced hotels. The bed spreads are a little scratchy, not very soft. But it was so hot, I did not really use the bedspreads. TV worked but had some weird wavy lines, but we hardly watched it as we were at Disneyland everyday. It is a quick walk to Disneyland front gate from this hotel. Staff were great, and the computer and printer in the lobby were helpful in printing our boarding passes for our return trip home. All in all, great value, and would definitely stay there again!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am pleased you enjoyed the breakfast, location, and accommodations.  Thank you for sharing what you felt made your stay a great value.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: As long as you remember you didn't book the Ritz, this place is fine.  Location is perfect for DL.  Literally across the street from the pedestrian entrance.  Room was clean, and large enough for what little time we spent in it.  Had a refrigerator and microwave.  King bed was comfortable.  We were concerned about being on the first floor, but turned out to not be noisy.  We were across the driveway from the restaurant dumpster, and were awakened by the trash truck one morning.  Breakfast was good enough.  Powdered eggs and frozen waffles, but everything else was pretty good.  Lots of bananas and apples too.  They charge for parking, so beware that gotcha.  We flew in and took the supershuttle from SNA, so didn't apply to us.  They secure-stored our luggage both coming and going
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to share your experience.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and including the location, accommodations and amenities.  Thank you for your comments and compliments, which are greatly appreciated.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Comfortable, clean rooms.  Great location if going to Disneyland as the Disneyland and California Adventure Courtyard is right across the street.  Will definitely stay here again!  I would definitely pass on the included continental breakfast buffet next door though.  Very low quality and sadly untasty.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay including the location and accommodations.  We appreciate your comments and compliments and look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We visited Disneyland last week with our kids and grandkids. The Park Place Inn was a great place to stay for our visit. It is right across the street from the Disneyland entrance so just walking over was great. The rooms are spacious and the included breakfast has many choices, although the room is crowded at busy times. The wi-fi is free and works well. Our grandchildren enjoyed the pool (it is on the small side).The staff was helpful. All in all, I would recommend this hotel to anyone making a Disneyland visit. Excellent location!!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and sharing what you liked about our hotel.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the location and amenities.  We greatly appreciate your comments, compliments, and recommendation and hope you will come back and see us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This was an excellent location for a family trip to Disneyland. Being able to easily walk to the park was a plus. The rooms were spacious and the breakfast adequate. The price was reasonable considering the location and breakfast. The internet was included and worked well.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the hotel, location, and amenities.  We appreciate your comments and compliments and hope you will come visit us again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I stayed with my two grandsons at this hotel nearest Disneyland, the location to the parks is excellent.  The accommodations were fine for our stay.  While I did not eat at the breakfast buffet next door, (due to food allergy) the boys (11 yrs old) found it to be fine each morning of our stay, so it was appreciated. The room was very clean, the housekeeping staff was excellent.  The front desk staff were very helpful. The price was a little high for the quality of the hotel, but I knew I was paying a premium for the location.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am sorry you were not able to take advantage of the breakfast. Please let us know next time what your allergies are and we will let you know which items you can enjoy.  I hope you had a wonderful time at Disneyland with your grandsons.  We appreciate your comments and compliments and hope you will come back and see us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Great Hotel for a Disneyland vacation
Summary: We just returned from Disneyland, and stayed at the Best Western Plus Park Place Inn. We were there for 5 nights, Nov 6-11/14. The hotel is literally right across Harbor Blvd from the Main Gates to Disneyland. Could not ask for a better location.  The rooms were fine, clean and looked like recent renovations had been done. The rooms are spacious,with nice size flat screen TV, coffee maker, hair dryer, fridge and microwave. The hotel has parking right outside the doors, so motel style. The front desk is open 24 hours a day, and are very personable and helpful. The pool is on the smaller size, also has a hot tub. Free in room wifi as well. The air conditioning unit was a bit loud, but one got used to it  Breakfast is offered complimentary right next door from 630am - 1000am, and
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to share your experience.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the breakfast, accommodations, and amenities.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated as well as your recommendation.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and hope you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Enjoyed our Disneyland days and our Best Western nights.   Easy, convenient, breakfast.  It had everything we needed.  It is not luxury, so don't stay if that is what you are looking for.  Family friendly and convenient.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Great location for a family trip to Disney
Summary: This hotel was great for a family trip to Disneyland because it is walking distance to Disneyland.  There is some places to walk for food besides eating at the park and there is a grocery store about a mile away.  The hotel also provided a very decent complimentary breakfast included in the price of the rooms.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the location and breakfast offerings. Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Literally a five minute walk to both disney parks...very affordable with good free buffet breakfast and pretty good pool/hot tub...employees were very friendly and helpful...my room and the property were very clean...not a luxurious hotel ...no rental car needed as there are lots of food,dining,shops that are walking distance in the area...great for ducks game if you like hockey...went with my four kids all ten and under and would definitely stay here again
