Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to share what you enjoyed about your stay.  I am very pleased you would come back and stay with us again.  Thank you for your comments and compliments. We hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care

Summary: This is a great hotel right across the road to the main gates of Disneyland, just walk outside across the road at the lights and you are there. The rooms are clean and there is a buffet breakfast included. Food not exception but adequate. After a long day at Disneyland you can come back and go to the buffet for dinner, again ok. The staff were great and very helpful. we had a great time here and would recommend this hotel to family and friends.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the accommodations and our staff.  We appreciate your comments, compliments, and recommendation and we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Ok, so I have read the very few "bad" reviews left by others and all I can say is the things people do have to complain about this hotel are completely ridiculous!! First of all, it's FREE breakfast!! What more is there to say? It's not the best breakfast in the world but it is a free hot meal for everyone in your party! They rotate eggs and ham one morning for cheese omelets and sausage the next accompanied by potatoes, waffles, pastries, donuts, toast, cereals yogurt, fruits, tea, coffee, hot chocolate, juice and milk. The only thing I can say about breakfast is go early!! We went most mornings during our stay around 6:45 and we had no issues getting a table. If you show up much later then that then it turns into a zoo!! Parking fee's are something else people complain about.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to share your thoughts.  Your review and your understanding is very much appreciated.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and are very pleased you had a great experience with us. Thank you for your very pointed comments as well as your compliments.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Please feel free to call me if there is anything I can do for you.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: very good accomodations and if your going to Disneyland can't beat  how close to the gate it is.  the service was good food was good and employees were very helpful.  We had a good experience here and would reccomend this to our friends and family to stay. It was close to a lot of attractions and restaurants and allowed us to use our time playing and not traveling.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to share what you liked about our hotel.  We greatly appreciate your comments, compliments, and recommendation and hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: we went on Alaska airlines and it was great went to Marriott it was fantastic went to best western and satisfied flew back to seattle on Alaska airlines and great would do it again, loved the suites in both hotel went for pleasure trip loved the service in both hotel
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am pleased you enjoyed the accommodations and service at our hotel.  Thank you for your comments and compliments. We hope you will come back and stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Always Can Count on Quality and Service
Summary: This is a great location and the staff is always courteous and helpful.  The rooms are large, clean, and there is a large screen television.  The beds are comfortable.  If there is any kind of problem they take care of it promptly.
Manager Response: Thank you for coming back to see us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoy having you stay with us and greatly appreciate your sharing what keeps bringing you back to our hotel.  WE definitely look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Close to the park and spacious...
Summary: We have stayed at this hotel at least 6 times over the past 2 years and we love it! It has larger suites that accommodate our families needs for beds and having somewhere we won't be stepping on top of each other.  The rooms are clean, but we are not talking the Grand California hotel here. This is your basic room and it has all the amenities. We love how close to Disneyland it is and the maintenance staff is one of the best we have seen at a hotel. We had a problem with our air conditioner not working properly, they were able to bring a new one up that night and install it within a matter of minutes.  Overall, I would recommend this hotel, it is so close to Disney and it is reasonably priced.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us again and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoy having you as our guest and I am very pleased our maintenance staff was able to help you so quickly.  Thank you for your comments, compliments, and recommendation.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Stayed here in July. Literally across the street from the main entrance to Disneyland/ Downtown Disney. Rooms were spacious and clean. However, there were problems with plumbing. Our sink and shower didn't drain well. We called the front desk and they fixed it right away. We didn't use housekeeping and the staff left us voicemails reminding us that we had the "do not disturb" sign up. Very attentive. I am definately gonna stay here next time we come to Disney. The only complaint would be parking is expensive and cramped. Luckily, we didn't have to move our car because everything is within walking distance. The continental breakfast was nice. Buffet style with eggs, meat, cereal and bagels.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the location, service, and breakfast provided.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated.  We hope you will come and stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: As close as you can get to Disneyland!
Summary: Great basic hotel for the family.  Lots of room options for families.  Free breakfast ( its just basic)  Any problem you have the staff takes care of immediately.  We ALWAYS stay here when we are on vacation.   Its the closet Good Neighbor hotel to the Disneyland resort.  Great if you have small children that need naps.  They have a basic pool and a big hot tub.  Which is awesome to relax in after a long day at the park.
Manager Response: Thank you for making us your hotel of choice when visiting Disneyland.  We appreciate you taking the time to write a review and share what you enjoy about our hotel.  We enjoy having you as our guest and look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care

Summary: The location and cleanliness was excellent, 5 stars!!! The facts that we had to go next door and up a flight of stairs with no elevator for continental breakfast was VERY disappointing and the washer and dryer and pop machines were all $2.00 each was shameful. The fact that the room was $143.00 @ night was par for the course but $10.00 @ night to park my car was ridiculous!! All in all it was pleasant and peaceful and clean, The staff was friendly and professional and I would stay there again because of the fact that nothing is perfect in a imperfect world!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am pleased you enjoyed the location, cleanliness, and the staff.  I am sorry you did not enjoy all aspects of your stay but very happy you would stay with us again.  Thank you for all of your comments and compliments and we hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We have stayed at many different hotel when visiting Disney. This one is absolutely the closest to Disney with not footing the bill of the onsite hotels. It was clean, close and convenient. The breakfast "snack" place was a pig pen and we walked out without even grabbing a banana.  The beds are extremely hard. Walls are paper thin. You could hear everything said in the surrounding rooms as well as the water running around you.  It was inexpensive and clean though.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and will help us improve our service.  We hope you will come back and visit us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The hotel was affordable, quiet, clean, comfortable, accommodated our family of 6, had free breakfast, and was literally right across the street from Disneyland - less of a walk than to the parking tram!  The housekeeping staff was amazingly attentive.  Staff at the desk was courteous and held our bags for us until our room was ready.  Check out was a breeze.  IHOP, Tony Romas, Mimi's Cafe, and McDonalds are a short walk away too.  Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to share what you enjoyed about your stay.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the accommodations, staff, and location of our hotel.  Your comments, compliments, and recommendation are greatly appreciated.  We hope you will be able to come stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This is a great hotel to stay in.  Extremely close to entrance of Disneyland and they have a great continental breakfast.  Hot and cold food options.  I highly recommend this hotel.  The beds were very comfortable.  The pool is nothing to brag about but we were not there to go swimming, we were there for Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay including the location, accommodations, and breakfast.  Your comments, compliments, and recommendation are greatly appreciated and we hope you will come back and stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Great price, great location and if you just want to stay and sleep and enjoy a day at park and cool off for a swim, this is where you want to be.  The breakfast is a bit dodgy but what you pay for you get, so free is pretty good even though you are eating just something simple and not very healthy.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope you will come back and stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This is a nice Best Western.  The rooms were very good.  The best part about this hotel is that it is really close to Disneyland.  It is about a 5-6 minute walk to the front gates of Disneyland. You can't beat that!  The only drawback is that complimentary continental breakfast is not good.  But, there is an iHop within walking distance and a great little cafe & market.  The cafe & market has really good coffee.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased to read you enjoyed your stay with us.  Your comments and compliments are appreciated and we hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The hotel is right across the street where the buses go in to Disneyland, you are as close to walking to the main gate as you are to the Disneyland hotels for a lot less money, great hotel to go back and and nap during the day and the breakfast had a lot of variety, not just danish, but a full blown breakfast bar.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay including the location and breakfast.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We utilize this location annually. We are always treated well and you cannot beat the location and the breakfast which is included. We travel as a family and usually need 4+ rooms. The staff is always accommodating.
Manager Response: Thank you for making us your hotel of choice when visiting Disneyland as well as taking the time to write a review.  We enjoy having you and your family stay with us and look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The room was average but spacious.  The location is phenomenal!  This hotel is extremely close to the gates of Disneyland, right across the street!  It is a 5 minute walk to the Disneyland Resort turnstiles.  It was so close that every day we went to the parks, we could go to the parks at opening and stay until the afternoon, come back to the hotel for a nap or a swim and head back to the parks around supper time.  The pool and hot tub were awesome!  It was nice to come back from Disneyland in the afternoon and go for a swim or relax in the hot tub.      Beds and pillows were very comfortable!  The bathroom counter is huge.  It fit three people's bathroom stuff for over a week, plus there was room to spare.  There was a fridge, coffee maker and a microwave in the room.  Plus a
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay including the accommodations and amenities offered by the hotel  We enjoyed having you stay with us and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We look forward to you staying with us again.  Thank you and take care

Summary: This is a basic, no frills hotel. For what they lack in glitz and glamour they make up for in service. Staff behind the counter were more than happy to hold our bags for us on two occasions, and made sure our courtesy bus knew where to pick us up from.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to share what you enjoyed about our hotel.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and are very pleased you enjoyed the customer service provided by our staff.  We do hope you will be able to come and stay with us again.  Thank you and take care

Summary Heading: No frills, but stay for the location
Summary: This hotel is by no means the type of hotel we usually stay at, however we chose it purely for the close proximity to Disneyland.  We travelled with our 8 month old son and needed somewhere close, so we could return during the day to allow him to have a nap. For this purpose, it was great.  It is literally located at the pedestrian crossing into Disneyland, which is closer and a shorter walk than staying at the Disney hotels. (Although one of them has direct access into California, the walk through that park to the entrance of Disneyland is much further than walking from Park Place).  The breakfast is ok, I can imagine during the summer months, it would be difficult to get a table, but we didn't have too much trouble. The rooms are clean and large enough to also fit a crib for
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am pleased you enjoyed the location of the hotel and were able to take advantage of the breakfast.  Our laundry attendants do fold the sheets and towels in the laundry room.  The table and chair outside is an accommodation for a housekeeper who is currently unable to perform her regular duties and is assisting laundry so she can continue to work.  Thank you for all of your comments and compliments.  We do hope you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The Best Western Plus park Place Inn is located near the Disneyland main entrance.  There was a full breakfast and check in and check out was easy. The room were clean and comfortable.  My family and I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We had booked rooms here and a family member who was paying for the room became ill.  He still wanted to pay for our room.  We called to see if they could accommodate him paying for the room in advance and they refused.  We offered to give another credit card as back up to make sure we weren't committing credit card fraud.   We were denied.  Very sad that a big chain does not help out, when help is needed.  We will NEVER stay here.
Manager Response: I am very sorry you were disappointed that we could not accept your father's credit card without him being here.  Due to rampant credit card fraud, the credit card holder must be present in order for the credit card to be charged.  We did offer alternatives to how your father could pay for your room but, these were met with refusal due to your father wanting to accumulate points on the credit card in question.  Providing an alternative credit card as back up was not offered as a suggestion to me, however, it still would not have allowed us to charge a credit card without the card holder present.  We do take credit card security seriously in order to protect consumers as well as the hotel and our guests.    Thank you and take care.

Summary: We stayed here from Oct 8-15. Clean room, wonderful service! So close to Disneyland!   The staff was so awesome. My friend was in the middle of selling her elderly mothers condo after getting her settled into assisted living back in Canada and suddenly the realtor had a buyer and needed my friend to do all this business over phone and faxing. Well, the staff was so helpful and made this odd bit of work inbetween visiting Disneyland smooth and simple. Thank you!  Rooms were clean and orderly, no issues with anything. They replaced our feather pillows due to allergy when requested, all staff were so friendly. Walking distance from Disneyland, and great view of fireworks. Great free breakfast buffet at Captain Kidds - excellent food!   I left a brand new pair of shoes behind in the
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and that we were able to assist your friend.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The service at this hotel was excellent.   The rooms were clean and comfortable.   The hotel is right across the street from Disneyland  so that you can walk in.  The hotel is a reasonably priced convenient place to stay and enjoy Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again.    Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: if not on-site, then stay here
Summary: We love staying on-site at Disney WORLD but the rates on DL property were a little steep, especially as part of a 3 week road trip.  We've enjoyed staying here before (2005) and found it to be excellent this time, too. Directly across the street from DL entrance, outdoor corridors & sufficient parking. It was very clean and the breakfast buffet was very good, similar to most BWs.   We definitely hope to stay here again!  ***You can buy your tickets from their front desk also, including park hoppers (which is what we got) and save time from waiting in the L O N G lines at the park.***
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us again and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your visit and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: My husband booked the hotel at the last minute, I had purchase tickets for Disney Halloween Party, everywhere was booked!! This hotel gave us a good deal, we arrive early (9am) and the manager gave us a room at that time! the check in was at 3pm. We were surprise and happy. Early room, good deal, and  across the street from Disney, couldn't ask for a better day!!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very happy we were able to check you in early so you could begin your day at Disney.  Thank you for your comments and compliments. We hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: My family of four stayed here in oct 2014 for 6 nights.  Location: For access to both Disneyland and California Adventure, you can't get more convenient than this. Located literally right across the street from Disneyland's shuttle bus entrance. I stayed at the Grand Californian twice and while the Grand has a separate entry to CA, the walk to Disney is about the same.   Room: It was clean and spacious. A bit dated but was fine.  Service: Was very attentive  Price: You pay for the convenience but it's worth it (especially with young kids). Although not as nice as the Grand Californian, it was 40% cheaper.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and appreciate your comments and compliments.  Please come back and visit us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This was my first stay at this property and it was very enjoyable.  My first consideration in booking here was the location but, to my surprise, everything about the motel was good.  Check-in was fast and the people behind the desk were very friendly and knew their jobs.  The room quality was very good, everything was clean and fresh, not a place where you don't want to touch anything.  The best part was the location.  The motel is right across the street from the main entrance to Disneyland, about a 7 to 8 minute walk.  The property is a great value.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write about your first stay at our property.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and are very pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We always stay at this hotel because unless you stay @ Disney, you really can't get closer. The breakfast at Captian Kid's isn't very good, but it's free! Great for a family, clean and you can see the fireworks. We go to Disney several times a year and ALWAYS stay here.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us again and sharing what brings you back to our hotel for your Disneyland visits.  We enjoy having you as our guest and appreciate your comments and compliments. We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This is a great hotel right across the street from Disneyland.  It is clean and the staff is so very helpful.  They have a very small gift shop inside the hotel for things that you might have forgotten.  They have a breakfast next door.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed our hotel and had a fun trip.  Your comments and compliments are appreciated and we hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: It was directly across from Disneyland. Took 2 seconds to walk there. Provided breakfast which is fantastic. I did not get parking but at least they have a parking structure down the street. I would like for them to offer a better breakfast. I love the huge counter top in bathrooms. That was awesome with 5 girls.Thanks
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed staying with us and appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: If you are ever planning a Disneyland trip. Be sure and Consider a Stovalls Best western property. The Park Place Inn and Mini suites is literally right across the street from  the Disneyland main gate. They have a clean hotel with a top notch staff. They offer a great continental breakfast. Perfect location if you have little ones. You can visit the park. Come take a nap and go back back to the park. It is so close you can see the monorail.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to share your experience.  We greatly appreciate your wonderful review of our property and hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The many times we have stayed here, and that IS many, have always been a pleasure.  They have continued to improve and it seems are attentive to the guest comments after a stay.  The rooms are comfortable, even if a bit dated.  I get the feeling with all of the exterior improvements maybe the rooms will be next.........??The beds are very comfortable for all of our varied ages and issues.  Everyone slept comfortably.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us again and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoy having you stay with us and appreciate your comments and compliments.  We are in the planning stages to update the lobby and the bedrooms and look forward to offering an even better experience to our guests.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We've stayed at the BW Park Place Inn on our last few trips to Disneyland.  The location is perfect and the free breakfast is a real plus.  It is better than the typical continental breakfast.  The rooms are large and well-kept too.
Manager Response: Thank you for returning to our hotel and sharing what you enjoy about staying with us.  Your comments and compliments are appreciated and we look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Over all, the stay is great.  Really close to the main entrance of Disneyland parks.  Wifi and a good variety of breakfast are included.  Parking is $10 per day and is limited as I see several cars parked along fire line by the exit.  Over the past 3, 4 years, we've stayed in Disney Grand, Disneyland paradise, the other best western on harbor blvd, and Fairfield inn, by far, this place offers the best value and convenience.  Our room is on the 3rd floor right above the front desk that has fridge, microwave, and noises from street traffic.  The carpet has some sticky spots, I will have to remember to bring slippers if I book this place again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and appreciate your comments and compliments.  We do shampoo the carpets regularly.  I will make sure the carpets in your room are cleaned again to get whatever was spilled.  We hope you will come back and see us again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel is in the absolute best location for Disneyland -- literally across the street from the main gate.  More convenient than on-resort hotels.  It's more of a motel than hotel, but just fine and good value.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay and the location of the hotel. We you will come back and stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: So there was a time when I was a little bit younger  and I went to Disney land over 10 years ago till this day:) It was a cold and rainy season and I had some time off from my continuation Private School, where I was in a foster home at the time. It was so hard growing up there in the foster and group homes, but I managed. But anyways we drove down there got all dressed up to watch the parade on the t.v while my roomates went out to see it live.  But n-e-ways the next morning we got up and we were there, pictures and everything from Disney land. And my real dad who I kept in contact with had given me 20.00 dollars so I was able to look around and I finally saw the perfect little gift, it was a golden knecklace with the Disney ears on them, big cousin is listening too:)
Manager Response: I am not sure if you stayed with us.  However, it seems like you have a very good memory of a visit to Disneyland.  Thank you for sharing.

Summary: Right across the street from Disneyland entrance. Breakfast good for families. Other good restaurants around the area. Recommended by COSTCO as a Good Neighbor Hotel. Beds were comfortable.  Mini suite was crowded for 4 adults and 2 kids but survivable!.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am pleased you enjoyed the accommodations, location, and breakfast.  Your comments an compliments are appreciated and we hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Very clean hotel with a professional and friendly staff who accommodated a family of 18 all staying in multiple rooms and arriving at different times and without any issues. Perfect location and the free breakfast is a money saver. Hats off to the Best Western staff and thanks from the Cortez family for making our vacation one to remember.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased we were able to provide you and your family with a memorable stay. Thank you for your comments and compliments. We hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This is a standard motel type accommodation in anything but a standard location.  Check in was straight forward, and we were soon on our way to our room. The room was clean and had everything we needed for when we were not at Disneyland.   The room rate also included breakfast at Captain Kidds which is located next door to the hotel. The breakfast there had a good choice, though I think their focus was on quantity over quality, but perhaps that's the right balance for people loading up before seeing the mouse?  As most other reviews mention, what makes a real difference is the location. Literally over the road from the entrance to Disneyland. I can't think of a hotel that is any closer.  Overall a good hotel in a cracking location. If we ever return to Disneyland, we will return
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to share your experience.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We've found our new home away from home on our disneyland vacations! You can't beat the location! It's closer to the main gate than the disneyland hotel. The staff was incredibly accommodating. We took an early morning flight and arrived at the hotel at just about 930am. They were more than willing to check us in and hold our bags till our room was ready.  The room was nicer than some of the motels we've stayed at on the strip there. Comfy bed, with uncomfortable pillows. But, if that's the only major complaint I had.  I never went to the breakfast bar, but my husband brought us breakfast from there every morning. Basic variety breakfast snacks. He brought the eggs back one morning, I took one bite and I was done. But, the fruit and bagels were perfect for me. All in all,
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  We are excited about you making us your home away from home when visiting Disneyland.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for Disney
Summary: SO convenient to Disneyland (right across the street from the park entrance), and breakfast is included at the restaurant right next to the hotel.  The price is great for the location, and we would definitely stay here again.  There is also a pool if you need to cool off from a hot day at the park.  We have stayed in the suite and the regular queen size beds room, and I recommend the suite for the extra room.  It does cost a little bit extra though!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am pleased you enjoyed the hotel and location and were able to take advantage of the breakfast and pool.  Thank you for your comments and we hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care

Summary Heading: Definitely my first choice when I return to Disneyland
Summary: As per other reviews, you couldn't find a better situated hotel for Disneyland than this. Literally across the road from the main entrance, it's perfectly situated. The rooms, although dated, are large and clean and quiet, all we were looking for in a hotel so close to the action. Right next door are 2 eateries ( although one does not have the best reputation) and even better is a convenience store on the other side which sells everything from wine, beer, personal products, fruit etc and we found this very handy. Wifi was also included which was fantastic.  McDonald's is also only a a short walk away which our son was thrilled about.  There is a bus stop out the front which allowed us to easily be picked up for other tours or you can also catch the public buses if you so
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed staying with us and are making us your first choice when returning to Disneyland.  We thank you for sharing what will be bringing you back to our hotel; we look forward to seeing you.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel is very serviceable and clean with minimal frills, but we all know the #1 reason to stay here. It's literally the closest non-Disney hotel to Disneyland. Obviously it would be a little overpriced anywhere else, but the fact that you can cross the street at the stop light for Disneyland's pedestrian entrance and walk straight into the hotel's lobby is worth its weight after a long day in the park, or just for convenience sake should you need to run back to your room for any reason. The only issue I had was when my room door got stuck very late at night when I was very tired, but we eventually got into the room after about 20 minutes of muscling the door open with the help of the front desk agent. If you're doing Disneyland correctly you shouldn't be spending a whole
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very happy that my front desk agent was able to help you, but very sorry for the inconvenience.  Thank you for letting us know what you enjoyed about your stay and sharing your experience.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel was great. It was so close to Disneyland, I believe it is as close as it gets. The rooms were big and clean. The staff was very friendly. You had to pay $10 a night to park which I didn't like but it was the same or cheaper than every other hotel in the area. We had an overall great experience with the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: As close as we could get to Disneyland
Summary: Really like the location of this hotel and as a plus we had a view of Space Mountain from our room! We literally walked out of the hotel and crossed the street into the park. The hotel itself was nice and we didn't hear any street noise during the night. The staff was very helpful and answered all our random questions. The free breakfast was OK which included eggs, sausage, waffles, cereals... Not bad compared to some places with only bagels and fruit. We would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am pleased you enjoyed the view from your room as well as our location, staff, and breakfast.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: As far as hotels that are close to the Disneyland Park, you can't get any closer than this one.  They are right at the crosswalk on Harbor Blvd.  The staff was very friendly and helpful-our room was ready when we arrived-no issues at all this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed our hotel and staff.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel is right across the street from Disneyland. Parking was $10/night, but worth it because the parking lot has controlled access and you can usually park very near to your room. Continental breakfast served daily with good food choices. Nice clean rooms and staff is very helpful. This will be my first choice in hotels when I plan future Disney trips.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to your future visits.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  They are greatly appreciated.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This was our first stay at this hotel, but we've stayed at 2 other hotels on the same strip across from Disneyland.  This is by far the nicest, with a huge breakfast and nice rooms.  It is not a 4 star hotel, but it is better than the others around.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: great location;  room was adequate, though very dark because of wallpaper color;  bed was comfortable ;  bathroom a bit small.  elevator was slow because it's used by staff/cleaning carts and guests.  parking was adequate as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and appreciate your comments.  Your comments will help us as we plan the remodeling of our hotel rooms.  We hope you will come stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel is the very best place to stay within easy walking distance to the Disney Resort.  The rooms, the staff and the breakfast (included) next door were all wonderful.  Would not hesitate to go back there and I will be letting everyone know how great it is.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  Thank you for your recommendation.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We stay at this Hotel every year.  It is the CLOSEST Hotel to the Disney Park Entrance.  This Hotl is right on the Crosswalk.....  less than a 3 minute walk.  I actually got into the park faster when staying at this hotel, than when staying at the Disneyland Hotel.  They offer a Breakfast Buffet. A little bigger than a Continental Buffet.  It is the SAME every morning @ Captain Kidd's which is right next door.  The rooms are Clean and Spacious.  Each Room has a Microwave, Refrigerator, and a Coffee Maker with Coffee, Sugar, and Cream Packets (Cups).  They also have a Heated Pool and Jacuzzi. A Laundry Facility, and Ice and Vending Machines on the Ground Floor.  The Staff is Courteous and Friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you again for staying with us and writing another review.  We enjoy having you stay with us and look forward to your next visit.  Mahalo, Malama pono

Summary Heading: Best Western Park Place Inn & Suites Anaheim, CA
Summary: I stay at this Hotel every year.  We love that the Property is right on the Cross walk to Disneyland.  It also comes with Breakfast every morning @ Captain Kidd which is right next door.  Each room has a Microwave Oven, Refrigerator, and Coffee Maker w/ Coffee Packets and Condiments......  Beds are comfortable, and the Staff is Courteous and Friendly.  Hotel also has a Heated Pool, Jacuzzi, and Laundry Facility.  There is an Ice Machine on the Ground Floor, as well as Vending Machines for Drinks and Goodies....
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us when you visit Disneyland.  We appreciate you taking the time to write a review as well as your comments and compliments.  I am very pleased you enjoy your time with us and look forward to your next visit.  Mahalo, Malama pono.

Summary: Rooms are clean and well stocked.  Staff is friendly and helpful. Location is right across the street from Disneyland. Great experience.  This is our second time staying here and will stay again next time we come to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us again and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoy having you as our guest and appreciate your comments and compliments.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Great location right across the street from Disneyland.  Easy walking distance to attractions and restaurants.  Continental breakfast could use some improvement.  Room was comfortable.  Staff was always pleasant and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We appreciate your comments and compliments and are pleased you enjoyed your stay.  Please stay with us again if you come back to the area.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: If you have read my previous review, you know this is the only place we stay when we go to Disneyland. The place is always clean, staff are excellent and the rooms are comfortable. They have been really sprucing up the paint, walkways, and lighting (love the led lights on the front of the building). I was told that there are plans to upgrade the room furnishings in the future as well as although they are dated, they are very functional. The baths were upgraded some time ago as well as the flat screen tv's. The beds are very comfortable and the bonus of the free wifi and expanded FREE breakfast next door... Just try and beat the location, convenience, the savings on breakfast in the park (for however many you have in your family, that could add up), the overall value. There is a
Manager Response: Thank you for making us your hotel of choice and taking the time to write a review.  It was wonderful having you stay with us again and we greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This is a great deal ($156/night) and is an incredibly convenient 5 minute walk to the front gates of Disnyland.  We stayed a few hotels down the road last time and the added 10 minute walk was noticeable at the end of a fun-filled day at the parks.  The rooms are large enough for two adults and a couple small children to be comfortable.  Breakfast buffet is included which saves about $35+ a day for a family of four.  My only gripe is the slow elevator.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your recent visit to Disneyland.  We appreciate you taking the time to write a review and share what you liked about our hotel.  We hope you will come stay with us again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: My two kids, sisiter and I stayed here during our visit to Disneyland this past weekend. I was looking for an affordable, safe and convenient location and a co-worker who has stayed here in the past recommended this hotel. I was worried about all the walking with my two little guys, then trying to get back to the room but my co-worker explained that the location doesn't get any better - and he was right! The room was a bit dark and dated (hence the 4 stars), but with free wi-fi and breakfast (not to mention location!) as well lots of restaurants and shops nearby, I feel like we got just what we needed. Who spends all day in the room anyway? We got the two queen beds with sofa sleeper, so with the four of us my sister and I were able to each have our own bed while the kids slept
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I would like to thank your coworker for referring you and I am very happy you choose our hotel.  Thank you for sharing what you enjoyed about your stay. I  am very pleased you enjoyed the accommodations and location and appreciate your comments, compliments and recommendation.  Hopefully you will come visit us again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Across trhe sreet from Disneyland.  Excellent experience. Good buffet. Most importantly, great bed and an excellent night's sleep.  Wireless internet was wonderful, fast, always up and running. Would definitely stay here again and recommend to friends and family.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you had an excellent experience and appreciate you taking the time to write what you enjoyed about the hotel.  Thank you for your comments, compliments, and recommendation.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This is the place for you! Directly across the street from the park. No shuttles needed, just head out the main gates for a quick rest, change of clothes, you name it.  The continental breakfast is expansive and free...one less meal you need to pay for!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the location and continental breakfast.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: if you are looking for a great hotel within walking distance to Disneyland, this is the place. It is directly across from the pedestrian walkway and less than 5 minutes walk you are in the parks. There are restaurants within walking distance in both directions from hotel, not more than 5 minutes. Ihop, Denny's, Tony Roma's, Mimi's,Cold stone and others. The location is perfect
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and take the time to write a review.  We appreciate your comments and compliments and hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I was very pleased with this hotel.  This was my first trip to Disneyland and I researched a lot of places and chose this one for the location.  The entrance to Disneyland Resort is directly across the street and you can walk to the front gates in less than 10 minutes!  Our room was clean and comfortable with a king sized bed and a full size sofa bed.  We also had a flat screen TV, a microwave, and a decent sized refrigerator that kept our items cold.  There was also a coffee maker and hair dryer.  A free continental breakfast is included next door at Captain Kidd's (this is on the second floor above the actual resteraunt).  This consisted of toast and bagels, cereals, home fries, premade mini omelets (not too bad) waffles and breakfast meats, fruit coffee and juices.   Not bad
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I hope you had a wonderful experience at Disneyland. We do appreciate you sharing what you liked about our hotel and do hope you will come back and visit us again.  Thank you for all of your comments and comments.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The rooms were clean and spacious, the pool was nice after a long day and you can't beat the location of being right across the street from Disneyland! Don't bother with the free breakfast buffet, there is never enough seating and the food was awful! Go to the ihop or Denny's. Apart from that it was great!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am pleased you enjoyed the location, accommodations, and the pool.  Your comments and compliments are appreciated and we hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Excellent for a so called "Moderate Property"
Summary: We stayed here 2 weeks ago and from beginning to end our experience was excellent.  We arrived early on Dapper Day.  The airport shuttle dropped us off and we were not expecting to check in, only drop off our bags before hitting the park.  Ken (front desk) found us a room available so we could get our afternoon going.  All the staff we encountered were very friendly and would go out of their way to serve.  Amazing.  We even bought our tickets to Disneyland at the front desk which Ken informed us was an option.  We were very glad we did.  At the park, the ticket lines were very long.  The room was great.  We had a super view of Disneyland.  The room was very clean, the beds were comfy, and the location can not be better.  The entire stay was wonderful. We will stay here again.  T
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to share your experience.  I hope you had a lot of fun at Disney's Dapper Day.  I am very pleased you had an excellent experience with us from beginning to end and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We look forward to your next visit with us.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The hotel is right across stye street from disneylands main gate. The rooms a comfortable and roomy. There is free internet and breakfast. I have stayed here several times and never been disappointed.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us again and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased we keep meeting your expectations and appreciate your comments and compliments.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This is the third trip to the happiest place on earth over the past year and this is the third different hotel we've tried.  Of the three I believe this one is ranked firmly at no. 2.    First the Pro's - The customer service was friendly and helpful, even though there was a slight mix up on the checkout when we split the bill between a friend and myself.  Somehow forgot my toothbrush and they had one for me and they also extended my parking on our checkout day hassle free and at no extra charge.  It is literally right across the street from Disneyland which I believe is very important with little ones (4-5).  Most affordable of the hotels in the vicinity for our needs.  No outside noise present (but see cons for other noise issues).  Con's - We got the two double beds for two
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the customer service and location of the hotel.  I do apologize regarding the noise from the A/C and the guests above you.  Any noise, if brought to our attention, can definitely be addressed.  Whether it is replacing the A/C or asking guests to be more considerate of others staying in the hotel.  All of your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Hotel was clean, quiet, big refrigerator, microwave in room, free internet and the room was very comfortable.  The best thing is that you cross one street and you can walk to Disneyland in less than 7 minutes.  This makes the hotel worth the extra 30 bucks you spend on the rooms as opposed to those further down the road.  We are annual Disney pass holders so we will be using this hotel in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay including the accommodations, amenities, and location.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This was an amazing experience!!!  We go to Disneyland several times a year.  This is the first time we have stayed here and it was fantastic from beginning to end.  We were able to check in early. We were celebrating our quads birthday's and they gave each one a Disney pin.  Staff and manager greeted us promptly and were very friendly.  Breakfast was delicious.  Rooms were very comfortable.  And location was the best!!!  We will stay here again for sure!!!  Thank you!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know about your experience and for your review. I am glad to hear that you had a great time staying with us and truly appreciate your comments regarding our service and staff. We hope to see you again soon. Take care!

Summary: Overall we were happy with the hotel and the location to Disneyland couldn't be any better.  Breakfast was also good.  Kids loved  the pool and spa. A/C was left off and the room was very hot when when arrived (100 degrees). Everything else was good and staff was helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and for sharing your experience. I am glad to hear that you enjoyed our breakfast and pool. Unfortunately because of a state heat advisory and to prevent power outages, which are at high risk during the summer, we do not leave the A/C units running in unoccupied rooms. We can, however, turn them on upon your request if we know your estimated time of arrival. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you back.

Summary: You can't beat the price and location for Disneyland.  The free breakfast is great, hot items such as eggs, waffles, sausage, ham, potatoes as well as cereals, juices, fruit, toast, oatmeal and yogurt.  This was our second stay and we will be back.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and also for taking the time to share your experience. I am glad to hear that you enjoyed our breakfast and that you will consider us for your next Disneyland trip. We hope to see you soon. Until then, take care.

Summary Heading: 2nd best place, home away from home.
Summary: Stayed here from 9/13-9/17. Check in was swift, pleasant & easy. We also were able to get onsite parking at the last minute! This place is clean & the staff very friendly and professional. With it being the closest hotel to the front gates of Disneyland it fit our needs perfectly!!! After being in the park for 10-12 hours you just can't beat it. Is it fancy? No, but will stay here again & again when visiting the  Disneyland Parks.we had a 2 queen mini suite and the room was large & clean. When I called to ask if they might have fan for the table, one was delivered to our room in less than 10 minutes!! Will definitely be back!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for taking the time to let us know about your experience. I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and appreciate your comments and compliments. We hope we will see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Best Place to travel with children to Disneyland
Summary: The best of this hotel is the location, you only need to cross the street and you are in Disneyland, is good for travel with children because the rooms are big and you can accommodate many people and the breakfast included is very good, is varied because is buffet .
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The staff at the hotel was very helpful at check in, check out and assisted with every question we had,  the hotel is clean well kept and directly across the street from the parks,  conveniently located to the parks and Downtown Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This is the single closest hotel to Disneyland, without being owned by Disney (The Grand Californian is closer, being on the property, but a completely different class). You walk out the front gates of the park, cross the street and you are in front of it. If you want to duck back to the hotel during the day to skip the heat, this one is the easiest.  Being close to the park is its greatest attraction. It's a place for families visiting the park, so everything in it can take a beating. Don't expect fine lace and ceramics here. It has comfortable beds (but rock hard pillows!) and an air conditioner that never goes off in summer.  It has most of the basics - single cup coffee maker, tiny microwave, and a fridge. No safe though, which is a shame.  The bathroom is small, but
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to share your experience.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and appreciate your comments and compliments.  I do apologize for the air conditioner the first night.  Thank you for sharing that the situation was remedied.  We do not have safes in the rooms but do offer free safety deposit boxes at the front desk.  Thank you again for writing about your experience.  We hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This is the next best location if you are not staying on the Disney property itself. You walk across the street and you are there. This is great for small children. Walking distance to several restaurants, ex. Bubba Gump, Pizza, etc, There is parking, but note, its limited to one car per room. Pool is very small, outdoor, but we did not use it. Junior suites were reasonably priced, clean. Staff was courteous on entry and for our needs. They accommodated our request for a late checkout and parking extension. Promptly sent me a new remote for the tv when mine did not work. Free breakfast was a money saver, bagels, eggs, sausage, cereal, instant oatmeal, juice, muffins, etc. It was not bad for a buffet style. Eggs were ok but seemed to be mixed with powdered ones? Another day they
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the location, service, accommodations, and amenities.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Don't stay for the bed & breakfast, stay for the location
Summary: The main reason we stayed at this hotel was for the location. It is right across the street from the entrance to Disneyland. With that being said, we did not expect it to be glamorous.   The rooms are clean but on the smaller size. This was fine since we pretty much just used the room to shower and sleep. There are not a whole lot of channels but again we did not go to watch TV. The beds were springy and uncomfortable. The pillows were hard and lumpy. The pullout bed in the sofa was fine for our daughter.   The closet is large with plenty of hangers. It seems like often hotels only have 3-4 hangers, but this one had close to a dozen or more. There is also a large dresser with 3 large and deep drawers. Since we stayed for a week it was nice to unpack and have plenty of space for
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  All reviews help us to improve our service and offerings to our guests.  I am sorry you did not fully enjoy your stay.  However, I am pleased you found the staff pleasant and accommodating.  We do have elevators for guests staying on the second and third floors which consist mainly of mini-suites and double room (two full beds). Thank you for all of your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: If you can't stay on Disneyland Resort property, this is the next best thing!  A leisurely 5 minute walk across the street from the entrance to both Parks, it's an excellent value.  Spacious, well appointed rooms, very nice staff.  We always stay here, when not on property, and we'll be back again in 6 weeks!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoy staying with us and appreciate your comments and compliments.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Great location, tired room, yuck breakfast
Summary: You can't beat this place for location. Walking distance from Disney. The rooms are very average and need a renovation. Out plumbing got backed up one night and were given a key for another room to shower, it was fixed the next day.   The free breakfast was disgusting. If processed food is your thing you're in luck. I couldn't stand it.   Overall a good stay, we only slept there between our days at Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very sorry you did not fully enjoy your stay with us and that there was an issue with the tub draining.  We will be undergoing renovations over the next couple of years and hope you will come back and visit us.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The location is great for going to and from the park and the workers are very friendly. The room was clean and nice, but the room was muggy and uncomfortable to be in. The breakfast was gross and was the same each day. Overall it was worth it and I would stay there again, but it can afford to make some changes.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  We appreciate you sharing what you enjoyed and what we may need to improve on.  We did have unusually hot and muggy weather and apologize that the room was not comfortable during your stay.  For the breakfast we do to try to offer a wide range of options so you are not limited to selecting the same thing for breakfast everyday.  We provide toaster waffles, eggs, sausage or ham, potatoes, yogurt, muffins and pastries, donuts, bagels and cream cheese, white and wheat toast, 4 types of cereal, oatmeal, fresh fruits (apples, oranges, bananas). We also provide, apple and orange juice, milk, coffee, hot chocolate, and tea. Unfortunately we are restricted in varying our daily offerings since we do not operate a restaurant and lack the storage facilities that would be required to change the breakfast offerings daily.  We do hope you will stay with us again.  We will be remodeling over the next couple of years and during this time hope to address many of the concerns guests have brought to our attention.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: If you are visiting Disneyland, this is the next best hotel to an actual Disney Resort hotel, in my opinion. Room was decent, breakfast was... american?, pool is alright, but the location is what makes it.  For 2 adults, the hotel was great; free wi-fi, relaxing chairs by the pool, and close proximity to restaurants. But for a family (or anyone with kids) it would be even better, solely for the facts that the rooms are decent to keep the parents happy, and the park is so close that it would keep the kids happy and excited (and probably reduce the amount of whining due to having to take shuttles/ walk from a further hotel).
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you were able to take advantage of the breakfast and pool area during your stay.  We greatly appreciate you sharing what made your stay "great" and we hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: So easy to get to/from Disney with just a few steps.  No need for a bus or long walking.  Having a full breakfast and an extra bed for our teenager made this the perfect place to stay for our Disney vacation.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the location, breakfast, and accommodations.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Great stay close to main gate :)
Summary: Great Hotel this was our second stay, you can't beat the location. Our eldest son got very sick, the front desk call the on call hotel doctor. He came right to our room gave is the medication we didn't have to leave our room. Much nicer than having to take a sick child to emerg :) we will ne back and this is our go to hotel :)) great stay
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us again and taking the time to share your experience.  I am very sorry your son got sick during your visit but happy the Hotel Doctor was able to help.  I hope he was still able to enjoy Disneyland.  Thank you for making us your go to hotel.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: My sister and I spend a few days at Disneyland every few years. We couldn't decide on a hotel so we decided to "wing it".  We had several hotels we planned to check out before deciding.  This was the first one we saw.  It was right across the street from Disneyland.  The lobby and rooms were updated with nice modern decor and bedding (in the room). The lighting (very important to me) was good.  We got a great room by the pool for a really good price. We will definitely return.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am happy we had a room available for you since you were winging it and that you enjoyed your stay with us.  We appreciate your comments and compliments and look forward to your next visit with us.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel several times on our trips to Disneyland - its close proximity to Disneyland can't be beat! Having a complimentary breakfast is something that's important to us when traveling to Disneyland, good to get energized before a busy day - and the BWPPI offers a delicious breakfast with many options. This trip was to take our 4 yr. old granddaughter for her first visit to Disneyland so it's so nice having the hotel close enough to take much-needed breaks during the day. I selected "average" on the cleanliness because the carpet in our room could definitely use a good cleaning; granddaughter's feet were quite grubby on the bottom after walking around barefoot in the room. Overall though, the facility is clean and tidy. All of the staff are very friendly. And
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us again and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoy staying at our hotel  and appreciate your comments and compliments.  I do apologize for the cleanliness of the carpet.  We do have a regular shampooing schedule but will make sure the room you were in receives immediate attention.  Thank you again and we look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care

Summary: Great location but mediocre hotel.  You are paying for location.  The wifi is fast.  The breakfast is more than continental (includes eggs & ham/sausage).  Pool is small but sufficient.  Parking is extra.  Accomodations are so-so.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and will help us improve our service to our guests.  We do hope you will come and stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The hotel is an older style motel (exterior entry) but the rooms are really nice on the inside.  You can't beat the location.  Across the street from Disneyland.  The only place closer would be a Disneyland hotel.  Breakfast is provided and is a good basic breakfast.  The beds are comfortable.  The only thing I might say is the pillows were really thick and heavy.  So if you're a back sleeper they may be too thick for you.  But it wasn't a problem or detraction.  The staff were all very friendly and helpful.  There is a convenience store (Cove) directly next door to the hotel.  It is convenient for buying bottled water, wine/beer, snacks, etc.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay including the breakfast, accommodations, staff, and location.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and hope you will be able to stay with us again.  Thank you and take care

Summary Heading: This is our new go-to hotel
Summary: We have been making an annual vacation of Disneyland and last time I paid attention to what hotels were right by the main entrance. I was excited to go home and find out that this one was ranked in the top ten while still reasonably priced! This year we stayed here and were not disappointed. You just can't beat right across the street from the main entrance. It took five minutes to walk there and we have two kids including a five year old. This becomes crucial late at night when high-energy five year old suddenly  cannot walk anymore as soon as it is time to leave the park.   The room was clean, not shabby, and there was plenty of room for the four of us. We weren't sure whether or not to be happy when we were given a room overlooking Harbour. However, we heard no street noise
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and are very pleased we have become your go-to hotel for visiting Disney.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This is our go-to hotel when we are at Disneyland, because you really can't beat the location. It's directly across from the pedestrian entrance to the park, so you don't have to worry about parking or getting a shuttle. I also like that it's easy to get back to the hotel for an afternoon nap, if needed! The price is always very reasonable as well. We have stayed here 4 or 5 times now, and every time it has been clean and comfortable. This time the toilet was leaking in our bathroom, but they sent someone to fix it right away and it was fine after that. We love the breakfast included at the restaurant next door! It really saves money not having to buy breakfast in the park. There is a good selection of food, usually including bread for toast, muffins, donuts, waffles, eggs,
Manager Response: Thank you for making us your go to hotel and taking the time to share your thoughts.  I am very pleased you enjoy our accommodations, amenities, and service.  We enjoy having you as our guest and look forward to your next visit. Thank you for your comments and compliments; they are greatly appreciated.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We have stayed at Disneyland hotel twice to take advantage of the early entry to the parks and also at the Grand Californian once.  This room was comparable to what we got at the Grand Californian 10 years ago (so not sure if they have updated it since.)  Got tired of paying the ridiculous prices and read a bunch of reviews before booking this place. They have a triple A rate of $125 which is a steal compared to the Disney hotels.   Held out checking in until we could get a room at the back of the hotel thanks to the review tips on this site that said they were quieter in the back.  The room was very clean, updated and while Best Western's are hit & miss in my opinion, this one is the real deal. Would stay here again.  Added bonus, got into Disneyland 20 minutes early today.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and appreciate your comments and compliments.  I am very pleased your had a wonderful stay and we look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The location was perfect for a walk across the street and into the Disneyland area and straight through to downtown Disney, the restaurants, shopping, music and entry into the two parks.  The beds and pillows were hard (not too much sleep), but the rooms were clean with a microwave, refrigerator and pull out couch (mini-suite).  The managers were very accommodating in allowing us to leave our car while we were at the park for the day.  Thank you.  The sign just as you enter the pool area is not too pleasing and leads one to say--NOT TODAY!  The signs should be taken down and information about the condition put into the paperwork upon registration whereby travelers sign as acknowledged.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and that we has availability to allow you to leave your car parked longer.  I do understand the working of the sign is not the most pleasant.  However, the wording and placement is mandated by the state.  Thank you for your comments and compliments and we hope you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: It's a stay for convenience not luxury.
Summary: The hotel is great because it is right across the street from Disneyland. Parking was tight & minimal. Rooms were ok, spacious but not so clean. My kids were walking barefoot around the room after a bath & their feet were completely black...that has to be my biggest complaint.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to right a review.  I do apologize for the carpets.  We do shampoo the carpets on a regular schedule.  However, some rooms do require more frequent shampooing.  We will definitely take care of the room your were in.  We do appreciate your comments and hope you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Best western expectations met across Disneyland
Summary: Going to this motel, I was expecting Best Western quality, across from Disneyland.    I got exactly what I wanted and for a very good price.  I booked several months ahead and got reduced rates as rates went up during the year.  It was very cheap compared to other good neighborhood hotels; and even more compared to the DIsney hotels.  And yes, location cannot be beaten.  Seriously, you cross the street and there you are, where others that bussed are being dropped off.  There you are, at the Disneyland and Downtown Disney entrance.  The motel is NOT luxury.  Do not expect it.  It provides comfort, as Best Western do.  We had a room on the first floor, towards the back of the property, and passed the pool.  Some here have commented that the walk to the room is very long.  The
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased we were able to provide you with exactly what your were looking for.  Thank you for sharing what made your stay so enjoyable.  Your very detailed review will help us continue providing the service and value that you have come to expect from Best Western Properties.  We will definitely address the continental breakfast restroom issue with the restaurant owner.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We had a very pleasant stay overall.  Everything was clean. Staff was professional and friendly.  Room was comfortable.  Very convenient for a trip to Disneyland or Downtown Disney.  The hotel and our room were just as it is on the website. I would definitely stay here again and bring my family.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your time with us and appreciate your comments and compliments.  We look forward to seeing you and your family when you return to the area.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel is literally across the street from the pedestrian entrance to Disneyland! It was very clean, comfortable, and all of the staff was excellent...especially Antoinette! We were here for the Disneyland race weekend and it was so convenient to just walk back at anytime to rest our tired legs and feet.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you had such a wonderful time with us and I hope you had a fun run.  Thank you very much for your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This is a very nice hotel with good sized rooms.  It is literally located across the street from the entrance to Disney.  It has plenty of secure parking although they do charge a fee.  Recommend this hotel highly.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you stay with us and greatly appreciate your comments, compliments, and recommendation.  We hope you will be able to come back and visit us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The hotel itself, is quite average, but you are not here for the hotel. You are here for the Parks and this hotel is all about location. It is as close as you can get to the crosswalk to Disneyland. The rooms are large, clean and easily accommodated our family of 5. The pull-out couch was a bit uncomfortable but did the trick. The room had a microwave and a small fridge which was nice to keep drinks cold.  The parking was the best deal around. The breakfast was adequate, scrambled eggs, toasted waffles, sausage or ham, breads, muffins, Danish, cereal, fruit, yogurt and juice. After 5 days it got tiresome, but still was a nice perk. I would absolutely stay here again the next time we go to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the accommodations and amenities and were able to take advantage of the breakfast.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Chose this hotel for the size if rooms (needed to accommodate 6 people) and location (closest place to Disneyland, and let me tell you - at midnight when yours waking back on what's left of your feet, you're very happy to be staying there!).  The room was clean, lots of towels provided, a fridge and small microwave.  It was also very outdated and "old" - not a concern but some people might be turned off.  The front desk staff were great!  They patiently stored our 12 bags (twice!) and managed to check us in 5 hours early, despite having a full house.  This was clearly something they went our of their way to make happen, and was much appreciated.    The included breakfast....well, it's better than nothing.  Everything was of the lowest quality, not terribly healthy, but they slow
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to share your experience.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the service provided by the staff and the location of the hotel.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and I hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Stayed two nights with the purpose of going to Disneyland and Disney's California Adventure for one day. Arrived in evening night before park visit and it was nice to start the Disney experience with dinner in downtown Disney. Truly right across from the park(s) with a relatively short walk to get in the park(s). We knew we made the right decision when people were lined up waiting for shuttles after a long day to return to their cars and then drive home/to their hotels. Price was also right for the free included breakfast buffet (sausage, scrambled eggs, fruit, yogurt, cereal, donuts, bread, bagels) at Captain Kidd's. Room was large enough and clean enough for a family of four to be comfortable and convenience store and other restaurants nearby if you don't want to eat in the
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay with us.  Thank you for your comments and compliments which are greatly appreciated.  We hope you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.
