Summary: We stayed here primarily because of the location.  After a full day at Disneyland, or as a mid-day break, you walk out of Disneyland and across the street and you're at the hotel.  Because of the location, the hotel could slack on the amenities, but they don't.  It's great having a mini fridge and microwave.  The hot tub and pool were well kept.  The breakfast choices were extensive and the room, while busy, was a comfortable place to start the day.  It's nice to be able to park until 3 PM the day of check out too.  That allowed us to shop Downtown Disney without worrying about the car.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you here and are very happy that you enjoyed the accommodations and amenities.  Thank you for comments and compliments.  We hope you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Stayed here on a Tuesday to Saturday in late June. I picked this hotel because it had decent reviews and particularly because of its prime location for quick access to Disneyland and for its free breakfast. This hotel really is as close as you can get to Disneyland as far as a good neighbor hotel goes. It is directly across the street from the walkway to the esplanade; literally a 5 minute walk. The free continental breakfast was good. There were cereals, bagels, fruit, toast, oatmeal and a selection of hot items each day (eggs, potatoes, bacon, sausage), but these are just sitting over heaters all morning, and no waffles or pancakes. However, it was nice to grab a quick (and free) breakfast before heading to the park.   The location and breakfast are really the only good
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to share your experience.  I am pleased you enjoyed the breakfast, location and room amenities.  I am sorry you did not entirely enjoy the accommodations.  We are in the planning stages of remodeling the rooms and hope you will give us another chance when completed.  Thank you and take care

Summary: We had a great time at the Park Place Inn and Suites.  Stayed right across from the entrance to Disneyland, a short five minute walk to the entrance gates to California Adventure and Disneyland.  Stay included morning breakfast at Captain Kidd's right next door.  Accommodations were very nice and comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you had a great time and enjoyed the location, breakfast, and accommodations.  We appreciate your comments and compliments and hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Given the great location right across the street from Disneyland, the free breakfast, and comfortable rooms, all for a fraction of the price of a Disney hotel. I don't think there's anywhere that's better for a Disneyland vacation.   The vending machines didn't work and finding a parking spot can be a little challenging, but otherwise everything was great.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Overall our stay here was good!  It would have been nice to know more about what was nearby like pizza delivery and restaurants outside of Disneyland, convenient stores, and bus schedules.  I felt like we were left in the dark a bit about that sort of thing, but maybe that was the intent of Disney. Our room was clean and front desk was helpful and pleasant.  We would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  All the information you were looking for is available at the front desk.  Stop by anytime and a front desk agent will happily answer any of your questions.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I LOVE this hotel! You can't get any close to Disneyland/California Adventure unless you stay on property. Why pay those prices when you don't have to? I did not eat their offered continental breakfast, I'm not much for breakfast. There is an IHOP connected to the restaurant where you eat breakfast. I ordered dinner there and took it back to the room. it was very convenient. The staff was very helpful when I had a problem, the problem didn't have anything to do with them. I am very impressed with the way this hotel is run. I used The Disney Express as transportation, they have a stop right in front of the hotel. Very clean and respectable. I will stay again. I advise you do the same.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review. I am very pleased you loved our hotel and were able to take advantage of our location and proximity to Disneyland, transportation, and restaurants.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Great Rooms and has hot breakfast
Summary: Clean rooms, the A/C works wonderfully.  Went for a 5 night stay while visiting Disneyland.  Awesome location to the park, literally walk across the street and you're in Disneyland.  Courteous staff, they even called before our arrival date and offered me a lower rate for our room!  Who does that?! They did and they're awesome for it!  Hot breakfast included with the room rate and it's better than a lot of the other hotels within walking distance to the park (we've tried) and helps save some green rather than eating in the park.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to share your experience.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and thank you for sharing what you enjoyed about our hotel.  Your comments and compliments are much appreciated and we hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Great value with excellent beds if you need place near Disney
Summary: Five minute walk to Disney, caring staff,complimentary breakfast buffet, rooms were clean and nice, with small separate alcove for table and chairs, and with larger-than-usual fridge and a microwave.  Beds and pillows were wonderful!  The price was very reasonable and the whole experience was better than expected for the price level.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased we exceeded your expectations and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We enjoyed having you stay with us and hope you will come stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I booked this hotel for it's location, and wasn't disappointed - just walk across the road and you're in Downtown Disney.  We had a room overlooking the pool, it was spacious and clean, although a little old.  A/C was a little noisy, and room was (conveniently) located near the metal outdoor stairs, but this was also very noisy in the morning with kids clumping up and down.  Overall I think this is a pretty good property, but I did wonder about the location of the Coffee Maker.  Ours was on the bathroom bench right next to the Toilet.  I would have moved it to another location but the power cord was very short so I couldn't find a better spot.  Overall, good value for money.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and appreciate your comments and compliments.  I hope you will choose to stay with us again if you are ever back in the area.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We don't spend much time in a room when we go to Disneyland.  It was ok and choose the location because it was directly across from access to Downtown Disney and Disneyland.  The breakfast was ok, but only slightly more than what a typical continental breakfast would have.  There are three buildings.  We ended up in the 3rd building.  I was not aware of the layout because this was the first time I stayed there.  If I choose to stay here again I would definitely REQUEST THE FIRST BUILDING.  The first building is directly across from where you go for breakfast. It is also the closest to the park.  The third building is the farthest and defeated the main purpose for me wanting to be close.  Elevator access is not great, it is available but not in convenient locations, so up the
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write review.  I hope you had a comfortable stay and enjoyed your time visiting Disneyland.  Thank you for your comments and we hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The Best Western was clean and very close to the park. My family had a bad experience the first night with the in wall AC unit. The unit started smoking lightly which caused the fire alarm to sound and my room to smell for the night. my entire family lost a lot of sleep due to the fact that this occurred at 3am. The staff did nothing to make it right. Not even an apology . The issue may have been fixed as it did not occur the rest of our stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  All comments help us improve our service to our guests.  I have followed up with the agent that spoke with you to ensure he understands how he could have provided better service. I am very sorry for the incident and hope you enjoyed your time at the park at that everything else with your stay was excellent.  We hope you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Excellent location, very good for the price, but dirty carpets on rooms and terrible coffee. Excellent location, very good for the price, but dirty carpets on rooms and terrible coffee. Excellent location, very good for the price, but dirty carpets on rooms and terrible coffee. Excellent location, very good for the price, but dirty carpets on rooms and terrible coffee.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.   We appreciate your comments and compliments and hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Just above average, but outside the gate to Disneyland
Summary: We arrived at the recommended check-in time and was give a room on the 1st floor right outside the entrance which was noisy. We ask to be more to a quieter location and was told we needed to pay for an upgrade to a suite. When we booked the room we requested a quiet location, but they seem to ignore any special request as on the online booking. So we paid for a suit. The difference between the room we had and a suit, an extra bed and $30 per night out of my pocket.  Don't go to the breakfast. It's disgusting. I would not take my children there.  The room was clean and reasonable, but the air-conditioner was noisy when running
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very sorry we were unable to meet your room location request.  We do our best to fulfill all of our guests requests.  Unfortunately, it just isn't always possible.  I do hope you enjoyed your time visiting the Disney Parks and hope if you are ever back in the area, you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Close to Disneyland and good eating locations.  Quite rooms for all the foot traffic.  Parking a second car a problem but worth the effort to stay at this location.  Front desk was very helpful when we asked directions to other attractions.  Planned on two nights, stayed a week and well worth it.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your time with us and decided to extend your stay.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: It was reassuring to see the Security man walking the lot while we were packing up our car to leave in the dark at :430 in the morning.  The gated entry is also a real security plus.   The breakfast had variety and the staff was attentive to the food trays and the cleaning up of tables.  The dining room was crowded, but the staff dealt efficiently with the crowd.The entire staff, right down to the gardeners are friendly and helpful.  They will try to meet any request you make.  The hotel is right across the street from entrance to Disneyland and makes it easy to walk out and rest during the day and then return to the park. No shuttles to wait for! Or to pay for!  To top it off the beds are really comfortable and the rooms are big.  There are restaurants close by in walking
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel when visiting Disneyland and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoy having you stay with us and greatly appreciate you sharing what brings you back to our hotel.  We are looking forward to your next visit with us.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: If you plan on visiting the Disneyland resort requiring overnight accommodations, and you plan on spending  most of your time in the theme parks, then the Best Western Plus Park Place Inn - Mini Suites is the place for you.  The key is convenience.  The hotel is directly across from the Disneyland Resort entrance and about a 5 minute walk to both the Disneyland and California Adventure park entrances.  Rooms are clean and modern.  Free breakfast buffet is a bonus; not too fancy (has the basics: eggs, bacon, toast, fruit, yogurt, hot/cold cereal, muffins, danish, coffee, juice etc.) -- quick and convenient.  The hotel is so close to the parks that you can easily walk back for a break (distance to the hotel from both theme park entrances is like walking from space mountain to
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you stay with us and appreciate you sharing what you liked about the hotel.  I am very pleased that the breakfast, location and accommodations met all your needs and hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Went on a family vacation this past week to see Disneyland, California Adventure and Universal Studios.  2 Adults, 4 children.  The room was a good size to accommodate all of us.  I liked that the toilet and shower were in a separate room while the counter and sink were in the main part of the room.  Pull out bed was comfortable as were the two queen beds in the room.  The pillows were horrible.  I had to use the small decorative pillow that came on the bed and two children weren't able to use the regular pillows.  They were massive, hard and heavy.  They were aweful. The location was excellent for access to Disneyland and California Adventure.  Right across the street from the main gates, we were able to get there early and come back to the room regularly if needed.  Also just
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to share your experience.  I am very pleased that you enjoyed your stay and appreciate your comments and compliments.  Unfortunately we did have an unplanned closure of the pool due to a guest getting sick and contaminating the pool.  Since it is a hotel pool, for health and safety reasons, the pool did have to be closed and chemically treated and cleaned before we could allow guests back in.  Thank you again for staying with us and we do hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We moved to this hotel halfway through our vacation and were very pleasantly accommodated. The front desk staff were professional and helpful. They let us have the room early because we were between resorts. The room was clean, quiet and roomy and best of all, right across the street from the walkway to Disneyland. The continental breakfast had a good variety but we did have to wait on occasion for the food items to be replaced and it was very busy. Probably best to get their early. Good bang for buck. We would choose it again if we come back.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to share your experience.  I am very pleased we were able to accommodate you during your transition between hotels.  Thank you for your comments and compliments, which are greatly appreciated.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Comfortable and I really appreciated the location.
Summary: As stated before the location is ideal if visiting Disneyland. The week of our visit (july 22nd-25th) it was hotter than normal in Aneheim; so we would hit disneyland first thing in morning then return to rest and swim and then go back to disney. In the hot weather I wouldn't do it any other way. The beds were comfortable and the room a nice size so our family of four wasn't cramped. Our rooms were cleaned every day during our stay. Everyone working at the hotel we encountered was very pleasant. The breakfast offered at the restraunt next door had a variety of choices and was Ok (my oldest child really liked it). Pool is rather small but my kids enjoyed it nonetheless. The rooms are not fancy but as I said comfortable-I had no trouble sleeping after fireworks at Disney. If I
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review. I am glad you were able to enjoy the pool during the very hot week and take time to rest before heading back to the parks.  Thank you for sharing what you enjoyed about our hotel.  We do appreciate your comments and compliments and look forward to having you stay with us again.  Thank you and take care

Summary: This hotel was very good.  The staff was helpfull and caring,  The location to Disneyland was excellent.  It literally is right  across the street from the Disneyland entrance.  We were very pleased with the service during our four night stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you stay with us and appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope you will be able to come stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The proximity of this hotel to the theme parks is unrivaled for the price rate of the rooms. It has everything you need and more. You don't need to break the bank to stay close to Disney. A 3 night stay here will cost you the same amount if you stay 1 night at the Grand Californian Hotel which does not have microwave, refrigerator and not to mention really small rooms. We have stayed in this hotel the 2nd time this year and have stayed here the last 3 years we have visited Disney. It is not a perfect hotel by any means but for the price and proximity you cant beat that. I recommended this place to friends and family already and were glad they listened to us. You can save that money and spend on great food and shopping during your stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us again and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoy staying with us and thank you for recommending us to family and friends.  We enjoy having you here and hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care

Summary: This hotel is close to Disneyland, across the street, which is a plus, but that's about it. Our room was not cleaned during our 2 day stay there. The faucet in the shower didn't work well and it was hard to turn on the water and then turn it from hot to cold or cold to hot. Room smelled like smoke, it was a non-smoking room.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to share your experience.  I am sorry that you did not receive cleaning service.  I do see that you had mentioned at check out that on your first night you did not receive service and we did provide compensation.  I do also apologize if you had trouble with the shower and that the room smelled like smoke.  If this had been reported to us during your stay we could have definitely addressed these issues for you to ensure you had a comfortable stay.  I do hope you enjoyed your time at Disneyland.  Please come stay with us again and allow us to provide the legendary service for which we strive.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This was my second visit to this hotel in as many years, as I was passing through Los Angeles on trips to Australia. I love Disneyland and will take any opportunity to visit. The hotel is absolutely perfect for such trips. You literally walk out the door, cross the road and you're at Disneyland!  The rooms are perfectly adequate (in fact larger than was needed), with clean enough bathrooms and facilities. The air-con and refrigerator would have kept me awake on normal occasions, but after spending a day in the parks I easily fell asleep.  Being in a room quite far from the reception, the wifi was useless. Unfortunately the staff were unable to help and instead gave me a number to call for technical support. This proved ineffective and a waste of time.  Never mind though, staying
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting us again while passing through.  We appreciate you taking the time to write a review and share your experience.  I am sorry you had trouble with the internet service when you stayed. However, since your stay with us we have switched internet providers and had a new system installed.  I hope you will stay with us again next time your passing through.  Thank you for your comments and compliments they are much appreciated.  Thank you and take care

Summary: Just steps to Disneyland Resort. Best location for families with small children who may require nap times in between the fun and excitement of Disney. Good breakfast selection both hot and cold. Trade off is dated rooms and small pool area.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  Thank you for sharing what you liked about our hotel.  We are in the planning process of updating the rooms and lobby and hope you will be able to come back and enjoy the rooms when we are done.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Great for Disneyland. Bring your own pillows
Summary: Clean, comfortable rooms. Mini suites good for families and continental breakfast with hot food items saves time and money.  Beds are comfortable but pillows are not.  Our sofa bed was worn out and saggy.  But overall, the value is great and you're in the park in 5 minutes or less.  Parking used to be free but for a few years guests have had to pay extra.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us again and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoy having you stay with us and appreciate your comments and compliments.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Location is perfect. We were going to DL which is right across the street. Restaurants were within walking distance, or on the same street. Staff was courteous. Our room was big enough for 5. The breakfast was well above average for a free breakfast. Lots of food to choose from, but seating at breakfast was limited. We stayed for 3 nights. On the first morning our shower handle broke off, not allowing us showers. We called and they had it fixed before we got back from breakfast. Three star service for the price of a two star place.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay including the location, accommodations, and amenities offered.  I am sorry for the trouble with the shower handle but very happy we were able to fix it quickly for you so you could start your day.  I do hope you will be able to come stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I have been staying at this hotel since I was a child. Every time I stay, I enjoy it. The rooms are always so clean. The staff is very friendly and helpful. I love being able to just walk right across the street and enter Disneyland. I look forward to going back in a few weeks when I run the Disneyland Half Marathon. This is the one hotel I always recommend for anybody going down to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us again and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoy having you stay with us and appreciate you recommending our property.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We look forward to seeing you in September and hope you have a great run.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: suite not really a suite. looks better than it really is. paying for location. breakfast reminded me of a mess hall. coffee was awful, buy it next door. room was clean and served the purpose. parking fee should be included in price. very hard to get out of driveways. easy walk to disneyland
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very sorry you did not fully enjoy your stay with us. We do not have suites at this property.  We have mini-suites which are larger than a standard room, beds are all in one room, and it holds up to six guests.  We do have an in driveway and an out driveway for easy in and out access.  I do show that you told us you did not have a vehicle while staying here and were not charged for parking which may have led to your difficulty.  We do appreciate your comments and hope you had a wonderful time at the parks.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: You can't beat the location of this hotel if you are visiting Disneyland! It is across the street! Rooms are big and beds are comfy. The staff is professional, kind and helpful. The store has reasonable prices on Disney souvenirs. Breakfast is included in the room rate. We stay there several times a year!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us when visiting Disneyland and taking the time to share your experience.  We enjoy having you here and look forward to your next visit.  Thank you for your comments and compliments. They are greatly appreciated.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: BW Park Place Inn was an excellent location, not only the hotel rooms were nice, beds were first class, staff delivered excellent service; but also, it's strategically located steps away from the Disneyland/CA Adventure gates.  Very convenient when travelling with two kids under 5.  Had a chance to rest in the afternoon, then go back to the park until closing.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to share your experience.  We enjoyed having you as our guests and appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope you will come stay with us again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The hotel is close and convenient to Disneyland.  Which is why we stayed there.  The beds are horrible, however.  Don't expect to get a good nights sleep after your day at the park.  It's too bad, it could be a fantastic place if they only placed a litle more emphasis on the guests comfort.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am sorry you did not find the beds comfortable.  We appreciate you bringing this to our attention.  We hope you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The location is so prime. Such a close distance from the hotel to Disneyland turnstiles. Stayed here for 4 nights and the convenience factor was exactly what i was looking for. Rooms are well maintained. Had one hiccup with the fridge not working when we first arrived and was taken care of within 30 minutes with a replacement. Overall experience wasnt bad at all other than the complementary breakfast. By far the worst complementary breakfast ive ever come across.  Other than that everything went very smooth.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  Thank you for sharing with us what you liked about the hotel and where we may be able to improve.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we hope you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: My daughter and I go to Disney every few years or so.  Last year we went and I noticed this hotel was being renovated so we decided to stay again.  The rooms were very nice and you can't beat the location!  Plenty of restaurants, right across the street from the parks- literally the same walking distance as Downtown Disney and it even included a breakfast buffet which was pretty good.  Parking was easy and cheap there and we went next door to a corner market often for toiletries we had forgotten.  For the price, the location and hotel were outstanding!  We had a great time!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us again and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again during your next visit to Disney.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This was our first family vacation to Disneyland and traveling with 2 little ones,great hotel and perfect location right across the street from Disneyland. This hotel will be the go to hotel on our next trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your time with us and would like to come back for your next trip.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The only reason to stay at this hotel is the 3 minute walk to Disneyland and California Adventure.  Their breakfast is free and that is the only good thing to say about it.  There is a lot of space in the room, but the pillows feel like rocks.  It is not a very inviting hotel and the lobby etc. is not appealing.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am sorry that you did not enjoy your stay but do appreciate your comments.  They will help us evaluate our service and offerings.  I hope you enjoyed your time in the parks.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This BW is walking distance to Disneyland... location, location, location!    We would not stay again given the lack of cleanliness of the hotel.  While it wasn't overly dirty it was kind of dingy and dated and didn't smell clean.  Some days the cleaning was good and other days it was sketchy at best.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  All comments help us to improve our service to our guests.  We will address your concerns with the staff that serviced your room.  I do hope you will come stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The hotel accommodations were exactly what we were looking for. Hotel staff were helpful and provided a great experience for me and my family. Would recommend this hotel to anyone going to the Disneyland Resort area. Thank you for a wonderful experience me and my family will never forget.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience.  I am very happy we were able to provide you with a memorable stay.  We very much appreciate your comments, compliments and recommendation.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: NIce Hotel - very close to park
Summary: The hotel is nice enough - the room is squishy if you have 6 people in a room that sleeps 6. Kept clean and no problem with the internet. Pool is a little small but nice to have. Very close to Disneyland - can be at front gate in a 10 minute walk which was great for my teens going to the park by themselves. Breakfast is okay also - there is some cooked food. Walking distance to many other places to eat also. Mostly we loved the location and the beds were comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay including the accommodations and location.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Such a great value for staying by Disney.  Good luck finding another hotel at this price that includes full breakfast and is the closest thing to crossing the crosswalk to Disneyland! Very helpful, genuinely happy staff to help out with questions. Nice little pool to cool off in when it's too hot to stay at the park. The group we traveled with regretted not staying here with us!!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guests and are very pleased you enjoyed your time with us.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We hope you and your friends will stay with us if you are in the area again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Great Hotel with an awesome location to Disneyland Park
Summary: This was a nice, clean, quiet Best Western Plus.  Nothing fancy, your typical BW hotel.  But the rooms were nice and large and the best part was to walk out your room, cross the crosswalk and across the Disney parking lot and you were at the entrance to the park in less than 5 minutes!!  I have been to Disney many times and we've always stayed at one of the Disneyland Hotels!  But, it was just my daughter and I for a 2 day stay and I couldn't justify paying their high prices for their rooms.  So I read some reviews and found the Best Western Plus Park Place and we LOVED it!    Now I'm disappointed only because I was going to surprise my husband for a weekend get-away for our anniversary in October and this hotel is sold out!!!  We never tried the free breakfast buffet because we
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and would like to be able to come back and stay with us in October.  Please give us a call if you have only checked online for availability.  We most likely have rooms still for the dates you are looking. There may just be some restrictions in place.  I hope we will see you again soon. Thank you for your comments and compliments.  They are very much appreciated.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This BW offers the BEST location to Disneyland (closer than the Disneyland hotel itself) but the rooms are OLD and in dire need of upgrades!  The carpet and furniture have not been replaced in over 10 years.  The staff and maids do a great job trying to keep the old girl clean, but the owners need to put some serious money into refurbishing the rooms.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We are actually in the remodeling planning stages so we hope you will be able to stay with us when the work is completed.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This was our 3rd time at this Best Western.  Its conveniently located across the street from the main entrance of Disneyland.  The staff provide a great "Disney-type" experience.  They are very accomodating, if you ask nicely.  We were able to check in a bit early, and found a parking spot in their lot in the morning, avoiding an additional charge in Disney parking the first day we went to the park.  The beds are comfortable, the rooms are spacious, the noise is minimal.  The staff are quick to respond to concerns or requests (like extra towels, sheets, etc).  In the past, I was unhappy with their wireless internet. They finally upgraded the first day we were there, and now I can say I am satisfied with the internet connection.  Still unhappy with my Sprint Service, but at least
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us again and for taking the time to write such a detailed review.  We enjoy having you stay with us and are very pleased that you return to our hotel when visiting Disneyland.  Thank you for letting us know that you noticed the improvement in the internet service and the crowd management in the breakfast area.  Thank you for the wonderful promotion of our hotel.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Excellent service exceeded my expectations.  Very friendly and helpful staff.  Large room to accommodate a large family.  Clean and perfect location to Disneyland...not sure if you can get any closer to the entrance!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to share your experience.  I am very pleased we exceeded your expectations.  Your comments and compliments are very much appreciated and we hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We stay here every time we go to Disneyland. The location is perfect, right in front of the main gate which makes for an easy walk back to the hotel. It is clean and the beds are comfortable.There are places near by if you are hungry too. Was not a fan of the breakfast...fake eggs and stale waffles. Not a huge deal to me. I will continue to stay here for sure.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the location and accommodations.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated.  We look forward to your next stay.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel is perfect for a family with young kids.  Easy to walk to and from after a long day at Disneyland.  We were also glad we were able to some back during the day and use the pool since it was so hot when we visited! Plenty of room for our family of 6, super clean and a great free breakfast.  We will definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am glad you were able to enjoy the pool and the free breakfast during your stay.  Your comments and compliments are much appreciated and we hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Need to accommodate handicap people better!!! Only one elevator so should be places close to elevator. More handicap stalls by each stairwells. Everything else was great with the Hotel service and Restaurant!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to share your experience.  The two elevators are located in the center of the property with the handicap parking stalls located with easy access to the elevators.  The location of the accessible rooms was chosen for the event of an emergency where elevators were not available.  With the rooms placed in the very front of the building near the stairs, the rooms could be checked immediately to provide any necessary assistance with evacuation.  We do try and meet all of our guests needs and requests.  Unfortunately we do not have the room type your reserved, on the first floor.  They are only located on the 2nd and the 3rd.   I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and do appreciate your comments and compliments.  We do hope you will stay with us again.  Mahalo.  Malama Pono.

Summary: We really enjoyed this hotel. It is right across the street from Disneyland, can't beat that. It is actually closer that the Disney hotels and a lot better rates also. Disney hotels start at $300+/night. Surprised us because you get Disney hotels at Disney World starting below $100/night.      A free continental breakfast is served next door at the IHOP. Staff were very helpful. Rooms were clean You can only buy park hopper tickets at the hotel, not the 1 park per day tickets. No problem, get them at the park. Not a very big line up. This is as close as you can get to the park, unless you sleep on a park bench in Disneyland. Highly recommended. Enjoy your stay at Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your time with us.  We appreciate your comments and compliments and hope you will come stay with us again.  Thank you and take care

Summary: We recently returned from a 4 night stay at this hotel.  It is literally right across the street from Disney!  We couldn't believe how close it was.  We had a king bed with the pull out sofa couch.  The room is not overly large, but we had room.  Two kids slept on the sofa bed, which was not very comfortable for them, but we made do.  The room is dark with the curtains shut, but that made for great napping in the afternoon before returning to the parks.  The frig was very large and held plenty of water and sodas, however there is no freezer compartment.  The pool is small and can get crowded.  The hot tub was nice after a long park day.  Breakfast was plentiful with a nice selection (and included!)  We had a minor maintenance issue and it was taken care of quickly and very
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review. We appreciate you sharing what you enjoyed about the hotel.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your time here and hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care

Summary: This hotel was wonderful. I was just across the street from Disney which was the biggest reason we picked it. The rooms were large and very clean. The beds were comfortable with the exception of the hide- a -bed. The hotel staff was helpful and friendly. This was our second stay at this hotel and we would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us again and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased that you enjoy the location, accommodations, and friendliness of the staff.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: A great place to stay when visiting Disneyland
Summary: This hotel is the closest to Disneyland- you literally just walk across the street! It is very clean, comfortable, and the staff is very friendly and helpful. There is a complimentary breakfast with quite a large selection: scrambled eggs, meat (sausage or ham depending on which day), potatoes, bagels, toast, donuts, muffins, a variety of fruits, cereals, juices, and of course coffee (I would skip the coffee). Something for the whole family.  We wanted something close to the park, and got it- along with so much more. I would stay here again without hesitation.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your time with us including the accommodations, location, service and breakfast.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Stayed here one night with a total of 6 people.  Clean room with decent accommodations.  We had two beds and a sleeper sofa.  Worked for our needs.  Walls are thin and you can hear your neighbors.  Breakfast at Ihop was good and the balloon character guy was the best I've ever seen.
Manager Response: Thank you for stay with us and sharing your experience.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the accommodations. Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We stayed at this Best Western for 10 nights and very much enjoyed our stay. The room was plenty large enough for our family of 5 and it was always clean and well stocked. We found the fridge to be larger than most motel sized fridges and worked great for us. We did not have time for the pool, but l lounged in the area and found it to be very nice. The only small drawbacks for us were the laundry facilities and breakfast. I found it hard to find the washing machines not in use - 2 washers and dryers are not enough for a hotel this size. But when I finally did get to use them, they did work very well and found the cost to be very economical compared  to other motels we have stayed at. We found the breakfast area very old and overall unclean. Even though the food was ok, I found
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you stay with us and are very pleased you enjoyed your time here.  The restaurant will be undergoing renovation in a few months. Hopefully we will see you again and you will be able to enjoy the updated facilities.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  They are very much appreciated.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I love the hotel, staff is good, location and clean. A bit out of my price range but still a nice hotel. I will have to look for a different hotel in our next trip there is one down the street that we stayed a couple of years ago and was also pleased and they prices are a bit cheaper. I cant give this hotel a bad review with the exception of the price but it is a very nice hotel and the staff is very helpful
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoy having you stay with us and appreciate your comments and compliments.  Our prices fluctuate depending on the time of year, so hopefully you will be able to stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This is the cleanest and most accommodating Best Western I have ever stayed at.  Everything sparkles here and someone is cleaning all the time.  They are shampooing carpets or washing windows or scrubbing tile grout.  This staff is amazing and make you feel at home!  They are so helpful.  Had trouble with my room key and the Gardner offered to help!  We highly recommend this site.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to share your experience. I am very pleased you had such a wonderful experience with us and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope you will come stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: clean, convenient hotel to Disneyland for the price
Summary: Nothing beats the location of this hotel to Disney's entrance and the great breakfasts! The rooms are clean, there's a mini fridge and microwave, and it is literally across the street from the entrance to the disneyland park!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review. I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay including the location and room amenities.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: My family stayed here for six nights. We were very satisfied. The rooms (we had two) were clean, large and included several amenities. All of the staff was professional and friendly. We will differently be staying there on our next vacation.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having your family stay with us and appreciate your comments and compliments.  We definitely look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This is my first time to Disneyland and we decided on the hotel because of it's location and the price is right.  We were so glad it is a right choice.  The room is clean and seems to have been renovated because the bathroom is clean and tidy without any crack or mouldy smell. The breakfast is simple but adequate to fill us up before the start of the day. The number 1 plus for me is the location.  It is right across the gate to Disneyland.  We were able to return in the evening, wash-up, then head back to the parks again for the evening shows and fireworks.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and I hope you had an absolutely wonderful experience at Disneyland.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We hope you will be able to come stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Really good experience!  Newer hotel....great staff and really good breakfast!  I travel with 14 young girls and some other parents for the AYSO National Games.  This place was great!  We are from Hawaii anf this was the first time many of the girls have been off island.  Staff was very helpful.  Rooms were great thought he pull out sofa bed was a little rough on my old bones but still acceptable.  Nice lobby area with big TV's and they had a social hour with free hambergers and hot dogs!  That was really nice.  Afortable too....
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and hope everyone had fun at the AYSO National Games.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We hope you will stay with us the next time you come to the mainland.  Mahalo, Malama Pono.

Summary: This is a very clean and close hotel right across the street from Disneyland.  The breakfast staff is not very helpful.  They needed to wash off the tables and clean up the area a bit.  But the hotel is nice and has a fun pool in between the hotel that is small but clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay with us.  I will pass your comments on to the breakfast supervisor so she can make the necessary improvements.  Your comments and compliments are appreciated and we hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Right across the street from Disneyland main gate with decent breakfast, small pool and hot tub, friendly front desk and more than spacious rooms. (double queen suite) This place is perfect for Disney travellers.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you stay with us and appreciate your comments and compliments. We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I was planning a trip to this location and was planning to book the hotel with my points and upgrade to a room that was large enough for my family. I called ahead and double checked.  The guy at the front desk stated that was fine and to call back as soon as I made the reservations with my points and he could do the upgrade. When I called back the next day to do the upgrade the office manager told me it was against there policy.  So now I have to tell my family that we have to go somewhere else. Sucks. A site should honer there employees mistakes.
Manager Response: I do apologize for any misunderstanding that may have occurred.  All of our employees are fully aware of the policy that reservations made with points are only for our standard rooms and are not eligible for upgrades.  I spoke with each gentleman who had been on the day you stated you called.  They all stated they had not spoken to someone regarding an upgrade and unfortunately, you were unable to provide me with the name of the person you spoke to.  Again I do apologize and do hope you and your family have a wonderful vacation.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: My girl was involved in Dance the Magic.   Our schedule was very busy, and a lot of meeting at different places.  Our other option was The Grand Disney Hotel.  We choose this location because it is right in front of the gate, and the price was right.  To our delight the place was exceptionally clean, the breakfast was above our expectation, and the staff was incredibly kind and helpful.  The bus stop was in front of the hotel, so coming and going anywhere was also convenient.  In our 7 nights stay, our schedule was so full, and snicking in a lot of rides in between meetings, we never have time for the room or pool.  The only different between the other place I have mentioned is the surrounding, but the rooms are very similar.  I am happy at the decision I have made to stay here
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I hope your daughter had fun participating in Dance the Magic.  I am very pleased we exceeding your expectations and appreciate your comments and compliments. We hope you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Good location, close  to Disney parks
Summary: We recently stayed here for seven nights as part of our LA trip and as per other reviews cannot fault the location as it is basically right at the door step of the entry to the disney theme parks. The room we had was on the third floor close to the front of the hotel and was quiet. The room was clean and their was a small fridge for putting drinks etc in. The beds were comfortable. Only issue is that the bathroom was quite small and their was no sink for brushing your teeth etc other than the one in the main room. Staff over all were very good although the gentlemen on the night desk when we checked in seemed to be a bit bored and uninterested...may have just been a long shift. They provide complimentary breakfast next door at Captain Kidd's upstairs. Most of the reviews that I
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to share your experience.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the accommodations, location and breakfast provided.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we hope you will be able to stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I've stayed at 5 other properties over 10 visits to Disneyland and I have never been as impressed as I was with this one. Large, well-decorated and clean rooms, that offer a comfortable place to stay RIGHT across the street from Disneyland. I am pretty sure this is a shorter walk to the main entrance than the Disneyland Hotel. I can't recommend the Park Place Inn enough!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  Your recommendation is very important to us and we greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  It is wonderful reading that we have provided the accommodations and service that makes us stand out over the other properties where you have stayed.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I brought my daughter and her best friend to Disneyland to celebrate their 16th birthdays and stayed at this hotel for 5 nights in July 2014.  I chose this hotel since it was the closest one to the parks with a good price point. It's nothing fancy but it has everything you should need for a good stay.  We stayed in a room with a King bed and a sleeper sofa and there was plenty of room for the 3 of us.  My daughter's friend slept on the sleeper sofa which wasn't the greatest, but she can sleep anywhere and was exhausted every night from our Disney adventures so had no problems.  As an adult, I wouldn't have wanted to have to sleep there. This hotel is directly across from the entry to the Disneyland resort and the hotels there are thin and long - our room was at the very back of
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to share your experience. I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and hope your daughter and her friend had a wonderful birthday celebration.  We greatly appreciate all of your comments and compliments, which have provided us with valuable information for improving our service.  We hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We have stayed several times at this hotel.  It is directly across the street from the shuttle drop at Disneyland.  We are able to walk back to the room a rest in the afternoon, returning in time for the parade and the cooler temperatures of the evening.  The suite is comfortable, clean and as all the essentials.  The staff is helpful and extends the positive experience that Disney provides.  This is an annual trip and very enjoyable.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us again and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoy having you stay with us and appreciate your comments and compliments.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: A nice hotel situated right at the crosswalk to the Disneyland entrance!  Customer service was outstanding with Antoinette during check-in.  She searched to find us adjoining suites.  We didn't expect this perk---nor did I realize how valuable it would turn out to be!  (cousins who only see one another once or twice a year had fun being so close)  Rooms were clean and our 2 queen suite was adequate size for two adults and two teen girls.  Small fridge was not turned on (so took a while to cool our bottles of water) but had a small freezer compartment.  The adjoining suite (grandma, sister-in-law, two teen girls) did not have the freezer area.  No issues with outside noise at all during the night.  (we went to bed after 11:30pm each night though)  Complimentary breakfast is
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to share your experience.  I will pass on your comments to Antoinette. Thank you for sharing how she helped make your stay memorable.  I do apologize that the refrigerator was not on when you checked in.  I will pass on a reminder to housekeeping to make sure everything is functioning in the room before the room is reported ready.  Thank you for your comments, compliments, and recommendation.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care

Summary: Our family went on a trip with my sister and her family and our parents.  The hotel was awesome, so close to Disneyland we easily took breaks from the park to relax at the pool.  The beds were very comfortable so we were ready for the busy days at the park.  I would recommend this hotel to anyone looking to visit Disneyland!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your time with us and were able to take advantage of the pool.  Your comments and compliments are much appreciated and we hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The hotel was fine but they don't have parking for paid guests!  The breakfast food was greasy the staff were nice.  After parking to check-in then told we would have to come back later we had to park at the hotel next door!  We stay at hotels because we don't like the Disney parking garage.  We have annual passports and drive to the park so parking is a must!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very sorry you were disappointed with the parking situation.  Check in is at 3 pm with parking available after 12 pm on the day of arrival.  On day of departure parking is available until 3 pm.  Unfortunately on your day of arrival you arrived before 12 pm and we were unable to accommodate your vehicle.  I hope with the clarification on the parking information provided to you in your confirmation email, you will decide to stay with us again.  Thank you and take care

Summary Heading: Don't let the location fool you!
Summary: Although the convenience factor is tempting, the layout of the hotel prevented us from getting proper rests, and no one wants to be grumpy in Disneyland. I found no fault with the staff, or the room itself but WOW was it noisy!  It has outdoor corridors, faces onto a parking lot of another hotel and restaurant, and is on the busiest intersection. It was noisy early in the mornings for those that like to get an early start, straight on through till midnight for those that like to shut that park down...and forget taking your little ones back for an afternoon nap...On our last trip I saw the nightly rate was $50 more than a few other comparable hotels. For that rate you can hop in a cab to save the walk and still be ahead of the game.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very sorry you did not enjoy your stay with us.  Some of the areas of the hotel do receive heavier traffic and at time some guests can be quite inconsiderate.  I do hope you will give us another chance.  We can try and place you in a quieter location towards the back of the property or on a higher floor depending on your room needs.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Excellent Hotel if you are visiting Disneyland
Summary: Location is excellent because you only pass the street and you arrive to Disneyland, the rooms are very normal, clean and comfortable, but the bathroom is very small. The breakfast is included in the price and is buffet, is good, and if you travel with groups or children this hotel  is a very good option.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to share your experience.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care

Summary: Our travel agent didn't let us down when she said this was about location.   Directly located opposite the entrance of Disneyland, this was the perfect place to stay.   Ideally recommended for families, our room contained a double bed and a sofa bed.  I can personally tell you the soda bed is not the most comfortable and is better off for the kiddies.    Wifi was included but the strength of signal was not the best.  Shopping and Food access is brilliant.   You have Denny's and IHOP just next door and full access to Downtown Disney for free (you just have to go through security).  The hotel has an ATM in the lobby and a 24 hour reception which was handy as we had to check out at 4am.     Breakfast is included, you just have to go to the hotel next door but I wouldn't recommend
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to share your experience.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your time with us including the location and amenities offered.  We have since installed a new internet service and have had wonderful results with the new company.  I do hope you will be able to come back and visit us again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Our family has been staying at the Best Western Park Place Inn for years. We've gone on countless trips to Disney and in the past ten years, we've only stayed at a different place like four or five times.  The location is everything, as it's right at the pedestrian crosswalk to Disneyland.   If you're looking for a luxurious suites, though, this isn't the place. The suites are simply two beds and a pull out sofa. If I had to guess, you could fit at least six people to a suite. Not bad.   Each room is allowed a parking spot and, unlike its sister hotel, the spots don't feel totally cramped. It also might be one of the few hotels on S. Harbor that don't charge extra for parking. That's always nice.  The staff is nice and helpful, providing you with directions about nearby shops
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us again and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoy having you stay with us and are very pleased you have made us your Disney home.  We do charge $10.00 per night for parking.  Are breakfast has also expanded to include toaster waffles, scrambled eggs, sausage/ham, potatoes, 2 yogurt options, 4 cereal options, oatmeal, two toast options, bagels and cream cheese, variety of muffins and pastries, donuts, fruit juices, milk, tea, coffee, and hot chocolate.  Thank you for your comments and compliments which are greatly appreciated. We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care

Summary: Great hotel. Clean and in walking distance to Disneyland. This was our first time staying here but we will definitely be back. Great breakfast the whole family enjoyed. Great prices even over 4th of July weekend..
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing what you liked about the hotel.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and will be visiting us again. Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We look forward to your next stay.  Thank you and take care

Summary Heading: The great staff makes this hotel!
Summary: It's not the most glamorous, updated or beautiful but the staff at this hotel and the price make it the one to stay at. I typically stay at Disneyland Hotel, Grand Californian or Paradise Pier but with the recent increase in hotel and park admissions price we are opting for more reasonably accommodations.  Pros: closest hotel to Disneyland entrance (closer than the resort hotels), great hospitality, always someone at front desk, they check in with you during your stay to make sure everything is up to par, secure parking, huge complimentary breakfast next door, clean rooms, large refrigerators, microwave, coffee makers, two luggage stands, sitting area in rooms.  Cons: needs to be updated.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review of our hotel.  I am very pleased you enjoyed our service, breakfast, and accommodations.  We are in the planning stage, preparing to begin work on updating the property.  We hope you will come and stay with us again and enjoy the improvements as we make them.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Excellent locarion, price, customer service!!!!!! The picture on their website is exactly what u see when u get there. The free breakfast was wonderful. Very professional front desk. Housekeeping friendly! Right across Disney entrance!!! I will not stay anywhere else!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased to read how much you enjoyed your stay and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We would enjoy having you stay with us again and hope to see you soon.  Thank you and take care

Summary: This hotel is one of closest to the entrance to Disneyland. The staff is friendly. The breakfast is better then most of the hotel breakfasts I have experienced. The grand kids loved the pool. The room was clean and comfortable, the sofa opens to become a queen sized bed. Over all It was a good place to stay. The price is competitive with other Inns in the area. I would stay again if I were going back to the Disneyland area.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing what you liked about the hotel.  I am very pleased you enjoyed staying here and that the grandkids had a chance to have fun in the pool.  We would be very happy to have you stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We just had wonderful Disney trip , stay at BWPPI was pleasent.It is just 5 mins walk for both parks. Rooms, room service and breakfast was also nice. Will stay again at this location when we visit Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the service, accommodations and breakfast.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We look forward to seeing you during your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I don't think you can get any closer to the Disney properties, honestly.  The rooms were spacious too and liked the sink and counter being outside of the bathroom.  I think the rugs could be updated though, they looked a bit grungy to me but I would stay there again if I was ever to revisit Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and share your experience.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us.  We are actually in the process of working with a designer to redo our rooms.  Hopefully you will be able to come back and enjoy the room when we are finished.  Thank you and take care

Summary Heading: The Best Disneyland/California Adventure Park Hotel
Summary: We love this hotel for the location, breakfast, communications, internet, and service.  I received pre-visit email communications and suggestions.  Upon arrival, we were advised that our room request notes were able to be accommodated; and our bags were held while we were in the parks. I was called upon room availability, although we naturally didn't officially check in until after park closures. Breakfast is really a great value; both hot and cold items, including fresh fruits, are served.  (The only imperfection was their coffee; for some reason, as my fellow travelers discovered, there was the need for lots of creamer use, even for those who don't usually use much.)  Every employee at the hotel and breakfast sites were courteous and gracious.  The only imperfection at the
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us again and taking the time to share your experience.  I am very pleased you enjoy the service, accommodations, location and breakfast offerings.  I am very sorry the front desk did not provide the detail that should have been offered regarding the laundry or service or ask clarifying questions.  This will be addressed with the staff so the service can be improved for all of our guests.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: You really can't beat the location. It was so nice to walk across the street and be right at Disneyland. The room decor is nothing to write home about (holy brown/tan everything!), but the rooms were big & easily fit our family of 6. The breakfast is next door at Captain Kidd's and it was really quite impressive...huge variety of food & lots of space. (Not gourmet obviously, but decent.)
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to share what you liked about your stay.  We enjoyed having you as our guests and appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope you will come stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: More like a motel than a hotel, some of the staff not that friendly or helpful, maybe I got them on a bad day. For those of you that like a soft bed and pillows this is definitely not a place for you, they are like rocks. I've no complaints about cleanliness it was spotless and it is across the road from Disneyland with a small shopping centre complete with some great restaurants only 10 minutes walk away.  Would I go back? Probably not
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am sorry you did not have a good experience with all of our staff members.  We do work to ensure everyone has a wonderful stay and positive experience.  Your comments and compliments are appreciated and I hope you will try staying with us again.  Thank you and take care

Summary Heading: We love this property, so we come back.
Summary: Situated across the street from Disneyland, this is a great place for families to stay.  We were traveling with three exchange students and two grandchildren.  First off, there's free Internet, and the rooms are set up perfectly for a large group.  We had two rooms this time right next to each other.  Two queen beds, and a sleeper couch that has a small partition.  You can have a sitting space or extra kids can sleep there.  The housekeeping is spot on.  I would classify the room as extremely clean.  So is the lobby.  There's a pool but we didn't use it this time.  Breakfast is free.  It's right next door and was complete.  Although there must be a bunch of families staying there, it was completely quiet when we were there.  There's many different restaurants up and down the
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us again and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoy having you here and appreciate you sharing what you like about our hotel.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care

Summary: Good location right across the entrance to the theme park.  Breakfasts were terrible.  Pool was not heated.  Rooms were average, but didn't matter as we spent all day at the parks and only spent time at the motel to shower and sleep.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  Your comments and compliments are appreciated and will help us evaluate our service.  The pool is heated year round to 80 degrees.  It is checked on an hourly basis to ensure the temperature holds and that the chemicals are maintained at the appropriate level.  I am sorry that you did not enjoy the breakfast offerings.  I hope you will stay with us again if you come back to the mainland.  Mahalo, Malama pono

Summary: Prior to my stay, I had a very nice staff member call me in advance to confirm my reservation and reserve my parking.  Parking is very limited so she wanted to make me aware of the 10 dollar fee and confirm if I would be parking a vehicle.  The staff was professional, organized  and very helpful.  The location is literally across the street from Disneyland - this place will save your feet!  The rooms are very clean and comfortable.  I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review. I am very pleased you enjoyed the service provided by our employees and as well as the location and accommodations. We enjoyed having you as our guest and do hope you will be able to stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The best part about this hotel was the location, location, location.  Definitely the best value immediately around Disneyland.  The rooms were adequate size, beds were a little small but the staff was friendly and rooms were clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care

Summary: You cannot beat the location of this motel.  The rooms are mediocre to good, bring your own pillows!!  But, alas, we were there for Disneyland which we could access by crossing one street.  The location of this hotel is amazing.  And the access to restaurants is definitely a plus.  We had an amazing time, and we werent there for the hotel, but the hotel was there for us!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to share your experience.  I hope you had a wonderful and memorable first family trip to Disneyland.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel, can't beat the location!
Summary: We stayed here because it was literally across the street from Disneyland. You can't beat it. Great price, nice hotel, comfortable rooms, free breakfast, and friendly staff. If we go back to Disneyland we will stay here again for SURE!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to share your experience.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the location, amenities, accommodations and service from the staff.  We look forward to having you stay with us if you visit Disneyland again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: It is the closest to Disneyland. It's room is small, but has a large fridge. Pool is okay, and breakfast has plenty of options. They serve some type of breakfast meat, potatoes, pastries, and eggo waffles. Expect to pay in full when you arrive.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am please you enjoyed your stay and appreciate your comments and compliments. We hope you will come stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Close to food, Disneyland, clean and comfortable..can walk into park, no shuttles to wait for.  The room is usually ready early enough and if not, you can store your bags, park and go away for a few hours....like the gated parking for security.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoy staying with us and appreciate your comments and compliments. I hope you will stay with us again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Excellent place to stay for location and price
Summary: This is our 3rd stay at the Best Western Plus Park Place Inn in the last 4 years.  We have stayed at other hotels along Harbor Blvd, but this is the best so far.  The price is the best value for your money. Can't get any closer to Disneyland entrance with the exception of Disney's Grand Californian hotel. Our kids enjoyed the free breakfast at Captain Kidd. Now I am aware the breakfast is not made to order but it is free and we do enjoy it. With 6 people, the free breakfast saves us money that we can spend for lunch or dinner or other stuff.  Never had problem finding a parking spot in our 3 visits here.  We have stayed probably about 20 nights here and we will not hesitate to stay or recommend this facility in the future. I have attend a conference at the Disneyland Hotel and
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us again and taking the time to review our property.  We enjoy having you as our guest and greatly appreciate your comments, compliments and recommendation of our hotel.  We hope you will be back soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Hotel's right in front of Disneyland. If you get tired from all the walking, you can always come back to freshen up or take a nap and then return so easily to the park. Breakfast is free, if the area is full and you don't want to blend in the crowd (kids are very active in the morning while they're having breakfast coz they're looking forward to going to Disneyland), if this bothers you, you're free to take the food in your room. Restaurant and Shopping's right around the area as well. Service was excellent. Room very comfortable for a family of 4. Very convenient, highly recommended!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay including the breakfast, location, accommodations, and service.  Your comments and compliments, and recommendation are greatly appreciated.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel has a perfect location with an easy walk to Disneyland (right across the street). The mini-suite room was comfortable and had plenty of space for our family of six.  The shower in the bathroom had great water pressure.  The free breakfast was one of the best we've seen in a hotel...LOTS of food choices, which was great.  We would happily stay in this hotel again!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your recent visit to Disneyland.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the accommodations and breakfast provided.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We would love to have you stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Best Western Park Place Inn- Disneyland
Summary: The accommodations were excellent, along with the staff and the price for the value of what was received.  The location was perfect as it is right across from the walkway to Disneyland.  The breakfast was superb as it is a full breakfast, not just a continental breakfast, which makes the price of the room even better.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you here and are very pleased to read that you enjoyed the accommodations, location staff, and breakfast.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We stayed here for 14 nights as a party of 10 occupying 3 rooms.  There are so many reviews which were very helpful to me before we went...as so many have said before the location of this hotel is superb.  5 minute walk to either of the parks and Downtown Disney as well as easy walking distance to a number of restaurants (although we did have a car and ventured away from the park locations to eat).    All our rooms were perfectly adequate with fridge, coffee maker, TV and microwave.  Coffee isn't great so i was glad we had taken our own.  Beds were very comfortable with many pillows if you wanted them and enough storage space for 3 suitcases of clothes!  Only complaint with the room (244) was that it was very noisy even though it was at the back of the hotel.  The aircon is
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write such detailed review.  I am very pleased you and your party enjoyed your time at our hotel including the accommodations and location of the hotel.
