Your comments an compliments are greatly appreciated and we hope you will have the chance to stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel is literally across the street from the main entrance to Disneyland.  Our stay was great!  The room was very clean and the staff were friendly.  The property is very well maintained.  The breakfasts were quite nice with a variety of items to chose.  There are plenty of restaurants in short walking distance.  We didn't have any issues with any part of our five day stay.  I would recommend this hotel to fellow travelers who would like a nice, clean and affordable place to stay.  I would stay there again on my next trip to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to share your experience.  I am very pleased you had a great stay and enjoyed the accommodations, amenities, and friendliness of the staff.  Your comments, compliments, and recommendation are greatly appreciated.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care

Summary Heading: Just across street from main gate
Summary: Location was awesome being immediately across the street from the main entrance.  Hotel rooms were of the usual high quality and cleanliness of the Best Western chain.  No issues or problems.  Price was exactly as quoted on Internet.  Staff was polite and helpful.  Complimentary breakfast was next door.  Food was average at best, but it was indeed free.  Overall, great location could not be beaten unless staying inside Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased that you enjoyed your stay and that we met all of your expectations.  Thank you for your comments and compliments and we hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care

Summary Heading: Our stay at Best Western Plus Place Inn
Summary: We have always stayed at Best Western Mini Suites, Anaheim when our family goes to Disneyland. The staff  has always treated us with the upmost respect and hospitality. We highly recommend this hotel Because it's very family friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us when you visit Disneyland and taking the time to write a review.  We appreciate your kind comments and compliments and look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care

Summary: We wanted to stay at one of the hotels right across the street from the entrance to Disneyland.  We picked this one after a lot of careful research and we were not disappointed.  First of all, every employee that we interacted with was courteous and helpful, from the ones we spoke with on the phone to the people at the front desk to the housekeeping staff.  The included breakfast had more options than most continental breakfasts do.  I had seen complaints about the WiFi, but we never had a single issue with it (they told us that they were in the process of upgrading it, so perhaps it will be better now than it used to be).  We needed 3 rooms and they were able to accommodate our request for all 3 rooms to be together with a connecting door between 2 of them.  Here is one thing I
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to share your experience.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and that we were able to meet your expectations from your research.  We did finish the upgrade of our internet service and have had exceptional service from the new provider.  All of your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care

Summary: Great location, comfortable, pool & spa to relax in & take a break from Disneyland then you can head back & continue the fun! We had a great time staying here! In my opinion it's one of the best deals around! Staff is friendly & helpful. You get convenience, comfort, affordability  so (more to spend at Disneyland!)
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and we are very pleased you had a great time staying here.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care

Summary: When I booked this Hotel I did not know that it was literially right accross the entrance to Disneyland.  This was great - my family was able to go back to the hotel for a couple of hours during the mid day early afternoon and rest then head back and be rested for more rides and World of Color.  The only thing is if you get back to early to the hotel your room may not be serviced.  We only had one day where it was not and they were not able to service it that day.  Was not a problem for us but the Hotel had left a message that they want the room serviced the next day.  I would recommend that you let the Hotel staff know if you are planning on returning to your room during the day to rest so they can do yours first.  Other than that I would highly recommend this hotel and will
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to share your experience.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and the convenience of our location. As you mentioned if we know guests will be returning to their room for an afternoon break, we will definitely do our best to ensure the room is cleaned prior to the guests' return.  Your recommendation is greatly appreciated and we look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The location was super convenient... we were able to go back to the hotel midday and take a break.  Breakfast selections were pretty good. Cereals, bagels, yogurt, fruits, eggs, meat, waffles, potatoes, pastries. Coffee was not too good.  Internet speed was fast enough for browsing. No complaints at all. We were there from 6/9 to 6/15/14.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your time with us including the location and amenities.  Your comments and compliments are appreciated and we hope to see you again.  Mahalo, Malama Pono

Summary Heading: Great stay!  Hope to come back one day!
Summary: We stayed here for 4 days at the beginning of our US adventure (from Australia).  We had a room that slept all 6 of us (2 adult and 4 children 8-14).  The room was basically one large room with 3 double beds which was fine as each day we were exhausted and went straight to bed, but if our stay was longer the room would have been a little small as there was no where for us adults to sit & chat or watch TV after the kids went to sleep.  But for this stay it was perfect and affordable.  No issues with noise or other guests noise and we slept well.    Location was the best thing about this hotel!  Right across the road from Disneyland.  Made each day so much easier not having to walk far at the end of the day to get "home"".    Free breakfast was adequate.   Not overly thrilled with
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very happy we were able to help get your US adventure started off right.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we do hope we see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We went to Disneyland for 4 days this past week (early June) and this hotel was in the perfect location and just what we needed.  Other than the minimal issues we had with the bed blanket being a little dirty on arrival and wi-fi service that was spotty...we absolutely loved our stay.  Comfy King bed for my husband and I and the kiddo slept on the pull-out bed in the couch.  Every morning, we woke up and got dressed...grabbed some free fruit and muffins at Captain Kidds and walked the 3-5 minutes to the gates for both Disney parks!!! In the afternoon, we were able to come back for a quick rest to recharge and head back for the evening.  Hotel employees were courteous and I highly recommend this hotel for your Disneyland stay :) Location, Location, Location!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the accommodations, location, and courteousness of the staff.  I do apologize for the issue with the blanket and this has been addressed with housekeeping.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Since this hotel is directly across from Disneyland, it is the perfect place to stay. We love that once we park the car, there is no need to move it again until it is time to check out. Everything we need is within walking distance, so very convenient.  Our only concern this time was that the internet did not work at all in our room. A note was placed in our room explaining that they were attempting to upgrade and that they appreciated our patience but it was a huge inconvenience. Even using the business center computer was a challenge.  But overall, our stay was nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoy staying with us and apologize for the inconvenience with the internet upgrade during your recent stay.  I do hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The staff was fantastic, room clean, beds comfortable and generally a quiet hotel. Pool area nice but shaded a lot. Breakfast included was nice. Close to other restaurants & across the street from Disneyland. Only complaint, WORST sleeper sofa bed I have ever slept on. Everything else about our visit was fantastic! I highly recommend staying there.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to share your experience.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and appreciate you recommending our hotel.  Thank you for your comments and compliments which will help us improve our rooms and service.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We were only here for 3 days, 1 and a half were used to go to Disneyland, the other we went on a fab LA City tour. Lovely and helpful desk staff, very kindly allowed us to store our luggage on our check out day and helped us to book a great day tour. Has a really cute little giftshop and we could purchase Disneyland tickets from them as-well which saved time. Extremely comfy beds, we had a twin share so our room had two big double beds. Very clean and had all the basic commodities.   Also had quite a few 24hour restaurants next door or very close which was handy. Disneyland is literally across the road so AMAZING location if you are after a Disneyland holiday..  We didnt use it but the small pool/spa area looked clean and very inviting.  If you arnt there for Disneyland I
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write about your experience.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and are very pleased you enjoyed what our hotel has to offer.  We hope we will see you again and thank you for your comments and compliments.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Wow! What a location at the main gate of Disneyland!!!! The maid staff was wonderful, had all the needs I needed and in one heck of a great spot!!! Next trip to Disneyland will be in this hotel from now and forever!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your thoughts of our hotel.  We enjoyed having you here and are very pleased you will be staying with us for all your future visits to Disneyland.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Perfect for your trip to Disneyland
Summary: Couldn't ask for a closer hotel to Disneyland, right across the street! Rooms were clean and spacious and have a microwave, mini fridge and a coffee maker. Complimentary breakfast is served upstairs at the restaurant beside the hotel, scrambled eggs, ham, sausages, toast, bagels, hot and cold cereal, fruit and yogurt. Cant ask for much more than that. If you are looking to go to the store to stock up your fridge we met a nice guy who owns Blue Star Transportation, he took us to Food For Less for a reasonably priced fare. He waited while we quickly picked up some items and drove us back to the hotel his name is Sammy 714-209-6460. Hotel staff was very helpful. The Anderson's
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the accommodations and amenities we have to offer.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel is the perfect location to Disneyland, right across the street to walk over. We booked two Queens and the room was surprisingly big! The beds are the best to sleep on but after a long day at Disneyland it doesn't matter. The staff was very nice and the room was very clean. We tried to check in early and they didn't have any rooms available but it was so fantastic that a hotel staff member gave me a call when our room was ready, I LOVED THAT!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased to read that you had a great stay with us and enjoyed the accommodations and service provided by the staff.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Great Hotel but bad parking when busy.
Summary: On a busy day even though you have to pay $10.00 for a parking you may not get one as you pull up.But everything else in this hotel is great and it is across the street from the entrance to Disneyland.I would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the hotel and that you would stay with us again.  I do apologize for the parking. We do guarantee all of our guests a parking space.  If arriving before 12 pm a space may not be available because not all of the previous nights guests have left the parking lot yet.  We do hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care

Summary: Literally right across the road from the entrance to Disneyland so if that's why you're in Anaheim then this hotel is perfect. Rooms were basic but clean and comfortable. In room microwave and fridge make it easy if you want to store food and heat it up. Breakfast was basic but more than adequate for us and you can take it back to your room if you like. Check in was easy and staff were very helpful when arranging transport to LAX at 4.30am. I would definitely stay here again and recommend it to others.
Manager Response: Thank you fro staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the accommodations, amenities, and helpfulness of the staff.  Thank you for your comments, compliments, and recommendation.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The Best Western Park Place is ideally located for a trip to Disneyland.  The hotel is right across the street from the park.  The rooms are spacious, clean and comfortable.  The pool and spa are a wonderful place to relax after the park.  Besides offering a continental breakfast, they are also located within walking distance of several nice reasonably priced restaurants.  The staff is knowledgeable and friendly.  They were even able to recommend a place for my son to get a haircut!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to share your experience.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your time with us and that we were able to provide information on a place for your son.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated. Thank you for sharing what made your stay so enjoyable.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care

Summary Heading: Stayed here with 2 kids at least 6 times!
Summary: Bring your own shampoo/conditioner-the ones in the room don't work well Ask for the rooms in the front the hotel...You don't want the extra walk and you want top floor. Rooms above you are very noisy! We were disappointed we asked for rooms closest to the front and were put all the way at the back this time.   Breakfast is okay-don't expect anything great (eggs are a little watery, toasters burn your bread-tip: don't let your bread sit for more than a minute and then turn it and toast the other side!) Nice that you can take food back to your room and also bring some extra muffins into the park with you for later. Bring a ziploc bag or do what we do and put muffins in the coffee cups and throw into your backpack for a snack later. Hahaha Overalls breakfast is fine. Sausages,
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us again and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoy staying with us and appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Fantastic! Your Feet Will Thank You!
Summary: This was our first stay at this property. Check in was very easy. Jeffery was very efficient and every staff member we encountered were very friendly. We had a rental car for the last part of our trip, so $10 per day parking fee, which wasn't bad at all. The room was very spacious. We were on the third floor on the back side of the hotel, so it was quiet. The beds were so comfortable. Never ran out of hot water for our showers. They were actually upgrading their WiFi service while we were staying there. The hot tub was amazing for aching calf muscles from all the walking. They have a gift shop in the lobby area that has EXTREMELY low prices on souvenirs compared to that of the park. As stated by other posts, right across the street, BOOM! You are there! The breakfast buffet is
Manager Response: Thank for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and are very pleased you had a amazing 15 year Wedding Anniversary.  We wish you many more.  Thank you for your detailed review.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: BW Park Place is the best location in walking distance to Disneyland.  The rooms are close to the park, clean, large, quiet, and a great staff.  The use of fridge and microwave in room make it easy to come back for snacks and lunch, as well as having a hot breakfast provided in the morning.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us including the location, accommodations, amenities, and staff.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We had two rooms with a connecting door.  It was great.  We requested rooms near each other and were surprised they were able to make this available to us.  I've stayed here at least once before.  We enjoyed it and were able to get a decent rate at costcotravel.com.  We have stayed at the choice hotel, off Manchester, I believe.  It was the worst. We stayed several times using Priceline at the Doubletree Orange by the Outlets at Orange. We enjoyed the hotel but don't like using a shuttle.  We stayed at the Crowne Plaza using Priceline. This stay was just OK. We most recently stayed at the Desert Inn & Suites. This was better than the choice hotel but the worst on our list otherwise due to noise and really poor breakfast.  The beds at the Best Western Park Place Inn were
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us again and taking the time to write such a detailed review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and that we were able to provide you with connecting rooms.  We do check the pool and hot tub chemicals on an hourly basis to ensure they are at the proper levels.  Hot tubs do have a tendency to develop foam so we just have to treat it for the foam occasionally.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again soon.    Thank you and take care.

Summary: This is a wonderful location for a hotel if you are visiting Disneyland Resort! I read that it was just across the street from the resort and that is absolutely correct. You couldn't get closer! The rooms are nice and comfortable and it was just the perfect place to stay as we were there to go to the parks.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and the location of the hotel.  We hope you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care

Summary: The hotel is right across the street from Disneyland.  Great breakfast buffet, great staff!   We will stay there again!!!!!!  We checked in a little bit early, since our flight arrived early, and the staff accomodated us with holding our luggage, recommending tours to go to, since a little late for Disney that day.    The rooms were ok, for a well-used hotel.  But the beds a little lumpy.  We can't complain,  This hotel, its staff and breakfast buffett was wonderful.   We would stay there again.....You can't go wrong here!  Perfect value for the area.......
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  Thank you for your recommendation and we hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Best Westen Park Place Inn is always my first choice when we visit Disneyland. It IS right across the street. No waiting for hotels shuttles or the ART to get to & from Disneyland. The included breakfast is a great value. Not just pastries & cereal.They have toast, waffles, eggs, sausages, yogurt, milk, juice, fruits, cereal, muffins, danishes & bagels.The room refrigerator is a great convenience too. Staff is always friendly. Stayed there at least 6 times & never had a problem.
Manager Response: Thank you for making us your first choice and taking the time to write a review.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated. We do enjoy having you as our guest and look forward to your next visit.  Mahalo, Malama Pono

Summary: The location and price value were priceless for a Disneyland vacation.  There was no waiting for shuttle buses; just cross the street and into the park - again, priceless.  The staff was friendly from the front desk to maid service to restaurant employees.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review. I am very pleased you enjoyed your time with us. Thank you for your comments and compliments. We hope you will come stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Was a quiet, clean hotel.  Staff were very friendly.  Wish pool was open passed 10 p.m. Love that it was RIGHT across the street from the main gate of Disneyland!  This was our 2nd time staying there and would stay again!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us again and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoy staying with us and appreciate your comments and compliments.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Me and my family have stayed at the BW Park Place in for the past 15yrs.. We are absolutly very satisfied and Happy with everything about the hotel.. From the Clean & spacious rooms to the great pool and hot tub.. Free breakfast in the morning. and the short walk to Disneyland.. most importantly is that the staff is all around GREAT!
Manager Response: Thank you for continuously returning to stay with us when visiting Disneyland.  We enjoy having you as our guest and greatly appreciate you taking the time to write a review.  Thank you for your comments and compliments. We look forward to your next stay.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Great location if you are going to Disneyland. There is no hotel closer to the entrance. Plenty of places to eat within a 1-2 minute walk from your room. The bed was kind of hard, but overall, it was a good clean room. I didn't find any bugs or dirtiness around. I would def come back!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We couldn't have been any closer to the Disneyland entrance.  The rooms were comfortable and nice.  The free breakfast goes beyond a normal hotel breakfast.  The staff was helpful.  I had a toddler with us and often have trouble getting a crib.  This hotel had a very nice one and there was plenty of room in the hotel room to place it.  Highly recommend it if you are going to Disneyland!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and we are very pleased you enjoyed the hotel accommodations and amenities.  Thank you for your comments, compliments, and recommendation.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Very pleased with the service and location
Summary: I was very happy with this hotel, as it was just across the street from Disney. The Front desk staff were very nice, and the physical hotel was acceptable, though a tad dated.   Couple of notes for my fellow travelers:   1) When they say 3pm check in, they mean it.... not one minute earlier. I saw half a dozen other travelers rebuffed no matter how much they begged. I know, I tried :)  But they will check your bags so you can go and eat, shop, or lounge about.  2) The Housekeeping staff are amazing! Every detail was looked after, every day, for an entire week! Hint: leave them a tip, and they will love you even more!  3) The free continental breakfast is hideous! Ham that doesn't taste like ham, potatoes squishy, and on and on.... even the toaster sucked. I ate a lot of yogurt,
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay. I am sorry we were not able to check you in.  The only time we will not check a  guest in early is if there is not a room available at the time.  Otherwise we are more than happy to honor early check ins.  Thank you for all of your comments and compliments and we hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I take my 7 yr old daughter to Disneyland every year and this stay at Best Western was my second and I was not disappointed! It was a seemless registration, clean room, and at a AAA discount rate that allows me to spend $ on having fun in the parks! Love the couch and coffee table area ... That is do nice! The convenience of parking my truck and having the park entrance literally across the street is invaluable! Especially after a long day/evening at the park the quick walk to the room is appreciated! As a single mom I appreciate any extra convenience I can get ... I have made this my Go-To hotel for our Annual visits to Disneyland! No need to shop around I got their number saved in my contacts!
Manager Response: Thank you for returning to the our hotel and taking the time to write a review.  I am so pleased you enjoyed your second stay with us. Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We look forward to seeing you during your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: My daughter and I stayed here recently for 3 nights. Overall, we were very happy with our stay. Our room was clean and fairly large for a standard, two double bed room.  I was a little worried at first because we were on the second floor right across from the pool and elevator, but our room was quiet and neither proved to be an issue.  The beds were comfortable and it was convenient having a mini fridge (which was larger than most) in our room. The location is great! (Right across the street from Disneyland, about a 10 minute walk).  Although the hot food was not very good at the complimentary breakfast, there were other options (yogurt, fruit, cereals, bagels, toast)  which were fine with me. The staff were extremely friendly and helpful (and we used several different staff
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and that noise from the pool and elevator did not disturb you.  I do apologize for the Wi-Fi connectivity.  This next week we will begin installation with a new provider. Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel is literally right across the street from the entrances to Disneyland and California Adventure Park. There are a lot of really good restaurants within walking distance. The room was very spacious and clean. We had a living area which included a pull out sleeper sofa, a king sized bed, large bathroom/vanity area, microwave, and refrigerator. The bed and pillows were ok, definitely not the best that I've slept on but surely not the worst either. The staff was very friendly and helpful. There is free breakfast that has a nice variety of items. I would definitely recommend this hitel.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased to read that you enjoyed the accommodations, amenities, and location of the hotel.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We appreciate your recommendation and hope you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel was perfect for our visit to Disneyland. We stayed in the hotel for 4 nights. The breakfast buffet was great. The rooms were clean. And it is just steps away from Disneyland and many restaurants. They do charge $10 per day to park your car. But you would pay that to park in Disneyland anyway. It is a great value and location.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your time with us. Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We hope you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: For the price and location, this was perfect. The breakfast was not anything to cheer about but classified as nourishment... I think astronauts get a little better tasting nourishment. It had all the essential nutrients and vitamins to keep you going until your Disney lunch. The hotel was clean and plenty of hot water. The AC was good. TV was not so great but we are here for Disneyland. The internet while advertised is non existent. Don't even bother to try and connect. I just stayed on 4G. For extra we were able to park for the day on our check out. There is also plenty of parking on the exit side of the hotel. We really did not spend any time in the hotel other then to sleep before heading back to Disneyland. The staff was very friendly and helpful. No complaints. They stick
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience.  I am pleased that you enjoyed stay and appreciate your comments and compliments.  We will be making some improvements soon.  We do hope you will come and visit us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We usually stay at an onsite property, but we thought we'd try something different with the grandkids this year.  The hotel is right across the street from the entrance to Disneyland/California Adventure and we had asked for a room with a view of the fireworks.  We weren't disappointed.  It was great watching the fireworks from our room.  The hotel was clean, staff was great and the free breakfast was delicious.  Very convenient. The street noise was loud due to the bus station right outside our window,  but once the window was closed, no street noise.  The air conditioner was loud, but we got used to it by the 2nd day and were able to sleep through it.  Also, there was only one elevator and it was at the opposite side of the property, but all in all, it was a great trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review. I am very pleased you enjoyed your time here with the grandkids.  Having only a few rooms that face the park, I am happy we were able to meet your request.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Very conveniently located right in front of Disneyland. Decent accommodation, given that I can park here, and then don't have to worry about parking at Disneyland! Have stayed here 4 times, every time I visit Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us when visiting Disneyland.  We enjoy having you here and greatly appreciate you taking the time to write a review.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We saved for almost 2 years to have a Disney vacation.  We purchased a package Disney vacation.   We arrived with so much excitement until our first contact with hotel employees!  Every employee we had contact with for our 3 night stay was rude.  After driving all night, we asked if they had early check in, our response was no.  We said ok can we get our package so we can use tickets to go in park?  It was put on the counter without a word.  We asked about breakfast and we're told we could not eat until the next morning.  We said ok, can we change our clothes somewhere?  They pointed to a bathroom and then watched so that we wouldn't eat.  How do you go to the happiest place on earth and have a hotel be rude for your whole vacation.  We will let the Disney chain know that this
Manager Response: Thank you for writing about your experience with us.  I am sorry your arrival did not meet your expectations.  I do apologize if you felt the gentleman that helped you was rude.  I did already speak with him on how he may have been able to better address your concerns.   Unfortunately you did arrive at 6:45 am with check in not guaranteed until 3pm.  Our previous night guests have until 11 am to check out and we did not have a clean vacant room ready that early in the morning.  Breakfast in the morning is prepared for guests who were registered overnight.    I do show however that the gentleman that assisted you did preregister you for your room.  This means he would have provided you your package while accepting the payment voucher and taking care of paperwork so all that needed to be done was for you to retrieve your keys when the room was ready.  He also provided you with a parking pass so you could park here instead of having to pay for parking at Disneyland prior to checking in to the room.  I am sorry if you felt you were being watched so you wouldn't eat.  Our front desk staff does not have view of the breakfast area which is in a separate building.  The breakfast area is controlled by a breakfast employee who has a list of current guests.  Again I am very sorry if you felt at anytime a member of our staff was rude or unaccommodating.  Please feel free to call me at the hotel if you would like to discuss your situation any further.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: My friends and I agreed we would definitely stay here again.  You can't beat the convenience to Disneyland!  The rooms were clean, staff was nice, and breakfast was good.  My only complaint was the Wi-Fi.  I wasn't really able to access it from my iPad.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased to read that you and your friends would stay here again if visiting Disneyland. Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We look hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This is a great place for proximity to Disneyland. Especially with small children when you may want to skip back to the room for a break (nap) before heading back into the park. You cannot get any closer without being inside the park.   Our room was very clean and always made up very nicely when we returned in the afternoon. The pool was big enough to splash around and have some fun. We are not here for the pool but it makes for a nice way to mix up the day.   The breakfast was just so so but really what can you expect for an included breakfast. I thought they had some variety. I am not much of a breakfast eater but there is more to choose from than your typical "continental breakfast" ie pre-wrapped danish and a piece of fruit. I will say the coffee was awful. I mean not
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the convenience of our location as well as the accommodations and amenities offered.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This is a great affordable option for families looking for close proximity to Disneyland.  Although we wanted a suite with a separate bedroom, we opted for this hotel because it was so close, affordable and included breakfast. Our room was next to the pool which was a bit noisy. Next time, we will ask for something in a better location.  The room was super clean and we appreciated the turn down service each night. The WiFi didn't work AT ALL and we were unable to get a signal for our cell phones. But we LOVED being able to walk right across the street to the main gate.  No waiting for shuttles or having to walk several blocks with tired feet!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the accommodations, amenities and service provided.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we hope you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We have stayed at multiple hotels in the Disneyland area, including the Disneyland resort hotel, Grand Californian.  The BW Plus Park Place Inn is by far the best for location and value!  You literally walk out of your room cross the street and are on your way.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and sharing your experience.  I am very pleased you appreciate the location and value offered here at the Best Western Plus Park Place Inn.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Value hotel, close to parks- free breakfast daily. Great friendly employees, large rooms.We travel with two young sons and the room is large enough that we don't end up on top of each other. Closer to parks than even Disney hotels. Lots of restaurants and casual dining around the hotel location. High speed internet in rooms.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and found the accommodations comfortable.  Thank you for your comments and compliments. We hope you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: had a consistent problem when trying to exit the parking structure, the guest card wouldn't scan right so we had to dial in for them to lift the bar up. But besides that, overall good experience.  Nice comfortable bed and literally a 5 minute walk to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing you experience.  I am sorry you had trouble with your parking gate ticket.  It must have printed incorrectly.  We appreciate your comments and compliments and hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care

Summary Heading: A good clean place close to Disneyland
Summary: We stayed in this hotel based on the reviews on this site and they are accurate.  The hotel was clean, comfortable and incredible close to the main attraction.  The staff were helpful and friendly and our kids loved the pool when we came back to the hotel for a rest in the mid-day.  The only complain is the free breakfast, I know free but it is horrible.  The same items day after day and the quality was very questionable.  We ultimately stuck with eating porrage and a bagel.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to share your experience.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and appreciate your comments and compliments. We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We stayed for 4 nights in April 2014.  We went with 3 adults and 1 child, and had enough room. Location was excellent.  It is the closest hotel to the park.  Literally across the street (5 minute walk).  There was a complimentary breakfast buffet next door that was less than desirable.  The only con was a very loud air condition in the room.  No problem finding a parking spot, but had to pay additional $10 fee per night to park.  Overall, price was right for a clean comfortable stay steps to the park.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us.  I am sorry the air conditioner was loud.  We will check the unit out and replace it if necessary.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care

Summary: Clean rooms, awesome staff, great breakfast! Across the street from Disneyland. They held our luggage after checkout so we could spend another day in Disneyland before our flight then upon returning for our luggage made transportation arrangements for us.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased that you enjoyed our hotel, staff, and amenities as well as the help provided on your last day.  We appreciate your comments and compliments and hope you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We stayed 5 nights at the hotel and I would recommend this hotel.The price was affordable for a family and  Its across the street from the Disney entrance. took about 5 to 10 minutes to walk to the entry gates. The beds were comfy and we had an overall good experience. It had a great selection for the buffet breakfast (waffles,ham,eggs,potatoes,fruit,cereal,yogurt, bagels,juices and milk ) the coffee however was not good. our room had a pull out sofa the kids used and it was big enough that the 4 of us shared it with my sister and her husband. only negative thing i have to say about the place is the AC was pretty loud and the coffee was icky, but there is a Starbucks in the park ;)
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  Thank you for sharing how we provided you with a good experience and what we can do to improve.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we hope you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Great location for the Disney Parks, easy walk across the street. Friendly, helpful staff, clean rooms, free breakfast, kid friendly and comfortable beds!  The only thing I would change is the extra $10 charge for parking. Would use hotel again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  We appreciate you sharing what you liked about the hotel.  We would love to have you stay with us again.  Thank you and take care

Summary: Our family stays at this particular hotel every year.  We love the location, value, and size of room.  The free breakfast includes so much more than any continental can offer.  We were very pleased with what they had to offer.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us when you visit Disneyland.  We appreciate you taking the time to write a review and share what brings you back to us every year.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Great hotel. Super close to park entrance, comfortable spacious rooms. Breakfast was great (waffles, eggs, potatoes, sausage/ham, cereal, pastries). Friendly staff. Pool is a bit small but we weren't in there very often. Would recommend this hotel and we would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you had a great stay and enjoyed the accommodations, amenities and location.  Thank you for your comments, compliments. and recommendation.  We look forward to you staying with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Don't expect the Ritz but if you are in town solely for Disneyland and a place to rest, this is the place. Besides the Park Vue next door, this motel is directly across the DL crossing less then 5 mins walk to the gate. we found the room to be a reasonable size with 2 comfy double beds. We had 7 suitcases plus carry ons and we still had room to move about. The fridge and microwave was handy to have and housekeeping did a great job with keeping the room clean. The only thing that they need to have is a room safe. Come on guys, get with the program. Most standard motels these days have safes in the rooms. They do however have a safety deposit box at reception but its not very big. You won't be able to store your ipads in them. All the staff was nice and accommodating. The pool was
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We appreciate you sharing what you enjoyed and what you feel we can do to make the experience even better.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your time with us and do hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel was very close to Disneyland.  When we were inside, you could see it through any window in the whole place. In fact, it was right across the street from it. It is only about a 2 minute walk to the park, not even that. The room we stayed in was nice and clean, and the room for the bath and shower was also clean and smelled quite nice actually... The package my family purchased included a breakfast buffet at the pirate themed restaurant next door to it, which again is only a 2 minute walk, if you have to stop for traffic. All in all it was a nice stay, although the rollout bed was a little close to the air vent then needed, it was a great deal and stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your visit with us including the accommodations, amenities and location.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Fantastic location if going to Disneyland
Summary: Situated directly across the road from the main entrance to Disneyland, Anaheim, Best Western Plus park place inn was a great place to stay. Room was tidy and was cleaned each day. The free breakfast was ok,  Plenty of food available but limited range and some things definitely tasted better than others, but everyone found something to their liking each morning so overall it was ok.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and everyone was able to satisfied at breakfast.  Thank you for sharing your comments and compliments.  We hope you will be able to visit us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: If you want a close place to stay when going to Disneyland, this is the place!  Literally right across the street from Disneyland.  Just make sure if you reserve a King room, you get King bed....I reserved a King room but got a queen bed and was told it was a king bed....NOT.  All in all, not a bad place to stay.  Hotel staff helpful and friendly, clean rooms but need some updating.  Rented a car at the airport but kept it parked in the hotel  parking lot the entire time, walked everywhere.  Free breakfast is okay, layout of the buffet is odd so it was hard to get to the food. Oh and the wi-fi at this hotel is really, really, really bad.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your stay and sharing your experience.  We do appreciate your comments and compliments.  Management did verify that there was a standard King bed in the room to ensure that there had not been an error.  I am pleased that you enjoyed your stay including the cleanliness and hotel staff.  We hope you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I stay at this hotel everytime we go to Disneyland! It's so close and very clean. Prompt hotel service. Beautiful rooms and free wifi. Everything is so wonderful about this hotel. I love that the couch pulls into an extra bed for the kids. Nice that this hotel has free breakfast.. just wish it was a little healthier. I will always stay here for my Disneyland trips.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us whenever you visit Disneyland.  We enjoy having you stay with us and appreciate your comments and compliments.  Thank you for making us your hotel of choice.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care

Summary: LOCATION LOCATION LOCATION! The hotel was very nice hotel. The staff is very helpful. You could ask for a better location as it is right across the street from the  the disneyland entrance. We cant wait for our return visit.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Stayed here for 7 nights and what can i say. Awesome sized room for 6 people and didnt at all feel cramped or squashed.  2 queens and sofa pullout. Beds were comfortable and so was the sofa bed.  Room comes with microwave and fridge plus flat screen tv that rotates. Shower is over bath and water pressure did not phase out one bit.  House keepers i give an extra plus too. Never have i stayed in a place that the cleaners are on the ball. Came back each day and always to a clean fresh spic room. Fully stocked with the neccesities as well towels.  Pool is like 6m deep and comes with jacuzzi. Towels are available at no extra charge down by the pool. Although a couple of days the pool was out of service, the hotel had organised the neighbouring hotel for use of their pool which was no
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write such a detailed review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and appreciate you sharing what made our hotel the "Best place ever".  Thank you for your comments regarding the housekeepers.  They are extremely hard workers.  We do hope we will have the pleasure of you staying with us again.  Thank you and take care

Summary: Free breakfast and no transportation costs to get to Disneyland Resort -- it's just across the street! Nice rooms, very good service, excellent value. The buffet breakfast is next door in Captain Kidd's and there was a nice selection of foods -- even the pickiest eater will be happy and fueled for the day.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review. We enjoyed having you as our guest and appreciate your comments and compliments.  Thank you for sharing what made your stay enjoyable.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The proximity to the maingate can't be beat!  It was fine for sleeping, didn't check out the pool.  Breakfast was ok, after day 3 I didn't want to eat it again!  Beds were comfy and room was clean.  Would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: So close to Disneyland, wonderful staff
Summary: Stayed here for 3 nights and thought they were great. Straight across the road to the entrance to Disneyland which was a great bonus especially after spending over 25 hours in the park!!  We had a king bed with queen sofa room, we had 7 large suitcases between the three of us plus carry ons (8 by the time we checked out, lots of Disney goodies) and there was still room to walk around.  The king bed was extremely comfortable and I loved how much space I had even though I shared it with my daughter.  The complimentary breakfast was a lovely touch and definitely more substantial than I was expecting for a continental breakfast.   As we were flying out late at night I arranged to have our room until 6pm so we could go to the park then come back and have showers and pack - we had to
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay including the comfort and spaciousness of your room as well as the breakfast.  Thank you for your comments and compliments and letting us know how we were able to make your stay enjoyable.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care

Summary: Everything was great from staff,breakfast,room size.location,beds. Would highly recommend it.Great for the price you pay. The only thing that could be better would be a bigger pool.Close to everything. Went to Mcdonalds everyday for lunch .That saved alot of money from eating in the park. rested a little and went back.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  Thank you for all of your comments and compliments and the wonderful review title. We hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The good: location is unbeatable.   Cross the street and the light that is located right outside the hotel and you are walking over to disney.   Also, approx 1 hour after we checked in , we received a phone call from the front desk, to see if we needed anything.  I had reserved the room online and under special requests, I had asked to have a room with a view of the fireworks.  So, I was pleased that they put us in a room that faced disney ( still couldn't see the fireworks, so we stepped outside).  The breakfast was fairly good for continental breakfast.   Great to not have to pay for that meal.  The bad: the wifi kept kicking us off.   The hotel isn't extravagant or beautiful, but fine for the price and location.  It was clean in the room.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care

Summary: We arrived from SNA early, about 930 am. The rooms were not ready but they stored our luggage, no worries. Time to play!  We changed into shorts and ran across the street to Disneyland. Did I mention that it is geographically the closest hotel? Even closer to Disneyland than the Disneyland Hotel. We've stayed here several times now and that is the number one reason why.  The front desk was very friendly, everyone was polite and helpful. We booked online, 8 months early thru Best Western and we paid an average about $110 per night. We felt it was a great deal for the location and the fact it was a over a weekend.  The rooms are good, for us. If you're expecting a resort, this is not it. We had a nice sized room, with sitting area, which his actually where I flopped all the
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us once again for your visit to Disneyland and taking the time to write such a detailed review of our property.  I am very pleased that you enjoy your visits with us and the improvements made to the breakfast.  Over the next couple of years we will be making improvements throughout the property I hope you will enjoy.  We look forward to your next visit with us.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Perfect location but not the best Interior
Summary: We stayed on the 3rd floor. Rooms look just like what others posted, a tan/brown color, room felt dark with a musty smell. PRO: I loved staying directly across the street from the Park entrance (5 min walk to the gates). Next time however I would try another hotel along the same street next time. Its a simple place to stay but lacked a wow factor. I didn't feel clean or very happy from my entire stay. Wi-Fi was not consistent, breakfast was mediocre, and pillows were hard and too tall (that might just be my preference). Hot tub was the best part of the hotel. After a long day at Disney it felt great to get your feet in the hot tub. Parking was $10 a day and was gated in, which felt good for security reasons. Overall I would not stay here, I would pay a little more and stay at
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am sorry you did not enjoy your stay with us.  We will be undergoing improvements over the next couple of years.  Perhaps you will give us another chance once those are completed.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This is our third year in a row to stay at this Best Western.  We love the staff and how wonderful they are.  The breakfast that they offer is good.  Plus the bonus is that they are directly across the street from the main entrance into Disneyland.  You are able to walk into Disneyland and if you don't want to eat in Disneyland there are plenty of restaurants close by.  We have 2 small children so being close to the hotel is plus for us when they need to go back for naps.  I really can't say enough nice things about this hotel.  We have been very satisfied each time we have stayed here.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at our hotel when visiting Disneyland and taking the time to write a review. Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated.  We enjoy having you as our guests and look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care

Summary: We had a great stay. We were debating on few hotels and decided on BW Plus Park Place Inn. It was a very good decision. At first we were skeptical but when we arrived, the front staff was great. They gave us the room we asked for and gave us the in and outs of Disneyland. The room was very clean. I usually look at how the bed are made and the cleanliness of the washroom and both exceeded my expectations. The housekeeper for our stay was great. We did not know how to operate the showers and they sent a staff right away to show us. On our last day, we wanted to do some shopping and the friendly front staff helped us. The check out was smooth. The staff were excellent. Lastly, can't beat the location. We stayed at hotels which required shuttle and staying here saved us about at
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased to read we exceeded your expectations and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  Thank you for sharing about your interaction with our staff and what you enjoyed about our hotel.  We hope you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care

Summary: We stay at this hotel with 2 young kids. The location is excellent. The breakfast was good too and it served till 10:00pm.  You just need to cross the street then you are in the bus loop of Disneyland. Our room is facing the Disneyland which was good that we can literally see the firework.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing what you liked about your stay.  I am pleased you enjoyed the location, the view of fireworks from your room and the breakfast.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we hope you will come and stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Great motel with an unbeatable location. Just across the main entrance. The room was clean comfortable and spacious. Nice big TV, effective air-con and nice firm beds. Just one big complaint - the most unreliable wifi! Made the stay a little annoying. We were there for 6 nights, by day 2 I switched off the wifi. It was unusable. If you want wifi during your day, avoid this place. Otherwise, this motel is the one to stay in.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and appreciate the comments and compliments. We hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This is simply the most convenient hotel for Disneyland. You just walk across the street and you are at the pedestrian strip between Disneyland and California Adventure. The room was clean and pretty, though the whole "mini suite" name is a joke - they are not any bigger than regular hotel rooms, they just have a half-wall dividing off the table and chairs. The room had a large mini-fridge and microwave. Other reviewers have found the beds too firm, but they were perfect for me. The sheets and pillows were spectacular. The hotel has a nice-looking pool and spa which we unfortunately did not get to experience. There is also a free breakfast which we skipped in favor of more time in the parks. :) Parking is an extra $10 a night, which did not seem out of line in a tourist area.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the hotel as well as the amenities offered and the extended parking.  I am happy you were able to enjoy your morning at Disney while taking advantage of the 3pm parking allowance.  Not all of our rooms are mini-suites.  I did see that you were in a standard room with two full size beds.  The mini-suite is a larger room and holds up to six guests.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated as well as your recommendation.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Really impressed with the location to the Parks and Downtown Disney, as well as The Garden Walk.  The free hot continental breakfast was delicious and offered a good variety with a restaurant style seating area.  The staff was helpful.  I myself thought the bed was alittle to firm. We would definetely recommend this establishment to our friends and would come back again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to share what you liked about the hotel.  Your comments, compliments, and recommendation are greatly appreciated.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your time with us and hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Great location for Disney-goers.  Good value for price. Free breakfast is good enough to get you started.  I just wish my room had been a little cleaner.  I would stay here again though. Just keep it squeaky clean folks!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay and do apologize your room wasn't as clean as it could be.  This will be addressed with housekeeping.  We do hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Clean, comfy, good breakfast, poor wi-fi, great location
Summary: If you need to be right across from Disneyland main entrance this is the place. You will still have quite a walk to the gate. The only way to get closer is to stay in one of Disney's expensive hotels or stay farther away at one with a shuttle. The shuttle buses get you closer to the gates.  The room was clean, comfy and roomy. It's an older motel that has had multiple facelifts and is well maintained and managed. Price is high because of the location. The included breakfast is good.  Wi-fi was practically non-usable. It is cumbersome to log on, often the login screen just won't come up. If you do get logged in it is real slow and disconnects often. If you must have internet for making travel arrangements count on using your phone as a hotspot if you can.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I do apologize for the problems with the internet.  We do offer a business center for our guests and we are in the process of addressing the connectivity issues.  Thank you for your comments and compliments and we hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Booked this hotel for 6 nights with 3 rooms.  Great location for Disneyland.  Just a quick walk across the street.  Rooms were clean and well kept.  Microwave and refrigerator were a great bonus.  We were in the back of the hotel which made for a quiet stay. Staff pleasant and helpful.  Breakfast is included in the price of the room.  Lots of choices for breakfast.  The only downside is that the menu does not change at all.  Unless you consider sausage for ham a change.  The "hot" items weren't usually hot, but I know how difficult it can be to maintain a buffet.  Not a lot of seating available when you consider how many rooms this hotel has.   Pool is small, but served our purposes twice. My only minor complaint is that you can't turn the bathroom light on without the fan
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to share your experience.  We appreciate you letting us know what you enjoyed and where we may need to improve.  We hope you will stay with us a gain.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Best Western Plus Park Place Inn Mini Suites Anaheim
Summary: Right across street from entrance.  Very convienient and well worth the price for the easy access.  Pool & Hot Tub Small but early morings empty for your use.  Rooms fine and well.  Only complaint is ONE Elevator and it is very slow.  The Cleaning staff have to use it also so there is usually a long wait for the elevator.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us.  We do have two elevators.  One for the front portion and one for the back portion of the hotel.  Both do provide access to all areas of the hotel.  We appreciate your comments and compliments and hope you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Excellent value for visiting Disney. Clean, comfortable hotel 2 minutes away from the Disney main gate. Friendly staff and decent breakfast. We were at Disney for the whole day anyway .. so all that we needed was a comfortable place to crash at the end of the day. Cannot be happier.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel is always our number one choice when headed to Disneyland.  You cannot beat the location!  The staff is always pleasant and helpful.  The breakfast is more than just dry cereal and pastries - very nice for being included in the cost of the room.
Manager Response: Thank you for making us your hotel of choice when visiting Disneyland.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We stayed here for 8 nights during our 2 week trip to the States.  Breakfast is great but decor dated and rooms very dark. Very noisey early in the morning and late at night.  Would not stay here again but location was great that directly opposite Disneyland.  Next time would try Howard Johnson as that was very close and kids pool area looked awesome.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am sorry we did not exceed your expectations, but do hope you had a wonderful visit to Disneyland.  We hope you will give us another chance as we will be making improvements over the next couple of years.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Right across from Disneyland - literally! Hotel personnel were wonderful, friendly, and accommodating. Rooms were lovely, and super clean! Pool was clean and great! Gift shop had great prices, friendly help, although would have liked longer hours. Location is great, near many restaurants and other Anaheim attractions. Would stay again!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to share what you liked about your stay.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your time with us.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Best non-Disney hotel for Disneyland. Period.
Summary: Literally the closest hotel to the parks aside from The Grand Californian. Five minute walk to the park gates. Friendly people, clean, comfortable LARGE rooms with all the amenities (fridge and microwave are a huge plus). The prices are always reasonable for the area. I have stayed here many times and will stay here many times in the future! I recommend it to all my friends who look for Disneyland hotels. Don't look anywhere else -- book here! And book direct on their website for the best rates and cancellation policies.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us when you visit Disneyland and taking the time to write a review.  We appreciate you comments and compliments as well as recommending us to your friends.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I like this hotel because it has the most PRIME location for going to Disneyland park. You cant really beat being right across the street. They also serve free breakfast every morning which is nice so i dont have to spend any additional money inside the park to be fed in the morning. we checked out on monday morning but spent the day at the park. the hotel staff was accomodating in allowing us to leave our bags with them until our flight in the evening. I've stayed here several times before and I will definitely be back to stay here again in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your visits to Disney.  We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience at our hotel.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We are looking forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Perfect location BUT dark room and sticky carpet
Summary: We choose this motel due to its positive reviews here and recommendation from a friend. We stayed a total of 6N/5D at 2 separate time.   I'd rate it 5 stars for location - as you may read in many reviews, nothing beats this location as it is in front of Disneyland entrance. The other motels though was also not as bad of a walk to Disney.   I'll give it 4 stars for service - We had very late check in on our first stay & stayed at the 2F. When we got back from SD, my second reservation was for 2 double beds (which, I thought has a pull-out sofa as well). I have 3 children, 9, 7 and 21 mos. I found out that all double bed rooms does not have a pull-out. Only the King and 2 Queen Bed rooms have pull-out couch. Also, all 2 Queen Beds are in 2nd and 3rd Floor. King and Double Bed
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience.  I am sorry we did not exceed your expectations.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and will help improve our service to our guests.  We do hope you will give us another chance as we continue to make improvements to the hotel.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Our favorite place to recommend and stay.  Location perfect.  one block from convention center, less to Disney heaven.  Restaurant options very near for walking.  Convenience store/market two doors down. Service great.  Clean, comfortable with amenities and very helpful friendly staff
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  We greatly appreciate your recommendation and staying with us during your visits to the area.  Looking forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Can't beat this one for location
Summary: Quiet and clean rooms , Dated bathrooms and outside.  Friendly staff, breakfast included but it was free so you get your money's worth lol.  Walk to Disney which is great at the end of the day and you just want to get back to the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Best Western Plus Park Place Inn is directly across from the Harbor entrance to Disneyland and DCA. It is comfortable, convenient and cost-effective. The service is GREAT. I've never had a problem they didn't resolve promptly. We've stayed in the King mini suite which has a King bed and a living area separated by a divider that includes a sofa-bed. The refrigerator and microwave make it easy to keep leftovers and drinks for quick and economic meals. While they don't have the lowest rate in the area, you do get what you pay for. It is more than worth the value of staying at this property.
Manager Response: Thank you for returning to our hotel for your Disney visits.  We enjoy having you as our guests and greatly appreciate you taking the time to share your comments and compliments.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel was awesome and within walking distance to both Disneyland and California Adventure park. Even the kids thought it was awesome to be so close. We could leave the Disney Parks have dinner and go back without the kids complaining because it was close. The staff were friendly and the rooms where clean and enough room for 6 people. We have 4 girls and were able to stay for 4 days without any issues.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and sharing your experience.  We are very pleased that you and the kids enjoyed staying at our hotel.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Actually across the street from Disneyland!! A very welcoming staff, free breakfast buffet at restaurant next door, free wifi, nice beds. Pool & hot tub and affordable laundry service if you need it. We will be back for sure!!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed our hotel and the amenities offered.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Excellent staff and accomodations were very nice. Never had a chance to try the breakfast but the room is a great value and the location can't be beat. Maid service was excellent except the windows could have used a cleaning. Fan and air conditioner were a little loud but the beds, pillows and linens - pure heaven, Most of the staff is very warm and welcoming and am looking forward to staying there again!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review. I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We look forward to having you stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: My wife and I stayed here with our 3 and 5 yr old daughters for our disneyland trip and the location was so convenient for all our needs.  We were on the ground floor near the lift and pool and we never had any trouble with noise. The room was clean and tidy and the maid service did a great job. The only down side of this hotel is the small laundry, you have to pick the right time to wash otherwise you'll be waiting awhile(1st world problems). Other then that I highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am so pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and that we met all of your needs.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Location if it is Disneyland your here for.
Summary: Location Location straight across the road from Disneyland entrance. Staff helpful Rooms clean .Tip for the Aussie pull the handle out hard on the shower thing to get water to run that was a laugh 4 of us visiting in separate rooms all had the same issue . Comfortable beds reasonable size rooms value for money. Give Captain Kids a miss for the complimentary breakfast go up the road to Dennys ask for Tyler better food and much nicer atmosphere. There is a General Store to your right has a bakery Alcohol snacks. Would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope you will be able to come back and visit us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The location this hotel is perfect for trip to Disneyland. It is literally right across the street from the entrance to Disneyland. If you are just using the hotel as a place to sleep at night it will work out just fine!! There is nothing fancy about it but it does the job. The beds were hard in the room was a little musty. They did have microwaves and refrigerators which were perfect for packing or snacks for the day! Plenty of close by restaurants. The continental breakfast for free is adequate. We would stay there again and just hope for more comfortable beds the next time!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to share you experience.  Your comments and compliments will help us improve our service.  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Excellent Stay.  Staff very helpful, rooms very clean and well decorated.  I always enjoy having a couch instead of only a chair. TV was new style and large.  Would stay here again.  Only unhappy with complimentary breakfast needs improvement.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and will help us improve our service to our guests.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care

Summary Heading: No parking if you use points!
Summary: Wouldn't give our other family member who used points a parking space in lot, even if we paid for parking separately. So, they had to park 5 blocks away at a Mall for twice as much and made it very inconvenient for us as we had to drive them to the lot to get their car if we left the area. Apparently they don't consider points 'paying' for the room. Sorry, we use a lot of money to get those points, so you guys just lost our repeat business for sure!
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for staying with us and for writing a review.  I do apologize for any inconvenience regarding the parking. However, we do not refuse parking to guests who have redeemed points for their stay.  Parking is limited at our hotel.  Some travel agency reservations per contract are restricted to no parking at the hotel and when we are close to selling out we will restrict reservations to no parking as well.  We do also restrict parking to one vehicle per room.  All of these restrictions are mentioned to the person making the reservation if and it is stated in the confirmation provided by the hotel or paperwork provided by the travel agency.  Secured public parking is located 2 blocks away/less than half a mile at the next traffic signal  If none of these situations apply to your friends, please contact me so I can review their reservation method and see if proper action was taken.  Thank you again and I hope we can find a resolution to your situation and have you stay with us again.  Thank you and take care. Kelly Laimana Front Office Manager 714 776 4800

Summary Heading: Closest hotel to disneyland outside of disney resort
Summary: What really goes for this hotel is its proximity to disneyland. No need of shuttles, just walk in!  Ameneties are average, but then when you are at disney, you only come to the hotel to sleep. Just hope the bed was a little more comfortable. No complaints from the staff. They were supper friendly.  Definitely recommended due to proximity to disneyland.
