Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to share your experience.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and appreciate your comments and compliments.  Thank you for your recommendation and we hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care

Summary: The hotel was right across the street from the main entrance to Disneyland which was so nice after a long day. The walk wasn't much further than where you catch the trams and busses so it's actually quicker than parking at the park. The rooms were clean and nice. My major complaint was the rock hard beds. I had a difficult time sleeping on them which sucks when you are at a busy park all day and are 7 months pregnant. The continental breakfast was also below average. There were no lights on and no ac and it was overcrowded, the food was ok. They did have a microwave and fridge in the room which was great for making breakfast and lunch to save money at the park. I'd love to stay here again if they upgrade the beds. Great price for the location.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  We appreciate your comments and compliments so we can continue to improve our service.  We do hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The title says it all.  Super easy to come back from Disney for nap but the hotel experience almost negates the convenience.  We  had a 5 day ticket at Disney and on 3 of those days we tried to come back for a nap/afternoon break and were interrupted by housekeeping, and another day they just didn't ever clean our room.  So no clean towels for our family of 4 the next day.  Also the 2nd day of our 7 night stay there, the 2nd roll of toilet paper ran out and was never replaced.  We tried communicating directly with housekeeping but they were rude and unaccomodating.   I know I was paying for the location and didn't expect more than 2 stars.  But I did expect a clean room and this just didn't happen.  The bathroom sink didn't drain properly and smelled funny.  The breakfast was
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  Your comments will help us improve our service to all of our guests.  I do wish you had contacted the front desk so your concerns could have been addressed.  I do hope the housekeepers were not being rude.  I do believe it may have simply been they did not understand your requests.   I am sorry your room was not cleaned by the time you came back for a nap. The housekeepers have a 199 rooms to clean. They do have to give first priority to the day's vacated rooms for that afternoons arrivals.  However, if the front desk is contacted we can set up a requested time to have your room cleaned so it is ready when you come back for a nap.  If the sink was not draining right, maintenance could have quickly addressed that issue. I do hope you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Being right across the street from Disneyland makes life so much easier!  The room was big enough for us to spread out and have space to relax and the free breakfast was great.  Will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at our hotel and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you stay with us and we are very pleased you had an 'amazing' time.  We look forward to having you stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We got two rooms for a few days at this location (family trip). Rooms were clean, staff was very helpful and beds were nice and comfortable. We could see the fireworks from Disneyland from the rooms we stayed in. The distance from the hotel to the park was closer than some of the Luxury DL hotels. At the end of a 14 hour hustle and bustle through the parks it was the best situation for us that the rooms were so close. Continental breakfast was more in depth than I am use to at most other hotels. They had scrambled eggs, sausage and waffles along with fresh fruit, cereal, juice, milk and coffee. This was perfect when you have three kids who are too excited to sit through a full service breakfast before visiting Disneyland. Thank you Best Western for this experience. We will be
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for sharing your experience.  I am very pleased to read how much you enjoyed your stay including the location and the breakfast provided.  We appreciate your comments and compliments and look forward to you staying with us during your next visit to the area.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: this is a great hotel to stay at if going to disneyland - it is right across the stree from disneyland - you can just walk across the street and to the front entrance! nic, clean rooms, very friendly staff,  and you get a free breakfast at the hotel next door!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and sharing your experience.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: So close to Disneyland!!  The staff was very pleasant and the rooms clean.  The beds are comfortable, but I wish I had brought my pillow.  The pool was clean and there were always fresh towels.  Family friendly hotel, good value.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay including the accommodations and service.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We hope to have you stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Ideal location. Easy parking. Clean room. Bathroom looked like new. Breakfast surpassed expectations. Service with a smile at every turn. Excellent deals on Disney items at hotel shop. Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay including the accommodations and amenities.  Your comments, compliments, and recommendation are greatly appreciated and we hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I had read many reviews and alot of them mentioned problems with parking and internet.  This hotel really met our needs for a Disney trip so decided to take a chance on a busy Spring Break weekend.  Absolutely no problems with internet, or parking and the full breakfast was an added benefit.  Staff were all courteous and helpful and nothing at all was negative about this hotel. Definitely will stay again
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to share your experience.  I am very pleased we exceeded your expectations and that you had an enjoyable stay during your Disney trip.  Thank you for your comments and compliments which are much appreciated. We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel is located across the street from the main entrance to Disneyland. It is a great way to get into the park, play all day and then come across the street at the end of the day. They have microwaves in the room as well as mini refrigerators, but we never had time to use them or the pool as we were in the park all the time. Great location, great service and quiet. They have a continental buffet included and they also have parking for a fee. We hope to stay there in 3 years when we bring the next grandchild to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated.  We enjoy reading what our guests lioked about their stay so we can continue to provide the quality service guests enjoy.  We look forward to seeing you in three years.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This place was perfect for our family of four (2 adults, 2 girls ages 6 and 5).  The room was nice with updated interior including a small microwave and refrigerator and coffee maker.  The only complaint I had would be with the comfort of the bed (hard!) and the noise of the a/c (but it's an older place with a window unit).  But, the location was OUTSTANDING and the price was good - including a full buffet breakfast that started at 6:30am.  We stayed at the Park Vue Inn last year for our visit to Disneyland and I'd say this BW is a step up with the same distance to DL.  I would stay at this BW again.  Oh, if you are looking for a place with a large pool, this isn't it.  The pool is small but starts at 3ft deep and goes to 6ft.   It was fine for us but we were there when it was
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We appreciate you letting us know what you enjoyed about your stay and where we can make improvements.  I am pleased you enjoyed your time with us and thank you for your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Park Place is ideally situated across from the entrance of the Disney Parks entrance. MacDonalds, IHOP and Dennys are within easy walking distance for young children. The rooms are clean and the staff friendly and helpful. We visited the parks in the AM, then came back to the hotel to swim and nap (grandkids ages 2 and 6). Then we went back to the park for the parade. I encourage getting strollers delivered to the hotel for little ones.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to share your experience.  We appreciate your comments and compliments and sharing what you enjoyed about your stay.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Family of 4 stayed here while visiting Disneyland for 3 days... truly, there isn't a better location, maybe including the Disney hotels!  Right across the street, with no need to move a car anywhere. We even watched the Disney fireworks off our balcony on the first night. Rooms are plenty big enough and the pool/spa are great to treat your feet after a long day of walking in the parks. The continental breakfast is standard fare, but helpful when you're traveling on a budget. Service is extremely helpful too - you can buy your Disney tickets on site! When we had a problem with our cell phones, staff was quick to help us try to solve it to stay in communication with family.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We appreciate you sharing what you like about your stay.  I am very pleased the staff worked quickly to try and help you with your cell phone issue.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We hope for the privilege to have you as our guests again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel was awesome. Rooms are very clean, breakfast is included and was great! There was plenty of parking and they let us check in early. They also let us park early in the morning while we went to Disney for the day. It's right across the street from Disney, you can't beat the short walk, much better than waiting for the tram! You wont be disappointed if you stay here. We will be back
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review. We appreciate your comments and compliments and sharing what you liked about our hotel.  We look forward to you staying with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: If you're looking for convienence for a Disneyland stay then stay here at the BW Park Place Inn. I have 6 of us altogether and was able to get into BW for 5 days. Very simple and they serve a continental breAkfast in the am. Right across from Disneyland crosswalk. Only a five minute walk. They have a pool which we enjoyed but the parking was cramped. But otherwise thats it. We stayed an extra day and were not charged any extra to keep our parking space until 8 that evening when we left. I would highly recommend this place
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to share your experience.  I am pleased you enjoyed the amenities of the hotel as well as the location.  Thank you for your comments, compliments, and recommendation.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The hotel room is nice and clean although the exterior could use a facelift. There is no area for coffee or hot water in the lobby after breakfast and the breakfast is held next door at the upstairs of a restaurant. The hotel is right across the street from Disney and makes for a great location to stay. The wireless internet did not work very well from my room.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and will help us improve our service to our guests.  We hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Across the street from the entrance to the Disneyland Resort - perfect location.  Upon check in staff was very friendly and helpful.  Full Breakfast was a huge plus!  Our room was very clean, anything we needed - extra towels, a box of tissues - was immediately brought up to our room.  Parking was right outside our room, easy access.  The kids loved the pool, quiet except for the fireworks from Disneyland.  Our only complaint was the air conditioner didn't cool the room of completely and the shower turned on and off in the opposite directions.   We tried to book online, but it showed the hotel all booked up.  When I called they still had rooms available.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for sharing your experience.  Thank you for letting us know how much you enjoyed your stay. I am glad we were able to quickly meet your needs and requests.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Can't Beat the Location & Budget Friendly
Summary: Our family of 4 stayed in a Queen suite for 5 nights during a busy Spring Break week. Check-in was smooth and quick, and our request for a top-floor suite was no problem. Rooms are accessible from outside walkways (not an inside hallway). The suite was clean, albeit a little musty smelling, but that was easily fixed by leaving the door open and running the A/C. Beds were comfortable and the sofa-bed was fine for our 7 year old, but likely would've caused backaches for an adult as it looked quite broken in. A/C unit was fairly quiet and efficient, which was a surprise considering similar units in other hotels. Shower pressure was fantastic. It stayed fairly quiet overnight, although the door adjoining two rooms at the back of the suite allowed noise from a crying baby to come
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write such a detailed review.  We appreciate you sharing how much you enjoyed the stay and listing what you felt were the benefits of staying with us.  Thank you for your wonderful comments and compliments. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Our family rented three double queen rooms in January of this year, 7 adults in all. While this Inn is not the Ritz, it more than met our needs for our three day visit. The rooms are large, clean, and pleasant. The beds are quite comfortable. There were plenty of towels, (which isn't always the case).   Perhaps the best thing about this hotel is the location. It is directly across the street from the entrance to Disneyland. We've stayed in other hotels in the area and this one is the best--by far. We would highly recommend the Park Place Inn and we look forward to staying there again!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for sharing how much you enjoyed your stay.  Your comments, compliments and recommendation are greatly appreciated.  We look forward to having you stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Great location! Just a across the street from Disneyland; can't get any closer. Nice room with large TV, fridge, microwave, large bed, pull out sofa..... Free breakfast includes waffles, ham, eggs, potatoes, muffins, bagels, oatmeal, cereal, apples, oranges, bananas, pastries, coffee, hot chocolate, tea, milk, juice, so many choices! Internet signal was a little weak/slow, but oh well. Bed was comfortable. Friendly staff. They will hold your bags until room is ready.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and sharing your experience.  We appreciate your comments and compliments and letting us know what you enjoyed about your stay.  I do apologize for the weak internet signal you experienced. We hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care

Summary: Friendly staff at check-in & check-out. Absolutely perfect location for visitors to the park, situated right at the crosswalk that leads to the front gates of Disneyland & Californialand. Clean room and they gave me a parking stall early as I arrived 6 hours prior to check-in, then they called me to let me know the room was ready.....which was ready an hour early.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated.  I am glad we were able to accomodate your vehicle early and allow you the time at Disney, without having to pay extra for parking.  Thank you for letting us know how much your enjoyed your stay.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Overall a very pleasant stay. Easy access to DIsneyland Park especially if you have younger ones who melt down. Was very easy to go back to hotel during the day to take a nap and rest! The rooms were very spacious and clean! The hotel had recently been remodeled and was very nice! The breakfast was not just muffins from a box. They actually cooked and prepared breakfast items! That was so nice. Being able to actually sit down and eat a breakfast meal that was warm and nutritious!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to share your experience.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the accommodations, amenities offered, as well as the location of the hotel.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Closest Hotel to the main gate, your there in 5 minutes. If you want a great deal become a rewards member. You have all the fixings surrounding the hotel. Stayed at other hotel and you have another 20 minutes to get to your room when leaving Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for sharing your experience.  Your comments and ratings are greatly appreciated.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Location and price was the overall for choosing this hotel.  We had a king room with a sofabed.  We took advantage of the hot breakfast everyday which definitely saved time and money.  We were so glad that at the end of our long days at Disney, we just had to walk across the street.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and sharing your experience.  I am pleased you enjoyed the location and breakfast provided.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: There isn't anything fancy about this place, but it was clean, included breakfast that went beyond cold cereal, and you can't beat the location for a Disneyland vacation--its RIGHT across the street from the entrance. With four kids, it can be hard to find hotels that can accommodate all of us in one room, and most Best Westerns can. None of the Disney hotels could without charging us for two rooms. We will most likely use this one again for any future Disneyland trips. The AAA discount helped with the cost as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for taking the time for sharing your experience.  I am ver pleased you enjoyed your stay and that we could accommodate your family.  We look forward to having you stay with us again.  Thank you and take care

Summary: We chose this hotel based on other positive reviews and that it is located right across from the Disneyland entrance.   However I can't say it was good value compared to staying a few streets away, as the room was dusty and dark (few lights), the refrigerator wasn't working, and the WiFi was terrible (very low signal strength in our room, couldn't connect; strength was OK as I walked past other rooms outside. Too much interference from neighbouring hotel WiFi). I raised these concerns with the front desk.   The free buffet breakfast at Captain Kidd's next door was good value, providing a range of options. Just have to get in early or later to avoid queues.   $10/night parking was also very convenient as you can come and go as you please.
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for choosing to stay with us. I am truly sorry we did not exceed your expectations.  This issues you addressed with the front desk I hope were brought to our attention during your stay so we were able to resolve them.  All your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and will help us improve our service for all of our guests.  I do hope you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Great Place to Stay at Disneyland
Summary: This is a great hotel to stay at if you are visiting Disneyland. Comfortable, convenient, and close to the entrance of the park. Internet was good, breakfast was good, the rooms are nice and we had connecting rooms for the family group
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased to read that you enjoyed the accomodations and amenities offered.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Great place to stay directly across from Disneyland!  Free breakfast included and the rooms were much nicer than the Camelot, which is where we stayed on our previous trip to Disneyland.  Definitely worth the price to make your trip to Disneyland as easy as possible!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and appreciate the comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Clean, comfortable, great location, good breakfast!!!!
Summary: This hotel was perfect for my recent visit to the Disneyland area.  The location cannot be beat!  Right across the street from the entrance to the Disney parks.  Our room was clean, nicely furnished, with a fridge, microwave, small coffee maker, hairdryer, and toiletries.  The complimentary breakfast was way better than any other that I have had at a hotel.  Buffet style, eggs, sausage, ham, waffles, potatoes, juices, coffee, milk, muffins, cereal, doughnuts, oatmeal, yogurts, fruits, breads, bagels, everything!  We didn't use the pool or the Jacuzzi, but they were clean and ready to use in March.  Also, you can buy your Disney passes right at the front desk of the hotel.  Easy!  Lots of restaurants nearby, including, a small pizza place, Panda Express, and Subway Sandwiches a
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your recent visit to the Disneyland area.  I enjoyed reading your review and I am very pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us.  We appreciate the time you took to write the review as well as your comments and compliments. W e look forward to having yous tay with us during your next visit.  Thank you and take care

Summary: Check-in was a breeze! Room was clean and comfortable. Pull out bed had a better than average mattress. Breakfast was OK, nothing special. Location can't be beat! Thin walls, small pool, no frills. But good for a close easy option. Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and greatly appreciate the comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We love Disneyland!  We go at least once a year and always stay here.  The hotel's location is amazing and it's great to have a hot breakfast ready for us before we head to the park.  The staff is helpful and accommodating.  I always request a 3rd floor room toward the back and they always grant our request.  The room is clean, housekeeping does a great job here!  Overall, the location, price, breakfast and staff can't be beat!  If you are staying at a Good Neighbor hotel, this is the one to stay at!
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for staying with us during your visits to Disneyland.  The time you took to write a review as well as your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated.  We enjoy having you as our guests and look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Came here with a group of six including a 2 and 4-year old. The price for this hotel is wonderful, especially when compared to the Disney hotels available, and it is a Good Neighbor hotel, which means you can still book the Disney Packages with it! The free breakfast is the BEST free breakfast I have ever had. It's next door at a buffet location and the options include pancakes, waffles, cereal, donuts, bagels, toast, eggs, sausage, bacon, and fruit, among other wonderful selections. The location is AMAZING. The Disneyland Resort entrance is literally 30 feet away across the street, so you feel the atmosphere and Disney magic as soon as you walk out your hotel door! The rooms are a bit dated, but when I go to Disney I am there for the parks, not the hotel decor. The rooms are
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay including the location and amenities offered by the hotel.  We are excited to read that we are now your choice hotel when visiting Disneyland.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: You can't ask for a better location and the accommodations met our expectations nicely.  Even at Spring Break, the pool and breakfast were not too crowded.  Staff is absolutely excellent and the rooms were cleaned beautifully each day while we were in the park.  Great places to eat nearby - including the Pizza Press and burritos up the street in strip mall.  I'd go back here every time.  The location can't be beat outside of Disneyland hotels and price is much better!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we hope you will be able to visit us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Hotel right opposite Disneyland entrance, couldn't get any closer! Parking not a problem in the hotel. The room itself was fine, nothing fancy but had everything we needed. Would come back again for the convenience of the hotel. Breakfast included, was absolutely fine.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and hope you are able to stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This was our first visit to Anaheim and we would highly recommend this hotel to anyone going to Disney.  When they say you are a 5 minute walk away, you truly are.  The rooms are spacious and very clean with a mini frig.   The free breakfast was an added bonus and had everything you could possibly need to get your day started.  The pool was very small, but when Disneyland is across the road it really doesn't matter.  Found the staff to be very friendly and helpful.  I had requested two connecting rooms and that's exactly what we got.  The internet was pretty slow, but was still able to get on line to check e-mails, etc.  If we ever get the chance to come back to Disneyland, I wouldn't think twice about booking here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your first trip to Anaheim.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us.  Your commetns, compliments, and recommendation are greatly appreciated.  We hope you will be able to come and stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Love the hotel, but if you want to leave your car after check out and enjoy Disney until the afternoon they make it extremely difficult. At first they said no, then said we would be charged an outrageous fee and said we had to go park at Disney! What hotel wouldn't want your $ and let you park? After several conversations they finally let us stay for a fee and then we had to have a special ticket to buzz out, call the office so we didn't get fined... Ridiculous!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us, but very sorry you were disappointed with the parking.  Parking at the hotel is a privilege restricted to registered guests of the hotel due to limited space.  We do not offer Disney Parking for a fee to visitors because our hotel parking lot size is not conducive to this practice.  However, knowing that some of our guests do like to enjoy some time at Disneyland on the day of checkout, we do offer a four hour courtesy parking extension.  This allows guests who have checked out at the 11 am check out time, to park until 3pm at no additional fee.  The extension ends at 3pm so there is space available for the nights arriving and current registered guests.  Since we did make an accommodation and the registered guest parking ticket can not be extended, we did require you to push the intercom button on the gate machine so we could open it for you. I do again apologize for any disappointment you experienced. It is not a matter of charging for extended Disney Parking but ensuring that all registered guests are able to park their vehicle.  Since you did enjoy your stay, I hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel was prefect for what we needed. It's close to Disney, clean, comfortable and priced correctly for the standard of property.  The staff where helpful and never an issue with any if the requests we put to them.  Yes the breakfast is a little crazy during the peak times and a little basic but its just part of the experience of families trying to get ready for Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to share your experience.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your time with us and appreciate your comments and compliments. We hope you will have the chance to stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The hotel staff are very kind and helpful. The place is clean.  It may not be the "nicest" hotel; but the staff and the location make up for any short comings. After a long day at the parks, it was good to see that all I had to do was fall across the street and I was home!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel is the closest you will get to Disneyland without staying on the property and paying an arm and a leg.The breakfast you get with the hotel is pretty good. For those of us who are handicap they are very accommodating. From leaving your scooter charging in the lobby to having breakfast downstairs and them serving you.The suites sleep up to 6 adults and they can also provide cribs for babies.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and sharing your experience.  I am very pleased you enjoy your time staying with us and that we are able to meet your needs.  Thank you for your comments and compliments. We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care

Summary Heading: Love the Best Western Park Place Inn
Summary: My wife and I won't stay anywhere else when going to Disneyland, and we go a lot. The location can't be beat. The rooms are always clean and so are the grounds. If you ever have a problem, as we did once with a sink, they are there really fast to fix it. We spend very little time in the room as we usually go to the park at opening and leave at closing each night and it is perfect. But if you have kids you need to pack back to the hotel when they are crashed, you will be very glad you stayed here.   Free WiFi, a fridge and microwave and we are set. We also appreciate the free breakfast right next door. It's nice to grab something on the way to the park so you don't have to spend the big bucks inside until lunch.  We always fly in to Orange County and our room is almost always
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing us for your Disney visits and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoy having you as our guest and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We look forward to your next visit with us.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Best Western PLUS Park Place Inn - Mini Suites, Anaheim, CALIFORNIA
Summary: Clean, comfortable, and just across the street from Disneyland. Well staffed so the place is kept up even with a huge customer turnover. Free breakfast is a weak point. Could be ok (fruit is fresh) but the second day we found it better to walk up the street to Mimi's. There is another restaurant nearby that also starts with a "M" but we didn't try it.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Great hotel, service and breakfasts.  Location was excellent for Disneyland.  The staff welcomed us like we were visiting relatives and called almost daily to insure we were comfortable. We all enjoyed the breakfasts and liked the menu.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience.  I enjoyed reading your review and I am so pleased you felt like you were among family.  Thank you for your commetns and compliments.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The front desk was great.  We couldn't check in but were able to park in lot and come back later and check in.  Room was clean and everything worked.  Needs updating but it was very nice.  Internet was up and working.  The breakfast was excellent it had everything anyone wanted, not just sweets.  Pool was nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to share your experience.  I am glad we had parking available so you could start your day off without any hassle.  Your comments and compliments are appreciated and we hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care

Summary: Would highly recommend this hotel. The hotel staff were very friendly and accommodating. Room was clean. The breakfast was wonderful and much more then your typical continental breakfast! Close to Disneyland. We have already made reservations for our next trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We look forward to seeing you during your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Very happy with the hotel in general. Very helpful staff, clean and quiet rooms, clean exterior & pool and an excellent breakfast buffet.  Major bonus is that it is located directly across from the Disneyland entrance. Just walk across the street and you are in Disneyland, no need for a shuttle.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to write a review.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Best Place to Stay when Visiting Disneyland!
Summary: This was our third stay at this location and it just can't be beat. It's the closest hotel to the park, being right at the stop light on Harbor Blvd., cross the street and you're on Disney property! The complimentary breakfast is great, lots of selection and very nice to "fuel up" before heading into the park. The rooms are nicely appointed. The front desk staff are all very professional and nice. The arranged for our ride to the airport with a transportation service they use and it was awesome, too. All in all, a very positive experience. We'll definitely stay there again on our next trip to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your recent trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate your comments and compliments as well as the sharing the experience of your stay with us.  We look forward to seeing you during your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights in February. We booked a 2x Double bed room, I was concerned as it was the cheapest room that it would not be so good, but it was spacious and comfortable! We were only two ladies so 1 bed each, a double was plenty. Breakfast was ok, nothing flash but enough variety to satisfy most I think and to fill your tummy before hitting the parks. Great service from the front desk, help with taxis, tours and using the safety deposit boxes behind the counter.   We requested a higher floor so there is no noise from above and away from stairs and lift, our request was met and found the room to be very quiet.  Our only issues was the WiFi, terrible! Trying to contact out families in Australia using face time was very hard. One day I ended up in the foyer to get
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to share your experience.  I am sorry you had trouble with the wi-fi. We are looking into ways in which the service could be improved.  Your comments and compliments are appreciated and I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay.  We hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Thought we were going to end up in a dive that was close to Disneyland. Thoughts of threadbare curtains, ratty carpet, dingy sheets, etc. could not have been happier to find a nicely remodeled, functional hotel room (that sleeps six people By the way). The beds were some of the nicest I have had the pleasure of sleeping on at a hotel...even better than the new Marriott we stayed at last week for a funeral, and WAY better than the place we got stuck in when we dropped down to San Diego for a few days. I would recommend this to anyone! Road noise was not an issue, though that was a concern that some others had. The rooms we had were 3rd floor, and we heard nothing all night long.  Breakfast was at the restaurant next door. It was also very predictable, but better than some of the
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I was very pleased to read that we exceeded your expectations.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated.  We hope we will have the pleasure of having you as our guests again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I was very pleased to find a great rate for such a great location when visiting Disneyland. It is right across the street from the main entrance. This hotel has great potential with it's customer service and amenities. Noise is the main problem. If they change to interior halls (which would be a lengthy and expensive renovation) or even make some adjustments with the doors and windows this could help significantly. I did not sleep well.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to share your experience.  While I am sorry you did not sleep well,  I am pleased that you enjoyed the customer service and the amenities.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We hope you will consider staying with us again.  You were in the very front of the hotel.  Perhaps we could place you in a quieter location next time.   Thank you and take care.

Summary: A very short walk across the street to Disneyland. $10 a night to park and was lucky enough that they had room for my car to stay in the lot until 9pm the day of my check out. Not always the case because it depends on how full the lot is that day. Buffet breakfast at restaurant next door was great. Hotel desk staff were very helpful and friendly. I would recommend this BW to anyone wanting a good hotel at a fair price.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am glad we were able to let you stay parked here while you enjoyed your last day at the park.  Thank you for your comments, compliments and recommendation.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Right across the street, it doesn't get much better than that. Rooms are comfortable and clean but you have to ask for housekeeping each day. The walls aren't paper thin, it is just that everyone is so loud and excited that they are at disneyland, so you'll hear folks. The pool was also great to have a break from the park.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your visit to Disney.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us.  Housekeeping will clean your room everyday as long as there is not a Do Not Disturb sign on the door.  If you come back during the day for a break and would like your room serviced by break time, please let us know so we can inform housekeeping.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Location, location, location!  This hotel is right across the street from the main gate, is clean and has a very helpful staff.  The continental breakfast is awesome!  Honestly, I have no reason to look elsewhere when we come back.  Can't beat the value!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated.  I am very pleased you will be returning to stay with us and look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This is the perfect place to stay when you visit Disneyland.  We have stayed here before and will definitely be staying on our next visit.  Clean spacious room.  The bed is comfortable.  Internet service is low.  Office Staff is very accommodating.  There is a micro wave and a small fridg in the room.
Manager Response: Thank you for returning to the Best Western Plus Park Place Inn.  We enjoy having you as our guests and appreciate your comments and compliments.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We spent 3 nights at the Park Place Inn in March 2014.  The hotel staff was friendly and helpful, and our room was clean and quiet.  Expanded continental breakfast is included and provided at the coffee shop next door.  The location is ideal, about as close to Disneyland as you can get without being in a Disney hotel.  A money saving tip: there are many Disney t-shirts available in the hotel gift shop.  While they may not be exactly what you can get in the park, they run about half the price, and we received a discount coupon.  Consider checking there first as merchandise in the park is ridiculously expensive.  All in all, this hotel is just right, and we'll definitely stay here when we come to Disneyland again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to share your experience.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This was our second stay at this Best Western, this time around with the kids. The room could definitely use some updating as far as the furniture and carpeting. But overall the beds were pretty comfy and the room was clean. Breakfast was okay nothing spectacular but not horrible either, but hey it is free. Overall a great stay with the kids and conveniently located across the main entrance from Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased to read you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The room was a bit small, the bed was excellent, but facing Disney grounds made this room noisy, so if you have children you might want to request something on the other end of the building. We had good service from the front desk personal. overall a good experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your recent visit to Disney.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and the service you received.  I hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Stayed for five nights.  My husband and I as well as our son, daughter-in-law and two children ages 6 and 1.  Very good location if you are visiting Disneyland and are not staying on Disney property.  Located directly across the street.  Convenient for returning with small children during the day.  Breakfast was sufficient with a wide variety.  Room clean and beds comfortable.  A little noisy, but to be expected in downtown area.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your recent visit to Disneyland.  I am very pleased to read you enjoyed the accommodations and location.  Thank you for taking the time to write a review.  We truly appreciate it and hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We usually stay at the Park Vue Inn when we come to Disneyland but we wanted to try something new. The location here couldn't be better. It is literally across the street from the main entrance to the park. That's about where the perks stop. This is a serviceable motel. It's not bad. It was clean. It just didn't have anything that wow'd us. The check in process was just ok. We weren't overly welcomed but the gentleman wasn't rude either. The room was clean and a good size. The pool area was a little disappointing. Small area and the way it's all positioned you can't see the fireworks from the park which has been something we've done in the past one night we are there. We would go back to the room early one night, let the kids play in the pool and we could see the fireworks from
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very sorry you did not enjoy your stay and apologize for any inconvenience caused by the 8 am contruction starting time.  Your comments are appreciated and we hope you enjoyed your time at Disneyland.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This has been our second stay at Park Place Inn.  It was quite a few years after our first stay, but we made the choice based on a decent stay the first time and the quite frankly, the best possible location for a Disneyland vacation.  This hotel is as close to Disneyland and California Adventure as possible... even closer than the Disneyland Hotel and Paradise Pier are to the two parks.  The hotel is located opposite Downtown Disney.  It is literally a 3-4 minute walk once you get across Harbor Blvd.  Rooms are decent size... decently clean.  Notice some people questioning the cleanliness of the carpeting.  I see it this way, typically SoCal gets very little rain and that does not help to keep their streets clean.  So much walking around your shoes are sure to pick up the
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for coming back and staying with us during your recent visit to the Disney Resort Area.  We appreciate your comments and compliments as well as you taking the time to share your personal experience.  As you mentioned we do not have safes in the room.  However, if there is ever something you would like to lock up that won't fit in the safety deposit boxes at the front desk, we would be happy to issue you a claim check and hold the items in the back office.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Great Hotel location is perfect right in front of Disneyland gates. room clean , friendly staff  breakfast is great, free wi-fi. They are always updating to keep modern We have stayed there many times in the past 5 years and will stay there again
Manager Response: Thank you for making us your choice hotel when visiting the Disney Resort Area.  We appreciate you taking the time to write this review to share your personal experience with us.  Thank you for your comments and compliments and we look forward to seeing you during your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: My husband and I are annual pass holders at Disneyland and come down from Monterey about once a month or every other month. We always, opt to stay at this hotel. We take our 2 yr. old daughter and love how convenient the location is to the park. I seriously am not understanding some of the complaints I'm reading on here. The front desk staff are amazing. They seriously go above and beyond to help out guests. Some people may not know but the Stovall company offers discounts, when you call to book your reservation they have a AAA discount or a Costco membership discount. It does save you money. Yes the suites are mini people, Hello, they do advertise them as mini. A full suite would indicate that there is a door between the bed area and the main area. I recommend this hotel to
Manager Response: I would first like to thank you for always choosing our hotel for your Disneyland visits.  We enjoy having you stay with us and greatly appreciate you taking the time to write this review.   Our employees strive to ensure all of our guests have a memorable experience.  Thank you for your comments and compliments and for sharing your personal experience with us.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I have to say I am mystified by the negative reviews on here. We stayed here in January and didn't have a single complaint.  The free breakfast is what it is. Load up on coffee carbs and protein and hit the park.  We stayed at the back on the third floor with a family of 6 next door and never heard them.  I'll pay the little extra to not waste my time in a shuttle or bus line. With a 4 year old and a 6 year old we did 3 15 hour days in the parks and hotel was convenient and quiet when we were done.  I can't imagine staying anywhere else and have recommended it to 3 different families who are on their way down.  Loved it and more important kids loved it.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your recent visit to Disneyland.  I am very pleased to read how much you and your kids enjoyed your stay with us.  We greatly appreciate you taking the time to write this review and your comments and compliments are very welcomed.  Thank you for your recommendation and we hope we will have the pleasure of seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel for years and years.  Check in has always been a pleasant experience as well as the entire stay.  Clean Clean Clean  spacious and a very friendly accomodating staff!   Extremely well priced  I would recommend this hotel to all!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experiences while staying with us over the years.  We greatly appreciate you spending your vacations with us as well as the comments and compliments. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We had several rooms booked here for a family trip to Disney.  The rates were not great, but I guess being across the street (literally!) from Disney, I wasn't going to find better prices.  The parking lot was a zoo due to the construction, the front desk was a maze to get to.    Our rooms were ok, nothing special again.  We were all on the ground floor, and had several different types; a single king, 2 queens, etc.  There was a nice sitting area in each.  In our room we had to cover the microwave clock because it was so bright and unplug the clock radio.  Nothing seemed to modern or updated, but it wasn't dirty or old looking either.  Just typical hotel room.    The pool and hottub area is small, the hot tub wasn't even that hot. And it closed promtly at 10pm.  The breakfast
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for choosing to stay with us during your recent visit to the Disney Resort Area.  I am very sorry we did not exceed your expectations and provide you with a comfortable and relaxing stay.  We will be making changes to the hotel over the next couple of years.  I do hope you will give us another chance to provide you with the service for which we are often praised for.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We had a terrible time during check-in there. The lady who did the check-in process with us was unhappy and seems even angry with us: she did not answer our questions, thrown our credit card and driver license to the table after checking them,... We thought she must hate us, but then she did the same thing to the next customer. When we were checking out (after 2-days' staying), luckily we did not have chance to communicate with her again, but we did see she was doing the same thing to a couple who were doing check-in process. Other folks in this hotel seem to be normal though.  Three comments we can provide: (1) Do not select this hotel. The good thing about this hotel is the location. It's indeed very convenient for those who plan to stay a whole day in Disneyland, perhaps just
Manager Response: I would first like to thank you for staying with us and for taking time to write a review.  Your comments will help us address any issues that there may be with our employees.  I do apologize if one of our desk agents appeared rude.  The situation will definitely be discussed.  We hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Pros: Walk to the front of the property, cross the street and you are at Disney.  Nothing closer.  All  staff is polite and friendly.  Although property is older all of the rooms are very clean.  This is our go-to place when we travel to Disney.  Queen beds and a sofa sleeper make rooms a great option.  Rooms have a dorm room fridge and a microwave.  Cons: If I have to find something- water pressure.  But honestly I think its an issue at all the hotels on Harbor.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your visits to Disney.  Your comments and compliments are appreciated well as your time taken to write a review.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: motel right across street from Disneyland very convenient for visit suites are not sweet but a reason to charge more for room forget the continental breakfast but Dennys and IHOP a few doors down parking is very tight and controlled
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  Addressing the suites per another review you wrote:  We do have mini-suites not suites.  Mini-suites are one large room with a small seperation.  Our minisuites are larger than our standard rooms and do hold up to six people.  I do apologize if there was any misunderstanding or miscommunication during the reservation process.  We hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care

Summary: Great place to stay!  Easy access to parks, right across the street.  Staff were so helpful with reservations, check-in and coordinating transportation from the airport.  Room was clean and cribs were already in rooms when we arrived.  They even accommodated a late check-out for all four rooms so we could stay inside during the rain while waiting for our ride to the airport.  Rooms were a little dated and small, but the convenience o the parks made up for this.  I would stay here again and recommend to others.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am glad we had rooms available so you could wait in comfort for your shuttle ride.  Your comments, compliments, and recommendation are greatly appreciated.  We hope to see your again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Great Place to stay and so close to Disney Land you won't believe the walk, you walk out from the free breakfast and your in the cross walk to the park, The breakfast is a nice Hot Full Breakfast Bar up stairs.  We Will be back
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your time with us.  Your comments and compliments are appreciated and we look forward to your next stay.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Excellent spot for Disneyland, honestly it's right at the entrance. Only takes 5 minutes to walk to Disneyland gates. Great value in this regard. Comfortable stay, we were on bottom floor and unfortunately you could hear everyone walking around or running in the case of the kids upstairs.  I would avoid the buffet though, I know it's free but it is small and it was chaotic for even the quiet season. More horrifying was the poor food quality, we should have gone to maccas up the road.  Apart from this it was clean and staff very helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for sharing your experience.  Your comments and compliments are appreciated and we hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Best place to stay while at Disneyland
Summary: My family has visited the Anaheim area many times over the years, and we have tried other accommodations, but none compare to the Park Place Inn.  The location, the price and, most importantly, their excellent staff, are beyond comparison!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We do enjoy having you as our guest and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: First off the location of this hotel is perfect!! Literally 8 mins (walking with kids) from Disneyland's gates! The front desk workers were helpful and welcoming! Kevin the supervisor was extremely nice! When I entered the room my mouth dropped of how gorgeous the room is! Some ppl say it's outdated but I have to disagree I loved it! And it's very spacious! We had the 1 king suite with coffee maker, mini fridge, microwave, etc! I can go on about this hotel because I am extremely satisfied! Out of all the best westerns I have stayed at on harbor blvd this one is hands down the best! Will be staying here every time we come to disneyland now! Thank you best western for making me happy!! (Mind I am the pickiest & quite a clean freak) room very clean!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to share your experience.  I am very pleased we exceeded your expectations and that you will be staying with us whenever you visit Disneyland.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Great motel for Disney and the convention centre!
Summary: We chose this motel for its position and price. It turned out to be a good choice, it is directly across the road from the entrance to Disneyland and California Adventure Park. And a short/small walk to the convention centre.  The rooms are roomy and clean! The Staff are friendly and helpful. The Wi Fi really needs to be improved and was below par in our room as the antenna was to far away from our room and I would say a lot of other rooms as well. All in all it seemed a great place for a family to stay. There are plenty of restaurants and eateries around as well as convenience stores. The free buffet was just barely ok, but is free! The price is also good for the budget. Would I stay here again, Yes!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and I am very pleased we met your expectations.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Great hotel right across from Disneyland.  Next to Captain Kidd's Restaurant and Coldstone Icecream.  There is a small market next door too.  Free breakfast in morning is a buffet with eggs, sausage, waffles, yogurt, etc.  Excellent value!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I hope you will return to once again enjoy the hotel, location, and breakfast offerings.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  Thank you and take care

Summary: We stayed here as a family,  Clean rooms, across from Disney gates, the kids liked the buffet.  Nice to be able to walk back to room for a rest or a break and go back to Disneyland. Not impressed on having to pay for parking.  Internet was included.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and writing a review.  Your comments and compliments are appreciated.  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay and hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Staff is very friendly (especially Oliver). Located directly across the street from Downtown Disney, 5-10 minute walk to both parks, and within walking distance of several restaurants. Overall a great value!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to share your experience.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care

Summary: Awesome location, right outside Disneyland entrance. After walking 11 hrs in the park, it was nice to not have far to go to our room.  Great breakfast. There was construction during our stay, but getting up early to start the day it didn't matter to us.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and that the driveway work did not negatively affect your visit.  We hope to see you again and appreciate your comments and compliments.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Clean, comfortable and close to Disneyland
Summary: This is my second time to stay here. You cant beat the value and how close you are to Disneyland, the only way to get any closer is to stay in the park. The rooms are very clean and beds are comfortable. I would highly recommend this hotel for its clean rooms, location and value.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us again and for sharing your experience.  We appreciate your comments, compliments and recommendation.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care

Summary: My family and I have stayed here many times when we go to Disneyland; in the past you couldn't best the price.  After this last trip we will not be staying here again. The air conditioner didn't work properly and the air didn't circulate in the room. The people at the front desk were not much help with answering questions and were rude when we asked again. We were supposed to get breakfast with our room but the place was under construction and we couldn't get into the place.  Also we received a call a couple of days before our trip letting us know if we were going to be taking our car there would be no place to park because the hotel was booked.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your recent visit and sharing your experience.  I do apologize we did not meet your expectations.  If the air conditioner was not working properly we could have definitely replaced it if had been brought to our attention.  Per another review that you wrote (regarding not being helpful), we did try and offer to let your husband store the luggage in the office but he chose to wait. We could not provide access to a room that was not yet ready for occupancy.  Breakfast was available and was accessible through the set of doors immediately next to the main set of doors.  Regarding the phone call for parking.  We were calling to confirm if you would have a vehicle so we could ensure there was a space available to you.  We did not call to tell you that you would not be allowed to park.  Again I am very sorry for not meeting your expectations and for any misunderstandings that may have occurred.  We hope you will choose to stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Good Value and close to Disneyland!
Summary: We just stayed at this hotel in January 2014. We were there for a week and we had a good stay, they were remodeling the front driveway so we had to use the exit which was not very easy when the exit only has room for one vehicle. The hotel was not super busy which was nice, however one of the two elevators was down for 2 days and that caused some problems for us since we had a stroller we would have to carry up and down the stairs or walk the distance of the hotel to wait for a long time for the elevator to get to the second level.  The rooms were good, the carpets really need to be cleaned. anytime we took or shoes off in the room our socks were black within 10 minutes. That is a huge bummer and makes me wonder how clean the rest of the room was. We also had problems every
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us again and sharing your experience.  I am truly sorry we did not meet your expectations during your stay.  Your comments will definitely help us address areas we need to improve.  The staff most likely sent maintenace to check the boilers, but should have sent someone to your room as well to make sure everything was working properly as was done on the day of check out.  I do hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Stayed 3 nights last minute to go to disneyland.  Rooms were only available if we didn't use the parking lot?  Huh?  Agreed to stay even tho we had 2 cars.  We parked at the Anaheim Gardens garage which is the 7 min walk that they state.  Not bad if your not going anywhere in your car.  Cost was 24 dollars per day.  The hotel was very clean including the carpets which appeared to be new.  We are frequent disney visitors and have found many of the older motels in the area to have disgustingly dirty carpets.  The breakfast is better than most motels with lots of choice and even some fresh fruit. OH, and you walk across the street to disney entrance.  Perfect.  Had the Captain Kidds buffet on the morning we were leaving.  Probably will not do that again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and sharing your experience.  Unfortunately we do have limited parking.  When we are near parking compacity we do have to restrict reservations to no parking on site.  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I have stayed here in the past and will stay here next time we come. We had a clean and comfortable room and half way through the day when nap time for the kids came we did the 3 minute walk back to the hotel, took a nap, and then headed back to the park.  The breakfast is fine, nothing spectacular but hey, it's free! I have no complaints but I do have a couple of suggestions for the hotel since I know they read these reviews. 1.  Get better wireless. It is spotty at best. For me, free wireless is a selling point for a hotel. It should work all of the time and should have a good signal. 2.  The air conditioners are a bit loud. We have kids that sleep through anything so it isn't a huge deal. But I can see why some people complain about it.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us again and taking the time to share your experience.  Your comments are greatly appreciated.  We are looking into ways we can improve the internet service.  For the air conditioners, they do go through significant use.  If they are becoming too loud in the rooms, we do have replacements.  Again thank you for taking the time to write a review and we look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Best hotel off Disney property for price and location!
Summary: This was my first time as an adult  going to Disneyland. I went with my daughter who is in a wheelchair.  Speaking as a person who used to work in the travel industry for years, and I am very picky, this hotel is a good value with quality!  It is across the street from the Disney parks.  It takes about 5 minutes walking time to each park entrance. This is one of Disney's good neighbor hotels so they are under the scrutiny to maintain the Disney standard and they do it well.  The lobby is small and personal, staff knowledgable, and friendly.  Check-in very easy.  Rooms are average size and clean. We had an accessible room that was very roomy with refrigerator to keep water, and snacks in. There is a mini mart practically next door that we would walk to every night after the parks
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us including the accommodations, location, and breakfast.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we look forward to seeing you next year.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Room accomodations and  convenience to amusement parks
Summary: The room was too small.  But very convenient to downtown disney, california adventure, disneyland as well as local stores and resturants.  Everythng you could possibly want to do was within walking distance.
Manager Response: Thank for staying with us and sharing your experience.  We hope you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Room was dark and the room location was very noisy,  The air conditioning was so loud we couldn't hear the television.  Beds were great, though...which is important when walking for hours in Disneyland parks.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for sharing your experience.  I do apologize that you had noise issues while you were staying with us.  We do hope you will stay with us again.  Please let us know while you are here if anything seems not to be working properly.  We definitely could have replaced the air conditioner for you.  The ACs should not be emitting a loud noise.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Me,daughter & her 2 boys stayed Sun-Wed. night, room 377.  Wish the full beds were queen-size.  Sheets,towels & swim towels were clean & plentiful. (yea) Saw the fireworks from 3rd floor balcony Sun. night. (yea!) The breakfast was good (yea!), it would have been great if they didn't put a TON  of pepper on the potatoes and ruined them. Warning: put a jacket or pen &paper or something on your table when you go back for 2nds or they will clear your table right away!  The hotel stay was good. My only complaint is that the pool is NOT HEATED. But that's not a big deal, we were not in the pool much and there is a hot tub.   If you are renting  a scooter, rent from Apple Scooters!!! ($90. for 3 days)  If you need transportation from Airport to hotel, use Executive Transportation and
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us.  Thank you for your comments and compliments. We do hope to see you again.  For your next stay, please note that the pool is heated year round to 80 degrees and is checked hourly.   Thank you and take care.

Summary: I was pleasantly surprised by this hotel. The room was very nice and clean. I was concerned about the complimentary breakfast at Captain Kidds as I have eaten there before and not been impressed, however the complimentary breakfast is seperate and upstairs and we were very happy with it. There was hot and cold items and plenty of options to choose from. I would definitely stay here again for the right price. It is truly right across the street from Disneyland entrance.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to share your experience.  I am very pleased that we exceeded your expecations and that you enjoyed the breakfast.  Your comments and compliments are appreciated and we do hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Best western, best place to stay!
Summary: This was our 4th family trip to disneyland and each stay has been at different hotels. The best western park place inn has been by far the best hotel we have found yet. It is steps away from the front enterance of disneyland and yet very affordable. The rooms are super clean and staff are super friendly making sure that we were comfortable and had everything we needed.The internet was a little slow but wasnt a huge deal.The continental breakfast was good. It had a variety of stuff to eat including eggs, sausage,waffles, fresh fruit, yogurt,bagels,toast and pasteries.Cant complain it was free.I highly recommend staying here as we will for sure on our next trip to Disneyland!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  Thank you for your recommendation and we look forward to seeing you during your next visit to Disneyland.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: It's a great place and short walk to the happiest place on earth Disneyland and easy access to the highway to Universal studios or San Diego. Pool and Jacuzzi was great for parents with sore feet and kids who have fun. A quick breakfast in the morning for the family. The walk to Disneyland is about 5 minutes, no waiting for a buss ride to get some rest.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay as well as the convenience of our location.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel is a great hotel if you want to stay close to Disneyland.  We had to rent a scooter for my husband and we were able to park it in the lobby for recharging at night with no problems.  The rooms are very clean and were always clean when we returned to the room no matter what time we came back.  I would recommend this hotel very highly.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay.  We thank you for your comments, compliments, recommendation.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This is a great place to stay for a family across the road from Disneyland. We had booked through our travel agent for two rooms one of which was to include three separate beds for our teenage kids. Unfortunately the room provided only had two beds, we ended up having to pay extra for a room change to a room that had a bed settee available. Other than that, the staff were very friendly and helpful, the rooms were clean and of average size, there was a coffee maker and a fridge to keep our water cool. There is a restaurant on site which was reasonable and handy and a shop next door that sells really good coffee. The bus stop is out the from of the hotel, very handy for those of us on foot. Great laundry and parking onsite for those with cars. Our rooms were right outside the
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am sorry to read there was a problem with your reservation, but happy we had something that would accommodate your three teenage kids.  We appreciate your comments and compliments and hope to see you again if you come back to visit Disneyland.    Thank you and take care.

Summary: The Park Place Inn in Anaheim  is a nice hotel. It is very close to the front gate of Disneyland, makes that late night walk back easier. The staff is very pleasant and helpful. The have a morning breakfast that met our expectations. We have stayed at this hotel more than once and highly recommend it.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us again and taking the time to share your experience.  We enjoy having you as our guest and appreciate your comments and compliments.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Best location for going to the Parks!!!!  It's right at the crosswalk into the park--you literally cannot get any closer besides staying at the Grand.  Park Place is clean & the staff is great!  We have stayed there many time & always request a room above the lobby facing the parks.  Quieter there & we get to see what we want. :-)  It's close to McDonald's, IHOP, Tony Roma's, Cold Stone.  Fridge & Microwave in the rooms.  Beds/pillows weren't as comfy this trip, like they were new or something, but not bad enough to do anything about it.  We don't spend a lot of time at the hotel when we go to Disneyland so we look for cleanliness & proximity to the Parks.  We shower & sleep there & for a fraction of the price of a D-land hotel, this is great for us.  Pool is not super large but
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us again and taking the time to write a review.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and I hope we always have the room location available for you when you visit. We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Mildew smell in room and manager would not change the room
Summary: The hotel room had a mildew smell in the room and the manager of the hotel would not change the room.  It was very late and we have two small children so I couldn't really run around trying to find another room.  I even called the corporate office and they said that it was up to the manager.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I do apologize that you were not satisfied with your stay.  I do show that you had two separate reservations with us.  One night was for a standard room, being covered by a free night voucher that you had earned and the the next night was in a minisuite.  A request was made at check in to upgrade to a minisuite so you would not have to switch rooms.  However the voucher was only valid for a standard room.  I am very sorry if there was an odor in your room.   The only notification I see regarding this issue was from written reviews.  I will reach out to Best Western Customer Care.  If a call had been placed to them regarding this issue, a case should have been openned and a call or written notification sent to us to address the issue.  I will also speak with supervisor who was working in my place the evening you checked in.  Again I do apologize that you were dissatisfied with your stay.  I do hope you enjoyed your visit to Disneyland.  Thank you and take care

Summary: I am giving this hotel an excellent rating, not because it is an excellent hotel, but because it delivers everything it says it will.I cannot imagine you would want to stay in this hotel for any other reason than to visit Disneyland and for that it couldn't be better. Save your money on the Disney hotels that are overpriced and lack charm (approx 3 times the price of this hotel) This hotel lacks charm too, but at least you aren't expecting it! Rooms and corridors mission brown and uninspiring. However you'll get a good night sleep in clean rooms and very comfortable beds. Breakfast included was an added bonus, and surprisingly good, it will fuel you up for an energetic morning in Disneyland. Pool and hot tub was an unexpected bonus for the kids. If you're looking for a nice
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your visit to Disneyland.  We appreciate your comments and compliments as well as you taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and our proximity to Disneyland.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I won't go into the location of the hotel as likely every review does except to say it doesn't get much closer to the Disneyland park entrance than this Best Western.
