I was assigned a ground floor room #114 which was a short walk front the front lobby and it featured a large room with king bed and a small sofa and coffee table. The vanity was outside of the bathroom and the newer large flat screen TV was on a swivel so could be watched from either the bed or sofa and was handy. The furniture seemed a little dates, faux bamboo style desk & dresser from the 70's or 80's but everything in the room worked fine and was comfortable décor notwithstanding. The ground floor does have parking right outside so there was some noise heard in the room from cars and other guests walking by
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjouyed your accommodations as well as the amenities and location of the hotel.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Staff very nice, room terrible, outlets didnt work, air conditioners out dated and loud, started construction at 6am when people are there for business uncalled for. We couldnt even charge our phones, laptops ect, unless we went to the bathroom. The tv and fridge were plugged into a extentsion cord another hazard, no parking for the people that were staying there. just poor quality set up and we will not stay there again. The staff was very friendly but doesnt make up for the room quality.
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience.  All reviews help us to improve our service.  I am very sorry we did not meet your expectations when you were with us.   Yes, our parking lot was being repaved while you were here.  However, the work did not begin until 8:00 am, not 6:00 am.  Disneyland and the City of Anaheim were both doing work.  That may have been the source of the noise.  Also, we did ensure that parking was available for our guests while the work was being done.  I am sorry you did not find your accommodations acceptable.  If anything had been brought to our attention while you were here, we could have definitely addressed the issues to ensure you had a more enjoyable stay.  Again we do thank you for addressing your concerns with us so we can evaluate the room you were in and take corrective action for the next guest.   We do hope you will give us another chance to provide you with a truly relaxing and enjoyable stay.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Location was the best on the street. 5 min. walk maximum to Disneyland and California Adventure then another 3 min.. to downtown disney. Rooms were clean and modern enough. Service was very helpful along with the service from Select Rent a Car that is located right in the lobby. Only used the rent a car for our last day at Universal otherwise almost everything we needed (minus a grocery store) was within walking distance. A small convenience store is located right next door that is open until around 1am. Highly recommend this hotel for the price and location.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your visit to the Disney Resort Area.  I am very happy to read you enjoyed the location as well as the amenities and conveniences of the hotel.  Your comments, compliments, and recommendation are greatly appreciated.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: When we arrived the staff was extremely helpful, I even had to ask some of those cleaning the rooms a question after I was in my room and they were helpful as well. On check out I again had a great employee who was very kind and did a great job at answering my questions in regards to directions. Great hotel. Amazing location to Disneyland. Will definitely be staying there again!!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for sharing your experience.  I am very pleased all of our staff members were able to assist you.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I don't usually post reviews, but the Best Western Park Place deserves the praise.  I did a lot of searching before choosing this hotel. The location is fantastic - 5 minutes from hotel door to Disneyland gates.The rooms were clean and large.  Beds comfy.  The breakfast buffet exceeded expectations.  Staff was there to help and were friendly.  Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to share your experience.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the staff, amenities and accomodations.   Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we do hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: room good parking not so good
Summary: Was there for a convention so right away the room was higher than what a normal rate would be. Room was comfortable. Internet was not very fast. Parking was a nitemare. They were resurfacing one side of the lot so it cut it in half. Good sied to that was there were no cars parked on my side where my room was so it was quiet. Overall decent room. Breakfast was pretty awful.
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for staying with us during the convention.  If you choose to stay with us next year, please be aware that the negotiated convention rates are often lower than our standard rates.  I do apologize for the inconvenience of the repaving, but glad you enjoyed the quiet.  Thank you for your comments and compliments and we do hope to see you again next year.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Great location at the front of the main gates of Disneyland, great staff, great breakfast with good choices, rooms are clean, beds are good  parking on site.  We have stayed there 7 times and going back next week. This is our hotel of choice when we go to Disneyland
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review .  With all the options available, we greatly appreciate you choosing to stay with us when visiting Disneyland.  Thank you for your comments and compliments and we will see you next week.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Very convenient place to stay while visiting Disneyland.  Staff was very friendly and helpful during check-in, check-out, and the stay.  Breakfast was next door above a restaurant so there was plenty of room to sit down and eat.  Entrance to Disneyland was right across the street.  Staff was very helpful in recommending a airport shuttle to get to and from the airport.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay.  Your comments and compliments are appreciated and we hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Received great rooms, all adjoining or next to one another, on first level (important with strollers), traveled with a party of eight. Loved the microwave/fridge in rooms, nice large beds (my husband is very tall), quiet, just across the street from Disneyland, no shuttle needed, you literally walk out your hotel room to the street light, walk across the street and to the main gates. Breakfast was perfect and had something for everyone.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very happy we were able to place all three rooms next to each other in convenient location. Thank you for your comments and compliments.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the accommodations, amenities, and location.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The staff was friendly and professional. Easy walk to the convention center The rooms were good sized and exceptionally clean. In room microwave, fridge and coffee added to the already good value price. Bonus for the hot tub too!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience.  I am very pleased you enjoyed our hotel, the amenities, and location.  I hope you had fun at the NAMM show.  We hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The hotel itself clean and tidy what you would need it your not planning on spending a lot of time in your room.  Since this hotel is located right across the street from Disney Land we didn't and it worked well for us.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased we met your needs for your trip to Disneyland.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: You are directly across the street from the entrance to Disneyland.  Perfect walking.  Also, very close to good dining options besides the park.  This was our first stay at this motel but stay regularly at Best Western chain.  It's not a horrible place, but it's not the best either.  We stayed over the Tinkerbell 1/2 Marathon Weekend, it was great as far as location and having to report to the park at 5:30 AM for race day.  However, when we were informed late Saturday afternoon that due to the 1/2 Marathon access to and from the motel starting at 4AM Sunday until 9AM Sunday was not going to happen, we were not real happy.  I felt like they could have given a little more notice than this. I do realize that this was not entirely their fault.  We worked through that and left at
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for staying with us and taking the time to share your experience at our hotel.  The information provided will help us improve our service and offerings.  I do apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced regarding the road closures.  We did put up notice once we had a complete understanding of the closures and transportation options including the alternative pick up locations and times.  The year prior we were not completely boxed in by the road closures for the marathon.  We did place a notice in the lobby early Thursday evening on the lobby counter and placed one in every room Friday morning.  I am very sorry for any disappointment you may have experienced during your stay and thank you for writing a review so we can address the issues.  I do wish we had been notified of the trouble with your room and A/C and other concerns so we could have addressed the issues while you were here.  We hope we will see you again and be provided with the opportunity to show what a true Park Place Inn experience is.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: One advantage is that the hotel is just front of the main entrance of Disney and pretty close of HWY 5. very convenient for me, absoluty no complaint of the hotel, staff , room, etc..; The included breakfast is Ok, specially for how much you pay for the room. Nearby you find stores, and diverse dinning option , expensive and economic. I recommend this hotel
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and appreciate your comments and compliments.  Thank you for your recommendation and we hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel two years in a row for the Tinker Bell 1/2 Marathon weekend, and I am very happy with the accommodations and the location.  It is located directly across the street from the Disneyland shuttle drop off and only 1/2 a mile to Downtown Disney. The rooms are clean, have a fridge, a microwave, and a TV, and the hotel also provides free wireless and a free buffet breakfast.  To top it off, the staff were also friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you fore returning to our hotel and taking the time to write a review.  We appreciate your comments and compliments and hope you had a wonderful marathon weekend.  We hope to see you again next year.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Once you check in and park the car everything is easily within walking distance of Disneyland: the entrance, restaurants and related venues. Convenience with no driving is big plus. You can return during the day and rest. Great for families. Saw but did not use pool and spa.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience.  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay here and you for sharing what you liked about our hotel.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Great location - parking fee a rip off
Summary: The Park Place is a nice hotel and has a great location just across the street from Disney entrance, however, the parking situation was a huge disappointment.  We arrived the night before and discovered that our parking pass was only good until 3pm the next day.  The pass did say that there would be a charge if we stayed past that time but did not spell out any specifics.  The parking charge on our bill for the night before was only $10, so we were shocked when we had to pony up $75 to get our car past the exit gate at 11pm when we left.  Seriously?  $75 for 8 hours of parking?  Really misleading.  The website touts marginal parking fee of $10 but makes no mention of a $75 charge (or whatever the hourly rate is).  Will never stay there again.  We've stayed at other hotels along
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  If you read this response, please contact me at the hotel.  My name is below.    I am sorry that you left on a bad note regarding the parking.  If asked we could haved provided what the additional cost for extended parking would have been and also offered alternative locations.    The $10 parking fee is intended for registered guests of the hotel which is why that is the only rate mentioned on the website.  The non guest rates are not mentioned on the site because we do not offer public parking.  Our parking lot size is not able to accomodate Disneyland Parking as well as registered guests of the hotel.  The higher rates are in place to act as a deterrent to non guests of the hotel who prefer our lot due to its proximity to the main gates of Disneyland and California Adventure.    We do wish we could allow our guests to stay here all day after check out.  Unfortunately, if we did so, then spaces would not be available for registered guests returning for the evening, or for new arrivals.  However, knowing that some of our guests do like to enjoy some time at Disneyland on the day of checkout, we do offer a four hour courtesy parking extension.  The extenstion ends at 3pm so there is space available for the nights arriving guests.  Again I am very sorry regarding the issue of the parking especially after it seems you had an enjoyable stay.  Please feel free to contact me to see if I can help you in anyway.  Thank you and take care,  Kelly Laimana Front Office Manger

Summary: My boyfriend and I stayed at The Best Western Park Place Inn and Mini Suites back in September of 2013. We wanted a hotel that was relatively cheap and close to the Disneyland entrance. We absolutely Loved this hotel. You can't go in expecting 5 star accomodations, but for the price and the location, we absolutely Loved it. Our room was nice. It had a king sized bed, a bathroom, a nice vanity with a large mirror, a sitting area with a small 2 seater couch and a coffee table. A desk and chair. A TV. A small fridge and microwave. It was absolutely perfect for the two of us. The cleaning staff did a bang up job every day. The front desk staff was Always extremely friendly and helpful. Now, this hotel offers a complimentary breakfast and I will say, it's a little disappointing. We
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your visit to Disneyland.  We appreciate you taking the time to share your comments and compliments.  I am very pleased you loved our hotel and including the room, amenities, staff, and location.  We do hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: the Best Western Plus Park Place Inn was fabulous.  We were only looking for a place to sleep as our days would be spent inside the parks and we wanted to be as close to the gate as possible.  Little did we know it was a suite!  The TV was huge, not many channels to choose from, but we didn't stay here to watch TV!! Can't wait to go back.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your Disneyland Vacation.  I am very pleased we exceeded your expectations and greatly appreciate you taking the time to write a review.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The Best Western Mini-Suites in Anaheim provide very clean and well maintained rooms. The complimentary breakfast has hot and cold food and a good selection. The beds are comfortable and the people are fantastic. The parking policy is inconvenient and was the only unpleasant part of our trip. You cannot park there until noon which means finding another place to park and then moving the car or parking at Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated.  I am sorry for the inconvenience of the parking.  Parking at 12 pm is not so much a policy as it is a matter of availability.  We do have limited parking for guests of our hotel.  Check out is not until 11am and guests are allowed to have there vehicle here until 3pm the day of check out as a courtesy.  Check in is not until 3pm.  However as a courtesy, we do notify our guests that parking is available after 12pm the day of arrival, for those who wish to come early.  We do wish we could offer a full day of parking to our guests who have either checked out or are waiting to check in.  Unfortunately our lot size cannot accommodate Disney parking as well as registered guests. We do hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Good family option across the road from the park
Summary: The location is unbeatable.  You are right at the crossing to walk across the road to Disneyland and there's a bus / shuttle stop right outside the front door.  The rooms are spacious but average and a bit gloomy in a concrete block construction style.  It's a bit motel like on the ground floor where there are cars pulled up right outside rooms.  There's a nice enough pool and jacuzzi with pool towels and a guest laundry.  They have free guest wifi which is a bit fiddly but OK.  Reception is OK.  We had a major stuff up with our reservation.  We arrived to be told our reservation had been cancelled.  Then when we queried this (because why would we travel all the way from New Zealand and show up on a cancelled reservation) we were queried as though we were being untruthful and it
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and sharing your experience.  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay with us.  I do apologize for the inconvenience you experienced at check in.  I understand how upsetting it could be after such a long day of traveling to not have a room.  We did originally have two reservations reserved for you.  One was cancelled online by someone in your party in April and the other was cancelled via an email in September.  However, I am happy we were able to accomodate you in a room at the same rate which you originally booked.  I do thank you for the comments and compliments that you wrote and hope you enjoyed your time visiting the Disney Parks.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Great place if your going to Disney
Summary: This hotel was perfect for our trip to Disney.  The room had two beds and a couch. Plenty of room for our stuff as well as a fridge & microwave.   It was a great place to come and go from the park.   The breakfast that is included is very basic but it did have eggs and some hot choices so while not exciting food more than you normally get at a hotel.  I would stay there again if I go back to the magic kingdom.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your recent trip to Disney.  We appreciate you taking the time to write a review as well as your comments and compliments.  We do hope to see you again if you make another trip to the Disney Resort Area.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: It's a nice an clean hotel. But you can't rely on the internet. The rooms need to be refurbished. Old furnite. Nice cost/benefit. If you don't want to drive, excellent place, Everything is a walking distance.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to share your experience.  Your comments and compliments are appreciated.  We hope you will stay with us again if you come back to the area.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: clean rooms great service stay here a lot easy to catch the bus to Disneyland and California adventure the only real problem with this hotel is that parking area is small and is hard to get in and out of.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your recent trip to the Disney Resort Area.  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay and appreciate you taking the time to write a review.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Can't beat the price for being across the street from Disneyland!
Summary: Everything was great except my husband felt like he was falling off the bed and our room was right next to the street. On our first night, we could hear all the traffic.  On the second night, we didn't hear a thing from being so fatigued!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am happy to read you enjoyed your stay with us.  I do apologize for the bed.  We will check the mattress in the room where you were sleeping.  I do hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This location is one where you are paying primarily for the location. It really doesn't get any better outside the park. The breakfast is great and the ladies were so kind and nice. The space where it's held is a bit snug, but having the option to take food back to our room made a difference. It's nice they work with the restaurant next door, "Captain Kidds" The room had the worst bed I had ever slept on it was harder than bricks. Two adult and 4 kids made it snug but doable. The housekeeping staff spoke no English so it was difficult to get her to understand that we wanted extra towels.The front desk was great most of the time. As we were leaving we found previous person's item under our bed along with some I won't mention, so it made us question how clean the room really was.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  Your comments will help us improve our service to our guests.  I do apologize that the room was not thoroughly checked before you arrived.  Nothing should have been left behind in the room.  I am not sure what channels you are referring to.  The only tv channels we offer are the local network, plus Disney, FX, Weather Channel, CNN, Cartoon Network, HBO Family, USA, TBS, TNT, CNN, Discovery, TLC, Animal Planet, AMC, National Geographic, and ESPN.    Again thank you for sharing your experience and we do hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Great for a trip to Disneyland
Summary: We booked 2 King rooms.  They met our request for ajoring rooms.  You can't beat the location it is directly across the street from Disneyland.  The offer breakfast, but we didn't get a chance to eat either day.  We loved the sofa area in the room.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am glad we were able to meet your request for adjoining rooms.  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay and accommodations.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care

Summary: Very clean and comfortable room with a better breakfast than I've had at most 2 and 3 star hotels in Europe. Very comfy beds with several perfect sized pillows. Couldn't ask for a better location. A left turn right into the hotel, a 4 minute walk from the entrance to both Disney parks (Closer than any of the Disney hotels!). It was great to know that 5 minutes out of the park, I'd be back in a comfy bed. Excellent TV and fridge. Bath had extended shower curtains and a working multiple spray shower head - VERY refreshing!  Courteous and professional staff - especially the security guy out front. No matter if 6:30am or 11pm, he always appeared fresh and alert and was always courteous and professional in both demeanor and dress. Very commendable, especially for a job that would
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write such a detailed review.  I am extremely pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and has been rated the best so far by your teenage kids.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and will help us provide even better service to our guests.  We do look forward to you staing with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Wonderful place to stay, Fantastic Location
Summary: The Best Western Mini Suites in Anaheim is a wonderful place to stay. Literally right opposite the Disneyland entrance, its easy to get in and out of the park for the day. The rooms are a great size, and the bed was really comfy too. Good TV with plenty of channels, and wifi in the room. My room was right down the back so it didnt always connect well but it work reasonably considering. The hotel staff were friendly when needed help. The best thing was the room size and location. Would stay here again for sure.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: It was very nice,The room was clean & very nice. I have stayed there before & will stay again. My only complaint is the breakfast. They didn't have any meat selection, everything was cold, the juice was watered down. The ladies didn't do a good job at replenshing anything. They just stood around & watched. But the Motel room & stay was Great.
Manager Response: Thank you for returning to the Best Western Plus Park Place Inn. I am pleased you enjoyed your stay.  I do apologize for what you experienced in the breakfast area.  There should have been either ham or sausage at breakfast for a meat option.  We will definitely ensure that the items are being restocked during the course of the breakfast hours.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Front desk staff were very helpful and informative during our overnight stay. Room was clean and well maintained. My son forgot his iPad and the staff were diligent in ensuring it's safe return to him.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us.  Thank you for your comments and compliments and I am happy we were able to get your sons iPad back to him.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Tops for anyone going to Disneyland!
Summary: Our family of 5 have stayed at the BW Park Place Inn and Mini-Suites many, many times.  You cannot beat the location for Disneyland, California Adventure or Downtown Disney.  You are directly across from the pedestrian entrance.  We love being so close that you can hit the parks and then be back in your room in 5 minutes for a nap or swim before heading back in to Disneyland.  The continental breakfast was recently upgraded to include mediocre hot food- scrambled eggs, sausage & potatoes.  Mediocre but better than no hot food.  Parking used to be free for guests but you'll pay $10 now per night.  I preferred when parking was just rolled into the nightly rate but hotels have figured out how to squeeze whenever they can.  Oh- bring your own pillow- the hotel pillows are hard!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us once again and taking the time to write a review.  We appreciate you coming back to stay with us during your visits to Disneyland as well as your comments and compliments.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We were very happy with the location, size of room and staff here. You are directly across from the Disney Resort entrance which just cannot be beat, its even closer than staying at Paradise Pear or the Disneyland Hotel. I think the Grand Californian has them beat though. :) My ONLY dissatisfaction was the horrible quality breakfast. I was able to make do with a banana and yogurt, but be prepared for powdered eggs, highly processed donuts, danishes, and cereal, and unripe fruit. Even our shuttle driver warned us to stear clear of the Captain Kidd's restaurant which is where the breakfast is held.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased to read that you enjoyed the location, room size, and staff.  I hope you had a wonderful visit to the area and appreciate your comments and compliments.  The breakfast provided is located on the second floor of Captain Kidd's with the food provided by the hotel, separate from the restaurant's breakfast.  We offer scrambled eggs, toaster waffles, sausage, ham, potatoes, yogurt, 4 types of cereal (Cheerios, Fruit Loops, Corn Flakes, Raisin Bran), oatmeal, white and wheat toast, danishes, muffins, donuts, bagels and cream cheese, three types of fruit, two juices, milk, hot chocolate, coffee, and tea.  Thank you for sharing your experience with the breakfast so we can evaluate the offerings.  Thank you and take care

Summary: Had to replace room key 3 times after it stopped working each time. Front desk could care less why this was happening(how about looking into the door lock mechanism?) The guy meeting you out front as you drove into their parking lot was a jerk.   Beds to hard/pillows way to fat to be confortable. Continental Breakfast is basically coffee, scrambled eggs and donuts. Room is meant to accommodate 6 people yet only has 1 sink??? Your only paying for location at this hotel... everything else about it is a letdown.
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience.  I am sorry you were having trouble with your door lock.  If the keys work each time a new one is made, the issue is typically the keycards have become demagnitized because they came in contact with something magnetic that cleared the coding on the magnetic strip. This could be a cell phone, credit cards, ipads, e-readers, magnet in wallet or purse or even Disney tickets.  I also apologize you did not enjoy the breakfast. The breakfast is actually a deluxe continental breakfast.  Aside from the traditional items which are typically cereal, pastry and coffee, we also offer toaster waffles, scrambled eggs, sausage or ham, potatoes, danishes, donuts, muffins, bagels and cream cheese, yogurt, cereal (corn flakes, raisin bran, fruit loops, cheerios), oatmeal, fresh fruit (oranges, bananas, apples), juice (apple, orange) coffee, hot chocolate, milk, and tea.  If there are other items you would like to see offered, please let us know so we could take it into consideration.  As for the security guard working out front managing the traffic and ensuring only guests were parking here during the busiest time of the year; I would appreciate if you could provide me with the times you encountered him so I could address it with his company. I am very sorry we did not meet your needs or expectations.  Please feel free to contact me.  I would like to know if any issues were brought to our attention while you were here and if they were, how we responded.  We do try to address all of our guests' concerns so they can fully enjoy their stay and experience in the Disney Resort Area.  Thank you and take care.  Kelly Laimana

Summary: This a very CLEAN & comfortable Hotel right across the street from Disneyland. All of the staff are great people that go out of there way to insure that your stay is the BEST it can be. I have stayed here with my family and friends while on Christmas vaction for the past 3 years and each year our group gets lager. You can't go wrong staying at the Best Western PLUS Park Place Inn when you plan your next trip to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel and taking the time to write a review.  We greatly appreciate you coming back to stay with us as well as your comments and compliments. We look forward to seeing you next Christmas and your growing group.  Thank you and take care

Summary Heading: Great except for no drinking water fountain
Summary: Great location across the street from Entrance to Disney Land.  Nice Hot breakfast  including egg and sausage/ham. However no drinking water fountain at this facility not even in the reception lobby - so once the breakfast time was over, had to buy bottled water.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay with us, including the breakfast and location to the parks.  I do hope we will see you again soon.  Your comments and compliments are appreciated.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Staff was very nice and it was easy check in and check out. The rooms we requested were right above the lobby, and we could see the fireworks from Disneyland. The parking is limited but we were able to use the parking at the hotel 2 doors down.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel is located across of the main entrance of Disneyland in California. It is just crossing the road and you are there. It offers free breakfast in the next door restaurant, which I thought was convenient, but the service there is terrible. If you don't care about breakfast, it is a great option. The room is nice and offers free fridge and microwave.  The price is higher compared to others around, but it has its reasons. One frustrating thing is that from most of the bedrooms you can not see the fireworks. There is this giant wall blocking it even if you walk to outside.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience.  I am sory you were not fully satisfied with your stay. The breakfast offered at the restaurante next door is in the upstairs portion of the restaurant where the food and drinks are self serve buffet style consisting of waffles, ham/sausage, potatoes, scrambled eggs, danishes, donuts, bagels and cream cheese, muffins, toast, yogurt, four types of cereal, oatmeal, 3 varieties of fresh fruit, juice, coffee, milk, hot chocolate, tea and coffee. I do hope we will see you again and next time you are able to enjoy the breakfast.  Your comments and compliments are appreciated.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Save the walking for Disneyland-this place is CLOSE
Summary: This particular Best Western is located right across from the Park!  Other hotels claim to be just across the street, but this one is just steps away from the Magical Kingdom of Disneyland.  I liked the pool, breakfast, updated rooms, and the service that I received from the moment I stepped inside their door.  There were people talking to the front desk and another in line, I headed towards the line and another person took me to the side and got me registered.  They had 3 people at the desk to help customers.  The room was very nice, clean, and ample electrical outlets for your i-phone, i-pads, and other electrical devices for travelers.  Plus, lots of choices for breakfast unlike a few of the others on the same street. All in all, great place to stay. Only drawback was beds
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased to read how much you enjoyed your stay and the service you received.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated.  We do have mini-suites that come with two queen beds and a sofa bed.  The room is about $30 more a night if you are looking for some larger than the standard two doubles.  Again, thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: great place to stay while doing disneyland
Summary: my family of 6 recently stayed at this hotel because we were going to disneyland.  the hotel was close enough to walk which made it better for doing all day at disneyland and being able to come and go all day without having to do transit.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased to read that you enjoyed the convenience of our hotel for your trip to Disneyland.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Perfect place for going to Disneyland
Summary: Stayed here for 4 nights, since I am going to a conference so I drop my family here for them to go to the park.  Hotel is directly across from the gate, you simply can't find a closer place to stay for the price.  Hotel staff is super friendly and everything works.  We were given the room right above the lobby, looking at the gate and can see the firework in the room.  Room is clean, everything works but decor is a bit outdated.  Oh well, for the convenience and the price, you just can't beat it.  The breakfast is great.  The family would go the park early and spend a few hours there, come back to take a nap and then continue to play in the park till midnight.  Excellent value and service.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to share your experience.  I am glad we worked out well for your conference and your family's visit to Disneyland.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: First trip to Disneyland with the family. The reservation process was very easy. Each time I called the hotel before our arrival the staff was very friendly. On the day of arrival, we arrived quite earlier than check-in time. We pre-checked in and although our room was not ready the staff was very friendly and helpful. We headed off to Disneyland which is literally right across the street. Very easy to walk to and from. Definitely a big plus when traveling with small children. Especially after a long day at Disneyland, no need to wait for a shuttle or walk more than 5 minutes to get to your room. Our room was clean and cozy.  Although we did not try the included breakfast, family that we were traveling with did and they very much enjoyed it. Overall we had an amazing time and
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased we were able to provide you with a great stay for your first family trip to Disneyland.  Thank you for your comments and compliments which are greatly appreciated.  We do look forward to your next visit with us.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Hotel is right across the street from Disneyland. Staff were nice. room clean and good size. Parking fee for a hotel at Disneyland. everything you could ask for. Great price. Will always stay at this hotel for Disneyland
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Best place to stay near Disneyland
Summary: Great acommodations. Staff is friendly and courteous. One of the staff members really went out of her way to change our former room to a mini suite. She also made it easy for me; am handicap, and our room was really close to the elevator. Food was really good, the only thing that it needs an elevator for those that have trouble going up the stairs like me. But other than that it's great.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to share your experience.  I am very happy we were able to make changes so your stay could be as comfortable and enjoyable as possible.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  They are greatly appreciated. We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: we stayed here for the first time last week and wont be returning unless everything else is full.  it wasn't a bad experience but we have stayed at others close by that were much better for same rates.    The room was dark and well worn, loose electrical receptacles (chargers would fall out) switch had to be fiddled with to turn lamp on, carpet looked dirty, and the air conditioner made so much noise starting and stoping it woke us up several times in the night.    There was wifi but it was intermittent we were constantly logging back on.  One night someone was smoking pot somewhere and it filled our room with that smell.  We complained and the best they could do is come in and spray air freshener.  The pool was cold, too cold for my kids and we are from the north!  The hot tub
Manager Response: I would first like to thank you for staying with us and taking the time to share your experience.  I am very sorry you did not have an enjoyable stay with us.  If I had been aware of your concerns while you were here I could have definitely offered you more assistance that what it seems you received.  Our air conditioners should never wake you up.  If they are that noisy, we do have replacements to place in guest rooms.  The pool is kept at 80 degrees however on cool days it can definitely feel much cooler.  The chemicals in the pool and jacuzzi are checked on an hourly basis to ensure they remain at the proper balance and levels.  I do apologize for the pot smell coming from another guest's room.  We do investigate the source and take of it once it is located.  You also should have been offered the options of moving rooms, letting us freshen the room or air it out or other options that may have best suited your needs.  I am truly sorry for your experience.  If you wish to give us another chance to provide you with a true Best Western Plus Park Place Inn experience, please contact me at the hotel.  Kelly Laimana Front Office Manager.  Thank you and take care

Summary: Good value, great location.  Not luxury, but clean and convenient.  The beds weren't the most comfortable, but not bad either.  Definitely a good option if you don't want to pay for Disney's on-site resorts.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you here and appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: You can't beat the location; right across the street from Disneyland's Main Entrance.  We never had to move our car the whole time we were here.  Eating breakfast at Captain Kidd's (included in the price of the room) was pretty good and saved us about $25/per day.  The room was very clean and the bed was super comfortable.  Only fault was minor; the room décor could do with some refreshing but it wasn't hideous. We've stayed here before and will again mainly because of how wonderful it is to just walk across the street to the 'Happiest Place on Earth'.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your recent visit to Disneyland.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us as well as the breakfast and our location.  We appreciate you taking the time to write a review and share your comments and compliments.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We love coming here. We are treated well and get a great room close to the park and at a great price. The service is great and the breakfast is really good too. We have come to enjoy this location as our home away from home. We would highly recommend it.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us when you visit Disneyland.  It is a pleasure to read that we have become your home away from home.  We appreciate you taking the time to share your comments and compliments and look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We stay at this hotel every time we go to Disneyland. It is literally across the street from the park and you can wake up and walk over. You don't have to worry about parking or shuttles. The rooms are small but clean. The continental breakfast is held at the restaurant next door and is above average. It is very affordable and conveniently located
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your visits to Disneyland.  We appreciate you returning especially with all the options available.  Your comments and compliments are also appreciated and we look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I have been staying at Best Western Park Place Inn for the last 10 years.  They are always helpful and courteous.  This includes the whole staff..including gardeners.  The rooms are spacious and always clean. If there is a problem, they fix it immediately.  Can't beat the location!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review.  We enjoy seeing you throughout the year during your visits.  We greatly appreciate the compliments and we look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This is a great location with breakfast included. Right across the street from Disney Land, Loved the room and amenities.  the breakfast was good with great selection.  THe kids loved it and easy to walk to destination.  We will stay here again for sure.  Not much of a view on the back of the hotel to watch fireworks from the room, but otherwise perfect location and hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am pleased to read you enjoyed your stay with us, including the location and amenities offered.  We hope to have you stay with us again.  Your comments and compliments are appreciated.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: best western park place inn anaheim CA
Summary: I stay at this hotel every time I go to Disneyland, at least 6 times a year. It is directly across the street. Very comfortable beds, pillows and the nicest blankets of any other hotel I've stayed at . The towels are very white and brand new looking which is important to me. Free hot breakfast included with a good selection of food. Reasonable rates as well. I've never had a problem staying here and I highly recommend it.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your Disneyland visits.  We enjoy having you here and appreciate your comments and compliments.  I am pleased you enjoy staying with us and look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care

Summary: I always have great service at this hotel. the staff is very friendly and helpful. The hotel is right across the street from Disneyland, about 5 minute walk to the entrance of either park. the rooms are clean, breakfast is decent, and parking convenient.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your visits to Disneyland.  We appreciate you returning to our hotel especially with all the choices available.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: As close as it gets without staying at a Disney hotel!
Summary: This hotel is as close as you can get to the park gates at a non-Disney hotel.  The location is fantastic.  The Disney Resort Express shuttle dropped us off and picked us up right in front.  We had a large, clean room with everything we needed, including a little coffee maker and a fridge.  The bed wasn't quite perfect for me, but it wasn't hard, at least.  I slept reasonably well, but not as good as I'd like.  The sound traveled from other rooms and outside, so we turned on the A/C fan to muffle the occasional sounds.  That worked really well.  The breakfast was plentiful, as it was buffet-style, but the quality wasn't high.  It was reasonable and edible, but we tired of it quickly.  Plenty of protein and fruit options, which we appreciated.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us including the amenities and accommodations.  Your comments and compliments are appreciated and will help us provide better service to our guests.  We do hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We stay at this warm and convenient motel every visit to see The Mouse, and have never had any major issues.  The only down-sides were that the electrical outlets in the room we stayed this past stay were so worn that our personal device chargers kept falling out of the wall and even failed to charge our devices due to very poor electrical connection.  The Wi-Fi connection is also inadequate for Facetime or other Apps that require fairly high speed connection.
Manager Response: Thank you for returning to the Best Western Park Place Inn.  We appreciate you always staying with us especially with all the options available.  Thank you for taking the time to write a review and sharing your experience.  I do apologize for the electrical outlets not working properly.  We will have that addressed.  Thank you again and we hope to see you soon.  Thank you and take care

Summary: The location is awesome. you literally walk out of your room, cross the street and your at the main gate of disney and california adventure. If you're staying on the first floor, be aware that you will hear everything that passes your door... from housekeeping carts, to children running, to adults yelling at their children to put on their jackets. we were not early risers to disney, but we were pretty much forced to wake up when everyone was headed to the free breakfast at 6a. The wifi is terrible, so don't get it. i had to stand next to the window to get wifi.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay with us including the proximity to parks.  I do apologize for the noise from other guests and the Wi-Fi service.  The wi-fi is being addressed.  I do hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Wonderful location, clean room.  We were disappointed to come back to our rooms twice during our stay at 3 pm to find that they had not been cleaned.  When I finally complained when it happened twice, I was told the checked out rooms were cleaned first.  The continental breakfast was good..  My one big complaint is that the WiiFi is bad and for such a big chain motel, I think they should do better.  On the last night, I finally had to go to the lobby to write an email as the signal was on and off.  In this day and age, I think they should do better than that.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am sorry your room was not ready for you when you came back from the park.  It is true that housekeeping will focus their attention on getting the checked out rooms ready for 3:00 pm check in.  However, at the same time they are working on rooms for guests who are staying additional nights.  If you know you will be returning from the park for an afternoon break, just let the front desk know when and we will ask housekeeping to service your room so it is ready when you come back.  I do apologize for any inconvenience you experienced during your stay.  We do hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: My husband and I spent two days at Disney and this was the perfect hotel for us. You literally cross the road and you are at Disney, it's great because we would head back in the afternoon to freshen up and grab coats and it barely took anytime to do. The breakfast buffet was very basic but it was god to just have a quick bite before a big day. The room was very clean, bed super comfortable and staff all friendly and helpful. We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review. I am very pleased you enjoyed the location, accommodations, and amenities.  Your comments and compliments are very much appreciated .  We would be very happy to have you stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Still a good hotel to stay at..........
Summary: We normally stay at the Best Western Park Place Inn-Mini Suites every year when we go to Disneyland.  (With the exception of last year when we went to Disneyworld).  Until recently, I have never had to wait for a room.  Normally, rooms are ready early.  This last stay, we were very early (8:00am) and left our luggage at the Front Desk.  After visiting Disneyland for 4 1/2 hours, we decided to go back to the Hotel and get unpacked.  Unfortunately, our room was still not ready.  Meanwhile, other guests were arriving and checking in with no wait at all.  Still, we waited & waited.  Finally, I made peanut butter and jelly sandwiches in the lobby for my hungry family.  I realize that the OFFICIAL Check-in isn't until 3:00pm.  However, it did not make waiting any easier while other
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for taking the time to write a review and also for staying with us during your visits to Disneyland.  I do apologize that this visit we were not able to provide you with a room earlier than three.  We are more than happy to check guests in early as long as rooms are ready.  As you stated we are usually able to do this.  However, during busy periods it is not always possible.  Housekeeping does works hard to service well over a hundred rooms in very short time. I understand frustration from seeing guests receive their rooms before you. However, they were most likely a different room type from what you had reserved. We were also trying to meet a location request for your room. We could have most likely placed you in a room earlier but it would not have been in the desired location. Again I do thank you for choosing us when you visit the Disney Resort,  We do look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care

Summary: Great hotel if you have a big family. The mini suites are perfect for a family of 6 or 7. Plenty of room and wonderful staff to help with all of the accommodations. The free continental breakfast isn't bad either.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your Disneyalnd Vacation and for taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Our family of 5 recently stayed 4 nights, and it was EXCELLENT in all regards! We had a family suite with a pull out sofa which provided ample space for our family to sleep comfortably. The beds were PERFECT, and I slept like a baby all 4 nights there. Furthermore, we arrived early (11:30 am), and we're able to check in immediately! The breakfast was in a lovely room with restaurant style booths, and was typical breakfast fare, although I did enjoy the individual containers of fruit yogurt, as the hotel next door serves yogurt poured in a large bowl sitting on the counter (yuck)!  Our room was very quiet, surprisingly large, and had lots of space for suitcases, gifts, and a stroller we didn't need to collapse to make room. We never had issues with wi-fi as stated by many even
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  It was a pleasure reading your comments and compliments and knowing we provided you with "perfection".  Thank you for letting us know how much you enjoyed the amenities and accomodations of our hotel.  We look forward to your next visit with us.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: For a short trip to Disneyland with family, this place is the closest to the Park entrance.  Rooms clean & comfortable, nice hot tub the kids enjoyed.  I felt like it was sort of expensive, but certainly not as bad as the "friends" of Disney, and $10 daily for parking?  Really ridiculous.  But it was December and why stay at a resort with fancy pool area if it's too cold to swim?  We were pretty happy w/the walking distance and did not eat breakfast there.  The microwave & fridge were really what made us decide on this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your recent visit to Disneyland.  I am pleased to read that you and your family enjoyed your stay with us.  Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share your comments and compliments.  We do hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Well maintained, courteous and efficient staff. Perfect location opposite the the Magic Kingdom's front gate. Five minutes from Anaheim Amtrak station. Parking available for guests at a reasonable price.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The room was a little dirty, the room was located near the staff room and every morning 7-9 AM there was constant noise and we could not sleep. The breakfast room was dark, when I asked to turn on more lights they told me that 50% of the bulbs were burned and they would not switch bulbs to  save energy also the floor was sticky dirty.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to share your experience.  Your comments will helpus improve our service.  I did not see any notes written in your record indicating that you addressed your concerns with us.  If we are not notified that something is interfering with you enjoying your stay, we can not address and correct the issues for you.   If you did let us know and your concerns were not addressed properly, I do apologize. I do hope you will give us another chance to provide you with the service for which we are frequently complimented.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: BEST WESTERN IS BEST FOR DISNEYLAND TRIP
Summary: The location and cleanliness and professional staff were top notch. Great warm full breakfast next door (2nd floor, Captain Kidd's).  Best Western hotels always deliver. The only issue was the Wi-Fi.... very spotty. We were close to the back so perhaps it was a location issue? We'll be back for sure!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated.  We definitely look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Location compliments the purpose of travel and the service (plus breakfast) doubled the experience. Room view was marvellous for disney fireworks in the night. Well trained staff and prompt maintenance. On Site Laundry and detergent available which is a added plus if travelling with infants/kids.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  It was a pleasure reading your comments and how much you enjoyed your stay with us.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Great location, right at the cross-walk into the Disneyland entrance. The staff are helpful, the rooms are very clean and practical, extra space with a lounge area and large sink area outside of the bathroom. Pool area was used a few times, kids enjoyed it. Next door to Dennys and IHop, the free breakfast at Captain Buffet was pretty good, the offer exceeded my expectations, its very busy, the place is meant to be a quick meal and out to DL. I would stay again without hesitation
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and sharing your experience.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your accommodations and the amenities offered by the hotel.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel is perfect for the family. Disney is right across the street and they serve a very good breakfast. The staff is very kind and the rooms are nice. This was our 6th year staying here and my family loves it. We already booked our rooms for next year we like it so much.
Manager Response: Thank you for returning once again to the Best Western Park Place Inn.  We enjoy having you spend your vacation with us and look forward to seeing you next year.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Great location across from the park! Captain Kidd's Buffet leaves something to be desired... The rest of the place is great- rooms are very comfortable, clean and the staff is more then willing to help you with what ever your needs are. They can set you up with wheel chairs, strollers- what ever... only thing I wish they would add are postage stamps...  Over all though awesome! :)
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and we were able to assist you with your needs.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We chose this hotel since it was the closest you could get to the entrance to Disneyland (Park Vue is also as close, but we chose this one).  It was extremely clean (I am super picky) and the staff was very professional.  We have been to Disneyland many times and always choose a bit cheaper hotel a mile or so walking distance from Disneyland.  But this time we wanted to try being closer, especially with to small kids.  I can not tell you what a HUGE difference it made.  We will never stay anywhere else when we visit Disneyland!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us.  I am very pleased we exceeded your expectations and look forward to you staying with us whenever you visit Disneyland.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: My family of 6 stayed here while we went to Disneyland.  Loved the location.  Our room was spacious and very clean.  Loved the long vanity separate from toilet.  Beds were comfortable.   Breakfast was excellent, but busy.  The price was very reasonable and parking was no problem.  We will use this hotel again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your visit to Disneyland.  We appreciate you taking the time to write a review and share what you like about our hotel.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the accommodations and the breakfast provided.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We did disneyland with my 4 yr old and we wanted limited walking to the hotel.  I did research before arriving.  I drove to disneyland before months prior to make sure we actually did get the hotel across from the entrance.  Most hotels will say they are across from Disney but Disney is huge.  For this hotel, you walk out the lobby, across the cross walk and into Disney. Highly recommend.  The rooms are your standard Best Western rooms but House Keeping was great and organized my childs stuff animals on his bed when they cleaned the room. Staff is organized and helpful.  The only thing i would recommend is to bring your own breakfast items. They have a mini frig with plenty of room.  Their continental breakfast is a good size breakfast but we found it so busy, we couldn't find a
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review of our hotel.  I am very pleased we were able to meet your expectations, especially after the time you put into researching our property.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  They are greatly appreciated.  We do hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We wanted a hassle-free, high value stay while visiting Disneyland for a special occasion. This property delivered on all points. Clean, convenient, great pricing (...Costco discount applied!) and professional staff. Thank you. We will be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and sharing your experience.  It is wonderful reading that we met all of your needs to help you celebrate a special occassion.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Very good location for Disneyland, California Adventure and Disney Downtown. Nice to be able to park the car and walk in. Breakfast was better than most but recommend getting there before the rush at 8am. Rooms were clean and everything worked well. Staff was friendly. The mattress was firm and the pullout bed was fine for the toddler but would be a bad option for an adult as you could feel the springs and bars.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your Disney visit and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and had a great experience.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Spent 7 nights here and the only good thing was the location. Oh, and the courteous staff who were always quick to apologize... I'm so sorry, but...  okay, so it's relatively clean, but very dark and dingy. We stayed on the bottom floor. I would have to say it was my second worst hotel experience ever, the first being bugs in Paris.  1. The laundry, garbage, and housekeeping carts made endless racket on the brick walkway just outside the door.  2. The wi-fi rarely worked, and when it did it was too slow to do anything worthwhile for trip research and planning  3. The walls are paper thin. We could hear everything that went on beside us.  4. We also heard nothing but stomping above us.  5. The breakfast is horrible and under staffed, always waiting for eggs. Could only find Grape
Manager Response: I thank you for taking the time to write a review.  All comments help us evaluate and improve our service.  I am very sorry you did not enjoy your stay with us.  I truly wish you had let us know the extent of your displeasure.  We could have offered several options to try and make your stay more comfortable from moving you to another room with less foot traffic or a higher floor so you did not have guests above you; or to even finding another hotel for you where you would be able to relax without the Disney families coming and going throughout the day and into the night.  Again I am very sorry you did not enjoy your stay with us and thank you for sharing your experience so we can address the issues mentioned.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Great location and value, very clean
Summary: I've stayed at this location many times and will continue to stay here everytime we visit Disneyland.  It is very convenient being right across the street from Disneyland Park, and self serve breakfast right next door at Captian Kid's.  A convenient store next door also.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us for your visits to Disneyland.  We greatly appreciate you coming back to our hotel and sharing what you like about staying here.  We look forward to your next visit with us.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We only had 2 nights here but could not have chosen a better location for our Disneyland trip.  Straight across the road it takes 2 minutes to walk to the park gates.  The accommodation was really great.  Rooms were spacious and clean so there was really nothing to fault.  Could do with a little updating but thats not a major problem.  The included breakfast was so much more than we were expecting! So awesome to have that included and we so appreciated the good start to the day. Overall we would happily recommend this hotel to anyone, it cant be beaten for value for money and location.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very leased you enjoyed your stay with us including the breakfast.  We will most likely begin updating within the next year or so.  Thank you for your comments, compliments and recommendation.  We hope to see you again if you make it back to the area.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: My sister and I stayed for two nights at the end of October. We were totally happy with the accomodations.  The staff was friendly and helpful. The free breakfast was more expansive than expected. Nice selection of hot breakfast items, cold cereals, bakery, etc. Very easy walk to Disneyland. Room was a good size and very clean. Would stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay with us.  Thank you for your comments and compliments and we hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Best hotel for going to Disneyland
Summary: This hotel is directly across the street from the entrance to Disneyland.  It's clean, reasonably priced, includes breakfast, and the staff was friendly and helpful during our stay.  We arrived early in the morning, too early to check into a room, but they stowed our bags in a secure storage area so we could spend the day at the park without worrying.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your trip to Disneyland.  We appreciate your comments and compliments.  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay and we hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Best place we've stayed at for Disney vacation!
Summary: Over the past few years we've stayed at a few different hotels while vacationing at Disneyland...this hotel has been by far the best. Previous hotels have never allowed early check in and made us keep our luggage in our truck while we had to wait a few hours to check in (I understand that's our fault for arriving early but you never know how traffic will be when driving 6 hours! And sometimes you arrive early). This Best Western allowed us to check in at 10am! We were able to drop our bags at our spacious and comfortable room and start our day at the park worry free! The beds were the most comfortable beds I've ever experienced at a hotel! I slept so amazing here! Breakfast in the morning was fantastic for a free breakfast! I wasn't expecting there to be a good sized buffet. My
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us.  We know there are a lot of options and we are very pleased we will be your go to hotel for your Disney visits.  Thank you for sharing your experience.  I am happy we had a room available for you at 10 am so you could enjoy the parks.  We greatly appreciate your comments, compliments, and recommendation and look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Just stayed here for first night of 3 day trip to Disneyland and wished we had stayed here for all 3 nights instead of Disneyland Hotel we had booked for last 2 nights.  This hotel was a shorter walk to the Parks than the Disney hotel, literally across the street.  Room was clean and had microwave and fridge.  Front desk staff were very helpful and courteous.  Free breakfast was a full meal including hot and cold items,  Far more than just standard dry cereal continental breakfast and it is in a room above the restaurant next door so not crammed into one small space.  Can't comment on pool because did not use the facilities.  We will definitely stay here for our next Disneyland trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  We do greatly enjoy reading we are preferred over the Disney Properties.  It lets us know we are providing the quality service to our guests for which we strive.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This Best Western hotel is closer to Disneyland than the Disneyland hotel it self; and at less than half the cost.  Awesome, convenient.  You just get up for a complimentary breakfast at Captain Kidd's, then walk across the street.  Boom, you're at the Disneyland front entrance.  You can't get more convenient than that.  Get tired, just walk back across the street, catch some zz's with the kids, and then go back to the park.  Awesome!  The room is good, no Ritz Carlton, but come on, you just need to sleep and use the bathroom in there.  We stayed at the California Grand once and it's much the same as that room.  Lots of space in the room as well, big King bed and a nice lounging area.  Hotel staff are very attentive and personable.  Highly recommend staying at this Best Western
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us again this year.  I am so pleased you enjoy our hotel and we meet or exceed your expectations.  It was a pleasure reading your review and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  Thank you for recommending us and we look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We always stay at this Best Western Motel directly across the street from Disneyland's main gate.  Never had a problem or a bad experience here and we will continue coming back every year.  Definitly the most convenient place to stay when visiting Disneyland and very reasonably priced.  Rooms are clean, beds are comfy, and staff is friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for always choosing our hotel for your Disney visits. Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated.  I am very pleased that we keep you wanting to return to our hotel every year.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The hotel is clean, quiet, and reasonably priced.  Plenty of places to eat.  The front desk people are, just like most Californians, nice and courteous, but not friendly.  Being from Louisiana I'm used to Southern hospitality.  Free hot breakfast is good.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review of the property.  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and appreciate your comments.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: You simply cannot beat the location and value for a trip to Disneyland. I loved that it took 10 minute walk from my room to Disneyland's train station. It was so nice to be able to have a complimentary hot breakfast each morning. I would highly recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed our hotel, the location, and the breakfast.  Your recommendation is greatly appreciated and we hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This is such a great hotel with its location and service.  This has been our go-to hotel for the past 4-years and every experience has been great.  No complaints.  We comment about the amazing location every time...you just can't beat the 5-minute walk.  And we feel the service is great, staff has always been very friendly.  My feeling about those who complain are people who are complainers themselves and have difficult social skills.  Bottom line, if you're nice to the staff, they will be nice to you in return.  They have help us coordinate shuttle service from Long Beach and Orange County airports at reasonable rates.  The breakfast was better this year because there was more variety with ham, sausage, scrambled eggs, pastries, cereals and fruit.  We try to visit Disneyland
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us again and taking the time to write a review.  We appreciate being considered as your go to hotel during your visits to the Disney Resort Area.  I am pleased you enjoyed the additions to the breaksfast and appreciate your comments regarding the staff.  We look forward to your next visit with us.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Just spent six nights and am very happy with the service we received. We have four kids and the room was plenty big. Kids are 4, 7, 9 &  12 Free breakfast buffet was a nice addition and I'm sure to Disneyland Park it's a shorter walk then the Disney Hotel. We will be back @ this place on our next visit.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review. I am very pleased you enjoyed the service, amenities and location of the hotel.  We greatly appreciate you choosing to stay with us and look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: your right across the street from the walkway to Disneyland, California land and downtown Disney. the room was nice and TV has been upgraded to large flat screen. beds are comfortable. breakfast is adequate to get you started for your day at the parks.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience at the Best Western Park Place Inn.  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay as wel as the amenities.  We appreciate you choosing us out of the number of options available and hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel is directly across from the entrance to Disneyland, and walking across the street to purchase tickets to either California Adventure or Disneyland is extremely easy.  The included breakfast was great, albeit a bit crowded in the room, but a great value for the price charged.  I would recommend it.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed our hotel.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Great Stay at the Best Western Park Place Inn
Summary: We had no clue what to expect when we booked our stay for a post deployment trip to Disneyland. We were pleasantly surprised upon arrival. The rooms are big with a couch seating area. The free breakfast buffet that the hotel offers next door at Captain Kidds is nothing special but definitely filling. Everyone found something to their liking from our 8 year old picky eater to our 65 year old moms that we brough with us. Each day there were potatoes, eggs, either sausage or ham, pastries, bread and bagels, fruit, yogurt, cereal and lots of drinks to choose from. Even the pool area kept the kids happy though it is small. The hot tub felt great after a few days of walking at the parks. We will definitely be staying here again!
Manager Response: First I would like to thank the service member and the entire family for the sacrifices made everyday.  I am very pleased that you enjoyed your stay here and the amenities that we offer.  I hope you all had a wonderful time at Disneyland and enjoy your time back together.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The room was clean and accommodated all six of us, and although quarters were tight it was all good.  The only negative was the fold out bed.  Sleeping on the floor might be an option unless it's upgraded.  The regular beds were good.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us. I am pleased your enjoyed your stay and appreciate you taking the time to share your experience.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Stayed here with my 8 year old daughter for 5 nights....  Great and close to the Park entrance.  Friendly staff, free breakfast with ample choices. Housekkeping was great and you cannot beat the location and price.  Clean room with a TV and bathroom.  What else do you need as we spent most of all the days at Disneyland or California Adventure.
