Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to share your experience.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated as well as your review title.  I am very pleased you and your daughter enjoyed your stay.  I hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: My family likes to stay here when we go to Disneyland. It's right across the street from the entrance. You do need to walk a ways before you actually get to the the ticket gate but it's a nice motel. The rooms are large and the breakfast buffet is better than most places in the area. My husband is gluten free so we always bring his own breakfast items. There is a fridge and microwave so it's easy to keep those things we need. This time the buffet had eggs and sausage or ham. He could actually eat there. There are still a lot of carb heavy options but it was nice to have something else.
Manager Response: Thank you for returning to the Best Western Park Place Inn for your visits to Disneyland.  I am glad your husband was able to enjoy the breakfast this time.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  They are greatly appreciated and we look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Another great stay at Best Western
Summary: This location is perfect for Disneyland goers - the entrance is right across the street from the hotel.  We arrived early for check in and our room wasn't ready but they were very helpful and gave us our parking pass and we were able to enjoy the area. (only downside $10 per day for parking). The room was very spacious - with a couch, microwave and mini fridge.  The only problem was the location of our room - early in the morning when everyone was leaving it was very noisy.  We were right by the lobby area where people were dragging their suitcases on the sidewalk and the doors to the vehicles were being slammed shut.  The free breakfast is great - there are hot and cold items.  Tip - go later in the service as it is crazy busy first thing in the morning with all the families
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your visit to the Disney Resort Area.  We are very pleased that you enjoyed your stay, including the amenities offered by the hotel and the location.  Your recommendation, comments, and compliments are greataly appreciated and we thank you for taking the time to write a review.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Great place to stay. So nice and close to Disneyland. Took us 6 minutes to walk. Only one complaint and that was that the wifi connections were terrible. Needed to stay in touch with care givers at home and sometimes couldn't. Also couldn't confirm our flight home because no connection. I would still recommend this hotel but they really should do something about the wifi.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and share your experience.  I do apologize for the problems you experienced with the wi-fi connection.  We are working with the provider to see how they can improve the service.  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay regardeless of the wifi and appreciate your recommendation.  We do hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This was a trip with 2 adults and 2 kids.  It was a quick4 day trip to disney to celebrate my sons birthday and my friends daughters birthday.  We have been to disney many times but first time for my friend and her daughter.  Wanted the convenience of being able to walk to park and not have to shuttle and have abiltiy to run back during day to drop off parcels or pick up coats for evening.  You can not beat this location.  It is directly in front of the crosswalk to get to disney park.  You can be at the gates in 5-10 minutes.    The property is old but was fairly clean. Carpet could use a good cleaning but pretty typical for the price.  We paid $92 per night which you can not beat.  It was exactly what we expected it would be.  Rooms are very dark, could use some better lights.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your visit to Disney.  I hope everyone had a great time and the kids had a wonderful birthday celebration. Thank you for your comments and compliments.  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay with us including the amenities and location of the hotel.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care

Summary: I've  been  coming  to  this  hotel  for  the past  6  years  and  I've  always  received  such  GREAT  SERVICE.   The  entire  staff  is  so  friendly  and  helpful.  The  rooms  are  NICE  AND  COMFORTABLE.  They  have  the  BEST  LOCATION  -  DIRECTLY  ACROSS  THE  DISNEYLAND  ENTRACE.   If  you  need  to  rest,  just  walk  right  across  the  street ,  NO  WATING  FOR  ANY  BUSES  TO  TAKE  YOU  BACK  TO  YOUR  HOTEL.
Manager Response: Thank you continuing to stay with us and sharing what brings you back to our hotel.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Best Place to stay for Disneyland.  It's right across the street.  Clean and comfortable rooms.  Great staff.  No frills and affordable rates.  We spent everyday at Disney and California Adventure while we were there.  And we were TIRED at the end of the day!  It was so nice to walk right out of the park and only have to walk across the street to our room. Breakfast was served every morning and was good buffet but get there early!  Very busy!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience.  I very pleased you enjoyed our hotel including the location, breakfast and staff.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: DIRECTLY across the street from Disneyland, with parking ($10 day) and a free buffet breakfast - you can't beat it. Best hotel around (& we've stayed at several). I almost hate to say anything too good, because I don't want it to always be booked or for them to raise prices! The rooms are average-large & clean. Frig, micro, coffee pot (small), extra blanket & lots of pillows. It has a pool, & overall, it's not too noisy (probably depends on the time of year too). Staff is always amazing - friendly, helpful, quick & accomodating. It's an awesome place for so many reasons (mostly location & staff), but remember it's a Best Western & (a free breakfast), not the Bellagio. You're staying for the cheap(er) convenience to Disneyland (than the Disney or other hotels).
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  It was a pleasure reading your review and your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated.  We look forward to you staying with us again.  Thank  you and take care.

Summary Heading: exactly what we needed. Close to the gate, clean and affordable
Summary: Clean room, friendly front desk staff, comfortable beds, clean swimming pool and hot tub, and our stay included buffet breakfast, which was great with kids.  And this hotel is so close to Disneyland that I think it is actually a shorter walking distance to the park entrances than from the Disney Resort hotels.  We'd stay here again should we be so lucky to be able to visit Disneyland again!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your recent visit to Disneyland.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and your compliments are very much appreciated.  I do hope you will be able to visit us again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Hotel is fine. Location is Amazing!
Summary: Note that there are two different Best Western hotels on Harbor Blvd. near the entrance to Disneyland. This hotel, the Park Place Inn, is closest. The BW Anaheim Inn, a different hotel, is further south and a longer walk to the park.  BW Park Place Inn is a Best Western. The rooms are adequate, the amenities are limited, and you should therefore temper your expectations. However, the location of this hotel cannot be beat if you're visiting Disneyland and Disney California Adventure. This hotel is closer to the parks' entrances than the Disneyland Hotel. You can easily leave your room and be inside Disneyland Park 10 minutes later, including the wait to cross the street, and the bag check to get onto Disney property.  - BREAKFAST: As noted by other reviewers, breakfast is fairly
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write such a detailed review.  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay with us.  If you visit us again, please check out the breakfast.  We have made some changes to the items offered since you stayed with us.  All of your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and will help us improve our service. We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The staff members were friendly, respectful, efficient and worked hard to please the customers staying at the hotel. The location was key to us for convenience purposes while on vacation. Breakfast was great helping make the trip cost effective while enjoying the sights and towns nearby. I would definitely recommend this hotel to those looking for 'THE" ideal location between all the Amusement parks, sights and places to go to.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us.  Your comments regarding the staff are greatly appreciated.  I am happy we were able to help in making your trip cost effective and appreciate your recommendation.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: DIRECTLY across the street from Disneyland, with parking ($10 day) and a free buffet breakfast - you can't beat it. Best hotel around (& we've stayed at several).  I almost hate to say anything too good, because I don't want it to always be booked or raise prices!  The rooms are large & clean. Frig, micro, coffee pot (small), extra blanket & lots of pillows. It has a pool,  & overall, it's not too noisy (probably depends on the time of year too). Staff is always amazing - friendly, helpful, quick & accomodating. It's an awesome place for so many reasons, but remember it's a Best Western, not the Bellagio. You're staying for the cheap(er) convenience to Disneyland (than the Disney hotels).
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated.  We are very pleased your enjoyed your stay with us including the amenities, staff, and location of the hotel.  We hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel 3 times now with the 4th coming up in December.  We have stayed at a number of hotels on the strip and this is by far the best offsite hotel.  Lots of restaurant options close by and the walk to Disneyland is 5 minutes from hotel to front gate.  The breakfast buffet is less than desirable so we tend to skip and eat in the park.  My daughter enjoys the pool, the rooms are clean and the staff are excellent!  Out countdown is on until December 3rd!
Manager Response: Thank you for returning to our hotel and sharing why you like to stay with us.  Your comments and compliments are appreciated and helpful as well.  We look forward to seeing you next month.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We stayed Oct 19th-26th and found this to be the best place to stay due to location to the park. We have stayed at Howard Johnson down the road 2 times before and found that that extra walk down the road deterrred us from returning to the park at night after dinner with young kids. Best Western Park Place has sapcious rooms, comfy beds and the breakfast is adequate for what we needed. Pool is tiny but we were not there to swim, spent all our time in the parks.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased your enjoyed our hotel and the proximity to the Disney Parks.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I enjoy this hotel, the location for Disneyland is great, the parking was okay we park in front of our room all the time, the only bad thing was that we had to go next door to get our breaskfast buffet, and that could of been a lot better. But over all it was a nice place
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to share your experience.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay.  Thank you for your comments and compliments and letting us know where we can improve.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This is the place to stay if you want to be close to Disneyland.  The rooms are nice and well kept.  Having breakfast available is wonderful and a great way to start the day.  We will defiantly stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your time at the Park Place Inn.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we look forward to your next stay.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Staff was very friendly and room was clean/comfortable - convieniently located directly across the street from Disneyland/California Adventure/downtown Disney and walking distance to several restaurants. The stay also included a very good breakfast buffet with hot items, cereals, baked goods, fresh fruit, etc. The only problem we encountered was a broken shower. I reported it and by the time we returned from breakfast, the shower was fixed. We appreciated the great service from the staff. We will definitely stay here again if in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review of our hotel.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay including the amenities and location of the hotel.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  I do apologize you had trouble with your shower but, happy to know it was fixed promptly for you.  We look forward to having you stay with us again if you are in the area.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Best Western still a strong choice
Summary: I stayed here for the third time in September and continue to believe that this Best Western is the best choice for a trip to Disneyland. For my past two stays I was here in the true off-season, but for this September trip, Disneyland--and the hotel--were packed. The complimentary breakfast room was stuffed to the gills, even hours before the park opened (though they never ran out of food it was really hard to get a table) and our rooms were literally the furthest away from the lobby. While this was probably good for street noise, it actually felt surprisingly isolating to stare out at the creepy vacant lot. It was also very inconvenient when my room key was voided and I had to trudge all the way back to the front desk late at night. On my last trip, we were on the ground floor
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us again.  We appreciate you taking the time to share your comments and compliments as well as noting things that could be improved.  We hope to see your again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: great location for family to visit Disneyand, easy access for afternoon rests; pool area looked decent; large free buffet variety available in building next door at Captain Kidd's; staff at front desk extremely friendly and good attitude
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and sharing your opinion.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated.  We are very pleased you enjoyed your stay and we hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: rooms were clean, plenty of hot water,  friendly and helpful staff, check on my cab arrival without having to ask, checkout was smooth and no issues with the bill.  WiFi is terrible, at least in room 130. Except for the garbage truck one morning it was actually pretty quiet.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your recent visit to the Disney Resort Area.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Best location of any offsite hotel - just across the street from the bus drop off. The room was very clean. The decor is outdated but who cares when you are only sleeping. The free breakfast was fine - nothing gourmet but the price was great and there was plenty of it.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and sharing your experience.  We appreciate your comments and compliments and hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Super close, easy parking, clean rooms and a substantial breakfast included. What more could you ask across the street from Disney entrance. And with a pool. There is even a shop to get Disney souveniers for a lot less than in Disney itself
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.  We appreciate you taking the time to write are review.  Your comments and compliments will helps us as we continuously work on the experience we provide to our guests.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We stayed here October 2013 for 5 night to visit Disneyland Resort. Very nice and clean rooms. Beds were comfortable and you cant beat the short walk to Disneyland. Pretty sure its the closest hotel to the parks. Love that it has a good size refrigerator in the rooms and a microwave! We will probably stay here again next time!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and share your experience.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the offerings of the hotel including the location.  Your comments and compliments are appreciated and we do hope to see you during your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We have stayed at Best Western - Park Place several times over the years and enjoy it each time. The proximity to Disneyland is fantastic, especially if you have small children. The price is fair, the staff is very friendly and professional, and the rooms are clean with just the right amenities. We would and have recommended this hotel to many friends.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay.  We greatly appreciate your returning to the BW Park Place when visiting Disneyland as well as your comments and compliments.  Thank you for your recommendation and we look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We stay here every time we go to Disneyland! The rooms are very nice and sleep up to 6 with no extra charge. The plus is, walk across the street and you are at Disneyland. Eleven of us stayed in two connecting rooms which was perfect. We stayed on the 2nd floor, rooms 207 & 208, which is what I requested and they were able to accommodate.   It should be easy to find something that will please for breakfast. Maybe not gourmet, but there are scrambled eggs, ham, potatoes, waffles, bagels, toast, jams, oatmeal, cold cereal, fruit, hot chocolate, orange juice, apple juice, doughnuts, pastries and yogurt.   Beds are comfortable, room was clean, staff was friendly and the free WiFi worked great for us. We'll be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your visits to Disneyland.  We greatly appreciate you taking the time to share you experience and your thoughts of the hotel, service and amenities.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: price paid was for location only
Summary: great location but way overpriced for what you get.Room smelled aweful and in need of updating, toilet kept clogging.Breakfast was free if you could stand to eat the same low quality food everyday, nothing different. That being said the staff at the front desk was helpful upon checkin and it was just across the street from Disneyland as were several other crammed in hotels just as rundown.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to share your thoughts about the hotel.  Letting us know what you liked and what can be improved will definitely help us in providing better service to all of our guests.  We hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Best Western Park Place in Anihiem, CA
Summary: This is the best place ever to stay if you're going to Disneyland.  It is so close and you don't have to take a shuttle or drive. It is literally across the street.  It has a great continental breakfast with plenty of variety, a pool and hot tub, rooms were clean and comfortable and the staff was friendly and accommodating. We would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your visit as well as the amenities, location and service provided by the staff.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel is great for it's amenities and for its proximity to Disneyland.  We had great service while checking in...and one point my other half came back to the hotel prior to me and left the door ajar so I could enter easily...I got to the door and there was a Best Western employee knocking on the door because he had found it ajar and was concerned...thought that was great
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the amenities and location.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We had raw sewage back-up into our sinks twice and the hotel just said SORRY. We should of known that something was going on when we checked in because there were fans EVERYWHERE in the lower rooms. The cable also went out and the hotel again said, "Sorry, we are having issues."
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience.  I do apologize that your sink backed up however, it was not raw sewage.  There is seperate plumbing.  However, again we do apologize for the inconvenience.  We did upon check out credit $40.00 back to your account.  When the General Manager read your concerns, she did authorize a refunded of one night which has already been credited to your account.  The fans that were mentioned were in place to help dry carpets after shampooing.   Thank you for letting us know your concerns so we can ensure that this type of situation is always handled quickly and efficiently.  Thank you and take care

Summary Heading: Best place to stay for Disneyland
Summary: 2 min walk to the gate of Disneyland, clean rooms , fair prices!  Nice restaurants  within the block to the hotel. I would recommend staying here if you want to stay close to Disneyland,California adventures and downtown Disney  because the rooms are as nice as the Disney hotels at a third of the price. DO IT!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and for your review.  I am very pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We were pleasantly surprised with this hotel. The location was great. It is literally across the street from the Disneyland entrance. The rooms were good. If you are looking for 5star, plush accommodations, this hotel is not for you. However, the rooms were clean and spacious. The beds were comfortable. The breakfast buffet was not fine dining, but was more than adequate for a quick breakfast before going to the park.  Every morning there were bagels, toast, cereal, scrambled eggs, potatoes, a breakfast meat, waffles, yogurt, pastries, coffee, milk, juice and fruit. There were only two things that I had a problem with. One, we had a child above us who ran continuously.   So we constantly heard footsteps in the evenings and early mornings.  It was an irritation, but not enough to
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We are very pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us and and appreciated the amenities offered.  I do apologize for the noise from the child above.  If you ever have trouble with noise from another room, please let us know and we will kindly ask them to be courteous to other guests.  We do look forward to having you stay with us again.  Your comments and compliments are very much appreciated.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The breakfast here is horrible, Beds are hard, and the TV in our room did not even work. The front desk was helpful but did not fix any situations for us. Would not stay here again. There are plenty of other hotels with a better value in the area.
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for staying with us and taking the time to review our property.  I am very sorry you did not enjoy your stay with us.  The TV cable service did go out the night you stayed with us.  We were able to have it fixed the Following morning.  However, I do realize this was too late for you.  Again I am sorry we did not meet your expectations.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This was a great place to stay for our whole family of eleven. Close to Disneyland, the staff was great, the housekeeping was great with clean rooms and clean towels and room was always ready if we returned in the middle of the day. We did not use the Captain Kidds breakfast because we were to much in a hurry to go to Disneyland.  The staff very helpful and cheerful. They stowed our luggage the day of check out so we could go back to the Park and return to catch our shuttle, that was real helpful.  It was a total beautiful experience.  With a family this large and everyone doing their own thing with their family this stay made it a pleasure.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your visit to Disneyland.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the staff and the services provided.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again soon.  Maybe next time you will be able to utilize the breakfast.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at this hotel. The breakfast was abundant, although not always amazing quality and the restaurant got very busy and became difficult to find a seat at times. The rooms were cleaned very well. The pool was small but nice. The pull out bed wasn't that comfortable but the other beds were great. The internet was very slow which was unfortunate because it was very expensive to use the data plan for our cell phones. The location is amazing! So nice to see our hotel right after leaving Disneyland for the day.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your visit to Disneyalnd.  We greatly appreciate you taking the time to share your comments and compliments.  We are very pleased you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We stayed here mid August you can,t beat it clean  very important to me,good size rooms, nice bed and right out side of Disneyland. Great spot. we enjoyed our time here and would recomend it to anyone. Would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your visit to Disneyland.  We enjoyed having you as our guest and greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  Thank you for your recommendation and we hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: You can't beat this hotel for its location and price.  It is directly outside the Disneyland and California Adventure Parks.  The price for the location is terrific.  Our stay was not without problems although I doubt this happens to everyone.  We were interrupted by loud, continuous knocking at our door by maid service after we had gone to sleep.  The maid service had gone to the wrong room.  This was forgivable but it would have been nice if the hotel offered a credit or at least a few free water bottles as a token apology.  Also, we had repeated issues with our room key cards not working.  We replaced them at least 4 times over our 3.5 day stay.  This was frustrating and the front desk was apologetic but offered no solution and no kind of credit or even a token of apology.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience.  All comments help us improve our service.  I am truly sorry for any inconvenience caused by the housekeeper knocking on the wrong door as well as for the keys.  Hotel rooms keys are very sensitive.  If placed near credit cards, cell phoens or any type of magnet, they can become demagnitized.  I do hope you will give us another chance to provide you with an enjoyable and relaxing stay.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Very welcoming & friendly staff. Every individual we came into contact with was warm & thoughtful as well as knowledgeable about their position.  Loved the location - an easy walk to the Disney Resort.  Free breakfast was great & the manager was kind enough to carry the food downstairs so my wheelchair-bound mom didn't have to take the elevator to the 2nd floor where the free breakfast was served.    Overall, we were very pleased and will most definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and that we were able to provide assistance to your mom.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I stayed in room 262 with 5 guests total. I was relying on the sofa sleeper for the 5th person. The sleeper was in the most terrible condition I have ever seen. Broken from the hinges and the mattress had springs sticking out and about 1 inch high. The hotel noisy, you could hear every noise. The coffee for the breakfast tasted like chemicals. When I asked the Captain Kids to fix, they stated it has tasted like that for years and there was nothing they could do.
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for taking the time to write a review of our property. All comments and compliments help us improve our quality and service to our guests.  I do apologize for the sofa bed.  I do wish you had let us know so we could have replaced it for you.  I am also sorry you did not enjoy the coffee.  I do hope you will give us another chance to provide you with a true Best Western Park Place Inn service and experience.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Great accommodation and very friendly staff
Summary: We recently stayed at this hotel on a family holiday to Disneyland.  We were overall very impressed with the room accommodations, with 2 kings and a pull out sofa bed.  Which we used as we were a family of 5.  The room was very spacious and always serviced daily to a high standard.  The daily free breakfast across at Captain Kids was more than adequate with a variety of food served as a buffet , which included fruit, bagels, toast, pastries, donuts, muffins, scrambled egg, cooked ham steaks, waffles, porridge and breakfast cereals and yogurt, fresh juices,  and tea/coffee.   The  hotel services were great including a very nice pool and spa area.   When we became unwell with a virus which we may have picked up on the plane the hotel staff were very helpful in assisting us to find
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We greatly appreciate you sharing the experience you had with us.  I am very pleased we were able to help you find medical treatment and do hope everyone is now feeling well.  We hope we will see you if you come back to The States.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Our family of 6 (2 adults, 4 kids under 14) recently stayed at what has become our favorite non-Disney hotel. This will have been our 4th time staying as a family and once again, the hotel and staff met our every expectation. Check-in was a breeze, the room was great, and of course the 5 minute walk to the front gates of Disneyland and California Adventure can't be beat. Our room was clean and fresh every day we came back from the parks for our afternoon rest up. Likewise, when we came back for the night, the room was quiet and comfortable. Bottom line, if you are looking for  a nice hotel within walking distance of the park with great staff and affordable rates, this is the place for you.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us again during your visit to the Disney Resort.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments as well as taking the time to write a review.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Can't get any closer without being in one of the Disney hotels!  Hot tub and pool always full of kids -- no room for grown ups in hot tub :(   Free continental breakfast.... you get what you "pay" for, but hey it was free :)
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of our property.  We appreciate you choosing to stay with us and hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: The Good, The bad, & the Ugly
Summary: Well, where to start. I booked this off a recommendation of a friend and after reading the reviews I still felt ok.I book directly through BW since I am a rewards member.  I kept looking for better deals but figured at just under $100 before tax and parking I would stay with this hotel for the location and price. I kept looking at other hotels and hesitated to switch and stuck with this due to the reviews mostly.  The good- Staff is friendly and accommodating  We got into town early so check to see when we could get our room. Front desk staff was friendly and let me do all the paperwork and stated they would call when a room was ready. Before I left the lobby they saw me and stated it was ready. They gave us an upper level room which made me happy but it didn’t have a sofa bed
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for taking the time to write a review of our property.  All comments help us improve the service we provide to our guests.  I am truly sorry you did not enjoy your stay.  I do wish we had been notified so we could have addressed your concerns.  Yes your room should always be clean and all issues were addressed with housekeeping.  Unfortunately we can not limit access for outside corridors, especially due to the placement of the elevators.  Again I do apologize for your experience.  Please feel free to contact me.  We would like you to stay with us again so you can experience the true Best Western Plus Park Place Inn experience.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The best thing about this motel was the location; the crosswalk to the Disneyland and CAP entrances is just outside. It was close enough to the parks to pop out during the day. The motel is older-style with exterior corridors. It has been remodelled on the outside, but the rooms are tired and compact. The pool is small and visible to anyone walking past. The included breakfast is provided upstairs at Captain Kidds restaurant next door; the selection was reasonable, but all pre-packaged or pre-cooked. It was hard to get a table and the staff looked jaded.  Issues - The kids' sofa bed was the most uncomfortable bed they had slept in during our month-long trip. We were on the ground floor and woken by a garbage truck each morning. The wifi was non-workable, either not being able to
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our property.  All comments received from our guests helps us improve our service.  Unfortunately without knowing your name I cannot look into your reservation to check the issues on your account, but I do apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced.   I do hope you notified the front desk regarding the sofa bed.  We do have replacement mattresses as well as sofa's if it is not just the mattress. I do apologize that we did not fully meet your expecations and hope you will give us another chance if you come back to the area.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Great location but needs some refreshing
Summary: We have stayed at the BW Park Place Inn twice now when visiting Anaheim, and since the last time we stayed, the hotel's main lobby exterior has received a nice upgrade. The breakfast is heads and tails above our last stay as well, with many hot items (eggs, ham, waffles, potatoes, sausage) as well as pastries, toast, cereal, yogurt, and fruit. It's a nice way to start a big day at Disney and a huge money saver.  The rooms, however, could really use an update. The furniture is quite dated and although the rooms are always clean they are getting a bit dingy. The wifi was brutally inconsistent, which made it very troublesome when trying to get in touch with the person who was looking after our house, finding maps and directions for various activities during the trip, and checking
Manager Response: Thank you for returning the BW Park Place Inn and for sharing your experience.  Thank you for your compliments.  We will be making improvements over the next few years.  We hope you will enjoy some of the improvements when you next visit us.  Thank you for taking the time to write a review and we look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: About 900 steps from the entrance to Disneyland
Summary: This is a great location when visiting Disneyland.  All we had to do was walk across the street and we were on the Disneyland property as you see in the pictures from other guests.  My husband picked the room and he told me it across from the park but I didn't realize how close the park was to the hotel.  There were other hotels in the area but this was the closest.  The employees at the front desk were very nice and helpful in finding center things around the area.  Each morning we went to the restaurant for a very nice breakfast awaiting us.  We had eggs, potatoes, ham or sausage, donuts, muffins, cereals and fruit with several beverages.  You will not regret staying here.  We had a room on the back of the property and it was nice and quiet.  Very spacious and clean!!!!  We
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your trip to Disneyland.  We are very pleased to read you enjoyed your stay , the helpfullness of the employees and the complimentary breakfast.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we do hope it make it back to the area soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Comfortable and clean room has a refrigerator, microwave and a sofa bed. The staff was very helpful in finding a room for my son and his family who came in a day early. The location is great right at the crosswalk to Disneyland just a short distance to the parks and Downtown Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review.  We are happy we were able to help your son and his family.  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This place was amazing for the price! It was just a hop skip and a jump away from disneyland which was our primary purpose of being there. Fast friendly service. The only complaint would be that the WIFI is NOT high speed as advertised.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your recent visit to Disneyland.  We appreciate you taking the time to write a review.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Great Location , Great Rates, Always Clean, Comfortable beds, Decent Breakfast, Nice Pool and Spa, So Close to Disneyland, Close to Food (within walking distant)  We always try and stay here when we go to Disneyland!
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate you staying with us when you go to Disneyland.  Thank you for taking the time to write a review and for your compliments.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Very comfortable rooms and beds. Quite the value when compared to the California Grand, which I have stayed in several times. And the staff at the Best Western were super accommodating where the CG staff is sometimes questionable. Very close to the park and easy access. Quiet rooms except for some children apparently escaped from their room at 5:30 am and ran down the hallway. Not the hotels fault and only happened once. Breakfast was ok not supper but sure helped to not go out. We just brought the food to our room. Check in was fantastic and friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for taking the time to write a review.  The comparison to a Disney property, especially in the area of customer service was very much appreciated and shared with all.  Thank you for your comments and compliments and we definitely hope to have you stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: After some extensive research looking into various hotels within walking distance of the park, the Park Place Inn seemed to meet all of our criteria.  The price was very reasonable, you can't beat the proximity to Disneyland and an included breakfast.  We were here for 10 nights and have not one complaint!  Lets start off with price.  I will advise you not to go into this place with a 5 star expectation, or you will be sorely disappointed.  However, if you are just looking for a nice clean place to rest your head after a 14 hour day at Disneyland, this is the place for you.  the beds were very comfy, the room was spacious enough for both my Girlfriend and myself, and it was very quiet.  I do feel you get what you pay for and more here!  The breakfast was just alright.  Again,
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for your detailed review.  We greatly appreciate you taking the time to write about your experience.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay as well as the amenities and location of the hotel.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated.  We look forward to seeing you next year.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The room had adequate space for our family of 6.  The price was good.  The room and bathroom were super clean room.  It was a great location (right across the road from the Disney parks where we were going.)  Breakfast at the restaurant next door met our needs (eggs, potatoes, fruit, yogurt, juice, coffee, tea, bagels, donuts, bread, danish), although there were a LOT of bread/sugary choices.  We supplemented our food from the grocery store, but that was also lunches for us.  I would NOT recommend the buffet supper at that restaurant.  There were lots of choices, but it was barely edible.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and sharing your experience.  I am pleased to read you enjoyed your stay.  Thank you for your comments regarding the breakfast.  We do lease the upstairs for our breakfast and provide the food.  Your comments will help us improve our offerings. We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I recently stayed at this hotel for 2 nights. Probably the best location for the hotels not in the park. It was such a short walk. The staff were friendly at check in and check out. They gave us a room at the VERY end in the corner on the second floor, so that was kind of a bummer. The street noise was quite loud throughout the night and there was a bright light directly outside our window. The internet connection was quite horrible. Me and my boyfriend both had phones and I had a laptop and it was basically impossible to connect on each of our devices. We got it to work once but then lost the connection after 2 minutes or so. I strongly suggest you get stronger connections for the back part of the hotel. Also the continental breakfast next door at captain kids was awful. Very
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience.  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay but do apologize for the detracting items.  We are addressing the internet issues.  For the breakfast there are many options available if you choose to stay with us again.  Besides the items mentioned, we do also offer white and wheat toast, yogurt, bagels, cereal (including cheerios and raisin bran), oatmeal, and a variety of fresh fruits, as well as other items.  I do thank you for your comments and compliments and hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: It was great to park the car when we arrived and didn't need to use it until we left. Did not like the location of the rooms initially so the person at the desk made arrangements to change our rooms with no problem.  Rooms were clean, but a little tired, could use some updating. We didn't spend much time in the room. If you are looking for a  place to stay that is walking distance to Disneyland this is not a bad place.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and sharing your experience.  I am glad we were able to move you to another location in the hotel so you could enjoy your stay.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Right across the street from Disneyland, great price and the breakfast buffet (which is free) exceeded my expecations.  This was our fist time staying here, we will never stay anywhere else.  The only issue was the free wi-fi.  It's a hot spot so you lose connection easliy and it's a pain to use.  Other than that, great hotel and great experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  It is wonderful to read we exceeded your expecations.  We definitely look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This is our second stay at this hotel this year. We love it because it's directly across from the entrance to the Disneyland Resort. It took us 8 minutes to walk from our rooms to the turnstiles at the theme parks and I'm a slow walker. We had two connecting rooms, each with a king bed and a full-size sleeper sofa. The sofa was nice to have so we could relax in one room without having to sit on the bed. The rooms are clean with the exception of the carpets, which are badly in need of cleaning. Our socks were black after a short time walking around. The bed was extremely comfortable. It was nice to have the microwave and mini fridge. The desk had extra outlets, which came in handy for recharging all the electronic devices that we seem to travel with. The TV was a large, flat
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us once again.  We appreciate you returning and taking the time to write a review.  I am pleased to read that you enjoyed your stay and the amenities of the hotel.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: My family and I just got back from our vacation to SoCal where we spent 4 days at the BEST WESTERN PLUS Park Place Inn - Mini Suites. We have stayed at other Best Western Hotels before and were very pleased. This hotel also got great reviews on TripAdvisor so we felt good about our decision to stay there while visiting Disneyland. Unfortunately, we were underwhelmed and disappointed. This hotel's, excuse me, MOTEL's biggest draw is it's proximity to Disneyland. It is directly across the street from the main gate which made for a super easy commute between the park and the motel. It was great to not have to worry about parking. The parking fee, by the way, was $10/day, not bad at all, and was less than or comparable to other hotels in the area. There was always a place to park
Manager Response: I would first like to thank you for writing a review of our property.  We do greatly appreciate your compliments and also letting us know what disappointed you.  I do wish you had brought your concerns to us while you were here so we could have addressed the issues.  If we could not meet your expectations we could have definitely helped you find other accomodations with no penalty.  I am truly sorry you did not enjoy your stay.   I do hope you will give us another chance so you can experience the true service of the Best Western Plus Park Place Inn.  Please feel free to contact me.  Kelly Laimana Front Office Manager

Summary: This is a great place to stay. Right across the road from Disneyland - they also sell tickets to Disneyland so you don't have to wait in lines.  Unfortunately for us someone were running a 1/2 marathon the day we arrived and we had to drive around for 2 hours trying to get to the hotel -not the hotel's fault. We arrived early from Australia - after a 20 hour flight all we wanted was to get some sleep. The hotel staff were great and got us are room early so we could get a few hours sleep.  The only thing I would say was a disappointment was the breakfast provided next door at Captain Kidds. Food was pretty bad, we tried it one day spent the rest of our stay having breakfast at I-Hop.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your visit to Disneyland.  I am very sorry you were inconvenienced by the marathon but glad we could get you into your room early.  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay and appreciate your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Wow if I'm ever back in this area I will stay here again. On first glance it may seem a bit dated. I don't mind that. The rooms are a gd size and clean and we r opposite Disneyland as the brochure indicated, they were happy to bring in a roll away as we 3 individuals travelling together and don't want to share a bed. BUT WAIT THERE'S MORE the people at the front desk knew what they were doing BUT WAIT THERE'S MORE. They have a microwave and a fridge. Unlike many many many hotels I ave been in over the past 23days while on a tour from New York to LA.  BUT WAIT THERE'S MORE there's a pool and free WiFi and a continental breakfast. Ok I haven't had the breakfast yet. It's gd though to have it included.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am so pleased we exceeded your expectations and that we were able to provide you with a wonderful and comfortable stay while you visited the Disneyland area.  I did help you get your bags from the storage area and yes I did definitely enjoy reading your review.  I hope to see you again and hope you had a safe flight home.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Could not ask for anything more.
Summary: I reserved 3 rooms on line, well in advance of an upcoming wedding at Disneyland Hotel. They emailed me right away showing my reservations and thanked me for choosing their hotel.  Arrived and found the staff very friendly and they explain in detail how the security gates worked and where to have the breakfast included with room. They were very helpful and made sure all our questions were answered fully.  Found rooms very clean, up to date and well organized. Plenty of towels for each quest.  We found the location ideal, as we could walk to all of the Disney attractions and hotels and not have to drive. The added benefit of this hotel is there are many, many places to eat within walking distance.  We will definitely stay here again when going to Disney or have any other reason
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and sharing your experience. I am very pleased that you enjoyed every aspect of your stay with us.  I hope you enjoyed the wedding and definitely look forward to your next visit with us.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Very pleased with our stay there while at Disneyland.  At the end of a very long day, it was so convenient to just walk across the street!!  The bed was comfortable, fridge was good sized, plenty of coffee...  Overall, a great experience!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your visit to Disneyland.  I am very pleased that you enjoyed your stay and had a great experience.  Thank you for taking the time to write a review and we hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We chose this hotel based on trip advisor recommendations.  We were not let down.  From the time we checked in to the time we left staff were courteous and helpful in assisting us with inquiries.  We had a mini suite.  There were 2 adults and a 5 and 7 year old.  The room had sufficient space for us and our luggage.  The furnishings were a little tired.  The only annoying thing about this hotel were the small square pillows.  They still worked as a pillow but were odd and not as comfortable as rectangle ones.  Breakfast was ok.  If you like toast you will be fine.  The other options were very average.  We stayed on a 3rd floor room and had no noise from others.  The hotel has a small pool and spa area which got quite busy in the afternoons.  It also had a laundry which was busy
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us.  I am very pleased to read you enjoyed your stay with us including the location and the amenities. We greatly appreciate your compliments and taking the time to share your experience. Thank you for your recommendation and we hope to see you during your next visit to the area.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We booked the hotel because it's right accross the street from Disney and the price was fair.... What a nightmare!!! People at check in were so unfriendly! They hardly looked at you. The rooms are okay, but the wall are soooo thin. You can hear anything, anytime, anywhere!!  We booked this hotel for 8 night and did not get good sleep on any!!! The breakfast is next door and is just soooo poor. Everyday the same stuff!! Every day (Sat included) the waste was collected between 7 & 8, just in case you hope to sleep in the morning... Only good thing is the perfect location. Ow and we kept the cleanliness of the hotel also as a good thing, till we realised on the last day our feet were completely black and noticed the carpet is not cleaned at all, which was really discusting!!! We
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your concerns.  I do hope that you addressed the issues you had while you stayed with us.  I couldn't imagine staying for 8 nights in a place where I was so disastisfied.  We do greatly appreciate our guests coming to us with their concerns so we can promptly address any issues and ensure our guests have a wonderful and comfortable stay.  If we are unable to completely satisfy our guests we will definitely help them to ensure they enjoy their stay in the area

Summary: Yeah, as advertised this spot is directly from Disneyland. However, because it is in such a congested area you will find there isn't much room for much else. Check-in was great, room was clean and updated. Car process was a drag. We had to have a car key,  and you couldn't check the car without the room which is at 3pm (there is a parking fee). They do give you time after check out to leave your car there, however you better move it. The pool is nothing to get excited about. So do not plan a pool day at this hotel. The breakfast buffet is great. It is next door up the stairs, but it is a true buffet. In all I do not like the parking park of this hotel, the rooms were just fine and employees were great. I would use this hotel for very short visits. No longer than two nights.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience.  I am sorry you did not like having to use a ticket to access the parking.  However, it is a necessity where we are located.  Otherwise our parking would be overwhelmed with non hotel guests parking for their day at Disneyland.  We do allow you to park before 3 pm if there is space available.  It just is not guaranteed until 3pm.  I do hope you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again.  Again thank you for choosing to stay with us.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Right across from the Disney maingate alone made this hotel worth the stay. The breakfast in the morning saved us time and money and kept us well satisfied throughout the morning in the parks. The rooms were very clean and very spacious. Our room included a sofa that I assumed was a hide a bed. That will be perfect when my daughter is old enough to join us. I did see another post of housekeeping throwing away some assumed garbage... I did have some medicine disappear after returning to our room... it had gotten soaked on splash mountain and looked pretty beat up... and if it had fallen on the floor I could understand the mixup... although I would advise the housekeeping to only take what's IN the garbage cans and refresh towels and linens for stay over guests. Im sure it was
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We greatly appreciate hearing back from our guests about their experience.  I am very sorry that the medicine appears to have been thrown out.  Please contact me if you had to get a replacement.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.  Kelly Laimana Front Office Manager

Summary: we stayed here from sept 13th to 17th. it was great for access to disneyland. and ight next to two restauants. great location. parking was easy to find. checkin and checkout was fast, although when we asked for a certain room we were told sory we only have one room left so we had no choice. people were friendly and we got extra towels when we asked for them.  the one problem we had , which is why i am giving a two star rating is that on the ONE day we actually let housekeeping come in they TOSSED two items we had next to our computer.  We had two glass pop bottles to keep as souviners as we cannot get them here. They did not clean up the half glass if water on the table and didnt take some other trash but took the pop bottles we had laid out of the way.  Not sure if anything
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience.  I do greatly apologize for the bottles disappearing.  Even though we did compensate you $30 for the bottles, I do understand the disappointment in not having the souvenirs you were hoping to take home.  Our housekeepers are very hard working and honest and turn in forgotten items ranging from kids toys to ipads.  While I am sure it was just a mistake in thinking they were trash, I again do apologize for you not having the souvenirs.  I do hope you will consider staying with us again in the future.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: If you are going to Disneyland this is the perfect location. My family and I stayed in the mini suite and it was a great deal. Check in was easy. Every staff member I talked to or even walked past was extremely friendly and nice. The room was spacious, clean and comfortable. We had 4 adults and a two year old and the suite had plenty of room for all of us. The beds were very comfortable. It is so nice to have a fridge in the room when you are going to Disneyland so you can keep water bottles cold and bring leftover food back to the room. The room comes with free wifi which we loved. It is literally right across the street from the entrance to Disneyland. It was so nice to leave Disneyland at night and just have a short walk back to the hotel. The pool and hot tub are both very
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased to read how much you enjoyed your stay and your compliments are greatly appreciated.  It is wonderful you were able to enjoy all the amenities and location of the hotel.  Thank you again for staying with us and sharing your experience.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We have stayed here many times it is directly across the street from the main gate...awesome location! The staff were great the pool area is small but clean. There is a fridge and microwave in the suite and the breakfast saves you time to grab a quick snack prior to starting your disney day. Front Desk Staff were wonderful!
Manager Response: Thank you for returning to the Best Western Plus Park Place Inn.  We greatly appreciate you coming back to our hotel.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we look forward to your next stay.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Those visiting the Disneyland Resort will find access to "The Happiest Place On Earth" easy, and even easier on your pocket book as well.  The location is simply excellent and we have always been pleased with our room.  The facility is very well maintained and recently underwent a remodel that updated the exterior appearance.  We have stayed here several times and always found the staff to be personable, pleasant and helpful.  Lodging includes a free breakfast buffet that eclipses the competition in quality and selection.  (This is a real bonus if you are like us and are on a budget with children.)  Highly recommend this place to our friends.  We had to think twice before posting our thoughts because this place is like a best kept secret!  This Hotel gives you the best value
Manager Response: Thank you for returning to the Best Western Park Place Inn for your visit to the Disneyland Resort. We enjoy having you stay with us and greatly appreciate you sharing your thoughts about our hotel. Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: The check in was easy and fast the staff was very friendly. Had a light bulb go out in bathroom was replaced by the time we came back. the room was very clean and well kept. Never have seen staff work so hard and they all were very friendly. The location to Disneyland was the best one just walked out of room and across the street.
Manager Response: Thank you for returning to the Best Western Park Place Inn for your visit to the Disneyland Resort.  We enjoy having you stay with us and greatly appreciate you sharing your thoughts about our hotel.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I took my daughter to Disneyland for a surprise visit. The location of this hotel  was awesome. It is RIGHT ACROSS THE STREET from Disneyland. The staff was very awesome when we checked in and very friendly throughout our stay. However, the TV didn't work very well and the AC didn't cool the room. The hot water didn't work properly. When I told the staff they didn't seem to care too much. with that said, Id DEFINITELY stay here again because of location
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us.  I hope your daughter enjoyed her surprise.  I am sorry for the issues that you experienced and for the desk clerks seeming to lack concern for the issues.  We definitely want all of our guests to enjoy their stay and be able to take full advantage of everything in the room.  I am pleased that you will return to our hotel.  We will address the issues you experienced especially with regards to the customer service.  Thank you and we look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Stayed here for our Disneyland stay and it was perfect! It was clean, SUPER close to Disneyland with a short walk across the street, perfect size room for a family of 5, great price and free breakfast that included hot and cold foods. Perfect location and great value. Will use this hotel again for sure!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your Disneyland visit.  I am very pleased that you had a 'perfect' stay with us.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated as well as the knowledge that you enjoyed the amenities and the location of the hotel.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Closest to Disneyland, this hotel wins hands-down in terms of location. Rooms are furnished simply and clean though the bathroom was slightly small. We appreciate the fridge, coffee maker and microwave oven in the room, as well as the complimentary breakfast. When we arrived in the evening, the 2 young ladies at the frontdesk were rather expressionless. They briefed us through the check-in procedures in a technical manner, so this should be improved upon. Staff who processed our check-out on the 3rd morning were friendlier and had more smiles for guests.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your visit to Disneyland.  We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated.  They will definitely help us improve our service.  If you come back to the area, we hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Great Hotel for visit to Disneyland
Summary: Excellent location, right across the street from Disney.  Terrific value with hot breakfast included.  Clean, comfortable and very helpful staff.  WiFi had limited range but everything else was great.  I would recommend this hotel to everyone.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us.  I enjoyed reading your review and thank you for taking the time to share your experience.  Your comments, compliments, and recommendation are greatly appreciated.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We spent 2  nights here and it was awsome. it is very close to disneyland and you can come and go all day long which we took advantage of. the room was clean and the beds were nice and comfy. The breakfast was real good as well.  We would definately stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to share your experience.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This Best Western was a great deal price wise and location wise. We loved that breakfast was included with the room and there was a wonderful selection of breakfast choices. The location just really cannot be beat. You walk right across Harbor Blvd to the pedestrian entrance. Loved it! The rooms were okay, a little lacking in decor and a bit smaller than they appear in the photo as was the pool, but really, it was great for the price we paid. The staff great too. Too bad there's a parking fee per night though.  The mattresses were unbelievable!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review of our hotel.  I am very pleased that you enjoyed our hotel.  It is wonderful reading that you were able to enjoy the amenities of the hotel as well as the location.  We hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Very close to Disney. Great beds, Clean Hotel. Breakfast better than most, with a large variety of items. We will stay here again. Comfortable, microwave and good size fridge included in every room. Our suite had two queen beds and a couch sleeper. The Sleeper sofa was not very comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we are pleased you enjoyed your stay.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: You cant beat this location for your Disneyland stay! Right across the street!  It is closest of all the Good Neighbor Motels.  The staff was very accommodating to us when our plans changed at the last minute also. I was very satisfied with the value and location.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay and that we were able to accommodate the changes to your plans .  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This was a great hotel to stay at if your only purpose is to visit Disneyland.  We typically stay in a Marriott or comparable but decided to stay at this hotel for the convenient location (right across the street from the Disneyland entrance).  We liked the easy access and had no use for any other hotel amenities.  The bathrooms were clean, the beds were comfortable and it was a pleasant surprise.  We will definitely stay at this hotel for an overnighter when visiting Disneyland Park.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your visit to Disneyland.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and will stay with us again.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We have been coming to Disneyland every year for the past 18 years.  We have always stayed at the Best Western Park Place Inn and Suites.  Have never had an issue with our room, parking, other guests or staff.    I love being able to know that our hotel stay is not a concern and that way we as a family just focus on Disneyland and all the fun (rides, food, etc).  When we are done, we come back to a great room and get some great sleep.   Highly recommend this hotel if you are visiting Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your visits to Disneyland.  We appreciate the fact that you continuously return to the Best Western Park Place Inn.  I am very pleased to read that you have enjoyed every visit to our hotel especially since there have been various changes over the years.  We look forward to your next visit with us  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Great place to stay for Disney experience very short walk to Disneyland/Calif. Adventure.  Staff was very helpful & friendly. Room was very clean. Breakfast in the morning was good with several choices of food. Would definitely stay here again. The location alone is worth it.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay at the Best Western Park Place.  We do hope we will have the pleasure of you staying with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The staff and hotel where exceptional!! Very friendly and clean! The breakfast had a wide variety to choose from, so even my picky eater found some things she would eat:) The bonus was that the hotel is right across from the entrance to Disneyland!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and sharing your experience.  It was wonderful reading how much you enjoyed your stay with us and the offerings of the hotel and its location.  We hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Good working area in room, fridge but could use a micro. The one on the main floor is weak. Didn't have time to use pool but looked very clean.  Spoke to other guests. They spoke highly of the restaurant.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us.  Your comments and compliments were greatly appreciated.  We hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Stayed for several days in May of 2012.  2nd time at this motel (first was many many years ago).  Decent place, clean spacious rooms (ours was a standard room) very very close to restaurants (like half a block away if that) and right across the street from Disneyland.  The crosswalk to cross the street is right out front.  Still, it's a minor hike to the actual front gates of Disneyland and California Adventure.  But closer than just about any other place.  Prices are about average, I'd say, for motels around the park, maybe just a touch higher, probably due to location.  Short of staying in one of the Disney hotels (which you'll pay premium for), though, you could not do better for location if you'd rather walk in instead of ride a shuttle.  The Disney hotels would continue to
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your visit and sharing your experience.  We appreciate your comments and compliments and thank you for choosing to stay with us when not staying at a Disney property.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel was good accommodation as was located a 5 minute walk from the entrance to Disneyland.  Would definitely stay here again.  Breakfast was fine and there was always plenty of food available.  The rooms were clean although the swimming pool was quite small for such a large hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased to read you enjoyed your stay and you would stay with us again.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: This is the spot to stay for Disneyland!
Summary: My family had stayed here for the Disneyland Half Marathon September 2012. What a prime location! The hotel was clean and spacious and most of all, the location was excellent for our long days at the park.  This is the hotel for my family to stay at when whenever we come to enjoy the Disneyland Parks!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us while participating in the Half Marathon.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the hotel and location.  We would definitely enjoy seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We spent 4 nights at the Park Place Inn and Suites.  We have stayed there for years and always had a good experience.  The location is excellent.  Pool is small for the size of complex.  Service and room was very good at half the cost of one of the Disney properties.
Manager Response: Thank you for returning to the Best Western Park Place Inn.  We appreciate you coming back to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Difficult to do better in Anaheim
Summary: We stayed at the Park Place Inn in late August 2013 for two nights, with our family in another suite.  Both were located at the rear of the premises on level 2 (first floor for non US people).  This did involve a bit of lifting of bags and cases, but the rooms were quiet.  I had one complaint as a relatively light sleeper and that was the noise of the air conditioning, which we had to have on but which did disturb my sleep as it cut in and out. We didn't use the small pool during our visit, but the area did look a little cramped and possibly too shaded.  The guest laundry was a good feature. Accepting the great location and all the other benefits other writers have repreated in almost every review, we believe our best contribution to the debate is how to get the best use from
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your recent visit to the area.  We appreciate you taking the time to write a review of your stay.  It is wonderful reading that you enjoyed your stay with us and the benefits of the hotel.  We hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Just a clear explanation about parking here and walking in to DL
Summary: This very nice motel has a primary draw, and it is no secret: This is the closest hotel to the gate of both parks (except for Disney's Grand Californian)!  It is an awesome experience to be able to leave your hotel, cross the street, and enter the parks.  It is a premium time saving advantage and worth the extra $25-50/night.  Pay heed to this very important fact: Parking costs $10/night (no big deal).  They only allow 1 car per room. You can only park on site (on check-in day) when a sufficient amount of cars from check-out are gone (about 10am to 12pm).  During your stay, you can remain parked until check-out, when you must leave (about 8am to 10am). I get this policy, really, I do. I don't blame them at all. How else could they possibly manage this issue? For us, it bothered
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for your comments.  I am sorry we were unable to meet your needs.  We do have limited parking and do appreciate your understanding.  I would like to mention that the vehicle does not have to move immediately upon check out.  Check out is at 11am.  We do  offer a complimentary parking extension until 3pm.  Due to arriving guests being guaranteed a parking spot at 3pm, this is the latest we can extend the parking.   I do hope you will be able to stay with us on a future visit to the Disney Resort.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: If you're going to Disneyland with a family.
Summary: If you're taking kids to Disneyland any looking for a budget place to sleep, this is about as good as it can get. The rooms are big (by hotel standards) and clean. It's impossible to stay any closer to the parks. You are literally less than a 5 minute walk from the front gate, which is a great feature if little ones need naps during the day. As long as you don't expect *any* extra bells or whistles (the pool is pretty tiny, the continental breakfast is passable, but it's the same lineup every day, and there's no extra onsite parking if anyone is visiting you at the hotel), then you'll be fine. Just go in knowing what to expect.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our property.  We are pleased that you chose to stay with us and that you enjoyed your stay.  Your comments and compliments are appreciated.  We will do our best to accommodate a visitors vehicle as long as it is not staying overnight.  We do have limited parking for one vehicle per room.  We hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This was a perfect place to stay to walk to Disneyland.  The room was comfortable, kind of decorated in a Polynesian theme.  It was nice to have the microwave and fridge for our stay.  Check-in was quick and efficient.  The breakfast buffet upstairs at Cap'n Kidd's was much more than we had expected and was good.  There are many places to eat within walking distance, so that's convenient too.  The pool was very refreshing after a HOT day at Disneyland, and everything was clean.  The only reason this didn't rate 5 stars is I dislike having to pay for parking, but I suppose it's one way they can keep people who aren't guests from parking there to go to the parks.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated.  I am very pleased to read that you enjoyed your stay including our location and amenities.  I hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Six of us stayed here at the end of Aug for 2 nights.  Great location - walk to the park gates, rooms were more than adequate for a quick stay.  Microwave and mini fridge were standard and useful for a group of 6.  Breakfast next door was fine to get the day started. Parking is $10 per night which seems to be the norm for the area.  Definitely would consider staying here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to share your experience.  I am very pleased to read that you enjoyed your stay with us.  We do hope you stay with us during your next visit to the area.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This is a great place to stay clean rooms friendly staff and right across the street from Disneyland.  This was our third visit here. The rooms are nice perfect place to relax after a long day at the park. This is the only place we stay when we come to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us again.  We enjoy having you as our guest and appreciate you taking the time to write a review.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The hotel is close to both parks.  The staff was very helpful and responsive to my requests. The rooms were clean and very quiet.   We made several request of the hotel staff and each time the staff was friendly, positive and solved each issue.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for sharing your experience.  I am very pleased we were able to meet your requests and solve any issues.  Your review is greatly appreciated.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: A one night stay close to Disneyland
Summary: We stay at the Park Place inn once in a while if we want a late night stay at the Disneyland Resorts and don't want to drive home.
