The rates are reasonable and it is across the street from Disneyland a 3 or 4 minute walk from the hotel. Rooms are very clean and a good basic breakfast in the morning to start the day. Friendly staff. Only drawback is a $10 charge to park your car. Something new from are last stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for returning to the Best Western Park Place Inn.  We enjoy having you as our guest.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We do look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Great hotel for a family or group visit to Disneyland because of the location, it is 5 minutes walking, we were able to take a Disneyland mid afternoon break, rest and clean up, then go back to the very end.  The hotel room was very clean and adjoining rooms were family friendly.  The front desk staff were welcoming, friendly and helpful in everyway.  Thanks to this hotel for a fun experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for sharing your experience.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay including our location and the friendliness of our staff.  We hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Super close to D-land, friendly & efficient
Summary: We spent 2 nights here and for the price and convenience, it cannot be beat.  6 of us shared a mini-suite and for 2 nights - we all managed fine.  Breakfast is more than adequate - hot food included eggs, sausages, waffles as well as fruit, cereals, coffee and juices. We could walk to the Disneyland across the street and zip back to the hotel if we needed a rest or to pick up a change of clothes.  The kids enjoyed a morning swim each day. We used the laundry facility and while there were only 2 machines, it was surprisingly not busy at all.  Great for families with young kids.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to write a review.  I enjoyed reading your comments and compliments and I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay.  We hope to see you again during another visit to the Disney Resort Area.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Awesome location, easy parking, great breakfast, and more!
Summary: Everything was GREAT!  Awesome location (directly across the street from the entrance to Disneyland), great parking arrangement, excellent room, very nice breakfast, reasonable rates, and very nice hotel staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated.  We hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Hotel is located directly across from the entrance of Disneyland. It is about a 5 minute walk from hotel to the gates of Disneyland. Rooms are clean and roomy. Hotel offers continental breakfast across the way at the captain kids upstairs. Breakfast consisted of eggs, potatoes, sausage, cereal and fruit. Parking is reasonable $10, beats parking at the park. Staff was friendly and assisted us with finding a late night pizza delivery after returning from the park. Have stayed here several times and price is very reasonable. Only issue is that they only offer 2 double beds instead of queens.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us.  I am very pleased to read that you enjoyed your stay with us.  Our standard room with two beds does only come with doubles.  However, we do have our mini-suites which consist of 2 queens and a queens sofa bed with just a slight price difference.  Thank you for writing a review and we hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Great location for people with young children.
Summary: We stay here every time we go to Disneyland and have never been disappointed. The rooms are clean and well maintained. Always have wonderful service no matter what time we arrived and always try to honor our room request.  They have upgraded their free breakfast and other improvements.  The only negative I have about the hotel is their parking, it's went from bad to worst over the last few years and now are charging a parking fee, which has gone up in the last year.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review.  We greatly appreciate you staying with us whenever you visit Disneyland.  Thank you for your comments and compliments. We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Great stay and a great location
Summary: I was in town for the Disneyland Half Marathon and this was the best location at the best price. I called several days before and asked for a room away from the street as to get the best nights sleep and was told that it would just be a request. Upon check-in I was granted my request and had a great room at the end of the building. The room was clean and well kept. The decor was a bit dated but it still looked good. I will most certainly stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for sharing your experience.  I am very happy we were able to meet your request.  I hope you enjoyed the Half Marathon and your visit to the area.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This is a great hotel to stay at when you are visiting Disneyland. We have stayed here on many occations, and it is very well kept. It is directly across the street from Disneyland and you don't have to pay for parking at Disneyland then. There are great resturants around this area to eat at as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for being a reoccurring guest of the Best Western Plus Park Place Inn.  We enjoy having your stay with us during your visits to Disney.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Excellent location directly across from the Disneyland entrance. What could be more convenient? Plenty of shops and restaurants within walking distance to choose from. Easy in and out access for vehicles, though you won't need your car once there.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am pleased to read you enjoyed the location of our hotel.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Convenient location to disney park. Staffs are friendly and nice to commuicate with. Room is also acceptable compared to the price we paid.  In geneal we don't have any complain about here and we would consider come back in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay and look forward to you staying with us again.

Summary: Location wonderful for a Disney adventure with the family (or without). Rooms are functional, good size, clean and basic we couldn't ask for more really given the time we actually spent in them. Pool and spa was a bonus, breakfast next door was the start you needed for your day, fruit, toast, yoghurt and muffins. Front desk staff always helpful and friendly. Can't speak highly enough of the location to Disney parks and Downtown Disney basically you cross the road (directly out front of hotel driveway) and you're at the entry (or when exhausted you're home within minutes, not queuing for ART bus or hotel transfer buses). Without a doubt when we visit Disney again we'll be back, this hotel delivered for the price and our needs.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your visit to the area.  We are very happy you enjoyed your stay including the breakfast offerings and location to the Disney Resort.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Stay here for its location only
Summary: The location of this hotel is why we chose to stay at it - right across the entrance to Disneyland.  Breakfast was ok, A/C unit was very loud, but at least it worked.  Room could have used a good clean, especially the carpets in the corners and along the walls.  The pool was way too small!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to share your experience.  I do apologize that all your expectations were not met.   We do have replacement A/C units when they are becoming too loud. They can be switched out within 10 minutes upon request.  The carpets have also been addressed with housekeeping.  I do hope that you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Walking distance to the Disneyland parks.  Decent accommodations, clean.  Included breakfast (Captain Kidd) was okay.  Parking accommodations are limited.  Had to park my second car at a neighboring hotel's valet service.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience.  I am pleased you enjoyed the room accommodations and the location to the parks.  I do apologize that you were unable to park your second vehicle here.  Our parking is limited to one vehicle per room due to space restrictions.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Great little hotel!  Right across the street from Disneyland! Great location! Good breakfast and friendly staff! clean rooms and fresh towels and sheets! I would definately be staying there on my return trip to Disneyland with the Kids!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased your enjoyed your stay with us.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and we look forward to seeing you and the kids again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I think this hotel is an excellent place to stay. The rooms were very clean and well taken care of.  If we needed something we received it immediately and everyone was very friendly.  The breakfast was also great.  We were happy with all the choses. You never had to wait long when something needed to be refilled.There was 13 of us and they put us all next to each other. And the location is the best.  Didn't expect to be that close to the park.  There isn't anything negative to say about the hotel and our stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  It is wonderful to read how much you enjoyed your stay.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated and I hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Best location, Well-kept hotel and Service for Disneyland!
Summary: Just got back from second trip to Disneyland, staying in hotels around the park. Best Western Park Place Inn & Suites was a really great choice for just staying in the Disney area and getting value for the dollar. The hotel was well-kept, clean, fresh paint throughout, even though it's been there for a very long time. You absolutely can't beat the location- it's precisely across the street from the Disney entrance, so you don't need to wait for shuttles, etc. The included breakfast is a FULL hot and cold buffet next door, the suites have plenty of room and the bathroom seemed newly updated. There were six of us in bed comfortably, as the beds and the sleeper sofa were all queen sized. My teenager thought the bed was a bit too firm, but the pillows were lovely and room
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write such a detailed review.  I am very pleased to read how much you enjoyed your stay and the offerings of the hotel.  If you stay with us again, I would just like you to know there are two elevators; one on either side of the pool.  Thank you for the comments and compliments you shared in your review.  Your recommendation is greatly appreciated and we hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Stayed for five nights (four days at the park) and we're thrilled with our choice! My girlfriend and I loved the inn. We'd stay there again. The price, location, rooms - all great!  Room: The King room was spacious and clean. Loved that there was a mini-fridge and microwave. We were on the north side, first floor, near the front - while some people have mentioned that it can get loud, we didn't mind: 1. The A/C is loud so it blocked out the noise from outside and 2. Makes the walk to the park even shorter!  Breakfast: Varied (hot and cold/sweet and savoury). It has something for everybody!  Location:  Location is FANTASTIC. Even closer than the Disneyland Hotel and Paradise Pier. We timed our walk from our room to the bag check - five minutes, tops. We took breaks during the day
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your trip to Disney.  It is a pleasure reading the comments and compliments in your review.  I am pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us and we look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Great for families, close to Disney
Summary: This hotel worked great for our family: spacious rooms (2 beds, plus a pull out couch), good size bar fridge, microwave all helped us on our Disney vacation with our 3 year old.  As other reviews indicate, the hotel is right at the lights where you cross to go to Disneyland parks.  I think it took about 5 min to get to the gates.  Hotel was clean, and our 3rd floor room was quiet.  You hear the fireworks, but our little one slept through them each night.    Breakfast is just fine, pool is smaller ( it was hot when we were there so it was very full of families all trying to cool off in the afternoon) but clean and a nice temp.  I'd definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your Disney visit.  I am very happy to read that our hotel and amenities helped during your vacation with your little one.  Your comments and compliments are appreciated.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Very clean and safe hotel directly across the street from Disneyland/CA.  Rooms are clean and spacious. Staff are very courteous and friendly.  Continental breakfast is pretty good.  Would recommend this hotel to anyone going to Disney or Anaheim area.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and for your comments and compliments.  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay and greatly appreciate your recommendation.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Nothing closer to Disney - staff very accommodating - price very reasonable -breakfast - several hot items and cereal and toast,coffee,juices, fresh fruit  - nice pool area -  clean and comfortable rooms   Highly recommend
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your visit to the Disneyland area.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and greatly appreciate your recommendation.  I hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We stayed here for 5 nights in August this year, we were thrilled with the short walk to the entrance of both Disneyland + California Adventure (literally across the road) Pros - Rooms were clean, spacious & serviced daily. - Short walk to theme parks. - Free daily buffet breakfast (eggs, muffins, yogurt, fruit, toast etc..) - Right next to Captain Kids, IHOP, McDonalds. - Quiet rooms, with air conditioner, fridge, large plasma T.V, hairdryer, kettle. - Friendly front desk service.  Cons - $10 per day parking fee (it's probably not too bad, but it does add up!) - Pillows were all thick & hard  I would stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.  I greatly appreciate you taking the time to list what you liked and what could be improved on.  All information helps us improve our service.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and definitely look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Stayed for 6 nights , superb location ,quiet hotel (room was on the side about 1/2 way back. Breakfast  was excellent . Nice room layout had 2 queen beds with pull out couch fridge and micro. A short walk to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The best part of this hotel was the proximity to Disneyland. WiFi was a joke. Free breakfast was ok. Lots of nearby restaurant was great. The fee for daily parking seems high, otherwise we had a good time at Disneyland, good bonding for family.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am sorry that you were not fully satisfied with your stay, but very happy you enjoyed your time at Disneyland with your family.  I do hope you will give us another chance.  We would like to have you and your family as our guests again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We recently stayed here for three nights. Everything about the hotel is great. Disneyland parks just a few minutes walk away, housekeeping efficient and front desk staff friendly. We did have a  small problem with our park tickets but the matter was quickly resolved by the fabulous Nancy. The free breakfast buffet has a good selection and there are inexpensive restaurants nearby if you don't want theme park food. Will definitely stay here on any future trips.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you during your visit to Disneyland.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: People, location, site - all wonderful! We have stayed there for the past 14 years and recommended it to others who have also been very happy. It is also very pleasant to see many of the same faces over the years. The staff has watched my son grow up and when I call for reservations they always remember and ask about him, events in our lives, etc. It is like visiting family-the members that you really like! :O)
Manager Response: Thank you for writing a review. We have definitely enjoyed having you and your son stay with us over the years.  I know we probably won't see you again until next year but we look forward to your visit.  Thank you and have a great rest of the year.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We have just arrived home from our holiday in USA after nearly a month and out of all the 4 hotels we stayed at this was one of the best.  Even the kids (aged 15 & 11 yrs old) said how much they enjoyed staying there. Directly opposite the Disneyland gates, which was welcomed at the end of long days at Disneyland. I knew it was close as the main reason for choosing to stay at this hotel was the location to Disneyland but had to see it to believe it (how close it actually was). Staff were friendly and very efficient in every respect.  Hotel shop was small but stocked some great things, worth checking out.  Our room was spacious and clean and surprisingly quiet and the beds and pillows were very comfortable.  Having the wash basin outside of the main bathroom made life easier
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your visit to Disneyland.  I hope you had a relaxing trip home.  I am very pleased to read how much you and your kids enjoyed your stay with us.  Thank you for sharing your experience and we look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Best hotel and closest to Disneyland entrance.  Very nice staff and clean and updated rooms.  Will definitely stay here on my next trip to Disneyland.  I wish there wasn't a parking fee, I feel like that should have been free, but otherwise great hotel. We also appreciated the free breakfast, that was a great help and convenience on our trip
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Our go to place when we visit Disneyland
Summary: My family and I visit Disneyland 1-2 times a year.  There's another BW next door but we usually opt to stay at this one because of the breakfast buffet (which the other BW doesn't offer yet).  The staff here are pleasant.  Like everyone has mentioned, the location is awesome.  You're a 5 minute walk to the Disney entrance.  If you have young children (we have a 6 year old), it is very convenient to take a mid-day break, eat and then return to your room to rest up before returning to the park in the evening.  There are very affordable dining options next to the BW.  We usually ate at the next door Denny's and McDonalds.  There's also a Coldstone Creamery next door for if you're craving yummy ice cream. The breakfast at the hotel is simple but fine.  During our stay, the options
Manager Response: Thank you for continuing to stay with us and for writing a review of our property..  I am very pleased to read that you enjoy our amenities and the location of our hotel.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated as well as your return visits.  We look forward to your next time you stay with us.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Across the street (5-10 minutes walk) to Disneyland
Summary: This hotel is super convenient if you are going to Disneyland.  Every morning, you just walk across the street and 5-10 minutes later, you are at the gates to enter the theme park.  The hotel itself looks old.  However, if you aren't looking for something fancy, then this place is pretty good.  It is a good size room with a small living area.  It has a microwave and fridge, and our sink area is HUGE.  I like that there is a lot of counter space to put your toiletries, make-up, etc.  The bed is comfortable and the air-conditioner works well.  The room looks a bit dark and dreary, but that didn't bother me too much.  The wifi did not work the entire time that we were there.  We did not report it, but it was a little annoying.    The shower faucet is a little confusing.  You have
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated.  I do apologize that you experienced trouble with the internet.  I do wish you had notified.  Usually it is a quick fix by resetting the routers or simply changing a setting on the device you are trying to connect with.  I do hope you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We recently stayed 4 nights on a trip to Disneyland.  We wanted some place close by that we could come back to and rest for the afternoon when the sun and crowds were most intense.  This place delivered.  The walk to the parks was very easy--maybe 5 minutes.  The room was spacious.  The housekeeping staff did a thorough job.  And the place was surprisingly quiet, given that there were families with kids all about.  The free breakfast was nothing fancy, but was convenient.  The fridge and microwave were very handy.  Check-in and check-out were no-hassle.  This will be the first place I look if I ever come back to Disneyland.  The only negatives I can think of were the water and A/C.  The water had a bit of a sulfur smell, so we depended on the ice machine (presumably filtered?)
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your recent trip to Disneyland.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and appreciate your comments and compliments.  I do apologize for the water and the a/c.  Please let us know when you stay with us, if anything seems wrong in your room so we can address it.  We look forward to having you stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Closer to Disney's gates than the Disneyland Hotel. Great place to rest, clean up, and regroup between all day adventures at Disneyland and California Adventure. The free breakfast was a decent buffet and saved us a lot of money.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for writing a review of our hotel.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and the breakfast offerings.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Breakfast wasn't that great, but hotel was nice!
Summary: The hotel is right across the street from Disneyland! Makes it so nice to walk a short distance with kids after spending all day walking around. The rooms are nice and the beds are comfy. The only thing that was a disappointment was the complimentary breakfast next door at Captain Kidds. It was awful! Items smelled like a freezer after being cooked. I stuck to toast and OJ.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and sharing your experience.  Thank you for letting us know about the breakfast so we can make sure that it does not happen again.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Best location if you are walking to the resort.  Our room had very dirty carpet and strong mildew smell.  A/C also smelled bad.  Breakfast next door at Cap'n Kids was hearty.  Staff were very nice.  Made good use of fridge and microwave.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience.  I do apologize that there were problems with your room.  I do hope you let us know while you were here so you could be moved and the issues in the room addressed.  Thank you for your compliments.  I do hope you will give us another chance if you come back into the area.  Thank you and take care

Summary Heading: It's right across the street from the entrance to Disneyland
Summary: This place delivers exactly what it promises.  Location, location, location.  The pool is tiny, the rooms are fine, not large or small.  Parking isn't too bad.  There is an elevator by the pool, so park midway down the hotel lot (gated, requires a pass) if you will need to use a luggage cart, or if you are on the 3rd floor and don't want to haul luggage up the stairs.  Breakfast is passable, next door at the restaurant (buffet on 2nd floor, free).
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and for writing about your experience at our hotel.  We hope we will see you again if you come back to the area.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Amazing location, great hotel, great service!
Summary: This is the fourth time that we've stayed in this hotel and this time we were here for a week. It is PERFECTLY located at the crosswalk to Disneyland's main gate. McDonald's is two buildings over and the included breakfast is at the restaurant next door.   The breakfast is actually better than the last time we stayed here. Cereals and pastries are usual at free breakfasts but they also have eggs, hash browns and either bacon, sausage or ham depending on the day.
Manager Response: Thank you for coming back to stay with us and for taking the time to write a review.  Your comments are greatly appreciated.  I am pleased you enjoyed the additions to the breakfast and look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The best honest hotel ever.  Nancy at front desk is amazing, check in was fast and well organized and Maribel the housekeeper, honest (she found my teenagers purse and turned it in to the front desk - so thankful for an honest staff).  Truly the best stay for our one night.  Hotel was clean, extra pillows already in room before arrival, the only negative for me was that the bed seemed new, so it was a little hard, and I'm a girl who likes a pillow top.  Others will most likely like the firm mattress. Lastly, I have stayed there many times before (always when we are visiting Disneyland, it is right across the street), and we will always stay with them in the future. Thanks Best Western for hiring honest and reliable staff. Kittie - Stayed August 2013
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and writing a review about your experience.  Your comments are greatly appreciated and I am very happy we were able to get your daughter's purse back to her.  Thank you for continuing to stay with us during your visits to the area.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: My husband and I stayed at the BW for 3 nights while visiting Disneyland for the first time.  When looking for a hotel, I was nervous looking at maps, because so many hotels appear to be close to the park.  I hate using buses because they're always crowded.  We chose the BW because many travelers on Trip Advisor said this was the closest hotel to the parks.    Indeed, it was the closest!  We walked out of our room, and the crosswalk to Disney was right there!  Once we crossed the street, we walked through the bus unloading zone (and further were relieved that we would never need a bus), bag check, and we were at the turnstiles to both Disneyland and CA Adventure!    The parks opened at 8, but the front of the parks open at 7:30am, so we went to breakfast at 7am.  The breakfast
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the location of our hotel and the amenities offered.  I hope we will see you again if you come back to the area.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: we received a room next to the lobby and thought it would be noisy-it was pleasantly quiet and convenient- convenient to disneyland and staff was knowledgeable of other sights and ammenities--room was clean the only complaint was that thte sofabed lacked comfort and support
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and sharing your experience.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay.  I do hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Not clean smelled like urine you can hear everything that is going on around you. I would not stay their again. The price was good but I would pay more for it to be clean. It was close to Disneyland that as a good thing easy to get to and from
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us.  All comments help us to improve our service to our guests.  I am very sorry that your room had a bad odor to it.  We did check the room and had it thoroughly cleaned to take care of whatever may have been causing the odor.  Please note this is not the standard in our rooms.  I do wish you had let us know about the problem in your room so we could have addressed the situation and made your stay much more enjoyable.  I do hope you will give us another chance during a future visit to the Disneyland area.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: average motel and breakfasts but super for Disney parks access. price ok for what you get. parking assured. staff friendly but not exceptional landscape very nice and pool and spa are both handicap accessable and well kept
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our property.  Your comments are greatly appreciated.  They will definitely help us in evaluating what we need to improve.  I hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Stayed here for three nights while visiting Disney. There was no closer hotel to the park entrances than this one - it was literally five minutes from our room to the gates. (We did have a room near the front.)The hotel has obviously seen some wear and tear, but the rooms were clean and comfy. Can't speak for the pool, as we spent the bulk of our time in the park. Breakfast was very good- eggs,meat, waffles, breads, fruit, and cereal every day. All in all a great value - I would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review to share your experience staying with us.  We are very happy you chose us for your visit to Disney.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated.  We do hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Location and value for your buck are the big draw here. You are literally across the street from the main entrance (about a 5-7 minute walk ). We stayed 3 nights in room #242 which is the last room, 2nd floor in the back (very quiet). Only problem is the elevator is in the middle of the building and the stairs were not that close to our room & we never did find the ice machine!.  King bed (comfy) & a pullout (OK). Mini fridge & flat screen TV. Room was a little worn looking but everything was clean incl. bathroom. Breakfast incl. was upstairs above Capt. Kidd's offering juices/coffee/milk, cereal, hot eggs & sausage or ham, ready made waffles, yogurt, fresh fruit. Ladies were constantly replenishing and cleaning tables as needed. It can get very busy! Pools on site are very
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your visit to the Disney Resort Area.  I appreciate you taking the time to write a review of our hotel.  Your comments are greatly appreciated and I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay.  I am sorry you were not properly directed to the ice machine.  There are several and should have been pointed out on the map of the hotel for you.  I do hope, if you make it back to the area, that you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel is not only convenient because you can walk to Disneyland, their staff is wonderful, the fill all your needs with a pleasure. I will definitely come back  to this place. The room are spacious and clean, their continental breakfast is great, I didn't get to really enjoy the hotel but I will definitely recommend it to my friends and family.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and your kind compliments.  We greatly appreciate, you taking the time to share the experience of your stay.  Thank you for your recommendation and we hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We stayed here for three nights while visiting Disneyland.  The location could not have been more convenient and closer to the parks than some of the Disney hotels.  The accommodations were nice and the room was a good size.  We did not have trouble with the parking but the lot was very full most evenings.  Our room was towards the back of the complex so noise was not an issue.  I felt the breakfast was good and had a variety of offerings making it easy to meet everybody's needs. It was a great value.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay including the accommodations, location, and amenities.  Your comments and compliments are appreciated and we hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care

Summary: This hotel worked well for us. We wanted comfort and convenience, and we had all of that at a reasonable price. It was easy walking distance from Disney and close enough for those all important mid-day naps little ones need.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience.  I am very pleased to read that we were able to meet all of your needs so you could enjoy your visit to Disney.  I hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The whole family stayed here for a few days to visit LA and Disneyland.  The motel is right at the stop light for DIsneyland entrance.  You could not get much closer.  The suites were great with 2 queen beds and pull out sofa with lots of room.  Front desk was very helpful with several questions we had and issues with parking.  Only drawback may be rooms closer to the road can get some noise with the traffic going by.  Not an issue if you are an early riser though.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your visit to Disneyland and LA.  We appreciate you taking the time to write a review and share your experience.  We hope you will stay with us again if you come back to the area.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The Best Western Park Place Inn and Mini Suites is a great hotel.  It is located directly across from the Disneyland resort.  It is also in walking distance of many resturants.  The only problem is parking is at a premium and the spaces are very close together.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  We enjoyed having you as our guests and hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This was our second trip to Disney in the past year.  (our child was severely sick last year, so we wanted to have a better experience). We chose the Park Place Inn the first time, and it was an easy decision for us to return this time.  Once again, we had a great experience here.  The rooms were kept nice and clean.  The flat screen tv was in excellent condition.  The breakfast in the restaurant next door was a great value.  The 5 minute walk to either park is the best thing in the world with 2 young kids.  Its close to several good restaurants (although I would recommend eating in the parks, its just as inexpensive and gives you a better experience). The only thing I would say was irritating was the free wi-fi.  We were on the 1st floor in the northeast corner (which, by the
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us again during you visit to the Disney Resort.  I am very happy you were able to return this year to enjoy the parks with two healthy, happy children.  It is wonderful to read how much you enjoyed your stay and the offerings of the hotel and area.  I do apologize for the internet issues.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Can't beat the location of this hotel for a visit to Disneyland. Just a brief jaunt across the street and you are right there.  The staff was friendly and helpful. Free breakfast was an added plus. Would be nice if they offered free parking.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our property.  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and our proximity to the Disney Parks.  Thank you for your comments and compliments. I hope you will stay with us again if you come back to the Disneyland area.  Thank you and take care

Summary: We stayed here four nights for a Disneyland trip.  We had a room with a king bed and sleeper sofa.   My grown son slept on the sleeper and was comfortable.  The king was very comfortable also.  We had a first floor room, but never heard any  noise from any other rooms.  The internet was very week and not easy to use at night, but better during the day when most people are in the parks.  The location of this hotel is perfect for a Disney trip.  You walk out the door, cross the street, and you are on the Disney property.  It is then a walk of about five minutes to the gates of either Disneyland or Disney California Adventure.   The  breakfast is next door and upstairs.  This could be a problem if you are disabled.  The breakfast was good.  It was not exceptional, but there were
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and sharing your experience.  It is wonderful to read that you enjoyed your stay with us and the ammenities we offer.  I do apologize for the internet.  We are working to find a solution to further improve the internet service.  For the breakfast, there accomodations for our disabled guests.  Guests with disabilities can be seated downstairs and served by our breakfast attendants, or if preferred, a member of the party may select food and bring it down.  We do hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This room was perfect for our family of five on a recent trip to Disneyland.  The location was ideal - actually closer to Disneyland than the Disney hotel!  It was great to have the extra sofabed for my son.  Nice to have breakfast included.  The gift shop was small but still had a nice selection of items.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience.  I am very pleased to read that you enjoyed your stay.  Your comments were greatly appreciated.  I hope we will get to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Hotel can't be beat for location right across the street from disney, very clean, but only 1 elevator so try not to get a room on third floor, pool was very small and there is a 10$ parking fee per day.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  Please note that we do have two elevators.  One on each side of the pool.  I do apologize if the second one was not pointed out to you or if one was down during your stay.  I do hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for a trip to Disneyland with 6 children. We had 2 rooms and it was great. The staff was friendly,breakfast was good and best of all you are directly across from the entrance to Disney. It was great. This is the second time we have brought our family and will do so again.
Manager Response: Thank you for returning to the Best Western Plus Park Place Inn.  I am pleased that you enjoyed your stay with your family once again.  We appreciate your compliments and look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: This is the closest hotel to Disneyland other than Disney's Grand Californian which is about 4-5Xs the cost of this hotel the last time I checked.  The Disneyland Hotel and Disney's Paradise Pier are further away from the front gate that this Best Western!  I timed it one afternoon when we took a very leisurely walk and it was less than 6 minutes to the bag check (just before the entrance gates).  Can't beat that!   I stayed at this hotel July 22-24 with my tween daughter. It was our second stay here. I booked the room a few months in advance and received a good rate with a AAA discount (about $150/night including tax which is a good rate for the height of the summer).  I requested a room close to Harbor Blvd which luckily I received and was in room 102 (1st floor) two doors
Manager Response: Thank you for coming back to the Park Place.  We greatly appreciate the wonderful review you wrote about our property.  I am very pleased that you enjoyed your stay and the ammenities that our hotel offers.  Your review has definitely has provided us and guests with wonderful information.  I am happy we were able to meet your room request for a nice, enjoyable, and comfortable stay.  Your compliments and comments are greatly appreciated and we look forward to your visit next year.

Summary Heading: Very good hotel and right across from Disneyland!
Summary: Last summer my folks and I choose this hotel to stay at for night when we visited Disneyland because we do a lot in one day at the park. I have to be honest I thought this place was going to let us down because of the price but it didn't. We had a really nice room to stay in, staff was friendly, beds were comfortable and we had a good sleep. I would stay here again, expand the parking lot would be nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us .  I am very pleased that we exceeded your expectations.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Loved the location!  Right across from Disneyland.  What I appreciated most was after we left, I realized we left a towel we took for my son.  The hotel found it and called us while we were driving home and asked if we wanted them to send it to us!  What incredible service!  Breakfast provided was sufficient.  Had eggs, either sausage or ham (one day sausage/next day ham), potatoes, bread options, cereal, yogurt, fruit, etc.  Great start to a great day @ Disneyland and California Adventure!  Would definitely recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and your wonderful review.  It is wonderful to read how much you enjoyed your stay and service provided.  I am glad we were able to reach you regarding your son's towel.  We appreciate your comments, compliments and recommendation.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Wrong room assigned - Unhelpful hotel manager
Summary: My girlfriend and I had a reservation to stay at the Best Western Plus Park Place Inn on July 1st and 2nd. We planned on visiting the Disneyland Resort. This hotel was booked due to the proximity to the entrance to the Disneyland park (across the street,) and the majority of positive reviews on TripAdvisor. We arrived at approximately 8:30am. The front of the hotel was clearly undergoing renovations, even though the website stated they would be completed in June. It's clear that the hotel is old and feels more like a motel, with exterior corridors and a small lobby. The Pool was tiny. The front desk staff was pleasant during our arrival. We checked our bags and were informed that we would be contacted by phone when the room is available. The clerk confirmed our reservation dates
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for sharing your concerns during your stay with us.  I do apologize that you were not satisfied with the handicap accessible room.  While this is the room that you selected when you made the reservation online, I do wish we could have moved you to a standard king for you full stay.  Unfortunately that option was not available for your second night.  The mini-suite with the 2 queen beds and sofa bed was unfortunately the only room type option left.  There was an additional charge for this room since it is a larger room and we did provide the room that was originally reserved online.  Since we did not have anything else available we did call other hotels to try and accommodate your needs.  However, the ones we contacted in the immediate area were sold out for the night. I do apologize that you did not enjoy the breakfast.  Breakfast is not advertised as being provided by the restaurant.  We do state that we serve it on the second floor.  We do provide toaster waffles, scrambled eggs, ham, potatoes, sausage, white and wheat toast, danishes, muffins, donuts, bagels and cream cheese, yogurt, cereal (Corn Flakes, Raisin Bran, Fruit Loops, and Cheerios), oatmeal, fresh fruit, juice, coffe, hot chocolate, milk, and tea.  I am very sorry you did not enjoy your stay.  I do hope you will give us another chance.  If you do, please call the hotel directly so we can ensure you receive the room type that best fits your needs.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: One word awesome!!!! The food was also great. Way to go BW!!!   Thank you. The location of the hotel is excellent, right across the street from Disneyland and very convenient to other places like the convention center. plenty of stores and restaurants around the hotel. Its great, Disneyland in plain sight awesome. The breakfast at the hotel rocks!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and your wonderful review of our property.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated .  I am very pleased you were able to fully enjoy our location and offerings.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We had a nice stay at the Best Western Park Place mini suites.  This hotel has the very best location for a disney visit.  Our room was very clean.   The staff were all very friendly and helpful.  They did an excellent job making us feel welcome and comfortable during our stay.  This hotel is a little pricey and the pool is small.  Overall location and staff make this place worth it.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your recent visit to the Disney Resort Area.  I appreciate you taking the time to write about your experience.  Thank you for your compliments and comments.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The location of this hotel is fantastic for any Disneyland visitor! We had a great experience; our room was clean and the staff was very helpful! (One staff member wrote down a phone number to his favorite pizza location for us.) We ate at the breakfast every morning of our trip; the selection was good, but did get a little redundant after a couple of days. If they could change up the buffet a bit every few days, that would be great! Other than that, we had a perfect experience and definitely recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.  I am very pleased to read that you had a 'perfect experience'.  Thank you for your compliments regarding the staff and the facilities.  I appreciate your recommendation and comments regarding how breakfast can be improved.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We have arrived in the hotel on 4th of July evening. Since Disneyland is just accross the street, we walk to see the fireworks. As far as location concerned, no complain about it. You can be at Disneyland before it's open, so plenty of space to enjoy all the rides. Breakfast is provided in the restaurant next door, which is okay. you can even grab some fruits and bread from the restaurants to be taken as your snack in Disneyland. Hotel is a bit old, but clean. Wifi provided, and they even have a computer with free (limited time) internet at the lobly. There's a washing machine which is useful to clean your clothes especially after a wet days in Disneyland. Also you would like to check the merchandise at the stores. Price is reasonable. Overall, a pleasant stay.
Manager Response: The fourth of July fireworks are definitely fun to watch at Disneyland.  I am glad you arrived in time to be able to watch them.  Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience.  I am pleased you enjoyed the location of our hotel and and the ammenities that we offer.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Hotel is located at the crosswalk to the entrance to Disneyland.  extremely convenient for a multi day trip to Disney.   Room was clean, and appeared recently remodeled.  Breakfast could stand some improvement, but it was convenient, and good enough to go back and eat again.  Desk staff was efficient, but could stand to appear a little happier to be there.  overall a good stay,  I would return.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and sharing your experience.  Thank you for letting us know what you liked and what could be improved.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: There is more than one Best Western on this street
Summary: I even almost put my review in the wrong place. Location is perfect. Our standard room was a good size and we three adults had plenty of room. The queen beds were on the smaller size, but fine for us. I only had coffee from the complementary breakfast room, and I honestly didn't look at the food offerings, but my friends had bagels, ham, ect.   We only stayed one night, and had hoped to leave our car in the hotel parking lot on check out day when we went into the parks. Unfortunately we were told that during the busy season, they were fully booked and the lot surrounding the hotel simply didn't have room for more than one car per room. She kindly double checked for us and could only offer us parking at another hotel down the street. We just moved our car to the Disney lot that
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us.  It does get confusing with 6 Best Westerns in the immediate Disneyland area.  3 on the same street.  I am glad you found us and stayed with us.  Thank you for your comments and compliments and understanding regarding the parking situation.  I am also very happy we were able to reach you before you left the area so we could return the phone charger.  Thank you for your recommendation and we hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We have been to Disneyland 5 times in the last 2 years. We love it!! We have stayed at this hotel 3 out of the 5 times, and ever since we found this hotel I refuse to stay any where else. The hotel is clean, comphy beds, love the fridge and microwave, staff is nice. price is usually good, location is AMAZING!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for continuing to stay with us during your visitis to Disneyland.  I am very pleased to read that you have consistently received the service and quality we strive to provide to all of our guests.  Thank you for your compliments and comments and we look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We stayed here in July 2013 for 2 nights to spend the day at Disneyland.  Rooms were clean and nicely decorated. It is on the main drag so there is alot of activity outside the hotel, so some may find it a bit noisy, however you can't beat the location, a short walk to the Disney Parks main entrance, no waiting for buses, etc. There is a complimentary breakfast in the morning that was OK but does get crowded. Overall it was a fine experience for what we needed.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and sharing your experience.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay, the location, and the ammenities of the hotel.  I do hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Perfect location for Disneyworld and helpful staff
Summary: Stayed for two nights with my wife and daughter. It was the perfect location as we were in town to visit Disneyland and the location made it easy for us to get back and forth from the resort.  Plus: -Staff super helpful with planning rest of trip. We were heading up Highway 1 and the staff took 20 minutes to highlight their personal favourite places to stop -Location  Neutral: -Breakfast was free / all you can eat brunch but the quality was below average -Rooms were large but a bit shabby   Bad: -Wifi was free but extremely slow
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your recent visit to Disneyland.  We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience.  I am happy we were able to help you plan your drive up Highway 1.  There is beautiful scenery and fun places to stop.  I hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Excellent location to visit the Disneyland Resort
Summary: We stayed here June 2013 for 6 nights with our 3 kids.  The room was spacious and clean.  (As others have noted, white socks got dirty within minutes of running around on the carpets, but I don't think that can be avoided when you stay this close to DL during the busy season.)   We always had enough towels, but they really didn't provide many washcloths, (maybe 2 or 3), and with 3 little ones, it really wasn't enough.  The first day we were there, we went to the room for a nap at 2pm and they still hadn't cleaned the room.  The next 4 days they must have figured out we have young children and they did have it cleaned in the morning, but if you have little ones and are hoping to come back for an afternoon nap, it might be worth letting the staff know so you don't have to wait.
Manager Response: Thank you for  choosing to stay with us during your visit to the Disney Resort Area.  Thank you for sharing your experience.  I am very pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us and I thank you for your compliments.  We do hope you will stay with us during your next visit to the area.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: My husband and I stayed here July 6-8. The hotel is very quiet even for the doors facing outside. The rooms are nice and cozy and comfortable beds. The only issue we had was with the WiFi which is not the best if you use an iPad or your phone. The location is awesome as you are right across the street from Disneyland, California Adventure and Downtown Disney. Parking is $10 a day and they do offer a continental breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your visit to the Disney Resort Area.  We enjoyed having you as our guests.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and the location within the Resort Area.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Deceptive advertising!  I booked a 2 QUEEN bed mini suite.  What I got was a suite with 2 FULL size beds.  When I went down to the registration desk to inquire about the size of the bed, they said that the room I was given were in fact QUEEN beds.  The clerk at the front desk was nice enough to take me to room 305, which is also suppose to have queen beds, so that I can compare the beds.  I told the clerk that the beds in room 305 are the same size as my bed in room 250, and that they are not queen beds.  I asked her "does that look like a queen to you?"  Her answer "I don't know how big a queen size should be."  I went back to my room and did some research.  It seems this is a Best Western issue, and not just this particular location.  Others have also complained of the size of
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your concerns.  I am sorry that you did not believe that your room consisted of queen size beds.  The beds are 60" x 80" which is a queen size.  You were taken to another mini-suite to show that your beds were not smaller than those in other mini-suites.  When that was not sufficient we offered to show you a room with full size beds so you could see the difference in the bed sizes.  This offer was turned down as well as the offer to find alternative accomodations at no penalty so you would be more comfortable during the last night of your stay.  I am truly sorry you feel that you were a victim of deceptive advertising.  Queen beds are not much larger than full size beds (only 6" x 5" difference), and in a large hotel room can appear smaller.  Please feel free to contact me with you would like to discuss this further.  Thank you and take care.  Kelly Laimana Front Office Manager

Summary: We stayed at this hotel so we could be close to Disneyland.  In that respect, it was a perfect match.  The hotel is nothing spectacular, but it serves its purpose.  The employees were wonderful; very helpful and kind...actually seemed to go out of their way to help us when our daughter became very ill and had to go to Urgent Care.  The rooms are ok...again, it served the purpose.  The sofa bed was pretty bad...it was like a deep abyss.  My husband slept in the spoon shaped bed each night.  The wireless is the WORST. You have to keep logging in to the WiFi...if 5 minutes went by when I was not using the WiFi, I would have to sign in again...even if I was still in the room!  Even when you sign in, the WiFi wouldn't work/connect half the time.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and sharing your experience.  I do apologize for the beds.  We hope you will stay with us again.  If you ever have trouble with anything in the rooms while staying here, including the beds, please let us know so we can address it immediately.  Our goal is to ensure you have a relaxing and restful stay with us so you can enjoy your visit to the Disney Resort.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We stay at this property twice a year when visiting Disneyland.  It is clean, comfortable, and affordable.  It is right across the street from the Disneyland Main Entrance Plaza.  It is actually a shorter walk than the Disney hotels.  Another feature is they partner with Anaheim Medical Supply for rentals of mobility scooters at a better rate than at Disneyland, which frequently runs out of scooters to rent.
Manager Response: Thank you for returning to the Best Western Plus Park Place Inn.  We enjoy having you stay with us during your visits to the Disney Resort Area.  Your compliments are appreciated and we look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Best place to stay on Harbor!
Summary: I stayed at here June 24th thru the the 29th, I took a family trip to Disneyland. We usually stay at Park Vue next door but with the cost and the loss of amenities they once gave I decided to go else where.  I tried out the best western for the first time and when we arrived I was greeted with a smile from there friendly staff. I wasn't supposed to check in till after 3pm but when I arrived at around 10am I was expecting a wait to get into a room but they had a room waiting when I arrived.  When I checked out on Friday our flight wasn't till 6pm so the hotel heald our bags even after we checked out so we could spend the day in Downtown Disney to shop. I would defiantly stay here again. In fact I am planing to revisit again with the kids spring break! I can't wait! Best Western
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your recent trip to the Disney Resort Area.  I am very pleased to read we were able to help get off to a nice early start.  It is wonderful to read that you enjoyed the ammenities and our friendly staff.  We look forward to seeing you and your family during spring break.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I was granted my request for a room in the back. It was very quiet except for hearing the Disney fireworks. Room was clean. Air-conditioning worked very well. Cannot beat it's convenient location for the Disney parks.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and share your experience.  I am pleased we were able to meet your request during your stay with us.  Thank you for your compliments.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Unbeatable location directly across the street from Disney, that's why you stay here.  Our room however was damp the entire time. The carpet stayed wet from humidity from the poorly installed AC and poor fan in the bathroom. When we put a towel down by the sink (over carpet) so our feet would not get wet, the towel soaked immediately and came up black with mildew so clearly the moisture issue was not a new thing. The complimentary breakfast is a bit confusing as you have to go next door and upstairs for the food. It was a better than average fare though.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience at our hotel.  We greatly appreciate hearing back from our guests.  Thank you for mentioning the damp carpet.   Please know this is not normal.  If this had been brought to our attention during your stay we could have addressed it and ensured you a much more comfortable stay.   Please let us know which room you were in.  We do need to inspect the room to determine where the dampness is originating. I do hope you we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: arrived early (7am) in order to enjoy full day at Disneyland and was allowed to park even though room would not be ready until after 3pm.  Room was clean, but quite dark.  Bed was a bit uncomfortable, could feel a slant. Maybe time for new mattresses.  Bathroom was spotless. Continental breakfast was surprisingly extensive.  Hot eggs, ham, potatoes, and waffles and plenty of cold options: cereal/breads/pastries/bagels, 3 different fresh fruits, coffee/tea/juices.    Overall, our stay was a trade off:  Fantastic location for visit to Disneyland but the room felt, while safe and clean, a bit dark/dingy/depressing.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Best Western Plus Park Place Inn.  We enjoyed having you as our guests.  Thank you for sharing what you liked and didn't like about the hotel.  It will definitely help us improve our accomodations for our guests.  I hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We've stayed here last April and it was right across from  Disneyland Entrance.  Pretty decent hotel except its expensive $179 per night not including parking fees.  Although, the breakfast is the only perks because its complimentary.  If you want convenience I guess it's real good but if you want to save money you may want to think it over.  We came when the place was being renovated and no one told us anything about it but it didn't bother us so much because when we came back from the theme park the noise was gone.  Anyways, make sure you look around the area before booking so you could save a few bucks.  Hopefully this helps.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us.  I appreciate you sharing your thoughts on our property.  Our rates do vary based on room type reserved and time of year.  We do offer AAA, Costco, Government and AARP/Senior rates.  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay.  Please give us a call when you are coming back to the area.  Maybe we will have something else available for you.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Traveled to Park Place Inn for a Disneyland vacation.  We love staying here for its proximity to the park.  We arrived too early to get our room but were allowed to get our parking pass and head to Disneyland.  That was a great perk for us.  Even though there was construction going on, we never heard anything.  We had a great stay and will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and sharing your experience.  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay and were not bothered by the construction taking place.  We look forward to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: good clean reasonable and RIGHT ACROSS THE STREED from Disneyland :)
Summary: Good rooms, nice staff-- best is that they are right across the street from Disneyland!! Trust me, I would rather pay $15 more a night to stay here, the down the street a little. After walking around the park all day, you feel every step back to your hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for writing about your stay with us.  We appreciate your comments and compliments.   Hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care

Summary Heading: Dirtiest rooms on S. Harbor not to mention the management staff needs to learn about customer service!
Summary: I recently had the displeasure of being a guest at this roach motel. I am an annual pass holder, live in Northern California, so frequent the area various times a year. First, the smell as you walk in is something I could not get passed. Bed sheets were stained, bathroom was dirty, hotel staff is a joke. They are not willing to help with anything. I believe management is in need of some serious customer service training because they are ill equipped to resolve any issues with anything other than a generic response. Listen, if location is important and cleanliness is a must I recommend the tropicana inn and suites, park vue, and candy cane inn. All of these are either directly across the street or just a bit up the street from the park. I wish they would have at least offered a
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for sharing your displeasure with our hotel.  If we are not told, there is no way we can address the issues.  Our housekeeping staff takes pride in their work and has strict guidelines to follow; not only from the hotel but Best Western as well.  There is also a supervisor that checks the room after the housekeeper finishes cleaning.  Please give me a call so we can address your situation.  Thank you and take care, Kelly Laimana Front Office Manager

Summary: The location of this hotel is amazing.  We travelled with very small children and we really enjoyed how close the hotel was to the Disney entrance.  You really can't get any closer.  Also, the breakfast buffet was very good too.  It is located in the restaurant next door and has everything you need - cereals, toast, eggs, pancakes, fruit, yogurt, etc. The room décor is in desperate need of an upgrade but that didn't really bother us.  The only major negative of our stay was that we noticed a pile of toenail clippings beside the night stand.  Definitely not the cleanest place to stay.  I didn't want to touch anything in the room after we found that.  For that simple fact, we would not stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing the experience of your stay with us.  Our housekeepers receive very high compliments on the work they do.  Please let me know what room you were in and when you stayed so we can address the issue and ensure the housekeeper does not overlook anything.  I am very sorry and do hope you will give us another chance.  Thank you and take care. Kelly Laimana Front Office Manager

Summary: The hotel is directly across from the entrance to Disneyland and California Adventures!!! They have a breakfast included and it is pretty decent.  The rooms were very clean and look a lot more updated than the previous reviews had stated. The rooms were kept clean.  The kids enjoyed the pool and I was even able to do some laundry. Very reasonably priced. We will stay here every time we visit Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments and compliments.  I am very pleased you had a wonderful time during your stay with us.  We greatly appreciate you choosing to stay with us and look forward to seeing you during your next visit to Disney.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: So thankful it's close and clean!
Summary: Location alone makes this place ideal. After a long day at the Disneyland park your feet and family will thank you for choosing Park Place Inn. Way closer to Disneyland then the actual Disneyland Hotel. We stayed for 7 nights at the Park Place Inn. The room was always clean and the housekeeper always placed my daughter's stuffed animals in a new pose everyday. The staff was very nice except for one guy who gave my husband attitude when we called one morning to the front desk to report that our phone would not call out. He assumed we were checking out and asked why we would want it fixed. We still had four days at the hotel. My brother and his family were in an another room and it was so much easier to call their room from our room phone than unpacking our backpack to find a cell
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and writing a review of our property.  First, I would like to apologize for the attitude your husband received when he called about the phone.  The desk clerks only response should have been, "I am sorry it is not working.  When would be the most convenient time for you to have it fixed."  Whether it is your first night, last morning, or anywhere in between, anything not working properly should be corrected upon request.  This is definitely going to be addressed.   We greatly appreciate your comments.  I am very pleased to read that you enjoyed your stay and that we were able to provide help with your flat tire.  The breakfast provided at Captain Kidd's is provided by the hotel and is separate from the restaurant food.  I do hope you are able to enjoy it during your next visit.  We look forward to seeing you again next June.  Thank you and take care

Summary Heading: Great location.  Thoroughly enjoyed our stay.
Summary: We stayed during spring break as part of a family Disneyland vacation package set up through our travel agent.  We were immediately thrilled to find it directly across the street from the entrance to Disneyland.  This convenience alone was an incredible perk, as we didn't have a vehicle (and didn't need one),  Everything we needed was within walking distance, and we could easily take a break from Disneyland whenever we wanted and come back later.  Hospitality was great, plenty of amenities, ample A/C in the room along with frig and microwave, no disturbances, and very satisfying complimentary breakfast next door at Captain Kidd's.  It also didn't hurt that the weather was perfect that week too.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us.  It is a pleasure reading your comments and getting a feel for your excitement of our location.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and had the perfect weather for your vacation.  I hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Best thing is location. The hotel was under construction, so it helped to have security staff help get out of the parking. Can't complain, room was clean, staff was nice, the complimentary breakfast got boring.....everyday the same thing.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us.  I am sorry we did not exceed your expectations during your stay.  I do hope you were comfortable during your stay and that you enjoyed your trip to the area.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I seriously do not understand how this place can get any negative reviews. Just spent 3 nights here with wife and our 3 yr old. The rooms are huge by European standards. Our room was located near the swimming pool and was pleasantly quiet allowing for a comfortable nights sleep. The room was exceptionally clean.  The location is the best you will find outside of the resort itself. Literally across the road. The staff at reception were attentive and polite. The continental breakfast at captain kidds next door was more than ample. Scrambled eggs, tasty sausages and potatoes for those that like a cooked brekkie. There were also Bagels pastries fruits and cereals. Ok it might get a bit boring if you are staying a week but for us, it was all we needed to set us up for the big day
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us while you and your family visited the Disney Resort.  We greatly appreciate your compliments and your recommendation of our property.  It was a pleasure to read about your experience with us.  We hope you will return to The States and visit us again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: So disappointing in many ways, would not recommend anyone staying here.
Summary: We travel to Disneyland frequently since we live in San Diego and have annual passes. We are grandparents and travel with our children and grandchildren. We have stayed at several properties over the last 8 years and this property was the most disappointing place we have ever stayed at, not just in Anaheim, but in any of our travels.   Bookings, rooms, food, parking, and other services were very poor quality and the final straw was when I tried to talk to someone to get  try and recover a very bad experience, I was given a standard reply (probably been given many times before) that it is what it is and there was nothing they were willing to do.   We ended up missing several hours of Disneyland park time and ended up going home early because of the stress that was caused by the
Manager Response: I am very sorry you did not enjoy your stay with us.  I do understand you were disappointed that we could not extend your parking into the evening.  Our check out time is 11 am with a courtesy parking extension until 3 pm.  With our parking being limited, we do need to ensure that our arriving guests have a place to park.  We truly wish we could let our departing guests park longer than the extend time. Unfortunately our parking lot is not large enough to accommodate Disney parking as well as hotel guests.  I do also apologize if there was a discrepancy with your rate.  It does not appear this was brought to our attention.  You did receive the AAA rate and were charged the 17% tax plus the parking fee.  This is all listed on confirmations that are sent to you.  We do ask you to confirm the rate at check in.  We also confirm charges at check out.  These steps are taken to avoid or catch any errors or mistakes.  Please contact us so we can clear up any possible issues. Again I am very sorry you did not enjoy your stay and that we were not able to resolve the parking situation to your satisfaction.  Please feel free to contact me if you would like to discuss this further.  Kelly Laimana Front Office Manager

Summary: Stayed here for one night recently and perfect for a Disneyland stay!  Checked in by 1pm(can check in as early as Noon) and was able to just walk across the street and into the parks.  Parking is only $10 and covers from check till 3pm when you check out, or at least when it's the next day.  Really helped since we finally got up early to get the Cars Fast Pass.  The next day we juts went back to the car before 3pm and moved it to one of the Disney parking lots.  Since most passes now include free parking(or at least when bought via AAA) it was super convenient.  Rooms are comfortable enough, clean though a little on the old side for decor.  Stay includes free breakfast at the buffet place across the street so toast, cereal, eggs.  Nothing special but I didn't mind it at all.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.  I am very pleased to read that you enjoyed your stay.  I would just like to clarify a couple things for anyone reading.  Check in is at 3 pm.  Earlier check in is based strictly on availability.  Check out is at 11 am but we do extend the parking until 3pm at no charge as a courtesy to our guests.  Our breakfast does include toaster waffles, scrambled eggs, sausage, ham, potatoes, pastries, muffins, bagels and cream cheese, toast, yogurt, 4 types of cereal, oatmeal, 3 kinds of fresh fruit, juice, coffe, hot chocolate, milk, and tea.  Again, thank you for your review and we hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Not worth the horrible customer service! Park Vue or desert is a better choice
Summary: I am an annual passholder so we frequently stay in the Anaheim/disney area. This hotels location is all it has going for it. Te front staff night manager is just horrible. Ruined out stay I complained because they ran out of parking and had us park at a nearby hotel. When we went for our vehicle it was smoked in...ashes everywhere. We had our 3 year old daughter with us and the smell was unbearable. There are several hotels directly across the street. Park Vue or Dessert are better choices and very accommodating
Manager Response: I would like to apologize that we did not exceed your expectations.  Your reservation was changed after the cancellation policy however as a courtesy we allowed you to change your dates.  When called again to change the dates back we did allow it again, as a courtesy.  However the stipulation was made and noted by the supervisor that parking would not be available for your stay and you would have to park offsite if you wished to change your dates.  Due to limited parking I did enforce the off site parking.  As far as smoking in your car, I do know the owner of the valet company strictly prohibts anything of that kind.  It has been mentioned to him so he can address the issue.   Again I am sorry you did not enjoy your stay with us.  Perhaps you will give us another chance so you can experience the service for which our guests continuously return.  Thank you and take care,

Summary: The hotel is right across the street from Disneyland. The rooms are spacious and well laid out.  It was clean and the staff were accommodating and pleasant.   Was a solo traveler this trip and felt a little uncomfortable heading to my room at night but that probably has more to do with me than the hotel itself.  I arrived early so they held my bags so I could do a fully day/2 park touring.  I returned well into the evening and had a perfect nights sleep on comfy beds.   I would certainly return here with my family should we ever venture cross country again!  The only thing I would not do is eat the restaurant again....go to the IHOP next door.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your trip to Disney.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us.  I hope you enjoyed your time in the Disney Resort and hope you and your family are able to come here soon for a visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: A perfect place to stay near Disneyland.
Summary: This hotel is directly across the street from the entrance to Disneyland.  It is closer to the park than the Disney properties.  If you have little ones and need a place for an afternoon nap or a snack or to grab a jacket, this is the perfect place to stay.  The room was clean and had plenty of beds for our four kids.  It is a little noisy with kids running around early in the morning to make it to Disneyland but that is what you would expect staying so close to the park.  The breakfast at Captain Kidd's next door is abysmal.  Plan on paying for food elsewhere or bring your own and stash it in the in room fridge but do not eat the included breakfast.  Overall this was a perfect place for my family to stay to visit Disneyland.  The room was not fancy but was clean and had
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and sharing your experience.  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay with us.
