If you wouldn't mind, we would like to hear what you did not like about the breakfast.  We do serve Toaster waffles, scrambled eggs, sauasage, ham, potatoes, pastries, donuts, bagels and cream cheese, muffins, toast, yogurt, 4 types of cereal, oatmeal, 3 different fresh fruits, juice, coffee, milk, tea, and hot chocolate. We do thank you for your compliments and look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Location, but very poor in standards
Summary: We arrived for 1 night before our flight back to the UK. The Check in staff were very knowledgeable and helpful. The rooms on the other hand were horrible, dark, musky smell and the decor needs brightening.  Location is obviously very good if you want to this for Disney, We were most disappointed with the rooms, would we stay here again unfortunately no. These rooms were nothing compared to the ones at Best Western International Drive, Orlando.
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for staying with us.  I am sorry you did not enjoy your stay.  Your comments are greatly appreciated.  We do like hearing from all of our guests so we know where we need to improve.  Perhaps you will give us another chance if you come back into the area.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: If you are here for Disneyland, the location can't be beat. Nothing like just walking across the street to your bed after a long day at the parks, or being able to quickly run back to the room for a sweatshirt in the evening. The front desk staff was wonderfully friendly and helpful. For these two reasons, we will look at this hotel again if coming for DL.  If you're not here for Disneyland, look farther afield.   Parking was horrid - the spots are tiny, so large SUV's take up about one and a half spaces, leaving you to try to wedge in between. There is breakfast provided in the restaurant next door. The food was ok (pretty standard), but, like the parking lot, there just wasn't enough room for everyone and it was a bit tough to get a seat.  Our room faced the pool, and even on
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.  We do know you have a number of choices to choose from while in the area.  I would like to thank you for your compliments and we do hope to see you again soon.  Just so you are aware when making your next reservation, the rooms around the pool are our rooms with two full size beds.  To avoid that area a different room type would need to be reserved.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: THE RIGHT HOTEL AT THE RIGHT LOCATION
Summary: My family visited Disneyland/California Adventure again this year and again we stayed at the BW Park Place Inn.  We stayed for a week the first week of June 2013.  It is located right across the street from the main entrance to the parks and makes it so nice at the end of a long day to only have a few steps to walk to get to our rooms.  We booked two connecting double queen/sofa bed units and they were great. (just as last year)  The rooms are large and very comfortable, with large counter on the sink.  The beds are very good and we all slept like we were at home.  The A/C works well and is pretty quite and the internet access is very good and fast.  The pool and spa are nice and well maintained and the chemical levels of both are always in proper balance and with in the
Manager Response: Thank you for returning to the Best Western Plus Park Place Inn.  I am very pleased that you enjoyed your stay once again.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We look forward to your return visit in 2015.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This is my 3rd visit. I always love the location to disneyland. The rooms are clean, beds are great and they offer a descent free breakfast. Would I stay there on a romantic get away with my husband? Not! But when I am hitting the parks with my family this place is perfectly priced and you can't get any closer.
Manager Response: Thank for returning to the Best Western Plus Park Place Inn.  We do enjoy having you and your family as our guests.   Thank you for your compliments.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Our first stay but not our last
Summary: We stayed the entire last week of May, 6 nights total. We have stayed at most of the properties on Harbor Blvd but this was our first stay at this hotel.  We were so very pleased at the proximity to the crosswalk to main gate (you really can't be closer!) and the free breakfast was better than we expected.  In the past we stayed at Hojos for their free parking, but the walk is atrocious at the end of a long day and inconvenient for mid-day naps.  Also we have stayed next door at the Park Vue for the proximity to the gate and the free breakfast, but the breakfast there was not nearly as good as BWPlus PPI.  The parking at BWPlus Park Place Inn was tight and $10 per night, but when we factored in the free breakfast and proximity to the gate, we quickly decided this hotel is our
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.  There are definitely many hotels to choose from.  I am very pleased you found us and will be coming back to stay with us.  It is wonderful reading that you enjoyed our proximity to Disneyland and the ammenities our hotel offers.I am glad you enjoyed the breakfast.  We did just recently add several items to improve the variety of our breakfast offerings.  We greatly appreciate you comments and compliments and look forward to seeing you again in November  Thank you and take care

Summary Heading: Close to disneyland and affordable price
Summary: Hotel room is ok size. It's clean and breakfast is next door in the captain kidds restaurant. Pool is small area.  The hotel just across disneyland , it take 10 mins to walk to the enterace of disneyland or california adventure. For the price it is a good hotel :)
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for reviewing our property.  I hope you had an enjoyable time during your visit to the Disney Resort Area.  We hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Sooo convenient, great choice for Disneyland!
Summary: We stayed four nights here as we visited Disneyland and are happy we did.  The location is just so convenient.  It was great to be able to easily go back to the hotel room, rest up a bit, and return to the attractions without paying the high prices of the Disney hotels.  Don't be discouraged by the renovations taking place at the hotel.  The construction noise was not a problem for us.  In fact, most of the noise we heard from from gleeful little ones excited to go to Disneyland!  The room was large, clean and comfortable.  It was nice having the big TV, mini fridge, and microwave in the room.  The included wifi worked well.  The included breakfast was quite good overall.  We would definitely recommend this hotel for Disneyland.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate you staying with us and sharing your experience.  I am very pleased you enjoyed the ammenities of the hotel and the location.  Thank you for your compliments and recommendation.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Our family was meeting to go to Disneyland, Universal Studios, Sea World and other places the last week of May.  We were able to buy our tickets at his hotel for all these places. We got adjoining rooms; one for my older son and wife and one for myself; my younger son and his 13 yr.old daughter.   We each had separate clean & comfortable beds, which is hard to find in other hotels - the couch area was set up to add privacy for the person sleeping in that area.  I liked that the tub/shower and stool were in one area and the sink was outside of that area - large counter space for all the things you have (with two females in one of the rooms).  The hotel is right at the entrance walkway to Disneyland - can't beat that.  The included breakfast was great - hot meat, potatoes, eggs,
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us, for your compliments and recommendations.  I really do enjoy reading when our guests have had a wonderful stay.  It lets me know what we are doing correctly to provide our guests with the most enjoyable and relaxing stay possible.  The city pass that you purchased for the three theme parks is definitely convenient and a good value.   I hope you enjoyed your time at all the parks.   I do hope we will see you and your family again soon.  Thank you and take care

Summary Heading: Closer to Disneyland then the Disney Resort! Cheaper too!
Summary: We took a cab for $35 from the airport to this hotel and it is the best place to stay if you are going to Disneyland.  The walk to the resort is right across the street and shorter than if you stayed at the Disneyland resort on property!  The rooms here are clean and comfortable.  They are in the middle of construction unfortnantely so it was more difficult to get around the lobby.  But we made great friends with the security guards!  The breakfast was hosted over at a resturant next door.  It was not bad either.  And we normally had the free breakfast then lunch at Disney and Dinner (late) at Denny's  DO NOT GO TO THE I-HOP!  the I-Hop which is also next to the hotel has jacked their prices up almost double.  Got to the Denny's about two more doors down!  They are great and if
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  I will definitely share your statement with Sonia.  I am pleased you were able to enjoy our location and ammenities. Thank you for your patience with our new hires.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care

Summary: At first, I was nervous about staying here. We frequently visit both Disneyland and Disney World, and we always stay at Disney hotels. Being on a smaller budget this trip, we decided to give it a try. We stayed in the mini suite the last week of May 2013. We were very pleasantly surprised. The room and bathroom were VERY clean. The bathroom had nice tile and new fixtures. The sink was on the outside of the bathroom and had a nice long countertop. The beds were clean and really comfortable. We had plenty of towels. The room had a microwave and a refrigerator. The Tropicana Inn (right next door) has a mini mart with a coffee shop that stays open until 1:00am. The mini mart has a great selection of food and toiletries. We were even able to buy butter and milk. We bought water there
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the chance and staying with us.  I am very pleased we exceeded your expectations and that you were able to relax and enjoy your stay with us.  We are definitely excited to hear that you will now choose us over Disney properties.  That is a wonderful compliment.  We look forward to seeing you during your next vist to the Disney Resort.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: It is right across the street from Disneyland entrance. You can't be any closer than this hotel. It is very clean. My husband said they were even scrubbing the pool shower first thing in the morning. Comfortable beds, plenty of towels, large refrigerator, microwave, and big tv. Computer on-site to print boarding passes, etc. Very nice convenience store next door (The Cove) with good food options and a cafe in back. Excellent lattes here. The free breakfast was ok. Let's just say, we went the first day and not the second day. It'll do, but really not that tasty in my opinion. Hotel was getting facade re-done this week, but no construction noise at all (new stucco & paint).  Good choice for Disneyland vacation.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience.  It is wonderful to read that you were able to enjoy our ammenities as well as the benefits of our location.  Thank you for your reveiw and we hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Perfect place to stay for disneyland
Summary: We stayed here in May 2013 and had a wonderful time.  This hotel was chosen based on the reviews from trip advisor.  Even though they were doing construction in the front of the hotel, it did not affect us in any way.   Rooms:  We loved the rooms.  Despite what other reviewers call "motel style" rooms, I actually thought they were very nice.  It was roomy, clean, and very quiet.   Service:  I unfortunately got a really bad toothache on the trip and needed to go to an emergency dentist.  The staff helped my husband get me to a dentist within an hour!   Proximity to DL:  You cant get any closer.  We have a four year old and we sent her back to the hotel with my mother in law for naps, while we continued to explore DL.    They had a little laundry room and parking was not a
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us.  I am very pleased to read that the construction did not affect your stay.  I am very sorry you had trouble with your tooth while you should be enjoying Disneyland but, glad we were able to get you help.  We definitely look forward to another visit from you.  A hui hou. Malama pono.

Summary: We took my mom down for her 70th birthday (and 10th visit to Disneyland) in April. We choose this motel for what we read in reviews as it close proximity to the park, and it turns out that short of staying in a Disney hotel, it is the closest to the entrance. Super convenient, really helpful staff, older but very tidy rooms, all helped make it a great time had by all.  The breakfast buffet for those that are looking to have one provided (I personally don't go to Disneyland with high hopes for good food) is adequate. Likely a Denny's type quality, with a decent selection I would say, especially given it is free. All in all I would certainly stay there again if price and proximity were the two priorities!!
Manager Response: Happy Birthday to your mom.  Thank you for you compliments and for choosing to stay with us.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and hope your mom had a wonderful birthday.  We definitely hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Very Convenient if you are visiting Disney Land. Rooms are clean. BF is average, can be improved. Staff shows courtesy. Will recommend this place. Cost is bit on higher side but can be booked early to get better rates.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience.  We do greatly appreciate you recommending us and hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We have stayed in this Inn several times because of the convenience of walking a few hundred metres to the entrance of Disneyland.  We were unsure whether to continue to stay here because the free full breakfast was lacking in nutritional choices.  However we gave it one more chance and were pleasantly surprised by the breakfast.  Scrambled eggs, sausage, ham and whole wheat toast were new since last time, making the breakfast a little healthier.  The rooms and service were great as well so I'll be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and giving us another chance.  We have been working to improve our breakfast for our guests and I am very happy to see that you enjoyed what we have added.  We do also greatly appreciate the fact that you are a frequent guest and with the added items you will continue returning to our hotel.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: location location location directly across from the transit area of disney, cant get any closer off property! front desk was pleasant. housekeeping had the room cleaned by 3 pm during our stay. front of hotel is currently under renovation, a little disruptive but no big deal. ac does make a little noise, did not bother us. rooms seem a little dated, but there was lots of space (we had two twin beds). liked the seperation of bathroom/vanity area. had no issues with the room so cannot comment on service. all in all, great stay for disneyland! thanks BW
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us.  I am very pleased that you had a great stay with us and that the construction did not really bother you.  Fortunately it should be completed shortly.  We do hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We recently spent two nights  and we will definitely go back - very clearn - ALL staff were very accommodating.  Air Condition was not working - called and had a new unit in place within 30 minutes.  Highly recommend  - Breakfast was wonderful
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments and compliments.  I am very pleased to read that you had a fantastic stay.  Thank you for staying with us and I hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We recently stayed at this hotel for 8 nights!  Location is great. across the street to Disney. There is a small convenience store next door which is OK for missed items, but we walked across the street to the Disney transportation center, jumped on the ART (#1) down to Target to stock our room on day 1. The hotel has a small gift shop with a few items as well.  Breakfast is next door, upstairs at Captin Kidd's , Food was adequate to fill us up for a day at the park. Hot items-scrambled eggs,waffles,potatoes,they rotated sausage and ham on a daily basis. We never had any issues finding a table, did have to wait for a few minutes one day, but there are alot of tables. decor is run down, Staff did a great job keeping up with food and cleaning tables quickly to turnover. ( we would
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for your comments and compliments.  It is a pleasure reading about guests enjoying their stay with us and being able to take advantage of all our hotel and location has to offer.  I do apologize for the stains in your room as well as the sock and shoe under the bed.  This is not acceptable and it will be addressed.  We do hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: You can't get any closer to the Disneyland entrance gates than this hotel!  You can go between your room and Disneyland in no time at all, which is great if you want to go back for a quick nap to re-energise... not that we did!  After a flight delay, we didn't check in until 4am... but no problem at all, the duty manager was polite and understanding and checked us in quickly for our 4 night stay.  Our room (ground floor, facing parking) was large, spotlessly clean, tidy and well equipped.  The shower was good and hot, there were plenty of towels and toiletries (replenished daily).  Lighting was good and the air conditioning, though a little noisy, worked well.  There was a large screen TV but we never used it... we were too busy over the road at Disneyland!  The king bed was
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for sharing your experience.  I am very glad we were able to get you in effortlessly after a very long trip to get here.  It is a pleasure to read that your stay was enjoyable and comfortable.  I do apologize for the early morning houskeeper noise.  We will ask them to keep it down in the morning as they are getting ready for their shift.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  The information you provided will help us to continue improving our customer service.  We do hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Across the street from Disneyland!!!!! Literally!!
Summary: For they pricee you can't beat walking across the street to Disneyland, its nice after a long day at the parks as well. Free parking would be nice though. But hey nothings ever perfect. Would stay again. Security 24/7 is comforting, staff is friendly an very helpful. Rooms were nice had a updated look. Flat screen TV. Bathroom was new tile "granite" counter tops. Hot was hot when it needed to be. Carpet could use a shampoo but would stay again. A/C an fridge worked great.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and writing a review of our property.  Your comments as well as your compliments are greatly appreciated.  Thank you for letting us know what made your stay enjoyable and what we can work on to better serve our customers.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Best stay I've ever had on Harbor!
Summary: I was at Disneyland for a mommy and me trip and needed something close and safe. This fit the bill and included breakfast for an excellent price. I did not have a car and had the "no car" discount.  When we arrived, the front desk was very nice and helpful. They stored our luggage for us so we could go strait to the parks, since the gates had just opened.   When we finally arrived back to our room, 5 minutes after leaving the gate of Disneyland, I was very surprised it was so big and nice! I've stayed at 7 other motels on Harbor and my room has never been so clean, quiet and big! We had a double queen room on the 2rd floor, directly above the pool. Even with kids in the pool it was quiet.   We were very grateful for the breakfast in the morning. There were plenty of choices and
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your wonderful review.  I am very happy that we could make your mommy and me trip a wonderful experience.  Thank you for your compliments.  We have recently expanded our breakfast, so I am very pleased to read that you enjoyed it.  It is also a pleasure to read that we are now you choice over other hotels in the area.  We definitely look forward to having you stay with us again,  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Pretty bad... There are better choices
Summary: I picked this hotel based on it's proximity to the main gates at Disneyland. I've stayed in at least five different "value" hotels in this area at one time or another and this is the only one that I would not return to again. The staff was overall grumpy, the AC in the room didn't work right and it was either freezing or sweltering. To top it off, the included breakfast was WAY overclouded and unappetizing. With so many other choices, stay somewhere else.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and letting us know about your experience.  I do apologize we did not meet your expectations.  I do hope we had the opportunity to take a look at and fix your AC unit for you.  I am also sorry you did not enjoy the complimentary breakfast.  We do try to have something for everyone by offering waffles, scrambled eggs, sausage, ham, potatoes, yogurt, 3 varieties of fresh fruit, pastries, toast, bagels and cream cheese, 3 types of cereal, oatmeal, juices, coffe, milk, tea, and hot chocolate.  I also apologize that you did not experience the service from our staff for which we are so often complimented.  I do hope you will give us another chance to provide you with the quality service our guests have come to expect.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Rooms were ok but nothing special for the money and the 10 Dollars extra for the parking is way out off line  They totaly play on the Disney thing but disney they are not.  The parking was totaly banal spots where hard to get if you can find one and extremly narrow.  Also every morning at 7AM the trash truck shows up with the constant beep beep for 15 minutes . Ill never will stay there again
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write about your experience.  All comments help us improve our service to our guests.  I do apologize for the noise from the trash trucks.  Unfortunately we did have to temporarily relocate the dumpsters due to construction, to provide the trucks easy access.  The $10.00 parking fee is actually one of the lowest in the area.  Others range from $17 - $25.  I am very sorry you did not enjoy your stay.  Perhaps when the construction is done you will give us another chance to serve you.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We recently stayed six nights at BWPPI while on a family holiday to Disneyland. The location cannot be beat, directly across from the entrance to Disneyland which is a major plus after a long day and half the night walking around the parks. Our room faced over the pool & we were very happy with it.  I thought there was plenty of room for our family of four & quite a bit of luggage. Breakfast next door was a great start to the day & there was always plenty of food including fruit. Although there was alot of construction happening at the front of the property this did not effect us in any way.  We highly recommend BWPPI & will be staying here next time we visit Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.  We greatly appreciate you sharing your experience through your review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed our recently expanded breakfast and that the construction did not effect your stay.  Thank you for recommending us.  We look forward to having you stay with us on your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: First they were not truthful. Their website clearly states their lobby is under construction from 9:00 am til 4:00pm, when each of the 4 days we were there the noise began at 7:30. The construction is also not limited to the lobby. They jack hammered all the way along the sidewalk. Disneyland doesn't open til 10:00 and some mornings we would have liked to relax longer. Second the area near the bathroom sink smells like rotten eggs, so whoever sleeps on the bed closest gets to enjoy that. Third, the toilet got clogged and when we called they never came, had to call again the next morning. Fourth, if you do not stay on the 3rd floor, it is very noisy with people above you. One advantage is the close proximity to the park, just have to walk across the street
Manager Response: I would first like to thank you for sharing your experience with us.  I am sorry you did not enjoy your stay. However we were quite truthful.  The following is copied directly from our website (Starting January 2013 to June 2013, the hotel will be making improvements to the lobby, the entryway and the front exterior of the property. These enhancements will be from 9am to 4pm daily).  There would be no construction at 7:30 am.  Trash trucks do arrive about that time and I do understand that the beeping can be loud. However, unfortunately we have no control over their arrival time.  I am sorry for the trouble you experienced with your room.  I do wish I had been made aware so I could have taken care of it for you.  There were a number of options available including moving your room or finding you a hotel that would have been more suitable to your needs.  Please feel free to contact me.  I do hope you will give us another chance to serve you.  Construction is scheduled to be completed in June.  Thank you and take care. Kelly Laimana

Summary: 8 of us stayed here for a week, 4 kids 11, 8, 6, and 5 months and 4 adults.  It was absolutely perfect for our Disneyland vacation!   Pro's: 1.  This is as close as you can get to the entrance, without paying the huge hotel dollars at the Disneyland hotels.  No waiting for shuttles and an easy afternoon walk back to rest.  We also had a couple of other tours, and the busses pick you up right in front of this hotel.  2.  We had adjoining 2 Queen suites on the third floor.  They had lots of room for our large group and all of our bags.  3.  The rooms were very clean.  The cleaning staff did a great job and never interrupted us! 4.  The continental breakfast next door.  It had everything you needed to start your day!  It had hot food, cereal, bagels, toast, and muffins.  The staff
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for your very detailed review.  It is greatly appreciated when your likes are clearly written as well as what we can improve on.  I am very pleased that you enjoyed your stay.  Thank you very much for your compliments.   We very much look forward to having you stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We stayed at the Best Western Park Place Inn for our family trip to Disneyland.  The front of the hotel was under construction, but there was no extra noise.  It was only a little inconvenient because you had to walk around the side to get to the rooms.  We stayed in a room with two double beds and the beds were very comfortable.  There was a small table and chairs also, which was great because we went back to the hotel to eat lunch each day.  The pool is a little small, but the kids loved it anyway.  The room was very clean when we arrived and the room was cleaned well each morning after we left.  The free breakfast next door had lots of choices, but was a little crowded and the food was only average.  But definitely better than just a continental breakfast - it filled us up
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and sharing your experience.  I am very pleased the room and the breakfast met your needs while you were with us.  Construction will be completed in June, so the access will be much easier.  We do look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I am single mom who was looking to take my 6yr old daughter to Disneyland by myself. Traveling from Arizona, I needed convenience. This hotel was PERFECT! Excellent location (literally across the street from the main entrance of the the Disneyland resort), reasonable parking fees, with my AAA discount I saved $50, and the room was nicer than what I was expecting (a couch and coffee table too!). The pool/hot tub were clean and the area was clean (swept) and well maintained (plenty of pools towels) also. I literally pulled in, parked my vehicle, checked in (seamlessly-great staff!), unpacked and had nothing else to worry about ... my daughter and I had a wonderful extended weekend in Disneyland. We did not eat at the buffet because we ate cereal in the room and was off to play! I
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and for sharing your experience.  I am very happy we were able to make your trip with your daughter comfortable and hassle free.  We definitely look forward to having you stay with us again.  We would love to meet the Grandparents.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Looking forward to returning after the construction is done! Really liked the full breakfast - nice to have a good meal before going into Disneyland for the day. Room was comfortable and spacious. Thanks!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review of our property.  It is wonderful to read you enjoyed the expanded breakfast.  We do look forward to having you back with us.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This place is very clean, and rooms are a very nice size.  Close walk to Disneyland and California Adventure Park right over the bridge.  The complitmentary buffet at Captain Kidd's, however, was horrible.  Coffee was not even drinkable.  My husband said the milk for the cereal smelled bad, and the eggs were disgusting.  Consider breakfast somewhere else!!  The price of the room was very reasonable, and beds were very comfortable.  Besides for the breakfast, I highly recommend this place.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and listing your recommendation of our property.  I am sorry you did not enjoy the breakfast.  We will definitely look into the coffee issue and find out what happened with the milk and eggs.  I am very pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us.  I hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: After reviewng the dozens of choices available across the street from Disneyland, we chose the Park Place Inn.  Our priorities were location, onsite laundry, in room fridge and microwave, free breakfast and pool.  As others have said, you cannot beat this hotel for location.  And I would say, having walked around the Downtown District, this hotel is probably closer to the gates than either of the Disneyland Hotels.  Halfway to the gates one morning, I decided to go back to the hotel for our jackets....I hesitated going because we were almost at the gates but I was in our room and back within 5 minutes...and we needed the jackets as the weather had turned cooler that day.  The HoJo down the road was another consideration for us but after a long day at both parks, our little 5
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write such a detailed review of your stay with us.  I am very pleased to read that you greatly enjoyed our location and the ammenities that we offer.  I will check the washing machines because they should be the same price with the standard rate 1.25 and a super wash at 1.50.  I do apologize for the lack of towels in the pool area.  We will ask housekeeping to check and stock the pool towels more frequently.  Thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Directly across the street from the Disney entrance.  The lobby was inviting and clean, with a nice fireplace.  Check-in was prompt and friendly.  The breakfast buffet was plentiful and a good variety for most anyone.  I'm a vegetarian, and there was plenty for me to choose from (fruits, cereals, yogurts, etc.).  It was kind of crowded and noisy, but that is to be expected.   The room was clean and standard - nothing special, but certainly fine.  After all, if you are visiting Disneyland, you aren't in the room much anyway.  We did appreciate the fact the neighboring rooms seemed relatively quiet - not paper thin walls like a lot of places.  There is a nice little convenience store next door, and local restaurants within walking distance.  Overall, I'd stay there again.  If you
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to share your experience.  We do try to have something available for everyone to choose from at breakfast.  I am very pleased you were able to find enough filling options.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We do hope you will stay with us again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We are a family of 5 (3 teenagers) and we had plenting of space in our room with the pull out bed.  The room was clean and the beds were fairly comfortable.  The breakfast in the morning really helped start the day off right.  The food was buffet style and there was plenty of it.  The boys made 2-3 egg sandwhiches every morning.  This hotel is very convenient.  We were able to walk to our hotel for coats in the evening and were not gone long at all.  The current construction closed off one side of the hotel, but that did not bug us.  All in all, we had a very good experience here.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review.  It is wonderful reading that you enjoyed your stay with us.  I am very pleased you appreciated the convenience of our location and were able to enjoy the breakfast.  We do hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I'm a former cast member and I'd always heard that this hotel was great since its across the street from the Disneyland. So When my boyfriend and I went in December we thought it would be a great place to stay...boy were we Wrong. We got there late at night and the young man  and the desk knew Nothing! He as very rude. He asked for a credit card and said nothing about them charging it at the time. The breakfast was so terrible. Un-eatable and not worth the walk. The second day they called to tell us they needed another credit card and would deactivate our card until we brought them another one. We were at the park trying to enjoy our vacation we had saved for Years!  We took them another card and they charged that one as well ($400 on each card) and also deactivated the cards!
Manager Response: I do apologize you did not enjoy your stay and were unhappy with the rate increase from what you originally reserved.  However the Best Western Employee Discount is reserved for current Best Western Employees.  The first authorization to the card was in place until you provided us proof of employement.  When it was determined that you were no longer a Best Western employee we did deactivate your keys and give you the option of paying the full price for your stay or checking out and finding a different hotel to stay in.  The second authorization was completed upon your agreement to staying at the standard rate.  Please feel free to contact me if you would like to discuss this further.  Kelly Laimana Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Great location, very close to Disneyland
Summary: We stayed at this hotel on our trip to Disneyland, location is excellent, breakfast is amazing! However front desk stuff could use a little more training! We arrived late and were tired already, received keys from the lady that thought she knew all and tried to boss around 2 guys that were at the front desk! Keys did not work for our room, I went back she redid them again well they did not work again!!! Third time to the lobby lady tried them again, well she did not write correct hotel room on our key envelope, and while the key were programmed for the correct room the room we were written to go to did not match! Again guys were very pleasant, knowing all lady... Not so much...
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience.  We appreciate your comments and letting us know where we can improve service.  We hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I loved being right across the street from the Disney entrance.  Especially great after being in the parks all day and you're exhausted.  Not the newest or fanciest, but clean enough, plenty of towels and has the all important refrigerator.  Will be a lot better when they are through with the construction blocking the entrance.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Not bad for an older hotel/motel. It has a small lobby (friendly) and you enter rooms from outside walkways/balconies. The rooms were clean but nothing to write home about. Got a good rate by arriving without a vehicle. Parking is tight and limited. Places around here don't like vehicles. Good news is that you are right across the street from the main entrance. Probably takes longer to wait for the WALK signal at Harbour Blvd than it does to get to the gate! The free breakfast is next door at Captain Kids which is a run down restaurant. The food will fill your tummy to get started for the day and there is plenty of it but don't expect quality. The pool was always out of towels but we only soaked our feet.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and for sharing your experience at our property.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and our proximity to Disneyland.  I do apologize for the pool not being kept well supplied with towels.  We hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Superb location for a Disney Good Neighbour hotel
Summary: This hotel gets "5 Stars" for location being directly across from the pedestrian/public transit entrance to the Disney complex. The rooms are very large, spotlessly clean, quiet, free Wifi, friendly staff, comfy beds and well serviced by housekeeping. The free breakfast is OK - helpful without being brilliant. If I had one complaint, it was that there was no safe in the room.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and sharing your experience.  We enjoyed having you here during your visit to the Disney Resort Area.  Thank you for your compliments and comments.  We do hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Our AAA rep suggested this motel and it was a great suggestion. If you are looking for the Hilton it is not this motel but the suites are roomy, clean and the location is right across the street from Disney without the huge cost! The staff was wonderful and the free breakfasts were good. The pool, hot tub and laundry services were a nice touch! We had three adults and two kids so one of our kids stayed on the sofa and said it was comfortable. The motel is also right by the bustop which helped with our transportation! The only negative would be all of the am garbage trucks but the staff did warn us and we planned to be up around 0630 anyway. Great find!
Manager Response: Thank you taking your AAA rep's advice and for writing a review of our property.  We enjoyed having you here.  We are very pleased you enjoyed your stay wtih us.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Couldn't be any closer to park gates than this place unless you stay at the Grand Californian (which is at least triple the price!). The rooms are nothing special; very typical "motel" style rooms with outside corridors, and dated furnishings. We stayed in a mini-suite and it had 2 queen beds and a fold-out couch. I thought the beds were pretty comfortable, but my daughter complained that they hurt her back. The carpet was a little sticky feeling and looked pretty worn. We liked their breakfast, which consisted of eggs, ham or sausage, potatoes, assorted pastry and muffins, cereal, bananas, oranges, apples, yogurt, juice, coffee and milk. A previous review mentioned the loud garbage trucks each morning and we noticed this too. I don't think there is anything they can do about
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write about your stay. I am very pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us. I do apologize for the carpet. We do have a regular carpet cleaning schedule. If the carpet is ever an issue, please let us know so we can address it for you. Thank you for letting us know about the lighting in the room. I do hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take car.

Summary Heading: Fantastic location for Disneyland, but otherwise average
Summary: Check in was prompt. Rooms are clean and the mini suites are prefect for families (2 queens and sofabed). Other than that the rooms are nothing special. Our room had a old smell like it was once a smoking room. The AC had not been running, so the room was hot and muggy. The pool is incredibly small and not inviting whatsoever. Location for Disneyland is great, but there are plenty of hotels on this strip to choose from.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write about your stay at the Park Place Inn.  I am sorry your stay was not as enjoyable as it should have been.  I hope you enjoyed your time at Disneyland.  I do thank you for staying with us.  Thank you and take care

Summary: Stayed here with our 3yr-old + 1yr-old. FANTASTIC location for access to Disneyland! Had considered Disney hotels, but this one was half the price and twice as close. 2 min walk to Main Gate. Very clean; friendly service; great breakfast included. Small grocery store next door.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us.  We greatly appreciate your compliments and comments.  We to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We had a great time at your hotel as always, but I had no idea that you were under construction. I had 3 rooms and called multiple times and no one informed me. Also I was traveling with 2 special needs kids who need to stay on a somewhat strick sleeping schedule in order to make the daytime a success. We were woken every morning by the trahmen emptying the dumpsters. Our 2 rooms were right next to the dumpsters. When I made the reservation I  requested rooms next to each other, but I guess next time I need to request not to be by the dumpsters
Manager Response: Thank you for returning to the Best Western Park Place.  We greatly appreciate you coming back.  I am sorry that you were not notified when you called.  You should have been notified when you first made the reservation with Central Reservations.  We have it on the website and the information was provided in email confirmations.  I am very pleased that you enjoyed your stay regardless of the construction and the trash pick up.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This is my favorite place to stay , when I go to Disneyland and California Adventure! It is one crosswalk and two driveways away from the entrance to the parks; Close. It is the Cleanest hotel I've stayed at across from the parks. And It is the Quietest hotel that I've stay at across from the Parks. The rooms are very well put together and updated. The staff is extra nice and helpful! It has a nice and quaint pool area. Somehow it feels more adult, but it is very kid friendly. For a quiet and comfortable nights sleep after a day of revelry at the parks this hotel is well worth the extra $20.00 a night!!! They also have an O.K. continental breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to share your comments and compliments.  We greatly appreciate sharing what you like about our hotel.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: GREAT location for family trip to Disney parks
Summary: This hotel was literally across the street from where the buses drop people who stay further from the Disney area.  It was a 3 minute walk to the entrances to Disneyland, CA and Downtown Disney.  GREAT location for a family with small kids who might need to go back to nap.  We had a room with a sofa bed, so everyone had a place to sleep.  Room was quiet.  Continental breakfast was not that fabulous, but the kids thought it was fine, and it was complimentary.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.  I am pleased you enjoyed your time here.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay at Disney
Summary: We were glad we chose this hotel - the location simply cannot be any better! Our room was clean and quiet. We were on the second floor and heard some footsteps above us one morning, but generally enjoyed the silence. The pullout bed was ... well, a pullout bed. It worked for the kids, but wouldn't be very comfortable for adults. The other beds were fine. The pool area isn't large, but worked fine for cooling off.  A couple of annoyances - the door locks were pretty unreliable, taking several attempts to open. Also, even though it was cool outside at night our room got stuffy even with the AC on, and we often kept the door open for 15 minutes upon returning from our day.   The complimentary breakfast was good - scrambled eggs, sausage, cereal, bagels, fruit etc. The free
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and sharing your experience.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay at our hotel and I do hope you will stay with us again.  I do apologize that your room did not feel cool upon entry.  When walking a considerable amount of time outside in cool air it will often feel stuffy when first entering a room.  Especially when it is cooler than lowest setting of 65 degrees.  We recommend turning on the fan to draw in the outside air.  If this is not working we could check the AC unit to make sure it is functioning correctly.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.   Take care.

Summary: It was so close to Disneyland, right across the street. We were able to return to the room for a break and then go back.   We enjoyed the hot tub after a long day at disneyland.  The continental breakfast was more than we expected.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and for your ratings.  I am extremely pleased you enjoyed our location, hot tub and breakfast.  Thank you for sharing your visit with us and we hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: My daughter and I stayed at the Best Western Plus Park Place Inn-mini suites. We had an awesome stay. Loved being across from the pedestrian entrance to Disneyland, it only took like 5 minutes to walk across the street, lots of restraunts in walking distance, and i am very picky about walking long distance. Room was very clean, front desk very nice, even checked us in before check in time. I couldn't comment on the breakfast over next door at Captain Kids since we either went to IHOP ( next door) or Millie's (4 doors down.) The only bad thing i could find at this hotel in the 4 days we stayed here was the people above us was very annoying stomp, stomp. But loved this hotel and will be back for sure.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience.  We love feedback from our guests so we can continue improving our service.  I am extremely pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and our proximity to Disneyland.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Spacious room, VERY short walk to DLR gates.
Summary: Once again, location can't be beat! This is our 3rd stay at Park Place Inn, and our first in a mini suite. The room has 2 queen beds, a sofa bed, fridge, microwave and a flat screen TV. The beds were comfortable, and with the amount of pillows provided, we were able to find one that was comfortable also.  Enjoyed having the larger beds in the suite.  The sofa bed left a lot to be desired though. Very thin and saggy. We ended up just using the bedding on the couch itself for our daughter. For our family, the extra cost of the mini suite just wasn't wort it.  Liked having a mini mart next door that has a great selection of beer and wine.  Also walked two doors down to Pizza Press for a good late night meal.
Manager Response: Thank you for returning to the Best Western Plus Park Place Inn.  Your return visits are greatly appreciated as well as your review.  Thank you for sharing information about your stay.  I do apologize for the sofa bed.  Please let us know next time there is ever anything that is making your stay less comfortable.  We will do everything we can to fix it.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Extremely convenient for the location and price
Summary: This hotel is perfect for families visiting Disneyland. The location couldn't be better since it is directly across from the main entrance to Disneyland! The staff were very friendly and helpful and the rooms were clean and comfortable. If you are expecting The Ritz you may be disappointed, but if you are just looking for something convenient to the park that is ideal for families you will be more than happy. The continental breakfast next door at Captain Kidd's (which is included in the rate) is more than adequate. If you are looking for a fancy breakfast, again you may be disappointed, but it is good enough to get the day started and satisfy hungry kids. I have stayed at other hotels in the Anaheim resort area and I would definitely say that it is one of the better ones in the
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us.  We understand there are numerous options to choose from.  It is wonderful to read you enjoyed your stay with us and the compliments are appreciated.  We look forward to you staying with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Everyone needs to try this hotel at least once.
Summary: You cannot beat the location . A straight shot to main gate... Although we had more than a few quirks I would like to give this hotel one more chance because of its location .   Breakfast was more than continental breakfast and rooms were clean.... Next time I will look for a better price for this hotel than the $200.00 a night .
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing information regarding your stay.  I am sorry for whatever quirks you may have experienced. We do hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We took our family of 4 (2x adults, 2x teens) for a week's vacation to Disneyland in March 2013 and stayed literally across the street from the Disney main entrance.  It took us 5 min to get from hotel room to the Disney security screening point.  We had stayed at this property about 6 years ago and it was top of the list when choosing accomodation for this trip.  Booked a mini-suite on-line @ $159/nite.  Check in (despite _very_ late arrival ... thanks Alaska Airlines) was without surprise or difficulty.  Desk staff were well dressed, friendly, and accomodating when we asked not to be assigned a room backing onto the elevator shaft.  Room was clean and odor free!!  Big screen TV worked as did wireless internet.  No plumbing problems, no bed-bugs.  Bathroom was clean, the shower
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for choosing to stay with us again and for taking the time to write such a detailed review of our hotel.  You provided us with valuable information and we thank you for your compliments and comments.  We did recently enhance our breakfast so I am very pleased that you enjoyed it. Thank you for letting us know how much you enjoyed your stay and your satisfaction in the handling of the keycard issue.  We definitely hope to see you again and thank you for your recommendation.  Thank. you and take care.

Summary: We stayed for three nights, after our first night there was an unfortunate incident of a pipe bursting in our room. While this can happen anywhere you stay, the way Best Western Park Place Inn handled it was exceptional. They not only transfered us to another room immediately, they also upgraded the room, gave us a generous discount on our total bill, had our laundry sent out and washed/dried for free, and had nice Disney items/souvenirs waiting in our new room when we got back from a fun day at Disneyland. Let me just say that when this first happened we were not "upset", it was unfortunate but luckily no electronics (ipads, cell phones, etc) were damaged, just luggage and clothes were wet. We were so excited to finally be at Disneyland that this was just a hiccup, the way the
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience at our hotel.  I am extremely pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us even with the pipe incident.  It is wonderful to see that you were still able to relax and enjoy your vacation.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated.  We do hope we will have the pleasure of you staying with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Can't Beat this Hotel for Disneyland Stay
Summary: Stayed here for three nights on a recent trip to Disneyland.  We arrived early and were allowed to check in which we greatly appreciated!  The front desk and housekeeping staff were fabulous!  The room was clean and the beds were comfortable which is more than I can say for some other hotels across from Disneyland.  We had five in our room and never had to ask for additional towels!!  It's a little thing, but the extra step taken to have enough towels in the room was greatly appreciated!  The continental breakfast was fairly standard with cereals, toast, bagels, Eggo type waffles, bananas, apples, yogurt, eggs and sausage or ham.  We did not use the pool or Jacuzzi, but both are pretty small.  We have stayed at this hotel before and would certainly do so again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us again and for sharing your recent stay.  Thank you for your compliments.  I am very pleased that enjoyed your time with us.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: You can't stay closer to Disneyland and the price is so much better than the Disney hotels!
Summary: My wife, three year old and I loved our four nights at the Park Place... It's not a classy hotel... But it is perfect after a day at the park. Breakfast is called a continental breakfast, but includes eggs, waffles, ham or sausage and cereal. Shorter walk to the Disneyland entrance than from the Disneyland Hotel! If you just plan to crash after 14 hours of park hopping then this is a wonderful choice!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.  I am very pleased that your family loved your stay here at the Best Western Plus Park Place Inn.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Would stay again and highly recommend to a friend, awesome !!!!!
Summary: Couldn't be any closer to entrance to DL. Well appointed rooms, wonderful friendly staff, free breakfast, what a bonus !!  Stayed here before and has definitely been a first choice . Great for all your needs and for all ages.
Manager Response: Thank you for returning to the Best Western Plus Park Place Inn.  It is wonderful to read that we are your first choice when coming to the area.  Thank you for your compliments.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: If you are planning on staying most of the day at the parks!!
Summary: We stayed there last weekend (march) after deciding on a last minute trip. We chose this hotel mainly because of the location. It's right on the crosswalk and less than 5 minutes from the parks.  Rooms were very clean, staff very friendly, save big $ staying in here( we usually stay on site). If you (like us) are planning on staying at the parks most of the day this is definitely a great hotel. If on the other hand you wish for a more relax atmosphere and are planning on a true Disney immersion trip, go ahead and spend the extra $ on a Disney Hotel. We'll be back :-)
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments.  I am very pleased that you have enjoyed your stay with us, especially when being used to the full Disney immersion.  We look forward to having you stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Stayed in a Minisuite room as we are a family of 5, 2 adults & 3 children 17, 14 & 11. Plenty of room, very comfortable beds & clean & tidy. Stayed on 3rd floor close to front of complex & had no noise problems. Enjoyed free breakfast at Captain Kidds restaurant next door although get there early as tables can fill quickly. Food was plentiful & filling just what you need before heading off for a full day at Disneyland. Plenty of restaurants to eat at close by as well. Great location of hotel located across the road to the entrance to Disneyland. 5min walk & we were in the park. Staff were very helpful as this was our first visit to the U.S. & answered all our questions promptly. Will recommend as a place to stay to all our friends in Australia.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience.  I hope you had a wonderful time here in the U.S.  I am very pleased we were able to provide you with a clean, comfortable, and relaxing place to stay.  Thank you for your recommendation to your friends.  We hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: The very best off property choice!
Summary: If you are going to Disneyland and want to save $$$ on your hotel, but don't want to walk very far, this is THE place for you! We've stayed here 3 times and love it. The rooms are clean & spacious, the breakfast saves time + money, and the distance is unbeatable next to the Grand Californian. The mattresses fixed my hubby's back problems, so we've contacted Serta to buy one for home. The 1 and only complaint I have is there often is nowhere to sit in the breakfast room. Book ahead of time as this hotel is popular with people who know what they're doing when it comes to Disneyland!
Manager Response: Thank you for continually choosing to stay with us.  Your wonderful recommendation is greatly appreciated.  We are currently working on the seating situation for the continental breakfast.  I am happy your husband found a mattress that has helped his back problems.  My husband has back issues as well, so I know how wonderful it must have been for him.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Great Stay! Short Walk to Disneyland
Summary: We had two rooms and both were clean and well-maintained. Bed were comfy. Free breakfast was a nice surprise, good variety of food and it was constantly replenished. Staff was friendly and made us feel welcome. Minor issue with fridge was dealt with instantly. Other than hearing the water running when adjacent rooms used the bathtub/shower, the rooms were quiet. Did hear the fireworks, which seemed to really echo throughout the hotel. Not really a problem because usually we're over at the park watching them  Hotel is located right at the crosswalk to the Disneyland Resort. Our rooms were at the very back of the hotel and it took us seven minutes to walk to the entrance, and I'm a slow walker. We parked the car and didn't move it all week. Parking lot was close to full, but there
Manager Response: Thank you sharing your experience here at the Best Western Plus Park Place Inn.  We know there are many choices for our guests and appreciate you choosing us and letting us know what you liked and what we can improve on.  Thank you for your compliments.  We look forward to you staying with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We stayed in a 2nd floor, south facing, non-pool exposure, 2 queen & sofabed room (w/accessible door to adjoining room) further off Harbor Blvd.  With a family of 6 (2 adults & 4 kids ~ under 10), this was sufficient space for our needs.  Since we traveled with a stroller, the 2 elevators made our trek easier.  The daily breakfast on the 2nd floor of Captain Kidd's was a alternating routine of waffles, toast, bagels, donuts, danishes, scrambled eggs, bacon, sausage or ham.  There was also a cereal station, fruit, yogurt and the typical beverages (e.g. juice, coffee, tea, milk).  Breakfast was not fabulous but sufficient for our daily needs.  Get there early because it fills up fast (seating is limited).  Our room was kept well by housekeeping and WIFI was good (not great ~
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write about your experience.  We greatly appreciate the detail that you provided.  It definitely helps us improve our service.  Thank you for your comments and compliments.  I am pleased you were able to make good use of our ammenities and we hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I have stayed at other hotels around Disneyland, but this is far the best. Others it is horrible to have to walk especially with small kids. Here I we were able to walk back after 5 hours at the park rest and then go back. The beds were comfortable and the rooms were clean. The only thing was the tv would get lines on it, but we didn't watch too much of that
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and sharing your experience.  It is wonderful reading that you enjoyed your stay with us.  I do apologize for the TV reception.  I know there were a couple days we were having issues with this.  The cable provider was contacted.  We hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at the Park Place Inn.  It is an easy walk to Disneyland.  The rooms were clean and comfortable although they didn't vacuum them each day.  Staying with 3 children in the room the floors really did need vacuuming.  The counter space was good, although the sink was at a weird angle close to the wall.  We didn't have a lot of interaction with the front desk or other employees,  but the interactions we did have were all pleasant.  Parking would be the one negative about this property.  The spaces are small and given it's proximity to Disneyland,  most of the guests are families, with SUV's or minivans, yet most parking spaces are for compact cars.    The free breakfast while not the caliber of similar hotels in other cities, was better than I have experienced at
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience.  We appreciate knowing what you enjoyed and what you felt we could do to improve the quality of your stay.  I am very happy that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: If you want close to Disneyland, this is it.
Summary: The last time I went to Disneyland, Regan was President, and one thing I recall, was to stay close to the front gate.  You can't get much closer than this hotel.    The rooms are big, we got two double beds, so there was plenty of room.  There was a microwave, but I don't know what you would put in it.    The desk staff were very helpful in everything you wanted to know.    Breakfast was included, and was "served" upstairs in the next door "restaurant" - Captain Kidds Family Restaurant.  I made a rule many years ago, never to eat in a restaurant with the word Family in it.  My fears were reinforced.  This place is a zoo.  I've been to many breakfast bars around the world, but have never experienced people standing up eating breakfast while still in their PJ's.  Please people,
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for taking the time to share your experience. Thank you for your comments and compliments.  We do appreciate your feedback regarding breakfast.  Hopefully you are able to make another visit much sooner than the 20-30 yrs it took for you to be able to visit this time.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel is a family favorite of ours.  Each time we go to Disneyland, we only stay here.  Can't beat the 4 minute walk to the front gate of either park.  Simply awesome.  The breakfast at Captain Kidd's isn't that great but hey, it's a free warm meal to get your day started.
Manager Response: Thank for your making us your go to hotel for visits to Disneyland.  We greatly appreciate you returning each time, especially with all the options available.  We look forward to your next stay with us.    Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Good Hotel, Great Price, Across the Street from Disneyland
Summary: The hotel is conveniently located right across the street from Disneyland. Got a good rate online. Rooms were spacious and clean, but dated. Undergoing some construction too but wasn't bad. A new fave
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your visit to Disneyland.  It is wonderful to read we have become a new favorite location.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take are.

Summary: Having stayed in several other hotels & motels while visiting the Disneyland Resort, I have come to the conclusion that, unless you are looking for luxury (or prestige), the place to stay is a motel directly across the street. This is the second time my wife and I have done so and the convenience of a place to sleep so close to the resort can’t be beat.   When you consider that most people really only need a nice bed and clean room to crash in while visiting Disney, the extras offered at this Best Western are hard to beat. The room was plenty big enough, it was nice, clean and fresh, the closet was large, it had a micro-wave oven, a mini-fridge and the bed was comfortable. Housekeeping did a good and thorough job each day and if we needed anything extra we had it within a few
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write such a detailed description of your experience with us.  We appreciate all of your comments, compliments, and recommendation.  It is definitely wonderful to read that your stay with us was the best you have had in Anaheim so far.  We definitely hope we will have the pleasure of you staying with us again.  Until next time, thank you and take care.

Summary: We checked in a few days ago. I am  happy to say this is the best place we have stayed in while in Disneyland. It very clean, no smells, rooms are good size and the beds are the BEST. The staff here are wonderful they go out of their way to make your stay wonderful, The  free breakfast is very good, If it were not for our adult children and grandchildren at home I would stay here for ever,  We have stayed in other places including the Disney resort hotels this by far is way better, Your close to everything  here, We have reservations to come back with the family in June,  The parking is not as bad as some have said. The spaces are  small we had no problem with our van, At night  you do not hear any noise , The pool is nice and clean.  Great gift shop you saved lots of money
Manager Response: Thank you choosing our hotel and for writing a wonderful review.  It is a pleasure reading about how much you enjoyed your stay.  Thank you for the great compliments.  We look forward to having you back with us in June, along with your family.  We will see you soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: You can walk into Disneyland and leave your car-great value
Summary: We found this hotel through our AAA book and boy were we glad we found it.  Staying here was much more reasonable than staying on property and we just walked into the park and left our car at the hotel.  It only took 5 minutes from our hotel and it allowed us the freedom to come and go as we pleased.    Breakfast was adequate but for the price, we didn't complain.  Get there early, it is crowded with kids.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience.  I am happy you enjoyed your stay with us.  We have recently added items to our breakfast I hope you will enjoy on your next visit. We now offer, toaster waffles, scrambled eggs, sausage or ham, potatoes, yogurt, 3 types of cereal plus instant oatmeal, different selection of pastries including bagels and cream cheese, white and wheat toast, as well as 3 types of fresh fruit, juice, coffee, and milk.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel is right at the traffic light crossing to the Maingate entrance at Disneyland.  You can't get any closer to the park outside of staying at a Disney hotel.  My husband and I had a king room and it was very roomy for the two of us with a couch, large bathroom/vanity area and there was a fridge and microwave in the room; the fridge however, froze everything we put in it.  The free breakfast at the restaurant next door was very satisfying, however, very busy as well.  We couldn't understand how they control the restaurant patronage as there was no verification that we were actually staying at the Best Western, as far as we could tell anyone could just walk in and eat there.  We thought we would get a meal voucher or something but nothing was required.  Our room was on the
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience.  I do apologize for the refrigerator freezing your food.  I do hope we were able to quickly bring you another one or adjust the settings on the one in your room. We are working on improving the internet service.  Thank you for informing us of your concerns regarding the breakfast.  This will be taken under consideration.  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Great location, excellent staff, lots of space
Summary: Stayed here for five nights to visit Disneyland, one adult and two kids.  Pros: - excellent location - crosswalk to Disneyland is just out the front of the hotel, and so was very easy to get there - and even to send an older child back alone if needed as such an easy and safe walk - about 5 minutes to the park gate from our room in the back block if lights were against us - big room (we booked the suite which was $20 more than the cheapest rooms) with lounge and lots of storage space - one of the few places where we actually managed to unpack all the clothes we had been carrying around for 6 weeks of variable weather plus souvenirs - lots of food nearby - Denny's IHOP, McDonalds, Captain Kidd's which made it very easy to get food after a long day - free breakfast - sure, not
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and writing such a detailed review of your stay with us.  The information you provided will definitely help us as we continue to try and exceed our guests expectations.  Thank you for your wonderful compliments and comments regarding our staff and amenities.  I am sorry there was an error with your reservation, but pleased it was rectified easily.  We do not have safes in the room however, if you do have something you would like to put away for the day or your stay, we do have safety deposit boxes at the front desk at no charge. If these are not large enough, we do also hold items at the front desk providing you a claim check for the item. We hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Our family, mom, dad and 2 boys have stayed here 3 times now.  It is right across the street to the entrance to disneyland and is very conveniant.  The rooms have always been clean.  Beds are comfortable and bathrooms always clean.  Housekeeping is great.  No complaints.  We always get the mini suite.  It is nice to have the microwave and fridge. The wifi is awful, but there is a computer at the front desk you can use.  We've only used the pool once and my boys had fun in it.  The breakfast is just ok, but costs nothing to fill you up before heading into the park.  I left some clothes in one of the drawers and the front desk called me at home and couriered them home to me!  Impressive.  Always a great place to stay.  Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you for writing a review of our property.  We greatly appreciate you taking the time to share your experience. Thank you for continuing to choose us as your place to stay when visiting Disneyland.  We have recently added items to our breakfast I hope you will enjoy on your next visit.  We have expanded upon our Continental Breaskfast and now offer, toaster waffles, scrambled eggs, sausage or ham, potatoes, yogurt, 3 types of cereal plus instant oatmeal, different selection of pastries including bagels and cream cheese, white and wheat toast, as well as 3 types of fresh fruit,  juice, coffee, and milk.  Breakfast hours have also been extended and it is now served from 6:30 am to 10 am. We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Love this Best Western for its location and value.  It was clean (we even saw them shampooing the carpets in several of the rooms while we were there), great housekeeping service (they cleaned one afternoon after we'd slept in and I called the front desk and requested it), they just added hot items to their continental breakfast and its right across the street from the pedestrian entrance to Disneyland. The front desk has always been super-helpful, the only downside was that they charge $10 per day for parking (per room). Didn't use the pool or the hot tub this year, but have in years past and they are nice.  Used the laundry facilities for the first time (didn't know they had them before), and they were fine. Dryers don't dry big loads very well, but did what we needed them to
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us again and sharing your experience.  I am pleased that you continue to come back and were able to take advantage of amenities you were not aware we had on prior stays.  Thank you for letting us know you liked the longer breakfast hours and the addition of the hot items.  We hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The staff was very helpful! They provided us with all hygiene products we needed when our bags were lost. Very clean breakfast area and one of the BEST continental breakfasts we have had. Location is awesome literally right across the street from the gates. Rooms are nothing special, hot tub was just barely hot enough but overall a great stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing the experience of your stay with us.  I am happy we were able to provide you with necessary items when your bags were lost.  Thank you for your compliments regarding our breakfast.  We have just recently added more items and appreciate reading that what we are now provided is appreciated by our guests.  We hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Another great stay to a magical Disney trip
Summary: This is the second time we stayed at Park Place Inn.  The first time we stayed here, we selected the hotel based on location.  However, we were so surprised on the quality of the rooms that we decided this would be our go to place.  Our second stay did not disappoint. We stayed here for 4 nights while we visited Disneyland. The rooms are very clean, safe and roomy.  We used the hot tub, which was not heated to the 102 degrees that is posted but was still a nice way to relax after a long day at the park. They now charge you $10 a night to park your car but since the location is SO CLOSE to Disney I wouldn't expect anything else.  Please keep in mind that these hotels are there for people that go to Disney.  You cant walk in thinking you will get Four Season quality rooms but
Manager Response: Thank you for returning to the Best Western Park Place Inn.  There are numerous options and we greatly appreciate hearing that you have enjoyed your stay here.  Thank you for your compliments.  I do apologize that the Jacuzzi apparently wasn't at the correct temperature.  Our maintenance staff checks it frequently to make sure it isn't getting too hot or cold.  We will make sure it is not overlooked. We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and tkae care.

Summary Heading: I would have given it more
Summary: Location is certainly the biggest plus here. Perfect for coming back to change on those cooler Anaheim nights.   What I did find troubling (but not the hotel's fault) was homeless people sleeping in front of the hotel on the ART shelter benches at night. It know it is safer for them in the tourist zone but this is the first time in my travels to see that.  The room itself was very spacious and clean. We found the mattress and pillows too hard for our liking but we were usually so tired by the time we got back we slept. The sofa was a nice touch and we had no problem with the WIFI. Housekeeping was good. The HVAC was way too loud.  The breakfast was perfect. We didn't try the hot buffet but there was more than enough to make a breakfast to fuel you for the day ahead.   We had a
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing what you liked and didn't like about your stay.  I greatly apologize for the trouble with the sink and the missed activity.  It should not have taken that long to be addressed.  The HVAC noise is something that can easily be addressed.  When they get too loud it typically means it is wearing out and can be quickly replaced within about 10 minutes.   I do hope you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: My daughter and I just returned from a 2 night stay at the Park Place. This was our 2nd stay in 7 months. The room was clean. The staff were friendly and helpful.  Can't beat the location. This is our go to hotel for Disney visits. We'll be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for returning to the Best Western Plus Park Place Inn.  We appreciate that you continue to choose us with all the options that are available.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Right across the street from the happiest place on earth!
Summary: We booked this hotel based on the location and price (thank you AAA)!  We were thrilled by the clean updated rooms and friendly staff!  And the continental breakfast included in the room did include eggs, bacon, sausage which was a bonus!  We stayed in the king bed room with pull out sofa which was spacious and worked out perfectly for us with our two children!  We will stay here again and be sure to recommend to our friends!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for sharing your experience.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and greatly appreciate your compliments.  Thank you for recommending us and we look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.
