Summary: This is the closest hotel you can get to Disney.  A short walk, less than 5 minutes to the gate.  EXCELLENT LOCATION.  Easy to get back to hotel during the day for a break from Disney.  It was perfect.  We had a room near the lobby and it was quiet.  The room itself is large (we had King bed with pullout sofa), nice big counter hear bathroom sink for all your stuff.  Lots of big drawers in dresser.  Shower was nice and hot.  Room was very clean.  I tried to make microwave popcorn and it didn't turn out,not sure why.  The fridge is a good size.  Room is dated, but we had a flat screen tv (not too many channels).  Nice big closet with 2 luggage racks.  Pillows were really bad, but that's the only real complaint about the room.  The breakfast is served from 6:30 to 9:30 (nice that
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful comments and compliments.  We geatly appreciate you taking the time to write in detail about what you liked and letting us know about the pillows.  We hope you are able to come back to Disneyland soon and visit us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Best place to stay for Disney
Summary: We had a 2 queen suite, nice big room. There was  a pull out couch besides the two beds in a small sitting area. Breakfast was great, way above average free breakfast.    Only bad thing was the walls are thin, being across the street from Disneyland there's always kids being loud.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and sharing your experience.  We appreciate hearing back from our guests.  Thank you for your compliments and ratings.  We hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We just stayed at the Best Western Park Place Plus and found it ot be again a winner of a hotel for our family trip. We were traveling with our immediate family and extended family which totaled 8 people this trip. We asked for joining rooms and were happy to see that even though they couldn't gurantee this, that we had our accomodation met.  This is a great location for anyone who wants to head to the Disney Parks and not have to pay as much to stay on property. The only problem that we had this time is when we would try to go to the free breakfast there were not enough places to sit down to eat and if you took your food back to your room it was cold and gross. Other than that, this is a good place to stay with lots of room and clean location.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us again.  I am very pleased that you enjoyed your stay.   We are currently looking at different options for improving the seating for out continental breakfast.  I am sorry you were not able to enjoy it this time.  We hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This is by far the best value for your money. We stayed here from Feb 7-13 inclusive. We had 2 room (adjoining). The service we received was excellent, no request was a problem. Rooms were made up, beds changed daily. I could not say enough about the staff at this location. The accomodations, while a little dated were clean - carpets etc. What do you expect for the price! We got a GREAT deal by watching the price and booking early. Thepool area was cleaned every day ( I actually saw them doing this). The buffet was reasonable, there was eggs, hash browns, sausage, fruit yougart, waffles, toast, oatmeal cereals etc and there was always plenty of food. This was a huge help in lowering our daily costs. The location is so close that going back to the hotl and making a quick sandwich
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Best Western Plus Park Place Inn and sharing your experience.  We greatly appreciate your compliments and comments.  I am pleased our offerings were able to help you reduce costs.  A Disneyland Vacation is definitely not cheap.  We hope to see you again soon and provide you with another great vacation stay.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: You cannot beat the location of this hotel being right across the street from the main entrance of Disneyland.  I don't think we would have been closer had we stayed on park! We arrived at the hotel a little early and we pleasantly surprised that two of our group's four rooms were ready to go so we could drop off luggage and head to the park for the afternoon.  The rooms were clean and the beds were very comfortable.  The free breakfast was good and offered both hot and cold options.  It was nice that it opened at 6:30 am as well as my kids are early risers. I will definitely consider this hotel again as it has been by far the nicest one we have stayed in on our visits to Disneyland!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us.  Your compliments are greatly appreciated and we are very pleased you enjoyed your stay.  I am glad we were able to have a couple of rooms available so you could prepare to enjoy your afternoon at the park.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at this Best Western .Having it right across the entrance to the park was very nice the only draw back was the pillows were a little frm for my liking other than that everything was tip top shape staff was helpfull and the complinetary breakfast buffet was very nice will stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing us for your Anniversary celebration.  I hope you had a wonderful one.  Thank you for your compliments and letting us know about the pillows.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Three of us stayed at the Best Western Plus Park Place Inn during the Tinkerbell Half Marathon in January. We wanted a hotel that was within walking distance to the entrance of Disneyland. The BW is right across the street and a very short stroll. Our hotel room was spacious and clean. I am giving it an overall rating of "4 stars" because the room does need updating. The carpeting, furniture, and wallpaper could use some some renovations. Also, the door to the room was very difficult to open because it would stick so a new entrance door or lock is also needed. The air conditioning unit was noisy and not very efficient. Every morning there was a breakfast buffet which contained a variety of foods and was very good. The rates are quite reasonable. The staff is extremely friendly,
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel during your participation in the Tinkerbell Half Marathon.  I am very happy that we were able to accomodate your needs and hope you enjoyed your experience participating in the marathon.  Thank you for your compliments and letting us know where we could improve.  If you stay with us again, please let us know if anything is not working properly or efficiently and we will do our best to correct it for you.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Good for off season with location, relaxation, and ease.
Summary: As a very sensitive light sleeper I honestly slept pretty good. We had a room on the 3rd floor by the elevator. I was worried that I would be up all night with elevator and foot traffic noise. This never was a problem. Maybe it was because it was super super slow during this off season at Disney or the fact that the A/C would drown out any noise. The room was cleaner (carpet was kinda fuzzy) than most motels we've stayed in and the cleaning staff set up my Minnie blanket and Minnie stuffed animal cute on our bed each day. They also left extra tea and coffee for us. Although they forgot extra lotion or restock the Kleenex. Breakfast wasn't much more than sausage, egg patties, toast, yoplait yogurt, Danishes, and muffins with only oranges, bananas, and apples for us vegan or
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience.  I am very pleased your enjoyed your stay and the proximity to the parks.  I am sorry some items were not restocked in your room and for the complaint call that you received.  We hope these things will not prevent you from staying with us again.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We were going to Disney for one day and we found this great place.well on the same street i saw at least 2 BW. So anyway i decided to pick this one. Good choice, a cross the street from Disney's entrance.  Easy to locate, great front desk service, very helpful (its a busy place), room was clean, nice and very basic BW. This was another motel style. Its huge and was full at the time. But no matter the crowd the front desk managed well. No issues at all. The breakfast was in a restaurant on the other side of the road very nice and good stuff. Plenty of food no again no issues. The price was awesome... 160$ for a motel across the street from disney.  Image paying the parking at disney...  So really i would recom that you book there to visit Disney. Free parking and a 2 minute walk
Manager Response: Thank you for your compliments of our property.  I am pleased you enjoyed you stay with us and I hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care

Summary: We stayed at this hotel/motel in January 2013 for the NAMM show and couldn't have picked a better place.  Room was comfy, clean and quiet.  Only complaint would be a couple really too-firm pillows but we found the soft ones and slept better after that.  This hotel is right across from Disneyland and we could catch the shuttles to the show there, so much better than walking; and it's next door to Captain Kidd's where guests get free breakfast; it's a few doors down from Tony Roma's - delicious!; and even closer to Cold Stone Ice Cream; and Denny's is close.  In my mind, best location of all for that area.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and hope you had a wonderful time at the NAMM show.  Thank you for your compliments of our our hotel.  We hope to see you next year when NAMM is back in town or sooner.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: If you're doing a runDisney event, this is a good place to stay as it's within walking distance of the start/finish line. The only downside to the hotel is that there is limited parking. There was also construction going on, so there was only one exit/entrance. Hoping it's finished for the Disneyland race weekend later this year.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our property.  I am glad you enjoyed your stay with us and hope you had fun running the marathon.  Our construction is scheduled to be completed by June so we should be clear for the Labor Day Weekend Marathon.  We look forward to seeing you then.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Perfect place for a quick Disneyland visit
Summary: This hotel has been nicely upgraded and couldn't be closer to the park.  We enjoyed the free continental breakfast and were pleased with the variety of choices.  The staff were incredibly kind and helpful.  I have already booked another room!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and writing about your experience.  We greatly appreciate you compliments and look forward to seeing you during your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Great location for disneyland trip (just right across the street from the park).   Clean rooms and friendly staff.  Nice free continental breakfast (but it was very crowded in the eating area).    However, parking at the hotel was tight, there was no room for extended parking (leaving late on check out day)
Manager Response: I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and appreciate your compliments.  Unfortunately, as you mentioned our parking is limited.   Check out is 11 am.  However, we do provide a complimentary extension for parking until 3 pm to give guests a little more time on their last day.  We do need to ask our checked out guests to move there vehicles after 3 pm to ensure that guests arriving for a reservation have a place to park. I do hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Can't Get Any Closer to Disney
Summary: This is a great place to stay if you don't plan on spending a lot of time in your hotel. The room itself was pretty clean, but it wasn't anything special. I gave this hotel an extra point because of its location. You can literally not get a closer hotel to Disney than this place, its even closer than any of the Disney owned hotels. This was a great hotel for us because we were taking my 80 year old Grandma to the parks, and it wasn't too far for her to walk. The continental breakfast at the hotel was ok, but if you have one of the "suites" it comes with a mini fridge and a microwave, so I would just as soon swing by a grocery store on the way and pick stuff up than bother with the continental breakfast. I would definatly stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review of our property.  I am pleased that you enjoyed your stay and that the location was helpful for your Grandma.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This is a very convenient location with Disneyland and California Adventure within 2 minute walking distance to front gates. The rooms are nice and big. Nice amenities. Great breakfast to start a busy day in Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to review our property.  We appreciate your compliments and hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: we loved the rooms, they were clean and well kept. the airconditoner/heater was so loud it kept me awake at night, and it was a little too chilly not to have it on. other than that I would , and will recommend this holel.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for sharing your experience.  I do apologize for the noise from the AC/heater unit.  Do to the frequent use they do wear out.  However we do have replacements so there will not be any bothersome noise.  If we have the pleasure of your visit again, please let us know if anything is disturbing you or not working properly in the room.  We will correct it to the best of our ability.  Our goal is for our guests to have a enjoyable, memorable, and relaxing stay.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Right Across the Street from Disney Parks
Summary: We really loved the location of this hotel.  Can't beat right across the street from the Disney Parks! The continental breakfast was your usual deal. A few hot items (sausage, egg patties, and bacon). They also had waffles, donuts, pastries, toast,  fruit, cereal, oatmeal, and yogurt.   I liked it, but my husband got tired of the same stuff after 2 days.  For those who do get tired of it, there is an IHOP and a Denny's really close by.    The room itself was ok.  The pillows were extremely hard.  I have never had hard pillows in a hotel before.  Quite uncomfortable.  The pullout sofa was very worn down and the mattress was very old.  We lined the mattress with blankets for my 5 year old.  He is small enough not to have noticed, but an adult would be very uncomfortable on the
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and sharing what you liked and didn't like about your stay.  We are continuously trying to improve our hotel and services to meet our guests needs.  We hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We spent three nights here in mid January and were very happy with the hotel. The location can't be beaten, being directly across from the park gates. Reading previous reviews on this hotel I felt it strange that people complained about the noise of children.....one has to expect the odd excited yell from children when you stay at a family hotel situated opposite Disneyland! The rooms were compact but had all the necessary requirements. The restaurant was great but did fill up around 8am.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your visit to the States.  We appreciate your comments and we are very pleased that you enjoyed your time with us.  We hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I was very impressed with this hotel.  We were in walking distance to Disneyland entrance (just had to cross 1 street and then walk into the entrance).  Our stay included continental breakfast at the next door restaurant's upstairs room (not in the hotel lobby).  This was fine and had a lot of different selections of cereal, oatmeal, toast, croissant, egg patties, sausage links, and pastry items like danishes.  Also had yogurt and fresh fruit (bananas, apples, oranges).  I was tired of the breakfast after the third day. The hotel room was excellent.  Very roomy and seemed recently remodeled.  The beds were comfortable and clean.  You got to your rooms walking outside, which was a bit of a hassle.  There was 1 elevator that I noticed.  But using the stairs was okay. These rooms
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your trip to the Disneyland Resort.  I am very pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us.   Thank you for your comments and compliments.  I hope you will be able to visit us again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We decided to give this place a try, as we were participating in the Tinker Bell half marathon.  We wanted a place that was within walking distance, and this place fit the bill. Although they were doing some renovating, they were very accomodating. Front desk was very friendly at check-in, even though there was a long line. We received complimentary breakfast next door, which was ok - muffins, croisants, cereal, fruit, an egg thing and some sausage. Just enough to give us energy for the morning. Room was nice and clean. We overlooked the pool and jacuzzi. We kept saying we would try the jacuzzi, but never got around to it. We did see that there were kids that were loving the pool area!  We were on the third floor and near the elevator, but didn't hear the elevator at all during
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write about your experience at our hotel.  We greatly appreciate you choosing us with all the options in the area.  I hope you enjoyed participating in the marathon.  It is a pleasure to read that you enjoyed your stay.  We look forward to having you as a guest again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I had stayed at this hotel years ago and wasn't that impressed.  They have certainly won back my business. The staff was extremely helpful. I had a flat tire and they assisted me with getting someone to help change it.  I appreciated that being there with 3 kids and no other adult.
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us another chance after not being satisfied during a previous stay.  I appreciate reading that you have seen an improvement in our hotel and the service we provide.   I am also very pleased that we were able to assist you with getting help for a flat tire.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This was my second stay at Best Western Plus Park Pace Inn & Mini Suites and the proximity to Disneyland will keep me coming back. Being so close to the entrance makes coming and going from the parks easy, it’s nice to be able to take a break without having to take a shuttle or lose a lot of time.  The renovations haven’t made the hotel rooms nicer to look at, but they are clean and fairly large.  The staff were just as great as my first stay, and were great about getting us into a room straight away when we checked in early (we didn’t ask, they just delivered).  I stayed on the second floor overlooking the pool and near the elevator- I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND THIS LOCATION. Noise from the pool comes straight into the room, and being a family friendly hotel there is a lot of
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us again.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments that you took the time to write.  We look forward to you visiting us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Another great stay at this property. The beds, although smaller than what we are used to, were very comfortable. I would recommend bringing a pillow however. Standard rooms are a good size for a family of four. The in room fridge and microwave are a huge plus.  Parking is definitely at a premium when the hotel is full.  Breakfast is included, but is pretty bad in our opinion. Would definitely recommend bringing something that could be cooked in the microwave.  As so many others have said, the location is GREAT! Definitely looking forward to our next stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our property.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated.  It is very valuable to know what is liked and what needs to be improved on to enchance our guests experiences. We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Right across the street to Disneyland Gates.
Summary: You will not find a hotel with a shorter walk to Disneyland. It's so close, you can leave the park, go to your room and back to the park without getting tired. The room and ammenities are pretty standard. So was the breakfast.There is a parking fee.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our property.  We appreciate your choice to stay with us out of all the options available.  We hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel is right across the street from Disneyland/California Adventure and the Downtown Disney shopping district. A nice place to stay for a couple of days. The buffet breakfast was good, but the dining room was full so we ate in our room - no big deal. I will stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Best Western Plus Park Place Inn.  We appreciate you taking the time to write a review of our property.  We are pleased that you enjoyed your stay and we look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: It is located across the street from Disneyland so if you're going there, I don't think you can beat the location.  The rates are very reasonable.  There is a microwave, fridge and free wifi in the rooms.  I had a king room and there was a little sitting area with couch and coffee table. The tv was large and flatscreen.  The sink is outside the bathroom itself and has a large mirror.  You can hear your neighbors talking in their room and the children on the floor above running around. Fortunately both of these neighbors kept the same hours as I did, so they were quiet when I needed them to be.  I think I got lucky in this...   There is a free continental breakfast in the restaurant across the street.  There was always a staff person there to ask about food allergies, and the
Manager Response: Thank you for writing a review of our property and choosing to stay with us.  I greatly appreciate your recommendation of the Best Western Plus Park Place Inn.  I am pleased that you enjoyed your stay and hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Great location, right across the street from the main gates to Disneyland.  While an older motel, it's been well maintained and was clean and comfortable.  Checking in and out was quick and the staff friendly.  The no-car discount price couldn't be beat, especially considering the location.  There are laundry facilities available and while we didn't use the pool because of cold weather, iwe saw the water being tested and hot tub being re-filled multiple times on our walk back to our room, so I'm sure it's clean and well maintained as well.  There's a bus stop right outside to catch a city bus or arrange for tour pick-ups and car rentals can be arranged on site.  Breakfast is included, but we chose to eat elsewhere after our first morning.  The sausages appeared to be floating in
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Best Western Park Place Inn.  Your compliments and recommendation are greatly appreciated.  I do apologize for the appearance of the breakfast.  This will be addressed so guests can enjoy the food that we offer.  I hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel was in the "best" location for a week long trip to Disneyland with children, right across the street from the main entrance.  It is by no means a new hotel, but the staff are constantly maintaining the facility - every morning the vending machines are wiped down, on different occasions we saw the water in the pool being tested, the hot tub filled with fresh water on at least two different occasions.  we were in a connecting room on the third floor (346 & 347) - it was perfect for two adults & three children, great sleeping configurations (2 queens & sofa bed in each unit) with plenty of room for the kids to unwind after a busy day at the park.  when we checked in the fridge in one unit was not working - it was replaced immediately, the hair dry blew only cold air, it
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for your comments and compliments of our property.  I do apologize that a couple of items were not working correctly in your room.  However, I am very pleased that we were able to address it immediately so you could enjoy your stay.  Thank you for staying with us during your trip to Disneyland.  I hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: THE best place to stay for Disneyland vacation
Summary: I have stayed at almost every hotel along Harbor Blvd and this is the best.  It is the closest, cleanest, best value by far.  Staff is very polite and helpful.  Rooms are very clean and nice.  Not a luxury hotel, of course, but absolutely perfect for a Disneyland trip.  Incredibly reasonable price.  Internet was weak, but I cannot think of anything else that wasn't just right.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at the Best Western Plus Park Place Inn.  We greatly appreciation your recommendation of our property over others in the area.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This place was fine to crash and the pool was fun for the kids but its a pretty average 'motel ' . DON'T get sucked in to paying for the buffet breakfast next door, your salty tears will taste sweeter then whatever sweets they can dish up. The place was conveniently situated directly across from Disney and you couldn't get closer if you tried. That was a great plus. No gym facilities and you need your passport for I'd and the nearest fitness centre which is a little expensive.  Coffee? Like most areas in the USA they have no idea about what it is to have a good coffee but McCafe is nearby and while it isn't a Melbourne coffee at least they try. Food....that's a hard one. If you love lard then your in the right place. On most menus in the restaurants nearby if you make a request
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our property.  I am sorry not everything met to your satisfaction.  There is no need to pay for breakfast next door.  We do offer a complimentary Deluxe Continental breakfast that includes waffles, eggs, sausage, yogurt, cereals, oatmeal, muffins, danishes and fresh fruits. There are a number of restaurants in the area that offer healthy selections all within a 5-10 minute walk.  The Garden Walk and Downtown Disney offer several options all of which can be reached in a 10 minute walk.  Within 5 minutes there is Millies, Mimi's and Tony Roma's all offering a different variety of food. I do hope you enjoyed your visit to Disneyland and that you were comfortable while you stayed with us.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We stay in this hotel for its location and price.  The rooms are outdated (but had flat screen tvs).  If you are going to Disneyland, you can not get a better hotel for the price!  It is directly across the street from the entrance and you get a continental breakfast.  The staff is friendly and check-in always easy.  Parking is a problem.  Don't leave after 4:00 or you will not have a spot.  We have always had a room in the back on the 3rd floor, and it has been quiet.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our property.  We greatly appreciate you choosing to stay with us during your visits to the Disney Resort Area.  We do guarantee a parking spot for our guests, so do not ever worry about taking your car out during your stay.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Couldn't ask for a better location
Summary: Located right across the street for the Disneyland entrance - so convenient. Comfortable rooms and free breakfast. The rooms are dated but very comfortable with 2 Queen Beds, a Queen size sleeper sofa, a microwave, and refrigerator. The continental breakfast is located next door - good selection but very crowded if you want to eat in time to make the opening of the park. The parking spaces are small but not too bad for a mid size rental car. The pool is outside but is heated to a comfortable temperature for swimming in November. We enjoyed soaking in the hottub after a full day in the park. Would definitely stay again if I ever return to California.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for sharing your experience.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay.  I hope we will get to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: If you're visiting Disney, this is the place to stay!
Summary: We stayed here for New Year's and it was great!  You can't beat the location.  Although most places offer shuttle service, you still have to wait in line to get on a shuttle and wait for the shuttle to get there as well.  Most run every half hour.  There's no wait time here, just a quick walk across the street.  The rooms were clean and comfortable.  There is an iHop and a Denny's next to the hotel as well.  The Best Western does charge a daily fee for parking, so if you're ok with that, then this is the place to stay :)
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your New Year's Celebration.  We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience at our property with others.  We hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We have stayed at six hotels on harbor blvd and this is our favorite. We like the close walk to the park. It has the best breakfast and lots of seating.  Even though we have stayed at others we keep coming back here.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our property.  It is wonderful to read we are your favorite property and that you return to us after staying at others.  We definitely look forward to you next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel was very close to the happiest place on Earth.  The hotel is right across the street from the park.  The room was spacious.  The hotel has multiple floors.   The beds were very nice.  The rooms were a nice size. I would highly recommend this hotel. It was an enjoyable stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments and compliments.  I am very pleased that your enjoyed your stay with us and greatly appreciate your recommendation.  I hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Steps away from the happiest place on earth..
Summary: I really enjoyed the fact that this hotel was right across the entrance from The Disneyland Park.  It made it really easy to take a break and rest up for round two at the park.  I would definitely stay again.  The room was clean and comfortable, the staff was friendly and helpful.  I also liked the fact that they had breakfast provided, and not the typical toast, juice and coffee.  There was cereal, eggs, sausage, fresh fruit, yogurt, and waffles too!  It was all delicious and it helped with the cost of eating in the park!! I just wish it wasn't so expensive to stay here or I would every time I traveled to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us.  I am pleased your stay with us.  Your compliments are greatly appreciated and we hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We just stayed here for 6 nights with a 2 1/2 year old. The location was perfect for us to come back in the middle of the day for a nap. It was literally a 5 minute walk to Disneyland. Their continental breakfast was way better than we expected. When i think of continental breakfast i think cereal, fruit, and pastries. They had eggs, sausage, waffles, pastries, toast, fruit, yogurt, cereal, oatmeal, juice, coffee, and tea.  We thought this was perfect especially since we wanted to get to the park and ate it everyday.  As for those people who complained about the breakfast, IT'S FREE!!!!!  It does cost to park but it was the cheapest rate and definitely better than paying to park at Disneyland or having to wait for a shuttle.  Housekeeping was exceptional and cleaned our room
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for choosing to stay with us.  We know there are many other choices in the area so we do strive to make your stay as comfortable and enjoyable as possible.  I greatly appreciate you taking the time to review our property and share your experience with others.  Your compliments have been passed on to the various departments.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This is the third time we have stayed at this location.  It is a great a location and the closest location to the Disneyland Resort.  The light to cross Harbor Blvd to Disneyland is at the front of the property.   This property is older but taken care of.  There is parking.  The breakfast is fine.  The rooms are large with microwave, frig and couch.  Small bathroom but plenty of counter space.
Manager Response: Thank you for returning to our hotel.  We know without our repeat guests we would not stay in business.  Thank you for recommending our hotel to others.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: You can't get any closer to maingate at Disneyland & it is a great hotel
Summary: We have stayed at the Best Western Park Place on our visit to Disneyland on two occassions.  This is a great moderate priced hotel.  We are a family of 4 - 2 adults, 2 children under 12 and the rooms were perfect for a visit to Disneyland.   The hotel is located directly across the street from the maingate at Disneyland Park.  They offer a complimentary continental breakfast which is served in the restaurant next door.(upstairs)  The rooms are clean and comfortable.  https://www.destinations-bycolette.com
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel again and taking the time to write a review.  Repeat customers and recommendations are essential for us, given the number of options in the area.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The rooms, staff, and location are bar none the best in the area for staying for Disneyland/California Adventure. However, the electrical outlets were not snug enough to consistantly charge our phones/tablets. This was awkward for the four of us to keep our devices charged throughout our stay. That said, it was a minor inconvenience, and overall our stay was excellent.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our property.  We greatly appeciate you comments and compliments.  I do apologize for the issue with the electrical outlets.  We are looking at ways to continously improve upon our service and this will be noted.  We hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: What a perfect location this is!!!  Directly across from the entrance to Disneyland and closer than parking in one of their lots!!!!  Very clean and comfortable and a great price for convenience.  Continental breakfast, as advertised, is really a full service breakfast! Pancakes, eggs, sausage, cereal, fruit, beverages.  You really can't ask for more!  We will definitely stay here on future trips!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for sharing your experience.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Great Location, Nothing fancy, but all the necessities are there. You just have to remember your not booking a 5 star so dont expect it. Amenities were lovely, bed was comfortable and everything worked. Complementary breakfast next door - but nothing to write home about. Better off walking 2 mins for Mcdonalds... All in All lovely hotel, laundry on site and cheap and easy to use.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your trip to the States.  We greatly appreciate your comments and we are very pleased you enjoyed your stay.  We hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I just spent 5 nights here with my daughter and it was pretty great. Upon check in there was a mix up. I booked a room with 2 beds but when we arrived at our room there was only 1 bed. After a quick call to the desk the gentleman  that checked us in came with a luggage cart and escorted us to our new room which was in the front of the building with a great view of the fireworks at night. Thank you Cesar!! Harbor Blvd is very noisy but we are heavy sleepers and it didn't bother us.  The breakfast wasn't anything to write home about, but it was something in your tummy to start the day off!  We used the hot tub a couple of times and it was fine.  Our room was sufficiently cleaned every day. It doesn't hurt to leave housekeeping a couple of bucks either.  You also could not get any
Manager Response: I would like to apologize for any error that may have occurred prior to check-in.  I am glad we were able to fix the situation immediately and not have it affect your stay.  We definitely look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you for staying with us.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel is very conveniently located across the street from the main gates of Disneyland and CA Adventure. The free breakfast was served at the restaurant next door, which consisted of sausage patties, eggs, toast, yogurt, fruit (apples, bananas), juice, coffee, waffles, and pancakes. While this breakfast was better than others in the area (has warm food offerings), it was hardly a breakfast which we considered good... don't think "fluffy, fresh eggs with sizzling sausage and fresh made waffles hot off the iron".... think "microwaved egg squares, frozen sausage patties warmed in the serving tray, with cold pancakes and watered down coffee on the side" ... it was OK on one or two mornings but not good enough for us to eat each morning, even being free.   We were excited to
Manager Response: I would like to first thank you for writing a review of our property and letting us know what you liked and didn't like. I am sorry you did not enjoy your stay. I do need to address that we do not serve pancakes with our breakfast however we do serve toaster waffles which are freshly toasted for the guest. I am sorry you experienced too much noise in your room. If this had been brought to our attention, we could have definitely moved you to a quieter room. Our goal is to make our guests' stays as enjoyable and memorable as possible. If there is ever a problem, we ask our guests to please bring it to our attention so we can fix it immediately. For our gift shop we try to price our merchandise to be competitive with hotels in the area and Disneyland. With the coupon offered to our guests, the prices are even lower.  I hope you will give us another chance so you can experience a memorable and enjoyable stay.  Thank you and take care.  Report response as inappropriate Thank you. We appreciate your input.

Summary: We stayed here 3 nights with our 2 kids. Room decor and furnitures are old like grandmas' houses. Does not make us feel like we're across from the happiest place on earth. Hotel is over priced. There is no in room safe so if you plan to stay here, don't bring expensive stuffs. Continental breakfast at the restaurant next door is poor. Make sure you toast your waffles since they are out from frozen bag. There is charge for parking at this hotel which other hotels nearby don't.  Location is good. it's across from disneyland entrance. But there are also a handful of other hotels nearby which are very clos to the entrance.  We stayed at other hotels nearby before with lower price and better services ( they're booked at the time of our travel this year) Never stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write about your stay with us.  I am sorry you did not enjoy your stay.  No we do not have in room safes. However, our housekeepers are extremely honest.  And we do also offer the option for you to check your items at the front desk and we will hold them for you while you are out of the room.  We do charge for parking as do a number of hotels nearby.  Ours is the lowest rate with others going as high as $25.00 per night.  If the hotel does not charge for parking many charge a resort fee which is higher than most of the parking charges.  With this in mind, I do hope you will give us another chance.  Thank you and take care

Summary: This hotel is adjacent to the intersection that is directly in front of the entrance to Disneyland and California Adventure, which was the selling point for us. It was so easy to go back to the room and rest for several hours in the afternoon, something maybe we did a little bit too much of (when the kids got tired, we used to rest on the train, which is not as comfy as the hotel bed!). The rooms were clean and functional though a bit spartan, not unexpected for this price point; service however, was excellent! The front desk was super friendly (even when we were checking in at the wee hours of the am) and when we had maintenance issues (slow draining tub, etc), help arrived truly within a few minutes of calling. We had a second floor room and on our first morning, we were woken
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write about your stay.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your time at the Park Place Inn.  Your comments and compliments are greatly appreciated.  We do look forward to seeing you during your future visits.   I noticed under the room tip section that you noted stairs would be required for the third floor.  We do have two elevators; each located on either side of the pool.  Please come see us again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Convenient, clean... did I mention convenient?
Summary: We chose this hotel thru a combination of its location and its value.  We wanted a safe, clean yet convenient place to base for Disneyland and California Adventures. Mission accomplished.    Pros: You dont need to drive to the parking lot and take a tram. You walk to the gates.  If you need to leave the park for some reason, it is do-able.  No, it is not a few steps, but as far as hotels go, it is as close as you can get.  The gift shop also sells a nice selection of jackets and pullovers for about half the price of Disney.  Next to an Ihop and walking distance to Mimi's and a few other decent eating choices.  Internet worked fine.  Cons:  Breakfast did not impress, but may be ok for some.  Parking now costs $7 a day.  Outside room noise a bit above average.  Don't try to go to
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and writing about our hotel.  Letting us know what you liked and didn't like will definitely help us improve our service to all of our guests.  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay and the convenience of our location.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: this is a huge complex of very similar rooms...I know because we ended up in a couple during our stay.  Kinda of a 70's and 80's look to the fixtures, colors and such.  Clean and basic. No safe in the room so be aware of that if you are concerned about laptops, passports and other valuables.  the bathroom is kinda of stark but all the essentials are there. The rooms are carpeted and have a distinct odor of meldew and bleach....at least the two that I stayed in did. I have mold alegeries so this was a problem for me that is why we ended up in another room. The second room wasn't as bad as the first...but still had some irritants that did effect me. So if you have allergies be aware of that. We really like having the Ihop next door and the main entrance to the happiest place on
Manager Response: Thank you for writing about your experience at the Best Western Park Place Inn.  We appreciate that you choose to stay with us with the number of options available.  I am sorry there was a mildew odor in the rooms.  We will have housekeeping be extra vigilant to any odors so they can be addressed. We do hope to see you again.  If you stay with us in the future, Please note that you may secure small valuables in the safety deposit boxes at the front office.  Large items may be checked-in at the front desk and stored in the office until you are ready for them.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We stayed for 4 nights. Service was great, location can't be beat. The only complaint we have is the wireless is terrible. It took forever to gain access, then we'd get booted off. We finally gave up.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our property.  I am sorry the wi-fi was not working properly.  We are taking steps to improve the wi-fi.  I hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Had issues with climate control but staff was on it quickly an efficiently.Great location. Breakfast buffet is acceptable and filling. Staff is friendly and accomodating. Parling is very tight. Several large pickup trucks made it difficult to get a car in so it would not get door dings from the adjacent vehicles.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us.  We appreciate you writing a review of our property and staff.  We hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I luv staying here. I have 2 little kids and luv the fact that its right across the steet from Disneyland. Customer service is excellent. WiFi works with no problems and it's free. Continental Breakfast was good especially since its free...one less meal to pay for while on vacation. The rooms are always clean. Always have had good experiences here and location is great!
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for staying with us again and sharing your experience.  We greatly appreciate your compliments.  Please come see us again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I spent 10 days here with my husband on our honeymoon & we loved it alot.  The hotel more than suited our needs in every way.  The location cant be beat and the staff are more than helpful, they really go out of their way to help you with anything from laundry service that picks up & drops off (we loved that) to advising local bus routes which took us to Target on Harbour Blvd. But most of all just friendly people.  And the rooms are very clean & comfortable i couldnt fault them at all.  Dont pass this gem by when booking your disney trip
Manager Response: First I would like to offer you my congratulations.  I am pleased we could be a part of making your honeymoon special.  I wish you a lifetime of happiness together.   Thank you for your compliments regarding our property and our staff.  We hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Great location to walk to the park.  Parking is a bit of an issue, especially the fact that they charge now.  Rooms are your typical hotel room.  Great to be able to grab a bite to eat first thing in the morning.  Would stay again if the rates are good.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our property and recommend us to others.  We do hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Every time we plan a disney trip we try to see if this place has availability to stay at overnight. It's right across from the main entrance of disneyland. Literally, a 5 minute walk. This hotel gives you good value for the money- best location ever, free wifi, 8$ parking/night and free continental breakfast. Very family friendly hotel. Staff members are awesome! Especially last week when they allowed us to check in early at 12pm...really grateful for that! All I can say is, keep up the good work guys! Hope the price for the accomodation stays the same. We'll be back for sure! Thanks!
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for making us your first choice when visiting Disneyland.  Thank you for your compliments and sharing with everyone what you like about us.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel is located just across the street from Dysneyland. The best location you can imagine. Even better than the dysney hotels. The room are OK. Clean and spacious. Two queen beds and a sofa-bed. The bathroom though is small.  Breakfast is included and average. I sure recomend this hotel for families. Location spetacular and rooms clean and sapacious.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and recommending our hotel.  We hope you visit us again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Second stay here. Both times we found the rooms clean and comfortable. Breakfast buffet is convenient and adequate with some hot items.  Location is spectacular, a short 5 minute walk to the parks.  Staff were very accommodating and helpful. Great value for the money.
Manager Response: Thank you for returning to the Best Western Plus Park Place Inn.  I am pleased both of your stays with us have been enjoyable.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This is the perfect hotel if you are looking for something that is right across from Disneyland - it is very clean, the rooms are nice sized and comfortable.  Great for the money and almost is like staying right on property.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us.  We appreciate the comments that you have posted.  We hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This was our second stay here this year. The location right across the street from the main entrance to Disney can't be beat.  Considering the location, the price is very reasonable. The room was spotless, and I am picky.  A light burned out in the bathroom vanity light bar, and it was changed by housekeeping when they cleaned the room- that is pretty rare to have that attention to detail so I was impressed. As others have said, the beakfast buffet is not great, but if you just want a light breakfast it was fine. Nice selection of cereals, some yogurt, and fruit. Then eggo type waffles you can toast, bread for toasting. Some cold danishes, then hot sausage and egg patties. It was the same every day, so some variety, like bacon and pancakes would have been nice, but for a quick
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for returning to the Best Western Park Place Inn and sharing your experience.  We greatly appreciate your feedback and your compliments.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Hotel was close to park but breakfast buffet was terrible and hotel very noisy. Stayed there for  walking distance but better off to pay more and skip the convience. People knocked on our door many times late at night and even woke children up  to  find it was wrong room
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write about your experience.  I am sorry you did not enjoy your stay with us.  I am sorry you were disappointed with our continental breakfast.  It seems you may have been prepared for a full hot breakfast since you mentioned it being a buffet.  I am sorry if there was a misunderstanding that led to you be unsatisfied.  I hope you will give us another chance so we can show you what our service is truly like.  We may be able to put you in a quieter room where there would be less foot traffic causing noise at night.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I remember reading the negative reviews about this place shortly after I reserved it and worrying that I had made a mistake. I am happy to report I had a great experience and I think there are far more positive reviews than negative reviews for a reason.   I found this to be a very reasonable room for a great price. For $98 we got a queen bed with a fold out sofa bed, continental breakfast, and an ideal location right across the street from the main entrance of Disneyland. What more could you ask for? The service was VERY courteous, both on check-in and check-out. In fact, we were allowed to leave our car in their lot for 4 hours after check-out as a courtesy.   Sure, the breakfast is pretty low quality and the parking is tight, but for the price and location I simply can't
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing the experience of your stay at the Best Western Plus Park Place Inn.  I am thankful you did not change your reservation after reading some of the reviews.  Thank you for your compliments.  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay and I hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Stayed here Nov. 3 - Nov. 7 for our Family Vacation to Disneyland. Cannot complain about the room. It was neat, clean & quiet. Housekeeping was efficient & check-in was smooth & easy. Sheets were clean & soft, pillows were big & fluffy & the A/C worked. The free breakfast was just what you'd expect - cereal, milk, frozen waffles(w/toasters to toast them in), bread, danish, egg "pancakes", sausage & coffee. We liked it just fine but the allure of specialty pancakes & omlets at IHOP next door was too great. We would DEFINATELY stay here again for our next Disneyland vacation!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our property.  We greatly appreciate the compliments.  We look forward to having you as our guests once again during your next Disneyland vacation.  Thank you and take care

Summary: It was my first time going to Disneyland, and I wanted a hotel close to the park. Not so much walking after a long day. I searched and saw that it was across the street and I loved it. When we got there it was actually better then I expected. It was clean the staff was friendly. It was our little home away from home. The continental breakfast was amazing. I thought of was just going to be pastries, but no it was mini buffet. You can't go wrong with this hotel. The best part was after a long day at the park we didn't have to wait for a shuttle or walk so much. That made the trip way better. Totally going to stay here for the rest of my Disneyland trips to come. :)
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review.  I am very pleased we exceeded your expectations.  We look forward to seeing you on your next trip and once again being your home away from home.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We stay at this property every year we come to Disneyland. It is clean and the staff are friendly and helpful. My daughter and family stayed in the next room. Their room had a nice flat screen, ours had a very old poor quality television. It was election night and it would have been nice to watch on a decent television. We stay away from the Buffett and walk down to McDonald's. It is great to have your hotel so close to Disneyland especially when you are so exhausted from your ten hours at the park.
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for continuing to stay with us when you visit Disneyland. We greatly appreciate our return guests.  You should have a new tv in your room the next time you visit.  Our aim is to have them in all the rooms by the end of the year.  Until, we see you again, take care.  Thank you.

Summary Heading: You will not get what you are reserving
Summary: This hotel has an excellent location. Right across the street from the gates to both Disneyland and California Adventure Park. We were travelling as a family of grandmother, mother and father and 2 years old. We specifically reserved a minisuite with a queen bed in one room, with a door, and part of the same room but outside the door was another queen bed and a pull out. We reserved here specifically because of the minisuite option. Before leaving for our vacation I checked with the hotel twice by email to confirm that we were still getting the minisuite option and they assured me that we were. When we got there . . . we had a regular room with 2 queen beds and a sofa pull out. The desk staff advised that that hotel does not have any minisuites and that their central
Manager Response: I would first like to thank you for staying with us.  I would also like to thank you for sharing your comments and concerns.  I would like to clear up the issue regarding the mini-suite.  Mini-suites are one room and larger than standard rooms with no full room separation.  I am sorry for the confusion when you checked with the front desk.  The room you stayed in was a mini-suite;  larger than a standard room with two queen beds and a queen sofa bed with the sofa bed separated by a half wall partition.  What we do not have are suites where this a full separation.  Again I am sorry for any confusion.  Regarding what may have been happening in the parking lot.  We do not allow any loiterers on property and they are promptly asked to leave.  I am not sure what you are referencing, but if you could let me know I would greatly appreciate the information.  I hope you will give us another chance.  Please let me know if there is anything I can do for you.  Thank you and take care.  Kelly Laimana ppifom@yahoo.com

Summary: We booked this because it was our first trip to Disneyland and we wanted somewhere close to stay.  It was literally right across the street from the Disneyland properties.  Just a short walk each morning and night.  We had a suite with 2 queen beds and a sofa bed.  The sofa bed was a typical sofa bed with the bar in the middle so beware of that.  The other beds were pretty comfortable if you like a very firm mattress which my husband does.  The room was very clean and the only real complaint was the air conditioner was very noisy all night long.  We told the staff at the front desk this when we checked out and they were going to have it looked at.  The staff was terrific!  Tony at the front desk on Friday morning was so helpful in getting a response from our late shuttle.  (Do
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for choosing for your first trip to Disneyland.  I am very pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us.  I do apologize for the air conditioner being noisy.  Please, if you have any issues when you stay with us, let us know right away so we can address it.  There are usually some very easy fixes that will make your stay even more enjoyable.  I do hope we will see you again.  Thank for your comments and sharing your experience with us.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Sad to say this place needs some TLC
Summary: I write this with a heavy heart, as we have stayed here multiple times over the past several years.  The location is second to none for visiting Disneyland and we have often recommended this hotel to others.  We stayed for a week at the beginning of October; here are the positives:  -The staff is courteous and helpful.  We had a food order that they stored for us and separated the perishables to put in the fridge until we arrived.    -Location. Location. Location.  -Free continental breakfast next door.  We chose to have Von's deliver us bananas, cereal bars and the like instead of going next door.  We have eaten there in the past, and it is an okay continental breakfast.  Hard to complain about free food.  -Room size is great, especially in one of the mini suites.  We asked for
Manager Response: I would first like to thank you for being a regular guest of our property.  Letting us know where you see room for improvement can definitely help us improve our service.  It will also help us to keep you as our guest.  We are in the process of replacing all of our tvs.  They should all be in by the end of this year.  If a door lock is ever giving you an issue, please let us know and we will fix it immediately.  Many times the battery just needs replaced.  However, sometimes they do just break.  I am very sorry for the housekeeping service that you received. This will definitely be addressed with the housekeeping manager.  I hope we will see you again soon.  Please do not hesitate to contact me if you need anything.   Thank you and take care.

Summary: This was our second stay and you can't beat the location right across the street from Disneyland.  We got the 2nd floor with a pool view.  We were close to the elevator and cleaning staff so it was busy near our room, but fine.  We were able to park here in the morning prior to checking in and that was very convenient so we went to the parks and came back at 3pm to check in.  We appreciated that.  The room was clean and big enough.  Wi-fi was great!  We used the hot tub once and had to ask for towels down there, but no big deal.  The pool was too cold.  The free breakfast is okay.  I wish they offered something different everyday, but the variety was decent.  The coffee was terrible though!  We got spoiled by the free breakfast at the Country Inn in San Diego.  Check out was
Manager Response: Thank you for returning to the Best Western Plus Park Place Inn.  I am pleased you have enjoyed your stay with us both times that you have been here.  Thank you for letting us know what we can improve on to make your stay even better.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We had a wonderful stay at this hotel, located right across the street from Disneyland.  The hotel was very clean (the carpet is a little "tired"), and beds were very comfortable.  The staff was friendly and helpful.  This is not a "fancy" hotel, but great for on a budget or with a family.  Breakfast is typical pre-fab fare, but adequate.  We enjoyed our stay and would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Best Western Park Place Inn.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and thank you for your review.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Stayed here in Oct and when we checked into our room, my husband and I almost passed out because it smelt as though someone peed on the floor and the house keeping staff just poured some chemical on it to try and get rid of the smell. We didn't even bring our bags in because of the smell. We called front desk and the girl was rude and seemed to have an attitude when we told her we refused to stay in a room with such a foul smell. They did move us. The room was clean and spacious. The house keeping staff was always so friendly and smiled everytime we walked pass them saying good morning each morning we saw them. We've stayed at this hotel everytime we've been to Disneyland, so when a couple of the young girls at the front desk were rude, it surely made me question whether or not
Manager Response: First I would like to thank you for continuously staying at our hotel.  We do greatly value our repeat guests. I am sorry for your recent experience with a couple of girls at the desk.  As you mentioned, this is not the typical service that you receive at our hotel.  The service you received will be addressed and further training will be provided.  I am pleased that the rest of your stay was enjoyable.  I hope this one experience will not dissuade you from returning.  Please let me know if I can be of service.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We had friends visit Disneyland this year and they wrote down the name of this hotel because it was so close to Disneyland. I tried to book online and was told no rooms were available, but I called the hotel direct and they had rooms. Like all the previous reviews it is nothing fancy, but it was clean, had a micro wave & fridge, the front desk was very informative and pleasant and so nice to be able to buy Disney tickets right in the lobby. The breakfast was great for a quick bite. There is a Dennys, Mimi's and Tony Roma's very close but after walking all day in Disneyland we went to the closest restaurant IHOP twice and it was delicious both times and kids eat free after 4pm with a paying adult. Again we LOVED being able to be at Disneyland first thing, come back to our room to
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and writing about your experience.  I am very happy you were able to enjoy all the ammenties and the advantages of our location.  We hope we will get to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Stayed Oct 2012, This is our 2nd stay at the BWPPI and we would go back here everytime!  You cannot beat the location, directly at the crosswalk on Harbor Blvd!  We got a 3rd floor room and hear zero noise from neighbors, just a little street noise.  It was quiet and comfortable and best of all....CLOSE!  This was our first trip with little ones and it was so nice to have this short walk and the end of a long and busy day.  Breakfast is fine, nothing fancy but it's free and a nice feature!  Staff was helpful and friendly, room was always clean at the end of the day.  No complains! Great stay! :)
Manager Response: Thank you for returning to the Best Western Park Place Inn.  We greatly appreciate you taking the time to write a review of our property.  I am very happy that you enjoyed your stay with us.  Thank you for your compliments and we definitely look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Wonderful stay to get to Disney properties
Summary: We just stayed at this hotel last month and had a wonderful stay. The accomadations are clean, well light and inviting. They are not super fancy, but after walking around for 6 or more hours a day at a theme park, it doesn't really matter. We love the fact that they are located right across from the main exit and the distance to any restaurnt is minimal. The free breakfast is free, not a huge gorment meal, but a great way to save some cash to be spent later on treats or souveiners at the park.   We will always try to stay here for all future trips.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write about your stay with us.   I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us.  It is wonderful you were able to take advantage of our ammenities and our location.  Thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Our Go - To Place for a quick Disneyland Trip
Summary: We discovered this hotel a few years ago and continue to return over and over and bring our friends. It is perfectly situated for a quick trip to the Disney Parks. The GM and her staff always make you feel welcome and attend to your needs.  The rooms are clean and well maintained.  When Breakfast is included it is an above average Continenal Breakfast Buffet. In addition to the Disney Property there are plenty of food choices all within walking distance.  We rarely use our car once we have arrived.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your continuous patronage of our Best Western.  Thank you for compliments and taking the time to write a review of our property.   We enjoy having you and your friends as our guests and look forward to seeing you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We stayed here in October 2012, after staying at a nearby property two previous times. (We were happy with the previous hotel, but this place is so close!)  That's the most important reason to choose Best Western Park Place--Location. Your feet WILL get tired and sore, especially by day three, so being able to stay at the closest hotel to Disneyland is great. What makes it lose a star? It IS drab, as others have said...and it's a bit dated. Though, it is clean, and that helps a lot. I am very thankful to the person who checked us in--we were thrilled to have a room with a view of Disneyland. (Top floor, so no noisy neighbors...though we didn't hear much in the way of neighbors.)  Granted, we probably wouldn't request a room with a view of Disneyland next time. The road noise
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and writing about your experience and view of our property.  We appreciate the comments you made.  They will definitely help us improve our service and what we offer to our guests.  We hope that we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay when visiting Disney
Summary: Our family of 4 enjoyed staying at this hotel from the 29 Sept - 08 Oct. We loved the view from the top floor out towards Disney.  We could not have found a more convenient hotel and appreciated the easy short walk into the park in the 40+ c heat. Our room on the top floor looking towards Disney was extremely clean, great air-con, quiet room, free wi fi great for our teenagers, the free breakfast up stairs at Captain Kidds was excellent, more than what we would normally have, and the day we wanted to use our early morning entry at Disneyland at 7.00am we where at breakfast at 6.30am grabbed our brekkie and ate it while walking over the road.  We brought our City Pass (3 day Disney park hopper ticket/ Universal Studios/ Sea World) from the hotel. We where reliant on buses and
Manager Response: Thank you for your compliments of our property and staff.  We would like to thank you for choosing us as your home away from home.  You were very enjoyable guests and we hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Closest you can get to the Parks
Summary: I agree with the previous reviewer that lists this hotel as Convenient but Drab.  We had stayed here back in 2006 and had a not so great experience.   The rooms were clean and have all the amminities that you would want in a hotel room.  But this is more of a motel feeling than a hotel.   We had 3 people in the room and were given a King with a sleeper sofa.  Luckly the 3rd person was a child or else that sleeper bed would have been very uncomfortable.   It was a very thin matress.   We were on the first floor which was nice, after walking back from the park after a long day of park hopping we didn't have to climb stairs to fall into bed.     They offer free wifi in all the buildings now, but unfortunately the signal is so weak, that we could only get connected half the time on
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us once again.  I read your comments regarding your previous stay and I hope this stay was much more to your satisfaction.  I greatly appreciate the comments regarding this stay.  They will help us improve our service for all of our guests.  Thank you again for giving us another chance.  I hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care

Summary: Its an average Best Western. I would expect more since it is in close proximity to Disneyland. So if you are looking for upscale or nice this isn't the place for you. But if you are looking for a place to sleep and find amenities at Disneyland or other attractions it is a good value. Clean, friendly, and close to Disneyland. Very friendly staff and the breakfast is always a plus....
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the BW Plus Park Place Inn.  We do appreciate you sharing your experiences and thoughts about our property.  While we did not entirely meet your expectations we are pleased you enjoyed the staff, breakfast, location, and cleanliness of our property.  We do hope you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Great rates considering it's right across the road from Disneyland! The room was very clean and in good repair, other than an extremely uncomfortable sofa bed. The free breakfast was good, lots of variety, and so handy to start out your Disney day! We arrived early (about noon) and had no trouble checking in right away. Would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Best Western Plus Park Place Inn and sharing your experience.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your room and do apologize for the sofa bed.  Please let us know any time you experience discomfort in your room and we will address the situation.  We do want you to have a relaxing and enjoyable stay so you can enjoy your time at Disneyland.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Hopefully, soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: You can't stay closer to the Disneyland entrance than here.  I was taken aback at first, because this hotel isn't fancy/cutesy themed like it's neighbors.  Never fear.  This is a great place to stay, and we thought the rate was very reasonable.  Here are the facts:  The room was a roomy suite, in good repair, and clean.  It included a mini-fridge and a microwave.  The staff were all friendly and efficient.  There was a nightly charge ($8 at the time) for parking, .  Breakfast was included and served upstairs at the restaurant next door.  It's just basic fuel for the morning, not fancy.  The pool is small, but it and the hot tub were well maintained.  You can buy "Hopper" tickets at their front desk.  Request a first floor room, and you've got the foundation for a fantastic
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your visit to Disneyland.  Thank you for your comments regarding our property and your stay.  I am pleased that you enjoyed your visit with us.  I hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We stayed the the Park Place from Sept. 23 to Sept 30th. We found the rooms more than adequate. Clean and functional. The refrigerator keep our drinks very cold. That doesn't happen often! Air Conditioning worked very well as it was hot in the parks that week and it was nice to come back to a cool room. The location can not be beat. Several Restaurants nearby and just a quick trip to the Disney front gates. We did not try the free breakfast because that is just not our thing. The pool was small but the kids enjoyed it the 1 time we were out there. The only complaint I could have and kept this to a 4 star rating the the VERY tight Parking. The front side of the hotel looks to have a little more space. Our room was on the back side and it is very tight to get a mini van parked in
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with the BW Plus Park Place Inn.  We appreciate that you took the time to write about your experience with us.  I am pleased that we were able to exceed your expectations and we hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Best location if you travel with a toddler
Summary: Booked this room because of the location. This was our first time visiting Disneyland with a toddler and I wanted to stay somewhere close by where we could walk back to the room if we needed a nap or if our daughter had a meltdown. I was afraid of the parking situation because of other reviews, but we had no problem with parking. Front desk person (I don't remember his name) was very friendly and apologized for making me wait because he was helping someone else. The only thing that stoped me from giving this hotel five stars is the carpet, it looked very old and dirty. One last thing... take your pillows unless you like sleeping in very firm pillows.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us while visiting Disneyland.  I greatly appreciate your feedback.  All comments help us improve our quality and service for our guests.  I hope that we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We just got back and in the 35C+ heat it was wonderful to be so close to the parks.  Minimal walk and the hotel is at the front of the property so you don't have to walk across another parking lot to get there.    Continental breakfast was convenient, but very busy.  We chose to go to the IHOP next door a few times and had good service there.    We went to Disney when it opened, then came back to swim in the afternoon, 3 kids 5,3 and 1 enjoyed the little pool and quite frequently we had it to ourselves.  Hottub was a good size and temperature.   Staff was friendly and helpful!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and writing about your experience.  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay and that you enjoyed the comfort and convenience of our property.  We hope we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Perfect location right across the street from Disneyland. This is especially good if you need a mid day break from the park. The rooms are clean and the beds comfortable. The front desk was especially friendly and helpful when I asked to switch from 2 double beds to a king bed. Overall a wonderful place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at the Best Western Plus Park Place Inn.  I am very pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us.  I am glad we were able to accomodate your request for a King, so you were more comfortable in your room. I hope we will get to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We recently finished our four night stay at this hotel. Our experience was very good. We arrived at around 9am after a flight from Australia. One of our kids didn't sleep on the plane, so Cesar at reception arranged early access to our room. So we slept for a couple of hours and then spent the rest of the day at Disneyland which is right across the road. It is the closest hotel to the main entry to Disneyland. You cross the road at the traffic light out the front of the hotel and walk straight into the disneyland drop off area. The walk to the entry gates is about 200 meters.  Our room was very clean and was serviced every day.  Breakfast is free at Captain Kidds which is right next door.  They have cereal, yoghurt, juices, coffee/tea and an assortment of hot foods. It is busy
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and writing about your Great Experience.  I am very happy we were able to provide you with an early check in so everyone could rest.  I am sure with one child not sleeping, parents didn't sleep either.  Or at least not very well.   Thank you for your compliments.   If you return to the area, I hope we will get to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: For the second year in a row I used RCI points to stay at one place and then moved to the Best Western, and this is the last time - I'll pay the extra to stay here.  If you are a person who stays in the park all day, or only returns to the hotel to have a rest and then go back to Disneyland, this is the place for you.  No shuttles or buses, just a quick walk to and from the hotel.  If you want full service, a great pool, good attached restaurants or nice landscaping stay somewhere else, but if you want just hour after hour, and day after day of Disneyland and a nice comfortable place to sleep and rest up for more of this than I don't think you can find better.  The staff is fantastic - very accomodating and the place is clean and well kept.  You can't find any great prices
Manager Response: Thank you for continuing to choose the Best Western Plus Park Place Inn.  We greatly appreciate your compliments and your repeat visits.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: So close to the Disney parks
Summary: Literally, you are right at the entrance into the Disney park property.  About a block's distance to the park entrance gates.  Rooms were clean & spacious.  Couch area, then a half wall, then the bed(s) and bath area.  Breakfast provided free.  Not great, but okay.  Crowded in restaurant area, so you might want to carry back to your room.
