Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and writing about your experience.  I am very happy that you enjoyed your stay and were pleased with your accommodations.  I hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Stay here for shortest walk to Disneyland!
Summary: We have stayed at so many hotels that boast they are close to D-land, but this is THE closest.  We stayed 3 nights here and will stay again for these reasons:  efficient check-in, large/spacious room, split bathroom so two people can get ready at the same time, refrigerator/microwave/coffee-maker in room, very comfortable beds/nice linens/lots of pillows.  And, the hotel is situated right across the street from the main entrance to Disneyland.  After a long day and many hours of walking through the two parks, it is nice to walk back to a cool, clean, room.  The only drawbacks I would have to say is the parking was limited and we had to carry quite a bit of luggage, bags, etc. to the elevator and then wind around to our room.  We did hear the neighbors next door....kids screaming
Manager Response: We appreciated having you as a guest of our hotel.  Thank you for writing a review of our property.  Listing what you appreciated and what may need improved will help us make your next stay even better.  If neighboring guests are ever to loud, please let us know and we will discreetly address the situation.  I am pleased that the noise you experienced will not deter you from a future visit.  I do hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: My husband and I stayed here for 5 nights, I loved the fact we were so close that I could just walk over to disneyland alone no problem.  We flew into John Wayne (SNA) and held a taxi (there is an online coupon for $5 off using California yellow cab) to the motel.  I was hesitant to be without a car but it totally was not needed.  We were able to find food and beer in the gift/mini shops with 2 blocks of the hotel.    We did see folks having a rough time of the very small parking spaces, all the more reason not to rent a car in my opinion.  For breakfast I had no problem with toast and jelly, yogurt and fresh fruit.  There is not a safe in the room, they do have safe deposit boxes in the office.  They are small the size of a large wallet but it is long.  The room was comfortable
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and writing about your stay.  Thank you for writing about how our property and its ammenities was a benefit to you.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The parking here is atrocious.  They have added a gate to use so that they can monitor parking, but they have no room for people to park who are checking in, so when we try to get through the gate, people are blocking it and there is no where for us to go.  Also, it is really hard to get in and out of the spaces.  You can barely back up without narrowly missing the car behind you.  Also we could swear we saw something saying there was a gym here and there isn't one.  The internet is not that great and the hair dryer doesn't work at all.  The shower is very difficult to operate, with a weird way to turn it on and no instructions.  The only compliment so far is that the people who work here are extremely nice and helpful.  That's generally the most important thing--at least that
Manager Response: First I would like to thank you for staying with us and writing about your experience.  I am sorry you were disappointed with your stay at the Best Western Plus Park Place Inn.  We take into account all comments provided by guests to try and improve our property.  I am very pleased that you enjoyed the service provided by the employees even if the other aspects of your stay were disappointing.  I do hope that you will stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Best Accommodation I've had in Anaheim
Summary: Love this hotel.   The location of course is superb.  Have stayed at several motels in Anaheim when visiting Disneyland.  Will not deviate from this one..  And will be back next May.  (From Australia) Staff so friendly and helpful....  Got us a wheelchair for hire at a moments notice.  Disabled person in our group caused a toilet block... fixed it very promptly. Rooms wonderful.  The suites are a perfect size.  Laundry room very handy.   The complimentary breakfast Is the best....  You only need some plain cereal or a couple of pieces of toast for brekky when you're spending the day at Disneyland.  Any more than this and you're asking to make yourself sick. Can't wait to visit the hotel again.  We know we will enjoy ourselves and be comfortable and well looked after. Julie
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience as our guest.  I am very happy that we were able to assist you with any needs that arose and that our ammenities were beneficial during your stay.  We look forward to seeing you again in May.  Please let me know if there is any way I can be of help while planning or during your next visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: To begin, I am giving this hotel 5 stars b/c they deserve it for their contributing to our 5 star stay, mostly b/c of the location and excellent customer service, but don't confuse it w/ a 5 star hotel.  It is a simple Best Western and is more like an upgraded, nice hotel / motel.  Still, everything was nice, the room was large enough and clean and for what it is it couldn't have been better.  To begin the location is as everyone else has said amazing.  It is at that traffic light right across the street from the main entrance to Disneyland and is about a 4 minute walk from the hotel to the entrance plaza to Disneyland and Disney California Adventure.  It was perfect for both getting to the parks early in the morning and having a short walk home at night after a long day.
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for staying with us at the Best Western Plus Park Place Inn.  I was extremely pleased when reading your comments about your experience with us.  Your compliments regarding your driver will definitely be passed on to AMG's (car service) Manager.  And what a fun and unexpected experience for the children to ride in the limo.  Thank you for your compliments regarding the hotel and staff.  The staff  greatly appreciates hearing that their efforts made a guest's stay enjoyable and memorable.  We hope we will be able to be of service to you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay while at Disneyland.
Summary: This hotel was in a great location for Disneyland. There were mini marts and retaurants close by which was nice. Cost of the hotel was reasonable and continental breakfast was decent. The rooms were clean. My only complaint would be the rugs. We have an 11 month old that loves to crawl. When we would put him down his legs and hands would be black after. Not the end of the world, but that's my one negative.
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for staying with us and writing a review of our property.  I would like to apologize for the carpet.  We do try and keep to a routine shampooing schedule to maintain the cleanliness of the carpets.  I am very happy that this issue will not prevent you from staying with us again.  However, if there is ever anything wrong with the room you are staying in, please let us know immediately so we can address it.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care,

Summary: Based on reviews and previous stays at Best Westerns we were very pleasantly surprised. The room was large and clean, it had a mini fridge and microwave. The free breakast was ok (eggs, sausage, frozen waffles, pastries, fruit, cereal, etc) and was a good, quick way to start the day. The main plus was that the hotel is right across the street from the Disneyland entrance. Our twin girls became very tired after half a day at Disneyland, so we were able to take them back to the room for a nap and then go back to Disneyland. The next time we go to Disneyland we will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and writing about your experience.  I am very happy to see that we exceeded your expectations.  We recently added new additions to the breakfast and I am glad it was a good start to your day.    We look forward to seeing you and your twins again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Once again we thoroughly enjoyed our stay at this perfectly located Best Western. The rooms are immaculate and the service is prompt and professional. The one thing keeping us from giving it a perfect rating is the weak and very unreliable wifi. Much to their credit, the staff did reset the router, but it did not improve the service. However, this will note event us from staying here during our many visits to the Magic Kindom in tne future!
Manager Response: Thank you for returning and visiting us.  I apologize for the internet trouble.  We are working with the provider try and determine the problem.  I am very happy it did not disuade you from future visits and that the rest of your stay was enjoyable.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We loved our stay at this motel for our spring break vacation.  It was not only close and convenient, it was extremely clean.  The restaurant and nearby store were an added plus!  The pool was nice, but we spent our time at the parks.  Overall, it was a wonderful vacation and we will return to the Best Western Plus Park Place Inn and Mini Suites!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our property.  I am very pleased you had a wonderful spring break while staying with us.  We look forward to your return visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: My husband and I recently stayed here in August 2012. This motel is right across the street from the main gate to Disney Land. With that said you are not staying at some upscale hotel. The Best Western was clean and reasonably priced. The pool area is small with some chairs around it and there is a hot tub. They even let us keep our car parked there until 4:00pm on the day we checked out. I would stay there again if we went back.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and writing a review of our property.  I very happy that you enjoyed your stay and intend to stay with us again if you return to the area.  We hope we will see you soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Location location location!!!!!  Super convenient! This hotel is right across the street from the Disney entrance!!!!  We got to the gate quicker than walking from parking to trams.  Rates were reasonable and included free continental breakfast. I have to say it was better than most "continental" breakfasts! It even included eggs and sausage. Cant complain when its FREE!!!  Hotel room was pretty clean and spacious and staff was very friendly and helpful!!! Only "con" I have is the parking expires at 3pm the next day.  Would be nice to be able to leave our car til we leave Disneyland even at an extra fee. Over all great experience! Definitely will return!!!
Manager Response: I would first like to thank you for staying with us and also for writing a review of our property.  I am very happy that you enjoyed your stay with us.  When we are not busy and have ample parking available, we are more than happy to extend the parking time for our guests.  However when busy, we do need to ensure we have spaces for arriving and in-house guests.  We look forward to you staying with us again and meeting all of your needs.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: As Season Pass Holders that live in Northern California - we definitely want to maximize our time when we're at Disneyland. This Hotel puts you as close as you can get. You're literally 5 mins walking door to door! While the beds leave us achy in the morning...and we've struggled with WiFi access (especially at the back of the building), you're so thoroughly exhausted by the time you get there - all that matters is SLEEP & how many of those glorious steps you saved being so close! Captain Kids Buffet next door that comes with your Booking is a great way to start the day if you're not interested in the delicious $30/head Disney Character Breakfast. We always catch a shuttle from the John Wayne Airport - and avoid the $8/night Parking for your Rental Car if you don't need it!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and writing a review of our property.  Your comfort is very important to us.  If anything in the room ever makes you uncomfortable or does not meet your satisfaction, please let us know.  We want you to fully enjoy your stay with us.  I am pleased you enjoyed the breakfast we provide at Captain Kidd's.  We try to make sure there are enough options to satisfy all of our guests.  We look forward to seeing you again and hope it is soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel is reasonably priced, especially for its great location a very short distance from the front gates of Disney.  Clean room, comfortable bed and newer pull out couch made a for a great night's sleep. Quiet and close to all the action. The late night check in staff was not overly friendly but on every other encounter the staff was very nice and professional.  We happen to stay a night where the electricity that serviced the hotel went out.  While this was not their fault and it was difficult due to the heat, the staff did keep us informed on the status of the repair and followed up with a phone call after the stay.  The customer service during this ugly problem was excellent, better than we had hoped.  The free breakfast is lacking for anyone over the age of 6, really
Manager Response: Thank you for telling about your stay with us at the Best Western Plus Park Place Inn.  I am sorry the customer service wasn't as it should have been when you checked in.  This is being addressed.  No matter what time you arrive you should receive the same quality of customer service.  I would like to thank you for your understanding during the power outage.  It was a very hot day, warm night, and very uncomfortable.  I hope you will stay with us again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: If you are looking for a clean and reasonably priced hotel near Disney Land, this is the hotel for you. It is located directly across the street from the entrance to both parks and Downtown Disney. No need to pay for parking at Disney. All of the attractions are easily in walking distance to the Best Western. This is not a 4 or 5 star hotel, but it is clean, reasonably priced and as close as you can get without staying on Disney property.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the Best Western Park Place Inn.  I hope you will stay with us again so we can provide you with another relaxing and enjoyable visit to the Disney Resort Area.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Street light across Disneyland & California Adventure entrances!
Summary: Even with having NO Power for about 8 hours due to the hotel electrical transformer blowing out, WE had a pleasant time staying at Best Western. The hotel manager "Lillian" and her entire staff really did their best to keep us safe during the power outage. Room 117 was clean and even with the pool right outside our window, we couldn't really hear all the kids swimming. The laundry room was conveniently located close by so that we could do our laundry, since we had just came in from Carlsbad, CA. The vending & ice machines were also next to the laundry area. Traveling with my mother-in-law in her mid 70's, coming back to the hotel to rest for the evening Disney Fireworks and World of Colors water shows were a huge plus, especially with the heat. FYI - Yes, we could really hear
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for taking the time to write a review of our property.  I am very happy to see that you enjoyed your stay even with the power outage.  Thank you for your understanding.  Especially on a very hot day with no air conditioner available.  We look forward to having you you stay with us again and hope it is soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Obviously the location is one of this hotel's best attributes. But not only is it right across the street from the entrance, it offers a spacious and clean room at a reasonable price.  My family spent 4 nights at this hotel and we were not disappointed with any part of our stay. Our room had two queen beds, and a pull out sofa bed. There was a microwave and mini fridge that was larger than what most of the other hotels offer. The beds were comfortable and even our 15 year old son said the pull out sofa was better than most.  The complimentary breakfast was OK and is comparable to what some of the other nearby hotels offer.  It allowed us and the kids to get something to eat before heading to the parks. We will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for staying with us and writing a review of our property.  It was wonderful to read that you enjoyed your stay with us.   We look forward to having you stay with us during future visits to the area.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Two night stay with just the right amenities for what we needed. Clean bathroom, clean beds, clean fridge, lots of room for 2 adults and 2 young kids. The sitting area in the room was a plus. Quiet hotel, great parking and walking to the parks, safe, just right. A crib that we requested was waiting for us, clean and ready to use.  Breakfast was better than expected as there was protein included and available every day. And the overall price was right for our budget. We would stay again and recommend it to friends/family!  areas that could be improved: better light in the rooms (it felt dark at night), lighter color carpet (the dark color makes me think that a lot of dirt is not showing).
Manager Response: Thank you for your compliments of our property and noting what you would like to see improved.  Reviews like yours help us to continue making improvements and maintain a high level of customer service and satisfaction.  I am please you enjoyed your stay and hope we will have you as a guest again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: My husband and I stayed here in March 2012 for three nights and you could not get a better location.  As others have said, it's literally a 5 minute walk from the hotel to the Disneyland/California Park/Downtown Disney gates.  We arrived early due to our flight and transfer from LAX but checking in was easy, with friendly service, and they were happy to keep our bags in reception while we ate next door (I can't remember the name of the chain restaurant, but it's where we got buffet breakfast included in our hotel deal), and again for the whole day after we checked out and had the day to fill in (spent across the road at Downtown Disney and cinema there) until our transfer back to LAX.  We had originally booked for 2 nights because we weren't sure what we would do on the last
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our property.  I am very pleased that you were so comfortable that you stayed an extra night with us.  I am sorry that you unfortunately had to move rooms, but glad that we could accommodate you for another night.  Thank you for referring us to your friends.  We hope we will see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Our room was spacious and comfortable, and the hotel is directly across the street from Disney.  It's literally a 5 minute walk from the hotel to the park entrance, which is huge when you're leaving the park exhausted or you want to recharge during the day.  The complimentary breakfast was always hot and fresh, and had enough choices to satisfy everyone in our family.  The pool was small but very clean and refreshing.    My only complaint is the carpet in our room was really dirty.  Our kids walked around the room barefoot for less than 5 minutes and the bottoms of their feet were completely black!  I have never experienced a hotel carpet this dirty before.  Aside from that, we had a very good experience at this hotel and would definately stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our property.  I am pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us.  I am sorry for the dirty carpet.  We do have a routine shampooing schedule.  If you read this, please let me know which room you were in so we could look at the room.  Perhaps some rooms require more frequent shampooing due to location.  Thank you again.  Take care.

Summary: Stayed here for two nights in July a family with kids 18, 15 and 12.  The service from the staff was efficient and friendly. The room was adequate and had all we expected. It helped that a mix up in supplies left us with extra towels and consumables but I suspect we could have got those on asking.  The key here is location. Literally across the road from Disney which was useful when one of us had to be removed from the park by wheelchair!  Decent pool and staff very helpful when we left in directing us to where we needed to go.  Go here if you want to go to Disney and put that car away for a while.
Manager Response: Thank you for your compliments of our property and staff.  We enjoy reading that our guests enjoyed their stay.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Just returned from a 3 night stay. The short walk from the Disney parks was priceless. Checking in was a fast, but not overly friendly experience. The room was clean and comfortable. Now and again there was a foul odor coming from the sink, but it wasn't bothersome enough to call the desk. We found the gift shop to be kinda lame. Check out was fast and very friendly(different employee). We would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our property.  I am pleased that your stay was enjoyable.  If anything is not to your satisfaction, please definitely let us know as soon as possible so we can address it.    We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We were very pleased with our 3-night stay at the BW Park Place.  The free buffet breakfast next door at Captain Kidd's was fresh and with good variety of choices: which made quite a difference when we would postpone lunch to catch a few more rides.  It was great to be so close to the parks, where we could easily walk there in the morning, and return to our room in the middle of the day, and get back quickly late at night when we were tired.    The 2 queen + sleeper suite was large enough and the beds were comfortable.    The cleaning staff did well, and and front desk was always courteous and professional.       I feel that the availability of suites, quality of the breakfast, and the proximity to the Disney parks make this hotel an exceptional value.
Manager Response: Thank you for your compliments of our property, service, and staff.  We strive to make each guests stay comfortable and enjoyable.  It is a pleasure to read when we have been successful.  We look forward to you staying with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We have stayed here 2 times before and both times the reservations were messed up, but they fixed it and we had an enjoyable stay.  My daugher made a reservation months ago for sept.  She recieved a phone call this past weekend saying the card was declined and they could not hold the reservation.  She asked why the card was ran now and they said that was their policy, even though that has never happened before.  They stated that who ever my daughter talked to was wrong.  Now I can see running the card right before the stay or right when the reservation was made but not somewhere in the middle.  Since we have had so many problems with reservations, we will no longer ever stay there again and this is sad because it is a nice and convient place to stay.  They need to confirm their
Manager Response: I am sorry you have not been satisfied with your reservation experience.  Several changes were made to the reservation since the original booking.  When the reservation was updated in July it required the card to authorize again since the initial authorization had already expired.  When it reauthorized the card came back as declined.  This is why she received a call.  Again, I am sorry this caused you to have a negative experience with our reservation process.  We hope you will consider staying with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Very close to Disneyland, but still inb a quiet location.  Large, well equipped rooms and a decent breakfast.  The kids enjoyed the pool and bubble bath. A good place to watch the fireworks in the evening is at the front end of the Inn (facing Disneyland).
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our property.  I hope we get to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Being Disney passholders we have tried several hotels near Disneyland. You cant beat the location of this hotel. We have 4 kids and we get the double queen mini suite. Plenty of room for the six of us. Sofa is a queen sleeper.  Rates are reasonable and they offer AAA discount. The hotel is clean and beds are comfy. There are several fast food places and resturants within walking distance. Which is nice since down town disney resturants usually have a long wait. We stay at this hotel in the winter months beacuse when its warm we enjoy laying out by pool and the pool at this hotel is shaded early. So if you could care less about sunshine by the pool I would recomend this hotel. We will stay here when we come for our trip in October!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our hotel and offering your recommendation.  We hope we will get to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The Best Western is the closest (non-Disney) hotel you can get to Disneyland, Disney California Adventure, and Downtown Disney. It's really easy to just walk across the street and get into the parks (after security and tickets, of course). The room was a good size and the bathroom was clean. Beds were comfortable. The "mini suite" portion is just a pony wall with a table and chairs behind it, so don't expect anything fancy. We stayed one night in peak season, so we didn't get the best rate, but you pay for the location.  The complementary breakfast was excellent--even if we just grabbed a few things to eat on our way into the park.  Just be aware that there is another "Best Western" property a few doors down.  Don't get confused like we did!
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing your stay with us.  We appreciate your comments and hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Like many previous reviewers, I also say ..... location .... location .... location ....!! We stayed here for eight days for our first trip to southern California and I am happy that we chose this hotel. Nothing could beat its location...... literally five minutes walking from Disneyland and California Adventure main gates. We also visited San Diego Zoo, Sea World, and Universal Studios with Southern California Gray Line sightseeing tours. The bus stop for Gray Line was also right in front of the hotel!! The sidewalk in front of the hotel is possibly one of best locations to see the fireworks every night!! The suite was clean overall, although I wish the floor could have been vacuumed, at least, once during our stay (I wish Martha Lopez didn't have her days off for the most part
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful comments about your stay with us.  I am pleased to see that you enjoyed your time at the Best Western Park Place.  I will pass on your thanks to Gaby and Ken.  I hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Absolutely recommended by a fussy traveller
Summary: Our room was a double queen mini suite and we were very impressed. So clean that everything looked brand new. Bathroom was very modern, beds were amazingly comfortable and a full sized wardrobe for all your clothes. I am a fuss-pot and I was very happy. We did Disneyland in one day from 8am to 1am and were so glad that this was the absolute closest Hotel to the main gate. Literally across the road, very short walk and you're in Disneyland. When my 8 year old said he couldn't walk another step beyond the main gate I pointed out the Hotel across the road and he decided he could make it that far, I felt for all the people who had to go further down the block. For breakfast we chose to go to Ihop instead of the free buffet, this was a big mistake. Ihop was incredibly slow and the
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for taking the time to write a review of our hotel.  It is wonderful to know that you were able to have a very enjoyable and relaxing stay.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Best place to stay near Disneyland
Summary: We stay here every year on our annual Disney trip and have never been disappointed.  It's within walking distance of IHOP (great breakfast), Disneyland, California Adventure, and Downtown Disney.  We don't need the car until we leave for home.  The rooms are clean and comfortable.  The hotel staff is friendly and helpful.  If the purpose of your trip is to visit Disney attractions, you can't beat this hotel for price and convenience.
Manager Response: Thank you for returning to the Best Western Plus Park Place Inn.  We look forward to another visit.  Hopefully soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This was a great hotel to stay at for a trip to Disneyland!  The hotel was DIRECTLY across the street from the park.  Within 5 minutes after leaving the park, I was IN my room.  Can't ask for better than that.  They do have a free continental breakfast which was so so, but there is a IHOP right next door.  The rooms were a nice size and very clean.  They also have a gift shop where they sell VERY reasonably priced Disney shirts.  The only negative is a word of caution....the parking ticket that they give you is a little paper ticket, that kind of resembles a fast pass ticket (very easy to mistake as garbage and throw out) and if you lose it, they charge you $75!  I wondered how much money they make on that...  Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our property.  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay and our location.  We look forward to you staying with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We got to our hotel with a sick kid a little early (after calling ahead to ask if we could do so).  That was nice for them to do for us.  the beds were fine, and the room was clean.  The floor would be the only minor complaint.  But not enough to warrant a phone call (the provide cards in the room if there are immediate concerns. The cleaning staff did a nice job.  We are pretty sure we left a Carsland souvenier in our room, and it was not returned, but that is on us forgetting when we left (our kid was still sick).  One night at 10:30pm our 5 year old got sick, and I was going to turn on the shower, the handle came off.  Maintenance was there in 5 minutes to fix it.  Again, very nice service.  Breakfast was just fine.  Some warm items, lots of fruit and danish.  Drinks to get
Manager Response: I am sorry your child was sick during your visit to Disneyland.  I am glad we had a room available early for you so your child could rest.  I am sorry there were some issues with the room.  You mentioned they did not bother you but we do like our guests to be 100% satisfied.  I am also sorry that we did not find the missing Cars Land souvenir.  We try and get all items left behind back to our guests.  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay overall.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel has the best location in Anaheim. The Disney entrance is literally across the street. The room are good. They had two double beds for the four of us. The breakfast was at the restaurant next door which was ok. There are other restaurants close by too. There is a pool, laundry services within the hotel. Overall we were extremely happy with our choice thanks to trip advisor
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our property.  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: My family stayed at Best Western Park Place Inn June 30-July 7.  It was the best decision I could have made for our family.  The price was awesome!  The location was amazing!  The room was clean with a wonderful housekeeping service each day.  My wife inquired at check-in where we could purchase a fan, since we use a fan at night even at home, for white noise.  The front desk offered us a fan to borrow while there.  This place exceeded our expectations!  The breakfast was plentiful and delicious each day.  We thought the breakfast was a strength of this establishment!  Overall, we would like to return next year since this place was so great!  Thank you to the management and employees of Best Western Park Place Inn for a memorable stay!  Craig Long
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our property.  It is wonderful to read that we exceeded your expectations.  We hope you will be able to visit us again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Best Place to Stay Near Disneyland!
Summary: Every year, we take our annual trip to Disneyland and we stay at this hotel.  We always book an adjoining room since they are so many of us.  This is one of the cleanest hotels on South Harbor.  I remember one time years ago, we stayed at another hotel and it wasn't as clean.  It's directly across the street from the main entrance to Disneyland. They provide a continental breakfast which has gotten a little sparse over the years, but what the heck, it's free.  Their customer service is okay (we never had any problems).  The rooms are clean and free of bed bugs (this hotel invested in bed bug mattress covers).  Can't comment on the Wifi since we leave our computers at home.  You can't go wrong with this Best Western for price and location.
Manager Response: Thank you for making us your Disneyland Vacation hotel.  We greatly appreciate your business and look forward to seeing you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: My family (three generations, ages 79 to age 2) stayed at this motel for five days in June.   This was one of the smartest things we did on our Disneyland visit because we were literally across the street, one crosswalk, and each of us could come & go at will.    We would walk over early in the morning, walk back in the afternoon to rest, and then walk back in the late afternoon until closing.   The complimentary buffet breakfast is at an adjacent restaurant, but everything worked seamlessly, and we were able to have a quick breakfast and still get to the park when it opened.   The buffet was solid with eggs & sausage links every morning plus fruits, pastries, cereals, yogurt, etc.    FYI advice:   there are two washing machines/two dryers for 199 rooms and the hours are
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our property.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us.  We look forward to you returning for another visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel from June 29-July 2. Check in and check out was so easy and uncomplicated, we wonder why other hotels can't be as efficient. We had two cars and needed handicapped parking for one, so they gave us valet parking at the hotel next door to accommodate that need. The staff at this hotel were amazing and easy to deal with. They really took care of everything.
Manager Response: Thank you for writing a review of our property.  I am pleased we were able to accomodate your needs to make your stay enjoyable.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Please come back soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: My husband and I visited June 17-21 for our 25th anniversary.  We were very happy with nearly every aspect of our stay.  You truly can't get closer to the DL gates than this hotel unless you stay at the Grand Californian which is so out of our price range.  We found our room to be very clean and the staff was extremely friendly.  We had a king room which included a sitting area with a sofa, a microwave and refrigerator.  It also had a large flat screen tv.  I loved the bedding!  There was no scratchy, stiff, nasty bedspread.  We ate the free breakfast twice.  It is located next door in the upstairs of Captain Kidd's.  It was a basic breakfast, but fueled us up to start our day in the park.  They had egg patties, sausage links, waffles, cereal, oatmeal, fruit, danishes, bagels,
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is the 3rd or 4th time we've stayed here.  The pros are that the front desk staff are very friendly and helpful and I can't emphasize how close and convenient it is to the entrance to Disneyland.  Literally right across the street. The price also can't be beat!  The rooms are decent.  They've always been very clean when we've stayed.  The house keeping staff is awesome and I feel they really try to add little special touches such as folding the towels in a fancy way.  But it couldn't hurt for the rooms to be updated a little bit.  They're fairly worn, but considering I don't spend a lot of time in the room it's not that big of a deal.  There's also a free continental breakfast...I prefer to just have coffee in the park but it's great for families and when we go with our
Manager Response: Thank you for writing a review of our hotel.  We greatly appreciate your repeat visits to our property.  We just very recently upgraded our Wi Fi service so there should no longer be connection problems.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I like this hotel! It is actually the only hotel I've stayed at the last two times I went to Disneyland. It is right accross the street - LIKE right across the street - from the entrance to both Disneyland and California Adventure. If you are not going to be staying at one of the Disneyland Hotels, this is the one and only place I would ever stay. We usually get the suite which is only like $180 a night and sleeps 6 people. The way I see it is why pay big $$$$$ if your not even going to be in your room most of the time.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our property.  We look forward to you coming to stay with us again.   Thank you and take care.

Summary: I wish i could give 3.5 stars, which would be a little more accurate.  Slightly above average but not great or exceptional.    We were staying for 3 nights at the Best Western Park Place Mini Suites.  This hotel is located at the pedestrian crosswalk that leads to the entrance of Disneyland.  This hotel and the Park Vue hotel, located on the other side of the crosswalk, are the closest hotels to Disney's entrance other than Disney's Grand Californian Resort & Spa.  That hotel is pretty much located inside Disney's California Adventure park.  But beyond that, the Disneyland Hotel and Disney's Paradise Pier are both actually further than where we stayed and cost twice as much.  I paid a discounted rate of $96/night.  Paradise Pier & Disneyland Hotel, by contrast cost about
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our property.  I am very pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us.  I am sorry the hostess was not there to greet you as you went up the stairs.  We do not provide tickets for the continental breakfast.  I think what you are describing is the gift shop coupon.  However, you may be asked to show your room key.  Again thank you for writing a review and bringing this to our attention.  We look forward to your return visit.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for 5 nights in June 2012.  I agree it is the most conveniently located (non Disney) hotel to Disneyland.  We had a mini suite, which is not a suite but just a larger room, for 2 adults and 2 children under 4.  The hotel is literally across the road from the main entrance to Disneyland so were we're able to easily take the kids home during the day for a rest.  The hotel itself is somewhat dated but this is more than compensated for by it's location.
Manager Response: Thank you for writing about our property.  I do hope your stay was enjoyable and comfortable and that we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This is our 3rd trip to Disneyland in the past decade.  We have stay at all three of the hotels just across the street from Disneyland (Desert Inn & Suites, Park Vue, Park Place Inn).  This is the best of all for us. We stayed 9 nights with 6 of use in the suite with 2 queen beds and a sofa bed.  The sofa bed was great for our kids. Of, course the location was the best. Just a few minutes to walk to the gate entrance.  I was initially hesitant in staying here since I read the negative reviews - parking, breakfast, pool...) There is a $8 charge for parking. We found parking with plenty of space for our Odyssey van. There are compact designated spaces for smaller cars which others are probably complaining about. We checked in early (in the morning) during the mid-week, and we were
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write your review of our property.  I am thrilled that we were able to exceed your expectations.  Thank you for pointing out specific details so we can continue to provide the service you enjoyed.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: BW Park Place Inn is our go-to hotel when we can't get in at the Grand Californian. Why? Because it is close. I do not make the trek to California to sit in my room the whole time; we are looking for a place to put our bags and a clean bed to sleep in and we get both. Yes, it can be noisy when people run by the rooms, but this has nothing to do with the hotel and everything to do with the fact that people do not raise their children to be courteous of others (or practice it themselves, for that matter) and it happens everywhere - including at the GC. We go to the park from 8 in the morning until 11 most nights and this hotel is a great place to crash and recharge for the next day. If you are looking for a California resort experience, figure it out and go elsewhere more suited
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our property.  We greatly appreciate you repeat visits.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Excellent service.  Great value breakfast. Egg patties, sausage, waffles, croissants, toast, juices, fruits, coffee, tea, milk. Those folks complaining about this breakfast probably have not stayed at any other "free breakfast" hotels. In that category, this is one of the best.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our property and your compliments.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We had a room booked for 3 days, then we left for 5, and came back for another 3 days. The first leg our room was on the 2nd floor, it was clean and quiet. I didn't need alot done to the room, and the maid came just as we were leaving, I asked for more coffee, and for the beds to be made and towels replaced...she obliged and was quite nice.  The second 3 day stay, was exactly the opposite...our room was on the 3rd floor, after I specifically asked for the second floor, couldn't get the first floor at all because they only put the quites on the second and third floors.  Our room stunk like cigarettes the moment I walked in the door. Ugh!!  And the toilet was sluggish in flushing.  I complained at the front Desk, and asked for someone to spray the room. They did. They asked if I
Manager Response: First I would like to thank you for writing a review.  Letting us know what you appreciated and what you felt needed improved, helps us improve our service.  I am sorry your second stay with us did not meet your expecations.   I am sorry we did not have a room available for you on the second floor.  We do our best to meet all requests, however, it is just not always possible.    Housekeeping works very hard to make sure all guests staying the night have their rooms cleaned by 4 pm and that rooms are ready for arrivals by 3 pm.  Depending how busy they are will determine how quickly the rooms are cleaned.  If you will be returning for naps, please let us know by what time you would like your room cleaned.   Housekeeping will do their absolute best to accomodate your needs.  I am sorry for the cigarette odor in the room.  All of our rooms are nonsmoking.  Unfortunately someone was inconsiderate.  I am pleased you were able to visit our continental breakfast.  We do not run the Captain Kidd's restaurant, we just lease the psace for our breakfast.  Please see us at the front desk and we can provide you with several options in a very short walking distance.  We do hope to see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: The second happiest place on earth
Summary: Stayed here  for 10 nights in febuary 2012 with my partner.We both had the best time,being so close to D/L was a big plus,after walking the parks all day its good to know u only have about 480 (yes i counted them)or so steps to go to get back to your room,and when u get back your room is  clean and fresh.Our room was at the back, ground floor,this was a little noisy at times with trafficand people arriving very early or late and unpacking there cars.The beds were very comfy and clean.The girls who service/clean the rooms do a fantastic job,our room was perfect everytime we returned.Front desk staff were great,very friendly and helpful and,as with everyone at this hotel, greet you with a smile.I can't pick any faults with this hotel,great price,location and staff.The restaurant
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our property.  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay with us.  Please stop by the continental breakfast on your next visit.  We have added waffles, sausage, egg patties and croissants since you stayed with us.  We look forward to seeing you next year.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: You can't get any closer to Disneyland than the Best Western Park Place Inn and Suites.  Right across the street from the main entrance to Disney, Rates are very reasonable for the location, and type of motel.  I highly recommend if your looking for convienence, and a great price.  Don't expect a Four Seasons, but if you plan to spend most of your time at Disney and not much time in your room - This is the place!  Clean, friendly staff, and continental breakfast.  Nicely done Best Western!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to write about your stay with us.  It is always wonderful to read when our guests enjoy their stay at our property.  We look forward to you staying with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: You can't get any closer to the main gates at Disneyland!
Summary: We stayed two nights at this Best Western and had minimal complaints.  We had trouble with the wifi but it could have been our devices.  The front desk was helpful, gift shop has good prices on Disney items, and my family enjoyed the included breakfast.  Like my title says, you can't get any closer to Disneyland and it's WELL worth your money to be able to walk across the street and fall into bed after walking around the park for 16 hours!  We would definitely choose this hotel again! :)
Manager Response: I appreciate you taking the time to write a review of our property.  I am very pleased that you enjoyed your stay and what the property has to offer.  We would be very happy to have you stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: A Top Notch Hotel and Steps Away from Disneyland
Summary: This hotel is perfect for any one on a trip to Disneyland.  It is only steps away from the main entrance.  We arrived early and while the family went into Disneyland I waited with the car until our rooms were ready.  The staff at the front desk are very, very good and they got our connecting rooms ready by 930am.  we booked double queen mini suites and I requested connecting rooms and they were able to give us just want we wanted.  The rooms are large and well appointed for a mid range hotel chain.  They were spotless and well supplied with towels etc.  My wife mentioned how nice the rooms were many times during our stay as did the other adults in our party.  We stayed a total of 7 days and 6 nights.  The beds are very comfortable.  The maid service is outstanding.  a hint, if
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write such a wonderful and detailed review of our property.  I am very pleased we were able to exceed your expectations and meet your needs while you stayed with us.  Everyone here works very hard to make sure our guests have a very enjoyable stay.  It is a pleasure knowing when the efforts have succeeded.  We definitely look forward to having you and your family stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: A number of couples got together for an adult trip to Disneyland and this place was perfect. Right across the streen from the entrance made paying for parking and the lost time riding and waiting for shuttles a thing of the past. Bargain rate by booking 3 months ahead. Acceptable free breakfast saved that hassle and money also. Can't be beat in my book. Going back again this year.
Manager Response: Thank you for writing a review of our property.  I enjoyed reading about your stay with us.  We look forward to having you here next year.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This hotel is just what you would expect from a Best Western.  The rooms were clean and large enough.  This is the closest Hotel to Disneyland.  It takes about 5 to 10 minutes to the front gate.  The staff was o.k.  The maid service was excellent, very friendly and helpful.  The free continental breakfast is in the building next-door and up a flight of stairs.  The only reason I went up there was for coffee.  The coffee makers in the rooms are one cup at a time.  I did see another traveler taking his coffee pot to his room and I will remember that next time.  The breakfast was o.k.  If you had a large family you had to feed, but not very inviting.  The pool is small and in the shade.  We were able to swim once but it was pretty cold.  The smoking areas are poor, they have one
Manager Response: Thank you for writing a review of our property.  I appreciate the comments you left regarding our property and your stay.  They will help us make improvements for all of our guests.  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay and I hope we will get to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This was our first time staying at the Best Western Plus Park Place in Anaheim.  We arrived early and our room was not yet ready.  The staff at the hotel allowed us to go for a swim until our room was ready and came out to get us once it was.   My son left his wallet in the change room and a very honest staff member found it and returned it to the front counter.   Everyone at the hotel was cheerful and helpful.  The rooms were clean and the beds were comfy.  The breakfast was typical Continental fare...there was a selection of fresh fruit, yogurts, pasteries and a few hot items as well.   The staff at the Gift Shop were so friendly and helpful as well.  We will be staying there again on our next trip for sure!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write about your experience with us.  I am glad you were able to enjoy the pool until your room was ready and that your son received wallet back.  We definitely look forward to having you as our guests again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Unfortunately we had to leave our originally reserved, "Quality" hotel (haha), due to a gross and unhealthy environment we were forced to look elsewhere.  I immediately drove straight to this hotel because i remembered the reviews on Trip Advisor.  I was quite traumatized by my experience at the last hotel and was greeted by the front desk at Best Western with great professionalism and extremely very accommodating staff.  I travel a good distance to come to Disneyland and have stayed in various Hotels.  I have concluded that paying a little extra for location and clean rooms is worth it.  They are located at the pedestrian crosswalk.  And their parking lot is gated so your car and the hotel is somewhat secure, comforting feature.  The Breakfast area is huge, inside and they
Manager Response: Thank you for writing about your experience with us.  I am extremely pleased that we were able to "save" your vacation after your experience at another hotel.  We look forward to you staying with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Good enough for us seasoned travelers!
Summary: When searching for a hotel to stay at with grandkids and our exchange student, we stumbled across this property.  The price was more than right, and we could get a mini suite that was perfect for our group.  One double sofa sleeper and two queen beds were perfect.  The room had everything we needed, was clean, and had free Internet.  Add a free breakfast for the group and you have a winning combination.  Located right across from the Disneyland park entrance, we are told it is a 5 minute walk to tickets.  This appears to be a family friendly place, so if you don't like that, stay somewhere else.  We have stayed at the Disney properties a couple of times, and I have to say this suits just fine.
Manager Response: Thank you for writing a review of our property.  I am pleased we were able to provide you with the experience you have come to expect from Best Western.  We definitely look forward to having you and your family stay with us again.  Until we see you again, take care and thank you.

Summary: First and foremost, you're immediately across the street from Disneyland.   There isn't a hotel that's closer, including the Disneyland hotel!   This hotel is 3 floors, clean, $8 to park your vehicle, small pool, hot tub, very accommodating and friendly front desk staff, and an overall great experience.  There are two pc's in the reception area if you need internet access, but wifi is throughout the hotel.   There is a little gift shop in reception, plus an ATM.    We found the rooms to be quite quiet, though they are on the smaller size.  The a/c comes from window units, not central air, but they work well.  The rooms are not 'fancy', but we had comfortable beds & pillows.  Shower w/ multiple setting showerhead.  Microwave, mini-fridge, table and chairs, enough room for all
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for taking the time to write a review of our property.  I am very pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us.  We look forward to another visit from you and your family.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Can't get any closer to Disney
Summary: We just returned from 3 days at Disneyland and staying at this hotel made the trip a lot easier.  It's great to be within easy walking distance from the main gate to the parks.  It also made getting passes easy as they were offered at the front desk, no standing in line at the ticket booths first thing each morning.  The motel was very clean and well maintained.  It's an older property but you can tell it's been remodeled recently and was having work done while we were there.  The bed was comfortable, the staff was excellent and the location is great.
Manager Response: Thank you for writing a review of our property.  We appreciate you sharing your experience with others.  Hopefully we will see you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We stayed in this hotel on a week long trip to Disneyland the week of 5/13. The overall best thing about this hotel is the location. It's directly across the street from the Park entrance. This was the only reason that it got 2 stars from me. Everything else about the place is mediocre at best including the breakfast. Their "hot" waffles are hard instant ones, so don't get excited because there is no iron. The standard stale danish, yougurt, fruit and cold cereal accompanied. The room felt dingy for some reason, and not because it wasn't cleaned, it just felt like it needed an update badly. We got stuck with a room that still had a CRT television which absolutely sucked!! It only showed about 75% of the picture, and the quality was horrible. The pillows were small and lumpy. The
Manager Response: First, I would like to thank you for writing a review of our property.  All reviews help us to improve our quality and our service for our guests.  I am very sorry that you did not enjoy your stay with us.   I am sorry if you brought any of these concerns to us while staying here and they were not addressed.  Many of these concerns could have been addressed immediately providing you with a relaxing and comfortable stay.  Please feel free to contact me at the hotel at any time if you have any questions or concerns.  We would like you to experience the true Best Western Plus Park Place Inn experience.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: I found this hotel to be very clean. My family had two rooms, a king with pull out bed and one with 2 queens and a pull out. We did not use the sofa beds, so I don't know if they're comfortable. The location of this hotel cannot be beat. I think it might be closer to the entrances of the parks than the Disneyland Hotel. We had rooms at the very back of the hotel on the third floor, and while it was a longer walk from the street, the rooms were very private and very, very quiet. We never heard another person in the hotel, even though it was booked. Everything in the room felt very clean, although one of our two rooms smelled a little like a sweaty locker room. Since we decided not to complain, I can't really fault the hotel for that, though the smell did last the three days we
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for taking the time to write a nice detailed review.  All the information you provided will help us in our effort to continuously improve our service and our property.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us.  I am sorry about the odor in the room.  Please let us know next time if there is anything unsatisfactory with the room.  We will do our best to correct whatever it is.  We look forward to having you stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We stayed in a mini-suite with 2 queens and a sofa bed for four nights. We picked the accommodation based on cost and distance to Disneyland, but when I first saw the motel and our room the Disneyland magic was deflated and I was wishing we had splurged more on the hotel. Our second-floor room faced a giant white brick wall--absolute worst view ever. The mini-suites are long and narrow and don't let in very much natural light, which gives them a dark, depressing quality. Our room was also quite stuffy when we first got in. There is no central air conditioning, just an aging wall unit that must be manually operated. The AC must be run continuously if you want to avoid the stuffiness, but that also makes it hard to sleep because the AC is loud and rattles a bit. So the first night
Manager Response: I would first like to thank you for writing a review of our property.  I am very sorry you did not enjoy your stay.  If any of our guests are experiencing any discomfort in their room we would like to know as soon as possible so we can address it.  I do hope you will give us another chance.  If there is a problem with natural lighting, if available, we can move you to a room on the other side of the property that allows more natural light into rooms.  If the AC is loud or rattling, our maintenance staff can address this issue with either adjustments or a new replacement.  If there seems to be something wrong with the bedding, we can ask our housekeeping staff to address this issue as well.  We want all of our guests to have a restful and enjoyable stay.  We will quickly correct any concerns to the extent of our ability.  Please contact me if you are coming back to the area.  I would like you to experience the relaxing and restful stay our guests repeatedly come back to enjoy

Summary: We had 6 of us in a mini-suite in 2 queen beds and a sofa bed. It had only one bathroom and barely enough room for us to use it with the max of 6 in the room. It was clean and the staff was nice and very helpful. The room was clean, but the lights were not very good. One lamp was broken at the switch, which made it hard to turn on and off, and the socket for one of the 2 bulbs didn't stay in the retainer always, so it had a tendency to hang down. The AC was a bit under-powered, so it was a bit humid in the room. We weren't in the room that much, so it was okay.  This motel is the closest one to Disneyland that you can find. If you want to be able to just run back and forth to your room while going to DL and DCS, this is the closest you will find. It is closer than the DL Hotel,
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for taking the time to write a review of our property.  If there is ever something not working correctly in your room, please let us know.  We will take care of it at whatever time is most convenient for you.  We want you to be as comfortable as possible when you stay with us.  I am pleased that you enjoyed your stay.  We would like you to come back, not just because of the closeness, but because you also had a wonderful experience.  Please contact me if you come back to the area.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We stayed here Apr. 28th thru May 4th, 2012 during our vacation to the SoCal area.   The room was great!  There was so much space ,it was very clean, the beds were very comfy and our view was fabulous!  (We were in room 380.) Loved the fridge and microwave and coffee maker. But the best thing for us was the staff.   Very friendly, very helpful and very willing to answer all our questions and concerns.  We only went to the free breakfast once, mostly because we had character breakfasts reserved at Disneyland, but it was much better than average.  We never took advantage of swimming at the pool, but we did check it out and it was small but very clean.   We definately loved the short walk back in the evening after the parks closed.   We will definately stay here again, in fact we
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for taking the time to write a review of our property.  It is wonderful to see that you enjoyed your stay with us.  We do look forward to seeing you in August.  Please do call us direct so we can assist you with your reservations.    Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Excellent location and large rooms that is perfect for a family!
Summary: My family and I stayed at the Best Western Plus Park Place Inn on March 2011. We had 2 mini-suite rooms. We paid $138.60 US for each day each room. The first room we got into smelled funny so the front desk changed our rooms.    Advantages:  1. The rooms were large enough for 4 adults and 2 young children.  2. The rooms contained 2 Queen Beds, Sofabed, Microwave ,Refrigerator, High Speed Internet Access, and a Coffee Maker.  3. The sinks are outside the bathroom so it is easy for multi-tasking without hogging the bathroom.  4. Disneyland entrance is right across the street so we always walked to Disneyland.  5. iHop was next door so we ate there for breakfast every day.  6. Tony Roma's is a close walk.  7. The beds were quite comfortable.  Disadvantages:  1. The elevator didn't
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for taking the time to write a review of our property.  All of your comments will help us improve our service.  We definitely like hearing the good.  However the not so good, is also appreciated so we can correct any issues.  If there is anything not to your satisfaction during your stay. please let us know so we can correct it and make your stay even more enjoyable.    Yest, our breakfast has been upgraded to include waffles, sausage and scrambled egg patties, croissants, yogurt, danishes, muffins, oatmeal, cereal, juices, coffee, milk and fresh fruit.  I am very sorry the boots were not located for you.  However,  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Great hotel. Directly across the street from the entrance to Disneyland.  Rooms were nice, comfy bed.  Breakfast next door at captain kidds.  Much better than average continental breakfast.  Pool a little small, but good enough.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our property.  We appreciate your comments and we are pleased you enjoyed your stay.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Favorite hotel! Has made improvements since last stay. Awesome stay!!
Summary: We try and stay here everytime we're in Disneyland. Depending on rates. We were there from fri-tues(short trip for us as we usually go for 10 days) We got in kind of late and I had made a request to be close to the front and they met my request. The staff was professional and friendly. Room was spacious, clean and quiet (on second floor) The beds were very comfortable, as were the pillows!!! Bathroom was nice. Shower was pretty nice with tile surround and had a shower head that had multiple settings. Was more impressed this stay with the updates they've made so far to the rooms. Room had microwave, mini frig and large vanity type area for getting ready in the morning. Which I loved because there was plenty of room for our belongings. There was also a pull out sofa. Didn't feel
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review of our property.  I am extremely pleased to see that we exceeded your expectations especially since you are a repeat guest.  We look forward to seeing you in October.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We liked this hotel because it was so close to the DL entrance.  I think possibly closer than the Grand Californian.  We had 2 queens and a sofabed.  They were comfortable and the room was plenty big for a family of 4 or even 5.  The sofa bed came in handy when one of my daughters got sick so the other one took the sofabed.  The rooms are not fancy, but they are clean and there is a microwave, small refrigerator and very small coffee pot.  The front desk folks were nice and there is a little gift shop which came in handy when we needed rain ponchos.  Restaurants nearby include McDonalds, IHop, Tony Romas and Denny's.  We didn't go for the free breakfast, so I can't say what that was like this time around.  In the past, it consisted of off-brand cereal, pastries and hard boiled
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our property.  Please try our breakfast the next time you stay with us.  It has now been upgraded to include Waffles, Scrambled Egg Patties, sausage and yogurt.  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay with us once again.  We look forward to seeing you soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: awesome location directly across the street from disney. comfy, clean rooms. very nice and accommodating customer service. breakfast not great but good enough... good for free! would definitely stay again if i was visiting disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for writing a review of our property.  I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us.  I hope to have you as our guest again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The room and bathroom were very clean! This hotel is really across the street from Disneyland, that's priceless !! The continental breakfast was just okay, just enough to hold you over.  I would definitely stay here again!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our property.  Unfortunately it sounds like you stayed with us just before we introduced the new breakfast items.  We now serve waffles, egg patties, sausage links, yogurt, toast, croissants, danishes, muffins, cereals, oatmeal, fresh fruit, and juices, coffee, and milk.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: We stayed two nights with our family of four, during a trip to Disneyland. This hotel has a great location- directly across the street from the pedestrian entrance to Disneyland. The hotel is old, run down, and in need of a remodel. We did not eat at the adjacent restaurant for two reasons: The dinner looked to be a HORRIBLE buffet. We didn't want to risk eating it the night before a full day at Disneyland. We didn't eat the continental breakfast buffet, which is the upper level of the restaurant, because of the looks of dinner AND we wanted to get right to Disneyland. Our first room was old and run down. Someone in an adjacent room was smoking pot, which made our room REAK. We were moved to another room down the hall. The manager apologized and reduced our rate for that night
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for taking time to write a review of our property.  I am sorry you did not enjoy your stay with us.  I am extremely sorry for the inconvenience you experienced due to an inconsiderate guest and the impression of our hotel it left with you.  We did address the situation with that guest once you were moved to more comfortable accomodations and we located the source.  As far as the restaurant next door, we only lease the upstairs for the breakfast and provide our own food.  The breakfast we now serve includes egg patties, sausage links, waffles, toast, croissants, danish, muffins, cereal, oatmeal, fresh fruit, yogurt and juices, coffee, and milk.  Again I would like to apologize for your negative experience with us.  I know it was inconvenient to have to move rooms, expecially with little ones in tow.  We would really like you to stay with us again and experience a comfortable, relaxing stay with us.  Please contact me here at the hotel if you would like to stay with us again.  Our number is 714 776 4800  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Ok, great location but there are other hotes that are as close.  Problem was Kelly.  I guess everyone can have a bad day but leave it at home.  I checked in and was very happy with the person who helped me.  As soon as she said she had to talk to the manager Kelly leaned over and told her "no".  I guess she could hear my request but did not say hello to me, say she was sorry, or even LOOK up at me.  It was amazing.  She was right there, right infront of me but could not be bothered to look up and say hello.  I am not going to put up with being treated that way....I don't care if you are 5 steps closer to the Disneyland gate, it isn't worth it.  Kelly needs "Disney" training.
Manager Response: I am very sorry for that you had this experience.  If I offended you in any way or my response or manner of response  was perceived as inappropriate I do apologize.  I do wish I knew what the incident is you are referencing and the details behind my response so I could address the situation and evaluate how I may be perceived.  Please feel free to contact me at the hotel.  We would like you to return to our hotel and experience our true service.

Summary Heading: Great hotel for family going to Disneyland
Summary: We went with our family and were able to get rooms next to each other.  We loved being able to walk across the street and go to disneyland, come back for a rest or nap for the kids, and then go back over later....all without looking for parking or waiting for a bus!  We also got the little ones ready for bed and went outside of our room and watched the fireworks each night.  This was definitely the place to stay.  There is also a continental breakfast available, but it's not great.  The best part though, is that little kids just need cereal or yogurt, but I thought that they were going to have a hot breakfast by now.  The adults were looking forward to that.  The staff was very nice and we didn't really have too much noise...and we were on the 1st level.  One of the adults in
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review of our property. I am sorry the upgraded breakfast met with some delays.  While it will not be a full hot breakfast we will have some options available.  We are currently testing various items to see which ones are preferred.  Our breakfast will be fully upgraded by May.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: It was WONDERFUL to stay right across the street from the Disneyland entrance.  After several days of Disneying, it was great to know that we had to take the fewest possible steps to get back to our hotel.  The pool was nice, clean and a good temperature, and the hot tub was not too hot.  The room was fine, in pretty good shape with nothing broken or dirty.  The rooms are definitely smaller than the Camelot two hotels down but honestly, who cares?  All I wanted was a place to sleep.  The beds were comfortable and it was nice to have a sitting area with a couch.  The buffet breakfast next door was not very exciting, and the coffee was completely disgusting.  I got some Disney trinkets in the gift shop for a surprisingly reasonable price, and the gift shop attendant was extremely
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to review our property.  I appreciate your feedback.  The information you provided will help us to continue and improve the quality of our customer service.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: The manager is the main problem at this hotel.  She has no intention of "being of service" to those who stay here.  We were told on the phone that there was good probablity of being able to park a second car on site, since it was during the week and in February, hardly the busy season.  BIG JOKE....although there WAS parking available, the manager refused to accomodate us, even though we were willing to pay for the additional car.  We had to find parking off site, on our own, and pay an additional  fee.   We would not stay here again and would encourage others to stay at one of the MANY other hotels across from Disneyland.
Manager Response: I am very sorry you were disappointed with your stay.  I know you were told to check at check in to see if the one car policy could be waived.  Unfortunately I was unable to.  February was very busy for us this year with almost every day in February close to a sell out.  We are very limited on parking so we do have to restrict the number of vehicles to ensure guests still due to arrive have a parking space.  This is why we take the steps to tell every guest at the time of reservation of the one car per room policy, include the policy with the email confirmations,and list it on websites.  When I was not able to meet your request, I did provide a listing of five alternative parking options plus two additional that were located just feet from our property.  Again I am very sorry I did not have room for a second vehicle.  Please call the hotel and ask to speak with me if you would like to stay with us again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: Basic hotel accommodation that is about as close as you get to the Disneyland entrance.  Nothing special about the room and in fact it is a bit worn.  But for the price and location, it can't be beat and they throw in a passable free continental breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you for writing a review of our property and letting us know what needs improved.  We do look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: This was our first time staying here and we'll do it again next time (one night on March 26).   The location can't be beat for sure and the room was nice and clean.   We stayed in a mini-suite and it looked exactly like the photos on the website.  The staff was very friendly and accommodating.  We wish they didn't charge for parking, but at least it was cheaper than parking at Disneyland.   The breakfast was okay... the usual fare of cereal, toast, bagels, fruit, donuts, yogurt, coffee, juice, etc.  Thanks for the nice stay BW Plus!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our property.  It is wonderful to see you enjoyed your stay with us.  We definitely look forward to your next visit with us.  Thank you and take care.

Summary Heading: Nice place, not the best parking.
Summary: After a 14 hour drive it was nice finally getting to the hotel. The parking was not however the best. It shares the parking with the neighboring returant, and the spaces are really tiny so if you own something larger then an aveo good luck not getting your doors dented. When we actually got into the room it was a nice surprise. The room was nicely decorated, the bed was super soft, overal it was a good stay. The bathroom however was really small, and the toilet was really small as well. The t.v.was not in the best shape. There were a bunch of lines through it and it could stand to be replaced. The worst part however was the fact that the "free wi-fi" never worked. We called the front desk several times and they never ever got it fixed. As long as you don't care about the tv or
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our property.  I am pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us.  Hopefully some of your concerns will have been addressed before you visit us again.  We are addressing the wi-fi issue and all the older tvs are in the process of being replaced.    Thank you and take care.

Summary: As others have said, the location can't be beat! We were here last year also and found our stay very pleasant. There is something to say about being so close. It is easy to go back and forth although we didn't because we stayed at the park until we were tired.  Since we have special dietary needs it was essential that we have a refrigerator and microwave and this motel has them.  Someone wrote about the tv being small. We didn't come to Disneyland to watch television!  We didn't have a car this time but last year I remember that I felt that the fee for parking a car was high. Perhaps that is standard around the area. The rooms were clean, not beautiful by any measure but again, what do you want when you come to Disneyland?? You want to be close to the park!! This is the place!
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for writing a review of our property.  We greatly appreciate your feedback.  It is a pleasure having you as our guest and we look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you and take care.

Summary: My fiance and I stayed here for two nights on St Patricks Day weekend 2012.  We normally splurge on the Grand Californian when we go, but this was a last minute trip and didn't want to break the bank.  We were surprised at how nice and clean the rooms felt.  Nice seating area by the door where you walk in, two double beds (firm and comfortable, but we're bringing our own pillows next time).  We were happy we stayed on the third floor, very quiet.  Parking is additional $8 per day.  The location could not be beat for a Non-Disney hotel!  On actual St Patricks day when we were in the park, it was pouring rain and we were soaked to the bone.  So at lunch time we ran back across the street to our hotel (5 min walk max), threw our shoes and jeans in the dryer for a few minutes, and
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our property.  We look forward to you returning to our property.  It was unfortunate that it rained on St. Patrick's Day however, I am glad our dryers were able to help you continue to enjoy your day at the parks.  Thank you and take care.
